Name: waymar royce
Subtitles: What do you expect? They're savages. One lot steals a goat from another lot and before you know it, they're ripping each other to pieces.

Name: will
Subtitles: I've never seen wildlings do a thing like this. I've never seen a thing like this, not ever in my life.

Name: waymar royce
Subtitles: How close did you get?

Name: will
Subtitles: Close as any man would.

Name: gared
Subtitles: We should head back to the wall.

Name: royce
Subtitles: Do the dead frighten you?

Name: gared
Subtitles: Our orders were to track the wildlings. We tracked them. They won't trouble us no more.

Name: royce
Subtitles: You don't think he'll ask us how they died? Get back on your horse.

Name: will
Subtitles: Whatever did it to them could do it to us. They even killed the children.

Name: royce
Subtitles: It's a good thing we're not children. You want to run away south, run away. Of course, they will behead you as a deserter … If I don't catch you first. Get back on your horse. I won't say it again.

Name: royce
Subtitles: Your dead men seem to have moved camp.

Name: will
Subtitles: They were here.

Name: gared
Subtitles: See where they went.

Name: royce
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: gared
Subtitles: It's …

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Go on. Father's watching.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And your mother.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Fine work, as always. Well done.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: I love the detail that you've managed to get in this corners. … Quite beautiful … the stitching …

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Don't think too much, Bran.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Relax your bow arm.

Name: jonrobb
Subtitles: Quick, Bran, faster!

Name: cassel
Subtitles: Lord Stark. My lady. A guardsman just rode in from the hills. They've captured a deserter from the Night's Watch.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Get the lads to saddle their horses.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Do you have to?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He swore an oath, Cat.

Name: cassel
Subtitles: The law is law, my lady.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Tell Bran he's coming, too.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He won't be a boy forever. And winter is coming.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Lad, go run back and get the rest.

Name: will
Subtitles: White Walkers. I saw the White Walkers. White Walkers. The White Walkers, I saw them.

Name: will
Subtitles: I know I broke my oath. And I know I'm a deserter. I should have gone back to the Wall and warned them. But I saw what I saw. I saw the White Walkers. People need to know. If you can get word to my family, tell them I'm no coward. Tell them I'm sorry.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block.

Name: will
Subtitles: Forgive me, lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Don't look away.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: King of the Andals and the First Men …

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Father will know if you do.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You did well.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You understand why I did it?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Jon said he was a deserter.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: But do you understand why I had to kill him?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Our way is the old way?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Is it true he saw the White Walkers?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: So he was lying?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: A madman sees what he sees.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Mountain lion?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: There are no mountain lions in these woods.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: It's a freak.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's a direwolf.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Tough old beast.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Now there are five.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You want to hold it?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Where will they go? Their mother's dead.

Name: cassel
Subtitles: They don't belong down here.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Better a quick death. They won't last without their mother.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Right. Give it here.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: NO!

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Put away your blade.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I take orders from your father, not you.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Please, father!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm sorry, Bran.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: What about you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm not a Stark. Get on.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The runt of the litter. That one's yours, Snow.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: As your brother, I feel it's my duty to warn you

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We're Lannisters. Lannisters don't act like fools.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What if Jon Arryn told someone?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: But who would he tell?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My husband.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn't know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he's off fucking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You should be the Hand of the king.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That's an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You have five northern children. You're not an outsider.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I wonder if the old gods agree.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's your gods with all the rules.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I am so sorry, my love.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Tell me.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your sister. The boy …

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He's coming this far North, there's only one thing he's after.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You can always say no, Ned.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion's chamber. I'm told he reads all night.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: I'm told he drinks all night.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: We've brought up eight barrels of ale from the cellar. Perhaps we'll find out.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: In any case, candles.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Why's your mother so dead-set on us getting pretty for the king?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: It's for the queen, I bet. I hear she's [sleek as a mink?]

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I hear the prince is a right royal prick.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He's never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I saw the king! He's got hundreds of people!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: How many times have I told you

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: But he's coming right now! Down our road!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I want you to promise me

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I promise.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: D'you know what?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Where's Arya? Sansa, where's your sister?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA's helm]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Move!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You've got fat.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Cat!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Nine years. Why haven't I seen you? Where the hell have you been?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Where's the Imp?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Will you shut up?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Who have we here? You must be Robb. My, you're a pretty one. Your name is?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Arya.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Ooh. Show us your muscles. You'll be a soldier.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's Jaime Lannister. The queen's twin brother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Would you please shut up.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: My queen.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My queen.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Take me to your crypt. I want to pay my respects.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We've been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Ned.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Tell me about Jon Arryn.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: One minute he was fine, and then … Burned right through him, whatever it was. I loved that man.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: We both did.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: He never had to teach you much, but me … You remember me at 16? All I wanted to do was crack skulls and fuck girls. He showed me what was what.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Don't look at me like that. Not his fault I didn't listen. I need you, Ned. Down at Kings Landing. Not up here, where you're no damn use to anybody. Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the king.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm not worthy of the honor.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I'm not trying to honor you. I'm trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat, drink, and whore my way to an early grave. Damn it, Ned, stand up. You helped me win the Iron Throne, now help me keep the damn thing. We were meant to rule together. If your sister had lived, we would have been bound by blood. Well, it's not too late. I have a son, you have a daughter. We'll join our Houses.
ners: [set(), set(), {'ned'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Mmh. It is true what they say about the Northern girls.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Did you hear the king's in Winterfell?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I did hear something about that.

Name: ros
Subtitles: And the queen. And her twin brother. They say that he is the most handsome man in the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And the other brother?

Name: ros
Subtitles: The queen has two brothers?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: There's the pretty one. And there's the clever one.

Name: ros
Subtitles: I hear they call him the Imp.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I hear he hates that nickname.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Oh? I hear he's more than earned it. I hear he's a drunken little lecher into all manner of perversions.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Clever girl.

Name: ros
Subtitles: We've been expecting you, Lord Tyrion.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Have you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The gods gave me one blessing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Don't get up.

Name: ros
Subtitles: M'lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You've much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She has odd cravings, our sister.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don't leave me alone with these people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry, I've begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I thought you might say that. But since we're short on time, Come on, girls. See you at sundown.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Close the door!

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Did you have to bury her in a place like this? She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She was my sister. This is where she belongs.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: She belonged with me.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: In my dreams, I kill him every night.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Not all of them.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Daenerys!

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Daenerys! There's our bride to be! Look – a gift from Illyrio. Touch it. Come on. Feel the fabric. Mmmm. Isn't he a gracious host?
ners: [{'daenerys'}, set(), {'illyrio'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We've been his guests for over a year and he's never asked us for anything.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Illyrio is no fool. He knows I won't forget my friends when I come into my throne. You still slouch. Let me see. You have a woman's body now. I need you to be perfect today. Can you do that for me? You don't want to wake the dragon, do you?
ners: [{'illyrio'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began today.

Name: maid
Subtitles: It's too hot, my lady.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Where is he?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: The Dothraki are not known for their punctuality.

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: May I present my honored guests? Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name. The rightful King of the Andals and the First Men. And his sister, Daenerys, of the House Targaryen.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Do you see how long his hair is? When Dothraki are defeated in combat, they cut off their braid so the whole world can see their shame. Khal Drogo has never been defeated. He's a savage, of course, but he's one of the finest killers alive. And you will be his queen.

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: Come forward, my dear.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Where's he going?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: The ceremony is over.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: But he didn't say anything. Did he like her?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: Trust me, Your Grace. If he didn't like her, we'd know.

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: It won't be long now. Soon you will cross the Narrow Sea and take back your father's throne. The people drink secret toasts to your health. They cry out for their true king.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: When will they be married?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: Soon. The Dothraki never stay still for long.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Is it true they lie with their horses?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: I wouldn't ask Khal Drogo.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Do you take me for a fool?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: I take you for a king. Kings lack the caution of common men. My apologies if I've given offense.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: I know how to play a man like Drogo. I give him a queen and he gives me an army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't want to be his queen. I want to go home.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: So do I. I want us both to go home. But they took it from us. So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't know.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: We go home with an army. With Khal Drogo's army. I would let his whole tribe fuck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that's what it took.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I'm ugly?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's so handsome.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Hush now. Your father hasn't even said yes.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why would he say no? He'd be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: He'd have to leave home. He'd have to leave me. And so would you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You left your home to come here. And I'd be queen someday. Please make father say yes.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Sansa…

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Please, please. It's the only thing I ever wanted.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Is he dead yet?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Uncle Benjen!

Name: benjen
Subtitles: You got bigger. I rode all day. Didn't want to leave you alone with the Lannisters. Why aren't you at the feast?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a bastard in their midst.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Well, you're always welcome on the wall. No bastard was ever refused a seat there.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: So take me with you when you go back.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Jon…

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Father will let me if you ask him, I know he will.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: The Wall isn't going anywhere.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm ready to swear your oath.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: You don't understand what you'd be giving up. We have no families. None of us will ever father sons.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't care about that.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: You might, if you knew what it meant. … I'd better get inside. Rescue your father from his guests. We'll talk later.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your uncle's in the Night's Watch.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What're you doing back there?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Preparing for a night with your family. I've always wanted to see the Wall.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're Tyrion Lannister. The queen's brother?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My greatest accomplishment. You – you're Ned Stark's bastard, aren't you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the bastard, though.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a bastard. Let me give you some advice, bastard. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.
ners: [{'stark'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What the hell do you know about being a bastard?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All dwarves are bastards in their fathers' eyes.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: You at a feast -- It's like a bear in a trap.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Of course I did. Just a lad. But he was tough, Ned. A true Ranger.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: The two he was with are still missing.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: A wildling ambush.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Maybe. Direwolves south of the wall. Talk of the Walkers. My brother might be the next Hand to the king. Winter is coming.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Winter is coming.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Uncle Benjen.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Robb boy. How are ye?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'm good.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes. Lovely country.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I'm sure it's very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thirteen, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're tall. Still growing?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I think so, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And have you bled yet?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And your dress. Did you make it?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Such talent. You must make something for me.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I hear we might share a grandchild someday.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I hear the same.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn't stay hidden up here forever.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your pardon.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it's true.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure we'll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I don't fight in tournaments.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No? Getting a little old for it?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I don't fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don't want him to know what I can do.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Well said.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya!

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Time for bed.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat's nest they call a capital.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I won't let him take you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The king takes what he wants. That's why he's king.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I'll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.'

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: How did he get so fat?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: He only stops eating when it's time for a drink.

Name: a voice
Subtitles: It's Maester Luwin, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Send him in.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Pardon, my lord, my lady. A rider in the night from your sister.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Stay.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: This was sent from the Eyrie. What's she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn't been back there since her wedding.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What news?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: She's fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She's fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn't know what she's saying.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lysa's head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son's life, if she wasn't certain her husband was murdered?

Name: luwin
Subtitles: If this news is true, and the Lannisters conspire against the throne, who but you can protect the king?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: The king rode for a month to ask Lord Stark's help. He's the only one he trusts. You swore the king an oath, my lord.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: He spent half his life fighting Robert's wars. He owes him nothing. Your father and brother rode south once on a king's demand.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: A different time. Different king.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: When do I meet with the Khal? We need to begin planning the invasion.

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown, you shall have it.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: When?

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: When their omens favor war.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: I piss on Dothraki omens. I waited 17 years to get my throne back.

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is considered a dull affair.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you, ser. Are you from my country?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.

Name: illyrio
Subtitles: Dragons' eggs, Daenerys. From the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai. The ages have turned them to stone, but they will always be beautiful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you, Magister.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: She's beautiful. … Ser Jorah, I don't know how to say ‘thank you' in Dothraki.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: There is no word for ‘thank you' in Dothraki.

Name: viserys
Subtitles: Make him happy.

Name: khal drogo
Subtitles: No.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do you know the Common Tongue?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Is ‘no' the only word that you know?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Rough night, Imp?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other, it will be a miracle.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I didn't pick you for a hunter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The greatest in the land. My spear never misses.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: It's not hunting if you pay for it.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Are you as good with a spear as you used to be?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: No, but I'm still better than you.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I know what I'm putting you through. Thank you for saying yes. I only ask you because I need you. You're a loyal friend. You hear me? A loyal friend. The last one I've got.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I hope I'll serve you well.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You will. And I'll make sure you don't look so fucking grim all the time. Come on, boys, let's go kill some boar!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Come on, you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Stop. STOP.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Are you completely mad?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He saw us.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's all right. It's all right.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He saw us!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I heard you the first time. Quite the little climber, aren't you? How old are you, boy?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Ten

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ten.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The things I do for love.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You need to drink, child... And eat.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Isn't there anything else?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Dothraki have two things in abundance

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Khaleesi!

Name: irri
Subtitles: Your hands.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: I have no interest in hospitality or comfort. I'll stay with Drogo until he fulfils his end of the bargain and I have my crown.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: As you wish, your Grace.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, Mormont, as brutish as this life is, I suppose it is preferable to beheading. What did Ned Stark want you for? Buying from a slaver?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense. You can rest assured of that.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What good will my sympathies do them?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: One word and I'll hit you again.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm telling mother!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Go! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You can't...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you understand?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: The Prince will remember that, little lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Bread. And two of those little fish. And a mug of dark beer to wash it down. And bacon, burnt black.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Little brother.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Beloved siblings.

Name: myrcella baratheon
Subtitles: Is Bran going to die?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Apparently not.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you mean?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Maester says the boy may live.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where's your sense of wonder? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And go celibate? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Please.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I would have dressed, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I never knew.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care... The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.
ners: [set(), {'robert'}, set(), set(), {'robert'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I am grateful..

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps this time she'll listen.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: A sword for the wall?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I already have one.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Good man. Have you swung it yet?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Of course I have.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We've guarded the Kingdoms for 8 000 years.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Is it "we" already? Have you taken your vows then?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Soon enough.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not, It's only for life.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Thank you, Nymeria. Septa Mordane says I have to do it again. "My things weren't properly folded", she says. Who cares how they're folded?! They're going to get all messed up anyway.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's good you've got help.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Watch. Nymeria, gloves.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Impressive.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Shut up. Nymeria, gloves!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I have something for you. And it has to be packed very carefully.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: A present?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Close the door. This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's so skinny.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I can be quick.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel? Do you like the balance?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I think so.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: First lesson

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I know which end to use.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm going to miss you... Careful... All the best swords have names, you know.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I came to say goodbye to Bran.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You've said it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I want you to leave.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I have no choice.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You can. You must.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You've said goodbye to Bran? He's not going to die. I know it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You Starks are hard to kill.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My mother?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She was very kind.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It was always my color.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Farewell, Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And you, Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Is my mother alive? Does she know about me? Where I am, where I'm going? Does she care?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Gods, this is country! I've half a mind to leave them all behind and keep going.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I've half a mind to go with you.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: What do you say, just you and me on the Kingsroad, swords at our sides, a couple of tavern wenches to warm our beds tonight.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You should have asked me 20 years ago.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: There were wars to fight, women to marry... We never had the chance to be young.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I recall a few chances.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: There was that one... Oh, what was her name? That common girl of yours? Becca? With the great big tits you could bury your face in.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Bessie. She was one of yours.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Bessie! Thank the gods for Bessie and her tits. Yours was... Aleena? No. You told me once. Meryl? Your bastardo s mother?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Wylla.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: That's it. She must have been a rare wench to make Lord Eddard Stark forget his honor. You never told me what she looked like.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Nor will I.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: We were at war. None of us knew if we were gonna go back home again. You're too hard on yourself. You always have been. I swear if I weren't your King, you'd have hit me already.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Trust me, that's not the worst thing. There was a rider in the night.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it? Should we send her a wedding gift?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: A knife perhaps, a good sharp one, and a bold man to wield it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She's little more than a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Soon enough that child will spread her legs and start breeding.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Tell me we're not speaking of this.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Oh, it's unspeakable to you? What her father did to your family... That was unspeakable. What Rhaegar Targaryen did to your sister... the woman I loved. I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: But you can't get your hands on this one, can you?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: This Khal Drogo, it's said he has 100,000 men in his horde.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: There are still those in the Seven Kingdoms who call me Usurper. If the Targaryen boy crosses with a Dothraki horde at his back, the scum will join him.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: There's a war coming, Ned. I don't know when, I don't know who we'll be fighting, but it's coming.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: Sit. You'll be fed. Untie them.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Why do you read so much?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Look at me and tell me what you see.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Is this a trick?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Until your brother killed that King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree? But how? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you? What's your story, bastard?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A bastard boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Night's Watch protects the realm from...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense... Everything's better with some wine in the belly.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: It's time we reviewed the accounts, my lady. You'll want to know how much this royal visit has cost us.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Talk to Poole about it.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Poole went south with Lord Stark, my lady. We need a new steward, and there are several other appointments that require our immediate attention...

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I don't care about appointments!

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Very good, my Lord. My Lady.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: When was the last time you left this room?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I have to take care of him.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: What if he's wrong? Bran needs me.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Close the windows! I can't stand it! Please make them stop!

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.

Name: assassin
Subtitles: You're not supposed to be here. No one is supposed to be here. It's a mercy. He's dead already.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: No!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Have you ever seen a dragon?

Name: irri
Subtitles: Dragon gone, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Everywhere? Even in the east?

Name: irri
Subtitles: No dragon. Brave men kill them. It is known.

Name: jhiqui
Subtitles: It is known.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: A trader from Garth told me that dragons come from the moon.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The moon?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: He told me the moon was an egg, Khaleesi, that once there were two moons in the sky. But one wandered too close to the sun and it cracked from the heat. Out of it poured a thousand thousand dragons and they drank the sun's fire.

Name: irri
Subtitles: Moon is no egg. Moon is goddess... wife of sun. It is known.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Leave me with her. Why did the trader from Garth tell you these stories?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Men like to talk when they're happy. Before your brother bought me for you, it was my job to make men happy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How old were you?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: I was nine when my mother sold me to the pleasure house.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Nine?!

Name: doreah
Subtitles: I did not touch a man for three years, Khaleesi. First you must learn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Can you teach me how to make the Khal happy?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Will it take three years?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: No.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: Welcome.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: The boy was always sure-footed before.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Someone tried to kill him twice. Why? Why murder an innocent child? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Saw what, my lady?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: Did you notice the dagger the killer used? It's too fine a weapon for such a man. The blade is Valyrian steel, the handle dragonbone. Someone gave it to him.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: They come into our home and try to murder my brother? If it's war they want...

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: What, is there going to be a battle in the Godswood? Too easily words of war become acts of war. We don't know the truth yet. Lord Stark must be told of this.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I don't trust a raven to carry these words.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'll ride to King's Landing.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Mother, you can't.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I must.

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: I'll send Hal with a squad of guardsmen to escort you.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: Let me accompany you at least. The Kingsroad can be a dangerous place for a woman alone.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What about Bran?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: No, Khaleesi. You must look in his eyes always. Love comes in at the eyes. It is said that Irogenia of Lys could finish a man with nothing but her eyes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Finish a man?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Kings traveled across the world for a night with Irogenia. Magisters sold their palaces. Khals burned her enemies just to have her for a few hours. They say a thousand men proposed to her and she refused them all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, she sounds like an interesting woman. I don't think that Drogo will like it with me on top.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: You will make him like it, Khaleesi. Men want what they've never had. And the Dothraki take slaves like a hound takes a bitch. Are you a slave, Khaleesi? Then don't make love like a slave. Very good, Khaleesi. Out there he is the mighty Khal, but in this tent, he belongs to you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't think that this is the Dothraki way.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: If he wanted the Dothraki way, why did he marry you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No. No. Tonight I would look upon your face.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Pardon me, Ser.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Do I frighten you so much, girl? Or is it him there making you shake? He frightens me too. Look at that face.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady? Does the hound frighten you? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.
ners: [set(), {'ilyn'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: My princess can drink as much as she wants. Don't worry... You're safe with me.

Name: mycah
Subtitles: I'll get you!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What are you doing here? Go away.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Your sister? And who are you, boy?

Name: mycah
Subtitles: Mycah, my Lord.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He the butcher's boy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He's my friend.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: A butcher's boy who wants to be a Knight, eh? Pick up your sword, butcher's boy. Let's see how good you are.

Name: mycah
Subtitles: She asked me to, my Lord. She asked me to.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm your prince, not your lord, and I said pick up your sword.

Name: mycah
Subtitles: It's not a sword, my prince. It's only a stick.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: And you're not a Knight. Only a butcher's boy. That was my lady's sister you were hitting, do you know that?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Stop it!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya, stay out of this.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'll gut you, you little cunt!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nymeria!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Please don't.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Then go! Don't touch me.

Name: soldier
Subtitles: The wolf's not here. Look down by the stream.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go! Leave now!

Name: soldier
Subtitles: It's a direwolf.

Name: soldier
Subtitles: I'll check down here.

Name: soldier
Subtitles: I think I heard a noise.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Go!

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: My lord! My lord! They found her. She's unharmed.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Where is she?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: She's been taken directly before the King.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Who took her?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: The Lannisters found her.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Right, get back.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: The Queen ordered them to bring her straight to him.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Back! Back to the inn. All back!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm sorry.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Are you hurt?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's all right. What is the meaning of this? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How dare you speak to your King in that manner?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Quiet, woman. Sorry, Ned. I never meant to frighten the girl. But we need to get this business done quickly.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's not true! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's not what happened!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Yes it is! They all attacked me and she threw my sword in the river.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Liar!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Shut up!

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Enough! He tells me one thing, she tells me another. Seven hells! What am I to make of this? Where's your other daughter, Ned?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: In bed asleep.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Now, child... Tell me what happened. Tell it all and tell it true. It's a great crime to lie to a King.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Liar! Liar liar liar!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Stop it! That's enough of that.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Liar liar liar!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Stop! Arya!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: What would you have me do, whip her through the streets? Damn it, children fight. It's over.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You let that little girl disarm you? See to it that your daughter is disciplined. I'll do the same with my son.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Gladly, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And what of the direwolf? What of the beast that savaged your son?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I'd forgot the damned wolf.

Name: soldier
Subtitles: We found no trace of the direwolf, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: So be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We have another wolf.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: As you will.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You can't mean it.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: A direwolf's no pet. Get her a dog. She'll be happier for it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He doesn't mean Lady, does he? No no, not Lady! Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Lady wasn't there! You leave her alone!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please! It wasn't Lady!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: s this your command... your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Where is the beast?

Name: soldier
Subtitles: Chained up outside, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Is this some trick?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The butcher's boy... You rode him down?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: He ran... Not very fast.

Name: kings landing guard
Subtitles: Welcome, Lord Stark. Grand Maester Pycelle has called a meeting of the Small Council. The honor of your presence is requested.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Get the girls settled in. I'll be back in time for supper. And, Jory, you go with them.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Yes, my Lord.

Name: kings landing guard
Subtitles: If you'd like to change into something more appropriate…

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Thank the gods you're here, Stark. About time we had some stern northern leadership.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Glad to see you're protecting the throne.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Sturdy old thing. How many kings' asses have polished it, I wonder? What's the line? The King shits and the Hand wipes.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Very handsome armor. Not a scratch on it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I know. People have been swinging at me for years, but they always seem to miss.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You've chosen your opponents wisely then.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I have a knack for it. It must be strange for you coming into this room. I was standing right here when it happened. He was very brave, your brother. Your father too. They didn't deserve to die like that. Nobody deserves to die like that.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: But you just stood there and watched.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: 500 men just stood there and watched. All the great knights of the Seven Kingdoms. You think anyone said a word, lifted a finger? No, Lord Stark. 500 men and this room was silent as a crypt. Except for the screams, of course, and the Mad King laughing. And later... When I watched the Mad King die, I remembered him laughing as your father burned... It felt like justice.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), {'stark'}, set(), set(), set(), {'the'}, set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Is that what you tell yourself at night? You're a servant of justice? That you were avenging my father when you shoved your sword in Aerys Targaryen's back?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Tell me... If I'd stabbed the Mad King in the belly instead of the back, would you admire me more?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You served him well, when serving was safe.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Lord Varys.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I was grievously sorry to hear of your troubles on the Kingsroad. We are all praying for Prince Joffrey's full recovery.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: A shame you didn't say a prayer for the butcher's son. Renly! You're looking well.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: And you look tired from the road. I told them this meeting could wait another day, but...

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: But we have a Kingdom to look after. I've hoped to meet you for some time, Lord Stark. No doubt Lady Catelyn has mentioned me.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She has, Lord Baelish. I understand you knew my brother Brandon as well.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: All too well. I still carry a token of his esteem from navel to collarbone.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Perhaps you chose the wrong man to duel with.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It wasn't the man that I chose, my Lord. It was Catelyn Tully. A woman worth fighting for, I'm sure you'll agree.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: I humbly beg your pardon, my Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Grand Maester.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: How many years has it been? You were a young man.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And you served another King.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: How forgetful of me. This belongs to you, now. Should we begin?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Without the King?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Winter may be coming, but I'm afraid the same cannot be said for my brother.

Name: varys
Subtitles: His Grace has many cares. He entrusts some small matters to us that we might lighten the load.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: We are the lords of small matters here.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: My brother instructs us to stage a tournament in honor of Lord Stark's appointment as Hand of the King.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Mmm, how much?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: 40,000 gold dragons to the champion, 20,000 to the runner-up, 20,000 to the winning archer.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Can the treasury bear such expense?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'll have to borrow it. The Lannisters will accommodate, I expect. We already owe Lord Tywin 3 million gold. What's another 80,000?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Are you telling me the Crown is three million in debt?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'm telling you the Crown is six million in debt.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: How could you let this happen?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The Master of Coin finds the money. The King and the Hand spend it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I will not believe Jon Arryn allowed Robert to bankrupt the realm.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Lord Arryn gave wise and prudent advice, but I fear His Grace doesn't always listen.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Counting coppers," he calls it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'll speak to him tomorrow. This tournament is an extravagance we cannot afford.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: As you will. But still, we'd best make our plans.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: There will be no plans until I speak to Robert. Forgive me, my Lords. I had a long ride.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You are the King's Hand, Lord Stark, we serve at your pleasure.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Please, it's nearly healed.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: It's ugly.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A King should have scars, you fought off a direwolf. You're a warrior like your father.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm not like him. I didn't fight off anything. It bit me and all I did was scream. And the two Stark girls saw it, both of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's not true. You killed the beast. You only spared the girl because of the love your father bears her father. When Aerys Targaryen sat on the Iron Throne, your father was a rebel and a traitor. Someday you'll sit on the throne and the truth will be what you make it.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Do I have to marry her?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes. She's very beautiful and young. If you don't like her, you only need to see her on formal occasions and when the time comes, to make little princes and princesses. And if you'd rather fuck painted whores, you'll fuck painted whores. And if you'd rather lie with noble virgins, so be it. You are my darling boy and the world will be exactly as you want it to be. Do something nice for the Stark girl.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I don't want to.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, but you will. The occasional kindness will spare you all sorts of trouble down the road.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: We allow the northerners too much power. They consider themselves our equals.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How would you handle them?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'd double their taxes and command them to supply 10,000 men to the royal army.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A royal army?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Why should every lord command his own men? It's primitive, no better than the hill tribes. We should have a standing army of men loyal to the Crown, trained by experienced soldiers... Instead of a mob of peasants who've never held pikes in their lives.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And if the northerners rebel?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'd crush them. Seize Winterfell and install someone loyal to the realm as Warden of the North. Uncle Kevan, maybe.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And these 10,000 northern troops, would they fight for you or their lord?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: For me. I'm their King.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: But you've just invaded their homeland, asked them to kill their brothers.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm not asking.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The North cannot be held... not by an outsider. It's too big and too wild. When the winter comes, the Seven gods together couldn't save you and your royal army. A good King knows when to save his strength... And when to destroy his enemies.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: So you agree... The Starks are enemies?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Everyone who isn't us is an enemy.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Enough of that, young lady. Eat your food.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm practicing.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Practicing for what?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Prince.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Arya, stop!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He's a liar and a coward and he killed my friend.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: The Hound killed your friend.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Hound does whatever the Prince tells him to do.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're an idiot.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're a liar. And if you told the truth, Mycah would be alive.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Enough!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What's happening here?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Arya would rather act like a beast than a lady.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Go to your room. We'll speak later. That's for you, love…

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The same dollmaker makes all of Princess Myrcella's toys. Don't you like it?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I haven't played with dolls since I was eight. May I be excused?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: You've barely eaten a thing.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's all right. Go on.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: War was easier than daughters.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Go away!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Arya, open the door. May I come in? Whose sword is that?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Mine.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Give it to me. I know this maker's mark. This is Mikken's work. Where did you get this? This is no toy. Little ladies shouldn't play with swords.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I wasn't playing. And I don't want to be a lady.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Come here. Now what do you want with this?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's called Needle.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: A blade with a name. And who were you hoping to skewer with Needle? Your sister? Do you know the first thing about sword fighting?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Stick 'em with the pointy end.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: laughs] That's the essence of it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I was trying to learn. I asked Mycah to practice with me. I asked him. It was my fault.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: No, sweet girl. You didn't kill the butcher's boy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I hate them! I hate all of them. The Hound, the Queen and the King and Joffrey and Sansa.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Sansa was dragged before the King and Queen... And asked to call the Prince a liar.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So was I! He is a liar.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Darling, listen to me. Sansa will be married to Joffrey someday. She cannot betray him. She must take his side even when he's wrong.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But how you can let her marry someone like that?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Well… Look at me. You're a Stark of Winterfell. You know our words.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Winter is coming.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You were born in the long summer. You've never known anything else. But now winter is truly coming. And in the winter, we must protect ourselves, look after one another. Sansa is your sister.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't hate her. Not really.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I don't want to frighten you, but I won't lie to you either. We've come to a dangerous place. We cannot fight a war amongst ourselves. All right? Go on. It's yours.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I can keep it?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Try not to stab your sister with it. If you're going to own a sword, you'd better know how to use it.

Name: old nan
Subtitles: Don't listen to it. Crows are all liars. I know a story about a crow.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I hate your stories.

Name: old nan
Subtitles: I know a story about a boy who hated stories. I could tell you about Ser Duncan the Tall. Those were always your favorites.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Those weren't my favorites. My favorites were the scary ones.

Name: old nan
Subtitles: Oh, my sweet summer child. What do you know about fear? Fear is for the winter, when the snows fall a hundred feet deep. Fear is for the long night, when the sun hides for years and children are born and live and die all in darkness. That is the time for fear, my little Lord, when the White Walkers move through the woods. Thousands of years ago there came a night that lasted a generation. Kings froze to death in their castles, same as the shepherds in their huts. And women smothered their babies rather than see them starve, and wept and felt the tears freeze on their cheeks. So is this the sort of story that you like? In that darkness, the White Walkers came for the first time. They swept through cities and kingdoms, riding their dead horses, hunting with their packs of pale spiders big as hounds…
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What are you telling him now?

Name: old nan
Subtitles: Only what the little Lord wants to hear.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Get your supper. I want some time with him. One time she told me the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant named Macumber.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Maybe we do.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: How do you feel? You still don't remember anything? I've seen you climb a thousand times. In the wind, in the rain... A thousand times. You never fall.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I did though. It's true, isn't it... what Maester Luwin says about my legs? I'd rather be dead.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Don't ever say that.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'd rather be dead.

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: Fewer eyes back here, my Lady. But still too many.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: It's nine years since I've set foot in the capital. And no one knew who I was the last time I came either.

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: My Lady.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Welcome to King's Landing, Lady Stark. Would you mind following us?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I would. We've done nothing wrong.

Name: guard
Subtitles: We've been instructed to escort you into the city.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Instructed? I don't know who's providing your instructions, but...

Name: guard
Subtitles: Follow me, Lady Stark.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Cat! Go on. Go upstairs.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You little worm! You take me for some back-alley Sally you can drag into a…

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I meant no disrespect to you of all people.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: How dare you bring me here! Have you lost your mind?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No one will come looking for you here. Isn't that what like you wanted? I'm truly sorry... about the locale.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: How did you know I was coming to King's Landing?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A dear friend told me.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lord Varys.

Name: varys
Subtitles: To see you again after so many years is a blessing. Your poor hands.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: How did you know I was coming?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Knowledge is my trade, my Lady. Did you bring the dagger with you, by any chance? My little birds are everywhere. Even in the north. They whisper to me the strangest stories. Valyrian steel.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Do you know whose dagger this is?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I must admit I do not.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Well well, this is an historic day. Something you don't know that I do. There's only one dagger like this in all of the Seven Kingdoms. It's mine.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Yours?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: At least it was, until the tournament on Prince Joffrey's last nameday. I bet on Ser Jaime in the jousting, as any sane man would. When the Knight of the Flowers unseated him, I lost this dagger.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: To whom?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Tyrion Lannister. The Imp.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: If that were a real sword, you'd be dead. Lord Snow here grew up in a castle spitting down on the likes of you. Pyp. Do you think Ned Stark's bastard bleeds like the rest of us?

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Next!

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Lord Snow, it appears you're the least useless person here. Go clean yourselves up. There's only so much I can stomach in a day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A charming man.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: I don't need him to be charming. I need him to turn this bunch of thieves and runaways into men of the Night's Watch.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And how's that going, Commander Mormont?

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Slowly. A raven came for Ned Stark's son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good news or bad?

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Both.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Lord Stark. I meant to give you this earlier. So forgetful these days. A raven from Winterfell this morning.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Good news? Perhaps you'd like to share it with your wife?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: My wife is in Winterfell.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Is she?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I thought that she'd be safest in here. One of several such establishments I own.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You're a funny man. A very funny man.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Ned! [poking her head out of a window]

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The Starks... Quick tempers, slow minds.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: You broke my nose, bastard!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's an improvement.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: If we threw you over the Wall, wonder how long it'd take you to hit.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: I wonder if they'd find you before the wolves did.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: What're you looking at, halfman?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm looking at you. You've got an interesting face. Very distinctive faces. All of you.

Name: rast
Subtitles: What do you care about our faces?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's just I think they would look marvelous decorating spikes in King's Landing. Perhaps I'll write my sister, the Queen, about it.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: We'll talk later, Lord Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Everybody knew what this place was and no one told me. No one but you. My father knew and left me to rot here at the Wall all the same.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Grenn's father left him too... Outside a farmhouse when he was three. Pyp was caught stealing a wheel of cheese. His little sister hadn't eaten in three days. He was given a choice

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They hate me because I'm better than they are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's a lucky thing none of them were trained by a master-at-arms like your Ser Rodrik. I don't imagine any of them have ever held a real sword before they came here. Your brother Bran. He's woken up.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The mere suggestion that the Queen's brother tried to kill your boy would be considered treason.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: We have proof. We have the blade.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Which Lord Tyrion will say was stolen from him. The only man who could say otherwise has no throat, thanks to your boy's wolf.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Petyr has promised to help us find the truth. He's like a little brother to me. He would never betray my trust.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'll try to keep you alive, for her sake. A fool's task, admittedly, but I've never been able to refuse your wife anything.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I won't forget this. You're a true friend.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation to maintain.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How could you be so stupid?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Calm down.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He's a child... 10 years old. What were you thinking?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I was thinking of us. You're a bit late to start complaining about it now. What has the boy told them?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Nothing. He's said nothing. He remembers nothing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Then what are you raving about?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What if it comes back to him? If he tells his father what he saw...

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We'll say he was lying. We'll say he was dreaming. We'll say whatever we like. I think we can outfox a 10-year-old.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And my husband?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll go to war with him if I have to. They can write a ballad about us

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Let me go.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Never.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The boy won't talk. And if he does, I'll kill him. Him, Ned Stark, the King... the whole bloody lot of them, until you and I are the only people left in this world.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I wish I could see the girls.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's too dangerous.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Just for a moment.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Until we know who our enemies are...

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I know they did it, Ned. The Lannisters. In my bones, I know it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Littlefinger's right. I can't do anything without proof.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And if you find the proof?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Then I bring it to Robert... And hope he's still the man I once knew. You watch yourself on the road, huh? That temper of yours is a dangerous thing.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My temper? Gods be good, you nearly killed poor Littlefinger yesterday.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He still loves you.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Does he?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Off with you.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: It's been a long time. But I still remember every face. You remember your first?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Of course, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Who was it?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: A Tyroshi. Never learned the name.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: How'd you do it?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Lance through the heart.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Quick one. Lucky for you. Mine was some Tarly boy at the Battle of Summerhall. My horse took an arrow so I was on foot, slogging through the mud. He came running at me, this dumb high-born lad, thinking he could end the rebellion with the single swing of his sword. I knocked him down with the hammer. Gods, I was strong then. Caved in his breastplate. Probably shattered every rib he had. Stood over him, hammer in the air. Right before I brought it down he shouted, "Wait! Wait!"... They never tell you how they all shit themselves. They don't put that part in the songs. Stupid boy. Now the Tarlys bend the knee like everyone else. He could have lingered on the edge of the battle with the smart boys and today his wife would be making him miserable, his sons would be ingrates, and he'd be waking three times in the night to piss into a bowl. Wine! Lancel. Gods, what a stupid name. Lancel Lannister. Who named you? Some halfwit with a stutter? What are you doing?
ners: [set(), set(), {'tarly'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'tarlys'}, set(), set(), {'lancel'}, set(), {'lancel'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: lancel lannister
Subtitles: It's empty, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: What do you mean it's empty?

Name: lancel lannister
Subtitles: There's no more wine.

Name: robert baratheon
