Subtitles: Is that what empty means?! So get more. Tell your cousin to get in here. Kingslayer! Get in here. Surrounded by Lannisters. Every time I close my eyes I see their blond hair and their smug, satisfied faces. It must wound your pride, huh? Standing out there like a glorified sentry. Jaime Lannister, son of the mighty Tywin... Forced to mind the door while your King eats and drinks and shits and fucks. So come on. We're telling war stories. Who was your first kill, not counting old men?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'jaime', 'tywin'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: One of the outlaws in the Brotherhood.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: I was there that day. You were only a squire, 16 years old.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You killed Simon Toyne with a counter riposte. Best move I ever saw.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: A good fighter, Toyne, but he lacked stamina.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Your outlaw... Any last words?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I cut his head off, so no.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: What about Aerys Targaryen? What did the Mad King say when you stabbed him in the back? I never asked. Did he call you a traitor? Did he plead for a reprieve?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He said the same thing he'd been saying for hours... "Burn them all." If that's all, your Grace...

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Dothraki don't believe in money. Most of their slaves were given to them as gifts.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: From whom?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: If you rule a city and you see the horde approaching, you have two choices

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Tell them all to stop.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You want the entire horde to stop? For how long?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Until I command them otherwise.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You're learning to talk like a Queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not a Queen. A Khaleesi.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: You dare! You give commands to me? To me? You do not command the dragon. I am Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. I don't take orders from savages or their sluts. Do you hear me?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: irri
Subtitles: Rakharo ask if you want him dead, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No!

Name: irri
Subtitles: Rakharo say you should take ear, to teach respect.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Please please, don't hurt him. Tell him I don't want my brother harmed.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Kill these Dothraki dogs! I am your King!

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Shall we return to the Khalasar, Khaleesi?

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: You walk. [to Viserys]

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: I wanted to be here when you saw it for the first time. I'm leaving this morning.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're leaving?

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: I'm the First Ranger. My job is out there. There have been disturbing reports.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What kind of reports?

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: The kind I don't want to believe.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: m ready. I won't let you down.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: You're not going. You're no ranger, Jon.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But I'm better than every...

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: Better than no one! Here... A man gets what he earns, when he earns it. We'll speak when I return.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: A bear's balls.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're joking?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: And his brains and his guts, his lungs and his heart all fried in his own fat. When you're a hundred miles north of the Wall and you ate your last meal a week ago, you leave nothing for the wolves.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And how do a bear's balls taste?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: A bit chewy. And what about you, my Lord? What's the strangest thing you've eaten?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do Dornish girls count? So you roam the Seven Kingdoms, collaring pickpockets and horse thieves and bringing them here as eager recruits?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: But it's not all of 'em's done bad things. Some of 'em's just poor lads looking for steady feed. Some of 'em's high-born lads looking for glory.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They have a better chance finding feed than glory.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: The Night's Watch is a joke to you, is it? Is that what we are, Lannister? An army of jesters in black?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You don't have enough men to be an army and aside from Yoren here, none of you are particularly funny.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: I hope we've provided you with some good stories to tell when you're back in King's Landing. But something to think about while you're drinking your wine down there, enjoying your brothels... Half the boys you've seen training will die north of the Wall. Might be a wilding's axe that gets them, might be sickness, might just be the cold. They die in pain. And they do it so plump little lords like you can enjoy their summer afternoons in peace and comfort.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you think I'm plump? Listen, Benjen... May I call you Benjen?

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: Call me what you like.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm not sure what I've done to offend you. I have great admiration for the Night's Watch. I've great admiration for you as First Ranger.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: You know, my brother once told me that nothing someone says before the word "but" really counts.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But... I don't believe that giants and ghouls and White Walkers are lurking beyond the Wall. I believe that the only difference between us and the wildlings is that when the Wall went up, our ancestors happened to live on the right side of it.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: You're right. The wildlings are no different from us. A little rougher maybe. But they're made of meat and bone. I know how to track them and I know how to kill them. It's not the wildlings giving me sleepless nights. You've never been north of the Wall, so don't tell me what's out there.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Are you going below? Keep well, keep warm.

Name: benjen stark
Subtitles: Enjoy the capital, brother.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: I always do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I think he's starting to like me. "Going below"?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Into the tunnel and out the other side. He'll be north of the Wall for a month or two.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So you're heading down to King's Landing too.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Day after tomorrow. I get about half of my recruits from their dungeons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Let's share the road. I could use some decent company.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: I travel a bit on the grubby side, my Lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not this time. We'll be staying at the finest castles and inns. No one turns away a Lannister.

Name: irri
Subtitles: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: irri
Subtitles: When was last time you bleed, Khaleesi? You change, Khaleesi. It's a blessing from the Great Stallion.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: For a man on horseback, the curved blade is a good thing, easier to handle. It's a good weapon for a Dothrakan. But a man in full plate... the arakh won't get through the steel. That's where the broadsword has the advantage. Designed for piercing plate.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: Dothraki don't wear steel dresses.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Armor.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: Armor. Armor make a man... Vroz?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Slow.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: Slow.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It's true, but it also keeps a man alive.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: My father taught me how to fight. He taught me that speed defeats size.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I've heard that your father was a famous warrior.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: He was bloodrider to Khal Bharbo. And your father, Jorah the Andal? He was a warrior also?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: He still is. A man of great honor. And I betrayed him.

Name: irri
Subtitles: The Khaleesi wants to eat something different tonight. Kill some rabbits.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: There are no rabbits.

Name: irri
Subtitles: Find some ducks, she likes ducks.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: Have you seen any ducks, woman? No rabbits, no ducks. Do you have eyes in your head? Do you?

Name: irri
Subtitles: Dog then. I have seen many dogs.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I don't think she wants to eat dog.

Name: irri
Subtitles: The Khaleesi have baby inside her. It is true. She does not bleed for two moons. Her belly start to swell.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: A blessing from the Great Stallion.

Name: irri
Subtitles: She does not want to eat horse.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I'll have the boys butcher a goat for supper. I need to ride to Qohor.

Name: rhakaro
Subtitles: We ride for Vaes Dothrak.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Don't worry. I'll catch you. The horde's easy to find.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Don't stand so still. It's harder to hit a moving target. Except for you. You move too much. I could just hold my sword out and let you do the work for me.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: How many winters have you seen, Lord Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Eight... no, nine.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: All of them brief?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They say the winter of my birth was three years long, Maester Aemon.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: This summer has lasted nine. But reports from the Citadel tell us the days grow shorter. The Starks are always right eventually

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: We've been capturing wildlings, more every month. They're fleeing south. The ones who flee... say they've seen the White Walkers.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, and the fishermen of Lannisport say they see mermaids.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: One of our own rangers swore he saw them kill his companions. He swore it right up to the moment Ned Stark chopped his head off.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: The Night's Watch is the only thing standing between the realm and what lies beyond. And it has become an army of undisciplined boys and tired old men. There are less than a thousand of us now. We can't man the other castles on the Wall. We can't properly patrol the wilderness. We've barely enough resources to keep our lads armed and fed.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Your sister sits by the side of the King. Tell her we need help.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: When winter does come, gods help us all if we're not ready.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's a boy.

Name: khal drogo
Subtitles: How do you know?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I know.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm sorry to see you leave, Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's either me or this cold. And it doesn't appear to be going anywhere.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Will you stop at Winterfell on your way South?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I expect I will. Gods know there aren't many feather beds between here and King's Landing.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If you see my brother Bran, tell him I miss him. Tell him I'd visit if I could.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He'll never walk again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If you're going to be a cripple, it's better to be a rich cripple. Take care, Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Farewell, My Lord.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: You are late, boy. Tomorrow you will be here at midday.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: Your dancing master, Syrio Forel.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: Tomorrow you will catch it. Now pick it up. That is not the way, boy. This is not a great sword that is needing two hands to swing it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's too heavy.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: It is heavy as it needs to be to make you strong. Just so. One hand is all that is needed. Now you are standing all wrong. Turn your body side-face. So. You are skinny. That is good. The target is smaller. Now the grip... Let me see. The grip must be delicate.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What if I drop it?

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: The steel must be part of your arm. Can you drop part of your arm? No. Nine years Syrio Forel was first sword to the Sealord of Braavos. He knows these things. You must listen to me, boy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm a girl.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: Boy, girl... You are a sword, that is all. That is the grip. You are not holding a battle-axe. You are holding...

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: A needle.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: Ahhh… Just so. Now we will begin the dance. Remember, child, this is not the dance of the Westeros we are learning... The knight's dance, hacking and hammering. This is the Bravo's dance... The water dance. It is swift and sudden. All men are made of water, do you know this? If you pierce them, the water leaks out and they die. Now you will try to strike me.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: Up! Dead. Dead. Very dead. Come. Again, faster.

Name: old nan
Subtitles: The little Lordo s been dreaming again.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: We have visitors.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't want to see anyone.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Really? If I was cooped up all day with no one but this old bat for company, I'd go mad. Anyway, you don't have a choice. Robb's waiting.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't want to go.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Neither do I. But Robb's Lord of Winterfell, which means I do what he says and you do what I say. Hodor! Help Bran down the hall.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I must say I received a slightly warmer welcome on my last visit.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Any man of the Night's Watch is welcome at Winterfell.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Any man of the Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'm not your boy, Lannister. I'm Lord of Winterfell while my father is away.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Then you might learn a lordo s courtesy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So it's true. Hello Bran. Do you remember anything about what happened?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: He has no memory of that day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Curious.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Why are you here?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Would your charming companion be so kind as to kneel? My neck is beginning to hurt.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Kneel, Hodor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you like to ride, Bran?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Yes. Well, I mean I did like to.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: The boy has lost the use of his legs.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What of it? With the right horse and saddle, even a cripple can ride.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm not a cripple.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Then I'm not a dwarf. My father will rejoice to hear it. I have a gift for you. Give that to your saddler. He'll provide the rest. You must shape the horse to the rider. Start with a yearling and teach it to respond to the reins and to the boy's voice.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Will I really be able to ride?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You will. On horseback you will be as tall as any of them.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Is this some kind of trick? Why do you want to help him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You've done my brother a kindness. The hospitality of Winterfell is yours.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Spare me your false courtesies, Lord Stark. There's a brothel outside your walls. There I'll find a bed and both of us can sleep easier.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Couldn't resist some northern ass? If you like redheads, ask for Ros.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Come to see me off, Greyjoy? Kind of you. Your master doesn't seem to like Lannisters.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He's not my master.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, of course not. What happened here? Where is lady Stark? Why didn't she receive me?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: She wasn't feeling well.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She's not in Winterfell, is she? Where did she go?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My lady's whereabouts...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My lady? Your loyalty to your captors is touching. Tell me, how do you think Balon Greyjoy would feel if he could see his only surviving son has turned lackey? I still remember seeing my father's fleet burn in Lannisport. I believe your uncles were responsible?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Must have been a pretty sight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Nothing prettier than watching sailors burn alive. Yes, a great victory for your people. Shame how it all turned out.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: We were outnumbered 10 to one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A stupid rebellion then. I suppose your father realized that when your brothers died in battle. Now here you are, your enemy's squire.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Careful, Imp.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I've offended you. Forgive me, it's been a rough morning. Anyway, don't despair. I'm a constant disappointment to my own father and I've learned to live with it. Your next tumble with Ros is on me. I'll try not to wear her out.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Leg, shoulder, leg. Left foot forward. Good. Now pivot as you deliver the stroke. Put all your weight behind it.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: What in seven hells is that?

Name: pyp
Subtitles: They'll need an eighth hell to fit him in.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Tell them your name.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Samwell Tarly, of Horn Hill. I mean, I was of Horn Hill. I've come to take the black.

Name: rast
Subtitles: Come to take the black pudding.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Well, you couldn't be any worse than you look. See what he can do.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I yield. Please, no more.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: On your feet. Pick up your sword. Hit him till he finds his feet. It seems they've run short of poachers and thieves down south. Now they send us squealing bloody pigs. Again, harder.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Enough! He yielded.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Looks like the bastardo s in love. All right then, lord Snow, you wish to defend your lady love, let's make it an exercise. You two. Three of you ought to be sufficient to make lady piggy squeal. All you've got to do is get past the bastard.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Are you sure you want to do this?

Name: grenn
Subtitles: No. Yield yield yield! I yield.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: We're done for today. Go clean the armory. That's all you're good for.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Well fought!

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Piss off.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Did he hurt you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I've had worse.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You can call me Sam... If you want. My mother calls me Sam.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not going to get any easier, you know? You'll have to defend yourself.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Why didn't you get up and fight?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I wanted to. I just couldn't.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Why not?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I'm a coward. My father always says so.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Wall's no place for cowards.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You're right. I'm sorry. I just... Wanted to thank you.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: A bloody coward. People saw us talking to him. Now they'll think we're cowards too.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: You're too stupid to be a coward.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: You're too stupid to be a...

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Quick now, before summer's over.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Come on here!

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Vaes Dothrak. The city of the horselords.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: A pile of mud. Mud and shit and twigs - best these savages can do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: These are my people now. You shouldn't call them savages.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: I'll call them what I like, because they're my people. This is my army. Khal Drogo is marching the wrong way with my army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: If my brother was given an army of Dothraki, could you conquer the Seven Kingdoms?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Dothraki have never crossed the Narrow Sea. They fear any water their horses can't drink.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But if they did?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: King Robert is fool enough to meet them in open battle, but the men advising him are different.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And you know these men?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I fought beside them once, long ago. Now Ned Stark wants my head. He drove me from my land.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You sold slaves.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I had no money and an expensive wife.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And where is she now?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: In another place, with another man.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Your Grace?

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Yes, my dear?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: They call you the last dragon...

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: They do.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: You have dragon's blood in your veins?

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: It's entirely possible.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: What happened to the dragons? I was told that brave men killed them all.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: The brave men didn't kill dragons. The brave men rode them. Rode them from Valyria to build the greatest civilization this world has ever seen. The breath of the greatest dragon forged the Iron Throne, which the Usurper is keeping warm for me. The swords of the vanquished, a thousand of them... melted together like so many candles.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: I have always wanted to see a dragon. There is nothing in the world that I would rather see.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Really? Why dragons?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: They can fly. And wherever they are, just a few flaps of their wings and they're somewhere else... Far away. And they can kill. Anyone or anything that tries to hurt them gets burned away to nothing... melted... like so many candles. Seeing a dragon would make me very happy.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, after 15 years in a pleasure house, I imagine just seeing the sky makes you happy.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: I was not locked in. I have seen things.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: What have you seen?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: I've seen... A man from Asshai with a dagger of real dragonglass. I've seen a man who could change his face the way that other men change their clothes. And I've seen a pirate who wore his weight in gold and whose ship had sails of colored silk. So... Have you seen one?

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: A pirate ship?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: A dragon.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: No, the last one died many years before I was born. I'll tell you what I have seen

Name: doreah
Subtitles: What happened to the skulls?

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't know. The Usurper had them smashed to powder, I expect. Scattered to the wind.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: That's very sad.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Yes, it is. What did I buy you for? To make me sad?

Name: doreah
Subtitles: No, your Grace. To teach your sister.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: To teach my sister how to be a better lover? You think I bought you to make Khal Drogo happy? You pretty little idiot. Go on then. Get on with it.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Someday your husband will sit there and you will sit by his side. And one day, before too long, you will present your son to the court. All the lords of Westeros will gather here to see the little prince...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What if I have a girl?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Gods be good, you'll have boys and girls and plenty of them.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What if I only have girls?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: I wouldn't worry about that.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Jeyne Poole's mother had five children, all of them girls.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Yes, but it's highly unlikely.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But what if?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: If you only had girls, I suppose the throne would pass to Prince Joffrey's little brother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And everyone would hate me.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Nobody could ever hate you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Joffrey does.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Nonsense. Why would you say such a thing? That business with the wolves? I've told you a hundred times... A direwolf is not...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Please shut up about it.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Do you remember your lessons? Who built the Iron Throne?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Aegon the Conqueror.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: And who built the Red Keep?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Maegor the Cruel.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: And how many years did it take to build...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My grandfather and uncle were murdered here, weren't they?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: They were killed on the orders of King Aerys, yes.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: The Mad King.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Commonly known as the Mad King.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why were they killed?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: You should speak to your father about these matters.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't want to speak to my father, ever.

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: You will find it in your heart to forgive your father.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, I won't.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: It's the Hando s tournament that's causing all this trouble, my Lords.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The King's tournament. I assure you the Hand wants no part of it.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: Call it what you will, Lord Stark Ser, the city is packed with people and more flooding in every day. Last night we had a tavern riot, a brothel fire, three stabbings and a drunken horse race down the Street of Sisters.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Dreadful.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: If you can't keep the King's peace, perhaps the City Watch should be commanded by someone who can.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: I need more men.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You'll get 50. Lord Baelish will see it paid for.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I will?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You found money for a champion's purse, you can find money to keep the peace. I'll also give you 20 of my household guards till the crowds have left.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: Thank you, my Lord Hand Ser. They will be put to good use.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The sooner this is over, the better.

Name: varys
Subtitles: The realm prospers from such events, my Lord. They give the great a chance at glory, and the lowly a respite from their woes.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And every inn in the city is full and the whores are walking bow-legged.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm sure the tourney puts coins in many a pocket. Now... If there's nothing else, my Lords?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: This heat. On days like this, I envy you northerners your summer snows. Until tomorrow my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I've been hoping to talk to you about Jon Arryn.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Lord Arryn? His death was a great sadness to all of us. I took personal charge of his care, but I could not save him. His sickness struck him very hard and very fast. I saw him in my chambers just the night before he passed. Lord Jon often came to me for counsel.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: I have been Grand Maester for many years. Kings and Hands have come to me for advice since...

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What did Jon want the night before he died?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: He came inquiring after a book.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: A book? What book?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: I fear it would be of little interest to you, my Lord. A ponderous tome.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'd like to read it.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: The lineages and histories of the great houses of the Seven Kingdoms, with descriptions of many high lords and noble ladies and their children.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Harkon Umber, first of his name, born to lord Hother Umber and lady Amaryllis Umber in the 183rd year after Aegon's landing, at the last hearth. Blue of eye, brown of hair and fair complected, died in his 14th year of a wound sustained

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: As I said, my Lord, a ponderous read.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Did Jon Arryn tell you what he wanted with it?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: He did not, my Lord. And I did not presume to ask.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Jon's death...

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Such a tragedy.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Did he say anything to you during his final hours?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Nothing of import, my Lord. There was one phrase he kept repeating

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The seed is strong"? What does that mean?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: The dying mind is a demented mind, Lord Stark. For all the weight they're given, last words are usually as significant as first words.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And you're quite certain he died of a natural illness?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: What else could it be?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Poison.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: A disturbing thought. I don't think it likely. The Hand was loved by all. What sort of man would dare...

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I've heard it said that poison is a woman's weapon.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Yes. Women, cravens... and eunuchs. Did you know that lord Varys is a eunuch?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Everybody knows that.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Yes, yes, of course. How that sort of person found himself on the King's Council, I will never know.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I've taken enough of your time.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: No trouble at all, my Lord. It's a great honor...

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Thank you. I'll find my own way out.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Syrio says a water dancer can stand on one toe for hours.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: It's a hard fall down these steps.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Syrio says every hurt is a lesson and every lesson makes you better. Tomorrow I'm going to be chasing cats.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Cats? Syrio says…

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He says every swordsman should study cats. They're quiet as shadows and as light as feathers. You have to be quick to catch them.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He's right about that.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Now that Bran's awake will he come live with us?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He needs to get his strength back first.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He wants to be a knight of the King's Guard. He can't be one now, can he?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: No. But someday he could be Lord of a holdfast or sit on the King's Council. Or he might raise castles like Brandon the Builder.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Can I be Lord of a holdfast?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You will marry a high Lord and rule his castle. And your sons shall be knights and princes and lords.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No. That's not me.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Hello. Ser Alliser said I'm to be your new watch partner. I should warn you, I don't see all that well.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Come stand by the fire. It's warmer.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No, that's all right. I'm fine.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're not. You're freezing.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I don't like high places.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You can't fight. You can't see. You're afraid of heights and almost everything else probably. What are you doing here, Sam?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: On the morning of my 18th nameday, my father came to me. "You're almost a man now," he said, "but you're not worthy of my land and title. Tomorrow, you're going to take the black, forsake all claim to your inheritance and start north. If you do not," he said, "then we'll have a hunt and somewhere in these woods your horse will stumble and you'll be thrown from your saddle to die. Or so I'll tell your mother. Nothing would please me more." Ser Alliser's going to make me fight again tomorrow, isn't he?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yes, he is.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I'm not going to get any better, you know?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Well… You can't get any worse.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I hear you're reading a boring book.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Pycelle talks too much.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He never stops. Do you know Ser Hugh of the Vale? Not surprising. Until recently, he was only a squire... Jon Arryn's squire. He was knighted almost immediately after his master's untimely death.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Knighted for what? Why are you telling me this?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I promised Cat that I'd help you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Where is Ser Hugh? I'll speak to him.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A singularly bad idea. Do you see that boy there? One of Varys's little birds. The Spider has taken a great interest in your comings and goings. Now look there. That one belongs to the Queen. And do you see that Septa pretending to read her book?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Varys or the Queen?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No. She's one of mine. Is there someone in your service whom you trust completely?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The wiser answer was no, my Lord. Get a message to this paragon of yours... Discreetly. Send him to question Ser Hugh. After that, you might want him to visit a certain armorer in the city. He lives in a large house at the top of the street of Steel.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I have my observers, as I said, and it's possible that they saw Lord Arryn visit this armorer several times in the weeks before his death.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Lord Baelish, perhaps I was wrong to distrust you.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Distrusting me was the wisest thing you've done since you climbed off your horse.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Ser Hugh? Ser Hugh!

Name: hugh of vale
Subtitles: As you can see, I'm busy.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: I'm here on behalf of Lord Eddard Stark, the Hand of the king. I'm the captain of his guard.

Name: hugh of vale
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I didn't catch your name, Ser...

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: No "ser." I'm not a knight.

Name: hugh of vale
Subtitles: I see. Well, it just so happens that I am.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: He said he'd be glad to talk to the Hand himself. He's a knight, you see.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: A knight. They strut around like roosters down here. Even the ones who've never seen an arrow coming their way.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: You shouldn't be out here, my Lord. There's no telling who has eyes where.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Let them look.

Name: tobho mott
Subtitles: The former Hand did call on me, my Lord, several times. I regret to say he did not honor me with his patronage.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What did Lord Arryn want?

Name: tobho mott
Subtitles: He always came to see the boy.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'd like to see him as well.

Name: tobho mott
Subtitles: As you wish, my Lord. Gendry! Here he is. Strong for his age. He works hard. Show the Hand the helmet you made, lad.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: This is fine work.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It's not for sale.

Name: tobho mott
Subtitles: Boy, this is the King's Hand! If his lordship wants the helmet...

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I made it for me.

Name: tobho mott
Subtitles: Forgive him, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: There's nothing to forgive. When Lord Arryn came to visit you, what would you talk about?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: He just asked me questions is all, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What kind of questions?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: About my work at first, if I was being treated well, if I liked it here. But then he started asking me about my mother.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your mother?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Who she was, what she looked like.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What did you tell him?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: She died when I was little. She had yellow hair. She'd sing to me sometimes.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Look at me. Get back to work, lad. If the day ever comes when that boy'd rather wield a sword than forge one, you send him to me.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Find anything?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: King Robert's bastard son.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: This is for the King from Lord Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Listen. Do you hear them? How many do you think are in there with him? Guess.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Three? Four?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He likes to do this when I'm on duty... He makes me listen as he insults my sister.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Forgive me, my Lord...

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why do I have to forgive you? Have you wronged me?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: We've met before, you know.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Have we? Strange, I've forgotten.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: The siege of Pyke. We fought side by side one afternoon.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That's where you got your scar?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Aye. One of the Greyjoys nearly took my eye.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Vicious sons of whores.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: They like their bloodshed.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They stopped liking it at the end. That was a proper battle. D'you remember Thoros of Myr charging through the breach?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: With his burning sword? I'll remember that till the day I die.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I saw the youngest of the Greyjoy lads at Winterfell. It was like seeing a shark on a mountaintop.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Theon? He's a good lad.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I doubt it.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I'll bet you smell of blackberry jam! Let me smell it. Come here.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Can I leave this with you? The message from Lord Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't serve Lord Stark.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Where have you been?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Watch duty. With Sam.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Prince Porkchop. Where is he?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He wasn't hungry.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Impossible!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's enough. Sam's no different from the rest of us. There was no place for him in the world, so he's come here. We're not going to hurt him in the training yard anymore. Never again, no matter what Thorne says. He's our brother now and we're going to protect him.

Name: rast
Subtitles: You are in love, Lord Snow. You girls can do as you please. But if Thorne puts me up against Lady Piggy, I'm gonna slice me off a side of bacon.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No one touches Sam.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: What are you waiting for? Attack him! You, get in there.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Hit me. Go on, hit me! I yield! Yield yield. I yield.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: You think this is funny, do you? When you're out there beyond the Wall with the sun going down, do you want a man at your back? Or a sniveling boy?

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: You send this whore to give me commands? I should have sent you back her head!

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Forgive me, Khaleesi. I did as you asked.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Hush now. It's all right. Irri, take her and leave us.

Name: irri
Subtitles: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why did you hit her?!

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: How many times do I have to tell you? You do not command me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I wasn't commanding you. I just wanted to invite you to supper.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: What's this?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's a gift. I had it made for you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Dothraki rags? Are you going to dress me now?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: This stinks of manure. All of it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Stop - stop it.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: You would turn me into one of them, wouldn't you? Next you'll want to braid my hair.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You've no right to a braid. You've won no victories yet.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: You do not talk back to me!

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: You are a horselordo s slut. And now you've woken the dragon...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I am a Khaleesi of the Dothraki! I am the wife of the great Khal and I carry his son inside me. The next time you raise a hand to me will be the last time you have hands.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I know for a fact that some of the officers go to that brothel in Mole's Town.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wouldn't doubt it.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Don't you think it's a little bit unfair? Making us take our vows while they sneak off for a little sally on the side?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sally on the side?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: It's silly, isn't it? What, we can't defend the Wall unless we're celibate? It's absurd.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I didn't think you'd be so upset about it.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Why not? Because I'm fat? But I like girls just as much as you do. They might not like me as much. I've never... been with one. You've probably had hundreds.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: As a matter of fact, I'm the same as you.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I find that hard to believe.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I came very close once. I was alone in a room with a naked girl, but...

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You didn't know where to put it?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I know where to put it.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Was she... Old and ugly?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Young and gorgeous. A whore named Ros.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: What color hair?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Red.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I like red hair. And her... Her...

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You don't want to know.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: That good?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Better.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Oh no. So why exactly did you not make love to Ros with the perfect...

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What's my name?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Jon Snow?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And why is my surname Snow?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Because... You're a bastard from the north.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I never met my mother. My father wouldn't even tell me her name. I don't know if she's living or dead. I don't know if she's a noblewoman or a fisherman's wife... Or a whore. So I sat there in the brothel as Ros took off her clothes. But I couldn't do it. Because all I could think was what if I got her pregnant and she had a child, another bastard named Snow? It's not a good life for a child.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: So... You didn't know where to put it?

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Enjoying yourselves? You look cold, boys.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: It is a bit nippy.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: A bit nippy, yeah, by the fire, indoors. It's still summer. Do you boys even remember the last winter? How long has it been now? What, 10 years? I remember. Was it uncomfortable at Winterfell? Were there days when you just couldn't get warm, never mind how many fires your servants built?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I build my own fires.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: That's admirable. I spent six months out there, beyond the Wall during the last winter. It was supposed to be a two-week mission. We heard a rumor Mance Rayder was planning to attack Eastwatch. So we went out to look for some of his men... Capture them, gather some knowledge. The Wildlings who fight for Mance Rayder are hard men. Harder than you'll ever be. They know their country better than we do. They knew there was a storm coming in. So they hid in their caves and waited for it to pass. And we got caught in the open. Wind so strong it yanked 100-foot trees straight from the ground, roots and all. If you took your gloves off to find your cock to have a piss, you lost a finger to the frost. And all in darkness. You don't know cold. Neither of you do. The horses died first. We didn't have enough to feed them, to keep them warm. Eating the horses was easy. But later when we started to fall... That wasn't easy. We should have had a couple of boys like you along, shouldn't we? Soft, fat boys like you. We'd have lasted a fortnight on you and still had bones leftover for soup. Soon we'll have new recruits and you lot will be passed along to the Lord Commander for assignment and they will call you men of the Night's Watch, but you'd be fools to believe it. You're boys still. And come the winter you will die... Like flies.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), {'mance'}, set(), set(), {'mance'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I hit him. I hit the dragon.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your brother Rhaegar was the last dragon. Viserys is less than the shadow of a snake.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He is still the true King.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The truth now

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No. But the common people are waiting for him. Illyrio said they're sewing dragon banners and praying for his return.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The common people pray for rain, health and a summer that never ends. They don't care what games the high Lords play.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What do you pray for, Ser Jorah?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I pray for home too. My brother will never take back the Seven Kingdoms. He couldn't lead an army even if my husband gave him one. He'll never take us home.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lover's quarrel?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm sorry. Do I...?

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Sansa dear, this is Lord Baelish. He's known...

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: An old friend of the family. I've known your mother a long long time.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why do they call you Littlefinger?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya!

Name: septa mordane
Subtitles: Don't be rude!

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No, it's quite all right. When I was a child I was very small and I come from a little spit of land called The Fingers, so you see, it's an exceedingly clever nickname.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I've been sitting here for days! Start the damn joust before I piss myself!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Gods, who is that?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Ser Gregor Clegane. They call him the Mountain. The Houndo s older brother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And his opponent?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Ser Hugh of the Vale. He was Jon Arryn's squire. Look how far he's come.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Yes, yes. Enough of the bloody pomp. Have at it!

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Not what you were expecting? Has anyone ever told you the story of the Mountain and the Hound? Lovely little tale of brotherly love. The Hound was just a pup, six years old maybe. Gregor a few years older, already a big lad, already getting a bit of a reputation. Some lucky boys just born with a talent for violence. One evening... Gregor found his little brother playing with a toy by the fire... Gregor's toy, a wooden knight. Gregor never said a word, he just grabbed his brother by the scruff of his neck and shoved his face into the burning coals. Held him there while the boy screamed, while his face melted. There aren't very many people who know that story.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'gregor'}, set(), {'gregor'}, {'gregor'}, set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I won't tell anyone. I promise.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No, please don't. If the Hound so much as heard you mention it, I'm afraid all the knights in King's Landing would not be able to save you.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: My Lord, Her Grace the Queen.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're missing your tournament.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Putting my name on it doesn't make it mine.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I thought we might put what happened on the Kingsroad behind us – the ugliness with the wolves. And forcing you to kill the beast was extreme. Though sometimes we go to extremes where our children are concerned. How is Sansa?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She likes it here.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The only Stark who does. Favors her mother, not much of the north in her.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What are you doing here?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I might ask the same of you. What is it you hope to accomplish?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The King called on me to serve him and the realm, and that's what I'll do until he tells me otherwise.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You can't change him. You can't help him. He'll do what he wants, which is all he's ever done. You'll try your best to pick up the pieces.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: If that's my job, then so be it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're just a soldier, aren't you? You take your orders and you carry on. I suppose it makes sense. Your older brother was trained to lead and you were trained to follow.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I was also trained to kill my enemies, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: As was I.

Name: marillion
Subtitles: Seven blessings to you, goodfolk!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And to you.

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: Boy! Bread, meat and beer, quickly.

Name: marillion
Subtitles: Good idea, grandfather. I'm starving. A song while we wait or?

Name: rodrick cassel
Subtitles: I'd rather throw myself down a well.

Name: marillion
Subtitles: Grandfather, may be your last chance if you're heading north. The only music the northerners know is the howling of wolves!

Name: masha heddle
Subtitles: I'm sorry, my Lord, we're full up. Every room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My men can sleep in the stable. As for myself, I don't require a large room.

Name: masha heddle
Subtitles: Truly, my lord, we have nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Is there nothing I can do... to remedy this?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You can have my room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: There's a clever man. You can manage food, I trust? Yoren, dine with me.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Aye, my Lord.

Name: marillion
Subtitles: My Lord of Lannister! Might I entertain you while you eat? I can sing of your father's victory at King's Landing!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Nothing would more likely ruin my supper. Lady Stark! What an unexpected pleasure. I was sorry to have missed you at Winterfell.

Name: masha heddle
Subtitles: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I was still Catelyn Tully the last time I stayed here. You, Ser... Is that the black bat of Harrenhal I see embroidered on your coat?

Name: knight of house whent
Subtitles: It is, my Lady.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And is Lady Whent a true and honest friend to my father... Lord Hoster Tully of Riverrun?

Name: knight of house whent
Subtitles: She is.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: The red stallion was always a welcome sight at Riverrun. My father counts Jonas Bracken amongst his oldest and most loyal bannermen.

Name: knight of house bracken
Subtitles: Our lord is honored by his trust.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I envy your father all his fine friends, but I don't quite see the purpose of this.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Knight of House Frey

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: This man... Came into my house as a guest and there conspired to murder my son, a boy of 10. In the name of King Robert and the good Lords you serve, I call upon you to seize him and help me return him to Winterfell to await the king's justice.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Does Ser Hugh have any family in the capital?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: No. I stood vigil for him myself last night. He had no one else.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He'd never worn this armor before.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Bad luck for him... Going against the Mountain.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Who determines the draw?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: All the knights draw straws, Lord Stark.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Aye... But who holds the straws? You've done good work, Sisters.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Life is strange. Not so many years ago we fought as enemies at the Trident.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm glad we never met on the field, Ser Barristan... as is my wife. I don't think the widow's life would suit her.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: You're too modest. I've seen you cut down a dozen great knights.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: My father once told me you were the best he'd ever seen. I never knew the man to be wrong about matters of combat.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: He was a fine man, your father. What the Mad King did to him was a terrible crime.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And that lad... He was a squire until a few months ago. How could he afford a new suit of armor?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Perhaps Lord Arryn left him some money? I hear the King wants to joust today.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Yes. That will never happen.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Robert tends to do what he wants.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: If the King got what he wanted all the time, we'd still be fighting a damned rebellion.

Name: lancel lannister
Subtitles: It's made too small, Your Grace. It won't go.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Your mother was a dumb whore with a fat arse. Did you know that? Look at this idiot! One ball and no brains. He can't even put a man's armor on him properly.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You're too fat for your armor.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Fat? Fat, is it? Is that how you speak to your King? That was funny, is it?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Oh, it's funny, is it?

Name: lancel lannister
Subtitles: No, Your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: No? You don't like the Hando s joke?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You're torturing the poor boy.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You heard the Hand. The King's too fat for his armor! Go find the breastplate stretcher, now!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The breastplate stretcher?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: How long before he figures it out?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Maybe you should have one invented.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: All right, all right. But you watch me out there. I still know how to point a lance.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You have no business jousting. Leave that for the young men.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Why? Because I'm king? Piss on that. I want to hit somebody!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And who's going to hit you back?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Anybody who can. And the last man in his saddle... will be you!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: There's not a man in the Seven Kingdoms would risk hurting you.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Are you telling me those cowards would let me win?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Drink.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm not thirsty.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Drink. Your King commands it. Gods! Too fat for my armor.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your squire... A Lannister boy?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Hmm... A bloody idiot... But Cersei insisted. I have Jon Arryn to thank for her. "Cersei Lannister will make a good match", he told me. "You'll need her father on your side." I thought being King meant I could do whatever I wanted. Enough of this! Let's go watch 'em ride. At least I can smell someone else's blood.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Robert?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: What? Oh! An inspiring sight for the people, eh? Come! Bow before your King! Bow, you shits!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Where's Arya

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: At her dancing lessons. The Knight of the Flowers.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you, Ser Loras.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Don't let Ser Gregor hurt him.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Hey.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I can't watch.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: 100 gold dragons on the Mountain.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: I'll take that bet.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Now what will I buy with 100 gold dragons? A dozen barrels of Dornish wine? Or a girl from the pleasure houses of Lys?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Or you could even buy a friend.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's going to die.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Ser Loras rides well.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Such a shame, Littlefinger. It would have been so nice for you to have a friend.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And tell me, Lord Renly, when will you be having your friend?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Loras knew his mare was in heat. Quite crafty, really.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Ser Loras would never do that! There's no honor in tricks.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No honor but quite a bit of gold.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Stop this madness in the name of your King!

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: I owe you my life, Ser.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I'm no Ser.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Remove his hood.

Name: marillion
Subtitles: On that eve, the captive Imp down-wards from his horse did limp, no more would he preen and primp, in garb of red and gold.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: This isn't the Kingsroad. You said we were riding for Winterfell.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I did... often and loudly.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Very wise. They'll be out in droves, looking for me in the wrong place. Wordo s probably gotten to my father by now. He'll be offering a handsome reward. Everyone knows a Lannister always pays his debts. Would you be so good as to untie me?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And why would I do that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why not? Am I going to run? The hill tribes would kill me for my boots. Unless a Shadowcat ate me first.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Shadowcats and hill tribes are the least of your concerns.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ah... the Eastern Road. We're going to The Vale. You're taking me to your sister's to answer for my imagined crimes. Tell me, Lady Stark. When was the last time you saw your sister?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Five years ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She's changed. She was always a bit touched, but now... you might as well kill me here.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I am not a murderer, Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Neither am I! I had nothing to do with the attempt on your son's life!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: The dagger found

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What sort of imbecile arms an assassin with his own blade?

Name: rodrik cassel
Subtitles: Should I gag him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why? Am I starting to make sense?

Name: rodrik cassel
Subtitles: My Lady, this way.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Untie me. If I die, what's the point?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Rodrik?

Name: rodrik cassel
Subtitles: I'll be fine, my Lady. There's no need to bloody yourself.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Your first? You need a woman. Nothing like a woman after a fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, I'm willing if she is.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Bran...

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: The Iron Islands. Sigil - a Kraken. Words - "We do not sow".

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Lords?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: The Greyjoys.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Famed for their skills at archery, navigation and lovemaking.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: And failed rebellions.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Sigil - a stag. - A crowned stag now that Robert's King.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Good.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Words - "Ours is the fury". Lords - the Baratheons.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: The Westerlands - sigil - a lion.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Hmm...

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Words - "A Lannister always pays his debts."

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: No. A common saying, but not their official motto.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Lords - the Lannisters.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: We're still on their words.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't know them.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: You do know them. Think.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Unbowed, unbent, unbroken".

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: That's House Martell.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Righteous in wrath".

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: House Hornwood.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Family, duty, honor".

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Those are Tully words... Your mother's. Are we playing a game?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Family, duty, honor"... Is that the right order?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: You know it is.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Family comes first?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Your mother had to leave Winterfell to protect the family.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: How can she protect the family, if she's not with her family?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Your mother sat by your bed for three weeks while you slept.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: And then she left!

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: When you were born, I was the one who pulled you from your mother. I placed you in her arms. From that moment until the moment she dies, she will love you. Absolutely. Fiercely.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Why did she leave?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: I still can't tell you, but she will be home soon.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Do you know where she is now? Today?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: No, I don't.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Then how can you promise me she'll be home soon?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Sometimes I worry you're too smart for your own good.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'll never shoot another arrow.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: And where is that written?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You need legs to work a bow.

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Hmm... If the saddle Lord Tyrion designed actually works, you could learn to shoot a bow from horseback.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Really?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: Dothraki boys learn when they're four years old. Why shouldn't you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Shh... Keep it down. You're not supposed to be inside the castle walls.

Name: ros
Subtitles: I thought you were supposed to be an important person around here.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Important enough for the likes of you.

Name: ros
Subtitles: You're not the only nobleman in my life, you know.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Who? the Imp? I'd call him half a nobleman.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Jealous?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Why should I be jealous?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Anyone with a few coppers in his pocket can own you for the night. What's a dwarf like down below? I've always wondered.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Might surprise you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Hmm?

Name: ros
Subtitles: He's good with his fingers too. And his tongue.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Generous tipper. I guess gold is cheap for a Lannister.

Name: ros
Subtitles: You are jealous.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm a Greyjoy. We've been Lords of the Iron Islands for 300 years. There's not a family in Westeros that can look down on us, not even the Lannisters.

Name: ros
Subtitles: And what about the Starks?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I've been Lord Stark's ward since I was eight years old.

Name: ros
Subtitles: A “ward”, that's a nice word for it. Your father rebelled against King Robert and if he does it again…

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My father fought for the freedom of his people! What did your father do? Fucked a cook and whelped a whore.

Name: ros
Subtitles: You're a very serious boy.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm not a boy.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Oh, yes you are. A serious boy, with a serious cock.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't want to pay for it.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Then get yourself a wife.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Come on. I'm not gonna hurt you.

Name: varys
Subtitles: How is your son, my Lord?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He'll never walk again.

Name: varys
Subtitles: But his mind is sound?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: So they say.

Name: varys
Subtitles: A blessing then. I suffered an early mutilation myself. Some doors close forever... others open in the most unexpected places. May I?

Name: varys
Subtitles: If the wrong ears heard what I'm about to tell you, off comes my head. And who would mourn poor Varys then? North or South, they sing no songs for spiders. But there are things you must know. You are the King's Hand and the King is a fool... your friend, I know, but a fool... and doomed unless you save him.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I've been in the capital a month. Why have you waited so long to tell me this?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I didn't trust you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: So why do you trust me now?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The Queen is not the only one who has been watching you closely. There are few men of honor in the capital. You are one of them. I would like to believe I am another, strange as that may seem.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What sort of doom does the King face?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The same sort as Jon Arryn. The tears of Lys, they call it. A rare and costly thing, as clear and tasteless as water. It leaves no trace.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Who gave it to him?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Some dear friend, no doubt. But which one? There were many. Lord Arryn was a kind and trusting man. There was one boy... all he was he owed to Jon Arryn.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The squire, Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Pity what happened to him, just when his life seemed to be going so nicely.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: If Ser Hugh poisoned him, who paid Ser Hugh?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Someone who could afford it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Jon was a man of peace. He was Hand for 17 years -- 17 good years. Why kill him?

Name: varys
Subtitles: He started asking questions.

Name: varys
Subtitles: He's found one bastard already. He has the book. The rest will come.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Subtitles: And when he knows the truth, what will he do?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The gods alone know. The fools tried to kill his son. What's worse, they botched it. The wolf and the lion will be at each other's throats. We will be at war soon, my friend.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Subtitles: What good is war now? We're not ready. If one Hand can die, why not a second?

Name: varys
Subtitles: This Hand is not the other.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Subtitles: We need time. Khal Drogo will not make his move until his son is born. You know how these savages are.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Delay," you say. "Move fast, " I reply. This is no longer a game for two players.

Name: illyrio mopatis
Subtitles: It never was.

Name: varys
Subtitles: The first to arrive and the last to leave. I admire your industry.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You do move quietly.

Name: varys
Subtitles: We all have our qualities.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You look a bit lonely today. You should pay a visit to my brothel this evening. First boy is on the house.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I think you're mistaking business with pleasure.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Am I? All those birds that whisper in your ear, such pretty little things. Trust me, we accommodate all inclinations.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Oh, I'm sure. Lord Redwyne likes his boys very young, I hear.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'm a purveyor of beauty and discretion, both equally important.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Though I suppose beauty is a subjective quality, no? Is it true that Ser Marlon of Tumblestone prefers amputees?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: All desires are valid to a man with a full purse.

Name: varys
Subtitles: And I heard the most awful rumor about a certain lord with a taste for fresh cadavers. Must be enormously difficult to accommodate that inclination. The logistics alone... to find beautiful corpses before they rot.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Strictly speaking, such a thing would not be in accordance with the King's laws.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Strictly speaking.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Tell me. Does someone, somewhere, keep your balls in a little box? I've often wondered.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Do you know, I have no idea where they are? And we had been so close. But enough about me. How have you been since we last saw each other?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Since you last saw me or since I last saw you?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Now the last time I saw you, you were talking to the Hand of the King.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Saw me with your own eyes?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Eyes I own.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Council business. We all have so much to discuss with Ned Stark.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Everyone's well aware of your enduring fondness for Lord Stark's wife. If the Lannisters were behind the attempt on the Stark boy's life and it was discovered that you helped the Starks come to that conclusion... To think... A simple word to the Queen...

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: One shudders at the thought.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Oh.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: But you know something? I do believe that I have seen you even more recently than you have seen me.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Have you?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Yes. Earlier today, I distinctly recall seeing you talking to Lord Stark in his chambers.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Was that you under the bed?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And not long after that when I saw you escorting a certain foreign dignitary... Council business? Of course you would have friends from across The Narrow Sea. You're from there yourself, after all. We're friends, aren't we, Lord Varys? I'd like to think we are. So you can imagine my burden, wondering if the King might question my friendo s sympathies… To stand at a crossroads where turning left means loyalty to a friend, turning right, loyalty to the realm.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Oh, please.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: To find myself in a position where a simple word to the King --

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: What are you two conspiring about? Well, whatever it is, you'd best hurry up. My brother is coming.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: To a small council meeting?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Disturbing news from far away. Haven't you heard?

Name: guard
Subtitles: Off with you. No begging.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not a beggar. I live here.

Name: guard
Subtitles: D'you want a smack on your ear to help you with your hearing?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I want to see my father.

Name: guard
Subtitles: I want to fuck the Queen, for all the good it does me.

Name: guard
Subtitles: You want your father, boy? He's lying on the floor of some tavern, getting pissed on by his friends.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My father is Hand of the King! I'm not a boy. I'm Arya Stark of Winterfell and if you lay a hand on me, my father will have both your heads on spikes! Now are you going to let me by or do I need to smack you on the ear to help with your hearing?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You know I had half my guard out searching for you? You promised me this would stop.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: They said they were going to kill you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Who did?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I didn't see them, but I think one was fat.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Oh, Arya.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not lying! They said you found the bastard and the wolves are fighting the lions and the savage... something about the savage.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Where did you hear this?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: In the dungeons, near the dragon skulls.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What were you doing in the dungeons?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Chasing a cat.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Pardon, my Lord. There's a Night's Watchman here begging a word. He says it's urgent.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your name, friend?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Yoren, if it please. This must be your son. He has the look.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm a girl!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Did Benjen send you?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: No one sent me, my Lord. I'm here to find men for The Wall, see if there's any scum in the dungeons that might be fit for service.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Ah, we'll find recruits for you.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Thank you, my Lord. But that's not why I disturb you now. Your brother, Benjen... his blood runs black, makes him as much my brother as yours. It's for his sake I rode here so hard I damn near killed my horse! There are others riding too. The whole city will know by tomorrow.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Know what?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Best said in private, my Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Go on. We'll talk more later.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Jory, take her safely to her room.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Come along, my Lady. You heard your father.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How many guards does my father have?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Here in King's Landing? Fifty.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You wouldn't let anyone kill him, would you?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: No fear on that count, little Lady.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Well?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: It's about your wife, my Lord. She's taken the Imp.

Name: vardis egen
Subtitles: You're far from home, Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: To whom do I speak?

Name: vardis egen
Subtitles: Ser Vardis Egen, Knight of The Vale. Is Lady Arryn expecting your visit?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: There was no time to send word.

Name: vardis egen
Subtitles: May I ask, my Lady, why he is with you?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: That's why there was no time. He is my prisoner.

Name: vardis egen
Subtitles: He doesn't look like a prisoner.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My sister will decide what he looks like.

Name: vardis egen
Subtitles: Yes, my Lady. She will at that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Eyrie. They say it's impregnable.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Give me 10 good men and some climbing spikes... I'll impregnate the bitch.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I like you.

Name: steward
Subtitles: Lord Stark, your presence has been requested in the small council chamber. A meeting has been called.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I need to see the King first -- alone.

Name: steward
Subtitles: The King is at the small council meeting, my Lord. He has summoned you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Is it about my wife?

Name: steward
Subtitles: No, my Lord. I believe it concerns Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: The whore is pregnant.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You're speaking of murdering a child.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I warned you this would happen. Back in the North, I warned you, but you didn't care to hear. Well, hear it now. I want 'em dead, mother and child both. And that fool, Viserys as well. Is that plain enough for you? I want them both dead.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You will dishonor yourself forever if you do this.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Honor?! I've got Seven Kingdoms to rule! One King, Seven Kingdoms. Do you think honor keeps them in line? Do you think it's honor that's keeping the peace? It's fear! Fear and blood!
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Then we're no better than the Mad King.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Careful, Ned. Careful now.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You want to assassinate a girl... Because the Spider heard a rumor?

Name: varys
Subtitles: No rumor, my Lord. The princess is with child.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Based on whose information?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Ser Jorah Mormont. He is serving as adviser to the Targaryens.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Mormont? You bring us the whispers of a traitor half a world away and call it fact?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Jorah Mormont's a slaver, not a traitor. Small difference, I know, to an honorable man.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He broke the law, betrayed his family, fled our land. We commit murder on the word of this man?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: And if he's right? If she has a son? A Targaryen at the head of a Dothraki army… What then?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The Narrow Sea still lies between us. I'll fear the Dothraki the day they teach their horses to run on water.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Do nothing? That's your wise advice? Do nothing til our enemies are on our shores? You're my council? Counsel! Speak sense to this honorable fool.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I understand your misgivings, my Lord. Truly, I do. It is a terrible thing we must consider, a vile thing. Yet, we who presume to rule must sometimes do vile things for the good of the realm. Should the gods grant Daenerys a son, the realm will bleed.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: I bear this girl no ill will, but should the Dothraki invade, how many innocents will die? How many towns will burn? Is it not wiser, kinder even, that she should die now so that tens of thousands might live?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: We should have had them both killed years ago.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: When you find yourself in bed with an ugly woman, best close your eyes, get it over with. Cut her throat. Be done with it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I followed you into war - twice, without doubts, without second thoughts. But I will not follow you now. The Robert I grew up with didn't tremble at the shadow of an unborn child.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: She dies.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I will have no part in it.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You're the King's Hand, Lord Stark. You'll do as I command or I'll find me a Hand who will.

Name: eddard stark
