Subtitles: And good luck to him. I thought you were a better man.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Out! Out, damn you! I'm done with you. Go! Run back to Winterfell! I'll have your head on a spike! I'll put it there myself, you fool! You think you're too good for this? Too proud and honorable? This is a war!
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'll go ahead with my daughters. Get them ready. Do it yourself. Don't ask anyone for help.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Right away, my Lord. Lord Baelish is here for you.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: His Grace went on about you at some length after you took your leave. The word "treason" was mentioned.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What can I do for you?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: When do you return to Winterfell?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Why? What do you care?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: If you're still here come nightfall, I'll take you to see the last person Jon Arryn spoke with before falling ill. If that sort of thing still interests you.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I don't have the time.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It won't take more than an hour. But as you please.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Round up all the men we have and station them outside the girls' chambers. Who are your best two swords?

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Heward and Wyl.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Find them and meet me at the stables.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You bring him here without permission? You pollute my home with his presence? Your aunt has done a bad thing, Robin, a very bad thing. You remember her, don't you? Isn't he beautiful? And strong too. Jon knew it. His last words were, "the seed is strong." He wanted everyone to know what a good, strong boy his son would grow up to be. Look at him, the Lord of all the Vale.
ners: [set(), set(), {'robin'}, set(), set(), set(), {'jon'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lysa, you wrote me about the Lannisters, warning me t-

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: To stay away from them! Not to bring one here!

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: Mommy? Is that the bad man?

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: It is.

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: He's little.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: He's Tyrion the Imp of House Lannister. He killed your father. He murdered the Hand of the King!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh? Did I kill him too? I've been a very busy man.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You will watch your tongue! These men are Knights of the Vale. Every one of the loved Jon Arryn. Every one of them would die for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If any harm comes to me, my brother, Jaime, will see that they do.

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: You can't hurt us! No one can hurt us here! Tell him, mommy! Tell him!

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Shh... Shh... Shh, my sweet boy. He's just trying to frighten us. Lannisters are all liars. No one will hurt my baby.

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: Mommy... I want to see the bad man fly.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Perhaps you will, my little love.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: This man is my prisoner. I will not have him harmed.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Ser Vardis, my sister's guest is weary. Take him down below so he can rest. Introduce him to Mord.

Name: mord
Subtitles: You go sleep, dwarf man. Sleep good, little dwarf. man!

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Lord Stark's lucky he still has a head.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Robert will rant for a few days, but he won't do anything. He adores the man.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: You're jealous.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Are you sure this won't hurt?

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Only if I slip.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: And you prefer me like this?

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Mhmm.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: If you want hairless, maybe you should find a little boy.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: I want you.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: My brother thinks that anyone who hasn't been to war isn't a man. He treats me as if I'm a spoiled child. Oh, and you're not? Loras Tyrell, the Knight of the Flowers? How many wars have you fought in? Oh, and how much did your father spend on that armor of yours?

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Hold still.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: All I ever hear from Robert and Stannis is how I'm not tough enough, how I squirm at the sight of blood.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: You did vomit when that boy's eye was knocked out in the mêlée.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: His eye was dangling out of the damn socket!

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: He shouldn't have entered the mêlée if he didn't know how to fight.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Easy for you to say. Not everyone is such a gifted swordsman.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: It's not a gift. No one gave it to me. I'm good because I work at it -- every day of my life since I could hold a stick.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: I could work at fighting all day, every day, and still never be as good as you.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Yes well, I guess we'll never know.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Everywhere?

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Everywhere. So how did it end up? The Targaryen girl will die?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: It needs to be done, unpleasant as it is. Robert's rather tasteless about it. Every time he talks about killing her, I swear the table rises six inches.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: It's a shame he can't muster the same enthusiasm for his wife.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: He does have a deep, abiding lust for her money. You have to give it to the Lannisters, they may be the most pompous, ponderous cunts the gods ever suffered to walk the world, but they do have outrageous amounts of money.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: I have an outrageous amount of money.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Not as much as the Lannisters.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: But a lot more than you.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Robert's threatening to take me hunting with him. Last time we were out there for two weeks, tramping through the trees in the rain, day after day. All so he can stick his spear into something's flesh! Oh. but Robert loves his killing. And he's the King.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Hmm... How did that ever happen?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Because he loves his killing and he used to be good at it.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Do you know who should be King?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Be serious.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: I am. My father could be your bank. I've never fought in a war before, but I'd fight for you.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: I'm fourth in line.

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: And where was Robert in the line of royal succession? Joffrey is a monster. Tommen is eight.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Stannis?

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Stannis has the personality of a lobster.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: He's still my older brother.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: What are you doing?!

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: Look at it.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: You cut me!

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: It's just blood. We've all got it in us. Sometimes a little spills. If you become King, you're going to see a lot of this. You need to get used to it. Go on. Look. People love you. They love to serve you because you're kind to them. They want to be near you.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: loras tyrell
Subtitles: You're willing to do what needs to be done, but you don't gloat over it. You don't love killing. Where is it written that power is the sole province of the worst? That thrones are only made for the hated and the feared. You would be a wonderful King.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry your marriage to Ned Stark didn't work out. You seemed so good together.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I'm glad I could do something to make you happy.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Without a Hand, everything will fall to pieces.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I suppose this is where you tell me to give the job to your brother Jaime.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No. He's not serious enough. I'll say this for Ned Stark - he's serious enough. Was it really worth it? Losing him this way?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I don't know. But I do know this, if the Targaryen girl convinces her horse-lord husband to invade and the Dothraki horde crosses The Narrow Sea... We won't be able to stop them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Dothraki don't sail. Every child knows that. They don't have discipline. They don't have armor. They don't have siege weapons.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: It's a neat little trick you do, you move your lips and your father's voice comes out.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Is my father wrong?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Let's say Viserys Targaryen lands with forty thousand Dothraki screamers at his back. We hole up in our castles, a wise move. Only a fool would meet the Dothraki in an open field. They leave us in our castles. They go from town to town, looting and burning, killing every man who can't hide behind a stone wall, stealing all our crops and livestock, enslaving all our women and children. How long do the people of the Seven Kingdoms stand behind their absentee King, their cowardly King hiding behind high walls? When do the people decide that Viserys Targaryen is the rightful monarch after all.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We still outnumber them.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Which is the bigger number -- five or one?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Five.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Five... one. One army, a real army, united behind one leader with one purpose. Our purpose died with the Mad King. Now we've got as many armies as there are men with gold in their purse. And everybody wants something different. Your father wants to own the world. Ned Stark wants to run away and bury his head in the snow.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: We haven't had a real fight in nine years. Back-stabbing doesn't prepare you for a fight. And that's all the realm is now, back-stabbing and scheming and arse-licking and money-grubbing. Sometimes I don't know what holds it together.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Our marriage.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Ah, so here we sit, seventeen years later, holding it all together. Don't you get tired?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Every day.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: How long can hate hold a thing together?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Well, seventeen years is quite a long time.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Yes, it is.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes, it tis. What was she like?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You've never asked about her, not once. Why not?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: At first, just saying her name, even in private felt like I was breathing life back into her. I thought if I didn't talk about her, she'd just fade away for you. When I realized that wasn't going to happen, I refused to ask out of spite. I didn't want to give you the satisfaction of thinking I cared enough to ask. And eventually it became clear that my spite didn't mean anything to you, as far as I could tell, you actually enjoyed it.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: So why now?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What harm could Lyanna Stark's ghost do to either of us that we haven't done to each other a hundred times over?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You want to know the horrible truth? I can't even remember what she looked like. I only know she was the one thing I ever wanted... Someone took her away from me, and Seven Kingdoms couldn't fill the hole she left behind.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I felt something for you once, you know?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I know.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Even after we lost our first boy -- for quite a while, actually. Was it ever possible for us? Was there ever a time, ever a... moment?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: No. Does that make you feel better or worse?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It doesn't make me feel anything.

Name: mhaegen
Subtitles: She looks like him, don't she, my Lord? She has his nose, his black hair.

Name: mhaegen
Subtitles: Tell him when you see him, my Lord. If it please you... Tell him how beautiful she is.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I will.

Name: mhaegen
Subtitles: And tell him I've been with no one else. I swear it, my Lord, by the old gods and new. I don't want no jewels or nothing, just him. The King was always good to me.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: When Jon Arryn came to visit you, what did he want?

Name: mhaegen
Subtitles: He wasn't that sort of man, my Lord. He just wanted to know if the child was happy, healthy.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She looks healthy enough to me. The girl shall want for nothing.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Brothels make a much better investment than ship, I've found. Whores rarely sink.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What do you know of King Robert's bastards?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Well, he has more than you, for a start.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: How many?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Does it matter? If you fuck enough women, some of them will give you presents.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And Jon Arryn tracked them all down. Why?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He was the King's Hand. Perhaps Robert wanted them looked after. He was overcome with fatherly love.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Come.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Jory!

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Such a small pack of wolves.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: Stay back, Ser! This is the Hand of the King!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Was!... the Hand of the King. Now I'm not sure what he is... Lord of somewhere very far away.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: What's the meaning of this, Lannister?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Get back inside where it's safe. I'm looking for my brother. You remember my brother, don't you, Lord Stark? Blond hair, sharp tongue, short man.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I remember him well.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It seems he had some trouble on the road. You wouldn't know what happened to him, would you?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He was taken at my command to answer for his crimes.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: My Lords! I'll bring the City Watch!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Come, Stark. I'd rather you die sword in hand.

Name: jory cassel
Subtitles: If you threaten my Lord again...

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Threaten? As in, "I'm going to open your Lord from balls to brains and see what Starks are made of”?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You kill me, your brother's a dead man.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're right. Take him alive! Kill his men!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: My brother, Lord Stark... We want him back.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Your pardon, your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do you know what your wife has done?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: She did nothing I did not command.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Who'd have thought she had it in her?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: By what right dare you lay hands on my blood?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I am the King's Hand -

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You were the King's Hand!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: trying to keep the peace -

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You shall now be held accountable.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Oh, will both of you shut your mouths? Catelyn will release Tyrion and you'll make your peace with Jaime.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: He butchered my men.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Lord Stark was returning drunk from a brothel when his men attacked Jaime.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Quiet, woman.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Jaime has fled the city. Give me leave to bring him back to justice.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I took you for a king.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Hold your tongue.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He's attacked my brother and abducted the other. I should wear the armor and you the gown.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I shall wear this like a badge of honor.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Wear it in silence or I'll honor you again.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: See what she does to me? My loving wife. I should not have hit her. That was not… That was not kingly.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: If we don't act… there will be a war.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: So tell your wife to return that little shit of an Imp to King's Landing. She's had her fun, now put an end to it. You hear me? Send a raven and put an end to it.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And what about Jaime Lannister? What about Jaime?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: I'm half a kingdom in debt to his bloody father. I don't know what happened between you and those yellow-haired shits. I don't want to know. This is what matters - I can't rule the kingdoms if the Starks and the Lannisters are at each other's throats, so enough!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: As you command your Grace. With your leave, I will return to Winterfell and set matters straight.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Piss on that! Send a raven. I want you to stay. I'm the king, I get what I want… I never loved my brothers. A sad thing for a man to admit, but it's true. You were the brother I chose. We'll talk when I return from the hunt.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The hunt?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Killing things clears my head. You'll have to sit on the throne while I'm away. You'll hate it more than I do.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: The Targaryen girl -

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Seven hells! Don't start with her again! The girl will die and I'll hear no more of it. Put on the badge. And if you ever take it off again, I swear to the Mother I'll pin the damn thing on Jaime Lannister.

Name: irri
Subtitles: Khaleesi?

Name: irri
Subtitles: Oh, Khaleesi!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You're hurt.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Not too fast.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Come on, Dancer.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: When are you gonna tell him?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Not now.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Blood for blood. You need to make the Lannisters to pay for Jory and the others.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You're talking about war.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm talking about justice.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Only the Lord of Winterfell can call in the bannermen and raise an army.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: A Lannister put his spear through your father's leg. The Kingslayer rides to Casterly Rock where no one can touch -

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You want me to march on Casterly Rock?!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You're not a boy anymore. They attacked your father. They've already started the war. It's your duty to represent your House when your father can't.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: And it's not your duty, because it's not your House.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Where's Bran?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't know. It's not my House.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Robb?

Name: osha
Subtitles: All alone in the deep dark woods.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm not alone, my brother is with me.

Name: wildling
Subtitles: I don't see him. Got him hidden under your cloak?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Oh, that's a pretty pin. Silver.

Name: wildling
Subtitles: We'll take the pin. And the horse. Get down… Be quick about it.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I can't. The saddle, the straps.

Name: wildling
Subtitles: What's wrong with you? You some kind of cripple?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell and if you don't let me be, I'll have you all killed!

Name: wildling
Subtitles: Cut his little cock off and stuff it in his mouth.

Name: osha
Subtitles: the boy's worth nothing dead. Benjen Stark's own blood. Think what Mance would give us.

Name: wildling
Subtitles: Piss on Mance rayder and piss on the North. We're going as far south as south goes. There ain't no white walkers down in Dorne.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Drop the knife. Let him go and I'll let you live.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Robb!

Name: wildling
Subtitles: Shut up! Drop the blade!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No, don't.

Name: wildling
Subtitles: Do it.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Are you all right?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Yes, it doesn't hurt.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Tough little lad. In the Iron Islands, you're not a man until you've killed your first enemy. Well done.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Have you lost your mind? What if you'd missed?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He would have killed you and cut Bran's throat.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You don't have the right -

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: To what, to save your brother's life? It was the only thing to do, so I did it.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What about her?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Give me my life, my lord, and I'm yours.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: We'll keep her alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Mord! Turnkey! Mord! Mord!

Name: mord
Subtitles: Dwarf man making noise!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How would you like to be rich?

Name: mord
Subtitles: Dwarf man still making noise.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My family is rich. We have gold, lots of gold. I'm prepared to give you lots of gold.

Name: mord
Subtitles: No gold!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, I don't have it here.

Name: mord
Subtitles: No gold! Fuck off.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't want to practice today.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: No?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: They killed Jory. My father is hurt. I don't care about stupid wooden swords.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: You are troubled.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Yes -

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: Good! Trouble is the perfect time for training. When you are dancing in the meadow with your dolls and kittens, this is not when fighting happens.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't like dolls and k -

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: You're not here. You're with your trouble. If you're with your trouble when fighting happens…

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: More trouble for you. Just so… How can you be quick as a snake, or as quiet as a shadow, when you are somewhere else? You are fearing for your father, hmm? That is right. Do you pray to the gods?

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: The old and the new.

Name: syrio forel
Subtitles: There is only one god. And his name is death. And there is only one thing we say to death - “Not today.”

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: She has to eat a whole heart? I hope that wasn't my horse.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: She's doing well.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: She'll never keep it down.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Tell me what she is saying.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The prince is riding. I have heard the thunder of the hooves. Swift as the wind he rides. His enemies will cower before him… and their wives will weep tears of blood.”

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: She's going to have a boy.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: He won't be a real Targaryen. He won't be a true dragon.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The stallion who mounts the world.” The stallion, is the khal of khals. He shall unite the people into a single khalasar. All the people of the world will be his herd.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: A prince rides inside me! And he shall be called Rhaego!

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: They love her.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: She truly is a queen today.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Don't let them see you carrying a sword in Vaes Dothrak. You know the law.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: It's not my law.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They don't belong to you.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Whatever is hers is also mine.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Once, perhaps.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: If I sell one egg, I'll have enough to buy a ship. Two eggs - a ship and an army.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: And you have all three.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: I need a large army… I'm the last hope of a dynasty, Mormont. The greatest dynasty this world has ever seen, on my shoulders since I was five years old and no one has ever given me what they gave to her in that tent. Never. Not a piece of it… How can I carry what I need to carry without it? Hmm? Who can rule without wealth, or fear, or love? Oh, you stand there, all nobility and honor. You don't think I see you looking at my little sister, hmm? Don't think I know what you want? I don't care. You can have her. She can be queen of the savages and dine on the finest bloody horseparts, and you can dine on whichever parts of her you like. But let me go.
ners: [{'mormont'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You can go, but you can't have the eggs.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: You swore an oath to me. Does loyalty mean nothing to you?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It means everything to me.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: And yet here you stand?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: And here I stand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord! Mord!

Name: mord
Subtitles: Noise again!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: About the gold -

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Listen to me! Listen to me! Sometimes possession… is an abstract concept. When they captured me they took my purse, but the gold is still mine.

Name: mord
Subtitles: Where?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where? I don't know where, but when they free me -

Name: mord
Subtitles: You want free? Go be free.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Have you ever heard the phrase “Rich as a Lannister”? Of course you have. You're a smart man. You know who the Lannisters are. I am a Lannister. Tyrion, son of Tywin! And of course, you have also heard the phrase, “a Lannister always pays his debts.” If you deliver a message from me to Lady Arryn, I will be in your debt. I will owe you gold. If you deliver the message and I live, which I very much intend to do.

Name: mord
Subtitles: What message?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Tell her I wish to confess my crimes.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You wish to confess your crimes?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, my lady. I do, my lady.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Skycells always break them. Speak, Imp. Meet your gods as an honest man.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where do I begin, my lords and ladies? I'm a vile man, I confess it. My crimes and sins are beyond counting. I have lied and cheated, gambled and whored. I'm not particularly good at violence, but I'm good at convincing others to do violence for me. You want specifics, I suppose. When I was seven, I saw a servant girl bathing in the river. I stole her robe. She was forced to return to the castle, naked and in tears. I close my eyes, I can still see her tits bouncing. When I was ten, I stuffed my uncle's boots with goatshit. When confronted with my crime, I blamed a squire. Poor boy was flogged and… I escaped justice. When I was twelve, I milked my eel into a pot of turtle stew. I flogged the one-eyed snake. I skinned my sausage. I made the bald man cry into the turtle stew, which I do believe my sister ate. At least I hope she did. I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel -
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Silence!

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: What happened next?!

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: What do you think you're doing?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Confessing my crimes.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion, you are accused of hiring a man to slay my son Bran in his bed, and of conspiring to murder my sister's husband; Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, I'm very sorry. I don't know anything about all that.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You've had your little joke. I trust you enjoyed it. Mord, take him back to the dungeon. But this time find a smaller cell, with a steeper floor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Is this how justice is done in the Vale? you accuse me of crimes, I deny them, so you throw me in a cell to freeze and starve? Where is the King's Justice? I'm accused and demand a trial.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: If you're tried and found guilty, then by the king's own laws you will pay with your life.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I understand the law.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: We have no executioner in the Eyrie. Life is more elegant here. Open the Moon Door.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You want a trial, my Lord Lannister. Very well. My son will listen to whatever you have to say, and you will hear his judgement. Then you will leave, by one door or the other.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No need to bother Lord Robin. I demand a trial by combat.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You have that right.

Name: knight
Subtitles: My lady, I beg the honor. Let me be your champion.

Name: knight
Subtitles: The honor should be mine. For the love I bore your lord husband let me avenge his death.

Name: knight
Subtitles: I'll fight for you, my Lady.

Name: knight
Subtitles: It'll be my honor.

Name: knight
Subtitles: The honor should be mine.

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: Make the bad man fly!

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Ser Vardis… You're quiet. Did you want to avenge my husband?

Name: ser vardis
Subtitles: With all my heart, my Lady. But the Imp is half my size. It would be shameful to slaughter such a man and call it justice.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Agreed.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You demanded a trial by combat.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Now I demand a champion. I have that right, same as you.

Name: ser vardis
Subtitles: My Lady, I would gladly fight the Imp's champion for you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I wouldn't be too glad, ser. I name my brother, Jaime Lannister.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: The Kingslayer is hundreds of miles from here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Send a raven for him, I'm happy to wait.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: The trial will be today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do I have a volunteer?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Anyone?... Anyone?

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: I think that we can assume that no one is willing -

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I'll stand for the dwarf.

Name: lancel lannister
Subtitles: More wine, your Grace?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Oh, what was I saying?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: A simpler time.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: It was! It was. You're too young to remember. Wasn't it, Selmy?

Name: barriston
Subtitles: It was, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: The enemy was right there in the open, vicious as you like, all but sending you a bloody invitation. Nothing like today.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Sounds exhilarating.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Exhilarating, yes. Not as exhilarating as those balls and masquerades you like to throw. You ever fucked a Riverlands girl?

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Once, I think.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You think? I think you'd remember. Back in our day, you weren't a real man until you fucked a girl from each of the Seven Kingdoms and the Riverlands. We called it “making the eight.”

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: Those were some lucky girls.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: You ever make the eight, Barristan?

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: I don't believe so, your Grace.

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Those were the days!

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: What days were those? The ones where half of Westeros fought the other half and millions died? Or before that, when the Mad King slaughtered women and babies because the voices in his head told him they deserved it? Or way before that when dragons burned whole cities to the ground?

Name: robert baratheon
Subtitles: Easy, boy. You might be my brother, but you're speaking to the King.

Name: renly baratheon
Subtitles: I suppose it was all rather heroic. If you were drunk enough and had some poor Riverlands whore to shove your price inside and “make the eight.”

Name: man
Subtitles: They burned most everything in the Riverlands, our fields, our granaries, our homes. They took our women and then they took ‘em again. When they was done, they butchered them as if they was animals. They covered our children in pitch and lit them on fire.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Brigands, most likely.

Name: man
Subtitles: They weren't thieves, they didn't steal nothing. They even left something behind, your Grace.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: It's the King's Hand you're addressing, not the king. The king is hunting.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Fish. The sigil of House Tully. Isn't that your wife's House - Tully - my Lord Hand?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: These men, were they flying a sigil? … A banner.

Name: man
Subtitles: None, your… Hand. The one who was leading them… Taller by a foot than any man I've ever met, saw him cut the blacksmith, saw him take the head off a horse with a single swing of his sword.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: That sounds like someone we know. The Mountain.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You're describing Ser Gregor Clegane.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Why should Ser Gregor turn brigand? The man is an anointed knight.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I've heard him called “Tywin Lannister's mad dog.” I'm sure you have as well. Can you think of any reason the Lannisters might possibly have for being angry with your wife?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: If the Lannisters were to order attacks on villages under the king's protection, it would be -

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It would be almost as brazen as attacking the Hand of the King in the streets of the capital.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Wel…

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I cannot give you back your homes or restore your dead to life. But perhaps I can give you justice in the name of our king, Robert. Lord Beric Dondarrion.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You shall have the command. Assemble 100 men and ride to Ser Gregor's keep.

Name: beric dondarrion
Subtitles: As you command.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, the First of his Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, I charge you to bring the king's justice to the false knight Gregor Clegane and all those who shared in his crimes. I denounce him and attaint him. I strip him of all ranks and titles of all lands and holdings, and sentence him to death.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: My lord… This… This is a drastic action. It would be better to wait for King Robert's return.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Grand Maester Pycelle.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: My Lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Send a raven to Casterly Rock. Inform Tywin Lannister that he has been summoned to court to answer for the crimes of his bannermen. He will arrive within the fortnight, or be branded an enemy of the crown and a traitor to the realm.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A bold move, my Lord, and admirable. But is it wise to yank the lion's tail? Tywin Lannister is the richest man in all the Seven Kingdoms. Gold wins wars, not soldiers.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Then how come Robert is king and not Tywin Lannister?

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: Is it over?

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: You don't fight with honor!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: No. He did.

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: Can I make the little man fly now?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not this little man. This little man is going home. I believe you have something of mine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A Lannister always pays his debts.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: You wear your hair like a real southern lady now.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Well, why shouldn't I? We're in the south.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: It's important to remember where you come from. I'm not sure your mother would like these new styles.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My mother isn't from the North.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: I'm aware of that.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why do you care? Do you even have hair under there?

Name: mordane
Subtitles: Yes. I have hair.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I've never seen it.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: Would you like to?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No. Where are you from anyway, the north or the south?

Name: mordane
Subtitles: I come from a very small village in -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Oh, wait. I just realized… I don't care.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: Sansa -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Septa.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: Now you are being rude.

Name: mordane
Subtitles: My prince.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My prince.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: My lady. I fear I have behaved monstrously the past few weeks. With your permission?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's beautiful. Like the one your mother wears.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You'll be queen one day, it's only fitting that you should look the part. Will you forgive me for my rudeness?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: There's nothing to forgive.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You're my lady. One day we'll be married in the throne room. Lords and ladies from all over the Seven Kingdoms will come, from the last hearth in the North, to the salt shore of the south. And you will be queen over all of them. I'll never disrespect you again. I'll never be cruel to you again. Do you understand me? You're my lady now, from this day, until my last day.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Stop! Stop! What are you doing?!

Name: ros
Subtitles: Going to King's Landing.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: In a turnip cart?

Name: ros
Subtitles: I'll find a ship heading south in White Harbor.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: And you can afford that?

Name: ros
Subtitles: Some of my friends are more generous than others.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: There's a thousand girls like you in King's Landing.

Name: ros
Subtitles: I'll have lots of company…

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes, you'll be very popular until some fat lord comes to visit with a big belly and a little prick and he can't get it up so he knocks all your teeth out.

Name: ros
Subtitles: And what will happen to me if I stay here? Will I become Lady Greyjoy, Mistress of the Iron Islands?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Don't be a fool.

Name: ros
Subtitles: I hear Jaime Lannister attacked Lord Stark in the streets of King's Landing. Every man for a hundred miles will be marching off to war soon and most of them will never come back, there's nothing more for me here. Let's go, Steffon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Let me see it one more time?

Name: ros
Subtitles: See what?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm going to miss you!

Name: ros
Subtitles: I know.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I'm sending you both back to Winterfell.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What?!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Listen -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What about Joffrey?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you dying because of your leg? Is that why you're sending us home?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What? No.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Please, Father. Please don't.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You can't. I've got my lessons with Syrio. I'm finally getting good.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: This isn't a punishment. I want you back in Winterfell for your own safety.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Can't we take Syrio back with us?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Who cares about your stupid dancing teacher? I can't go. I'm supposed to marry Prince Joffrey. I love him and I'm meant to be his queen and have his babies.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Seven hells.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: When you're old enough, I'll make you a match with someone who's worthy of you, someone who's brave and gentle and strong -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't want someone brave and gentle and strong. I want him! He'll be the greatest king that ever was, a golden lion, and I'll give him sons with beautiful blond hair.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The lion's not his sigil, idiot. He's a stag, like his father.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He is not. He's nothing like that old drunk king.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Go on, girls. Get your septa and start packing your things.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Wait!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Come on!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's not fair!

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Lord Orys Baratheon, black of hair.” “Axel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Lyonel Baratheon, black of hair.” “Steffon Baratheon, black of hair.” “Robert Baratheon, black of hair.” “Joffrey Baratheon… golden-haired.”

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Daenerys! Where's my sister?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Stop him.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Where is she? I'm here for the feast. The whore's feast.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Come.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Khal Drogo! I'm here for the feast.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Khal Drogo says there is a place for you. Back there.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: That is no place for a king.

Name: khal drogo
Subtitles: You are no king.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: Keep away from me!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Viserys, please.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: There she is.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Put the sword down. They'll kill us all.

Name: viserys targaryen
Subtitles: They can't kill us. They can't shed blood in their sacred city. But I can. I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you. But he never paid for you.

Subtitles: There is none.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We should burn them.

Name: othell yarwyck
Subtitles: Snow's not wrong, My Lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: I want Maester Aemon to examine them first.

Name: othell yarwyck
Subtitles: You heard him.

Name: ser alliser
Subtitles: Lord Commander, Maester Aemon awaits you in his chambers. A raven from King's Landing.

Name: nights watch brother
Subtitles: Come on, move 'em out.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Bring me a horn of ale, Snow, and pour one for yourself.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Is there any word of my father?

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Sit.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: I hope you're not thinking of doing anything stupid.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My sisters were in King's Landing too.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: I'm sure they'll be treated gently.

Name: lord varys
Subtitles: Your father has proved to be an awful traitor, dear.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: King Robert's body was still warm when Lord Eddard began plotting to steal Joffrey's rightful throne.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He wouldn't do that. He knows how much I love Joffrey.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Sansa sweetling, you are innocent of any wrong.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: A child born of a traitor's seed is no fit consort for our King.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, I'm not.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The girl is innocent, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Little dove, you must write to Lady Catelyn and your brother, the eldest.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Robb.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Word of your father's arrest will reach him soon, no doubt.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If...if I could see my father, talk to him about...

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You disappoint me, child.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I only meant that...what will happen to him?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That depends.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: On...on what?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: On your brother. And on you.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Treason? Sansa wrote this?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: It is your sister's hand, but the Queen's words.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Joffrey puts my father in chains, now he wants his ass kissed?

Name: maester luwin
Subtitles: This is a royal command, My Lord.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I won't refuse. His Grace summons me to King's Landing, I'll go to King's Landing.

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: I'm hungry.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Hush now, darling. You just ate.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You will not support us then? Do I understand you correctly?

Name: robin arryn
Subtitles: But I'm hungry!

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Soon, love, soon.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: That is what I ask.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Go on, sweet. Time for your bath. I'll feed you after.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: If you fear for the safety of your son...

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: Of course I fear for the safety of my son!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And that is why we have to stop them.

Name: lysa arryn
Subtitles: The knights of the Vale will stay in the Vale where they belong, to protect their Lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: From here it might be best if Bronn and I continue alone.

Name: shagga
Subtitles: Best for Tyrion son of Tywin. Not best for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And feed it to the goats, yes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Uncle. Father.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The rumors of your demise were unfounded.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Sorry to disappoint you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And who are these Companions of yours?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: This is Shagga Son of Dolf, Chieftain of the Stone Crows.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You wouldn't know him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: May I present My Lord Father, Tywin son of Tytos of House Lannister.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You left us no choice. The honor of the House was at stake.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We have our differences, Jaime and I.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He's been covering himself in glory.

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: Jaime smashed the River Lords at the Golden Tooth, and now lays siege to Riverrun, Catelyn Stark's homeland.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And the Starks? Lord Eddard?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Is our hostage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How did my sweet sister persuade the King to imprison his dear friend Ned?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Robert Baratheon is dead.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My sister rules, you mean.

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: Stark's son has called his banners.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: A green boy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Maybe. Though the boy does have a certain belligerence.

Name: messenger
Subtitles: If it please My Lord, Ser Addam bids me report that the Northmen have crossed the neck.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The wolf rushes into the lion's jaws.

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: At once, My Lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: It is said that the men of the Mountain clans are great warriors.

Name: shagga
Subtitles: Only if the half man fights with us.

Name: rodrik cassal
Subtitles: The scouts report Lord Tywin moves north.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: No, we need to get around him and break Jaime Lannister's siege of Riverrun.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: To do either we need to cross the river and the only crossing is at The Twins.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Lord Frey controls that bridge.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: The late Lord Frey" my father calls him.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Robb's right.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: So what's it gonna be? Do we move against Jaime or Lord Tywin?

Name: stark guard
Subtitles: Your pardon, my lords.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Don't worry, lad.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Where did you find him?

Name: stark guard
Subtitles: In the brush above the encampment.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: How high did you get?

Name: lannister scout
Subtitles: 20,000. Maybe more.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My father understands mercy, when there is room for it.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Robb.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Tell Lord Tywin, Winter is coming for him.

Name: lannister scout
Subtitles: Yes, My Lord. Thank you, My Lord.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Are you touched, boy?! Letting him go?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You call me boy again.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Oi.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: It is also the wish of His Grace, that his loyal servant Janos Slynt, Commander of the City Watch...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Ser Aron.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Be at once raised to the rank of Lord.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Gyles.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: And granted the ancient seat of Harrenhal, and that his sons and grandsons shall hold this honor after him, until the end of time.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Ser Barristan Selmy.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Your Grace, I am yours to command.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Rise, Ser Barristan.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Your Grace, the Kingsguard is a sworn brotherhood.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Whose death, Ser Barristan? Yours or your King's?

Name: king joffrey
Subtitles: You let my father die.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Your Grace...

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Council has determined that Ser Jaime Lannister will take your place as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: The man who profaned his blade with the blood of the King he had sworn to defend!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Careful, Ser.

Name: lord varys
Subtitles: We have nothing but gratitude for your long service, good Ser.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: A hall to die in and men to bury me.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A naked Knight, apparently.

Name: barristan selmy
Subtitles: Even now I could cut through the five of you like carving a cake!

Name: kings landing page
Subtitles: If any man in this hall has other matters to set before His Grace, let him speak now or go forth and hold his silence.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: king joffrey
Subtitles: Come forward, My Lady.

Name: kings landing page
Subtitles: The Lady Sansa of House Stark.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do you have some business for the King and the Council, Sansa?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I do.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: As it please Your Grace, I ask mercy for my father, Lord Eddard Stark, who was Hand of the King.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Treason is a noxious weed.

Name: king joffrey
Subtitles: Let her speak.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you, Your Grace.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Do you deny your father's crime?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, My Lords. I know he must be punished.

Name: king joffrey
Subtitles: He said I wasn't the King. Why did he say that?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He was badly hurt.

Name: lord varys
Subtitles: A childo s faith Such sweet innocence.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Treason is treason!

Name: king joffrey
Subtitles: Anything else?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If you still have any affection in your heart for me, please do me this kindness, Your Grace.

Name: king joffrey
Subtitles: Your sweet words have moved me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He will.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You've seen better days, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Another visit? lt seems you're my last friend.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No, no, many still love you. Sansa came to court this morning to plead for your life.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: On her knees begging for me. Hm! Did you laugh with the others?

Name: varys
Subtitles: You do me wrong, my lord. Your blood is the last thing l want.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: l don't know what you want. l've given up trying to guess.

Name: varys
Subtitles: When l was still a boy - before they cut my balls off with a hot knife - l traveled with a group of actors through the free cities. They taught me that each man has a role to play. The same is true at court. l am the master of whisperers. My role is to be sly, obsequious and without scruples. l'm a good actor, my lord.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Huh. Can you free me from this pit?

Name: varys
Subtitles: l could. But will l? No. As l said, I'm no hero.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: What do you want? Tell me. No riddles, no stories. Tell me, what do you want?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Peace. Did you know that your son is marching south with an army of Northmen? Loyal lad. Fighting for his father's freedom.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Robb? He's just a boy.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Boys have been conquerors before. But the man giving Cersei sleepless nights is the king's the late king's brother. Lord Stannis has the best claim to the throne. He is a proven battle commander and he is utterly without mercy.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Stannis Baratheon is Robert's true heir. The throne is his by rights.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Sansa pleaded so sweetly for your life. lt would be a shame to throw it away. Cersei is no fool. She knows a tame wolf is more use to her than a dead one.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You want me to serve the woman who murdered my king, who butchered my men, who crippled my son?

Name: varys
Subtitles: l want you to serve the realm! Tell the queen you will confess your vile treason, tell your son to lay down his sword and proclaim Joffrey as the true heir. Cersei knows you as a man of honor. lf you give her the peace she needs, and promise to carry her secret to your grave, l believe she will allow you to take the black and live out your days on the Wall with your brother and your bastard son.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You think my life is some precious thing to me? That l would trade my honor for a few more years of... of what? You grew up with actors. You learned their craft and you learnt it well. But l grew up with soldiers. l learned how to die a long time ago.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Pity. Such a pity. What of your daughter's life, my lord? ls that a precious thing to you?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: lt's a birthday message to his grand-niece Walda.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Or so Walder Frey would have you think.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Keep shooting them down. We can't risk Lord Walder sending word of your movements to the Lannisters.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: He's Grandfather's bannerman. We can't expect his support?

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Expect nothing of Walder Frey and you'll never be surprised. Look.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Father rots in a dungeon. How long before they take his head? We need to cross the Trident and we need to do it now.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Just march up to his gates and tell him you're crossing. We've got five times his numbers. You can take the Twins if you have to.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Not in time. Tywin Lannister marches north as we speak.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: The Freys have held the crossing for 600 years, and for 600 years they have never failed to exact their toll.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Have my horse saddled and ready.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Enter the Twins alone and he'll sell you to the Lannisters as he likes.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Or throw you in a dungeon. Or slit your throat.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My father would do whatever it took to secure our crossing. Whatever it took. lf l'm going to lead this army, l can't have other men doing my bargaining for me.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l agree. l'll go.

Name: everyone
Subtitles: You can't!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l have known Lord Walder since l was a girl. He would never harm me.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: Unless there was a profit in it.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: lt is a great pleasure to see you again after so many years, my lord.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Oh, spare me. Your boy's too proud to come before me himself. What am l supposed to do with you?

Name: stevron frey
Subtitles: Father, you forget yourself. Lady Stark is –

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Who asked you? You're not Lord Frey yet, not until l die. Do l look dead to you?

Name: ryger rivers
Subtitles: Father, please –

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: l need lessons in courtesy from you, bastard? Your mother would still be a milkmaid if l hadn't squirted you into her belly.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: ls there somewhere we can talk?

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: We're talking right now. Fine. Out! All of you!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l'm sure she will give you many sons.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Huh. Your father didn't come to the wedding.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: He is quite ill, my lord.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Huh. Didn't come to the last one, either. Or the one before that. Your family has always pissed on me.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My lord, l –

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Don't deny it. You know it's true. The fine Lord Tully would never marry any of his children to mine.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l'm sure there were reasons –

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: l didn't need reasons. l needed to get rid of sons and daughters. You see how they pile up? Why are you here?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: To ask you to open your gates, my lord, so my son and his bannermen may cross the Trident and be on their way.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Why should l let him?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: lf you could climb your own battlements, you would see that he has 20,000 men outside your walls.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: There will be 20,000 corpses when Tywin Lannister gets here. Don't try and frighten me, Lady Stark. Your husbando s in a cell beneath the Red Keep and your son's got no fur to keep his balls warm.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You swore an oath to my father.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Oh, yes, l said some words. And l swore oaths to the crown too, if l remember right. Joffrey's king now, which makes your boy and his corpses-to-be nothing but rebels, it seems to me. lf l had the sense the gods gave a fish, l'd hand you both over to the Lannisters.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Why don't you?

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Stark, Tully, Lannister, Baratheon. Give me one good reason why l should waste a single thought on any of you?

Name: voices outside
Subtitles: And engage!

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: When does Aemon think you'll be able to use that hand?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Soon, he says.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Good. You'll be ready for this, then. l thought a wolf was more appropriate for you than a bear so l had a new pommel made. lt's called Longclaw. Works as well for a wolf as a bear, l think.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: This is Valyrian steel.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: lt was my father's sword, his father before him. The Mormonts have carried it for five centuries. lt was meant for my son Jorah. He brought dishonor to our House, but he had the grace to leave the sword before he fled from Westeros.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My lord, you honor me, but l can't –

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Oh, you can. And you will. l wouldn't be standing here if it wasn't for you and your beast. A bloody dead man tried to kill me, so you'll take it. l'll hear no more about it. ls that understood?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yes, my lord.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Right. Now, don't think this means l approve of this nonsense with you and Alliser Thorne. That's a man's sword. lt'll take a man to wield it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: l'll apologize to Ser Alliser tonight.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: No, you won't. l sent him to King's Landing yesterday. The hand that your wolf tore off that thing's wrist – l've ordered Thorne to lay it at the feet of this boy king. That should get young Joffrey's attention. And it, uh, puts a thousand leagues between you and Thorne. Now go and put your sword somewhere safe and bring me my supper.

Name: unidentified nights watchers
Subtitles: Well done. Well done.

Name: nights watcher
Subtitles: You earned that, Snow.

Name: nights watcher
Subtitles: Well done.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Go on, let's have a look.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: At what?

Name: grenn
Subtitles: The sword! Show us the sword.

Name: all
Subtitles: Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword! Sword!

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Let's have a look.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Piss off.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Come on, l want to have a look at it in the light. Give it here!

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Look at its eyes.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: l - l can't.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You can't what?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: l'm really not supposed to say.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And yet you really want to say. You want to say that…

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: There was a raven. l read the message to Maester Aemon. lt's your brother Robb.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What? What about him?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: He's heading south. To war. All his bannermen have rallied to his side, they'll keep him safe.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: l should be there. l should be with him.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: lf we do that, they'll never get back across.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Well? What did he say?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lord Walder has granted your crossing. His men are yours, as well.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Huh.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Less the 400 he will keep here to hold the crossing against any who would pursue you.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What does he want in return?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You will be taking on his son Olyvar as your personal squire. He expects a knighthood in good time.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Fine, fine. And?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And Arya will marry his son Waldron when they both come of age.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: She won't be happy about that. And?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And when the fighting is done you will marry one of his daughters. Whichever you prefer. He has a number he thinks will be suitable.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: l see. Did you get a look at his daughters?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l did.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: And?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: One was – Do you consent?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Can l refuse?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Not if you want to cross.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Then l consent.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sam said you wanted to see me?

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: l did indeed. Perhaps you would be kind enough to assist me. Tell me, did you ever wonder why the men of the Night's Watch take no wives and father no children?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: So they will not love. Love is the death of duty. lf the day should ever come when your lord father was forced to choose between honor on the one hand and those he loves on the other, what would he do?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He would do whatever was right, no matter what.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: Then Lord Stark is one man in 10,000. Most of us are not so strong. What is honor compared to a woman's love? And what is duty against the feel of a newborn son in your arms? Or a brother's smile?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sam told you.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: We're all human. Oh, we all do our duty when there's no cost to it. Honor comes easy then. Yet sooner or later in every man's life there comes a day when it is not easy. A day when he must choose.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And this is my day? ls that what you're saying?

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: Oh, it hurts, boy. Oh, yes. l know.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You do not know. No one knows. l may be a bastard, but he is my father and Robb is my brother.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: The gods were cruel when they saw fit to test my vows. They waited till l was old. What could l do when the ravens brought the news from the South

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: My father was Maekar, the first of his name. My brother Aegon reigned after him when l had refused the throne. And he was followed by his son Aerys whom they called the Mad King.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're Aemon Targaryen.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: l'm a maester of the Citadel, bound in service to Castle Black and the Night's Watch. l will not tell you to stay or go. You must make that choice yourself and live with it for the rest of your days. As l have.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My lord… My sun and stars… Drogo.

Name: khal drogo
Subtitles: My horse…

Name: cohollo
Subtitles: Blood of my blood…

Name: khal drogo
Subtitles: No, l must ride.

Name: qotho
Subtitles: He fell from his horse. A Khal who cannot ride is no Khal.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He's tired, that's all. He needs to rest. We've ridden far enough today. We'll camp here.

Name: qotho
Subtitles: This is no place to camp. A woman does not give us orders. Not even a Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We'll camp here. Tell them Khal Drogo commanded it.

Name: qotho
Subtitles: You do not command me, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Find Mirri Maz Duur. Bring her to me.

Name: qotho
Subtitles: The witch? l'll bring you her head, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Bring her to me unharmed or Khal Drogo will hear why you denied me.

Name: qotho
Subtitles: Hyah! Hyah!

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: Our scouts tell us the Stark host has moved south from the Twins with Lord Frey's levies in tow. They're a day's march north.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The boy may lack experience and sense, but he does have a certain mindless provincial courage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, do continue. Didn't mean to interrupt.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: l do hope your savages are going to be of some use, otherwise we've wasted good steel on them.

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: The great hairy one insisted he must have two battleaxes. Heavy black steel, double-sided.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Shagga likes axes.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: When the battle commences, you and your wildlings will be in the vanguard.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The vanguard? Me and the tribesmen on the front lines?

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: They do seem rather ferocious.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ferocious? Last night a Moon Brother stabbed a Stone Crow over a sausage. Three Stone Crows seized the Moon Brother and opened his throat. Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So l was 16. My brother Jaime and l were riding, when we heard a scream. She ran out onto the road, clothes half torn off, with two men on her heels. Jaime scared away the men easily enough, while l wrapped her in my cloak. She was too scared to send off on her own, so while Jaime hunted down the rapers l took her to the nearest inn and fed her. Her name was Tysha. She was a wheelwright's orphan. And she was hungry. Together we finished off three chickens and a flagon of wine. lmpossible as it seems, there was a time when l was unaccustomed to wine. l forgot how afraid l was around girls. how l was always waiting for them to laugh at me or look away embarrassed, or ask me about my tall, handsome brother. l forgot about everything but Tysha. And somehow l found myself in her bed.

And by morning l was deep enough in love to ask for her hand. A few lies, a few gold coins, one drunken septon and there you have it - man and wife. For a fortnight anyway, until the septon sobered up and told my father.

He thought it was time l had a woman. After my brother confessed, my father brought in my wife and gave her to his guards. He paid her well - a silver for each man. How many whores command that kind of price? He brought me into the barracks and made me watch. By the end, she had so much silver that the coins were slipping through her fingers and rolling on to the floor.

Subtitles: The proper course is clear - pledge fealty to King Renly and move south to join our forces with his.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Renly is not the king.

Name: jonos bracken
Subtitles: You cannot mean to hold to Joffrey, my lord. He put your father to death.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: That doesn't make Renly king. He's Robert's youngest brother. lf Bran can't be Lord of Winterfell before me, Renly can't be king before Stannis.

Name: jonos bracken
Subtitles: Do you mean to declare us for Stannis?

Name: galbart glover
Subtitles: Renly is not right! lf we put ourselves behind Stannis…

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: My Lords. My Lords! Here is what l say to these two kings. Renly Baratheon is nothing to me, nor Stannis neither. Why should they rule over me and mine from some flowery seat in the South? What do they know of the Wall or the Wolfswood? Even their gods are wrong! Why shouldn't we rule ourselves again? lt was the dragons we bowed to and now the dragons are dead! There sits the only king l mean to bend my knee to - the King in the North!

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: l'll have peace on those terms. They can keep their Red Castle and their iron chair too. The King in the North!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Am l your brother, now and always?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Now and always.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My sword is yours in victory and defeat, from this day until my last day.

Name: greatjon umber
Subtitles: The King in the North!

Name: all
Subtitles: The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

Name: stark guard
Subtitles: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l want to see him. Now! Leave us.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Leave us.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You look lovely tonight, Lady Stark. Widowhood becomes you. Your bed must be lonely. ls that why you came? l'm not at my best, but l think l could be of service. You slip out of that gown and we'll see if l'm up to it. Oh, l do like a violent woman.
ners: [{'stark'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: l will kill you tonight, Ser. Pack your head in a box and send it to your sister.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Let me show you how. Hit me again, over the ear. And again and again. You're stronger than you look, it shouldn't take long.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: That is what you want the world to believe, isn't it? That you don't fear death.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: But l don't, my lady. The dark is coming for all of us. Why cry about it?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Because you are going to the deepest of the seven hells, if the gods are just.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What gods are those? The trees your husband prayed to? Where were the trees when his head was getting chopped off? lf your gods are real and if they are just why is the world so full of injustice?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Because of men like you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: There are no men like me. Only me.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My son Bran. How did he come to fall from that tower?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: l pushed him out the window.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I hoped the fall would kill him.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You should get some sleep. lt's going to be a long war.

Subtitles: l can't believe we're actually at war. Was it this exciting last time, when you were young? What does it say? Have we captured Robb Stark yet? What's our next move?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Stop talking. Get back into bed.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: They have my son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Stark boy appears to be less green than we'd hoped.

Name: leo lefford
Subtitles: l've heard his wolf killed a dozen men and as many horses.

Name: addam marbrand
Subtitles: ls it true about Stannis and Renly?

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: Both Baratheon brothers have taken up against us. Jaime captured, his armies scattered. lt's a catastrophe. Perhaps we should sue for peace.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: There's your peace. Joffrey saw to that when he decided to remove Ned Stark's head. You'll have an easier time drinking from that cup than you will bringing Robb Stark to the table now. He's winning – in case you hadn't noticed.

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: l'm told we still have his sisters.

Name: leo lefford
Subtitles: The first order of business is ransoming Ser Jaime.

Name: addam marbrand
Subtitles: Kevan Lannister

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: They have my son! Get out, all of you. Not you. You were right about Eddard Stark. lf he were alive, we could have used him to broker a peace with Winterfell and Riverrun, which would have given us more time to deal with Robert's brothers. But now – madness. Madness and stupidity. l always thought you were a stunted fool. Perhaps l was wrong.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), {'eddard'}, {'robert'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Half wrong. l'm new to strategy, but unless we want to be surrounded by three armies, it appears we can't stay here.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No one will stay here. Ser Gregor will head out with 500 riders and set the Riverland on fire from Godo s Eye to the Red Fork. The rest of us will regroup at Harrenhal. And you will go to King's Landing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And do what?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Rule. You will serve as Hand of the King in my stead. You will bring that boy king to heel, and his mother too, if needs be. And if you get so much as a whiff of treason from any of the rest – Baelish, Varys, Pycelle…

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Heads, spikes, walls. Why not my uncle? Why not anyone? Why me?

Name: tywin lannister

Subtitles: Ser Jorah?

Subtitles: Gently, gently.

Subtitles: My son – where is he? l want him. Where is he?

Subtitles: The boy did not live.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Tell me.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: What is there to tell?

Subtitles: How did my son die?

Subtitles: What do the women say?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They say the child was –

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: Monstrous, twisted. l pulled him out myself. He was scaled like a lizard, blind, with leather wings like the wings of a bat. When l touched him the skin fell from his bones. Inside he was full of graveworms. l warned you that only death can pay for life. You knew the price.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Subtitles: Time enough for that later –

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: l want to see him now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The khalasar is gone.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: A khal who cannot ride is no khal. The Dothraki follow only the strong. l'm sorry, my Princess.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Drogo! My sun and stars. Why is he out here alone?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: He seems to like the warmth, Princess.

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: He lives. You asked for life, you paid for life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: This is not life. When will he be as he was?

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: When the sun rises in the west, sets in the east. When the seas go dry. When the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Leave us.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: l don't want you alone with this sorceress.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: l have nothing more to fear from this woman. Go.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You knew what l was buying and you knew the price.

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: lt was wrong of them to burn my temple. lt angered the Great Shepherd.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: This is not Godo s work. My child was innocent.

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: lnnocent? He would have been The Stallion Who Mounts The World. Now he will burn no cities. Now his khalasar will trample no nations into dust.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: l spoke for you. l saved you.

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: Saved me? Three of those riders had already raped me before you saved me, girl. l saw my godo s house burn, there where l had healed men and women beyond counting. ln the streets l saw piles of heads, the head of the baker who makes my bread, the head of a young boy that l had cured of fever just three moons past. So tell me again exactly what it was that you saved?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Your life.

Name: mirri maz duur
Subtitles: Why don't you take a look at your khal. Then you will see exactly what life is worth when all the rest has gone.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You can't!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Get out of my way, Sam.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: They'll put out the word. They'll send out ravens. People will come after you. Do you know what happens to deserters?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Better than you do.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: What are you going to do?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: l'm gonna find my brother and put a sword through King Joffrey's throat.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You can't leave us now. We need you here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Move.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: l won't let you go.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Hyah!

Name: shae
Subtitles: Hand of the King?

Subtitles: So it would seem.

Subtitles: And your father said you couldn't take anyone with you to King's Landing?

Subtitles: No, he said l couldn't take with me to King's Landing. He was very specific on that point.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What?

Subtitles: Are you ashamed of me? Are you afraid that l'm dancing around the court with my tits out?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I'm funny now? l'm Shae, the funny whore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My father's probably the most powerful man in the country. Certainly the richest. He has all Seven Kingdoms in his pockets. Everyone everywhere always has to do exactly what my father says. He's always been a cunt. l believe the ladies of the court could learn a great deal from a girl like you. Why don't you come with me, be the Hando s lady? Because the King needs a Hand and the Hand –

Subtitles: Samwell!

Subtitles: ls he dead?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Did we get him?

Subtitles: Come on, help me get him up.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Lucky you've got plenty of padding. We're taking you back to where you belong.

Subtitles: l belong with my brother.

Subtitles: They'll kill you if they know you came after me. Go back.

Subtitles: Sam told us everything. We're sorry about your father.

Name: jon snow

Name: grenn
Subtitles: You can't. You said the words.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't care about –
