Subtitles: Hear my words and bear witness to my vow

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: To hell with all of you.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Night gathers and now my watch begins. lt shall not end until my death. l shall live and die at my post.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: l am the sword in the darkness –

Name: sam pyp and grenn
Subtitles: l am the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realms of men. l pledge my life and honor to the Night's Watch, for this night and all nights to come.”

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do you remember our first ride, my sun and stars? lf you are in there, if you haven't gone away, show me. You're a fighter. You've always been a fighter. l need you to fight now. l know you're very far away, but come back to me, my sun and stars.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: When the sun rises in the west and sets in the east. Then you shall return to me, my sun and stars.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Kings? Oh, l can tell you all there is to know about kings. The thing you need to understand about kings is – For the past 67 years, l've known truly known more kings than any man alive. They're complicated men, but l know how to serve them. Yes, and keep on serving them. Aerys Targaryen. Of all the thousand thousand maladies the Gods visit on us, madness is the worst. He was a good man. Such a charmer. To watch him melt away before my eyes, consumed by dreams of fire and blood. Robert Baratheon was an entirely different animal – powerful man, great warrior, but alas - winning a kingdom and ruling a kingdom are rather different things. They say that if a man goes through life with his battle visor down, he can often be blind to the enemies at his side. Now l serve his son King Joffrey, may the Gods bless his reign.
ners: [set(), {'l'}, set(), set(), set(), {'aerys'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'robert'}, set(), {'joffrey'}]

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: He is a capable young man. Strong military mind. Stern. But sternness in defense of the realm is no vice. lt's far too soon to know what manner of king he will be, but l sense true greatness on the horizon for our new King. Mmm. True greatness.

Name: ros
Subtitles: So what's the thing?

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: What thing?

Name: ros
Subtitles: About kings. You said, "The thing you need to understand about kings".

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: What? Things? What?

Name: ros
Subtitles: When you started, you… Never mind.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Let me see you out, my dear.

Name: ros
Subtitles: lt's all right. No need.

Name: grand maester pycelle
Subtitles: Yes, yes. Till the next time. Right.

Name: varys
Subtitles: When you imagine yourself up there, how do you look? Does the crown fit? Do all the lords and ladies simper and bow, the ones who sneered at you for years?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: lt's hard for them to simper and bow without heads.

Name: varys
Subtitles: A man with great ambition and no morals… l wouldn't bet against you.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And what would you do, my friend, if you found yourself sitting up there?

Name: varys
Subtitles: l must be one of the few men in this city who doesn't want to be King.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You must be one of the few men in the city who isn't a man.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Oh, you can do better than that.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: When they castrated you, did they take the pillar with the stones? l've always wondered.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Have you? Do you spend a lot of time wondering what's between my legs?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: l picture a gash. Like a woman's. ls that about right?

Name: varys
Subtitles: l am flattered, of course, to be pictured at all.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Must be strange for you, even after all these years… a man from another land, despised by most, feared by all.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Am l? That is good to know. Do you lie awake at night fearing my gash?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: But you carry on whispering in one king's ear and then the next. l admire you.

Name: varys
Subtitles: And l admire you, Lord Baelish. A grasper from a minor House with a major talent for befriending powerful men – and women.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A useful talent, l'm sure you'd agree.

Name: varys
Subtitles: So here we stand in mutual admiration and respect.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Playing our roles.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Serving a new King.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Long may he reign. My king.

Name: varys
Subtitles: My king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: My lords. Shall we begin?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: You're Arry now, hear me? Arry the orphan boy. No one asks an orphan too many questions, ‘cause nobody gives three shits. What's your name?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Arry.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: You've a long way to travel, and in bad company. l've 20 this time – men and boys all bound for the Wall. Your lord father gave me the pick of the dungeons, and l didn't find no little lordlings down there. This lot – half of them would turn you over to the King quick as spit for a pardon. And the other half would do the same, except they'd rape you first. So keep to yourself – and when you piss, do it in the woods alone. You stay with this lot, boy. And stay or l'll lock you in the back of the wagon with these three.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Subtitles: Watch yourself, midget.

Subtitles: What's a gutter rat like you doing with a sword?

Name: lommy greenhands
Subtitles: Maybe he's a little squire.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: He ain't no squire. Look at him. He looks like a girl. l bet he stole that sword.

Name: lommy greenhands
Subtitles: Let's have a look.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: l could use me a sword like that.

Name: lommy greenhands
Subtitles: Take it off him.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Give it here, midget.

Name: lommy greenhands
Subtitles: Look at him! You'd better give Hot Pie the sword. l've seen him kick a boy to death.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: l knocked him down and l kicked him in the balls and l kept kicking him until he was dead. l kicked him all to pieces. You better give me that sword!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You want it? l'll give it to you. l already killed one fat boy. l bet you never killed anyone. l bet you're a liar. But l'm not. l'm good at killing fat boys. l like killing fat boys.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Your like picking on the little ones, do you? l've been hammering an anvil these past 10 years. When l hit that steel, it sings. Are you gonna sing when l hit you? This is castle-forged steel. Where'd you steal it?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: lt was a gift.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: lt don't matter now. Where we're going, they don't care what you've done. They've got rapers, pickpockets, highwaymen, murderers.

Subtitles: Which are you?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Armourer's apprentice. But my master got sick of me, so here l am.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Come on, you sorry sons of whores! lt's a thousand leagues from here to the Wall, and winter is coming!

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Ham. How many days in a row must a man be expected to start his day with ham? Bring me some beer at least. You look exhausted. Was your moonlight ride that tiring?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My friends brought me back.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: l didn't say it was your honor.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They killed my father.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: And you're gonna bring him back to life, are you? No? Good. We've had enough of that sort of thing. Beyond the Wall, the Rangers are reporting whole villages abandoned. At night they see fires blazing in the mountains from dusk until dawn. A captured wildling swears their tribes are uniting in some secret stronghold, to what ends the gods only know. Outside Eastwatch Cotter Pyke's men discovered four blue-eyed corpses. Unlike us, they were wise enough to burn them. Do you think your brother's war is more important than ours?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'cotter'}, set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: When dead men and worse come hunting for us in the night, do you think it matters who sits on the lron Throne?

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: Good. Because l want you and your wolf with us when we ride out beyond the Wall tomorrow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Beyond the Wall?

Name: jeor mormont
Subtitles: l'll not sit meekly by and wait for the snows. l mean to find out what's happening. The Night's Watch will ride in force against the wildlings, the White Walkers and whatever else is out there. And we will find Benjen Stark, alive or dead. l will command them myself. So l'll only ask you once, Lord Snow, are you a brother of the Night's Watch or a bastard boy who wants to play at war?

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: ls this your command, Khaleesi?

Subtitles: Drogo will have no use for dragon eggs in the Night Lands. Sell them. You can return to the Free Cities and live as a wealthy woman for all your days.

Subtitles: They were not given to me to sell.

Subtitles: Well struck… Well struck, Dog.

Subtitles: We heard you were dead.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: I'm glad you're not dead.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Me, too, dear. Death is so boring, especially now with so much excitement in the world. . My Lady, I'm sorry for your loss.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Her loss? Her father was a confessed traitor!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But still her father. Surely having so recently lost your own beloved father you can sympathize.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My father was a traitor. My mother and brother are traitors, too. I am loyal to my beloved Joffrey.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Of course you are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, , enjoy your name day, Your Grace. Wish I could stay and celebrate, but there is work to be done.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What work? . Why are you here?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: The raven arrived from the Citadel this morning, Your Grace. The conclave has met, , considered reports from Maesters all over the Seven Kingdoms, and declared this great summer done, at last. The longest summer in living memory.

Name: varys
Subtitles: The peasants say, a long summer means an even longer winter.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: A common superstition.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: We have enough wheat for a five-year winter. If it lasts any longer, , we'll have fewer peasants.

Name: janos
Subtitles: The city's drowning in refugees, Your Grace, fleeing the war. We have nowhere to house them, and with winter coming, it'll only get worse.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You command the City Watch, do you not, Lord Slynt?

Name: janos
Subtitles: I do, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And are you not a Lord at my command?

Name: janos
Subtitles: I owe my title and lands to your generosity, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Then do your job. Shut the gates to the peasants. They belong in the field, not our capital.

Name: janos
Subtitles: Yes, Your Grace.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Don't get up. More ravishing than ever, big sister. . War agrees with you. Forgive the interruption, carry on.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What are you doing here?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's been a remarkable journey. I, , pissed off the edge of the Wall, I slept in a sky cell. . I fought with the hill tribes. So many adventures, so much to be thankful for.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What are you doing here? This is the small council.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes., well, I, do believe the Hand of the King is welcome at all small council meetings.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Our father is Hand of the King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, but in his absence…

Name: varys
Subtitles: Your father has named Lord Tyrion to serve as Hand in his stead while he fights -

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Out! All of you out. . I would like to know how you tricked father into this.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If I were capable of tricking father, I'd be emperor of the world by now. You brought this on yourself. .

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I've done nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Quite right. You did nothing when your son called for Ned Stark's head. Now the entire North has risen up against us.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I tried to stop it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did you? You failed. That bit of theater will haunt our family for a generation.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Robb Stark is a child.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Who's won every battle he's fought. Do you understand we're losing the war?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you know about warfare?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Nothing. But I know people. And I know that our enemies hate each other almost as much as they hate us.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey is King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey is King.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You are here to advise him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm only here to advise him. And if the King listens to what I say, the King might just get his Uncle Jaime back.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You love your children. It's your one redeeming quality. That and your cheekbones. The Starks love their children as well. And we have two of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: One.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: One?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Arya, little animal, she disappeared.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Disappeared? What, in a puff of smoke? We had three Starks to trade. You chopped one's head off and let another escape. Father will be furious. It must be odd for you to be the disappointing child.

Name: lord
Subtitles: My Lord, may the Old Gods watch over your brother and all our northern sons.

Name: lord
Subtitles: The walls of my Holdfast will not stand the winter. The stones were last mortared in the time of King Aerys, and I'm afraid the masons today are not fit to carry their fathers' hammers. When I was a boy, I remember seeing them put up a new tower at Torrhen's Square in a summer. Men worked back then. Today, my Holdfast looks like it was built by drunk children. At night you can hear the wind howling through the gaps. And the Gods forbid it rains. Why, I might as well sleep beneath a waterfall.
ners: [set(), {'aerys'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Maintenance of a Holdfast generally falls to the lord of that Holdfast.

Name: lord
Subtitles: Generally, yes, but I've sent all the young men off to fight Robb Stark's war.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: King Robb. And it's not his war. He didn't choose it.

Name: lord
Subtitles: Maybe not, My Lord, but he called in his Banners, and took the men.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Joffrey killed my father, your liege lord. Do you remember your vows, Ser?

Name: lord
Subtitles: Of course I remember!

Name: luwin
Subtitles: We can spare four masons for a week, My Lord. Will that be sufficient to repair your walls?

Name: lord
Subtitles: I - I believe it will.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: We didn't want him here all day, did we?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I didn't like the way he was talking about Robb.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Nor did I. But listening to people you'd rather not listen to is one of your responsibilities as Lord of Winterfell. . Lord Portan.

Name: portan
Subtitles: My Lord, may the Old Gods watch over your brother and all our northern sons.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Boil this for an hour and drink the tea. Makes all your pain go away.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Don't have any pain.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Lucky for you.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: That way.

Name: osha
Subtitles: You've been having those dreams again.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't dream.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Everyone dreams.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't. Heard some of the men talking about the comet. . They say it's an omen. They say it means Robb will win a great victory in the South.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Did they? . I heard some other fools say it's Lannister Red. Means the Lannisters will rule all Seven Kingdoms before long. I heard a stable boy say it's the color of blood, to mark the death of your father.

Name: osha
Subtitles: The stars don't fall for men. The red comet means one thing, boy. Dragons.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: The dragons are all dead. They've been dead for centuries.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: What did your brother say about them, Khaleesi?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He said they ate meat.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: He didn't tell you what kind of meat?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My brother didn't know anything about dragons. He didn't know anything about anything.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: She was Drogo's first gift to me.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I remember.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I promised to protect them. Promised them their enemies would die screaming. How do I make starvation scream?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: A trick I never learned, I'm afraid.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Does it ever end?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: This is further east than I've ever been. But, yes, Khaleesi, everything ends, even the red waste.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And you're sure there's no other way?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: If we go south to the land of the Lazarheen, the Lamb Men will kill us and take your dragons. If we go west to the Dothraki Sea, the first Khalasar we meet will kill us and take your dragons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No one will take my dragons.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They are too weak to fight, as are your people. You must be their strength.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: As you are mine.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Rakharo, Aggo, Kovarro. Take our remaining horses. You will ride east, you southeast, and you northeast.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: What do we seek, Khaleesi?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Cities, living or dead. Caravans and people. Rivers or lakes or the great salt sea. Find how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Rokharo, you are my last hope, blood of my blood.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: I will not fail you, blood of my blood.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You never have.

Name: rakharo
Subtitles: This is… bad time to start.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Having a rough time of it?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Nothing's killed me yet.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Your ass killed the sledge.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You offered me a ride!

Name: grenn
Subtitles: I just wanted you to shut up about your damn blisters.

Name: edd
Subtitles: I was born in a place like this. Later, I fell on hard times.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Are those girls?

Name: edd
Subtitles: Craster's daughters.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I haven't seen a girl in six months.

Name: edd
Subtitles: I'd keep on not seeing them if I were you.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: What, he don't like people messing with his daughters?

Name: edd
Subtitles: He don't like people messing with his wives.

Name: edd
Subtitles: He marries his daughters, and they give him more daughters, and on, and on it goes.

Name: sam
Subtitles: That's foul.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: It's beyond foul.

Name: edd
Subtitles: All the other wildlings for a hundred leagues have disappeared. Craster's still here. He must be doing something right.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What happens to the boys?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Hmm?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He marries his daughters. What does he do with his sons?

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: He said he planned to stop here on his way to the Frostfangs.

Name: craster
Subtitles: People make all sorts of plans. I haven't seen Benjen Stark in three years. Haven't missed him. Always treated me like scum. . Haven't had any good wine for a long time. You Southerners make good wine, I'll give you that.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're not Southerners.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Who's this little girl? You're prettier than half my daughters. You got a nice wet twat between your legs? What's your name?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Jon Snow.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Snow, eh? Listen to me, bastard. All you lot from south of the Wall, you're Southerners. But now you're in the North, the real North.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: The lad meant no harm.

Name: craster
Subtitles: I catch that pretty little bastard talking to my daughters -

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: No one will talk to your daughters, you have my word. Now, sit down and shut your mouth.

Name: craster
Subtitles: You bring any of that good wine with you?

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: We did. We passed through six villages on the way here. All six were abandoned. Where have all the wildlings gone?

Name: craster
Subtitles: I could tell you, but I'm thirsty.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: There's a barrel of Dornish wine on the sledge. Bring it in here.

Name: watchman
Subtitles: Yes, commander.

Name: craster
Subtitles: You want to know where they've all gone? North! To join up with Mance Rayder Your old friend.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: He's no friend of mine. He broke his vows, betrayed his brothers!

Name: craster
Subtitles: Oh, aye. But once he was just a poor black crow. And now he's King-Beyond-the-Wall.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: He's been calling himself that for years. What's he king of? A frozen lake somewhere?

Name: craster
Subtitles: That's a good-looking axe. Fresh forged?

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: Give it here.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: You'll have another one made at Castle Black. . Here.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Oh, that's some lovely steel. . You want to know what Mance Rayder is doing? Gathering an army. What I hear, he's already got more men than any of your southern kings.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: And where does he plan marching this army?

Name: craster
Subtitles: When you're all the way north, there's only one direction to go.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: These are bad times to be living alone in the wild. The cold winds are rising.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Let them come. My roots are sunk deep. Wife, tell the Lord Crow how content we are.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: This is our place. Our husband keeps us safe. Better to live free than die a slave.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Don't it make you jealous, old man, to see me with all these young wives and you with no one to warm your bed?

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: We chose different paths.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Oh, aye, and you chose the path with no one but boys on it. . You'll be wanting to sleep beneath my roof, I suppose, and eat me out of pigs.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: A roof would be welcome. It's been hard riding. We've brought our own food and good steel for you.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Any man lays a hand on one of my wives, he loses the hand. And I see this one, , staring too long, I might just gouge his eyes out.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: Your roof, your rules.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: Who am I? Who am I?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord commander.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: And who are you?

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your steward.

Name: lord mormont
Subtitles: You want to lead one day? . Then learn how to follow.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Lord of Light, come to us in our darkness. We offer you these false Gods.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Take them and cast your light upon us. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: group
Subtitles: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: After the long summer, darkness will fall heavy on the world. Stars will bleed.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: We need to stop her!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The cold breath of winter will freeze the seas.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Not now.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: And the dead shall rise in the North.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: All you men were named in the Light of the Seven! Is this how you treat the Gods of your fathers? Are you so eager to spit on your ancestors?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You smell of fear, fear and piss and old bones. Do you want to stop me? Stop me.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: In the ancient books, it's written that a warrior will draw a burning sword from the fire. And that sword shall be Lightbringer. Stannis Baratheon, warrior of light, your sword awaits you.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Lord, cast your light upon us!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: For the night is dark and full of terror.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: This woman will lead him into a war he cannot win.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Stannis is our king. We follow where he leads, even if we don't like the path.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: King. Since that boar killed his brother, every lord wants a coronation.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I don't serve the others. I serve Stannis.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: As do I, but loyal service means telling hard truths. He's surrounded by fools and fanatics, but he trusts you, Davos. . If you tell him the truth…

Name: davos
Subtitles: What's the truth?

Name: matthos
Subtitles: And I declare upon the honor of my house that my beloved brother Robert le-”

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: He wasn't my beloved brother. . I didn't love him, he didn't love me.

Name: davos
Subtitles: A harmless courtesy, Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: A lie. Take it out.

Name: matthos
Subtitles: That my brother Robert left no trueborn heirs; the boy Joffrey, the boy Tommen, and the girl Myrcella, being born of incest between Cersei Lannister and her brother Jaime Lannister. By right of birth -"

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Call him what he is.

Name: matthos
Subtitles: And her brother Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. By right of birth and blood, I do this day lay claim -

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Make it Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. Whatever else he is, the man's still a knight.

Name: matthos
Subtitles: Ser Jaime Lannister, the Kingslayer. By right of birth and blood, I do this day lay claim to the Iron Throne of Westeros. . Let all true men declare their loyalty.”

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: When Eddard Stark learned the truth, he told only me. I'll not make the same mistake. Send copies of that letter to every corner of the Realm, from the Arbor to the Wall. The time has come to choose. Let no man claim ignorance as an excuse.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, the Lannisters are the true enemy. If, for the time being, you could make peace with your brother -

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'll not make peace with Renly while he calls himself King.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Well, many have already declared for him; Mace Tyrell, Randyll Tarly.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Stannis does not need to beg this lord or that lord for support. The Lord of Light stands behind him.

Name: davos
Subtitles: And how many ships has the Lord of Light got in his fleet?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: He has no need for ships.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'm sure he doesn't, but we do if we're going to war. If not Renly, Your Grace, join forces with Robb Stark.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Who would steal the northern half of my kingdom. I've always served thieves according to their desserts, as you well know, Ser Davos. Joffrey, Renly, Robb Stark, they're all thieves. They'll bend the knee or I'll destroy them.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: I owe you an apology, my King. My duty is to serve. You have chosen the new God over the Old Gods. May the Lord of Light watch over us all. Shall we drink together?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Don't.

Name: cressen
Subtitles: A cup of wine to honor the one true God.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The night is dark and full of terrors, old man, but the fire burns them all away. Your Grace.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: King in the North. I keep expecting you to leave me in one castle or another for safekeeping, but you drag me along from camp to camp. Have you grown fond of me, Stark? Is that it? I've never seen you with a girl.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: If I left you with one of my bannermen, your father would know within a fortnight, and my bannerman would receive a raven with a message, "Release my son and you'll be rich beyond your dreams. Refuse and your house will be destroyed, root and stem.”

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You don't trust the loyalty of the men following you into battle?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Oh, I trust them with my life. Just not with yours.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Smart boy. What's wrong? Don't like being called ‘boy'? Insulted?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You insult yourself, Kingslayer. You've been defeated by a boy.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You're held captive by a boy. Perhaps you'll be killed by a boy. . Stannis Baratheon sent ravens to all the high lords of Westeros. King Joffrey Baratheon is neither a true king nor a true Baratheon. . He's your bastard son.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If that's true, Stannis is the rightful king. How convenient for him.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My father learned the truth. That's why you had him executed.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I was your prisoner when Ned Stark lost his head.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Your son killed him so the world wouldn't learn who fathered him. And you... you pushed my brother from a window because he saw you with the queen.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You have proof? Or do you want to trade gossip like a couple of fishwives?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'm sending one of your cousins down to King's Landing with my peace terms.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You think my father's going to negotiate with you? You don't know him very well.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: No, but he's starting to know me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Three victories don't make you a conqueror.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: It's better than three defeats.

Name: shae
Subtitles: This city stinks Like dead bodies.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A bit corpsey, yes.

Name: shae
Subtitles: And shit.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I thought you wanted to come here.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I love it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You love the smell of dead bodies and shit?

Name: shae
Subtitles: And cum and garlic and rum.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You can smell cum from the balcony?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I love the stink. I love the noise. Cities make me want to fuck.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And so did the country.

Name: shae
Subtitles: This is where I belong.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, well, you need to be careful. No one can know you're here.

Name: shae
Subtitles: No one will know.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You can't trust anyone in King's Landing. They're all liars; good liars, bad liars, one or two great liars.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What about you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Me? I'm not from here. I'm a slave to the truth.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Truth? You are the biggest little liar I have ever met.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why do you think I am so little? I'm being, , crushed beneath the weight of all that truth.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ned Stark actually slept on this, as if the poor man didn't suffer enough. One of the many changes we'll have to make around here.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Lord Baelish.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Of course, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Ned Stark's youngest daughter Arya... we can't seem to locate her.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: If she's escaped the capital, Winterfell seems the logical destination.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And yet my friends in the North report no sign of her.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Curious.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If we choose to negotiate with the Starks, the girl has some value. Whoever finds her, well, you know what they say about Lannisters and debts.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Well, you could ask Varys where she is. He'll have an answer for you. Whether you believe it,,, Myself, I have always had a hard time trusting eunuchs. Who knows what they want?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A mockingbird. . You created your own Sigil, didn't you?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Appropriate for a self-made man with so many songs to sing.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'm glad you like it. Some people are fortunate enough to be born into the right family. Others have to find their own way.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I heard a song once about a boy of modest means who found his way into the home of a very prominent family. He loved the eldest daughter. Sadly, she had eyes for another.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: When boys and girls live in the same home, awkward situations can arise. Sometimes, I've heard, even brothers and sisters develop certain affections. And when these affections become common knowledge, well, that is an awkward situation, indeed. Especially in a prominent family. But prominent families often forget a simple truth, I've found.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And which truth is that?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Knowledge is power.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Seize him. . Cut his throat. . Stop. Wait. I've changed my mind. Let him go. . Step back three paces. Turn around. Close your eyes. . Power is power. Do see if you can take some time away from your coins and your whores to locate the Stark girl for me. I would very much appreciate it.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You're Ser Alton Lannister?

Name: alton
Subtitles: I am, Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I offer your cousins peace if they meet my terms. First, your family must release my sisters. Second, my father's bones must be returned to us so he may rest beside his brother and sister in the crypts beneath Winterfell. And the remains of all those who died in his service must also be returned. Their families can honor them with proper funerals.

Name: alton
Subtitles: An honorable request, Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Third... Joffrey and the Queen Regent must renounce all claim to dominion of the North. From this time, till the end of time, we are a free and independent kingdom.

Name: ser rodrik
Subtitles: The King in the North.

Name: others at table
Subtitles: King in the North.

Subtitles: I'm walking and running, but I'm not I'm not me. I'm running through the godswood, sniffing the dirt, tasting blood in my mouth when I've made a fresh kill, howling. Old Nan used to tell me stories about magical people who could live inside stags, birds, wolves.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: That's exactly what they are, Bran - stories.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: So she was lying? They don't exist?

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Well, they may have done. But they're gone from the world, along with much else. These are dreams, Bran, nothing more.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No, my dreams are different. Mine are true. I dreamt of my father dying. And Rickon had the same dream.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: What about all the dreams you had that didn't come true? Hmm? Right.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: This link is made of Valyrian steel. Only one maester in a hundred wears it on his chain. It signifies that I have studied the higher mysteries. And all who study these mysteries try their hand at spells. I was no different. I was young. And what boy doesn't secretly wish for hidden powers to lift him out of his dull life into a special one? But in the end, for all my efforts, I got no more out of it than a thousand boys before me. Come on.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: luwin
Subtitles: All right. Maybe magic once was a mighty force in the world. But not anymore. The dragons are gone. The giants are dead. And the Children of the Forest forgotten.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Loras! Highgarden!

Name: man
Subtitles: Get him!

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Oh!

Name: loras
Subtitles: Yield! I yield.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Well fought. Approach.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Rise. Remove your helm.

Name: renly
Subtitles: You are all your father promised and more, my lady. I've seen Ser Loras bested once or twice, but never quite in that fashion.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Now, now, my love. My brother fought valiantly for you.

Name: renly
Subtitles: That he did, my queen. But there can only be one champion. Brienne of Tarth, you may ask anything of me you desire. If it is within my power, it is yours.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Your Grace, I ask the honor of a place in your Kingsguard.

Name: loras
Subtitles: What?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I will be one of your seven, pledge my life to yours, and keep you safe from all harm.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Done. Rise, Brienne of the Kingsguard.

Name: colen
Subtitles: Your Grace, I have the honor to bring you Lady Catelyn Stark, sent as an envoy by her son Robb, Lord of Winterfell.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lord of Winterfell and King in the North.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Lady Catelyn. I'm pleased to see you. May I present my wife, Margaery of House Tyrell?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You are very welcome here, Lady Stark. I'm so sorry for your loss.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You are most kind.

Name: renly
Subtitles: My lady, I swear to you I will see the Lannisters answer for your husbando s murder. When I take King's Landing, I'll bring you Joffrey's head.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: It will be enough to know that justice was done, my lord.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Your Grace. And you should kneel when you approach the King.

Name: renly
Subtitles: There's no need for that. Lady Stark is an honored guest.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Has your son marched against Tywin Lannister yet?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I do not sit on my son's war councils. And if I did, I would not share his strategies with you.

Name: loras
Subtitles: If Robb Stark wants a pact with us, he should come himself, not hide behind his mother's skirts.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My son is fighting a war, not playing at one.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Don't worry, my lady. Our war is just beginning.

Name: gerard
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Gerard. How's your foot?

Name: gerard
Subtitles: Better, Your Grace.

Name: gerard
Subtitles: They don't know their own size is all.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Good man.

Name: renly
Subtitles: I have a hundred thousand men at my command. All the might of the Stormlands and the Reach.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And all of them young and bold like your Knight of Flowers? It's a game to you, isn't it? I pity them.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Why?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Because it won't last. Because they are the knights of summer and winter is coming.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Brienne, escort Lady Catelyn to her tent. She's tired from her journey.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: At once, Your Grace. Shall I return after?

Name: renly
Subtitles: That won't be necessary. I would pray awhile. Alone.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: If you'll follow me, my lady.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You fought bravely today, Lady Brienne.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I fought for my king. Soon I'll fight for him on the battlefield. Die for him if I must. And, if it please you, Brienne's enough. I'm no lady.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What are you doing here?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I live here. Are you angry with me, brother?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You lying bitch.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: It's not my fault you didn't recognize me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Recognize you? How could I? The last time I saw you- you looked like a fat little boy.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You were a fat little boy, too, but I recognized you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Why didn't you tell me?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I wanted to see who you were first. And I did.

Name: balon
Subtitles: The plans are made. It's time you heard them.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Father.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Father.

Name: balon
Subtitles: The wolf pup has gone south with the entirety of the Northern army at his back. While he's tangling with the lion in the Westerlands, the North is ripe for the taking. The Ironborn will reave and pillage, as it was in the old days, all along the northern coast. We'll spread our dominion across the green lands, securing the Neck and everything above. Every stronghold will yield to us, one by one. Winterfell may defy us for a year, but what of it? The rest shall be ours, forest, field, and hall.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: balon
Subtitles: Yara, my daughter, you'll take thirty longships to attack Deepwood Motte.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I've always wanted a castle.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: And what's my role in all this?

Name: balon
Subtitles: You'll take a ship to raid the fishing villages on the Stoney Shore.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: A ship? You give her thirty and I get one?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: The Sea Bitch. We thought she'd be perfect for you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm to fight fishermen?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Be careful of their nets.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Father, I fought with Robb Stark. I know his men. He won't give up the North so easily.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: They won't even know we're there until it's too late.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What do you know of it, woman? I'm a proven warrior.

Name: balon
Subtitles: Your brothers were warriors, both of them dead at the hands of those you seem so eager to protect.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm not protecting anyone. I just wonder if it's not wiser to wait. Why risk going against the North if they would be our allies? Rise up against them and they could destroy us. But if we pledge fealty to them, they'll give us Casterly Rock.

Name: balon
Subtitles: What are our words? Our words?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: We do not sow.

Name: balon
Subtitles: We do not sow. We are Ironborn. We're not subjects. We're not slaves. We do not plow the fields or toil in the mine. We take what is ours. Your time with the wolves has made you weak.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You act as if I volunteered to go. You gave me away, if you remember. The day you bent the knee to Robert Baratheon. After he crushed you. Did you take what was yours then?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You gave me away!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Your boy! Your last boy! You gave me away like I was some dog you didn't want anymore. And now you curse me because I've come home.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You'd have our father bow down to your other family?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I have no other family.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Don't you? Make your choice, Theon, and do it quickly. Our ships sail with or without you.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You won't let me leave this room. You won't let me-

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Keep your voice down.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Why? You think your father can hear me? He's three hundred miles away!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't intend for you to stay here. I might be able to bring you into the castle kitchens.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Again, only temporary.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Every man who has tasted my cooking has told me what a good whore I am.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But you wouldn't be a cook. You'd pose as a scullion.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Scullion? What is a scullion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Kitchen wench.

Name: shae
Subtitles: A kitchen wench?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, but-

Name: shae
Subtitles: Cleaning pots? Is that how my lion wants to see me?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your lion wants to see you alive. We've come to a dangerous place. My sister wants to hurt me. She'll look for any weakness she can find. She can't know about you.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I'm the weakness?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's a compliment, my lady.

Name: shae
Subtitles: How is being a weakness a compliment?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Language can be a bit tricky here.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Oh, I'm too stupid to understand. The stupid foreign girl. I am not a kitchen wench.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: When will Joffrey and Sansa be married?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Soon, darling, when the war is over.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: Mother says I'll have a new gown for the ceremony and another for the feast. But yours will be ivory, since you're the bride.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The princess just spoke to you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Pardon, Your Grace. I'm sure your dress will be beautiful, Myrcella. I'm counting the days until the fighting is done and I can pledge my love to the King in sight of the gods.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Is Joffrey going to kill Sansa's brother?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He might.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Would you like that?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: No. I don't think so.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Even if he does, Sansa will do her duty. Won't you, little dove?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I'm Shae, my lady. Your new handmaiden.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I didn't know I needed a new handmaiden. You're not from here.

Name: shae
Subtitles: No.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Waiting for you to tell me what to do.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I shouldn't have to tell you to do things. You should just do them.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What things?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Change my linens, wash my clothing, scrub the floor, empty my chamber pot, brush my hair.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You said to brush your-

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Not now.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Your chamber pot is empty.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Clean the table.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Have you ever been a handmaiden before?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: For whom?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Lady Zuriff.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lady Zuriff

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: There is no Lady Zuriff in this city.

Name: shae
Subtitles: She wasn't in this city.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't know how they did things in that city, but in this city, handmaidens wait on ladies, not the other way around. And I don't have time to answer a thousand questions and teach you how to do your job.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Do you want me to leave?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Just brush my hair.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh! Thank the gods. I haven't had a proper shit in six days.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: I've encountered this problem before, my lord. The stresses of power often have this insalubrious effect. Two drops with water, daily.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Right. I'm so grateful to have a man of your vast knowledge and wisdom on my side.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Please.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Thank you, my lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I can trust you, Pycelle, can I not?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Why, yes, of course, my lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: These are perilous times. And the crown must forge new alliances. And these alliances must often be sealed in matrimony.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Matrimony, huh? Yes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm trusting the council with these plans, but the Queen mustn't know. We can't have her meddling in affairs that could determine the future of the realm. There's too much at stake.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Oh, yes, yes. Indeed, yes. I shall be silent as the grave.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm brokering an alliance with House Martell of Dorne. Princess Myrcella will wed their youngest son when she comes of age, ensuring their loyalty and their army, should we need it.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Myrcella sent away to Dorne?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But remember, the Queen mustn't know.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Ooh. "The Queen mustn't know." I love conversations that begin this way.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I plan to marry Princess Myrcella off to Theon Greyjoy.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Theon Greyjoy? Forgive me, my lord, but how? He grew up a ward of Winterfell. He fights for Robb Stark.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Precisely.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Theon's father loathes the Starks and will convince the boy to come to our side. Greyjoy can destroy the Northern army from within and we can have his father's ships.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But remember, you must tell no one.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Tell no one what?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I plan to wed Princess Myrcella to Robin Arryn of the Vale. Lysa is not fond of me. But perhaps the promise of a royal match will convince her to let bygones be bygones.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: She imprisoned you. She tried to execute you. And you offer her son a princess?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: For men in our position, holding grudges can be an encumbrance, don't you think?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And I suppose you want me to broker this agreement?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Who better?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Yes, I could sing this song to Lysa, if I cared to. What's in it for me?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The gratitude of the people of Westeros for helping to end this war, the adoration of the King for bringing the Vale back into the fold... and Harrenhal.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Harrenhal is cursed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Never took you for a superstitious man. By all means, tear it down and rebuild. You'll be able to afford it. I plan to make you Lord of the Riverlands.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: With a single stroke, you'd make me one of the greatest lords in the realm.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You served my family well in the matter of the succession.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: So did Janos Slynt, and he was given Harrenhal, too. Until you snatched it away.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I need you to deliver Lysa Arryn. I didn't need Janos Slynt. It's settled, then?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good. Oh. And remember-

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The Queen mustn't know.

Name: renly
Subtitles: That must hurt.

Name: renly
Subtitles: What? What is it?

Name: loras
Subtitles: A member of the Kingsguard? As if I wasn't humiliated enough already.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Brienne is a very capable warrior.

Name: renly
Subtitles: And she's devoted to me. You're jealous.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Jealous? Of Brienne the Beauty? Don't make me laugh.

Name: renly
Subtitles: I'll make it up to you.

Name: loras
Subtitles: No, Your Grace. Not tonight. There's another Tyrell who requires your attention. You didn't win my father's support or his army on charm alone.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Your vassals are starting to snigger behind your back. Brides aren't usually virgins two weeks after their wedding night.

Name: renly
Subtitles: And Margaery's a virgin?

Name: loras
Subtitles: Officially. Shall I bring her to you?

Name: renly
Subtitles: I should warn you, I've had quite a bit of wine.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: As is your right. You are a king.

Name: renly
Subtitles: You look very beautiful.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Thank you, Your Grace.

Name: renly
Subtitles: It's a lovely gown.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You think so? I can't decide how I like it better. This way, or this way.

Name: renly
Subtitles: You certainly don't need it.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Although, some say the beauty most desired is the beauty concealed.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Must be the wine.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Here, let me.

Name: renly
Subtitles: I'm sorry.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Do you want my brother to come in and help?

Name: renly
Subtitles: What?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He could get you started. I know he wouldn't mind. Or I can turn over and you can pretend I'm him.

Name: renly
Subtitles: I don't know what you're talking about.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: There's no need for us to play games. Save your lies for court. You're going to need a lot of them.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Your enemies aren't happy about us. They want to tear us apart. And the best way to stop them is to put your baby in my belly. We can try again later. You decide how you want to do it, with me, with me and Loras, however else you like.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Whatever you need to do. You are a king.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You monster. Myrcella is my only daughter. Do you really think I'll let you sell her like a common whore?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Myrcella's a princess. Some would say she was born for this.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I will not let you ship her off to Dorne as I was shipped off to Robert Baratheon.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Dorne is the safest place for her.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Are you mad? The Martells loathe us.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: That's why we need to seduce them. We're going to need their support in the war your son started.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She'll be a hostage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A guest.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You won't get away with this. You think the piece of paper Father gave you keeps you safe. Ned Stark had a piece of paper, too.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's done, Cersei.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You cannot stop it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Just how safe do you think Myrcella is if this city falls? Do you want to see her raped, butchered like the Targaryen children? Make no mistake. They'll mount her pretty little head on a spike right beside yours.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Get out! Get out!

Name: priest
Subtitles: Theon of the House Greyjoy, you would this day consecrate your faith to the Drowned God?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I would.

Name: drowned priest
Subtitles: Kneel.

Name: drowned priest
Subtitles: Let Theon, your servant, be born again from the sea as you were. Bless him with salt. Bless him with stone. Bless him with steel.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What is dead may never die.

Name: drowned priest
Subtitles: What is dead may never die. But rises again harder and stronger. Stand.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I don't appreciate being made a fool of, dwarf. If Myrcella marries the Martell boy, she can't very well marry Robin Arryn, can she?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, afraid not. Sorry about that.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And Harrenhal, I suppose that's off the table as well.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, I fear so. Sorry about that, too.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Leave me out of your next deception.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, that's a shame. You were to be the centerpiece of my next deception. My brother Jaime rots in a Northern stockade. I would see him released. That's where you come in.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Robb Stark will never release the Kingslayer.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, he won't. But his mother might. How would you like to see your beloved Cat again?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Find him?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh, aye. And he has company. Filthy old stoat. Almost hate to interrupt.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, you don't.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: No, I don't.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: What is the meaning of this?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: No, please, please.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You disappoint me, Grand Maester.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: I am your loyal servant.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So loyal that you told the Queen about my plans to send Myrcella to Dorne.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: No! Never! It's a falsehood. I swear it. It wasn't me. Ah, Varys. It was Varys the Spider.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: See, I told Varys that I was giving the Princess to the Greyjoys. I told Littlefinger that I planned to wed her to Robin Arryn. I told no one that I was offering her to the Dornish. No one but you.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: The eunuch has spies everywhere.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Cut off his manhood and feed it to the goats.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: No, no, no.

Name: timett
Subtitles: There are no goats, halfman.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, make do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How long have you been spying for my sister?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: All I did, I did for House Lannister. Always. Your lord father, ask him. I've always been his servant since the days of the Mad King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't like his beard.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: What? What?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Oh, no. No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How many Hands have you betrayed, Pycelle? Eddard Stark? Jon Arryn?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Oh, Lord Arryn, h-he knew. He, he knew the t-truth about, about, about the Queen. An-And he planned to act, to t-tell King Robert.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So you poisoned him?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: No. Never.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But you let him die, made sure he succumbed.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Lannister, I always served Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Get him out of my sight. Throw him in one of the black cells.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Oh, no. No, no, no. No, please. Don't! You can't do this to me!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: For your trouble.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You'll be pleased to know our mutual friend is doing quite well in Lady Sansa's service.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good. One of my better ideas.

Name: varys
Subtitles: And it seems the Grand Maester has found his way into a black cell?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Well played, My Lord Hand. But should I be worried? Janos Slynt, Pycelle - The Small Council grows smaller every day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Council has a reputation for serving past Hands poorly. I don't mean to follow Ned Stark to the grave.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Power is a curious thing, my lord. Are you fond of riddles?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why, am I about to hear one?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Three great men sit in a room. A king, a priest and a rich man. Between them stands a common sellsword. Each great man bids the sellsword kill the other two. Who lives, who dies?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Depends on the sellsword.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Does it? He has neither crown nor gold nor favor with the gods.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He has a sword, the power of life and death.

Name: varys
Subtitles: But if it's swordsmen who rule, why do we pretend kings hold all the power? When Ned Stark lost his head, who was truly responsible? Joffrey? The executioner? Or something else?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I've decided I don't like riddles.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Power resides where men believe it resides. It's a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: What?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How do you sleep?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Same as most men, I think.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But you've seen things, horrible things.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: Aye. I've seen some pretty things, too, but not nearly so many.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How do you sleep when you... when you have those things in your head?

Name: yoren
Subtitles: You didn't see that. I made damn sure.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I close my eyes and I see them up there. All of them standing there. Joffrey, the Queen and... and my sister.

Name: yoren
Subtitles: You know, we've got something in common, me and you. You know that? I must have been a couple of years older than you. I saw my brother stabbed through the heart right on our doorstep. He weren't much of a villain what skewered him. Willem, the lado s name was. He ran off before anyone could spit. And I just stood there, watching my brother die. Here's the funny part. I can't picture my brother's face anymore. But Willem, oh, he was a nice-looking boy. He had good white teeth, blue eyes, one of those dimpled chins all the girls like. I would think about him when I was working, when I was drinking, when I was having a shit. It got to the point where I would say his name every night before I went to bed. Willem. Willem. Willem. A prayer almost. Well, one day, Willem came riding back into town. I buried an ax so deep into Willem's skull, they had to bury him with it. Willem's horse got me to the Wall and I've been wearing black ever since. Well... That'll help you sleep, eh?

Subtitles: No, no, I'm relieved. I never really believed you were a fanatic. Charmless, rigid, a bore, yes, but not a godly man.

Subtitles: You should kneel before your brother. He's the Lordo s chosen, born amidst salt and smoke.

Subtitles: Born amidst salt and smoke? Is he a ham?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Listen to yourselves. If you were sons of mine, I would knock your heads together and lock you in a bedchamber until you remembered that you were brothers.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: It is strange to find you beside my brother, Lady Stark. Your husband was a supporter of my claim. Lord Eddardo s integrity cost him his head. And you sit beside this pretender and chastise me.

Subtitles: We share a common enemy.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: The Iron Throne is mine by right. All those that deny that are my foes.

Name: renly
Subtitles: The whole realm denies it, from Dorne to the Wall. Old men deny it with their death rattle and unborn children deny it in their mother's wombs. No one wants you for their king. You never wanted any friends, brother. But a man without friends is a man without power.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: For the sake of the mother who bore us, I will give you this one night to reconsider. Strike your banners, come to me before dawn, and I will grant you your old seat in the Council. I'll even name you my heir until a son is born to me. Otherwise I shall destroy you.

Subtitles: Look across those fields, brother. Can you see all those banners?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Where I come from, guests are treated with respect, not insulted at the gates.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Then perhaps you should return to where you come from. We wish you well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What are you doing? You promised to receive me.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: We have received you. Here we are, and here you are.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: If you do not let us in, all of us will die.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Which we shall deeply regret. But Qarth did not become the greatest city that ever was or will be by letting Dothraki savages through its gates.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Khaleesi, please be careful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thirteen! When my dragons are grown, we will take back what was stolen from me and destroy those who have wronged me. We will lay waste to armies and burn cities to the ground. Turn us away and we will burn you first.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Ah. You are a true Targaryen. Only, as you said a moment ago, if we don't let you into the city, you will all die. And so-

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Retreating in fear from a little girl is unbecoming of the greatest city that ever was or will be.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: The discussion is over, Xaro Xhoan Daxos. The Thirteen have spoken.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I am one of the Thirteen, and I am still speaking.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: The girl threatens to burn our city to the ground and you would invite her in for a cup of wine? She is the Mother of Dragons.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Do you expect her to watch her people starve without breathing fire? I believe we can allow a few Dothraki through our gates without dooming our city. After all, here I am, a savage from the Summer Isles, and Qarth still stands.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Our decision is final.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Very well. I invoke soumai.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I will vouch for her, her people, and her dragons, in accordance with the law.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Be it on your head.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Welcome to Qarth, my lady.

Name: tickler
Subtitles: Is there gold or silver in the village?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'm not from the village.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I don't know what that is.

Name: man
Subtitles: You two. Take Lord Lannister's things to his quarters.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What's this?

Name: mountain
Subtitles: We weren't expecting you till tomorrow, Lord Tywin.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Evidently not. Why are these prisoners not in their cells?

Name: mountain
Subtitles: Cells are overflowing, my lord.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: This lot won't be here long. Don't need no permanent place. After we interrogate 'em, we usually just-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Are we so well-manned that we can afford to discard able young bodies and skilled laborers?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You, do you have a trade?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Smith, my lord.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: What are you looking at? Kneel! Kneel or I'll carve your lungs out, boy.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: He'll do no such thing. This one's a girl, you idiot, dressed as a boy. Why?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Safer to travel, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Smart. More than I can say for this lot. Get these prisoners to work. Bring the girl. I need a new cupbearer.

Name: mountain
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your visits are too few, cousin.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Her Grace, the Queen Regent, commands you to release Grand Maester Pycelle. Here's your warrant.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So it is. Will you take a cup with me? I find that mulled wine helps me sleep.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I am here at Her Grace's behest, not to drink with you, Imp.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If my sister was so concerned for Pycelle, I would have thought she'd come herself. Instead she sends you. What am I to make of that?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I don't care what you make of it, so long as you release your prisoner immediately.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And you've received these instructions directly from Cersei?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: As I said several times.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And you've waited this long to deliver the information?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: When the Queen Regent gives me a command, I carry it out without delay.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Cersei must have great trust in you, allowing you into her chamber during the hour of the wolf.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: The Queen Regent has a great many responsibilities. She often works from dusk till dawn.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She must be very glad to have you helping her from dusk till dawn.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ah. Lavender oil. She always loved lavender oil, even as a girl.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I am a knight!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: An anointed knight, yes. Tell me, did Cersei have you knighted before or after she took you into her bed? What? Nothing to say? No more warnings for me, ser?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: You will withdraw these filthy accusations.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Have you ever given any thought to what King Joffrey will have to say when he finds out you've been bedding his mother?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: It's not my fault!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did she take you against your will? Can you not defend yourself, knight?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Your own father, Lord Tywin, when I was named the King's squire, he told me to obey her in everything.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did he tell you to fuck her, too?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I only meant I did as I was bid.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Hated every moment of it, is that what you'll have me believe? A high place in court, a knighthood, my sister's legs spreading open for you at night. Oh, yes, it must have been terrible. Wait here. His Grace will want to hear this.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Mercy! Mercy, my lord! I beg you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Save it for Joffrey. He loves a good grovel.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: My lord, it was your sister's bidding, the Queen. I'll leave the city at once, I swear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, I think not.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: My lord?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You heard me. My father told you to obey my sister. Obey her. Stay close to her side. Keep her trust. Pleasure her whenever she requires. No one ever need know, as long as you keep faith with me. I want to know what Cersei is doing, where she goes, who she sees, what they talk of, everything. And you will tell me.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'cersei'}, set()]

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Yes, my lord, I will. I swear it, as you command.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, rise, rise. Let us drink to our understanding. Oh, you don't have a cup. Oh, well. Smile, cousin. My sister is a beautiful woman, and it's all for the good of the realm. Go back and tell her that I beg her forgiveness, that I want no more conflict between us and that, henceforth, I shall do nothing without her consent.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: lancel
Subtitles: But her demands?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, I'll give her Pycelle.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: You will?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, I'll release him in the morning. Cersei can keep him as a pet, if she wants, but I will not have him on the Council. I could swear that I had not harmed a single hair on his head, but that would not, strictly speaking, be true. Stay within one table length.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Do your knuckle bones bring you luck?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Well, life's been good since you hacked them off, Your Grace. And it's four less fingernails to clean.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Fewer.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Pardon?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Four fewer fingernails to clean. Never understood why you had to wear them.

Name: davos
Subtitles: It reminds me of where I come from and where I am now. It reminds me of your justice. It was an honest punishment and you were good with the cleaver.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You were a hero and a smuggler. A good act does not wash out the bad, nor a bad the good.

Name: davos
Subtitles: A lesson I've tried to teach my son.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Does he listen?

Name: davos
Subtitles: To me? Gods, no. But if your Red Woman told him to leap from the crow's nest

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: She has a name. I trust you've not forgotten your smuggler's tricks.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I've lived within the law for seventeen-

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I want you to be a smuggler this time.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Any shore, any night. What am I bringing ashore?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: The Red Woman. No one must know what you do and we'll not speak of this again.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I am true to Your Grace and always will be, but surely there are other ways, cleaner ways.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Cleaner ways don't win wars.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Are you afraid, Onion Knight?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Someone once told me the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You've carried more unpleasant cargo in your time. Are you a good man, Ser Davos Seaworth?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'd say my parts are mixed, my lady, good and bad.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: If half an onion is black with rot, it's a rotten onion. A man is good or he is evil.

Name: davos
Subtitles: And which are you?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Oh, good. I'm a knight myself, of sorts, a champion of light and life.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Well, that must be very nice for you.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Do you love your wife?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I do.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Yet you have known other women.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Don't talk about my wife.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I'm not. I'm talking about other women. Like me, Ser Davos. You want me. You want to see what's beneath this robe.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: And you will.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Strange that this Lord of Light asks you to work in the shadows.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Shadows cannot live in the dark, Ser Davos. They are servants of light, the children of fire. And the brighter the flame, the darker they are.

Name: davos
Subtitles: These weren't here before. They've barred the passage.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: They can't bar our passage.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Gods protect us.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: There's only one god, Ser Davos, and he only protects those who serve him.

Name: renly
Subtitles: You swear it?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: By the mother. My son has no interest in the Iron Throne.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Then I see no reason for hostility between us. Your son can go on calling himself King in the North. The Starks will have dominion over all lands north of Moat Cailin, provided he swears me an oath of fealty.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And the wording of this oath?

Name: renly
Subtitles: The same Ned Stark swore to Robert eighteen years ago. Cat, their friendship held the kingdoms together.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And in return for my son's loyalty?

Name: renly
Subtitles: In the morning, I'll destroy my brother's army.

Name: renly
Subtitles: When that's done, Baratheon and Stark will fight their common enemy together, as they have done many times before.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Our two houses have always been close, which is why I am begging you to reconsider this battle. Negotiate a peace with your brother.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Negotiate with Stannis? You heard him out there. I'd have better luck debating the wind.

Name: renly
Subtitles: Please bring my terms to your son. I believe we are natural allies. I hope he feels the same. Together we could end this war in a fortnight.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: No! No.

Name: soldier
Subtitles: Follow me!

Name: soldier
Subtitles: You'll die for this.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: No, wait, it wasn't her!

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: We've got to leave. They'll hang you for this.

Name: man
Subtitles: Inside the king's tent - go

Name: man
Subtitles: Now.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I won't leave him.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You can't avenge him if you're dead.

Name: man
Subtitles: Over there, go!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Not that way.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: We need to go home. Loras.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: My lord, my lady.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Get out.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Stannis will be here in an hour. When he arrives, Renly's bannermen will flock to him. Your former companions will fight for the privilege of selling you to their new king.

Name: loras
Subtitles: And you want that privilege for yourself.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You will note that I am standing here talking to you, not Stannis.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: There's no time for this.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Ride back to Highgarden, sister. I'm not running from Stannis.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Brienne of Tarth murdered Renly.

Name: loras
Subtitles: I don't believe that. You don't believe that. Who gained the most from our king's death?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Stannis.

Name: loras
Subtitles: I will put a sword through his righteous face.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You can't stay here.

Name: loras
Subtitles: He would have been a true king, a good king.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Tell me, Ser Loras, what do you desire most in this world?

Name: loras
Subtitles: Revenge.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I have always found that to be the purest of motivations, but you won't have a chance to put your sword through Stannis, not today. You'll be cut to pieces before he sets foot on solid ground. If it is justice that you want, be smart about it.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You can't avenge him from the grave. Bring the horses. Please.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He was very handsome.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He was, Your Grace.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace." Calling yourself king doesn't make you one. And if Renly wasn't a king, I wasn't a queen.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Do you want to be a queen?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No. I want to be the queen.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Killed? By whom?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Accounts differ. Most seem to implicate Catelyn Stark in some way.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Really? Who'd have thought?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Some say it was one of his own Kingsguard, while still others say it was Stannis himself who did it after negotiations went sour.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Whomever did it, I say well done.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's not what Varys says. He says Renly's army is flocking to support Stannis, which would give Stannis superiority over us on both land and sea.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Littlefinger says we can outspend him three to one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And I say Father raised you to have too much respect for money. Stannis Baratheon is coming for us, sooner rather than later.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Aren't there other things you should be doing, like sealing my daughter in a crate so you can ship her away?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She'll be safer in Dorne.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes, I know how concerned you are for her safety.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It so happens that I am. Myrcella is a sweet, innocent girl and I don't blame her at all for you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: So clever. Aren't you always so clever with your schemes and your plots?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Schemes and plots are the same thing. They are going to attack us. We need to be ready.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No need to concern yourself over it. The king is taking personal charge of siege preparations.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: May I ask specifically what the king has in mind?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You may, specifically, or you may ask vaguely. The answer will be the same.

Name: tyrion lannister
