Subtitles: It's important that we talk about this.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's the king's royal prerogative to withhold sensitive information from his councilors.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: It's wildfire.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Wildfire? You wouldn't lie to me, would you, cousin?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: MThat's a lie right there.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: It is not a lie. Why would I lie?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Tell me, if the vile allegations against my brother and sister are true, do you think it will make Jaime more likely to kill you or less likely? When I tell him you're fucking her, I mean.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I'm telling you the truth.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The smart money would be on more likely.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: She's making wildfire.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But then perhaps his own unnatural urges will give him sympathy for yours.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: The Alchemists' Guild is being commissioned.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I suppose there's only one way to find out.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: They have thousands of pots already stored in their vaults. They are planning to launch it from the city walls into Stannis' ships and armies. Please.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: When did she tell you this?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I heard her talking with the pyromancer. And the other night, after I left her, she went to meet him. I swear to you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Swear to me on what?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: On my life.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But I don't care about your life.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: In the light of the Seven, by all that is holy and right, I, Lancel Lannister, do solemnly vow...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All right, all right. Enough. Even torturing you is boring. Just get out.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, Lancel, tell my friend Bronn to please kill you if anything should happen to me.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Please kill me if anything should happen to Lord Tyrion.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: It will be my pleasure.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'm sorry about your brother, Your Grace, I wanted to let you know that people grieve for him.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Fools love a fool. I grieve for him as well, for the boy he was, not the man he grew to be.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I need to speak to you - about what I saw in that cave.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I thought I made it clear to you there'd be no need to speak to me on this matter.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, I-

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I've never known you to need to hear a thing twice.

Name: davos
Subtitles: And I've never known you to hide from the truth.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You've come to lecture me on truth?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I've come to tell you that what I saw.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: All my brother's bannermen have come to my side. Except the Tyrells, who fled like cowards. They won't be able to resist us now. Soon I shall be sitting on the Iron Throne.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Nothing is worth what this will cost you, not even the Iron

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'll hear no more about it.

Name: man
Subtitles: Take a company of men, secure the perimeter.

Name: davos
Subtitles: When do we sail for King's Landing?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: As soon as I've consolidated my troops. We'll make short work of the Lannisters' fleet. Once Blackwater Bay is cleared, we'll deliver our troops to their doorstep and take the city.

Name: davos
Subtitles: And will you bring Lady Melisandre with you?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: That's not your concern.

Name: davos
Subtitles: If you take King's Landing with her by your side, the victory will be hers.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I never thought I'd have reason to doubt your loyalty. Was I wrong?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Loyal service means telling hard truths.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Oh, truth again. All right, what's the truth? The hard truth?

Name: davos
Subtitles: She's a foreigner preaching her foreign religion. Some believe she whispers orders in your ear and you obey.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: What do you believe?

Name: davos
Subtitles: You won those bannermen from Renly. Don't lose them to her.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: We set out for King's Landing without Lady Melisandre. And you lead the fleet into Blackwater Bay.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, I'm honored, but my time on the sea was spent evading ships, not attacking them. The other lords won't be happy.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Most of those lords should consider themselves lucky I don't hang them for treason. Hard truths cut both ways, Ser Davos.

Name: girl
Subtitles: I've got it! I've got it!

Name: man
Subtitles: So it's that one there at the top, on the right.

Name: man
Subtitles: Buy my fruit, my lord. Fresh fruit.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Stannis has more infantry, more ships, more horses. What do we have?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: There's that mind of yours you keep going on about.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, I've never actually been able to kill people with it.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Good thing. I'd be out of a job. What about your father?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He hasn't sent a raven in weeks. He's very busy. Being repeatedly humiliated by Robb Stark is time-consuming. We won't be able to hold the city against Stannis, not the way Joffrey's planning on holding it.

Name: protester
Subtitles: Corruption.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Yes!

Name: protester
Subtitles: We are swollen, bloated, foul. Brother fornicates with sister in the bed of kings and we're surprised when the fruit of their incest is rotten? Yes, a rotten king.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's hard to argue with his assessment.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Not after what he did to your birthday present.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The king is a lost cause. It's the rest of us I'm worried about now.

Name: man
Subtitles: A dancing king, prancing down his bloodstained halls to the tune of a twisted demon monkey.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You have to admire his imagination.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: He's talking about you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What? Demon monkey?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: People think you're pulling the king's strings. They blame you for the city's ills.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Blame me? I'm trying to save them.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You don't need to convince me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Demon monkey.

Name: man
Subtitles: Yeah, come on.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You're the crew of the Sea Bitch? I'm your commander. Welcome.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Stop. Stop! Your captain commands you to stop!

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: Where are we headed, Captain?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The Stony Shore, to raid their villages. There'll be spoils in it for you, and women, if you do your jobs well.

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: And who decides if we've done our jobs well?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I do. Your captain.

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: I have been reaving and raping since before you left Balon's balls, Captain. Don't reckon I've got much use for your ideas on how to do it. Don't reckon I've got much use for a captain at all. I'm thinking I can do the job of captain real well myself. All I need is a ship. You wouldn't know where I could find myself a ship now, would you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You could do that, take the ship, head out on your own. And I will hunt you down, drag you back here in chains and hang you for a traitor.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Stop. We yield.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Congratulations on your first command.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Thank you. Kind of you to come see me off.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Oh, I'm not here for you. I was just on my way to Red Harbor. I've got thirty ships. There's nowhere to put them here. Too narrow.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You'd better get out there. Wouldn't want her to set sail without you.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: That would never happen. My crew would wait on deck for a year if I asked them to. This lot, though... Enjoy the Stony Shore.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: Come on, I'll take you out.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: Dagmer, your first mate.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Why aren't you with the rest of them? Or did they send you to row me out and dump me halfway in the sea? That would be good for a laugh.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: They're not gonna respect you until you prove yourself.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: And how am I supposed to prove myself by pillaging piss-poor fishing villages?

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: You're not.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: And yet that's the task my father has given me to prove that I'm a true Iron Islander.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: They're all Iron Islanders. Do they do as they're told or do they do as they like?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The Stony Shore's not far from Torrhen's Square.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: The seat of the House of Tallhart, a more impressive prize than a few fishermen's daughters. What, you don't think we could take it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No, we could. We could never hold it for more than a few days. As soon as Winterfell got word that we'd taken Torrhen's Square, the Starks would send their men to take it back. And then-

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Take me to my ship.

Name: reginald
Subtitles: The Starks have overextended their lines. Now that summer's over, they'll have a hard time keeping their men and horses fed.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The Starks understand winter better than we ever will. The cold won't beat them.

Name: amory
Subtitles: Our spies report growing discontent among the Northern lords. They want to return home and gather the harvest before the crops turn.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And I'm sure if those same spies snuck into our own encampments, they would report growing discontent amongst the Southern lords. This is war, no one's content. We've underestimated the Stark boy for too long. He has a good mind for warfare, his men worship him. And as long as he keeps winning battles, they'll keep believing he is King in the North. You've been waiting for him to fail. He is not going to fail, not without our help. So how do we stop him?
ners: [set(), set(), {'stark'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: reginald
Subtitles: We've worked through the night, my lord. Perhaps we'd profit from some sleep.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes, I think you would, Reginald. And because you're my cousin, I might even let you wake from that sleep. Go, I'm sure your wife must miss you.

Name: reginald
Subtitles: My wife's in Lannisport.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Well, then you'd better start riding. Go, before I change my mind and send her your head.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: If your name wasn't Lannister, you'd be scrubbing out pots in the cook's tent. Go!

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Not wine, water. We'll be here for some time. Girl, where are you from?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Maidenpool, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And who are the Lords of Maidenpool? Remind me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: House Mooton, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And what is their sigil?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: A red salmon. I think a Maidenpool girl would remember that. You're a Northerner, aren't you?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Good. One more time, where are you from?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Barrowton, my lord. House Dustin. Two crossed longaxes beneath a black crown.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And what do they say of Robb Stark in the North?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: They call him the Young Wolf.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: They say he rides into battle on the back of a giant direwolf. They say he can turn into a wolf himself when he wants. They say he can't be killed.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And do you believe them?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No, my lord. Anyone can be killed.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Fetch that water.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A girl says nothing.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A girl keeps her mouth closed. No one hears, and friends may talk in secret, yes? A boy becomes a girl.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I was always a girl.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: And I was always aware. But the girl keeps secrets. It is not for a man to spoil them.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're one of them now. I should have let you burn.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: And you fetch water for one of them now. Why is this right for you and wrong for me?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I didn't have a choice.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: You did. I did. And here we are.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A man pays his debts. A man owes three.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Three what?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: The Red God takes what is his, lovely girl. And only death may pay for life. You saved me and the two I was with. You stole three deaths from the Red God. We have to give them back. Speak three names and the man will do the rest. Three lives I will give you, no more, no less, and we're done.
ners: [{'the'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I can name anyone and you'll kill him?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A man has said.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The one who tortures everyone.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A man needs a name.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't know his name. They call him the Tickler.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: That is enough. Go now, girl. Your master is thirsty.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: He's not here yet. He'd have seen us, blown the horn.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: When will he come?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: The Halfhand does things in his own time.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My uncle told me stories about him.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Most of them are true.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I heard the Halfhand spent half of last winter beyond the Wall.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: The whole winter. He was north of the Skirling Pass when the snows came. Had to wait for the thaw.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: So it is possible for someone to survive out here on their own.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Well, possible for the Halfhand.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Beautiful, isn't it? Gilly would love it here.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: There's nothing more sickening than a man in love.

Name: man
Subtitles: About time you did something. At least you'll keep warm.

Name: sam
Subtitles: The Fist of the First Men. Think of how old this place is. Before the Targaryens defeated the Andals, before the Andals took Westeros from the First Men.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Before I die, please, stop talking.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Thousands and thousands of years ago, the First Men stood here where we're standing all through the long night. What do you think they were like, the First Men?

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Stupid. Smart people don't find themselves in places like this.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I think they were afraid. I think they came here to get away from something. And I don't think it worked.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Wildlings?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: One blast is for rangers returning. Wildlings is two blasts.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: So you got to stand there waiting, wondering. One blast for friends, two for foes.

Name: sam
Subtitles: And three for White Walkers. It's been a thousand years, but that's the only time they blow the horn three times.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: But if it's been a thousand years, how do you know?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Well I read it in a book.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: I read it in a book.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Look. It's Qhorin Halfhand.

Name: dolorous
Subtitles: EDD Aye, we'll live another day. Hurrah.

Name: haylene
Subtitles: Take care, my lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I remember reading an old sailors' proverb, "Piss on wildfire and your cock burns off. "

Name: haylene
Subtitles: Oh, I have not conducted this experiment. It could well be true. The substance burns so hot, it melts wood, stone, even steel, and, of course, flesh. The substance burns so hot, it melts flesh like tallow.

Name: haylene
Subtitles: After the dragons died, wildfire was the key to the Targaryen power.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My companion takes issue.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: If I could tell you how many crazy old men I've seen pushing carts around army camps making grand claims about jars full of pig shit. No offense meant.

Name: haylene
Subtitles: Our order does not deal in pig shit. The substance is fire given form. And we have been perfecting it since the days of Maegor.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: To do what?

Name: haylene
Subtitles: The jars are put in catapults and flung at the enemy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How much do you have?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: If you could get real soldiers to man the catapults, then maybe you'd hit your target one time in ten, but all the real soldiers are in the Riverlands with your father.

Name: haylene
Subtitles: My lord, this man is insulting.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I don't know if you've ever seen a battle, old man, but things can get a bit messy. 'Cause when we're flinging things at Stannis, he's flinging them right back at us. Men die, men shit themselves, men run, which means pots falling, which means fire inside the walls, which means the poor cunts trying to defend the city end up burning it down.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My friend remains unconvinced.

Name: haylene
Subtitles: He would not dare insult my order whilst Aerys Targaryen lived.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Well, he's not living anymore. And all his pots of wildfire didn't help him, did they? Men win wars, not magic tricks.

Name: haylene
Subtitles: We have been working tirelessly, day and night, ever since your royal sister commanded us to do so. Our present count stands at 7,811. Enough to burn Stannis Baratheon's fleet and armies both.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: This is a shit idea.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm afraid I have to concur with my advisor, Wisdom Haylene. The contents of this room could lay King's Landing low. You won't be making wildfire for my sister any longer. You'll be making it for me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dracarys. Dracarys.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He'll be able to feed himself from now on.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Let him sleep, Doreah.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Yes, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He loves you.

Name: irri
Subtitles: I rewove this part of the top. And I fixed the heel on this one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you, my friend.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Did you see the dress Xaro had made for you? They say he's the wealthiest man in Qarth.

Name: irri
Subtitles: It is known.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: And if Qarth is the wealthiest city in Essos-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The last time a rich man gave me a dress, he was selling me to Khal Drogo.

Name: irri
Subtitles: May he ride forever through the night lands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Xaro is our host, but we know nothing about him. Men like to talk about other men when they're happy.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: You would look like a real princess in Xaro's-

Name: irri
Subtitles: She's not a princess. She's a Khaleesi. You should wear it, Khaleesi.

Name: irri
Subtitles: You are their guest. It would be rude not to.

Name: woman
Subtitles: And you must visit the night market. The Qartheen night market is like no night market you've ever seen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It sounds wonderful.

Name: woman
Subtitles: The Meereenis think they have a night market. I will take you there myself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Please excuse me for a moment.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What are they doing?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Malakko says the statue is too heavy to carry. Kovarro says that Malakko is an idiot. They can pry out the gems, the rest is pure gold. Very soft. He can chop off as much as we can carry.

Name: kovarro
Subtitles: Or melt it. Very simple.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We are his guests! You can't pry it or chop it or melt it.

Name: kovarro
Subtitles: Of course not, Khaleesi! We will wait until we leave.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not even when we leave.

Name: kovarro
Subtitles: Why not?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Our host saved us from the Red Waste and you want to steal from him? I will hear no more.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My brother used to say the only thing the Dothraki knew how to do was steal things better men have built.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It's not the only thing. They're quite good at killing the better men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That's not the kind of queen I'm going to be.

Name: pyatt pree
Subtitles: Mother of Dragons. On behalf of the warlocks of Qarth, I welcome you. A demonstration?

Name: pyatt pree
Subtitles: Take this gem. Look at it. Into its depths. So many facets. Look closely enough and you can see yourself in them. Often more than once.

Name: pyatt pree
Subtitles: Should you grow tired of Xaro's baubles and trinkets, it would be an honor to host you at the House of the Undying. You are always welcome, Mother of Dragons.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: My apologies. Pyatt Pree is one of the Thirteen. It was customary for me to extend him an invitation. Customs die slow deaths in Qarth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What is the House of the Undying?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: It is where the warlocks go to squint at dusty books and drink shade of the evening. It turns their lips blue and their minds soft. So soft, they actually believe their parlor tricks are magic.

Name: quaithe
Subtitles: You watch over her.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Do I know you?

Name: quaithe
Subtitles: I know you. Jorah Mormont of Bear Island.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: quaithe
Subtitles: I'm no one. But she is the Mother of Dragons. She needs true protectors, now more than ever. They shall come day and night to see the wonder born into the world again. And when they see, they shall lust, for dragons are fire made flesh. And fire is power.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: It looked like Stannis.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: To me it just looked like... A shadow in the shape of a man.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: In the shape of Stannis.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: We should reach my son's camp tomorrow.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Will you stay there long, my lady?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Only long enough to tell Robb what I have seen. After that, I will leave for Winterfell. My two youngest need me. I've been away from them for far too long.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I never knew my mother.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I'm sorry.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: My own mother died on the birthing bed when I was very young.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: It's a bloody business.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: What comes after is even harder.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Once you're safely back amongst your own people, will you give me leave to go, my lady?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You mean to kill Stannis.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I swore a vow.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: But Stannis has a great army around him. His own guards are sworn to keep him safe.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I'm as good as any of them. I should never have fled.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Renly's death was no fault of yours. You served him bravely.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I only held him that once as he was dying.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: He's gone, Brienne. You serve nothing and no one by following him into the earth. Renly's enemies are Robb's enemies as well.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I do not know your son, my lady. But I could serve you, if you would have me. You have courage. Not battle courage, perhaps, but, I don't know, a woman's kind of courage. And I think that when the time comes, you will not hold me back. Promise me that you will not hold me back from Stannis.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: When the time comes, I will not hold you back.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Then I am yours, my lady. I will shield your back and give my life for yours, if it comes to that. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I vow that you shall always have a place in my home and at my table and that I shall ask no service of you that might bring you dishonor. I swear it by the Old Gods and the new.

Name: winterfell shepherd
Subtitles: And it's not just thieves, my lord. There's wolves in them hills now, more than I ever seen. They come down in the night and they kill my sheep. My three sons is away fighting for your brother, my lord. They'll fight, keep fighting till they're told to go home. I have no one to man my flock now. Only me. I can't keep watch all day and all night.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We can send two orphan boys from Winterstown home with you to help watch over your flock if you can give them room and board.

Name: winterfell shepherd
Subtitles: My wife always prayed for more children. We'll look after them. Thank you, my lord. And may the gods bless you and yours.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Stop it. If that's everyone, I'm going to go for a ride before dark.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Good.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Bran! Lord Stark. Torrhen's Square is under siege.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Torrhen's Square is barely forty leagues from here. How can the Lannisters strike so far north?

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Might be a raiding party led by the Mountain. Might be sellswords paid by Tywin Lannister.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We have to help them.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Most of the fighting men are away with Robb, but I can gather two hundred decent men.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Do you need so many?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: If we can't protect our own bannermen, why should they protect us? Go, Ser Rodrik. Take the men you need.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Won't take long, my lord. Southerners don't do well up here.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: So, what does it mean?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Ask your Maester Luwin. He's the one studying books all the time.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I did ask him. He'd never heard of a three-eyed raven.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Must not mean anything, then.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You're lying.

Name: osha
Subtitles: You might be a little lord, but don't you call me a liar.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You know what it means.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I never said I didn't.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You didn't give me an honest answer.

Name: osha
Subtitles: That's not the same as being a liar.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Well, it's not far off.

Name: osha
Subtitles: So, you've been dreaming of a three-eyed raven again? In the godswood, you told me you didn't dream. Now who's a liar? What did you see in your dream?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Something bad? Tell me, boy.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I dreamt that the sea came to Winterfell. I saw waves crashing against the gates and the water came flowing over the walls. It flooded the castle. Drowned men were floating here, in the yard. Ser Rodrik was one of them.

Name: osha
Subtitles: The sea is hundreds of miles away.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I know. It's just a stupid dream.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I've got to get these potatoes to the kitchen. Otherwise they'll put me in chains again.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Osha. The three-eyed raven, what do they say about it north of the Wall?

Name: osha
Subtitles: They say all sorts of crazy things north of the Wall.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: There.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Where?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: On that mountain.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I don't see very well.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: A fire.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: There's a fire. The people sitting around it have better eyes than yours or mine. When they see us coming, that fire becomes a signal. Gives Mance Rayder plenty of time to throw a party in our honor.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: How many wildlings have joined him?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: From what we can tell, all of them. Mance has gathered them all like deer against the wolves. They're almost ready to make their move.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Where?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Somewhere safe. Somewhere south. Can't just march into their midst. And we can't wait for them here with nothing but a pile of stones to protect us.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: You saying we should fall back to the Wall?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Mance was one of us once. Now he's one of them. He's going to teach them our way of doing things. They'll hit us in force and they won't run away when we hit back. They're gonna be more organized than before, more disciplined, more like us. So we need to be more like them, do things their way. Sneak in, kill Mance, and scatter them to the winds before they can march on the Wall. And to do that
ners: [{'mance'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'mance'}, set()]

Name: jeor
Subtitles: We need to get rid of those lookouts.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: It's not a job for 400 men. I need to move fast and silent. Harker, Stonesnake, Borba.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Commander, I'd like to join Lord Qhorin.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: I've been called lots of things, but that might be my first Lord Qhorin. You're a steward, Snow, not a ranger.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I've fought and killed a wight. How many rangers can say that?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: He's the one?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Aye. You killed a wight. You also let an old man beat you bloody and take your sword.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Craster? In the boy's defense, that's a tough old goat.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I could take up Jon's duties while he's gone, my lord. It would be no trouble.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Well, I hope you make a better ranger than you do a steward. Go on.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: So, tell me, how long has your manservant been in love with you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He's not my manservant and he's not in love with me. He's my advisor and he's my friend.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Unlikely. I can almost always tell what a man wants.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what about what a woman wants?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Much more complicated. You, for example, what do you want?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: To cross the Narrow Sea and take back the Iron Throne.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Why?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Because I promised my khalasar I'd protect them and find them a safe home.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: You want to conquer the Seven Kingdoms for the Dothraki?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I want them because they're mine by right. The Iron Throne is mine and I will take it.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Ah, a conqueror.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And how did you get all of this? Did someone give it to you?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: No. I come from nothing. I hit the docks like a piece of cargo, except someone normally cares what happens to cargo.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So you wanted more than you had and you took it. You're a conqueror, too. You're just less ambitious.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What do you want, Xaro Xhoan Daxos? At the gates of the city, you bled for me. Why?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I will show you why.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: The door and the vault is made of Valyrian stone. The hardest steel does not make a mark. I offered the greatest locksmiths in Qarth their weight in gold if they could break into it. I made the same offer to the greatest thieves. They all went home empty-handed. The only thing that can open this door is this key.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And behind the door?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And it can all be mine?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: All? Let us say half. More than enough to buy horses, ships, armies. Enough to go home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: All I have to do?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Is marry me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That was a romantic proposal.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I've already married once for love, but the gods stole her from me. I come from nothing. My mother and father never owned a pair of shoes. But marry me, and I will give you the Seven Kingdoms and our children will be princes and princesses.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: See? I have more ambition than you thought. The time is right, Daenerys Targaryen, First of Your Name. Robert Baratheon is dead.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: If you cross the sea with an army you bought and a foreign husband who paid for it...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Seven Kingdoms are at war with one another. Four false kings destroying the country.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: To win Westeros, you need support from Westeros.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The usurper is dead.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Starks fight the Lannisters, and Baratheons fight each other.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: According to your new friend who earned your trust by cutting his hand?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The time to strike is now. We need to find ships and an army or we'll spend the rest of our lives rotting away at the edge of the world.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Rich men do not become rich by giving more than they get. They'll give you ships and soldiers and they'll own you forever. Moving carefully is the hard way, but it's the right way.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And if I'd listened to that advice outside the gates of Qarth, we'd all be dead by now.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I know the opportunity before you seems like the last you'll ever have, but you musT-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do not speak to me like I'm a child.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I only want-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What do you want? Tell me.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: To see you on the Iron Throne.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You have a good claim. A title. A birthright. But you have something more than that. You may cover it up and deny it, but you have a gentle heart. You would not only be respected and feared, you would be loved. Someone who can rule and should rule. Centuries come and go without a person like that coming into the world. There are times when I look at you and I still can't believe you're real.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So what would you have me do, as my advisor?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Make your own way. Find your own ship. You only need one. The allies we need are in Westeros, not Qarth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And how do I get the ship?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I'll find it for you. A sound ship with a good captain.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I look forward to meeting him.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Khaleesi.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You should stand sideface.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Sideface?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Sideways.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Why?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Smaller target.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Am I fighting someone?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're practicing for a fight. You should practice right.

Name: gold cloak
Subtitles: Guards! Did you see anything? Go up there. Go and see where he fell from.

Name: gold cloak
Subtitles: Go up the battlement.

Name: woman
Subtitles: That is strange.

Name: gold cloak
Subtitles: Move away. Stand back. He's dead.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I've taken your castle.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Theon?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: It's Prince Theon now. Get up. You have to get dressed. I've taken Winterfell. I took it. I'm occupying it. I sent men over the walls with grappling claws and ropes.
ners: [{'theon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: To take the castle.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You went with Robb.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: And he sent me back to Pyke. I'm a Greyjoy. I can't fight for Robb and my father both. Where's Hodor?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't know.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Find the halfwit.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My men are bringing your people together in the courtyard.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: So you and I can go down and tell them - how you've yielded Winterfell to me.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I won't.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes, you will.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I won't. I'll never yield. We'll fight you and throw you out.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The castle is mine. But these people are still yours. You'll yield to keep them safe, to keep them alive. That's what a good lord would do. Think carefully about what you want to say.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Theon. Did you hate us the whole time?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I've yielded Winterfell to Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Louder. Say Prince Theon.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I've yielded Winterfell to Prince Theon. You all know me.

Name: farlen
Subtitles: Aye, we know you for a steaming sack of shit.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Farlen, you be silent.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Listen to your little lord, Farlen. He has more sense than you do.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: All of you should do as he commands.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My father has donned the ancient crown of Salt and Rock and declared himself King of the Iron Islands. He claims the North as well by right of conquest. You are all his subjects.

Name: farlen
Subtitles: Bugger that. I serve the Starks. If you think you can hold the North with it-

Name: ironborn
Subtitles: Shut up!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: If you serve me as loyally as you served Ned Stark, I will be as good to you as he ever was. Betray me, and you will wish you hadn't. Maester Luwin, send a raven to Pyke informing my father of my victory here. And one to Deepwood Motte to my sister. Inform her that she's to bring You are a maester of the Citadel, sworn to serve the Lord of Winterfell, are you not?

Name: luwin
Subtitles: I am.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I am the Lord of Winterfell as Bran just informed you. Send the ravens.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: osha
Subtitles: My Lord Greyjoy.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I see you've finally learned how to address your betters. What do you want? I was brought here a captive.

Name: osha
Subtitles: You were here the day I was taken.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm the one who took you. What of it?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Let me serve you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Serve me how? I need fighters, not kitchen sluts.

Name: osha
Subtitles: It was Robb Stark who put me in the kitchens. Put a spear in my hand again.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: So you can bury it in my neck? Do you take me for a fool? Get up.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Step aside.

Name: osha
Subtitles: It's your dream, little lord. The ocean has come to swallow this place. I ain't letting it drown me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You'll all go about your tasks as usual. And in a few days' time-

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: Greyjoy!

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: We caught this one on his way back from Torrhen's Square. Took out two of ours before I got his sword.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Ser Rodrik, it grieves me that we meet as foes.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: It grieves me you've less honor than a back alley whore. You were raised here under this roof. These people are your people.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: They are not my people.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: King Robb thought of you as a brother.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My brothers are dead. They died fighting Stark men, men like you.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Aye, they died fighting a war your father started. Lord Stark raised you among his own sons.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Among them, but not one of them. I was his hostage, taken from my home.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: If he were alive to see this

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He's not. He's dead. The Seven Kingdoms are at war. And Winterfell is mine.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: I should have put a sword in your belly instead of in your hand.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You've served this house faithfully, old man. But keep talking and I'll-

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Take him to the cells. Lock him up

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: My prince. You cannot let that stand. He must pay.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'll lock him in a cell until he rots.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: No, he has to pay the iron price. They'll never respect you while he lives.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Ser Rodrik, I sentence you to death!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No! You said no harm would come to them if I yielded.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The old man couldn't keep his mouth shut.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: I urge you not to make a hasty decision.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He disrespected me in front of my men. That was his decision, not mine.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: He is worth more to you alive than dead. The Starks will pay. Please, Theon, think what you do.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You'll address me as Prince Theon or you'll be next.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: Come.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No! No! Theon! Please. Ser Rodrik!

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: He who passes the sentence should swing the sword.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm begging you.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Coward.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Stop. Stop! Stop right now!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You don't give commands anymore, little lord.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Please, stop this. Please stop him.

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Hush now, child. I'm off to see your father.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You said no harm would come! You said no harm would come. Theon, please.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Any last words, old man?

Name: rodrik
Subtitles: Gods help you, Theon Greyjoy. Now you are truly lost.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Theon, please don't.

Name: rickon
Subtitles: Do something!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'll do anything, please! No, please stop it!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ghost, stay with us. Ghost!

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: There goes your pet.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's not a pet.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: No, you're right, he's not. You can't tame a wild thing. You can't trust a wild thing.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ghost is different.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: So you think. Wild creatures have their own rules, their own reasons. And you'll never know them. Now the wildlings we're looking for sleep during the day and hunt at night.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I thought you said you couldn't know wild things.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: I said you can't. They find a nice cave to hide in while the sun's up and do their killing when it's dark.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We could do the same.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: No, we couldn't. This is their country. They know where to walk, where not to walk. I've lost good men who fell into a crevasse they didn't see till they were in it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My father always said I'm of the North.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wasn't joking.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Look around, boy. This look like home to you? You start thinking you know this place, it will kill you. You understand me?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: No, you don't. We're at war. We've always been at war. It's never going to end 'cause we're not fighting an enemy. We're fighting the North, and it's not going anywhere. The Watch has given you a great gift. You only have one thing to give in return, your life.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'll gladly give my life.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: I don't want you to be glad about it. I want you to curse and fight until your heart's done pumping. And know this, boy. Your death will be a gift for them south of the Wall. They'll never know what you've done. They'll never know how you died. They won't even know your damn name. But they'll be alive because some nameless bastard north of the Wall gave his life for theirs. Now, do you understand me?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I do.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: You're even dumber than you look. It's just words, boy, to keep us a little warmer in the night. Make us feel like we've got a purpose. Come on. We've got to find these goat fuckers before night falls and they find us.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Can you read?

Name: amory
Subtitles: My lord?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: This letter detailing our infantry movements was meant for Lord Damon of House Marbrand. It was sent to Lord Marlyn of House Dormand.

Name: amory
Subtitles: My apologies, my lord. I must have-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Girl, fetch me the History of the Greater and the Lesser Houses. It's the one on this-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: My cupbearer can read better than you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: To whom does House Dormand owe allegiance?

Name: armory
Subtitles: My lord, I-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: To the Starks of Winterfell! Who have twenty thousand men and my son! I judged you might be good for something more than brutalizing peasants. I see I overestimated you. If you ever put my son's life at risk again, I'll Leave us.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Put the book away, girl. Maybe you should devise our next battle plan while you're about it.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Lord Petyr Baelish.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mmm. Give us the room.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Clear all this.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lord Tywin.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Baelish.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Wine?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What news from the capital?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I traveled here directly from Renly Baratheon's camp.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Ah, the late King Renly. Rather a short reign. Murdered by a woman, I hear.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: So they say. There has been talk of other forces at work. Dark forces.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Here. Men love to blame demons when their grand plans unravel.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It is my belief that a moment of chaos affords opportunities lost soon after.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You say that as if you were the first man alive to think it. Yes, a crisis is an opportunity. What other brilliant insights have you brought me today?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: After the Lannisters and the Starks, the Tyrells command the largest host. Their lands are the most fertile in the Seven Kingdoms, feeding horses and soldiers.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes, yes, yes.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The Tyrells have not yet declared for any of the surviving kings. Loras wants revenge. He blames Stannis for Renly's death. And Margaery-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Wants to be queen.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Yes, she does.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: House Tyrell rebelled against the Iron Throne. Against my grandson.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: They did. And perhaps that treason should be punished one day, after Stannis and Robb Stark are defeated.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: More wine for Lord Baelish.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: If you will allow me to represent your family's interests, I believe that an advantageous agreement TYWIN

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: They have.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Pardon, my lord.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It's only wine.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You would ride there yourself?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Tonight, with your leave.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I'll have an answer by nightfall. That'll be all, girl.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And what else?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: On your son Tyrion's directive, I met with Catelyn Stark.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Why?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He had an interesting proposal for her concerning her daughters.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Hmm.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: A girl.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: A wildling.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We could question her.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: You could. She won't answer. I've known a wildling to bite off his tongue instead of talking.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What's your name?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Ygritte.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: She was reaching for this ax when you got to her. Give her half a chance, she'll bury it in your face.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I gave you my name.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm Jon Snow.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You ought to burn them you killed.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: We'd need a big fire for that. Tell me, Ygritte. Why do you want us to build a big fire? Are there some more friends in the area?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Burn them or maybe you'll need those swords again.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Our boy here's already killed one dead man. He can do it again if he has to. What waits beyond the pass?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: The Free Folk.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: How many?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Hundreds and thousands. More than you've ever seen, crow.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Why come to the mountains? What's in the Frostfangs your king could want?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Do you mean to march on the Wall?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Do you know who I am, girl?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Qhorin Halfhand.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Tell me true. If your people captured me, would they take me prisoner?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: They'd take your head off your shoulders if they was feeling kind. If not, they'd kill you slow.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: We have no food for her. Can't spare a man to watch her. Can't let her go. She'll bring Mance Rayder's army down on us. It needs to be done. Want me to do it?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. No, I'll do it.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Come, brothers. We'll leave him to it. We'll meet you at the top. Don't take too long. We're deep in their country now.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You never killed a woman before, did you? You don't need to do it. Mance would take you. I know he would. There's secret ways. The crows would never catch us.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm as much a crow as they are.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Will you burn me? After?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Can't. Someone might see the smoke.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Strike hard and true, Jon Snow, or I'll come back and haunt you. That's cold.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Go on. Be quick about it.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Do it. Bastard, do it!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You can't do it. We both know it.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: The sun's going down, Jon Snow. And your friends are nowhere close.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'll find them.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Call for them. Go on. Call loudly.

Name: septon
Subtitles: May the Seven guide the princess on her journey. May the Mother give her health. May the crone give her wisdom. May the warrior give her courage.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: One day I pray you love someone. I pray you love her so much, when you close your eyes, you see her face. I want that for you. I want you to know what it's like to love someone, to truly love someone. Before I take her from you.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You sound like a little cat mewling for his mother. Princes don't cry.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I saw you cry.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Did you say something, my lady?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My little brother cried when I left Winterfell.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: So?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It seems a normal thing.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Is your little brother a prince?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Not really relevant then, is it? Come, dog.

Name: man
Subtitles: Hail Joffrey! Hail to the King. Seven blessings on you, Your Grace.

Name: man
Subtitles: Murderer! Bastard!

Name: man
Subtitles: All hail the King.

Name: man
Subtitles: He's no king.

Name: man
Subtitles: He's a bastard!

Name: man
Subtitles: Please, Your Grace, we're hungry.

Name: man
Subtitles: Freak.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Get the Prince back to the Keep now.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Yes, my lord. Come, quickly.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Please, Your Grace, give us some food!

Name: man
Subtitles: Bread, Your Grace, please!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Who threw that? I want the man who threw that. Find who did that and bring him to me!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Hold on!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Hold them back!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Just kill them! Kill them all!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Move. Move!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Pull back!

Name: man
Subtitles: Tear him to pieces!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What are you doing? I want these people executed!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: And they want the same for you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where's Sansa?

Name: guard
Subtitles: Through the door.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Come on.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Push hard.

Name: meryn
Subtitles: Protect the king!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Get back!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Fall back! Keep him safe!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Come in! Come in!

Name: cuard
Subtitles: Keep him safe!

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Motherfucker! Brotherfucker!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Watch out. Hold them back.

Name: man
Subtitles: Hey.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Traitors! I'll have all their heads.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, you blind, bloody fool!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You can't insult me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We've had vicious kings and we've had idiot kings, but I don't know if we've ever been cursed with a vicious idiot for a king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You can't-

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I can, I am.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: They attacked me!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They threw a cow pie at you, so you decided to kill them all? They're starving, you fool! All because of a war you started.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You're talking to a king!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And now I've struck a king. Did my hand fall from my wrist? Where is the Stark girl?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Let them have her!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If she dies, you'll never get your Uncle Jaime back! You owe him quite a bit, you know.

Name: man
Subtitles: Where are you going?

Name: man
Subtitles: You ever been fucked, little girl? Come here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Take some men and go and find the Stark girl.

Name: meryn
Subtitles: I take my orders from the king.

Name: man
Subtitles: Where? This way.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Please! No! No!

Name: man
Subtitles: Please!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're all right now, little bird. You're all right.

Name: man
Subtitles: We'll get you.

Name: man
Subtitles: This way.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Are you hurt, my lady?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: The little birdo s bleeding. Someone take her back to her cage. See to that cut.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well done, Clegane.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I didn't do it for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He shouldn't make me wait.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: The Spice King is the second wealthiest man in Qarth. He makes everyone wait. Of course, you could have avoided this embarrassment if you married the wealthiest man in Qarth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I already have a husband.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Khal Drogo is gone, Khaleesi. You are far too young to be a widow forever and far too beautiful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And you are far too smart to think that I will succumb to flattery.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I have traveled very far in my life and met many women, but none that are immune to flattery.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: The Mother of Dragons!

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Ah, here he comes.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Forgive me. I had terrible dreams last night. Terrible dreams. I could not sleep until the sun was shining and the birds were singing. Look what a beauty you are now the Red Waste has been washed off you. I am sorry about all that unpleasantness. The silver hair of a true Targaryen. Xaro Xhoan Daxos, she is far too lovely for a glorified dockworker like yourself.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Very true, and yet they say that your grandfather, who sold pepper off the back of a wagon, married a lady far lovelier and higher born than himself.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Every lady alive was lovelier and higher born than my grandfather. Did my servants not offer you something to eat, to drink? I'll have them flogged in the square.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you, my lord. You are a gracious host, but there is no servant alive that can bring me what I want.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Oh, she has a talent for drama, this one. So, my little princess, what is it you want?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My birthright. The Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: I fear I'm no better than a servant in this regard. I cannot give you what I do not have.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not asking you for the kingdoms. I'm asking you for ships.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: I need to cross the Narrow Sea. I need my ships as well. I use them, you see, to bring spices from one port to another.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Whatever you grant me now will be repaid three times over when I retake the Iron Throne.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Retake? Did you once sit on the Iron Throne?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My father sat there, before he was murdered.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: But if you did not sit on it yourself, would it not be correct to say "take the Iron Throne"?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I didn't come here to argue grammar.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Of course not. You came to take my ships. So let me explain my position, little princess. Unlike you, I do not have exalted ancestors. I make my living by trade. And I judge every trade on its merits. You ask for ships. You say I shall be repaid triple. I do not doubt your honesty or your intentions. But before you repay your debts, you must seize the Seven Kingdoms. Do you have an army?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not yet.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: You do not have an army. Do you have powerful allies in Westeros?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: There are many there that support my claim.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: When were you there last?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I left when I was a baby.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: So, in truth, you have no allies.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The people will rise to fight for their rightful queen when I return.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Ah. Forgive me, little princess, but I cannot make an investment based on wishes and dreams. Now if you'll pardon me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do you know lllyrio Mopatis, Magister of Pentos? Yes, we've met.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: A shrewd man.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: For my wedding, he gave me three petrified dragon eggs. He believed The world believed that the ages had turned them to stone. How many centuries has it been since dragons roamed the skies? But I dreamt that if I carried those eggs into a great fire, they would hatch. When I stepped into the fire, my own people thought I was mad. But when the fire burned out, I was unhurt, the Mother of Dragons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do you understand? I'm no ordinary woman. My dreams come true.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: I admire your passion. But in business, I trust in logic, not passion. I'm sorry, little princess.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I am not your little princess. I am Daenerys Stormborn of the blood of Old Valyria, and I will take what is mine. With fire and blood, I will take it.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Yes, my lady, but not with my ships.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Who taught you to read?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My father, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Hmm. I taught my son Jaime to read. The maester came to me one day, told me he wasn't learning. He couldn't make sense of the letters. He reversed them in his head. The maester said he'd heard tell of this affliction and that we simply must accept it. Ha! After that, I sat Jaime down for four hours every day until he learned. He hated me for it, for a time. For a long time. But he learned. Hmm. Where is your father? Is he alive? Who was he?
ners: [set(), {'jaime'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'jaime'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: A stonemason.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: A stonemason who could read? Hmm.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He taught himself.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Quite a man. What killed him?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Loyalty.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're a sharp little thing, aren't you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Did... Forgive me, my lord. I shouldn't ask questions.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No. But you've already begun.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Did you know your father, my lord?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I did. I grew up with him. I watched him grow old.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: He loved us. He was a good man, but a weak man. A weak man who nearly destroyed our house and name. I'm cold.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'll fetch more wood for the fire, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mmm.

Name: amory
Subtitles: Where are you going, girl?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The armory, my lord.

Name: amory
Subtitles: Why?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Lord Tywin sent me.

Name: amory
Subtitles: What might this be?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Lord Tywin gave it to me.

Name: amory
Subtitles: What for?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: To take to the armory.

Name: amory
Subtitles: Why would he do that? Let's go and ask him.

Name: amory
Subtitles: Move! Get out of the way!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Amory Lorch.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A girl has named a second name. A man will do what must be done.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Now!

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A girl cannot tell a man when exactly he must do a thing. A man cannot make a thing happen before its time.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But he's going to tell Tywin. He's getting away. It has to be now.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Guard!

Name: soldier
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: soldier
Subtitles: My honor, Your Grace.

Name: quent
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Quent.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Lady Talisa.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Your Grace. I'm not sure I'm a lady. Westerosi customs are still a bit foreign to me.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: It's hard to keep all the rules straight. But if I remember my lessons, a woman of noble birth is always called a lady. Unless she's a queen or a princess. I could find someone who knows.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Why are you so sure I'm of noble birth?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Because it's obvious.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: What if I told you my father sold lace on the Long Bridge, and my mother, my brother, and I lived with him above our shop?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'd call you a liar.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Not very noble to accuse a lady of dishonesty.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I always thought I was a brilliant liar.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Better at amputations, I'm afraid.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Quite a pretty spot.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Will we be here long?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I couldn't really discuss troop movements with you.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I'm not a spy.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Of course, a spy would deny being a spy.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: You're right. You've found me out. I'm writing a letter to the Lannisters. "The Young Wolf is on the move. "

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Perhaps you'd join me... If you've got time, of course, for, well-

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Robb.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Mother. Mother, this is Lady Talisa. She's been helping with the wounded. She's been very... helpful.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lady Talisa.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lady Talisa...?

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Maegyr.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Maegyr? Forgive me, I do not know this name.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: An uncommon name here. An old name in Volantis. Excuse me, my lady. Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I've missed you.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Yes, you look positively forlorn.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You surprised me, that's all. I didn't think I'd see you today.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I wish that you were free to follow your heart.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I know.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You have inherited your father's responsibilities. I'm afraid they come at a cost. You are promised to another.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: A debt that must be paid.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I haven't forgotten.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Your Grace. My lady. News from Winterfell.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Your brothers desert you? I can tell you which way to go.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We'll stop here. Too dark to go any farther today.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Here? There's no shelter here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's no shelter anywhere.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: There is if you know where to look. The cold could kill us both. If you light a fire-

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No fire.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: But a fire is-

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Have it your way.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: We'll stay warmer if we stay close.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Bet you freeze to death before I do. Bet your life.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Think they're out looking for you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Think they'll find you?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You're brave. Stupid, but brave.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We start again at first light. Get some sleep.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Stop moving.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I'm just trying to get comfortable.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Stop it!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're still moving.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Was I? I didn't notice that time.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: This cannot be true.

Name: roose
Subtitles: We've had ravens from White Harbor, Barrowton and the Dreadfort. I'm afraid it is true.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Why? Why would Theon-

Name: roose
Subtitles: Because the Greyjoys are treasonous whores.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My brothers?

Name: roose
Subtitles: We've heard nothing of them. But Rodrik Cassel is dead.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I told you, never trust a Greyjoy!

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I must go north at once.

Name: roose
Subtitles: There's still a war to win, Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: How can I call myself king if I can't hold my own castle? How can I ask men to follow me if I can't-

Name: roose
Subtitles: You are a king. And that means you don't have to do everything yourself.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Let me go and talk to Theon.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: There will be no talk. He will die for this.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Theon holds the castle with a skeleton crew. Let me send word to my bastard at the Dreadfort. He can raise a few hundred men and retake Winterfell before the new moon. We have the Lannisters on the run. If you march all the way back north now, you'll lose what you gained. My boy would be honored to bring you Prince Theon's head.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Tell your son Bran and Rickon's safety is paramount. And Theon, I want him brought to me alive. I want to look him in the eye and ask him why. And then I'll take his head myself.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Why on earth would I trust the word of a lying little savage like you?

Name: osha
Subtitles: I'm no liar.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: All wildlings are liars and savages with no loyalty to anything or anyone.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I done what I had to do to stay alive. I hate the Starks as well as you do. Let me serve you, my lord.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: How? And don't tell me to put a spear in your hand.

Name: osha
Subtitles: There are other ways to serve, my lord.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm a prince now, and you'd do well-

Name: ahsa
Subtitles: There are other ways to serve, my prince.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Like what?

Name: osha
Subtitles: We know things, the free people.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You know things? Like what? How to eat dirt?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Other things.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Savage things.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Wait outside.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I always wondered what you had under there.

Name: osha
Subtitles: It comes at a price.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm not killing you. That's your price.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I already had that.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What do you want then, other than your miserable life?

Name: ahsa
Subtitles: What all free people want. My freedom.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Well, you shall have it, then. But only if you serve me well.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Ow!

Name: shae
Subtitles: Shh. It's not deep.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I thought they were going to kill me.

Name: shae
Subtitles: They thought so, too.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He hated me, the man who hit me. I saw it in his eyes. Hated me. He never met me before, but he wanted to hurt me.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Of course he did.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why? Why would a stranger-

Name: shae
Subtitles: You are everything he will never have. Your horse eats better than his children. It doesn't matter now. He's dead.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I would have given them bread if I had it. I hate the king more than any of them.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Don't say these things. If the wrong people hear you-

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But you're not the wrong people.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Don't trust anybody. Life is safer that way.

Name: guard
Subtitles: And where are you going?

Name: osha
Subtitles: I have something for you from Prince Theon.

Name: guard
Subtitles: What?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Me. He says I'm to make the rounds. And keep you warm.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Spice King refuses me because I'm a bad investment. The Silk King won't support me because of his business with the Lannisters. Why offend his best customer? And the Copper King offers me a single ship on the condition that I lie with him for a night. Does he think I will whore myself for a boat?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: When I came to this city, I had nothing. Truly nothing. I slept by the docks. And when I could find work loading the ships, I would eat. If not, I dreamed of food. Today, I am the richest man in Qarth. Do you think the path from poverty to wealth is always pure and honorable? I have done many things, Khaleesi, that a righteous man would condemn. And here I am, with no regrets.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'khaleesi'}, set()]

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Bar the gates. Ring the bells. Slowly, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Where are they? Where are my dragons?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: A cripple? You let a cripple escape? The boy can't walk, but somehow he slipped past you?

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: The giant must have took him.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The giant? Hodor? Oh, that's all right, then. You let a halfwit escape with a cripple. And Rickon, too? The little one?

Name: black lorren
Subtitles: Gone, along with the wildling woman. The one you were fucking.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Right. Get the horses and the hounds.

Name: man
Subtitles: Come on, find the scent. Where they going?

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: Halt!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Enjoying your first hunt?

Name: luwin
Subtitles: So far, hunting seems very similar to riding, my lord.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: With hunting, there's blood at the end.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: They're little boys.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I was a little boy when I was torn away from my home and brought here. So I kept my word. I never ran away. If I find them soon enough, I won't hurt them. Well, I'll hurt them, but I won't kill them.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Those boys are of far more value to you alive than dead.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: They have no value to me missing.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Robb will have sent a force to retake Winterfell by now.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Robb's in the Riverlands. My sister's in Deepwood Motte. She'll get here long before they do. And Ned Stark always said 500 men could hold Winterfell again 10,000.

Name: man
Subtitles: We have a scent!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The hounds have the scent. Come, Maester, don't look so grim. It's all just a game.

Name: osha
Subtitles: We should have took more food.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We couldn't risk going to the kitchens.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Those people all love you. They would have given you whatever you needed.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: And if Theon found out, he'd hang them.

Name: osha
Subtitles: The boy can't survive on walnuts.

Name: rickon
Subtitles: I'm fine.

Name: osha
Subtitles: We've been walking since before sunrise. Even Hodor will tire.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Even you, sweet giant.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Wait, I know that farm. I sent those two Winterfell orphans there.

Name: rickon
Subtitles: Jack and Billy. They'll give us some food.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We can't risk it. If Theon tracks us here, he'll torture them until he finds out where we are.

Name: rikon
Subtitles: Billy climbs a tree better than anyone.

Name: osha
Subtitles: You've never seen me climb a tree, little man.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: They'll be after us with hounds.

Name: osha
Subtitles: We got a good start on them, but we can't outrun hounds forever.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Did you pull a knife on me in the night?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: What's the matter? Can't be the first time you pressed your bone against a woman's arse.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Let's move.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: It is the first time. How old are you, boy?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm a man of the Night's Watch.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You're a boy who's never been with a girl. Don't your stones start to hurt if your bone never gets-

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Don't call them that.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: What, stones? Or bone?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Neither. Both.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Move!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I heard they get all swollen and bruised if you don't use them. Of course, maybe that's just what the lads say when they want me feeling sorry for them. As if I'd feel sorry for them. Are there no girl crows?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There are no women of the Night's Watch, no.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: So the lads just do it with each other?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Never?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Never. We swore an oath.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You have sheep at the Wall? With your hands, then? No wonder you're all so miserable.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Would you please shut up?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Would you please shut up? You think you're better than me, crow. I'm a free woman.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're a free woman?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I might be your prisoner, but I'm a free woman.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If you're my prisoner, you're not a free woman. That's what "prisoner" means.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: And you think you're free? You swore some stupid oath and now you can never touch a girl.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It was my choice to say the words.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: So you don't like girls?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Of course I like girls.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: But you chose never to touch them.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's the price you pay if you want to be a man of the Night's Watch.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: So instead of getting naked with a girl, you'd prefer to invade our lands-

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Invade your lands? Wildlings raid our lands all the time. Some of them tried to kill my little brother, a crippled boy!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: They're not your lands! We've been here the whole time. You lot came along and just put up a big wall and said it was yours.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My father was Ned Stark. I have the blood of the First Men. My ancestors lived here, same as yours.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: So why are you fighting us?

Name: man
Subtitles: Go on. Now I want you to tell me what happened. Come on, this way. Come on, speak up. Speak up.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Wolfsbane. A rare substance. This is no common assassin.

Name: mountian
Subtitles: We hanged twenty men last night.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I don't care if you hanged a hundred. A man tried to kill me. I want his name and I want his head.

Name: mountain
Subtitles: We think it was an infiltrator from the Brotherhood Without Banners.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Pretentious name for a band of outlaws. We can't allow rebels behind our lines to harass us with impunity. We look like fools and they look like heroes. That's how kings fall. I want them dead, every one.

Name: mountain
Subtitles: Killing them isn't the problem. It's finding them. Have you gone soft, Clegane? I always thought you had a talent for violence.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Burn the villages, burn the farms. Let them know what it means to choose the wrong side.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mmm. Is that mutton?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Yes, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Don't like mutton.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'll bring something else.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Leave it. Are you hungry?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Of course you are. Eat.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'll eat in the kitchen later.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: It's bad manners to refuse a lordo s offer. Sit. Eat.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're small for your age. I suppose you've been underfed your whole life.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I eat a lot. I just don't grow.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mmm. This will be my last war. Win or lose.

Name: arya stark
