Subtitles: Have you ever lost before?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you think I'd be in my position if I had lost a war?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: But this is the one I'll be remembered for. The War of the Five Kings, they're calling it. My legacy will be determined in the coming months.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you know what legacy means? It's what you pass down to your children and your children's children. It's what remains of you when you're gone. Harren the Black thought this castle would be his legacy. The greatest fortress ever built.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The tallest towers, the strongest walls. The Great Hall had thirty-five hearths. Thirty-five. Can you imagine? Look at it now. A blasted ruin. Do you know what happened?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Dragons?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes. Dragons happened.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Harrenhal was built to withstand an attack from the land. A million men could have marched on these walls, and a million men would have been repelled. But an attack from the air with dragon fire, Mmm-mmm. Harren and all his sons roasted alive within these walls. Aegon Targaryen changed the rules. That's why every child alive still knows his name

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Aegon and his sisters.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mmm?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It wasn't just Aegon riding his dragon. It was Rhaenys and Visenya, too.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Correct. A student of history, are you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Rhaenys rode Meraxes. Visenya rode Vhagar.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure I knew that when I was a boy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Visenya Targaryen was a great warrior. She had a Valyrian steel sword she called Dark Sister.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Hmm. She's a heroine of yours, I take it?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Aren't most girls more interested in the pretty maidens from the songs? Jonquil with the flowers in her hair?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Most girls are idiots.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You remind me of my daughter. Where did you learn all this stuff about Visenya and her Valyrian steel sword?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: From my father.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: He was a well-read stonemason. Can't say I've ever met a literate stonemason.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Have you met many stonemasons, my lord?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Careful now, girl. I enjoy you, but be careful. Take that back to the kitchen. Eat what you want.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And, girl.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: M'lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Lowborn girls say "m'lord," not "my lord. " If you're going to pose as a commoner, you should do it properly.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My mother served Lady Dustin for many years, my lord. She taught me how to speak proper Properly.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're too smart for your own good. Has anyone told you that?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I beg pardon, ser. I should have come to you after to thank you for saving me. You were so brave.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Brave? A dog doesn't need courage to chase off rats.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Does it give you joy to scare people?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: No, it gives me joy to kill people.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Spare me. You can't tell me Lord Eddard Stark of Winterfell never killed a man.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It was his duty. He never liked it.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Is that what he told you? He lied. Killing is the sweetest thing there is.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why are you always so hateful?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You'll be glad of the hateful things I do someday when you're queen and I'm all that stands between you and your beloved king.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I've demanded a meeting of the Thirteen. One of them did this or knows who did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You are one of the Thirteen.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: If I wanted your dragons, I would have taken them. They mean nothing to me on their own.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Nothing? They're more valuable than anything in the world.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Shall we look inside my vault and see what selling your dragons would buy me I cannot buy already? We will get them back.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: There is no we, so why would you help me get them back?

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I took you under my protection in front of the rulers of my city. A man is what others say he is and no more. If they say that Xaro Xhoan Daxos is a liar, my word is worth nothing. I cannot let this thing happen to you under my roof.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But it did happen under your roof.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Khaleesi, many times in my life, I have been-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't care where you've been.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You think we're savages because we don't live in stone castles. We can't make steel as good as yours, it's true, but We're free. If someone tried to tell us we couldn't lie down as man and woman, we'd shove a spear up his arse. We don't go serving some shit king who's only king because his father was.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. No, you serve Mance Rayder, the King beyond the Wall.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: We chose Mance Rayder to lead us. He was a crow, same as you, but he wanted to be free. You could be free, too. You don't need to live your whole life taking commands from old men. Wake up when you want to wake up. I could show you the streams to fish, the woods to hunt. Build yourself a cabin and find a woman to lie with in the night.
ners: [{'mance'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You're a pretty lad. The girls would claw each other's eyes out to get naked with you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Walk.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I could teach you how to do it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I know how to do it.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You know nothing, Jon Snow.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: And what did she say?

Name: alton
Subtitles: She admired your spirit, Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: And what then?

Name: alton
Subtitles: She, uh...

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: If every man were held accountable for the actions of every distant relative, Ser Alton, we'd all hang.

Name: alton
Subtitles: She tore the paper in half, Your Grace.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You've acted with honor. I thank you for it. Lord Karstark, see that Ser Alton's pen is clean, and give him a hot supper.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Ser Alton's pen is occupied, Your Grace. The prisoners from the Yellow Fork.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Too many prisoners.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Is there room for Ser Alton?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Does he need to lie down?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Have the men build him a new pen. Put him in with the Kingslayer for now. Have your boy watch over them.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Torrhen.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: That will be all.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Your Grace. A minute of your time?

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I've been treating your wounded men.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: And my enemies, as some of my bannermen are fond of mentioning.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: They're not my enemies.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: That's what I tell my bannermen.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I've already run through the supplies I brought with me. Some are easily replaced. Egg yolks, turpentine, oil of roses.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: But some are not.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I need silk for stitching.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I need fennel root for those with fever, willow bark. Mostly I need milk of the poppy. You saw what it was like to amputate a foot without any. I assume there will be more loss of limb before this war is over.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: If you need help finding these-

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I know where to find them. I'm sorry, I shouldn't interrupt you.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Continue, my lady.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: You're riding to the Crag to negotiate a surrender?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: The Crag will have a maester and he will have what I need.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I expect he will.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: If I could write a list-

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Come with me to the Crag.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I don't think that will be-

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Let the maester show you his stores. I want the wounded men to be treated well, all the wounded men.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Children, come inside, quick. Come on.

Name: child
Subtitles: Hurry up!

Name: man
Subtitles: Can't find anything, ser. They've lost the scent.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Try again.

Name: man
Subtitles: We've circled this farmhouse twice. There's no sign of them.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: We could start the search fresh in the morning, my lord.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm looking at spending the rest of my life being treated like a fool and a eunuch by my own people. Ask yourself, is there anything I wouldn't do to stop that from happening? The hounds will find the scent again. I'll beat them until they do. I'll whip every man here until I have both those boys in hand. And once I've got them, the pampered little shits It's better to be cruel than weak.

Name: man
Subtitles: Prince Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Where are they?

Name: winterfell shepherd
Subtitles: Who, m'lord?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The Stark boys. Where are they?

Name: winterfell shepherd
Subtitles: I don't know. I seen no one.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Think harder.

Name: winterfell shepherd
Subtitles: I swear, m'lord. I don't know.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: My lord, over here. I think I've found what we're looking for.

Name: dagmer
Subtitles: Send the old man home.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Go back to Winterfell. Take him back.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Theon, don't do this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You came back.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: As soon as I heard. Do you know anything?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Irri is dead.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I know. She was a good-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: She's dead. She died alone. She died for me and I couldn't protect her.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Doreah?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We can't find her. She must be dead, too. I led my people out of the Red Waste and into the slaughterhouse.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I should have been here.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You went to find me a ship.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: My place is by your side. I shouldn't have left you alone with these people.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: These people"?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They are not to be trusted.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And who is to be trusted? Who are my people? The Targaryens? I only knew one, my brother, and he would have let a thousand men rape me if it had got him the crown. The Dothraki? Most of them turned on me the day that Khal Drogo fell from his horse.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your people are in Westeros.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The people in Westeros don't know I'm alive.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They will soon enough.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And then what? They'll pray for my return? They'll wave dragon banners and shout my name? That's what my brother believed and he was a fool.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You are not your brother. Trust me, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: There it is. "Trust me. " And it's you I should trust, Ser Jorah? Only you? I don't need trust any longer. I don't want it and I don't have room for it.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You are too young to be so-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And you are too familiar.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Forgive me, Khaleesi. No one can survive in this world without help. No one. Let me help you, please. Tell me how.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Find my dragons.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: How long till we get back to your crows?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're close.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: What, a day? A half-day? You don't know, do you? Do you even know where they are?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: What do you think they'll say when they hear about you and me?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Nothing happened between you and me.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I swear it, Old Master King Crow, ser, we were only close together for warmth. And then I felt it, right up against me backside like a club. I can show you the bruise on me tailbone. And before I knew what was where, his his Well, it was all out in the open, all angry as you like. And I didn't want to want it, but oh, I did! And he spread me legs and ruined. The shame of it. Now I can never marry a perfumed lord. What will me poor savage father say?
ners: [{'crow'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Turn back around.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: And I thought that we were done, but he said, ''Turn back around.'" I'll tell you what, Jon Snow. Since it's gonna be your word against mine, and since you can't talk about it without blushing, we may as well just-

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What, right here in the muck?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I'll keep you warm enough.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Are you that afraid of it?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's enough.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: It's nice and wet and warm.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Enough!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: It don't have teeth.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: All right! All right. Gods, you're dull.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Should have took me while you had the chance.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, no!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No. Oh, no.

Name: shae
Subtitles: It's all right. Give me that.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If the Queen sees, I can have Joffrey's children now.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Help me flip it over.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Where are you going?

Name: handmaiden
Subtitles: To tell Her Grace.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You'll say nothing to anyone. Do you understand?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your mother might have prepared you. You flowered, my dear. No more.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My mother told me, but I thought it would be different.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: In what way?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I thought it would be less messy.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Wait until you birth a child.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're a woman now. Do you have any idea what that means?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm fit to bear children for the king?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A prospect that once delighted you, bringing little princes and princesses into the world, the greatest honor for a queen.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey has always been difficult. Even his birth, I labored a day and a half to bring him into this world. You cannot imagine the pain. I screamed so loudly, I was sure Robert would hear me in the Kingswood.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: His Grace was not with you?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Robert was hunting. That was his custom. Whenever my time was near, my royal husband would flee to the trees with his huntsmen and his hounds. And when he returned, he would present me with some pelts or a stag's head, and I would present him with a baby. Not that I wanted him there, mind you. I had Grand Maester Pycelle, an army of midwives, and I had my brother. When they told Jaime he wasn't allowed in the birthing room, he smiled and asked which one of them proposed to keep him out. Joffrey will show you no such devotion.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You may never love the king, but you will love his children.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I love His Grace with all my heart.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's so very touching to hear. Permit me to share some womanly wisdom with you on this very special day. The more people you love, the weaker you are. You'll do things for them that you know you shouldn't do. You'll act the fool to make them happy, to keep them safe. Love no one but your children. On that front, a mother has no choice.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But shouldn't I love Joffrey, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You can try, little dove.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Who did you say your mother was again?

Name: alton
Subtitles: Cinda Lannister.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Is she the fat one?

Name: alton
Subtitles: Well, perhaps she's gotten a little larger than she-

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, no. There's only one fat Lannister. If she was your mother, you'd know it.

Name: alton
Subtitles: I squired for you once, you know.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: When?

Name: alton
Subtitles: The tournament, the day of Willem Frey's wedding.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I went to Willem Frey's wedding?

Name: alton
Subtitles: You did. Your squire had gotten so drunk the night before that he threw up.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He threw up on his horse on the way to the tourney grounds. What was his name?

Name: alton
Subtitles: Bryan.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Poor lad. That was my brother's doing, I seem to recall. I remember you. You'd never squired for anyone before.

Name: alton
Subtitles: That's right. I ran up and volunteered. "Let me, my lord. Let me." My father was furious. Afraid I'd embarrass our family in front of the Family.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You didn't, though.

Name: alton
Subtitles: You really remember?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You knew when you were needed and when to go away. It's a rare talent. Most of my squires, they mean well, but young men with big jobs, they tend to overdo them.

Name: alton
Subtitles: When I think back to that day-

Name: guard
Subtitles: Shh!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You were saying?

Name: alton
Subtitles: I- Never mind. It's embarrassing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: More embarrassing than being chained to a post covered in your own shit?

Name: alton
Subtitles: I remember everything about that day, your helmet, your horse, the rake lines in the dirt along the list, where the sun was in the sky when you knocked Balon from his horse, and the dent in your shield when you handed it back to me. I'll remember it all until I die. That was the best day of my life. And I remember being on the field after it was over. All the competitors were done. I was the last one out there. And I couldn't leave. I couldn't bring myself to go and sit with my family at a table so far on the edge of the feast you could barely even see the bride. And I couldn't bear to tell them what it had been like squiring for you, when I knew that they could never have the faintest idea what I was talking about.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I understand completely.

Name: alton
Subtitles: How could you? Sorry, I I didn't mean to doubt you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's just that I, I was sixteen once. I also had to replace someone's squire on short notice.

Name: alton
Subtitles: Which knight was it?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Barristan Selmy. The fight against the Kingswood Outlaws. Before your time.

Name: alton
Subtitles: What was he like?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He was a painter. A painter who only used red. I couldn't imagine being able to fight like that, not back then. And to help him do that, to be a part of something that perfect. I don't need to explain how that felt, not to you.

Name: alton
Subtitles: It's hard to put into words.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's like stepping into a dream you've been dreaming for as long as you can remember, and finding out that the dream is more real than your life.

Name: alton
Subtitles: Leaving that battlefield was like being dragged off to prison.

Name: alton
Subtitles: Did you squire for him again?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No. I didn't have your gift. He couldn't take a step without stepping on me. I was awful, a complete liability. Until one of the outlaws decided to take on a sixteen-year-old squire.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's a good thing I am who I am. I'd have been useless at anything else. I'm not well-suited for imprisonment. Shocking, I know. Some men are. Ned Stark, I imagine he made an excellent prisoner right up until the end. Not me, though. My life has left me uniquely unfit for constraint.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'ned'}, set(), set()]

Name: alton
Subtitles: And have you thought about

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Of course. Every day.

Name: alton
Subtitles: And?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Good prisoners breed good jailers, apparently. The Starks are very careful.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: But there is a way, I think. It wasn't possible until now.

Name: alton
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's actually quite simple.

Name: alton
Subtitles: Well, let me help you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You'll only have to do one thing.

Name: alton
Subtitles: Tell me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You'll have to die.

Name: quaith
Subtitles: Jorah the Andal. This man must sail past old Valyria. All who travel too close to the doom must have protection.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I didn't come here for lessons.

Name: quaith
Subtitles: No, you came for the dragons.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You have them? Where are they?

Name: quaith
Subtitles: Draw your sword. See what your steel is worth. You want to please the Mother of Dragons.

Name: quaith
Subtitles: You love her.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Where are the dragons?

Name: quaith
Subtitles: Will you betray her again, Jorah the Andal?

Name: quaith
Subtitles: Will you betray her again?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Never.

Name: quaith
Subtitles: The thief you seek is with her now.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: I did not leave the comfort of my home to come to yours and be called a thief.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: No one is calling you a thief. Who is she to accuse us?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Please, they're my children. I'm begging you.

Name: silk king
Subtitles: Begging us? It wasn't very long ago you were threatening us.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Without me, the dragons will die.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: It will be for the best. Your dragons will bring the world nothing but death and misery, my dear. If I knew where they were, I would not tell you.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: You are cruel, my friend. The Mother of Dragons is in the right. She must be reunited with her babies. I will help you, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How?

Name: pyatt pree
Subtitles: I will take you to the House of the Undying where I have put them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You have my dragons?

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: When I learned you were coming to our city, I made an arrangement with the King of Qarth. He procured them for me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But there is no King of Qarth.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: There is now. That was the other half of the arrangement.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: You would keep your gates and your minds closed to everything outside your walls, but Qarth cannot remain the greatest city that ever was if it refuses to change. I will open Qarth to the world as I have forced it to open itself to me.

Name: spice king
Subtitles: Your ambition is an inspiration. But like all upstarts, you overreach. Three dragons the size of cats and an alliance with a charlatan do not make you a king.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: An upstart and a charlatan? Empires have been built by less. Those on the margins often come to control the center, and those in the center make room for them, willingly or otherwise.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: The Mother of Dragons will be with her babies. She will give them her love and they will thrive by her side, forever.

Name: pyattpree
Subtitles: A mother should be with her children.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: Where will you run to, Daenerys Stormborn? Your dragons wait for you in the House of the Undying. Come see them.

Name: jacks
Subtitles: Lady Stark!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: No farther.

Name: jacks
Subtitles: Keep your hands off me, woman.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Don't enter without an invitation, man.

Name: jacks
Subtitles: Forgive me. Lady Stark.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: jacks
Subtitles: They caught the Kingslayer.

Name: man
Subtitles: Kingslayer!

Name: man
Subtitles: Kill the fucking Kingslayer!

Name: man
Subtitles: Hang him!

Name: man
Subtitles: You'll die today.

Name: man
Subtitles: Justice for the Karstark.

Name: man
Subtitles: Gut him!

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Get back! I want his head! Any man who stands between a father and his vengeance asks for death.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Lord Karstark, this man is our prisoner.

Name: rickard
Subtitles: This monster killed my son.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And crippled mine. He will answer for his crimes, I promise you, but not here.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: I will have his head. And if you try and stop me

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You will strike me down? Have you forgotten me, ser? I am the widow of your liege, Lord Eddard Stark. I am the mother of your king!

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: And where is our king now?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You know very well.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: He has gone to the Crag to accept the surrender. Aye, gone to the Crag, but not to negotiate. He brought that foreign bitch with him.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: How dare you!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Threatening my lady is an act of treason.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Treason? How can it be treason to kill Lannisters?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I understand your grief, my lord, better than most, I understand it. But in the name of my son, the King in the North, stand down.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: When your son returns, I will demand this murderer's head.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Wise men do not make demands of kings.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Fathers who love their sons do. I will have his head.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Thank you for fighting on my behalf, Lady Stark. I would have come to your defense, but-

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Take him to the stockades. Bind him with every chain you can find!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You've become a real she-wolf in your later years. There's not much fish left in you.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And gag him!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Since when do you light your own candles?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Since I decided that I can't stand to look at any of my handmaidens for another instant.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How many times can you read one raven scroll?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Stannis Baratheon's fleet has been spotted sailing north past Tarth, two hundred ships.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: More than we have.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, that's more than we have. He'll be at our gates within five days, four if he has the wind.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We have strong, high walls. We'll rain fire down on them from above.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Rain fire on them from above." You're quoting Father, aren't you?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Why not? He has a good mind for strategy, doesn't he?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Call it tactics, not strategy. But, yes, he does have a good mind for it. The best mind, some would say. Sadly, he's not here. It's just you, me and Joffrey, the Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure you'll make a point eventually.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He needs to start acting like a king. This war you started is coming to our doorstep. And if the entire city wants Joffrey dead

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm not the one giving the boy whores to abuse.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I thought the girls might help him.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Did you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I was wrong. If we can't control him

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do you think I haven't tried? He doesn't listen to me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's hard to put a leash on a dog once you've put a crown on its head.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I always hoped he'd be like Jaime. He looks like him. In a certain light.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The boy is more Robert than Jaime.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Robert was a drunken fool, but he didn't enjoy cruelty. Sometimes I wonder. What? If this is the price for what we've done, for our sins.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Sins?

Subtitles: He once told me that being a lord is like being a father, except you have thousands of children and you worry about all of them. The farmers plowing the fields are yours to protect. Name: robb stark

Name: talisa
Subtitles: When I was twelve, my mother and father went to a wedding. Weddings in Volantis last for days, you know. And they left me with my little brother. The second afternoon they were gone was the hottest day in the three-year summer. We couldn't bear to be inside, so we ran down to the Rhoyne. Every child in Volantis was in the Rhoyne that day. The rich, the poor, we were all there. Naked, screaming, racing to the little islands. Drummers were playing for coppers on the east bank. I was treading water, talking to a friend, when I realized I hadn't seen my brother. I called his name. Then I started screaming his name. And then I saw him floating face down. My heart just stopped. I was I dragged him from the water. My friend helped me, I think. I don't even remember. He was so little. Then we pulled him onto the riverbank. And I screamed at him and I shook him. And he was dead. Just dead. A man ran over. He had a fish tattoo on his face. In Volantis, the slaves have tattoos. So you know what they are without having to talk to them. And this man worked on a fishing boat. And he pushed me out of the way. You have to understand, for a slave to push a highborn girl, that's death for the man, a terrible death. But he pushed me out of the way, and he started pressing on my brother's chest again and again and again, until my brother spat out half of the Rhoyne and cried out. And the man cradled his head and told him to be calm. I decided two things that day. I would not waste my years planning dances and masquerades with the other noble ladies. And when I came of age, I would never live in a slave city again. I'm sorry, Your Grace. You told me of your problems and I've blathered on.

Subtitles: Pod! Find Bronn or Varys. Tell them I am here with Maester Pycelle. Tell them I am very much alive.

Subtitles: Yes, my lord.

Subtitles: What happened?

Subtitles: The murderer and traitor Stannis Baratheon suffered a stunning defeat at the hands of your father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where am I?

Name: pycelle

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Oh, For your trouble.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I, Joffrey of the House Baratheon, first of my name, the rightful King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm, do hereby proclaim my grandfather, Tywin Lannister, the savior of the city and the Hand of the King.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Thank you, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Lord Petyr Baelish, step forward.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: For your good service and ingenuity in uniting the Houses of Lannister and Tyrell, I declare that you shall be granted the castle of Harrenhal with all its attendant lands and incomes to be held by your sons and grandsons from this day until the end of time.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You honor me beyond words, Your Grace. I shall have to acquire some sons and grandsons.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Ser Loras Tyrell.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Your house has come to our aid. The whole realm is in your debt, none more so than I. If your family would ask anything of me, ask it, and it shall be yours.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Your Grace, my sister Margaery, her husband was taken from us before... She remains innocent. I would ask you to find it in your heart to do us the great honor of joining our houses.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Is this what you want, Lady Margaery?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: With all my heart, Your Grace. I have come to love you from afar. Tales of your courage and wisdom have never been far from my ears. And those tales have taken root deep inside of me.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I, too, have heard tales of your beauty and grace, but the tales do not do you justice, my lady. It would be an honor to return your love, but I am promised to another. A king must keep his word.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace, in the judgment of your Small Council, it would be neither proper nor wise for you to wed the daughter of a man beheaded for treason, a girl whose brother is in open rebellion against the throne as we speak. For the good of the realm, your councilors beg you to set Sansa Stark aside.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Margaery! We want Margaery!

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I would like to heed your wishes and the wishes of my people, but I took a holy vow.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your Grace, the gods do indeed hold betrothal solemn, but your father, blessed be his memory, made this pact before the Starks revealed their falseness. I have consulted with the High Septon and he assures me that their crimes against the realm free you from any promise you have made to them in the sight of the gods.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: The gods are good. I am free to heed my heart. Ser Loras, I will gladly wed your sweet sister. You will be my queen and I will love you from this day until my last day.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: My lady. My sincerest condolences.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They're right. I'm not good enough for him.

Subtitles: He'll let you go home? Joffrey's not the sort of boy who gives away his toys. You have a tender heart, just like your mother did at your age. I can see so much of her in you. She was like a sister to me. For her sake, I'll help get you home.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: King's Landing is my home now.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Look around you. We're all liars here. And every one of us is better than you.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Come in. Make yourself comfortable.

Name: ros
Subtitles: That doesn't look very comfortable. Here, watch me.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No need for that, my dear.

Name: ros
Subtitles: You sure? Most men like what they see.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I'm not like most men.

Name: ros
Subtitles: That's what most men say.

Name: ros
Subtitles: If you don't want what most men want, then you'd better tell me what you'd like me to do.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I would like you to tell me if working for Lord Baelish has been all you'd hoped it would be.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Have we met?

Name: varys

Name: ros

Name: varys

Name: ros
Subtitles: You're very kind, my lord. Allow me to return the favor.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You're afraid. Why? Nothing dangerous down there.

Name: ros
Subtitles: I know who you are.

Name: varys

Subtitles: What can I do for you, Lord Varys?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Littlefinger looks at you and sees a collection of profitable holes. I see a potential partner.

Name: ros
Subtitles: I'm afraid of him.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Oh, you should be. He's a dangerous man. But everyone has their weaknesses. Your current employer hides his very well, but not as well as he thinks.

Name: jaime lannister

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Walk.

Name: jaime lannister

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Not interested.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Of course you are. You'd love to know what it feels like to be a woman.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ah. "They lay with lions." Tavern girls, I'd say. Probably served my father's soldiers. Maybe one of them gave up a kiss and a feel. That's how they earned this. The glorious work of the Northern freedom fighters. Must make you proud to serve the Starks.

I led my men to the gates of the seventh hell as their brothers burned alive, and for what? Attacked from behind by Tywin Lannister and the Tyrells. If you see so much in your flames, why didn't you warn me?

Subtitles: Show me.

You will be king.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Lord Stark went out of his way to make it your home.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes, my captors were so very kind to me. You love reminding me of that. Everyone in this frozen pile of shit has always loved reminding me of that. You know what it's like to be told how lucky you are to be someone's prisoner? To be told how much you owe them? And then to go back home to your real father

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I will kill that man. I swear to the Drowned God, the Old Gods, the New Gods, to every fucking god in every fucking heaven, I will kill that man.

Name: luwin

Name: luwin

Name: luwin
Subtitles: I've known you many years, Theon Greyjoy. You're not the man you're pretending to be. Not yet.

Name: theon greyjoy

Name: theon greyjoy

Aggar and Gelmarr, Wex and Urzen, Stygg and Black Lorren. Ironborn warriors will cry out our names as they leap onto the shores of Seagard and Faircastle.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Tell us what medicine to get from your chambers.

Name: rickon
Subtitles: We'll make you better.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: I feel just fine.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: They burned it down. They burned everything.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Not everything. Not you. But they may come back. You have to go. Put on your warmest clothes. Pack as much food as you can carry and go north.

Name: osha
Subtitles: North's the wrong way. And mother and brother are south. We don't know where.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: There are too many enemies in the south. Go to the Wall, to Jon. He'll look after you and let your mother know you're safe.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't want to leave you.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: No more than I want to leave you. I pulled you into the world. Both of you. I've seen both your faces almost every day since. And for that, I consider myself very, very lucky. Go now with Hodor. Go on. I'll be right here.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'hodor'}, set(), set()]

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Osha. You must protect them. You're the only one who can. You may have to protect them against your own kind.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I've got no great love for my own kind. I'll get you milk of the poppy. Tell me where to find it.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: I don't want milk of the poppy.

Name: luwin
Subtitles: Do it quickly.

Name: drogo
Subtitles: Moon of my life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: This is dark magic, like the magic that took you from me. Took you from me before I could even Maybe I am dead and I just don't know it yet. Maybe I am with you in the Night Lands.

Name: drogo
Subtitles: Or maybe I refused to enter the Night Lands without you. Maybe I told the Great Stallion to go fuck himself and came back here to wait for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That sounds like something you would do.

Name: drogo
Subtitles: Or maybe it is a dream. Your dream, my dream I do not know. These are questions for wise men with skinny arms.

Name: drogo
Subtitles: You are the moon of my life. That is all I know and all I need to know.

Name: drogo
Subtitles: And if this is a dream, I will kill the man who tries to wake me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Until the sun rises in the west and sets in the east, until the rivers run dry and the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.

Name: pyatt pree
Subtitles: They miss their mother.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: They want to be with you.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: Do you want to be with them?

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: You will be.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: When your dragons were born,

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: our magic was born again.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: It is strongest in their presence.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: And they are strongest in yours.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: You will be with them, through winter, summer, winter again. Across a thousand, thousand seasons you will be with them.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: And we will be with you until time comes to an end.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: Welcome home, Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: This is not my home. My home is across the sea, where my people are waiting for me.

Name: pyat pree
Subtitles: They will be waiting a long time.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dracarys.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: We should be there by sundown. Won't be a fun night for you. Mance knows how to make crows sing. If you know what to say, you might just make it through the night. Not talking's not the way to go.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Careful with that. You might cut yourself.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Never swung a sword before, have you? You look like a baby with a rattle.

Name: rattleshirt
Subtitles: Enough of that!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Stop!

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Why, traitor? So you can give Mance Rayder an invitation to Castle Black?

Name: rattleshirt
Subtitles: Let 'em fight.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: That's it? That's what you can do? You little shit.

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Your traitor father teach you that?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: Or was it your whore mother?

Name: qhorin
Subtitles: We are the watchers on the Wall.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You can tell Mance that's the man who killed Qhorin Halfhand.

Name: rattleshirt
Subtitles: Burn the body.

Name: wildling
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: rattleshirt
Subtitles: You don't want this one coming back for you.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Come along, Jon Snow.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Time to meet the King-beyond-the-Wall.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: What the-

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Khaleesi, please. He said you'd never leave Qarth alive.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Come.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Nothing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you, Xaro Xhoan Daxos. Thank you for teaching me this lesson.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: I am king of Qarth. I can help you now, truly help you. We can take the Iron Throne. I'll bring you a thousand ships.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Please, Khaleesi, I beg you.

Name: xaro
Subtitles: All that you have dreamed is within your reach!

Name: doreah
Subtitles: I beg you, please!

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Khaleesi.

Name: doreah
Subtitles: Please! Please!

Name: xaro
Subtitles: Khaleesi!

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It's all a lie.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Looks real enough to me. Real enough to buy a ship?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Aye, a small ship.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Take all the gold and jewels.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: I thought we were coming north to fight wildlings.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Is this goat?

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: It's moose. People shouldn't live anywhere you need to burn shit to keep warm.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Well, you see a tree, let me know.

Name: sam
Subtitles: If you step back and think about it, the thing about Gilly that's so interesting is

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Just bloody kill me.

Name: sam
Subtitles: No, truly. The thing about her that I find so interesting is that after all that Craster's done to her, she's still got hope that life might get better.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: The thing about Gilly that you find so interesting is that she said six words to you.

Name: sam
Subtitles: And the thing about you that I find so interesting is absolutely nothing.

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's Jon and the Halfhand. They're back.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Two blasts is wildlings. You're not fighting them alone.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Come on.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Three blasts?

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Run!

Name: sam
Subtitles: Wait! Wait for me!

Name: sam
Subtitles: Grenn!

Name: sam
Subtitles: Edd!

Name: man
Subtitles: Fall back!

Name: sam
Subtitles: Brother?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Did you send the ravens?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Tarly, look at me. Did you send the ravens?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: That was your job. Your only job. We need to get back to the Wall. It's a long march. We know what's out there, but we have to make it, have to warn them or before winter's done, everyone you've ever known will be dead.

Name: main
Subtitles: CREDITS

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: First time you've seen a giant, Jon Snow?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Well, don't stare too long. They're shy. When they stop being shy, they get angry. And when they're angry, I've seen them pound a man straight into the ground like a hammer on a nail.

Name: man
Subtitles: Crow!

Name: boy
Subtitles: Crow!

Name: girl
Subtitles: Look over there!

Name: girl
Subtitles: Crow! Look over here! Look!

Name: woman
Subtitles: Ah, look, crow coming!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You're wearing the wrong color.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Mance was a ranger.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: In your hearts, all you crows want to fly free.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: When I'm free, will I be free to go?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Sure, you will.

Name: boy
Subtitles: Oh!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: And I'll be free to kill you. Got no respect, this lot. Got no fathers to slap 'em when they're foul.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What happened to their fathers?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Some of them were killed by crows like you. Don't look so grim, Jon Snow. If Mance Rayder likes you, you'll live another day. And if he don't...

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I smell a crow.

Name: rattleshirt
Subtitles: We killed his friends. Thought you'd want to question this one.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: What do we want with a baby crow?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: This baby killed Qhorin Halfhand. He wants to be one of us.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: That half-handed cunt killed friends of mine. Friends twice your size.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My father told me big men fall just as quick as little ones if you put a sword through their hearts.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Plenty of little men tried to put their swords through my heart. And there's plenty of little skeletons buried in the woods. What's your name, boy?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Jon Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Your Grace? Did you hear that? From now on, you'd better kneel every time I fart.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Stand, boy. We don't kneel for anyone beyond the Wall.

Name: mance
Subtitles: So, you're Ned Stark's bastard. Thank you for the gift, Lord of Bones. You can leave us.

Name: mance
Subtitles: The girl likes you. You like her back, Snow? That why you want to join us?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Don't panic, boy. This isn't the damned Night's Watch where we make you swear off girls.

Name: mance
Subtitles: This chicken eater you thought was king is Tormund Giantsbane.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Can't believe this pup killed the Halfhand.

Name: mance
Subtitles: He was our enemy and I'm glad he's dead.

Name: mance
Subtitles: He was my brother once. Back when he had a whole hand. What were you doing with him?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Lord Commander sent me to the Halfhand for seasoning.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Why?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He wants me to lead one day.

Name: mance
Subtitles: But here you are, a traitor kneeling before the King-Beyond-the-Wall.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If I'm a traitor, then you are, too.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Why do you want to join us, Jon Snow?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I want to be free.

Name: mance
Subtitles: No, I don't think so. I think what you want most of all is to be a hero. I'll ask you one last time ... why do you want to join us?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We stopped at Craster's Keep on the way north. I saw...

Name: mance
Subtitles: You saw what?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I saw Craster take his own baby boy and leave it in the woods. I saw what took it.

Name: mance
Subtitles: You're telling me you saw one of them? And why would that make you desert your brothers?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Because when I told the Lord Commander, he already knew. Thousands of years ago, the First Men battled the White Walkers and defeated them. I want to fight for the side that fights for the living. Did I come to the right place?

Name: mance
Subtitles: We'll need to find you a new cloak.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: What if you took off that bit there?

Name: whore
Subtitles: Don't you want to leave something to the imagination?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Trouble is, I've never had much imagination.

Name: whore
Subtitles: I want you to take it off.

Name: whore
Subtitles: Mouth.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Ser Bronn. Ser Bronn.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I didn't hear that.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Apologies, ser.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Back away. Keep backing away till you're outside this establishment. Then back away some more.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion sent me.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I will murder you, boy.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: He said it was a matter of life and death.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Pod?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's your sister. The queen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What are they doing here?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Protecting me, I assume. Will you let me in?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, I don't think so.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If I wanted to kill you, do you think I'd let a wooden door stop me?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They stay outside.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm not afraid of you, little brother.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why are you here?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I wanted to see your face. They said you'd lost your nose, but it's not as gruesome as all that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The man who cut me lost more than his nose.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I should hope so. The rebels came for Joffrey's head, they lost their own. Thanks to Father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Thanks to Father. Of course, it wasn't a rebel who tried to kill me.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No? Curious. Bit of a comedown from chamber of the Hand. But then I don't suppose you need much room.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Grand Maester Pycelle made the same joke. You must be proud to be as funny as a man whose balls brush his knees.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're meeting Father today?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How do you know that?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Because I have hundreds of spies in my employ. The Master of Whisperers owes me a favor or two. Father told me. What do you want from him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What do I want from him? He's my father. Do I need to want something? I'm sure he loves me dearly, as any father loves his child, his baby boy. Yet he hasn't come to visit once since arriving in King's Landing. I lay here, my face split in half, but Father never came.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're going to make me cry.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why do you care what I want from him?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Because you've slandered me to Father before.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Slandered? When?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You told him I had my guards beat that servant girl at Casterly Rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You did have your guards beat her. A girl of nine, I believe.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I was nine, too.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She lost an eye, if I remember correctly.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If I remember correctly, she never stole a necklace again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's not slander if it's true.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And what's this truth you plan on telling him today?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why are you so nervous about what I'm going to say to Father?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Because you're a liar. I expect you'll tell lies about me, about Joffrey.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Any lies in particular?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're a clever man, but you're not half as clever as you think you are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Still makes me more clever than you.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh, look at these two shining warriors. Ser Taryn Mant and... Ser Whosit of Whocares.

Name: meryn trant
Subtitles: Ser Meryn Trant.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

Name: meryn trant
Subtitles: You're no knight.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Pod.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater was anointed by the king himself.

Name: meryn trant
Subtitles: You're an up-jumped cutthroat, nothing more.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: That's exactly who I am. And you're a grub in fancy armor who's better at beating little girls than fighting men. Now, I have an appointment with Lord Tyrion.

Name: meryn trant
Subtitles: You put your hand on that door, you lose the hand.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: As much as I appreciate a walk in the sunshine, your lordship, I am wondering why you sent for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A number of people in this city want to kill me. You're here to protect me.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I've been doing that for a while now.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you grow bored protecting me?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I grow poor protecting you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Poor? Poor? Under my patronage you've become a knight, you've served as Commander of the City Watch.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Briefly.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure you filled your pockets.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: And now my pockets are empty. You've given me a taste for the finer things. And if you want me to carry on protecting you, you'll need to pay more.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I thought we were friends.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: We are. But I'm a sellsword. I sell my sword. I don't loan it out to friends as a favor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How much?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Double.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Double?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I'm a knight now. Knights are worth double.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't even know how much I'm paying you now.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Which means you can afford it.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Here. Here! Help me!

Name: man
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I was in the battle at Blackwater. I was a captain and a knight.

Name: man
Subtitles: Aye, ser, and serving which king?

Name: davos
Subtitles: The one true king of Westeros... Stannis Baratheon.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: I thought you were dead. Everyone thought you were dead. And your son?

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: He may have swam ashore as you did.

Name: davos
Subtitles: No, the wildfire took him. I saw it.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: I'm so sorry, my friend. I, too, have lost a son. There is nothing worse in this world. But, Davos, you were a good father.

Name: davos
Subtitles: If I was a good father, he'd still be here. Stannis lives?

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: He licks his wounds at Dragonstone.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Will you take me there?

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: There is nothing for me at Dragonstone.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This war is not over.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: Not for you, maybe. But for Salladhor Saan, the war is over.

Name: davos
Subtitles: We're both sworn to King Stannis.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: I am sworn to no man. I promised you 30 ships and you promised me riches and glory. I delivered the ships.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Stannis never gives up. Never. Now he will regroup ...

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: He's a broken man. His fleet lies at the bottom of Blackwater Bay. They say he sees no one ... not his generals, not even his wife. Only the Red Woman whispering in his ear, telling him what she sees in the flames and burning men alive.

Name: davos
Subtitles: What?

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: They built a great fire when Stannis returned. All those who spoke against her she called servants of darkness. They say she sang to them as they burned.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: I'm a pirate.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You're a smuggler.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: Servants of darkness. I'm thinking Dragonstone is a good place for us to avoid.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Take me back there, please.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: You cannot turn Stannis against her.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Maybe not, but I could carve her heart out.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: You could try. If you fail, they will burn you. If you succeed, they'll burn you. And you've only just come back to life. Stay alive a little longer, my friend.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You call me friend. You drank with me on my wedding day.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: And you drank with me on four of my wedding days, but I don't ask you for favors.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I have to stop her. Please, do this for me.

Name: salladhor
Subtitles: When you are dead, I will gather your bones in a little sack and let your widow wear them around her neck.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: We should set the siege lines a thousand yards from Harrenhal.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: I imagine the Mountain will defend whatever Tywin Lannister tells him to defend.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross. I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight. I don't think we're going to get one.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Two hundred Northmen slaughtered like sheep.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: The debt will be repaid, my friend. For them and for your sons.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Will it? They rot in the ground while their killer runs free.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: The Kingslayer won't remain free for long. My best hunters are after him.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: A Mallister?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Ser Jeremy. My father's bannerman.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Find her a chamber that will serve as a cell.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: She's your mother.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: She freed Jaime Lannister. The Lannisters robbed them of their sons and she robbed them of their justice.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Water. Water.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: This needs to be cleaned and closed.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What's your name, friend?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Qyburn.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: You're lucky to be alive.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Lucky?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The badge looks good on you. Almost as good as it looked on me. Are you enjoying your new position?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Am I enjoying it?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I was very happy as Hand of the King.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes. I heard how happy you were.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: blows on his paper to dry the ink.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You brought a whore into my bed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It wasn't your bed at the time.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I sent you here to advise the king. I gave you real power and authority. You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Occasionally I drank with the harlots.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What do you want, Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why does everyone assume I want something? Can't I simply visit with my beloved father? My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal. I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls. I bled in the mud for our family. And as my reward, I was trundled off to some dark little cell. But what do I want? A little bloody gratitude would be a start.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Jugglers and singers require applause. You are a Lannister. Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield? Hmm? Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion. So tell me what you want.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I want what is mine by right. Jaime is your eldest son, heir to your lands and titles. But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance. The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock. I am your son and lawful heir.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You want Casterly Rock?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It is mine by right.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay. And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy. And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife. And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Why? You ask that? You, who killed your mother to come into the world? You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning. Men's laws give you the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine. And to teach me humility, the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him. But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock into your whorehouse. Go, now. Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock. Go.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Oh, one more thing. The next whore I catch in your bed, I'll hang.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Dorne. It's going to Dorne.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Why Dorne?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's carrying silk and it's supposed to bring back wine in exchange. But it's not coming back. The captain's tired of risking his life so King's Landing lords and ladies can get drunk on better wine than they deserve. He's going to stay in Dorne. Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I met some people in Dorne who weren't so beautiful and warm.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Don't ruin the game.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I told you, I don't want to play.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What about that one there?

Name: shae
Subtitles: That one? It's going to Volantis.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Because when I got on a ship in Volantis, it looked like that one.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: That's not how the game works. You're not supposed to just blurt out the right answer. You've got to invent a story about where the ship is going and why.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Why should I make up a story when I know the truth?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Because the truth is always either terrible or boring.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lovely day for it. Watching the ships.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Baelish.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Might I speak with Lady Sansa alone for a moment?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I saw your mother not long ago. She's very eager to see you. And your sister.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya's alive? You said you'd take me home.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You said King's Landing was your home. You are the property of the crown. Stealing you would be treason. If you were to tell just one person ...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I won't tell anyone.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: How do I know?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Because I'm a terrible liar. You said so yourself. Please, Lord Baelish. Tell me what to do. Tell me when.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'm waiting for word on an assignment that will take me far away from the capital. When I set sail, I might be able to take you with me. But you'll need to be ready to leave on a moment's notice.

Name: ros
Subtitles: You're her handmaiden?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Yes. And you're his...?

Name: ros
Subtitles: I help manage his affairs.

Name: shae
Subtitles: He's an important person.

Name: ros
Subtitles: So is she. I grew up in the shadow of her father's castle. The day she was born, they rang the bells from sunrise till sunset. We've both done rather well, you and I.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Given where we started.

Name: shae
Subtitles: And where is that?

Name: ros
Subtitles: It's not easy for girls like us to dig our way out. Watch out for her.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I always do.

Name: ros
Subtitles: Watch out for her with him.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They're growing fast.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not fast enough. I can't wait that long. I need an army

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: We'll be in Astapor by nightfall. Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The greatest slave-soldiers in the world. The distinction means a good deal to some people.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's too beautiful a day to argue.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You're right. Another lovely day on the high seas.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't mock them. They're the first Dothraki who have ever been on a ship. They followed me across the poison water. If they'll do it, others will. And with a true khalasar ...

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi. You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong. And not before.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I heard you were dead.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Not yet.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: We are alone.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, you are the rightful king. Not only by blood. You're an honorable man, a just man. And there is still a war to fight.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I am fighting.

Name: davos
Subtitles: By burning prisoners alive?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I do not judge people for the gods they worship. If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I'm not your enemy.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You are my enemy.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay? Did I set your ships ablaze? I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands. I could have saved those men. You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him. But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind. Do you hear them screaming? All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help? Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'stannis'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Don't despair, Ser Davos. What I told your son is true.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Death by fire is the purest death.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This woman is evil! She's the mother of demons.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Come on.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.

Name: davos
Subtitles: She will destroy us all!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I will pray for you.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Guard

Name: guard
Subtitles: Guard #2

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Why have we stopped?

Name: guard
Subtitles: It's Lady Margaery, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What is she doing? Who gave her permission?

Name: maid
Subtitles: My lady. We should have guards, my lady.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Why?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Pardon me.

Name: maid
Subtitles: Stop, my lady. You'll ruin your dress.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I have others.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Would you like to speak with her, Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: child
Subtitles: He was a soldier. He went to fight on the walls when the ships came into Blackwater Bay. He never came back.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: And your mother?

Name: child
Subtitles: She died when she had me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.

Name: child
Subtitles: He wasn't a knight. He was just a soldier.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: And what do knights swear to do? Protect the weak and uphold the good. Your father did that. Be proud of him.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Was your father a soldier, too?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You should be proud, too. Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city. They saved us all. From now on, we're going to take care of you. All of you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them. Directly to me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Please, sit. Sit. I do apologize, my lady. Small council meetings. At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: That's a lovely gown, my lady.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes, it suits you perfectly. I imagine you might be rather cold.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I am touched by your concern, Your Grace. Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm. Doesn't it, Loras?

Name: loras
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Loras, isn't the queen's gown magnificent? The fabric, the embroidery, the metalwork. I've never seen anything like it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You might find a bit of armor quite useful once you become queen. Perhaps before. Joffrey tells me you stopped your carriage at Flea Bottom on your way back from the sept this morning.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Yes. I paid a visit to an orphanage the High Septon told me about.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Margaery does a great deal of work with the poor back in Highgarden.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The lowest among us are no different from the highest if you give them a chance and approach them with an open heart.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: An open heart is what you'll get in Flea Bottom if you're not careful, my dear. Not long ago, we were attacked by a mob there. We had a full complement of guards that didn't stop them. The king barely escaped with his life.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: My mother's always had a penchant for drama. Facts become less and less important to her as she grows older. Our lives were never truly in danger.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're right, of course. But you are your father's son. We can't all have a king's bravery.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Hunger turns men into beasts. I'm glad House Tyrell has been able to help in this regard. They tell me 100 wagons arrive daily now from the Reach. Wheat, barley, apples. We've had a blessed harvest. And, of course, it's our duty to assist the capital in time of need.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Well, as Ser Loras said, Lady Margaery has done this sort of... charitable work before. I'm sure she knows what she's doing.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure she does.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: The Unsullied have stood here for a day and a night with no food or water.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: They will stand until they drop.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Such is their obedience.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They may suit my needs. Tell me of their training.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: The Westrosi woman is pleased with them, but speaks no praise to keep the price down. She wished to know how they are trained.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: Tell her what she would know and be quick about it.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: They begin their training at five. Every day they drill from dawn to dusk until they have mastered the shortsword, the shield, and the three spears. Only one boy in four survives this rigorous training.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Their discipline and loyalty are absolute. They fear nothing.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Even the bravest men fear death.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: The knight says even brave men fear death.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: Tell the old man he smells of piss.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Truly, master?

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: No, not truly. Are you a girl or a goat to ask such a thing?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: My master says the Unsullied are not men. Death means nothing to them.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: Tell this ignorant whore of a Westerner to open her eyes and watch.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: He begs you attend to this carefully, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Tell the good master there is no need.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: She's worried about their nipples? Doers the dumb bitch know we've cut off their balls?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: My master points out that men don't need nipples.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: Here, I'm done with you.

Name: unsullied
Subtitles: This one is pleased to have served you.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: To win his shield, an Unsullied must go to the slave marts with a silver mark, find a newborn, and kill it before its mother's eyes. This way, my master says, we make certain there is no weakness left in them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You take a babe from its mother's arms, kill it as she watches, and pay for her pain with a silver coin?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: She is offended. She asks if you pay a sliver coin to the mother for her dead baby.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: What a soft mewling fool this one is.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: My master would like you to know that the silver is paid to the baby's owner, not the mother.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many do you have to sell?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Eight thousand.

Name: kraznys mo nakloz
Subtitles: Tell the Westerosi whore she has until tomorrow.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Master Kraznys asks that you please hurry. Many other buyers are interested.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Eight thousand dead babies.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Unsullied are a means to an end.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Once I own them, these men...

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They're not men. Not anymore.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Once I own an army of slaves, what will I be?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Do you think these slaves will have better lives serving Kraznys and men like him or serving you?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You'll be fair to them. You won't mutilate them to make a point.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You won't order them to murder babies. You'll see they're properly fed and sheltered. A great injustice has been done to them. Closing your eyes will not undo it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The warlocks.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I owe you my life, Ser.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: The honor is mine, my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You know this man?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I know him as one of the greatest fighters the Seven Kingdoms has ever seen and as the Lord Commander of Robert Baratheon's Kingsguard.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: King Robert is dead. I have been searching for you, Daenerys Stormborn, to ask your forgiveness. I was sworn to protect your family. I failed them.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Don't think too much, Bran.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Relax your bow arm.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: And which one of you was a marksman at ten?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Father?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You can't kill it, you know.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Why not?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Because the raven is you.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It's all right, Hodor.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Were you inside the wolf again, little lord?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No, it was the three-eyed raven.

Name: osha
Subtitles: He's back.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I tried to kill it, but I couldn't. There was a boy.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I don't want to hear about it.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: But you asked.

Name: osha
Subtitles: We've got plenty of worries. We don't need to pour black magic on top of them.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I didn't ask for black magic dreams.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I know you didn't, little lord.

Name: osha
Subtitles: We need to move.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We don't know who might be after us. No one even knows we're alive.

Name: osha
Subtitles: And who told you that? The three-eyed raven tell you?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Some good he is, then.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I don't know what other people know and what they don't. I only know the Wall is a long way off.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: My mother always told me you Westerosi were a grim lot. Grim, bearded, stinking barbarians that would row across the Narrow Sea and steal us from our beds.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Did you ever think you'd marry one?

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I never thought I'd marry anyone at all.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Never?

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Not until I met the king of the grim, bearded, stinking barbarians.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Pardon me, Your Grace. My queen.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Lord Bolton.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Let me guess which one is the good news.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Word from Riverrun and Winterfell.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I hadn't seen him in years. I don't even know how many.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: We'll travel to the funeral together. Lord Bolton will garrison here until we return.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Will I be wearing manacles when I lay my father to rest?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Something else?

Name: robb stark
