Subtitles: By the time Bolton's bastard Ramsay got to Winterfell, the Ironborn were gone. They massacred everyone and put the castle to the torch. And Bran and Rickon have not been found. They may have escaped. Or Theon may have taken them back to the Iron Islands as hostages.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Have you received any demands?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Have you heard anything from Theon at all?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Where am I? Who are you? What do you want?

Name: torturer
Subtitles: I want to do this.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Do you know how long it's going to take us to get to King's Landing walking through fields and forests?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: So how shall we pass the time?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: By putting one foot in front of the other.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's going to be a very dull walk.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm here to take you to King's Landing and bring back Lady Stark's daughters in exchange. Dull is fine.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You know, it doesn't matter how loyal a servant you are, no one enjoys the company of a humorless mute. Trust me on this. People have been serving me since I was born. You think Lady Stark is going to want a giant towheaded plank following her around for the rest of her life? A week's journey with you and she'll order you to fall on your sword.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: If Lady Stark is unhappy with any aspect of my service, I'm sure she'll let me know. She's an honest woman.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: All the good it's done her.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: How did you come into Lady Stark's service? There's something we can talk about.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Not your concern, Kingslayer.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It had to be recently. You weren't with her at Winterfell.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: How would you know?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Because I visited Winterfell. I would have noticed your dour head smacking into the archways.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Move.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Were you pledged to Stannis?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Gods, no.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ah, Renly. Really? He wasn't fit to rule over anything more important than a 12-course meal.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Shut your mouth.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why? I lived with him at court since he was a boy, don't forget. Could hardly escape the little tulip. Skipping down the corridors in his embroidered silks. I knew him far better than you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I knew him as well as anyone. As a member of his Kingsguard, he trusted me with everything. He would have been a wonderful king.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Sounds like you quite fancied him.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I did not fancy him.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Oh, gods, you did.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Did you ever tell him? No, of course not. You weren't Renly's type, I'm afraid.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He preferred curly-haired little girls like Loras Tyrell. You're far too much man for him.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm not interested in foul rumors.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Unless they're about me. It's all true about Renly. His proclivities were the worst kept secret at court. It's a shame the throne isn't made out of cocks. They'd have never got him off it.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Shut your mouth!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't blame him. And I don't blame you, either. We don't get to choose who we love.

Name: man
Subtitles: Where are you headed, then?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: South. You?

Name: man
Subtitles: Riverrun. Staying off the kingsroad, are you? They get you no matter where you go. You can't win.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, you really can't.

Name: man
Subtitles: Looks like you're safe enough, though. Meaning no offense, my lady, but I wouldn't tangle with you. Seven blessings to you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: And you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He knows who I am.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: He doesn't.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Maybe you're right. But what if you're not? What if he tells someone?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: We're not doing it. He's an innocent man.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: More innocent than Lady Stark's daughters?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Make it tighter here.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's better. It makes you look very strong.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: No flowers. I said no flowers. All these are wrong. Bring others.

Name: tailor
Subtitles: Yes, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Bloody flowers. On the king.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Looks like a Tyrell rose. Give it to Margaery for her wedding gown. Should be more than enough fabric.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Tell me what you think of her.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Who?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Margaery.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: She's an ideal match. With the Tyrells beside us, we'll crush the Northerners. Hang their lords, burn their strongholds, sow their fields with salt, and no one will think of rebelling for another century.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It is a good match, but what do you think of her? She's beautiful and intelligent.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Yes, she is.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Her concern with the well-being of the common people is interesting.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Not to me.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I only meant that to go out of your way to endanger yourself.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: This is becoming one of the most boring conversations I've ever had.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Margaery Tyrell dotes on filthy urchins for a reason. She dresses like a harlot for a reason. She married a traitor and known degenerate like Renly Baratheon for a reason.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: She married Renly Baratheon because she was told to. That's what intelligent women do-what they're told.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You need to ask yourself

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I don't need to do anything.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Better. Much better.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I still don't believe it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He didn't. He didn't want anything. He just takes an interest because he loved my mother.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Men only want one thing from a pretty girl.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Littlefinger's not in love with me.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Love is not the thing he wants.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's too old.

Name: shae
Subtitles: They never see it that way. He didn't ask you to do something for him? Spy on someone or...?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: shae
Subtitles: If he does ask you for anything or try anything or touch you, I want you to tell me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why? What will you do? I will make him stop.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Ser Loras Tyrell, my lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Send him in.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Ser Loras.

Name: loras
Subtitles: My sister Margaery invites you to take the air with her and our grandmother, the Lady Olenna, in the gardens. May I escort you to them?

Name: loras
Subtitles: I believe you grow more beautiful every day, Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You are too kind, Ser Loras. You probably don't remember the first time we met. At the Hando s tourney, you gave me your favor. A rose, a red rose.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Of course I did.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It's more your color. You take it.

Name: maid
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You're such a dear.

Name: loras
Subtitles: I'll take my leave. Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you, Ser Loras.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Come. Lady Sansa, it is my honor to present my grandmother the Lady Olenna of House Tyrell.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Kiss me, child.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: It's so good of you to visit me and my foolish flock of hens. We're very sorry for your losses.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And I was sorry when I heard of Lord Renly's death, Lady Margaery. He was very gallant.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Gallant, yes. And charming and very clean. He knew how to dress and smile and somehow this gave him the notion he was fit to be king.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Renly was brave and gentle, Grandmother. Father liked him and so did Loras.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Loras is young and very good at knocking men off horses with a stick. That does not make him wise. As to your fathead father-

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Grandmother! What will Sansa think of us?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: She might think we have some wits about us. One of us, at any rate. It was treason. I warned them. Robert has two sons and Renly has an older brother. How could he possibly have any claim to that ugly iron chair? We should have stayed well out of all this if you ask me. But once the cow's been milked, there's no squirting the cream back up her udders. So here we are to see things through. What do you say to that, Sansa? Shall we have some lemon cakes?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'renly', 'robert'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'sansa'}, set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lemon cake's my favorite.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: So we've been told. Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death? Here, Sansa, come sit with me. I'm much less boring than these others.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Do you know my son? The Lord of Highgarden?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I haven't had the pleasure.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: No great pleasure, believe me. A ponderous oaf. His father was an oaf as well. My husband, the late Lord Luthor. He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking. They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him. And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse. Now I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I-, I-

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You, you. Who else would know better? We've heard some troubling tales. Is there any truth to them? Has this boy mistreated you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Has he ripped out your tongue?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Joff-King Joffrey, he-His Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Yes, all Lannisters are lions. And when a Tyrell farts, it smells like a rose. But how kind is he? How clever? Has he a good heart, a gentle hand?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I'm to be his wife. I only want to know what that means.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Bring me some cheese.

Name: servant
Subtitles: The cheese will be served after the cakes, my lady.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: The cheese will be served when I want it served. And I want it served now.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Are you frightened, child? No need for that. We're only women here. Tell us the truth. No harm will come to you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My father always told the truth.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Yes, he had that reputation. And they named him traitor and took his head.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Joffrey. Joffrey did that. He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off. And he said that was mercy. Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I-I can't. I never meant-my father was a traitor. My brother as well. I have traitor's blood. Please don't make me say anymore.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: She's terrified, Grandmother. Just look at her.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Speak freely, child. We would never betray your confidence, I swear it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's a monster.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Ah. That's a pity.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Please, don't stop the wedding.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Have no fear. The Lord Oaf of Highgarden is determined that Margaery shall be queen. Even so, we thank you for the truth. Ah, here comes my cheese.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: We're at war. This march is a distraction.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Are we riding to battle at Riverrun?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Then it's a distraction.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My Uncle Edmure has his forces garrisoned there. We need his men.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Unless he's been breeding them, he don't have enough to make a difference.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Have you lost faith in our cause?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: If it's revenge, I still got faith in it.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: If you no longer believe-

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: I can believe till it snows in Dorne. Don't change the fact that we've got half the men.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You don't think we can win?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: May I speak my mind, Your Grace?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Have you not been speaking your mind, Lord Karstark?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: I think you lost this war the day you married her.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Whoa, whoa.

Name: man
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You're afraid of her. And she knows it.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I'm not afraid of her. May I help you, Lady Stark?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have-

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You can't help because a mother makes one for her children to protect them. Only a mother can make them.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: You've made them before?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Twice.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Did they work?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: After a fashion. I prayed for my son Bran to survive his fall.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox. Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live. But it would be a very long night. So I sat with him all through the darkness. Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Which boy?

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Jon Snow. When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him. I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me. So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.
ners: [{'jon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'stark'}]

Name: talisa
Subtitles: And he lived.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: And he lived. And I couldn't keep my promise. And everything that's happened since then all this horror that's come to my family it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Was it hard for you to kill the Halfhand?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: mance
Subtitles: You liked him? I like you, but if you're playing us false, it won't be hard for me to kill you. I've got wildling blood in my veins. These are my people.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I understand.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Well, how could you understand?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You want to protect your people.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Do you know what it takes to unite 90 clans, half of whom want to massacre the other half for one insult or another? They speak seven different languages in my army. The Thenns hate the Hornfoots. The Hornfoots hate the ice-river clans. Everyone hates the cave people. So you know how I got moon worshippers and cannibals and giants to march together in the same army?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: mance
Subtitles: I told them we were all going to die if we don't get south. Because that's the truth.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Shouldn't be long now.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What's wrong with him?

Name: mance
Subtitles: He's a warg. He can enter the mind of animals, see through their eyes. He's scouting for us.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: What, you've never met a warg?

Name: mance
Subtitles: Orell.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Where were you this time?

Name: orell
Subtitles: The Fist of the First Men.

Name: mance
Subtitles: What did you see?

Name: orell
Subtitles: Dead crows.

Name: rast
Subtitles: What's the matter, Piggy? You crying 'cause you're cold? There's 200 brothers killed by dead men and you're still here whimpering. That seem fair to you? I seen 'em torn to pieces fighting while you was off somewhere hiding in a hole. Why don't you lie down and rest for a while, eh? You know you want to.
ners: [{'piggy'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Hey. Get up, Sam.

Name: sam
Subtitles: No.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Get up.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I can't.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: If you stop, you'll die.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Course if you don't stop, you'll probably die, too.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You don't care.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Course we care.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You left me. When the white walkers came, you left me.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: Aye, we left you. You're fat and you're slow. We didn't want to die.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Help me get him up.

Name: rast
Subtitles: Looks like that piggy is done for.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Help us get him up.

Name: rast
Subtitles: He's slowing us down.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Just get him up!

Name: rast
Subtitles: Why? So the rest of us can die? We'll move faster without him.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: What is this? Get up, Tarly. Is he all right?

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Aye, I think so.

Name: rast
Subtitles: If he can't, we may as well just go without him.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: That's enough. Tarly, I forbid you to die. Do you hear me?

Name: rast
Subtitles: Why should the rest of us-

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Rast, you're responsible for him.

Name: rast
Subtitles: What am I supposed to do?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: Make sure he gets back alive. If he doesn't, you don't. Move on!

Name: rast
Subtitles: I'm not dying for you, Piggy. You hear me?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Where's Rickon and Hodor?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Looking for food.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: What's out there?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Not another step, boy. Unless you want to drown in your own blood.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I'm unarmed.

Name: osha
Subtitles: That was poor planning.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: My sister carries the weapons.

Name: meera
Subtitles: I'm better with them. Drop the spear.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Drop it.

Name: osha
Subtitles: If you kill me, that wolf will tear you to bits.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You must be SUMMER.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I'm Jojen Reed. This is my sister Meera. We've come a long way to find you, Brandon. And we have much farther to go.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'm just trying to understand.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Would you please shut up about it?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Jaqen H'ghar offered you three kills.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not listening.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: But just explain it to me. He offered to kill any three people you wanted. Dead. All you had to do was give him the names. Anyone. You could have picked King Joffrey.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Shut up.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You could have picked Tywin Lannister.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Jaqen got us out of Harrenhal, so why are you complaining?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: But you could have ended the war.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Where are we going?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: North.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: If we were going north, we should have come to the Red Fork River by now.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Maybe we already passed it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's a hundred feet wide. How could we have passed it? If we hit the Red Fork, we can follow it west to Riverrun. My mother grew up there. My grandfather, he's a lord. He'll protect us.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Could be a minstrel.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: A lion still has claws...

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: A minstrel's got gold sometimes. We could jump him, tie him up, steal his gold, and buy some food.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Shh.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: And so he spoke, and so he spoke

Name: thoros
Subtitles: What's lurking behind that wall? A lion? A wolf?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Just a dirty little cub, I think.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Loose a few more shafts.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Don't.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Put the sword down, girl.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You go on down the road. Just keep on singing so we know where you are. Leave us be and I won't kill you.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Generous.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You're a dangerous person. I like dangerous people. Why are your friends so shy?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What friends?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: The fat to your left and the lad beside him.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Three young ones on the run carrying castle-forged swords. You escape from Harrenhal?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Thoros of Myr. And the fellow here with the bow is Anguy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No, who do you fight for?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: The Brotherhood without Banners. Now come along. I want to hear how two boys and a very dangerous girl escaped Harrenhal.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I'm not going with them. The Brotherhood? That's who the Mountain and them lot were looking for. They'll bring us back and put rats in us.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You've got nothing to fear from us, son. The lords of Westeros want to burn the countryside. We're trying to save it. Now come on. We'll talk some more over brown bread and stew. And then you can go on your way.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Here's the thing, fat

Name: anguy
Subtitles: When I'm done talking, that arrow's falling down on your fat head. So I advise you move, because I'm done talking.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Half the country's starving and look at this one.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Maybe he's the reason half the country's starving.

Name: shae
Subtitles: My lion.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We've spoken of this. You cannot come here.

Name: shae
Subtitles: But you said I should come to you with any problems.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did anyone see you? No.

Name: shae
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You sure? My father does not make idle threats. Having you killed would be the high point of his week. You have to be absolutely certain.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All right. What is this problem?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I'm worried about Sansa. When she spoke with Lord Baelish, his friend warned me about him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Baelish doesn't have friends.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I don't know her name.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, Ros? The redhead?

Name: shae
Subtitles: How do you know her?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I try to know as many people as I can. You never know which one you'll need.

Name: shae
Subtitles: She's a whore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, well, we shouldn't be judgmental about these things.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You fucked her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, please. All right, yes, I fucked her once. Twice.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But since I met you, my lady, I've been with no one else.

Name: shae
Subtitles: And was she good? Did you like her?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not as much as I like you, obviously, or she'd be the one torturing me right now. What did she say about Littlefinger?

Name: shae
Subtitles: That Sansa shouldn't trust him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Is there an idiot in any village who trusts Littlefinger?

Name: shae
Subtitles: We have to protect her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We can't. Now that the Lannisters have discarded her, Sansa will have many suitors. A great beauty with a very old name.

Name: shae
Subtitles: A great beauty? Oh, a great beauty?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, she is, objectively, very. Her face is quite pleasing-to other men and to women, people in general. But not to me, of course. I only have eyes for you.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You pervert. You want her? This child?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't even want to talk about her.

Name: shae
Subtitles: But you are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Only because you're making me.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I didn't force you to open your mouth and make words come out.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: This is cruel and unfair. Cruelly unfair.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Oh, the cruelty. Shae is so cruel to me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Hmm, yes.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Now do you think I'm cruel?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Only if you stop. But you mustn't come here again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you hear me? You've come to a dangerous place full of dangerous people. Dangerous people.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Lady Tyrell, my king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Send her in.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You wanted to see me, Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm leaving on a hunting trip. I just wanted to make sure you had everything you need before I left.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: That's very thoughtful, Your Grace. I have everything I could want.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Good. Good. How are you finding life in the capital? It must be quite a change after Renly's camp.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: A welcome one. A military encampment is no place for a lady.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: And the bedside of a traitor? Is that a place for a lady?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace, I tried to do my duty as a wife, that is all.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What was your duty to this traitor as you saw it?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The duty of any wife to any husband-to provide him with children.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You failed to do this.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Why? I-I would not speak ill of the dead, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You think one ought to speak kindly of a traitor merely because he's had a sword put through his heart?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No. I do beg your pardon. The subtleties of politics are often lost on me. Renly I don't believe he was interested in the company of women.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What makes you say this?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Whenever I wanted to make a child with him, he-he had so many excuses, so many late-night war councils. He never wanted to try. Except one evening, after he'd had far too much wine to drink, he suggested something-something that sounded very painful and couldn't possibly result in children. Maybe the fault was with me.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: No, he was a known degenerate.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It's such a relief to hear you say so, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Mmm. I've considered making his perversion punishable by death.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: As is your right. You must do whatever you need to do.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You are the king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Yes. I am.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Do you like it? I just had it made. Probably one of the finest weapons in the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It's beautiful. Will you show me how it works?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: It's a new design. Much easier to load. There's no crank. You use this lever to draw the string.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: The bolt goes here.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: And then you just aim and-

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Would you take me hunting sometime? Forgive me, Your Grace. I know a hunt is no place for a woman.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: It's not unheard of.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: My father would never let me before-

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You no longer belong to him. Do you want to hold it?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: May I? Please.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I imagine it must be so exciting to squeeze your finger here and watch something die over there.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Could you do it? Could you kill something?.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I don't know, Your Grace Do you think I could?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Would you like to watch me?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Stop! Stop!

Name: torturer
Subtitles: Tell us the truth.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: About what?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't know what you want.

Name: torturer
Subtitles: I want the truth.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What truth?

Name: torturer
Subtitles: Why'd you take Winterfell?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I took it to-I took it-

Name: torturer
Subtitles: Who gave the orders?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No one. I took it on my own.

Name: torturer
Subtitles: Why?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: To take the North while it was vulnerable.

Name: torturer
Subtitles: What were you going to do once you took it?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Hold it. Rule it.

Name: torturer
Subtitles: Good. That's very good.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Why did you do that?

Name: torturer
Subtitles: I told you. Why did you take Winterfell?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I took it to bring glory to my house and my father.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Wait. Wait, wait, wait. I took it because I hated the Starks. I hated them for holding me prisoner. I wanted to hurt them.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Please.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'll tell you anything. Just take it off. Please. Please, just take it off.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Your sister sent me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yara?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I'll come for you tonight when the castle sleeps.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No, don't go. Please, please. No, please don't leave me. Please, please. Please, please don't go! Please. Please. Don't leave me. Please don't go.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: osha
Subtitles: Rickon, stay with us.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It's all right. The wolves will protect him.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You can get inside his head, see through his eyes.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Only when I'm asleep.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: That's how it begins until you learn to control it. You're a warg.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It's not just wolves. Sometimes in my dreams there's a-

Name: jojen
Subtitles: A three-eyed raven?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You've seen it?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: We saw him together. You haven't forgotten?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Does it have anything to do with warging?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: No, the raven is something different, something deeper. The raven brings the sight.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Seeing things that haven't happened yet?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Or things that happened long before you were born or things that are happening right now thousands of miles away.

Name: osha
Subtitles: What's he telling him?

Name: meera
Subtitles: Why don't you ask?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Isn't he ashamed, your brother, needing you to protect him?

Name: meera
Subtitles: Where's the shame in that?

Name: osha
Subtitles: Any boy his age who needs his sister to protect him is gonna find himself needing lots of protecting.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Some people will always need help. That doesn't mean they're not worth helping.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: When my father died, I dreamt it.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You didn't dream it. You saw it. So did I.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You have the sight, too?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: When I told my father about your father for the first time in my life, I saw him cry.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Your father is Howland Reed? Yeah.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Yeah.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He saved my father's life during the rebellion.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Your father told you about the rebellion? Mine never did. But I saw that, too.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: What else have you seen?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Only one thing that matters-you.

Name: man
Subtitles: I never liked the skinny ones. Like drinking from a puddle. Not that I'm averse to drinking from a puddle every now and again, you understand.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't drink ale.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: There's no story so good a drink won't make it better.

Name: man
Subtitles: Yeah!

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You see? They've all suffered through my bouts of sobriety. It's very tedious for all concerned. Now, how did three children-

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: We're not children.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: How did three young persons such as yourselves, untrained in the art of war, escape from Harrenhal?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Gendry's a smith. He was apprenticed in the armory.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: A smith, eh? Where'd you train?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: King's Landing. Tobho Mott's shop.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: That criminal. He charges twice as much as every other armorer in the city.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: That's because he's twice as good.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Aha! A smith and a salesman.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Gendry stole us weapons.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Ah, fought your way out of Harrenhal, I see.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He knows how to use a sword and so do I.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My brothers taught me.

Name: men
Subtitles: Ooh!

Name: thoros
Subtitles: To your brothers!

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You can finish your meals before you go. It may be awhile before you see another.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You'll free us?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: I gave you my word.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: But before you go, allow me to raise a cup to your-

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Hey, hey.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Now that is an uncommonly large person. How does one manage to subdue such an uncommonly large person?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: One waits for him to drink until he passes out.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Poor man. You have my sympathy.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Aha, not a man at all. A Hound!

Name: thoros
Subtitles: So good to see you again, Clegane.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Thoros? The fuck you doing here?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Drinking and talking too much. Same as ever.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: A pretty prize, lads.

Name: men
Subtitles: Yeah!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Girl.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: What in seven hells are you doing with the Stark bitch?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's a tough decision - take the bridge and risk being seen or cross the great water.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Silence, Kingslayer.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Anyone can see us on the bridge, but cross by water and the current could take us or I could escape down the river.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Good luck.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's wonderful to watch you wrestle with these dilemmas. Which will she choose?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Gambler at heart. Wouldn't have guessed.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Be quick about it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I need to rest.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Get up.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I have these, you know, on your feet when you walk too far. What do you call them?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Get up now.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Corns. I never used to get corns. Of course I used to ride everywhere, not march around like a common foot soldier wearing the same shit boots for over a year.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This heel is ruined. There's no way-

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I never understood why some knights felt the need to carry two swords.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ooh. You move well for a great beast of a woman.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You shouldn't grimace before you lunge. It gives away the game.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Bit of a quandary for you. If you kill me, you fail Lady Stark. But if you don't kill me, I'm going to kill you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're good. Graceless, but good.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: See? If you were willing to hurt me, you might have had me there.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Looks like your woman's getting the better of you, if you can call that a woman.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We enjoy a good fight. Gets our juices flowing. The Flayed Man of House Bolton. A bit gruesome for my taste.

Name: locke
Subtitles: You sure he's the one?

Name: man
Subtitles: That's him, all right. I saw him fight at the tourney for Ser Willem Frey's wedding.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Give the man his silver.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Let us go and my father will pay you whatever you want.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Enough to buy me a new head? If the King in the North hears I had the Kingslayer and let him go, he'll be taking it right off. I'd rather he takes yours.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: If I may, nephew, I encountered a situation with one of my lieutenants at the Stone Mill which may have some bearing-

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Why don't you shut your mouth about that damned mill? And don't call him "nephew." He is your king.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Robb knows I meant him no disr-

Name: brynden
Subtitles: You're lucky I'm not your king. I wouldn't let you wave your blunders around like a victory flag.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: My blunder sent Tywin's mad scurrying back to Casterly Rock with his tail between his legs. I think King Robb understands we're not gonna win this war if he's the only one winning any battles. No, there's glory enough to go around.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: It's not about glory. Your instructions were to wait for him to come to you.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I seized an opportunity.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What value was the mill?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: The Mountain was garrisoned across the river from it.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Is he there now? Of course not.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: We took the fight to him. He could not withstand us.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I wanted to draw the Mountain into the west, into our country where we could surround him and kill him. I wanted him to chase us, which he would have done because he is a mad without a strategic thought in his head. I could have that head on a spike by now. Instead, I have a mill.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: We took hostages. Willem Lannister. Martyn Lannister.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Willem and Martyn Lannister are fourteen years old.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Martyn is fifteen, I believe.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Tywin Lannister has my sisters. Have I sued for peace?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: No.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Do you think he'll sue for peace because we have his father's brother's great-grandsons?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: How many men did you lose?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: But for every man we lost, the Lannisters-

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: We need our men more than Tywin needs his!

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I didn't know.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You would have. Right here today at this gathering if you had been patient.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: We seem to be running short of patience here.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You know who isn't? Tywin Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Intimate. Lovely table. Better chairs than the old small council chamber. Conveniently close to your own quarters. I like it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What news of Jaime?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Twenty thousand unwashed Northerns have known about his escape for weeks. Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined. Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?

Name: varys
Subtitles: We are trying, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Try harder. What do we have, then?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully. In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Well, let him have it. The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble. The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord. Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children. She has always been positively predisposed toward me.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: A successful courtship would make Lord Baelish acting Lord of the Vale.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Titles do seem to breed titles.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold. Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Far be it from me to hinder true love, but Lord Baelish's absence would present certain problems. The royal wedding may end up being the most expensive event in living memory. Summer has ended, hard days lie ahead. Not a good time to leave the crown's finances unattended.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Fully agreed. Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Master of Coin?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm quite good at spending money, but a lifetime of outrageous wealth hasn't taught me much about managing it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I have no doubt you will prove equal to this challenge.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Hear, hear.

Name: men
Subtitles: He lifted her high in the air. He sniffed and roared and smelled her there. She kicked and wailed, a maid so fair. But he licked the honey from her hair. From there to here, from here to there. All black and brown and covered with hair. He smelled that girl in the summer air. The bear, the bear and the maiden fair.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I hope you're pleased. If you had armed me, they never would have taken us.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You were armed when we were taken.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I was in chains if you recall. Our little match would have ended quite quick if my hands weren't bound.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: All my life I've been hearing, 'Jaime Lannister, what a brilliant swordsman.' You were slower than I expected. And more predictable.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I've been sitting in a muddy pen wrapped in chains for the past year.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You were not beating me.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Maybe you were as good as people said once. Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: When we make camp tonight, you'll be raped. More than once. None of these fellows have ever been with a noblewoman. You'd be wise not to resist.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Would I?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They'll knock your teeth out.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You think I care about my teeth?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, I don't think you care about your teeth. If you fight them, they will kill you. Do you understand? I'm the prisoner of value, not you. Let them have what they want. What does it matter?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: What does it matter?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Close your eyes. Pretend they're Renly.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist? You'd let them do what they wanted?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If I was a woman, I'd make them kill me. But I'm not, thank the gods.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: If I had a proper forge, I could make it good as new.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Doesn't have to look pretty. It just has to keep the arrows out of my heart.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why are you helping him? He takes us prisoner and now he's our friend?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You're not our prisoner, little lady.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What am I?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Our guest. No one's put any chains on you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So I can walk away, then?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: These woods aren't safe for Ned Stark's daughter. You're lucky we found you.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You think you're good with that bow, you little twat?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Better than anyone you've ever met.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: A cowardo s weapon. I like to fight up close. I like to see a man's face when I put the steel in him.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Why? So you can kiss him?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You remember the last time you were here?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Looks like every other shit inn on the road.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Now, apologies, but you're one ugly fucker and I'd rather not see you no more.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Watch your head. Off we go.

Name: driver
Subtitles: Walk up!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What are you doing? We're about to leave.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I'm staying.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You're what?

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I baked some brown bread for the innkeep and she said she never had better. Told Thoros she's keeping me as a payment for all the free meals she's given him. Anyway, it's not me the Brotherhood wants. My brother ain't no king. I'm not a Stark of "Winterhell".

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Winterfell.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: You sure?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm sure.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Well, I made you something.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: It's a wolf.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Yes, it is.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's the tail?

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Yeah.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Well, be safe.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Yeah, you, too. Don't get stabbed.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You don't burn your fingers.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Good-bye, Hot Pie.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Good-bye, Arry.

Name: man
Subtitles: Up you go, little lady.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Hey, Hot Pie. It's really good.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: A person could almost be forgiven for forgetting we're at war.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: It often comforts me to think that even in war's darkest days, in most places in the world absolutely nothing is happening.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I've missed you, Uncle. Father missed you, too, from the day you left. Maybe he never said it in so many words-

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Maybe? Your father was a stubborn old ox. I was surprised when he died. Didn't think death had the patience.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: I'm glad you were with him. I wish to the gods I had been. Did you make peace in the end?

Name: brynden
Subtitles: After thirty years of fighting, I don't think he remembered what started it. He asked me to stop calling myself Blackfish. He said it was an old joke and it was never funny to begin with. I told him people had been calling me Blackfish for so long, they don't remember my real name.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Every time he would leave for the capital or fight in a campaign, I'd see him off. 'Wait for me, little Cat,' he'd say. 'Wait for me and I'll come back to you.' And I would sit at this window every day when the sun came up, waiting. I wonder how many times did Bran or Rickon stare across the moors of Winterfell waiting for me to return. I will never see them again.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: You mustn't think it. We don't know the truth. They could be in hiding. Robb believes they're alive. And he must go on believing. He's got to remain strong if he's to prevail. And you must remain strong for him.

Name: martyn
Subtitles: You're Robb Stark's wife.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Hold still.

Name: martyn
Subtitles: Is it true what they say about him?

Name: talisa
Subtitles: I don't know. What do they say about him?

Name: martyn
Subtitles: That he can turn into a wolf at night.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: True.

Name: martyn
Subtitles: And he eats the flesh of his enemies.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: True. You're a Lannister, aren't you?

Name: martyn
Subtitles: Martyn Lannister.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Martyn Lannister. You've nothing to fear. My husband doesn't eat children. Unless it's a full moon. It's not a full moon tonight, is it? See? Nothing to fear.
ners: [{'martyn'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: mance
Subtitles: Always the artists.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's only horses. No men.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You said there was dead crows.

Name: orell
Subtitles: There was.

Name: mance
Subtitles: How many men were here?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: About three hundred.

Name: mance
Subtitles: And you know what those men are now?

Name: mance
Subtitles: We're all the same to them - meat for their army.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you think anyone got away?

Name: mance
Subtitles: It's not impossible. You don't go far betting against Mormont. But dead or alive, he took a big gamble coming north. And he lost. His best fighting men are dead. And whether he's Lord Commander of the Night's Watch or a blue-eyed corpse, he's a long way from home. Tormund. Climb the Wall. Take Orell and twenty good men. And take this one. He knows Castle Black's defenses better than any of us. And if he's useful, good. If not throw him off the Wall. See if crows can fly.
ners: [set(), {'mormont'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'tormund'}, set(), {'orell'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We're finally going to war, old friend?

Name: mance
Subtitles: Hide near Castle Black. When I give the signal, hit them in the night. They've got a big old wall to hide behind, but it only guards one side.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We'll meet again.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Aye. If you do your job. Ah.

Name: orell
Subtitles: How will we see your signal?

Name: mance
Subtitles: Send your eagle above the Wall every night. When it's time, I'm going to light the biggest fire the North has ever seen.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Ghost?

Name: craster
Subtitles: What have we here? Frozen crows?

Name: jeor
Subtitles: We've come a long way.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Smaller flock than you went north with.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: We can talk inside.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Oh, can we?

Name: woman
Subtitles: They need some water.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Tether it and I'll be inside.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Keep your eyes where they belong. They're not for you.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Bet you feed that pig better than you feed us.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Aye, pig's got value to me. You should all be kissing my feet for letting you in. I'd have turned you all away if I wasn't a godly man.

Name: jeor
Subtitles: You are a godly man?

Name: craster
Subtitles: I am. I got no fear of what's out there. When the white cold comes, your swords and cloaks and bloody fires won't help you. The only ones left will be those who are right with the gods. The real gods.

Name: craster
Subtitles: Go tell her she can bite down on a rag or she can bite down on my fist. Women. That sow right there gave birth to a litter of eight. Barely a grunt. And she's almost as fat as this one here. Now why don't you dine on him? Carve off what you need as you go. Well, look at him. He's a walking feast.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: woman
Subtitles: Here we are.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Sharpen these for me, would ya?

Name: woman
Subtitles: I see the head. Push.

Name: woman
Subtitles: That's it. You're nearly there. One more push should do it.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What is it? What is it?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Keep quiet.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: If you can't ride, we don't stand a chance.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I can ride.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You're sure?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Ride east. Follow the rising sun. Your sister's waiting for you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'll make you a Lord of the Iron Islands for this.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: We're not in the Iron Islands. Go.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on. Come on.

Name: man
Subtitles: Come on back.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You refuse to tell me where you're going?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I don't know yet. The fires will show me.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: How long will you be gone?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I don't know.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You're abandoning me.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I will never abandon you. You are the Son of Fire. I am sworn to serve you.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Then serve me.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: When I return, you will understand.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: My enemies think they've destroyed me. They're laughing at me the way Renly laughed at me. I want Joffrey dead. I want Robb Stark dead. Make me another son.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I cannot.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Why?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You don't have the strength. It would kill you.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'm not so easily killed. Men have been trying for years.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I want you.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Your fires burn low, my king.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: There is another way. A better way.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You told me your magic requires a king's blood.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'm the one true king.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You are. But there are others with your blood in their veins. You will sit on the Iron Throne, but first there must be sacrifices. The Lord of Light demands it.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: The Walk of Punishment is a warning, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: To whom?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: To any slave who contemplates doing whatever these slaves did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Give me your water.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Khaleesi, this man has been sentenced to death.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Here, drink.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Leave this place, Your Grace. Leave tonight, I beg you.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: And what is she to do for soldiers?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: We can find sellswords in Pentos and Myr.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Is it 'we' already, Ser Barristan? If you want to sit on the throne your ancestors built, you must win it. That will mean blood on your hands before the thing is done.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The blood of my enemies, not the blood of innocents.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: How many wars have you fought in, Ser Barristan?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Three.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Have you ever seen a war where innocents didn't die by the thousands?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I was in King's Landing after the sack, khaleesi. You know what I saw? Butchery. Babies, children, old men. More women raped than you can count. There's a beast in every man and it stirs when you put a sword in his hand. But the Unsullied are not men. They do not rape. They do not put cities to the sword unless they're ordered to do so. If you buy them, the only men they'll kill are those you want dead.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do you disagree, Ser Barristan?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: When your brother Rhaegar led his army into battle at the Trident, men died for him because they believed in him, because they loved him, not because they'd been bought at a slaver's auction. I fought beside the last dragon on that day, Your Grace. I bled beside him.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Rhaegar fought valiantly, Rhaegar fought nobly, and Rhaegar died.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Did you know him well, Ser Barristan?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I did, Your Grace. Finest man I ever met.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I wish I had known him. But he was not the last dragon.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: All? Did this one's ears mishear, Your Grace?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They did not. I want to buy them all.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: She wants to buy them all.

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: She can't afford them. The slut thinks that she can flash her tits, and make us give her whatever she wants.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: There are eight thousand Unsullied in Astapor. Is this what you mean by all?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Yes. eight thousand. And the ones still in training as well.

Name: greizhen
Subtitles: If they fail on the battlefield, they will shame Astapor.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Master Greizhen says they cannot sell half-trained boys. If they fail on the battlefield, they will bring shame upon all of Astapor.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will have them all or take none. Many will fall in battle. I'll need the boys to pick up the swords they drop.

Name: varys
Subtitles: As a boy, I traveled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities. One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse. I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys. But what he wanted was far worse. He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses. With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while. He burned my parts in a brazier. The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call. I still dream of that night. Not of the sorcerer, not of his blade. I dream of the voice from the flames. Was it a god? A demon? A conjurer's trick? I don't know. But the sorcerer called and a voice answered. And ever since that day, I have hated magic and all those who practice it. But you can see why I was eager to aid in your fight against Stannis and his Red Priestess. A symbolic revenge of sorts.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'stannis'}, set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, ahem. I feel the need for actual revenge against the actual person who tried to have me killed. Which will require a degree of influence, which-

Name: varys
Subtitles: You do not possess at the moment.

Name: varys
Subtitles: But influence is largely a matter of patience, I have found. Once I had served the sorcerer's purpose, he threw me out of his house to die. I resolved to live to spite him. I begged. I sold what parts of my body remained to me. I became an excellent thief and soon learned that the contents of a man's letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse. Step by step, one distasteful task after another, I made my way from the slums of Myr to the small council chamber. Influence grows like a weed. I tended mine patiently until its tendrils reached from the Red Keep all the way across to the far side of the world where I managed to wrap them around something very special.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]
