Subtitles: And I won't see them again.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Stark deserters. Baratheon deserters. You lot aren't fighting in a war. You're running from it.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Last I heard, you were King Joffrey's guard dog. But here you are a thousand miles from home. Which of us is running?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Untie these ropes and we'll find out. What are you doing leading a mob of peasants?

Name: beric
Subtitles: Ned Stark ordered me to execute your brother in King Robert's name.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Ned Stark is dead. King Robert is dead. My brother's alive.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're fighting for ghosts.

Name: beric
Subtitles: That's what we are- ghosts waiting for you in the dark. You can't see us, but we see you. No matter whose cloak you wear- Lannister, Stark, Baratheon- you prey on the weak, the Brotherhood without Banners will hunt you down.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You found god? Is that it?

Name: beric
Subtitles: Aye. I've been reborn in the light of the one true god. As have we all. As would any man who's seen the things we've seen.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: If you mean to murder me, then bloody well get on with it.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You'll die soon enough, dog. But it won't be murder, only justice.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: And a kinder fate than you deserve. Lions you call yourselves. At the Mummer's Ford, girls of seven years were raped and babes still on the breast were cut in two while their mothers watched.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I wasn't at the Mummer's Ford. Dump your dead children at some other door.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: House Clegane was built upon dead children. I saw them lay Prince Aegon and Princess Rhaenys before the Iron Throne.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Do you take me for my brother? Is being born Clegane a crime?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Murder is a crime.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I never touched the Targaryen babes. I never saw them, never smelled them, never heard them bawling. You want to cut my throat, get on with it! But don't call me murderer and pretend that you're not.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You murdered Mycah. The butchers boy. My friend. He was twelve years old. He was unarmed. And you rode him down. You slung him over your horse like he was some deer.
ners: [{'mycah'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Aye, he was a bleeder.

Name: beric
Subtitles: You don't deny killing this boy?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I was Joffrey's sworn shield. The boy attacked the prince.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's a lie! I hit Joffrey. Mycah just ran away.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Then I should have killed you. Not my place to question princes.

Name: beric
Subtitles: You stand accused of murder. But no one here knows the truth of the charge, so it is not for us to judge you. Only the Lord of Light may do that now. I sentence you to trial by combat.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: So, who will it be? Should we find out if your fire god really loves you, priest? Or you, archer? What are you worth with a sword in your hand? Or is the little girl the bravest one here?

Name: beric
Subtitles: Aye. She might be. But it's me you'll fight.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: The master says they are untested. He says you would be wise to blood them early. There are many small cities between here and there, cities ripe for sacking. Should you take captives, the masters will buy the healthy ones and for a good price.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: And who knows? In ten years, some of the boys you send them may be Unsullied in their turn. Thus all shall prosper.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Is it done, then? They belong to me?

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: It is done.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: It is done.

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: She holds the whip.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: You hold the whip.

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: The bitch has her army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Unsullied!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Forward march!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Halt!

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: Tell the bitch her beast won't come.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: A dragon is not a slave.

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: You speak Valyrian?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I am Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, of the blood of Old Valyria. Valyrian is my mother tongue.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Unsullied! Slay the masters, slay the soldiers, slay every man who holds a whip, but harm no child. Strike the chains off every slave you see!

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: I am your master.

Name: kraznys
Subtitles: Kill her! Kill her! Kill her!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dracarys.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Unsullied! You have been slaves all your life. Today you are free. Any man who wishes to leave may leave, and no one will harm him. I give you my word. Will you fight for me? As free men?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Lord, cast your light upon us.

Name: men
Subtitles: Lord of Light, defend us.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Show us the truth. Strike this man down if he is guilty. Give strength to his sword if he is true. Lord of Light, give us wisdom. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: men
Subtitles: For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Get back.

Name: men
Subtitles: Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty. Guilty.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Kill him!

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Lord, cast your light upon this man, your servant. Bring him back from death and darkness. His flame has been extinguished. Restore it.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: For the night is dark and full of terrors. Lord, cast-

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Arya, don't!

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Bring him back from death and darkness

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No! Let go of me! Let me go!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Looks like their god likes me more than your butcher's boy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Burn in hell!

Name: beric
Subtitles: He will. But not today.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Orell says there are crows patrolling on the Wall. Tell me what you know.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There are four to a patrol- two builders to check for structural damage, two rangers to watch for enemies.

Name: orell
Subtitles: How often do these patrols go out?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It varies. If I knew where on the Wall we were heading, I could tell you.

Name: orell
Subtitles: You'd like to know that.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: There are nineteen castles guarding the Wall. How many are manned?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Three.

Name: orell
Subtitles: You sure of that?

Name: orell
Subtitles: Which three?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Castle Black.

Name: orell
Subtitles: Aye, Castle Black. Everyone knows Castle Black. Which others?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Eastwatch-by-the-Sea and the Shadow Tower.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: How many men remain in Castle Black?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: A thousand.

Name: orell
Subtitles: Liar.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What happens to your eagle after I kill you? Does he drift away like a kite with his strings cut or does he just flop dead to the ground?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: He's no crow.

Name: orell
Subtitles: Just 'cause you want him inside you don't make him one of us.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I'm not afraid of you.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I like you, boy. But if you lie to me, I'll pull your guts out through your throat.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: A thousand men.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We'll find out soon enough.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't need you to protect me.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Of course you do. Who stopped Rattleshirt when he was about to cut your throat? Who vouched for you with Mance? It seems you owe me a debt.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Give it back.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Well, I stole it. It's mine. If you want it, come steal it back.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ygritte! Ygritte!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ygritte! Seven hells. Ygritte!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Is Orell right? Are you still a crow? It's time you proved yourself.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ygritte.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You swore some vows. I want you to break 'em. I want you to see me.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: All of me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We shouldn't.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: We should.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Why are you still dressed? You know nothing, Jon Sno-

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: That thing you did with your mouth- is that what lords do to their ladies in the South?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't know. I just wanted to kiss you there is all.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Hmm.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You seemed to like it.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Aye, I liked it some. Who taught you that?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's been no one else. Only you.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: A maid. You were a maid.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I was a man of the Night's Watch. How about you? Were you a maid?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: What do you think?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Who was he?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Just a boy. He came trading with his brothers. He had red hair like me. Kissed by fire. But he was weak. Not like you. That was the first one. Then there was this Thenn boy. Spoke no Common, but gods, he was built like a mammoth.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'thenn'}, set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yeah, thanks. I think I've heard enough. We'd best get back. Tormund-

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I'm not done with you yet.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: How long's it been since you had a bath?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Let's not go back. Let's stay here a while longer. I don't ever want to leave this cave, Jon Snow. Not ever.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I want my gold.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: It says it clearly right there on that note you'll be repaid in full when the war is over.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Piss on that! You're nothing but thieves.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: We're outlaws. Outlaws steal. You're lucky we didn't kill you.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Come try it, archer. I'll shove those arrows up your ass.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You can't let him go. He's a murderer. He's guilty.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Not in the eyes of god.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You can't!

Name: beric
Subtitles: Enough! The judgment isn't ours to make.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Go in peace, Sandor Clegane. The Lord of Light isn't done with you yet.

Name: man
Subtitles: Riders coming through!

Name: man
Subtitles: The Kingslayer.

Name: man
Subtitles: Down!

Name: locke
Subtitles: On your knees. Lord Bolton, I give you the Kingslayer.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Pick him up, Locke.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You've lost a hand.

Name: locke
Subtitles: No, my lord, he has it here.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Take this away.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Send it to his father?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You'll hold your tongue unless you want to lose it.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Cut her free. Apologies, my lady. You're under my protection now.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Thank you, my lord.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Find suitable rooms for our guests. We'll speak later.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Lord Bolton.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Is there word from the capital?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You haven't heard? Stannis Baratheon laid siege to King's Landing. Sailed into Blackwater Bay. Stormed the gates with thousands of men. And your sister How can I put this? Your sister is alive and well. Your father's forces prevailed.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Ser Jaime isn't well. Take him to Qyburn.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Will I die?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: No. The corruption has spread. I fear it must be cut away. The safest course would be to take the whole arm off.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Then you'll die. You're no maester. Where's your chain?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: The Citadel stripped me of it. They found some of my experiments too bold. I can leave your upper arm, make the cut at your elbow.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't need my right hand to kill you.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: I can take away the rotting flesh and try and burn out the corruption - with boiling wine.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Mmm.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: With any luck, that will suffice. You'll need milk of the poppy.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No milk of the poppy.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: There will be pain.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll scream.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Quite a bit of pain.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll scream loudly.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Lord Baelish.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I wonder if I might ask you for a favor.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Of course, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I have reason to believe that House Tyrell do not hold the crown's best interests at heart.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My father's a practical man. He appreciates facts.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Myself, I often find them a hindrance.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And he appreciates those who aid his family, as you well know. He's almost as generous to those who help us as he is unpleasant towards those who don't. You have a good working relationship with the Tyrells. I thought you might look into it before you leave the capital.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I shall do my best.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Thank you. And your best will prove better than when I asked you to locate Arya Stark?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I assure you that it will.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Gods, boy, that's enough. We're not in a tavern.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Pardon, my lady.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: No need to speak. Are there any figs? Fetch some. I always take figs midafternoon. They help move the bowels. To what do I owe this summons?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Thank you for seeing me, my lady. I had hoped we might discuss a few financial matters.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I climbed all those steps to discuss financial matters?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's the royal wedding. I'm told you had a hand in planning it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Naturally.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's shaping up to be a very involved affair. The word extravagant has been used.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What good is the word extravagant if it can't be used to describe a royal wedding?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I understand that.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Good.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But, as Master of Coin, it falls upon me to calculate the cost for the crown. As of now, it's a huge expense.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And we're at war, Lady Olenna.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Oh, I'd nearly forgotten.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, and maintaining supply lines-

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I can't think how it slipped my mind. What is it, twelve thousand infantrymen the Tyrell family has supplied? Two thousand in support. Provisions so this city might survive the winter. A million bushels of wheat. Half a million bushels each of barley, oats, and rye. Twenty thousand head of cattle. Fifty thousand sheep. You don't have to lecture me about wartime expenses. I'm quite familiar with them.
ners: [set(), {'tyrell'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And we are so grateful for your contributions which are necessary for the preservation of the realm.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: As is a royal wedding. The people are hungry for more than just food. They crave distractions. And if we don't provide them, they'll create their own. And their distractions are likely to end with us being torn to pieces. A royal wedding is much safer. Wouldn't you say?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I would.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And traditionally paid for by the royal family.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched. You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper. Where did you go for them, Volantis?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My lady-

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Oh, very well. I won't have it said that House Tyrell refuses to play its part. We'll pay for half the expenses and the celebrations will go on as planned. Is that sufficient?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Quite sufficient. Thank you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Very good, then. That's settled. Good day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Give me that.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Just mending Lord Beric's armor.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'm going to stay on and smith for the Brotherhood.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Have you lost your mind? When the Lannisters find this place, you think they'll spare the smiths? They'll cave your head in with your own helmet.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: The Lannisters wanted to kill me long before I joined the Brotherhood.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You don't have to do this.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I want to. They need good men.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Robb needs good men, too. We're leaving tomorrow. And then you-

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: What? Serve him? I've served men my entire life. I served Master Mott at King's Landing and he sold me to the Watch. I served Lord Tywin at Harrenhal, wondering every day if I'd get tortured or killed. I'm done serving.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You just said you were serving Lord Beric.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: He may be their leader, but they chose him. These men are brothers. They're a family. I've never had a family.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I can be your family.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You wouldn't be my family. You'd be 'my lady'.

Name: martyn
Subtitles: Willem. Willem!

Name: willem
Subtitles: Is this a rescue?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Lannister filth! Take him!

Name: martyn
Subtitles: Please, I didn't do anything. I'm just a squire. Please-

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Bring them in.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Is that all of them? It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Not murder, Your Grace. Vengeance.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Vengeance? Those boys didn't kill your sons. I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen-

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Was strangled by the Kingslayer. They were his kin.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: They were boys! Look at them.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Tell your mother to look at them. She killed them as much as I.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: My mother had nothing to do with this. This was your treason.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: It's treason to free your enemies. In war, you kill your enemies. Did your father not teach you that, boy?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Leave him.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Aye. Leave me to the king. He wants to give me a scolding before he sets me free. That's how he deals with treason. Our King in the North. Or should I call him the King Who Lost the North?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon. Hang the rest.

Name: man
Subtitles: Mercy, sire! I didn't kill anyone. I only watched for the guards.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: This one was only the watcher. Hang him last so he can watch the others die.

Name: man
Subtitles: Please! Please, no. They made me do it! They made me! They made me!

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Word of this can't leave Riverrun. They were Tywin Lannister's nephews. The Lannisters pay their debts. They never stop talking about it.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: It wouldn't be lying. We will bury them and remain silent until the war is done.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks, no matter how highborn. He has to die.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: The Karstarks are Northmen. They won't forgive the killing of their lord.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Your mother's right. If you do this, the Karstarks will abandon you.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You tended to their wounds. You brought them supper. Now they're dead.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: And more boys will keep dying until this war is over. You need Karstark men to end it.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: A hostage. Tell the Karstarks that as long as they remain loyal, he will not be harmed.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: The blood of the First Men flows through my veins as much as yours, boy. I fought the Mad King for your father. I fought Joffrey for you. We are kin- Stark and Karstark.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: That didn't stop you from betraying me. And it won't save you now.

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: I don't want it to save me. I want it to haunt you to the end of your days.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Kneel, my lord.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Rickard Karstark, Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die. Would you speak a final word?

Name: rickard karstark
Subtitles: Kill me and be cursed. You are no king of mine.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne. Ser Meryn. The Hound. What are you going to do with me?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: At first light we'll ride for Riverrun. Your brother's there now. He'll make a contribution to our cause and you can go home.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm a hostage and you're selling me.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Don't think of it that way.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But it is that way.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: It is. And it isn't.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: More is than isn't.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Beric admired your father a great deal, you know. He wanted to refuse your ransom altogether.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So why don't you?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: We need the gold.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Do I frighten you, child?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: beric
Subtitles: You're angry with me. And I don't blame you. But letting him go was the right thing. I have more reason than most to want him hanged.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I thought he killed you.

Name: beric
Subtitles: He did.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But how?

Name: beric
Subtitles: Thoros how many times have you brought me back?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: It's the Lord of Light brings you back. I'm just the lucky drunk who says the words.

Name: beric
Subtitles: How many times?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Five, I think. No, this makes six.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Six.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: There was the first time- the Mountain. Show her. Lance right through the chest.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Then I was stabbed in the belly.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Then it was an arrow in the back. And that axe in the side.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Then the Lannisters caught me and executed me for treason. Was it a hanging or a dagger in the eye?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Both. Fuckers couldn't decide.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: And the Hound makes six.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Second time I've been killed by a Clegane.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You'd think you'd learn. It's not getting any easier, you know.

Name: beric
Subtitles: I know. Every time I come back, I'm a bit less. Pieces of you get chipped away.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Could you bring back a man without a head? Not six times. Just once.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: I don't think it works that way, child.

Name: beric
Subtitles: He was a good man, Ned Stark. He's at rest now, somewhere. I would never wish my life upon him.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I would. You're alive.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Lord, cast your light upon me. Protect me in the darkness. Burn away my sins. Help me serve you. Use me as you will. For the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: I have prayed day and night for you to come to me.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: My lady.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I meant to come sooner. The battle-

Name: selyse
Subtitles: I know of your troubles, My king. The Lady Melisandre has told me everything.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Yes, of course.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You mustn't despair. Your claim is true. You will be victorious.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I believed that once.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You are the one godo s champion and the finest man I've ever known.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Selyse. I've broken a sacred vow. I've sinned.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: No.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I've wronged you. I have shamed you.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You're doing godo s work.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You don't understand. The Red Woman- the Lady Melisandre-

Name: selyse
Subtitles: I know, Stannis. The Lady Melisandre has told me everything. No act done in service of the Lord of Light can ever be a sin. When she told me, I wept with joy.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Oh, my sweet boys. Petyr, Tommard, Edric. I thank god every day for bringing Melisandre to us. She gave you a son. I gave you - nothing.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: That's not true.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: So you've come to see her as well? There is no need. You must keep away from such distractions.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: She's my daughter. I want to see her.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You are a king. You don't need my permission.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Under the sea I know, I know/ Oh, oh, oh

Name: shireen
Subtitles: The birds have scales / And the fish take wing / I know, I know / Oh, oh, oh

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Shireen.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Father!

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You've grown since I last saw you.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Mother said you fought in a battle. Did you win?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: No.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Did the Onion Knight come back with you?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: He did. He fought bravely.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: He hasn't come to visit me. He said he'd bring me back a present from the capital.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: He won't be visiting, child.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Why not? He's my friend. Look.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: He made this for me. But don't tell Mother I have it. It's a secret. Mother doesn't like the Onion Knight.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Ser Davos is a traitor. He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime. Best forget him.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Not so hard. You'll scrub the skin off.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: What are you doing here?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I need a bath. Help me out of these rags.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Now get out.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: There's another tub.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This one suits me fine. Don't worry. I'm not interested. If I faint, pull me out. I don't intend to be the first Lannister to die in a bathtub.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Why should I care how you die?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You swore a solemn vow, remember? You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece. Not going so well, is it? No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That was unworthy. Forgive me. You protected me better than most-

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Don't you mock me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm apologizing. I'm sick of fighting. Let's call a truce.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You need trust to have a truce.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I trust you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: There it is. There's the look. I've seen it for seventeen years on face after face. You all despise me. Kingslayer. Oathbreaker. A man without honor. You've heard of wildfire?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The Mad King was obsessed with it. He loved to watch people burn, the way their skin blackened and blistered and melted off their bones. He burned lords he didn't like. He burned Hands who disobeyed him. He burned anyone who was against him. Before long, half the country was against him. Aerys saw traitors everywhere. So he had his pyromancer place caches of wildfire all over the city- beneath the Sept of Baelor and the slums of Flea Bottom. Under houses, stables, taverns. Even beneath the Red Keep itself. Finally, the day of reckoning came. Robert Baratheon marched on the capital after his victory at the Trident. But my father arrived first with the whole Lannister army at his back, promising to defend the city against the rebels. I knew my father better than that. He's never been one to pick the losing side. I told the Mad King as much. I urged him to surrender peacefully. But the king didn't listen to me. He didn't listen to Varys who tried to warn him. But he did listen to Grand Maester Pycelle, that grey, sunken cunt. 'You can trust the Lannisters,' he said. 'The Lannisters have always been true friends of the crown.' So we opened the gates and my father sacked the city. Once again, I came to the king, begging him to surrender. He told me to bring him my father's head. Then he turned to his pyromancer. 'Burn them all,' he said. 'Burn them in their homes. Burn them in their beds.' Tell me, if your precious Renly commanded you to kill your own father and stand by while thousands of men, women, and children burned alive, would you have done it? Would you have kept your oath then?
ners: [{'the'}, set(), set(), {'hands'}, set(), set(), {'aerys'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'robert'}, {'lannister'}, set(), set(), {'the'}, set(), set(), {'varys'}, {'pycelle'}, set(), {'lannisters'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'renly'}, set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: First, I killed the pyromancer. And then when the king turned to flee, I drove my sword into his back. 'Burn them all,' he kept saying. 'Burn them all.' I don't think he expected to die. He- he meant to burn with the rest of us and rise again, reborn as a dragon to turn his enemies to ash. I slit his throat to make sure that didn't happen. That's where Ned Stark found me.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'ned'}]

Name: brienne
Subtitles: If this is true why didn't you tell anyone? Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Stark? You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side? He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me. By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Help! Help! The Kingslayer!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Jaime. My name is Jaime.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Onion Knight. Ser Onion Knight.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Princess? Gods, what are you doing here?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Shh, you'll wake Bert.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Bert?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: He's the fat one. He's on guard duty tonight. He likes to drink wine and sleep a lot.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Go back to your room. You're not supposed to be here. If your father knew-

Name: shireen
Subtitles: he said you Were a traitor. Are you?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I am, child. I disobeyed my king, your father, and now I'm paying the price.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: I don't care. You're my friend. You must get bored down here. I brought you something to read. It's about Aegon and his dragons. Aegon used to live here. Did you know that? And the Targaryens built this castle.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Aye. So they did.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: You can hide the book under your cloak. It's a good one. I'll bring you more.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Thank you, my lady. I'm sure it's a fine book, but it's wasted on me.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Take it. I have more.

Name: davos
Subtitles: My lady, I can't read the words.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: You can't?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: I'll teach you. I'll come when Bert's on duty and teach you.

Name: davos
Subtitles: No. No. No.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: It's easy. It'll be fun.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Go. We can't.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Why not? What will they do, lock us in cells?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I wouldn't know where to start.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: At the beginning. This word is Aegon. When you see A, E, and G together like that, it sounds like egg. And the title of the whole book is 'An History of Aegon the Conqueror and His Conquest of Westeros.'

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It was a bitch of a siege.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Mm, you were first through the breach at Pyke?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The second. Thoros of Myr went in alone, waving that flaming sword of his.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Thoros of Myr. Bloody madman. Robert knighted you after the battle?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Proudest moment of my life. One knee in the dust, the king's sword on my shoulder, listening to the words. 'In the name of the Warrior, I charge you to be brave.' All I could think of was how badly I had to piss.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: In full plate metal for sixteen hours. Never occurred to me till the fighting was over. I was very nearly the first man knighted to piss on the king's boots.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Robert would have laughed. He was a good man, a great warrior. And a terrible king. I burned away my years fighting for terrible kings.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You swore an oath.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Yes. And a man of honor keeps his vows, even if he's serving a drunk or a lunatic. Just once in my life before it's over, I want to know what it's like to serve with pride, to fight for someone I believe in. Do you believe in her?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: With all my heart.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: These are the ones?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Yes, khaleesi. The officers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You did not choose this life. But you are free men now. And free men make their own choices. Have you selected your own leader from amongst your ranks?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Remove your helmet

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: This one has the honor.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What is your name?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Grey Worm.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Grey Worm.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: All Unsullied boys are given new names when they are cut- Grey Worm, Red Flea, Black Rat. Names that remind them what they are- vermin.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: From this day forward you will choose your own names. You will tell your fellow soldiers to do the same. Throw away your slave name. Choose the name your parents gave you, or any other. A name that gives you pride.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Grey Worm" gives me pride. It is a very lucky name. The name this one was born with was cursed. That was the name he had when he was taken as a slave. But Grey Worm is the name this one had the day Daenerys Stormborn set him free.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: King Robert wanted her dead.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Of course he wanted her dead. She's a Targaryen. The last Targaryen.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I suppose no one on the small council could speak sense to him.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I didn't sit on the small council.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: No? Doesn't the Lord of the Kingsguard traditionally-

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Traditionally, yes, but I killed a dozen of Robert's friends during his rebellion.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: He didn't want advice on how to govern from a man who had fought for the Mad King. Can't say I minded much. I always hated the politics.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Yeah, I imagine I would, too. Hours spent jabbering about backstabbings - and betrayals the world over.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Mm-hmm.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Still, she'll have to wade through that muck if she wants to rule the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: She'll have good men around her to advise her, men with experience.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Which men do you have in mind?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Forgive me, Ser Jorah, for what I'm about to say, but your reputation in Westeros has suffered over the years.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It suffered for a reason. I sold men into slavery.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I don't know if your presence by her side will help our cause when we go home.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Our cause? Forgive me, Ser Barristan, but I was busy defending the khaleesi against King Robert's assassins while you were still bowing to the man.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: We both want her to rule. Am I wrong?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You only joined us a few days ago. I can't speak to your intentions.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: If we're truly her loyal servants, we will do whatever needs to be done, no matter the cost, no matter our pride.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You're not Lord here. You're just another exile. And I take my orders from the queen.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Come to bed.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You were right.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: The Karstarks are gone. Almost half our forces. Tywin Lannister knows what he needs to do to make us unravel. Nothing. Only wait.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Don't let him.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What can I do? Attack King's Landing? There's nothing he'd like better. He'd crush us in a day.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: We could ride north. Take your land back from the Greyjoys. Wait out the winter.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Winter could last five years. Once my bannermen are home again, sitting by the fire, surrounded by their families, warm and safe, they'll never ride south again. When I gathered my lords together, we had a purpose, a mission. Now we're like a band of bickering children.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Give them a new purpose.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Oh, I don't know. I don't even know where Winterfell is.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Here. And we're here. King's Landing-

Name: talisa
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I can't force them to meet us in the field and I can't attack them where they're strongest, but I can attack them where they're not.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: And Casterly Rock can't run away. I'm going to take their home away from them.

Name: talisa
Subtitles: Can you do it?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I need men to replace the Karstarks who marched home. There is only one person in this kingdom with that kind of army who hasn't already sided with the Lannisters. The man whose daughter I was supposed to marry- Walder Frey.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's such a splendid fighter. Do you have any idea when we might

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I'll plant the seed as soon as Joffrey and I are married. It should grow quickly.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Joffrey won't let me leave. He's got too many reasons to keep me here.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: And only one to let you go. Because it will please me.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Squire!

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Well fought, ser.

Name: loras
Subtitles: That was no fight. I don't know you.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Olyver, if it please you.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: I should like to see you spar with a proper partner, ser.

Name: loras
Subtitles: How did you know?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Know what?

Name: loras
Subtitles: That I wanted to.

Name: loras
Subtitles: My lord, I'll have you know I'm to be married soon and even my intended hasn't the slightest notion.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: They rarely do, in my experience.

Name: loras
Subtitles: You have a good deal of experience, do you?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: With the husbands.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: That didn't take long.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Well, it took long enough. It seems our Knight of Flowers is engaged to be wed.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Is he? And who's the lucky girl?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: She may not be the grandest ship in the world or the fastest, but she's mine. I've always wanted a ship. Now I want a dozen. Strange, isn't it?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What is?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It doesn't matter what we want, once we get it, then we want something else. Your hair is different.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Is it?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lady Margaery wears it that way.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Many ladies wear it this way.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I have good news. I'll be leaving the city soon.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You still want me to come with you?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It's not a question of what I want. It's what you want. You want to go home, don't you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Of course. More than anything. But maybe it would be better to wait. I've been thinking how dangerous it would be. Not just for me, but for you. You've been so kind. I'd feel terrible if anything happened to you. I can't tell you how touched I am by your concern for my welfare.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I hope you know that I'm your friend, Sansa. Your true friend.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I do, Lord Baelish.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Petyr.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Petyr.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: If you wish to stay, then of course you will stay.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: We'll speak again when I return.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're late.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What's she doing here?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Our business concerns her, too. Sit.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You'll be pleased to learn that after one conversation with Olenna Tyrell, I've saved the crown hundreds of thousands on this wedding.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Never mind that now. We have something important to discuss.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm Master of Coin. Saving money is important.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Stop that. You're making me uncomfortable.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Your sister has learned that your new friends the Tyrells are plotting to marry Sansa Stark to Ser Loras.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Very well. She's a lovely girl. Missing some of Loras' favorite bits, but I'm sure they'll make do.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Your jokes are not appreciated.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It wasn't my best, but-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I bring them into the royal fold and this is how they repay me, by trying to steal the key to the North out from under me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Sansa is the key to the North? I seem to remember she has an older brother.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The Karstarks have marched home. The young wolf has lost half his army. His days are numbered. Theon Greyjoy murdered both his brothers. That makes Sansa Stark the heir to Winterfell. And I am not about to hand her over to the Tyrells.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Tyrell army is helping us to win this war. Do you really think it's wise to refuse them?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: There's nothing to refuse. This is a plot. Plots are not public knowledge. And the Tyrells won't carry this one out until after Joffrey's wedding. We need to act first and kill this union in its crib.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And how do we do that?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: We find Sansa Stark a different husband.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Wonderful.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes, it is.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You can't mean it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I can and I do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey has made this poor girl's life miserable since the day he took her father's head. Now she's finally free of him and you give her to me? That's cruel even for you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you intend on mistreating her? The girl's happiness is not my concern, nor should it be yours.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She's a child!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She's flowered, I assure you. She and I have discussed it at length.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: There, you see? You will wed her, bed her, and put a child in her. Surely you're capable of that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And if I refuse?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You wanted to be rewarded for your valor in battle. Sansa Stark is a finer reward than you could ever dare hope for. And it is past time you were wed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I was wed. Or don't you remember?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Only too well.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You should be thanking the gods for this. This is more than you deserve.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion will do as he's bid. As will you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you mean?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You'll marry Ser Loras.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I will not.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The boy is heir to Highgarden. Tyrion will secure the North, you will secure the Reach.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, I won't do it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes, you will. You're still fertile. You need to marry again and breed.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I am Queen Regent, not some broodmare.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're my daughter! You will do as I command and you will marry Loras Tyrell and put an end to the disgusting rumors about you once and for all.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Father, don't make me do it again, please.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Not another word. My children. You've disgraced the Lannister name for far too long.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: It's always summer / Under the sea / I know I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The birds have scales / And the fish take wing / I know I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The rain is dry / and snow falls up / I know, I know / Oh, oh, oh. / The stones crack open / The water burns / The shadows come to dance / My lord / The shadows come to play / The shadows come to dance / My lord / The shadows come to stay.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You've got too much wood in there.

Name: sam
Subtitles: But the more wood, the bigger the fire.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: It needs to breathe. Take off that big log.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Huh. You know your fires.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Someone built your fires for you growing up?

Name: sam
Subtitles: It doesn't get so cold down in the Reach. And there were servants, of course.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I knew you were highborn.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, I found something at the Fist of the First Men. Buried treasure. Thousands of years old. I think.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What does it do?

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'm not sure that it does anything. It's beautiful, though, isn't it?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: How much longer?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Not so far. A few more days.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Is the Wall as big as they say?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Bigger. So big you can't even see the top sometimes. It's hidden in clouds.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You're playing with me.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'm not. It's seven hundred feet high, all made of ice. On a warm day you can see it weeping. Castle Black is nice enough. They keep a fire burning in the long hall day and night. And Hobb makes venison stew with onions. Very tasty. Sometimes, one of the brothers will sing. Dareon sings best.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'hobb'}, set(), set(), {'dareon'}]

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Do you sing?

Name: sam
Subtitles: No. No, no, no. Not very well.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sing me a song.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, all right. Let's see.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh ahem. The father's face is stern and strong / He sits and judges right from wrong / He weighs our lives, the short and long / And loves the little children / The mother gives the gift of life / And watches over every wife / Her gentle smile ends all strife /And she loves her little children.

Name: osha
Subtitles: That's not how you skin a rabbit.

Name: meera
Subtitles: I know how to skin a rabbit.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Not by the looks of it.

Name: osha
Subtitles: You grow up north of the Wall, you learn the proper way to handle game.

Name: meera
Subtitles: I didn't see any game before I got here.

Name: osha
Subtitles: If I had a bow, I could have shot a dozen rabbits.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Well, I made this bow myself. Guess you don't learn how to do that north of the Wall.

Name: osha
Subtitles: You learn how to use your fists, though.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Oh, you're gonna punch the rabbits to death?

Name: osha
Subtitles: I had someone else in mind.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Well, someone else is sitting right here.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You're both very good at skinning rabbits.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Some of us are just a little better.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Well, some of us would say thank you when someone else hunts down their breakfast for them. Or don't they teach you to say thank you north of the Wall?

Name: osha
Subtitles: You've got a big mouth, girl, and too many teeth.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Stop it!

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You've been fighting since you met. Just stop it.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Lady Reed here's got a stick so far up her ass, it's a wonder her feet touch the ground.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You've been nasty to her every day. Of course she's nasty back.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Me? It's my fault? First time I met her, she put a knife to my throat.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: First time I met you, you held a knife at me. We can't fight each other. We'll never make it to the Wall. I want you both to make peace.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Your way of skinning rabbits is quicker than mine.

Name: osha
Subtitles: I said so, didn't I?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Osha!

Name: osha
Subtitles: You're a good little hunter.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Thank you. See? Not so hard, is it? Thank you.

Name: osha
Subtitles: Don't push me.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Shh. I'm right here with you.

Subtitles: What's happening?

Name: meera
Subtitles: I'm right here with you.

Name: rickon
Subtitles: What's wrong with him?

Name: meera
Subtitles: The visions take their toll.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He's having one now?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I saw Jon Snow.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You saw him? At Castle Black?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: He was on the wrong side of the Wall surrounded by enemies.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Used to be you couldn't find a tree within a mile of the Wall. Crows would come out every morning with axes.

Name: orell
Subtitles: Your flock gets smaller every year.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You ever climbed it before?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: No. But Tormundo s done it half a hundred times. You're afraid.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aren't you?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Aye. It's a long way up and a long way down. But I've waited my whole life to see the world from up there. Here, sit down.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I brought a pair for you. They're too big for you, but they're good.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You kill someone for them?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Nah. I didn't kill him, but I bet his balls are still bruised.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: He wasn't good to me the way you're good to me. He didn't do that thing you do with your tongue.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Can we not talk about that here?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Can we not talk about that here? I'm Jon Snow. I've killed dead men and Qhorin Halfhand, but I'm scared of naked girls.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Did I seem scared the other day?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You were trembling like a leaf.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Only in the beginning.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Only in the beginning. You're a proper lover, Jon Snow. And don't worry. Your secret's safe with me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What secret?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Do you think I'm as dumb as all those girls in silk dresses you knew growing up? You're loyal and you're brave. You didn't stop being a crow the day you walked into Mance Rayder's tent.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: But I'm your woman now, Jon Snow. You're going to be loyal to your woman. The Night's Watch don't care if you live or die. Mance Rayder don't care if I live or die. We're just soldiers in their armies and there's plenty more to carry on if we go down.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: It's you and me that matters to me and you. Don't ever betray me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I won't.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Cause I'll cut your pretty cock right off and wear it 'round my neck.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Sink your metal deep and make sure it holds before taking your next step. And if you fall, don't scream. You don't want that to be the last thing she remembers.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Joffrey. Cersei. Ilyn Payne.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: You're good. You're not as good as you think you are.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Face, tits, balls- I hit 'em right where I wanted to.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Aye, but you took your sweet time of it. You won't be fighting straw men, little lady. Show me your position.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Keep your elbow high. You want your back doing the hard labor. You're holding. Never hold.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Your muscles tense up when you hold. Pull the string back to the center of your chin and release. Never hold.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But I have to aim.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Never aim.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Never aim?

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Your eye knows where it wants the arrow to go. Trust your eye.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: There's someone out there.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: That's about far enough.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: We come as friends.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Begging your pardon, m'lady, but we'll be the judge of that.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Valar morghulis.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Valar dohaeris. I don't see many priestesses of R'hollor in the Riverlands.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You are Thoros of Myr.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The High Priest gave you a mission. Turn King Robert away from his idols and towards the Lord of Light. What happened?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: I failed.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You quit, you mean. The heathen continue to slaughter each other and you continue to get drunk.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You worship Him in your way, and I'll worship Him in mine. Do you speak the common tongue?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: My friends here don't speak High Valyrian. Why are you here, my lady?

Name: beric
Subtitles: Forgive my manners. I don't see many ladies these days.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Lucky for the ladies.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: How many times has the Lord brought him back?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Six.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: That's not possible.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: The Lord has smiled upon me.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You should not have this power.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: I have no power. I ask the Lord for His favor, and He responds as He will.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: I've always been a terrible priest. Drank too much rum. Fucked all the whores in King's Landing. It's a terrible thing to say, but by the time I came to Westeros, I didn't believe in our Lord. I decided that He, that all the gods, were stories we told the children to make them behave. So I wore the robes and every now and then I'd recite the prayers, but it was just for show. A spectacle for the locals. Until the Mountain drove a lance through this one's heart. I knelt beside his cold body and said the old words. Not because I believed in them, but he was my friend and he was dead. And they were the only words I knew. And for the first time in my life, the Lord replied. Beric's eyes opened and I knew the truth. Our god is the one true god. And all men must serve Him.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'beric'}, set(), set()]

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You've been to the other side.

Name: beric
Subtitles: The other side? There is no other side. I have been to the darkness, my lady. He sent you to us for a reason.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You have someone He needs.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: Bodkin point. Penetrates plate at two hundred yards. Can you make 'em?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Yeah, nothing tricky about it. Just need decent steel.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: I'll get you the steel.

Name: man
Subtitles: Come on.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't like that woman.

Name: anguy
Subtitles: That's 'cause you're a girl.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What does that have to do with anything?

Name: beric
Subtitles: Forgive me, lad.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What are you doing? Let go of him.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Tell them to stop. Come on. He wants to be one of you. He wants to join the Brotherhood. Stop them!

Name: beric
Subtitles: We serve the Lord of Light and the Lord of Light needs this boy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Did the Lord of Light tell you that or did she?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're not doing this for your god. You're doing it for gold.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: We're doing it for both, girl. We can't defend the people without weapons and horses and food. And we can't get weapons and horses and food without gold.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You told me this was a Brotherhood. You told me I could be one of you.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You are more than they can ever be. They're just foot soldiers in the great war. You will make kings rise and fall.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're a witch. You're going to hurt him.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I see a darkness in you. And in that darkness, eyes staring back at me- brown eyes, blue eyes, green eyes. Eyes you'll shut forever. We will meet again.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You staring at my ass, Jon Snow?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Look out!

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You all right?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Just seeing if you can take a hit, lad.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Sorry. Were you sleeping?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Wa-

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Wa-? Wa-? Water? You want some water. I wish I had some for you.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: So let's play a game. Which body part do you need the least?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Please.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Please is not a body part.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'll tell you everything, please.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: But you've already told me everything. Remember? Your daddy was mean to you. The Starks didn't appreciate you. One good bit, though. The Stark boys, they're still alive. Wouldn't that be a hunt to remember? You failed, but I'm a better hunter than you.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Now how about your little finger? You don't use that for much, do you? No? Good. Let's start with that.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You've been wondering why you're here. Haven't you? Where you are. Who I am. Why I'm doing this to you. So guess. If you guess right, I'll tell you. By the old gods and the new, I swear it. You win the game if you can figure out who I am and why I'm torturing you and I win the game if you beg me to cut off your finger.

Subtitles: If I win, you'll let me go?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You say please again and you'll wish you hadn't. You first. Where are we?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The North.

Subtitles: Too vague.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Deepwood Motte.

Subtitles: Terrible guess.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Now, where?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Last Hearth.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Do I look like a fucking Umber to you?

Subtitles: Karhold!

Subtitles: No. It was just a guess.

Subtitles: Very good, Lord Theon. And who am I?

Subtitles: Torrhen Karstark.

Subtitles: You're right.

Subtitles: Lord Rickard Karstark is Robb Stark's bannerman. I betrayed Robb. That's why you're torturing me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Yes. You win.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Of course, you forgot to ask one question. You forgot to ask if I'm a liar.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I'm afraid I am.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Everything I told you is a lie.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: This isn't happening to you for a reason. Well, one reason- I enjoy it.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Please, cut it off! Cut it off! Cut it off!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I win.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Thank you for riding here so quickly. I know travel isn't easy in these times.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: The roads are crawling with cutthroats and bandits. But when the King of the North summons us, we come.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Our father has instructed us to tell you that his alliance with the North can continue if his terms are met. Lord Frey requires a formal apology for your violation of your sacred oath to marry one of his daughters.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: Of course. He deserves as much. I was in the wrong.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: As restitution for this betrayal, he demands Harrenhal and all its attendant lands.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I don't think that's-

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: We are fighting for the North. Harrenhal is not in the North. It is his once the war is over and we have no further strategic need for it.

Subtitles: And there's something else.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: We will do whatever we can to give Lord Frey what he needs.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: Not what, whom.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: What?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: No.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Our father requires Lord Edmure to wed one of his daughters- Roslin.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: How old is she?

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Nineteen.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Could I see her first?

Name: black walder
Subtitles: You want to count her teeth? We depart for the Twins in the morning. We need an answer before we leave and a wedding not more than a fortnight thereafter or this alliance is at an end.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Your father does realize we're in the middle of a war?

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Father is old. It will put his heart at peace if he could see her wed to a good husband.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: And his recent experience has made him wary of long engagements.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: He has every right to be. Please excuse us while we discuss it.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Why should I let that old ferret choose my bride for me? At the very least, I should be offered the same choice you were. I'm his liege lord.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: He's a proud man and we've wounded him.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I didn't wound him. My answer is no.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Listen to me and listen very carefully. You-

Name: edmure
Subtitles: The laws of gods and men are very clear. No man can compel another man to marry.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: The laws of my fist are about to compel your teeth.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: It's all right. You heard him. If you refuse, our alliance with the Freys is dead.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: He's wanted me for one of his daughters since I was 12. He's not gonna stop wanting it now. When I say no, he will come back and offer me a daughter of my choosing.

Name: catelyn stark
Subtitles: You're willing to risk our freedom and our lives for a chance at a prettier wife?

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I have a war to fight. We can't win it without them. I have no time to haggle. You said you wanted to make amends for the Stone Mill.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: You recall that heroic engagement?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I had something less permanent in mind.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: I've won every battle, but I'm losing this war. If we don't do this and do it now, we're lost.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I'll marry her.

Name: robb stark
Subtitles: You're paying for my sins, Uncle. It's not fair or right. I'll remember it.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: I see my men have finally found you something appropriate to wear.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Yes. Most kind of them. You're a Stark bannerman, Lord Bolton. I am acting on Lady Stark's orders to return Jaime Lannister to King's Landing.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: When King Robb left Harrenhal, his mother was his prisoner. If she wasn't his mother, he'd have hanged her for treason.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: I should send you back to Robb Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You should. But instead, you're sitting here watching me fail at dinner. Why might that be?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Wars cost money. Many people would pay a great deal for you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We both know who would pay the most. Or make you pay the most if he found out you had captured me and sent me back up north for a summary execution.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You're right. Perhaps the safest thing to do is to kill you both and burn your bodies.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It would be, if you honestly believed my father would never find out about it.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: King Robb is keeping your father quite busy. He doesn't have time for anything else.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He'll make time for you.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: As soon as you're well enough to travel, I will allow you to go to King's Landing as restitution for the mistakes my soldiers made. And you will swear to tell your father the truth, that I had nothing to do with your maiming.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Shall we drink on it?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: I don't partake.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You do understand how suspicious that is to ordinary people?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Very well. My lady, may our journey continue without further incident.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Oh, she won't be going with you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I am charged with bringing Ser Jaime to-

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You are charged with abetting treason.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm afraid I must insist.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You're in no place to insist on anything. I would have hoped you'd learned your lesson about overplaying your position.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Impossible.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Why?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: My grandson is the pride of Highgarden. The most desirable bachelor in all seven kingdoms. Your daughter-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Is rich, the most beautiful woman in all seven kingdoms and the mother of the king.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Old.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Old?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Old. I'm something of an expert on the subject. Her change will be upon her before long. I'll spare you the details of what will happen then. You men may have a stomach for bloodshed and slaughter, but this is another matter entirely.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The years punish us as well, I promise you that. My stomach remains quite strong, however. The only thing that might turn it are details of your grandson's nocturnal activities. Do you deny them?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Oh, not at all. A sword swallower through and through.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And a boy with his affliction should be grateful for the opportunity to marry the most beautiful woman in the kingdoms and remove the stain from his name.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Did you grow up with boy cousins, Lord Tywin? Sons of your father's bannermen, squires, stable boys?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And you never-

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Not once? Not in any way?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Never.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I congratulate you upon your restraint. But it's a natural thing, two boys having a go at each other beneath the sheets.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps Highgarden has a high tolerance for unnatural behavior.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I wouldn't say that. True, we don't tie ourselves in knots over a discreet bit of buggery, but brothers and sisters- where I come from, that stain would be very difficult to wash out.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I will not breathe further life into a malicious lie by discussing it.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Lie or not, you must admit many people find it quite convincing. Convincing enough to put swords in their hands and send them off to kill Lannisters and Tyrells thanks to our new affiliation.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I don't care what people believe. And neither do you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: As an authority on myself, I must disagree.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Now, if the rumors about my children were true, then Joffrey is no king at all and House Tyrell is throwing its prized flower into the dirt.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And if Cersei is too old to give Loras children, we're throwing another prized flower into the dirt. It is a chance we simply cannot take.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The uncertainty makes you uncomfortable. All right. I'll remove it for you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: If you refuse to marry Loras to Cersei, I will name him to the Kingsguard. I'm sure you're familiar with the Kingsguard vows. He will never marry. He will never have children.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Oh

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The Tyrell name will fade. And Highgarden will go to the children of Joffrey and Margaery.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You would have your grandson protected by someone who disgusts you?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I would have my grandson protected by a skilled warrior who takes his vows seriously. So, shall I draw up the order? Or do you consent to this marriage?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: It's a rare enough thing- a man who lives up to his reputation.

Name: orell
Subtitles: No!

Name: orell
Subtitles: We've gotta cut them loose!

Name: tormund
Subtitles: No!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Take my hand!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: That's a wonderful pin.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Oh, it's more of a brooch, really. Though I suppose a brooch is a sort of pin, so

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm very happy about

Name: loras
Subtitles: Uh, yes. I-I am as well.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I feel like I'm in a dream.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Yes, me, too. Definitely. I've dreamed of a large wedding since I was quite young. The guests, the food, the tournaments. And the bride, of course. The most beautiful bride in the world in a beautiful gown of gold and green brocade with fringed sleeves. Have you ever been to Highgarden, my lady?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No. I had never left Winterfell before I came to King's Landing. But it sounds wonderful. I can't wait to see it. And to leave this place.

Name: loras
Subtitles: It's terrible, isn't it? The most terrible place there is.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't suppose there's anything we can do about this.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We can have them both killed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's hard to say which of the four of us is getting the worst of this arrangement. Probably Sansa. Though Loras will certainly come to know a deep and singular misery.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Father doesn't discriminate. We're all being shipped off to hell together.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: On a boat you built.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Tyrells were plotting to undermine our family. I did what I did to protect our family.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm your family. A member of your family who has actively contributed to that family's survival. Whether or not you or Father or anyone else wants to admit it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I do admit it. If it weren't for your trick with the wildfire, Stannis would have sacked the city before Father got here. Our heads would still be rotting on the city gate.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Trying to have me killed is an odd way of saying thank you. There are two people in King's Landing who can give an order to a Kingsguard. Did you or did you not order Ser Mandon to kill me during the Battle of the Blackwater?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The impulse I understand. He hates me because I'm the only one who tells him what he really is. So, fair enough. He wants me dead. But his stupidity? He could have had me poisoned and no one would have known. But the king orders a Kingsguard to murder the Hand of the King in full view of his own army. The boy's an idiot.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you want me to say?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I want you to tell me if my life is still in danger.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Probably. But not from Joffrey. He won't do anything now Father's here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Seven kingdoms united in fear of Tywin Lannister.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Not the Tyrells. Soon they won't need to be afraid of him. Joffrey will belong to Margaery, the little doe-eyed whore. And so will his children and their children. History will be taken from our hands.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You may escape, at least. Once Jaime gets back, Ser Loras may come down with a terrible case of sword through bowels.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: When Jaime gets back, yes. But when do we think that's going to be? He's out there somewhere.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Jaime or not, I'm truly fucked.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Who's going to tell her?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Do you think people will like it?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I don't think they will even notice it.

Name: sansa stark

ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'bruni'}, set(), {'bruni'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: osha
Subtitles: I knew he'd come back. And he did. He came in through the back of the hut. Only it wasn't Bruni. Not really. His skin was pale like a dead man's. His eyes bluer than clear sky. He came at me, grabbed me by the neck and squeezed so hard I could feel the life slipping out of me. I don't know how I got the knife. When I did, I stuck it deep into his heart. And he hardly seemed to notice. I had to burn our hut down with him inside. I didn't ask the gods what it meant. I didn't need to. I already knew. It meant the North was no place for men to be. Not anymore. I promised your maester I'd get you to Castle Black and no further.

Subtitles: Then comes the army. Once the walls are breached, the city will fall in hours.

Subtitles: Or perhaps you'll lead Grey Worm and me to the slaughter, cutting the head off our army. The masters of Yunkai will pay you your fee and you won't have to split it three ways cause you've already slaughtered your partners.

Subtitles: You leave tonight.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You're the Queensguard, Ser Barristan. Your place is by the Queen. If we are truly her loyal servants, we'll do whatever needs to be done. No matter the cost, no matter our pride.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: We're west of Castle Black, but the Nightfort's closest to us. It was the first castle on the Wall. The Watch abandoned it during the reign of King Jaehaerys I. Too big, impossible to maintain. Other than Castle Black itself, the Nightfort's the perfect castle for us. It's got a secret sally port, the Black Gate, as old as the Wall itself. No one's used it for centuries, most likely. It leads through the Wall right down into the Nightfort, if no one knows how to find it, which, it just so happens I do.

Name: gilly

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Sorry. But they come over the Wall and raid, steal, carry off women.

Name: rickon
Subtitles: That's what Old Nan said.

Subtitles: I don't see any.

Subtitles: The Watch might send a few men looking for a horse thief. They'll send a lot more to hunt down murderers.

Subtitles: Ygritte!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Best part of the animal.

Subtitles: I know they're still there.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You check every five minutes like you're afraid they're gonna move.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not afraid.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Of course you are. You're almost there and you're afraid you won't make it. The closer you get, the worse the fear gets. No point in trying to hide behind that face. I know fear when I see it. Seen it a lot.

Name: arya stark

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: When Beric's sword went up in flames, you looked like a scared little girl.

Subtitles: It seems normal to you?

Subtitles: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.

Subtitles: You're a Lannister. I am the disgraced daughter of the traitor Ned Stark.

Subtitles: Everyone is mine to torment. You'd do well to remember that, you little monster.
