Subtitles: Any man who must say, 'I am the king' is no true king. I'll make sure you understand that when I've won your war for you.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: My father won the real war. He killed Prince Rhaegar. He took the crown while you hid under Casterly Rock!

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The king is tired. See him to his chambers.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Come along.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm not tired.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We have so much to celebrate. A wedding to plan. You must rest.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Grand Maester, perhaps some essence of nightshade to help him sleep.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I'm not tired!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Come.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Not you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You just sent the most powerful man in Westeros to bed without his supper.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're a fool if you believe he's the most powerful man in Westeros.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A treasonous statement. Joffrey is king.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You really think a crown gives you power?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No. I think armies give you power.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mm-hmm.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Robb Stark had one, never lost a battle, and you defeated him all the same.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, I know. Walder Frey gets all the credit. Or the blame, I suppose, depending on your allegiance. Walder Frey is many things, but a brave man? No. He never would have risked such an action if he didn't have certain assurances.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Which he got from me. Do you disapprove?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm all for cheating. This is war.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: But to slaughter them at a wedding. Explain to me why it is more noble to kill ten thousand men in battle than a dozen at dinner.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So that's why you did it? To save lives?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: To end the war. To protect the family. Do you want to write a song for the dead Starks? Go ahead, write one. I'm in this world a little while longer to defend the Lannisters, to defend my blood.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Northerners will never forget.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Good. Let them remember what happens when they march on the south. All the Stark men are dead. Winterfell is a ruin. Roose Bolton will be named Warden of the North until your son by Sansa comes of age.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I believe you still have some work to do on that score.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you think she'll open her legs for me after I tell her how we murdered her mother and brother?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: One way or another, you will get that girl pregnant.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I will not rape her.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Shall I explain to you in one easy lesson how the world works?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Use small words. I'm not as bright as you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The house that puts family first will always defeat the house that puts the whims and wishes of its sons and daughters first. A good man does everything in his power to better his family's position regardless of his own selfish desires.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Does that amuse you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, it's a very good lesson. Only it's easy for you to preach utter devotion to family when you're making all the decisions.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Easy for me, is it?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: When have you ever done something that wasn't in your interest but solely for the benefit of the family?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The day that you were born. I wanted to carry you into the sea and let the waves wash you away. Instead, I let you live. And I brought you as my son. Because you're a Lannister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Sansa.

Name: meera
Subtitles: It's empty.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Let's find a place to sleep.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor. Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Don't, Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Maybe we shouldn't stay.

Name: meera
Subtitles: You'd rather be out there?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: There are a lot of stories about this place. Horrible stories.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I always quite liked the horrible stories.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: So did I. Once.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You ever heard about the Rat Cook?

Name: meera
Subtitles: No. Who's he?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Just a cook in the Night's Watch. He was angry at the king for something, I don't remember. When the king was visiting the Nightfort, the cook killed the king's son, cooked him into a big pie with onions, carrots, mushrooms and bacon. That night he served the pie to the king. He liked the taste of his son so much, he asked for a second slice. The gods turned the cook into a giant white rat who could only eat his own young. He's been roaming the Nightfort ever since, devouring his own babies. But no matter what he does, he's always hungry.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: meera
Subtitles: If the gods turned every killer into a giant white rat-

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It wasn't for murder the gods cursed the Rat Cook or for serving the king's son in a pie. He killed a guest beneath his roof. That's something the gods can't forgive.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: The late Walder Frey,' old Hoster called me because I didn't get my men to the Trident in time for battle. He thought he was witty. Look at us now, Tully. You're dead, your daughter Catelyn's dead, your grandson's dead, your son spent his wedding night in a dungeon, and I'm Lord of Riverrun.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: The Blackfish escaped.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: An old man on the run with no allies. I have Tywin Lannister backing me. Who does he have?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: As you say.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: They all laughed at me, all those high lords. They all thought they were better than me. Ned Stark, Hoster Tully. People snigger when I marry a young girl, but who said a word when Jon Arryn married the little Tully bitch?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: You'll be needing a new young girl.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Yeah. Got that to look forward to.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: And you, the Warden of the North. No more Starks to bow and scrape to. Must have been torture following that stupid boy all over the country.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: He ignored my advice at every turn. If he'd been a trifle less arrogant-

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Calling himself the Young Wolf. How's that for pomposity?

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Well, here's to the Young Wolf!

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Forever young.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Will you move to Winterfell now that the war's over?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: At some point perhaps. But Winterfell's in ruins.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Yeah. What happened up there? I heard the Greyjoy boy seized the place. I heard he killed all the ravens. And after that, nothing.

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: I sent my bastard Ramsay to root him out. Robb Stark offered amnesty for the Ironborn if they gave us Theon.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Oh. And?

Name: roose bolton
Subtitles: Ramsay delivered the terms. The Ironborn turned on Theon as we knew they would. They handed him over trussed and hooded. But Ramsay- well Ramsay has his own way of doing things.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Well, the girls weren't lying. You had a good-sized cock.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: What? No. Pork sausage. You think I'm some sort of savage?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: People talk about phantom limbs. An amputee might have an itch where his foot used to be. So I've always wondered do eunuchs have a phantom cock?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Next time you think about naked girls, would you feel an itch?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Sorry. I shouldn't make jokes. My mother taught me not to throw stones at cripples.

Subtitles: Kill me.

Subtitles: Kill me!

Subtitles: You don't look like a Theon Greyjoy anymore. That's a name for a lord. But you're not a lord, are you? You're just meat.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Stinking meat.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You reek. Reek! That's a good name for you. What's your name?

Name: theon greyjoy

Subtitles: What's your name?

Subtitles: Th- Theon Greyjoy.

Subtitles: Please.

Subtitles: What is your name?!

Name: balon
Subtitles: Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands and invader of the North. I give you until the full moon to order all Ironborn scum out of the North and back to those shit-stained rocks you call a home.

Subtitles: On the first night of the full moon, I will hunt down every islander still in our lands and flay them living the way I flayed the twenty Ironborn scum I found at Winterfell. In the box you'll find a special gift- Theon's favorite toy. He cried when I took it away from him.'

Name: balon
Subtitles: Leave the North now or more boxes will follow with more Theon. Signed Ramsay Snow, natural-born son of Roose Bolton, Lord of the Dreadfort and Warden of the North.' Get that out of my sight.

Name: balon

Subtitles: The boy is a fool. He cannot further the Greyjoy line. I will not give up the lands I have seized, the strongholds I have taken. Get this away from me.

Subtitles: Great. Never better.

Name: davos
Subtitles: It was just a bit of blood.

Subtitles: I should have known. Every time a highborn asks my name, it's trouble. We're not really people to you, are we? Just a million different ways to get what you want.

Subtitles: I'm not a highborn.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: She called you Ser. I heard it.

Name: davos
Subtitles: A recent state of affairs. I was born in Flea Bottom just like you.

Subtitles: The shit that poured from their privy pipes flowed down the side of Aegon's Hill along Tanner's Row and right in front of my front door on Gin Alley.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Gin Alley.

Name: davos
Subtitles: The Street of Steel, with your armor and your knights? Pfft. You lived in the fancy part of town. And here we are now. Two boys from Flea Bottom in the castle of a king.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Yeah, we've come a long way. We're all the same, really. She went to great pains to point that out to me.

Name: davos
Subtitles: If you mistrust fancy people so much, why were you in such a hurry to trust her?

Name: gendry baratheon

Name: davos
Subtitles: She does know her way around a man's head, I'll give her that.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: So how'd you become a lord?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Oh, that's a long story.

Name: gendry baratheon

Name: davos

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You see? Highborns.

Name: davos

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Why did you?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I did it for my son. I didn't want him to step over a river of shit every time he stepped through his front door. I wanted him to have a better life.

Subtitles: Does he?

Name: davos
Subtitles: He's dead.

Subtitles: How'd he die?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Following me.

Name: shae
Subtitles: When I was thirteen.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You were only a child.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I stopped being a child when I was nine. My mother made sure of that.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You've been a good influence on our mutual friend, you know. He used to drink from sundown to sunup, visit three brothels a night, gamble away his father's money. Now it's just the drinking.

Name: shae
Subtitles: And now I'm his wife's servant. I brush her hair and clip her nails and empty her chamber pot.

Name: varys
Subtitles: She is a sweet young thing. None of this is her fault.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I love that girl. I would kill for her. Do you think that makes it easier for me?

Name: varys
Subtitles: No, I expect not.

Name: shae
Subtitles: She's young and she's beautiful and highborn.

Subtitles: We break bread with them, but that doesn't make us family. We've learned their language, but we'll never be their countrymen. If you let yourself believe that a foreign girl with no name could spend her life with the son of Tywin Lannister-

Name: shae
Subtitles: I have a name.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What do you want from me, Lord Varys?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Diamonds. I'd tell you to beware carrying so much wealth, but you know how to protect yourself. Get on one of those ships. Sail to Pentos or Lys or Myr. You can buy a house with these diamonds, a very large house. Hire servants. Start a new life, a good life, far from here. The mysterious foreign beauty. You'll have suitors lining up.

And you- you are a complication. I know you love him. And I know it's true love not bought by gold and silver. I'm not asking you to leave him for money. I'm asking you to leave because your presence in the capital endangers him. This will never be your home, my lady. Find a true home somewhere far from here while there's still time.

Subtitles: Leave.

Subtitles: You have children. How happy would you say you are?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Not very. But if it weren't for my children, I'd have thrown myself from the highest window in the Red Keep. They're the reason I'm alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Even Joffrey?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Even Joffrey. He was all I had once. Before Myrcella was born. I used to spend hours looking at him. His wisps of hair. His tiny little hands and feet. He was such a jolly little fellow. You always hear the terrible ones were terrible babies. 'We should have known. Even then we should have known.' It's nonsense. Whenever he was with me, he was happy. And no one can take that away from me, not even Joffrey- how it feels to have someone. Someone of your own.

I don't know if Robb Stark died because of the Red Woman's sorcery or because at war men die all the time, but I do know that uniting the Seven Kingdoms with blood magic is wrong. It is evil. And you are not an evil man.
