Name: shae
Subtitles: I want you. Don't you want me?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Things are a bit tense right now.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What things?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My nephew the king wants to murder me. My wife hates me because my father murdered her family. Oberyn Martell wants to murder everyone whose last name is Lannister.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You need to relax.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Don't you want to relax?

Name: shae
Subtitles: What's wrong?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I told you. It's not a good time.

Name: shae
Subtitles: It's never a good time. You have your child bride now.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Shae.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Do you love her?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Love her? I barely know her. She's a child. She despises me.

Name: shae
Subtitles: That's not an answer.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Of course I don't love her.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You tried to ship me away.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ship you away?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Give me diamonds and make me disappear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What in the world are you talking about?

Name: shae
Subtitles: If you want me to leave, just say it. Say it!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Shh. I don't know what you're talking about.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You want me to stay?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: A work of art, really. The craftsmanship is excellent.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You like it so much, you're welcome to chop off your own hand and take it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Such an ingrate. I spent days with the goldsmith - getting the details just right.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Days?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Better part of an afternoon. There, how does that feel?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Uh... a hook would be more practical.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Elegant, I think.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Thank you for your help with the other matter.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: The symptoms have abated?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Gone completely. I am in your debt, Maester Qyburn.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Not a maester, Your Grace, but happy to help whenever I can.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Odd little man.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I've grown rather fond of him. He's quite talented, you know?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What symptoms?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Symptoms that are not your concern.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You let him touch you?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You jealous?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm surprised. You never let Pycelle near you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You think I'd let that old lecher put his hands on me? He smells like a dead cat.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not sure I've ever smelled a dead cat.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Well, they smell like Pycelle.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You drink more than you used to.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Let's see, you started a brawl in the streets with Ned Stark and disappeared from the capital. My husband died in a tragic hunting accident.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It must have been traumatic for you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My only daughter was shipped off to Dorne. We suffered through a siege.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: A rather short siege.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A rather short siege that I didn't expect to survive. And now I'm marrying my eldest son to a wicked little bitch from Highgarden while I'm supposed to marry her brother, a renowned pillow biter. So...

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Father disowned me today.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He can't disown you. You're all he's got.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're forgetting Tyrion.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You don't really plan on staying in the Kingsguard, do you?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Staying in the Kingsguard means I live right here in the Red Keep with you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Not now.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I want... Not now? When? I've been back for weeks.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Something's changed.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Everything's changed. You come back after all this time with no apologies and one hand and expect everything to be the same?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What do you want me to apologize for?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: For leaving me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You think I wanted to be taken prisoner?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Don't know what you wanted. You weren't here. You left me alone.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape. Every day. I murdered people so I could be here with you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You took too long.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I... What are you saying?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm saying you took too long.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Go away.

Name: marei
Subtitles: Forgive me, Your Grace. You told me to come at once if there was anything important.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You plan on killing all the crows yourself?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Do you plan on sitting here scratching your balls till winter?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We wait for Mance's orders.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: You sent a man over the Wall at the full moon. If he's not back yet, he's not coming back.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: And what is it you want? March on Castle Black with just this lot? Your pretty crow said 1,000 men are nesting there.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: Yeah, well, he's a liar.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: He is? Shouldn't it be "he was"? You said you put three arrows in him.

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I did.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I've seen you slip a shaft through a rabbit's eye at 200 yards. If that boy's still walking, it's 'cause you let him go.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Thenns. I fucking hate Thenns.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Mance sent you?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: How did you find us?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You came from the south, not the north.

Name: warg
Subtitles: Took a detour. Got some supper from a village down that way.

Name: styr
Subtitles: Why does the meat down here taste so much better than it does on our side of the Wall?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Help yourself.

Name: styr
Subtitles: Maybe everything's just better fed down here.

Name: styr
Subtitles: Fat and lazy. Easier for us, hmm?

Name: styr
Subtitles: You didn't see us coming? Lost your warg? And that baby crow you had with you, lost him too?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I'll answer to Mance. I won't answer to you.

Name: styr
Subtitles: She yours?

Name: ygritte
Subtitles: I'm not anybody's.

Name: styr
Subtitles: Too scrawny. Not like those crows at Castle Black.

Name: styr
Subtitles: Think of them stuck in their larders stuffing their faces with ham and blood sausage and stew, getting nice and fat and marbled.

Name: styr
Subtitles: I know we've had our differences, Tormund, but just one time before you die, you really ought to try crow.

Name: officer
Subtitles: Draw. Loose.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Last time I saw him, he was in the courtyard at Winterfell. "He said, " Next time I see you, you'll be all in black." I was jealous of Robb my whole life. The way my father looked at him, I wanted that. He was better than me at everything... fighting and hunting and riding and girls. Gods, the girls loved him. I wanted to hate him, but I never could.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Sometimes I want to hate you.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Well, you're better than me at everything. Except reading.

Name: sam
Subtitles: They're... they're ready for you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's wanted to hang me for a while. Now's his chance.

Name: sam
Subtitles: No one's going to hang you. You've done nothing wrong.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I've done plenty wrong.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: So you admit you murdered Qhorin Halfhand?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I didn't murder him.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: No? You put your sword through a brother of the Night's Watch. What do you call that?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He wanted me to kill him.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: A bastard son of a traitor. What would you expect?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Halfhand believed our only chance to stop Mance was to get a man inside his army.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Don't talk about the Halfhand as if you knew him. He was my brother.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Then you'd know he'd do anything to defend the Wall. The free folk would have boiled him alive, but letting me kill him...

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: The free folk? Listen to him. He even talks like a wildling now.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aye, I talk like a wildling. I ate with the wildlings. I climbed the Wall with the wildlings. I... I laid with a wildling girl.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: You admit to breaking your vows, then?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I do.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: The law is the law. The boy must die.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: If we beheaded every ranger who lay with a girl, the Wall would be manned by headless men.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: There's a difference between sneaking off to the Mole's Town brothel and sleeping with the enemy.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: While we sit here debating which rules I broke, Mance Rayder marches on the Wall with an army of 100,000.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: Impossible. You can't get 50 wildlings together before they start killing each other.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: 100,000. He's united the Thenns, the Hornfoots, the ice-river clans. He has giants fighting for him.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: Giants?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Have you ever been beyond the Wall, ser?

Name: janos slunt
Subtitles: I commanded the City Watch of King's Landing, boy.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And now you're here. You must not have been very good at your job.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: How dare you?!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's a band of wildlings south of the Wall already led by Tormund Giantsbane. I killed their warg and three others. They shot me full of arrows. Their orders are to attack Castle Black from the south when Mance hits it from the north. The signal for the attack will be a bonfire. Mance said it would be the greatest fire the North has ever seen. That's the truth. All the truth.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you intend to execute me or am I free to go?

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: None of us are free. We are men of the Night's Watch. But we won't be taking your head today, Jon Snow. Go on.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: I am acting commander here, Maester Aemon.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: Yes, you are.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: And I don't trust the bastard.

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: He told the truth.

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: And you always know when a man's telling a lie? How did you acquire this magical power?

Name: maester aemon
Subtitles: I grew up in King's Landing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: No. No. You're a queen, not an ox.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Your grandfather gave me a necklace just like this one for my 51st nameday.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The wedding is in a fortnight, Grandmother. You can't say no to everything.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Nonsense.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: My little dears. Go and speak to the jewelers of King's Landing. Tell them who you are, tell them who sent you. The one who brings me the best necklace will get to keep the next best.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: The Margaery Tyrell who walks into the sept a fortnight from now will inspire 1,000 songs. Now, how sad it will be if she's wearing rubbish like that.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Perhaps I should just let Joffrey choose it for me. End up with a string of dead sparrow heads around my neck.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You watch that. Even here, even with me.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: My word.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: My lady. My lady. Please pardon me for interrupting. My name is Brienne of Tarth.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: We know who you are. We've heard all about you. But hearing is one thing. Aren't you just marvelous? Absolutely singular.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I hear you knocked my grandson into the dirt like the silly little boy he is.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: My lady, I know this is a very busy time for you, but if I could just have a moment.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You dare not refuse.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: A shadow?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I swear to you by all the gods it was Stannis. He plunged his sword through Renly's heart and disappeared. One day, my lady, I will avenge our king.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Joffrey is our king now.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I meant no offense.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: And you've given none.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: All the Kingsguard will be on duty, of course. Ser Boros will be stationed here. Ser Preston will be stationed here beside the primary entertainment. Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Yes, yes, one guard at the... the thing. Go on.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ser Meryn will guard Lady Margaery and Tommen.

Name: meryn
Subtitles: I've always guarded the king himself, my lord. Ever since your absence.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And I thank you for it, Ser Meryn. All very good. I don't expect any trouble.

Name: meryn
Subtitles: The people love their king. They know who keeps them fed.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Margaery Tyrell, I've heard.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: By my leave. They know I saved the city. They know I won the war.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The war's not won. Not while Stannis lives.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I broke Stannis on the Blackwater. Pity you weren't there to help, Uncle.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: My apologies, Your Grace. I was rather busy.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Busy getting captured.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: So this is the famous "Book of Brothers"? All the great deeds of all the great Kingsguard. Ser Arthur Dayne. The Sword of the Morning. Led the attack on the Kingswood Brotherhood. Defeated the Smiling Knight in single combat. Ser Duncan the Tall. Four pages for Ser Duncan. He must have been quite a man.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: So they say.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Ser Jaime Lannister.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Someone forgot to write down all your great deeds.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: There's still time.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Is there? For a 40-year-old knight with one hand? How can you protect me with that?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I use my left hand now, Your Grace. Makes for more of a contest.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Have you ever been to Meereen?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Several times, Your Grace, with Master Kraznys.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: They say 1,000 slaves died building the Great Pyramid of Meereen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And now an army of former slaves is marching to her gates. You think the Great Masters are worried?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: If they're smart, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You were told to ride at the back of the train.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Yes, my queen. But I need to speak to you about something important. A matter of strategy.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: All right, what is this matter of strategy?

Name: daario
Subtitles: A dusk rose.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Would you like to walk at the back of the train instead of riding?

Name: daario
Subtitles: And this one's called lady's lace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Would you like to walk without shoes?

Name: daario
Subtitles: You have to know a land to rule it. It's plants, it's rivers, it's roads, it's people. Dusk rose tea eases fever. Everyone in Meereen knows that. Especially the slaves who have to make the tea. If you want them to follow you, you have to become a part of their world. Strategy.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daario
Subtitles: Harpy's Gold. No tea from this one. Beautiful but poisonous.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You are a gambler, aren't you?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: There's one on every mile marker between here and Meereen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many miles are there between here and Meereen?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: 163, Your Grace. I'll tell our men to ride ahead and bury them. You don't need to see this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You will do no such thing. I will see each and every one of their faces. Remove her collar before you bury her.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: There she is.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Yes, there she is.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: And? You made a promise.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: To return the Stark girls to their mother who is now dead.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: To keep them safe.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Well, Arya Stark hasn't been seen since her father was killed. Where do you think she is? My money's on dead. There's a certain safety in death, wouldn't you say? And Sansa Stark is now Sansa Lannister. Bit of a complication.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: A complication does not release you from a vow.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What do you want me to do? Kidnap my sister-in-law? And take her where? Where would she be safer than here?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Look me in the eye and tell me that you think she'll be safe in King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Are you sure we're not related? Ever since I've returned, every Lannister I've seen has been a miserable pain in my ass. Maybe you're a Lannister, too. You've got the hair for it if not the looks.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: It's all right. It's all right. It's all right.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're drunk.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Yes. I have good reason to be. Once I was a knight. Now I'm only a fool. Don't you know me?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Ser Dontos. The king's nameday celebration. I'm sorry. I should have remembered.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: I can't accept your apology. I may be a fool, but I'm a living fool, thanks to you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Anyone would have done the same.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: But only you did. I can never repay you. You gave me my life. But this, this is worth more than my life.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: It belonged to my mother and her mother before her. House Hollard was strong once. House on the rise. That's all that's left of those days, thanks to a few sad, fat drunks like me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I can't take it. It's very, very kind of you, but I can't.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: I don't have anything else left. That's all. Take it. Wear it. Let my name have one more moment in the sun before it disappears from the world.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'll wear it with pride, Ser Dontos.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Yeah.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: When am I going to get a horse of my own?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: The little lady wants a pony.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The little lady wants away from your stench.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Horses aren't easy to come by. Even if they were, you think I'm gonna put you on your own horse? Watch the only thing of value I've got in the world ride away?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why don't you have any money? Didn't you steal anything from Joffrey before you left?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: No.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're not very smart, are you?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I'm not a thief.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're fine with murdering little boys, but thieving is beneath you?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: A man's got to have a code.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You think I'm gonna escape? Where would I go? I'd be dead by nightfall without you. My family's gone. I've got no one.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You've got an aunt in the Vale. Your rich Aunt Lysa. After I sell you to her, maybe she'll have enough left over to buy you that pony you want so much.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm hungry. You're hungry.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Five horses, five men. More than I feel like killing on an empty stomach.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I know him. The small one. His name is Polliver. He captured us and took us to Harrenhal.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He killed Lommy.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: What the fuck's a Lommy?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He was my friend. Polliver stole my sword and put it right through his neck. He's still got it.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Got what?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My sword Needle.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Needle? Of course you named your sword.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Lots of people name their swords.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Lots of cunts.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: What are you... get back here.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My brother gave me that sword.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Get back here.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He killed my friend.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I don't care if he ate your friend. We're not going in there.

Name: man
Subtitles: Come on, give it up.

Name: man
Subtitles: Come here.

Name: man
Subtitles: Let's have a feel there.

Name: man
Subtitles: Leave it.

Name: innkeeper
Subtitles: Please, she's a good girl.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: Shut your mouth and pour us more ale and we may not take her with us when we're done with her.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: I know you.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: You're the Hound.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: Pour our new friend some ale. What brings you so far north?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I could ask the same of you. What are you doing up here?

Name: polliver
Subtitles: Just keeping the king's peace.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: No need. The war's over.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: So I've heard. Stannis defeated at the Blackwater. Robb Stark killed at the Twins. And where am I for all of it? Stuck with your brother. Meaning no offense.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: None taken.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: He's good, the Mountain is. Best at what he does. But torture, torture, torture, torture. You spend enough time putting the hammer to people, you start to feel like a carpenter making chairs. Drains the fun right out of it. And what's life without a little fun?

Name: polliver
Subtitles: But I don't need to tell you that, eh?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: She's all right. I've had better.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: You know what? You should come with us. His kind, they've always got something hidden away somewhere. Gold, silver, more daughters. Always something if you know how to make them talk. And there's plenty of him between here and King's Landing. You could do well for yourself. We certainly have been.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I'm not going to King's Landing.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: Think about it. We could do whatever we like wherever we go. These are the king's colors. No one's standing in his way now. Which means no one's standing in ours.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Fuck the king.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: When I heard that Joffrey's dog had tucked tail and run from the Battle of the Blackwater, I didn't believe it. But here you are.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Here I am. Bring me one of those chickens.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: You got money to pay for it?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You paid for it?

Name: polliver
Subtitles: No. But we're the king's men. So, you got money?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Not a penny.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I'll still take that chicken.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: Tell you what. We'll trade you. One of our little chickens for one of yours. Give us a go at your friend. Lowell there likes them a bit broken in.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're a talker. Listening to talkers makes me thirsty.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Ah. And hungry. Think I'll take two chickens.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: You don't seem to understand the situation.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I understand that if any more words come pouring out of your cunt mouth, I'm gonna have to eat every fucking chicken in this room.

Name: polliver
Subtitles: You lived your life for the king. You're gonna die for some chickens?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Someone is.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Something wrong with your leg, boy?

Name: polliver
Subtitles: What? What do you mean?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Can you walk? I've got to carry you?

Name: polliver
Subtitles: Carry me?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Fine little blade.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Maybe I'll pick my teeth with it.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tansy! Tansy! Tansy!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tansy! Tansy!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: There you are.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I can't see her, Ramsay.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tansy!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: If you make it out of the woods, you win! Run, Tansy, run!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tansy.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Where is she?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tansy, Tansy, Tansy!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Good girls. Down, girls. Down. Well done. You, too.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I only wounded her.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You brought her down. That's what matters. A fine shot. Wasn't it, Reek?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: A fine shot, master. My lady.

Name: tansy
Subtitles: Please, my lord. It hurts.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Oh, sweet. Don't cry. It will be over soon.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: She thinks she's pretty. Let me put one through her face.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: We have to reward the hounds, love. They did all the hard work.

Name: tansy
Subtitles: Why? I did whatever you asked.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: But you made Myranda feel jealous.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Me jealous of her?

Name: tansy
Subtitles: My lord, please.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You can see that your presence has become a bit of a problem.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Rip her! Rip her! Rip her!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Not so pretty now.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your new hand, it's nicer than the old one. Wouldn't you agree, Pod?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Is it solid gold?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Gilded steel.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're not eating. Why is no one eating? My wife wastes away and my brother starves himself.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not hungry.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You lost a hand, not a stomach. Try the boar. Cersei can't get enough of it since one killed Robert for her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A toast. To the proud Lannister children. The dwarf, the cripple, and the mother of madness.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Oh!

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I'll clean it up.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, I'll do it. Leave us.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's only wine.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I can't fight anymore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What about your left?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I can hold a sword, but all my instincts are wrong. How can I protect the king when I can hardly wipe my own ass?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're the Lord Commander now. Command. Let others do the fighting. When was the last time Father used a sword?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not Father. I'm the Kingslayer. When people find out I can't slay a pigeon...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Train, then. Learn to fight with your other hand.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: With whom? You? Men talk. Soon as someone discovers I can't fight, he'll tell everyone.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You need a proper, discreet swordsman. As it happens, I have just the one.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: My brother tells me you can keep your mouth shut. Unusual talent for a sellsword.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: He tells me you shit gold just like your father.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Is this place safe?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: There's this knight, Leygood, got thunderbolts on his shield.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Uh-huh.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Right here is where I fuck his wife. She's a screamer, that one. If they don't hear her, they won't hear us.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I've never seen Valyrian steel before. She's a beauty. The problem is, if you fight with an edged blade, I'll have to.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: And if I fight with an edged blade, I'll have no one left to pay me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I haven't used a sparring sword since I was nine.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ah! Bold warrior you are, attacking a man when his guardo s down.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Best time to attack a man.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Mind yourself. JAIME; If I still had my right hand...

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Plan on growing it back?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Come on, then.

Name: man
Subtitles: Open the gates!

Name: man
Subtitles: Riders coming in! Let's get these horses seen to!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Father. Welcome home.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Walda, this is Ramsay Snow, my bastard.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: A pleasure, Mother.

Name: walda
Subtitles: Hello.

Name: roose
Subtitles: See that the horses are fed, watered, and rubbed down. And take Lady Walda to her chambers.

Name: woman
Subtitles: This way, my lady.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Where is your prize?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: With the hounds. I'll have a look at him.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I hear you took a hand from the Kingslayer.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Word travels. How he screamed. You would have loved it.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Father.

Name: roose
Subtitles: What did you do to him?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I trained him. He was a slow learner, but he learned.

Name: roose
Subtitles: You flayed him.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Peeled a few bits. Removed a few others.

Name: roose
Subtitles: This was Balon Greyjoy's son and heir.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: We've been flaying our enemies for a thousand years. The flayed man is on our banners.

Name: roose
Subtitles: My banners, not yours. You're not a Bolton. You're a Snow. Tywin Lannister has given me the North. But he won't lift a finger to help me take it. As long as the Ironborn hold Moat Cailin, our armies are trapped south of the Neck. Theon was a valuable hostage, not your plaything. I wanted to trade him for Moat Cailin.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I already asked. Lord Greyjoy refused. Savages have no-

Name: roose
Subtitles: You sent terms to Balon Greyjoy without my consent?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You made me acting Lord of the Dreadfort. I acted.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I had to smuggle myself into my own lands thanks to the Greyjoys. I needed Theon. I needed him whole.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Theon was our enemy. But Reek, Reek will never betray us.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I placed far too much trust in you.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Reek, how could you let me stand before my father unshaven? It's disrespectful.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm sorry, my lord.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Give him the razor.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: If I'm not a Bolton, Father, what does it matter?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Go on, Reek. A nice close shave.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Reek, tell Father where are Bran and Rickon Stark?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't know, my lord.

Name: roose
Subtitles: You murdered them and displayed their corpses at Winterfell.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Reek, did you murder the Stark boys?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No, my lord. Just two farm boys.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: And crisped them so no one would know.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes, my lord.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: The Starks have always ruled the North. If Bran and Rickon are alive, the country will rally to their side now that Robb Stark is gone.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Oh, that's right, Reek. Robb Stark is dead. Sorry. I know he was like a brother to you. But my father put a knife through his heart. How do you feel about that?

Name: roose
Subtitles: You ready for a hunt?

Name: meryn trant
Subtitles: Always. Find those boys and I'll give you a thousand acres and a holdfast.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Your pet rat have any thoughts on which way they went after Winterfell?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Jon Snow is at Castle Black.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Who the fuck is Jon Snow?

Name: roose
Subtitles: Their bastard brother. He could be sheltering them. He may know where they are.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Even if he doesn't, he's half Stark himself. Could be a threat.

Name: roose
Subtitles: You want to prove yourself a Bolton? Gather whatever men you can and ride for Moat Cailin. Bring this creature of yours. Maybe he'll be of some use. Take the Moat for the family, for our family, and I'll reconsider your position.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Lord Varys. Breakfasting with the king?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I'm afraid foreigners aren't welcome at such exclusive affairs.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, to be foreign.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Ahem.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Shae has been noticed. Sansa's maid saw you with her. She already told your sister. It's only a matter of time before your father hears.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So I'm guilty of being seen with my own wife's handmaiden. My father will ask you if there's anything more and you'll tell him some clever lie.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No, I will not. How long do you imagine your father and sister would let me live if they suspected me of lying? I have no pet sellsword to protect me. No legendary brother to avenge me. Only little birds who whisper in my ear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Forgive me if I don't weep for you.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No one weeps for spiders or whores. I have friends across the sea who could help her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She won't leave. I've told her this is a dangerous place so many times, she no longer believes it.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Your father has promised to hang the next whore he finds you with. Have you ever known your father to make an idle threat?

Name: mace
Subtitles: From House Tyrell and the people of the Reach, Your Grace, it is my honor to present you with this wedding cup.

Name: mace
Subtitles: May you and my daughter Margaery drink deep and live long.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: A handsome goblet, my lord. Or shall I call you Father?

Name: mace
Subtitles: I shall be honored, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She's the whore I told you about. The dark-haired one.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Have her brought to the Tower of the Hand before the wedding.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: A book?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Lives of Four Kings." Grand Maester Kaeth's history of the reigns of Daeron the Young Dragon, Baelor the Blessed, Aegon the Unworthy, and Daeron the Good. A book every king should read.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Now that the war is won, we should all find time for wisdom. Thank you, Uncle.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: One of only two Valyrian steel swords in the capital, Your Grace, freshly forged in your honor.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Careful, Your Grace. Nothing cuts like Valyrian steel.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: So they say.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Such a great sword should have a name. What shall I call her?

Name: man
Subtitles: Stormbringer.

Name: man
Subtitles: Terminus.

Name: man
Subtitles: Widow's Wail.

Name: man
Subtitles: Wolfsbane.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Widow's Wail. I like that. Every time I use it, it'll be like cutting off Ned Stark's head all over again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Don't.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You want me on the desk? What's wrong, my lion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Don't call me that.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What should I call you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm afraid our friendship can't continue.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Our friendship?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: There's a ship waiting in the harbor bound for Pentos.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You'll have your own cabin, of course, and, across the Narrow Sea, a house, servants.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What is this?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm a married man. My wife has suffered a great deal, as you well know. I don't want her to suffer anymore on my account. I need to uphold my vows.

Name: shae
Subtitles: She doesn't want you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I need to do right by her.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You don't want her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: By our children.

Name: shae
Subtitles: What are you afraid of?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm not afraid.

Name: shae
Subtitles: You are. You are afraid of your father and your sister. You're going to run from them all your life?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I need you to leave.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I'm not afraid of them. I'm not going to run.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Shae.

Name: shae
Subtitles: We will fight them together. It's like you said, I am yours and you are mine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're a whore! Sansa is fit to bear my children and you are not. I can't be in love with a whore. I can't have children with a whore. How many men have you been with? Five hundred? Five thousand?

Name: shae
Subtitles: How many whores have you been with?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I have enjoyed my time with all of them and I have enjoyed my time with you most of all. But now that time is over.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You'll have a comfortable life in Pentos. Bronn will escort you to your ship.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Hear us now. Accept these tokens of our faith, my lord, and lead us from the darkness.

Name: axell florent
Subtitles: Sire, I served you well.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Lord of Light, show us the way...

Name: axell florent
Subtitles: Selyse, you're my sister!

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Yours are the stars that guide us.

Name: axell florent
Subtitles: Tell him! Tell him!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Lord of Light, protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Did you see? Their souls. It was their souls. Our lord took them. Did you see?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Lord Florent was your brother by law.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: He was an infidel.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He worshipped the gods of his fathers and their fathers before him. They were the gods of your fathers, too.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I ordered him to tear down his idols. He disobeyed.

Name: davos
Subtitles: How many ships did he bring to your 'cause? How many men?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: A good deal more than you.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Did you see, Ser Davos? They're with our lord now. Their sins all burned away. Did you see?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'm sure they're more than grateful, my queen.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Meat's off.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Our larders are almost empty.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Serve fish, then. We're on an island.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You hate fish.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I hate a good many things, but I suffer them all the same.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: When Storm's End was under siege and I was starving, Stannis boiled soup for me from books. The binding glue is made from horses. One morning, he shot two seagulls on the beach. I've never tasted anything as good as grilled seagull. Do you remember?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Of course I remember.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Have you ever known true hunger, my lady?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: It's all I knew when I was a child.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Until you found the Lord of Light?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Until he found me.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: I fear for our daughter's soul.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Every mother should fear for her childo s soul.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: She's a stubborn little beast.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: She's a child.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You barely know her. You think she's sweet because she smiles when you visit. She's sullen and stubborn and sinful. Why else would the Lord of Light have seen fit to mark her face? She needs the rod.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: She's my daughter. You will not strike her.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: As you command. Perhaps the Lady Melisandre could speak with her.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Were you sleeping, Princess?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Did you watch the ceremony on the beach?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: I heard it.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: And it frightened you?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Ser Axell was my uncle. He was always kind to me.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: They're in a better place now, Princess. The fire cleansed them of the sins of the world.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: But they screamed.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Women scream when they give birth. Afterward they are filled with joy.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Afterward they aren't ash and bone.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You have so many questions, don't you? So did I when I was a child. I was much like you. Only I wasn't a princess.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: And you didn't have this.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: No. But I suffered in other ways, sweet girl, believe me. What do you know of the gods?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: I read "The Seven-Pointed Star."

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Lies and fables. Septons speak of seven gods. There are but two... a god of light and love and joy and a god of darkness, evil, and fear. Eternally at war.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: There are no seven heavens and no seven hells?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: There's only one hell, Princess. The one we live in now.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Why did you wake me?

Name: meera
Subtitles: You've been gone for hours.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I was hungry.

Name: meera
Subtitles: We're all hungry.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I was just eating.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Summer was eating. Your body can't live on the food your wolf consumes. Spending too much time in Summer's skin is dangerous. You're not a direwolf, Bran.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Must be glorious, though. To run, to leap, to hunt. To be whole. I know that's tempting, but if you're trapped in Summer for too long, you'll forget what it was to be human.

Name: meera
Subtitles: You'd forget us, Bran. You'd forget your mother and father. You'd forget your brothers and sisters. You'd forget Winterfell. You'd forget you. And if we lose you, we lose everything.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Hodor, take me to the tree.

Name: threeeyed raven
Subtitles: Look for me... beneath the tree.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He saw us.

Name: threeeyed raven
Subtitles: North.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I know where we have to go.

Name: septon
Subtitles: Let it be known that Margaery of House Tyrell and Joffrey of the Houses Lannister and Baratheon are one heart, one flesh, one soul. Cursed be he who would seek to tear them asunder.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: With this kiss, I pledge my love.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We have a new queen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Better her than you.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Bit much, wouldn't you say?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: It feels proportionate.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Proportionate to what?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: The expected extravagance.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: People who spend their money on this sort of nonsense tend not to have it for long.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You ought to try enjoying something before you die. You might find it suits you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Not now, Mace. Lord Tywin and I are speaking.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Anyway, I don't know what you're complaining about. I'm paying my share.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Shall we stick golden roses in half the meat pies to commemorate your generosity?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: No, your heartfelt thank you is its own reward. I would imagine I'd be hearing it again before long. Wars are rather expensive. "The Iron Bank will have it's due." How they love to remind everyone. Almost as much as you Lannisters with your debts.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I'm not worried about the Iron Bank.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: We both know you're smarter than that. Come, Tywin, let us celebrate young love.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: All taken care of.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You saw her board the ship?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Aye, she's on it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You saw the ship sail away?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: No one knows she's there but you, me, and Varys.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How do you know?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Because if someone follows me without an invitation, I'm the last person they ever follow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: There's someone following you?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: She's gone. I know you don't want to believe it, but she is. Now, go drink till it feels like you did the right thing.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Hello.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Hello.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Not you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You look exquisite, child. The wind has been at you, though. I haven't had the opportunity to tell you how sorry I was to hear about your brother. War is war, but killing a man at a wedding, horrid. What sort of monster would do such a thing? As if men need more reasons to fear marriage.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My lady. My lady.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion, you see? Not as bad as all that. Perhaps if your pauper husband were to sell his mule and his last pair of shoes, he might be able to afford to bring you to Highgarden for a visit. Now that peace has come and all is right with the world, it would do you good to see some of it. You must excuse me. It's time I ate some of this food I paid for.

Name: musician
Subtitles: A coat of gold / Or a coat of red / A lion still has claws And mine, my lord...

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Very good. Very good. Off you go.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: My love, why don't we make the announcement?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Everyone. The queen would like to say a few words.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: We are so fortunate to enjoy this marvelous food and drink. Not all among us are so lucky. To thank the gods for bringing the recent war to a just end, King Joffrey has decreed that the leftovers from our feast be given to the poorest in his city.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're an example to us all.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Ser Jaime, I'm very sorry.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ser Loras, it's quite all right. Your sister looks very beautiful.

Name: loras
Subtitles: As does yours.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: So, looking forward to your wedding?

Name: loras
Subtitles: Yes, very much.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Our fathers are both rather keen on the prospect.

Name: loras
Subtitles: They certainly are.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps they should get married. If you were to marry Cersei, she'd murder you in your sleep. If you somehow managed to put a child in her first, she'd murder him, too, long before he drew his first breath. Luckily for you, none of this will happen because you'll never marry her.

Name: loras
Subtitles: And neither will you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Your Grace. My king. My queen.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Lady Brienne. So good of you to come.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm no lady, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Did you just bow?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Apologies, Your Grace. I never did master the curtsy.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: You're the one who put a sword through Renly Baratheon.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: That's not true, my love. Brienne had nothing to do with it.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: A shame. I'd knight the man that put an end to that deviant's life.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I just wanted to congratulate you both and wish you good fortune. The country has been at war too long. I hope your reign is long and peaceful.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Yes, yes.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Thank you. I hope we see more of you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Lady Brienne. You're Lord Selwyn Tarth's daughter. That makes you a lady whether you want to be or not.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: As you say, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I owe you my gratitude. You returned my brother safely to King's Landing.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: In truth, he rescued me, Your Grace. More than once.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Did he? Haven't heard that story before.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Not such a fascinating story, I'm afraid.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure you have many fascinating stories. Sworn to Renly Baratheon. Sworn to Catelyn Stark. And now my brother. Must be exciting to flit from one camp to the next serving whichever lord or lady you fancy.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I don't serve your brother, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: But you love him.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: No, no, come to my chambers and I will examine you personally.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She'll do no such thing.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Oh, Your Grace. Yes, well, this young lady sought my advice...

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You should see Qyburn. He's quite good.

Name: maid
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Qyburn? Deplorable man. Brought shame on the Citadel with his repugnant experiments.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: More repugnant than your gnarled fingers on that girl's thighs?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your Grace, I am a man of learning.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My little brother had you sent to the Black Cells when you annoyed him. What do you think I could do to you if you annoyed me?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: I never meant to annoy anyone.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: But you are. You annoy me right now. Every breath you draw in my presence annoys me. So here's what I want you to do. I want you to leave my presence. Leave this wedding right now. Go to the kitchens and instruct them that all the leftovers from the feast will be brought to the kennels.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your Grace, Queen Margaery-

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The queen is telling you the leftovers will feed the dogs or you will.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: A gold dragon to whoever knocks my fool's hat off.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're in rather a good mood.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I suppose I am.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I won't ask why.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Small pleasures.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Your Grace. Lord Tywin.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Prince Oberyn.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: I don't believe you have met Ellaria. This is the Lord Hand Tywin Lannister and Cersei Lannister, the Queen Regent. I suppose it is former Queen Regent now. Lord Hand and Lady Cersei, Ellaria Sand.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: My lord. My lady.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Charmed.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Can't say I've ever met a Sand before.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: We are everywhere in Dorne. I have 10,000 brothers and sisters.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Bastards are born of passion, aren't they? We don't despise them in Dorne.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No? How tolerant of you.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: I expect it is a relief, Lady Cersei, giving up your regal responsibilities. Wearing the crown for so many years must have left your neck a bit crooked.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I suppose you'll never know, Prince Oberyn. It's a shame your older brother couldn't attend the wedding.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Please give him our regards. With any luck, the gout will abate with time and he will be able to walk again.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: They call it the rich man's disease. A wonder you don't have it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Noblemen in my part of the country don't enjoy the same lifestyle as our counterparts in Dorne.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: People everywhere have their differences. In some places, the highborn frown upon those of low birth. In other places, the rape and murder of women and children is considered distasteful. What a fortunate thing for you, former Queen Regent, that your daughter Myrcella has been sent to live in the latter sort of place.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Everyone, silence! Clear the floor. There's been too much amusement here today. A royal wedding is not an amusement. A royal wedding is history. The time has come for all of us to contemplate our history. My lords... my ladies...
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: I give you. King Joffrey... Renly, Stannis, Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy. The War of the Five Kings.

Name: renly dwarf
Subtitles: I'm the rightful king.

Name: robb dwarf
Subtitles: King in the North!

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Yes!

Name: balon dwarf
Subtitles: Traitor. You're a traitor.

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: For the Seven Kingdoms!

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Let the war begin.

Name: stannis dwarf
Subtitles: Renly, you're no king.

Name: balon dwarf
Subtitles: Away, degenerate. Away. Away.

Name: renly dwarf
Subtitles: Ooh, careful.

Name: stannis dwarf
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: renly dwarf
Subtitles: I want you to be my prince. Stannis!

Name: balon dwarf
Subtitles: Who's got the gold now, Stark?

Name: robb dwarf
Subtitles: I am the rightful king.

Name: balon dwarf
Subtitles: Challenge me, ruffian.

Name: robb dwarf
Subtitles: Take that.

Name: balon dwarf
Subtitles: I'm drowning. I'm drowning.

Name: robb dwarf
Subtitles: I am the King in the North!

Name: stannis dwarf
Subtitles: Not wildfire!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Pay each of them 20 gold when this is done.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Yes, my lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We'll have to find another way to thank the king.

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Charge!

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Ready, again.

Name: robb dwarf
Subtitles: I am the King in the North! - Charge!

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Charge! Yes!

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Your head!

Name: joffrey dwarf
Subtitles: Fine gentlemen.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Well fought. Well fought. Here you are. Champion's purse. Though you're not the champion yet, are you? A true champion defeats all the challengers. Surely there are others out there who still dare to challenge my reign. Uncle. How about you? I'm sure they have a spare costume.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: One taste of combat was enough for me, Your Grace. I would like to keep what remains of my face. I think you should fight him. This was but a poor imitation of your own bravery on the field of battle. I speak as a firsthand witness. Climb down from the high table with your new Valyrian sword and show everyone how a true king wins his throne. Be careful, though. This one is clearly mad with lust. It would be a tragedy for the king to lose his virtue hours before his wedding night.
ners: [{'your'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A fine vintage. Shame that it spilled.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: It did not spill.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: My love, come back to me. It's time for my father's toast.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Well, how does he expect me to toast without wine? Uncle, you can be my cup-bearer seeing as you're too cowardly to fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace does me a great honor.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: It's not meant as an honor.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Bring me my goblet.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: What good is an empty cup? Fill it.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Kneel. Kneel before your king.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Kneel. I said... kneel!

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Look, the pie.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: My queen.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Wonderful. Wonderful. My hero.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Can we leave now?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Let's find out.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Uncle. Where are you going? You're my cup-bearer, remember?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I thought I might change out of these wet clothes, Your Grace.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: No, no, no. No, you're perfect the way you are. Serve me my wine.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Well, hurry up. This pie is dry.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: Mm, good. Needs washing down.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If it please Your Grace, Lady Sansa is very tired.

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: No. No, you'll wait here... un...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace?

Name: joffrey lannister
Subtitles: It's nothing.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He's choking!

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Help the poor boy.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Idiots, help your king.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Move away!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey! Joffrey!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Help him! Someone help him!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey!

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Come with me now.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey! Joffrey!

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: If you want to live, we have to leave.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Don't touch him!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey. Please, Joffrey. Joffrey, what is it? Help him!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My son.

Name: man
Subtitles: He's gone. Our king is gone.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He did this. He poisoned my son, your king. Take him. Take him! Take him! Take him!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You did this. You did this!

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: We have to leave.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Take him! Take him!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Where is his wife? Where's Sansa?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Find her. Bar the gates of the city. Seize every ship in the harbor.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Where is she?!

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No one leaves the capital! No one!

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Get in.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Where are we going?

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Somewhere safe.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Up you go, my lady. You'll be fine. You're stronger than you know.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Baelish?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Petyr... Are you hurt, my lady?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Good. Good. I'm sure you've had quite a fright. Rest easy. The worst is past. Ser Dontos shouts up from his boat.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Lord Baelish. I promised I'd get her to you safely.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Softly, my friend... Voices carry over water.

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: I should get back before someone thinks to look for me. LITTLEFINGER First you'll want your pay. 10,000 was it?

Name: ser dontos
Subtitles: Wait!

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Shh. You don't want the queen to hear, do you? 1,000 gold cloaks are searching for you. And if they found you, how do you think they would punish the girl who murdered the king?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I didn't murder anyone.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I know. I know. But you must admit it looks suspicious. The king who executed your father, who tormented you for years, and you fled the scene of his murder.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why did you kill him?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Because he was a drunk and a fool and I don't trust drunk fools.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He saved me.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Saved you? My lady, he followed my orders. Every one of them. And he did it all for gold. Money buys a man's silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He was helping me because I saved his life.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Yes, and he gave you a priceless necklace that once belonged to his grandmother. The last legacy of House Hollard.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I had it made a few weeks ago. What did I once tell you about the capital?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We're all liars here.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Come, my lady. I know you've had a difficult day. But you're safe now. I promise you that. You're safe with me and sailing home.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: So am I the queen?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: More than you were with Renly. Less than you would have been if Joffrey had done you the courtesy of consummating the marriage before dying. In any case, this would not be an opportune moment to press the issue.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Clawing at his own throat, looking to his mother to make stop... it was horrible.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: The world is overflowing with horrible things. But they're all a tray of cakes next to death. They brought me your grandfather's body when he died, you know? Made me look at it.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: What was it like?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: They took me to the Great Hall and there he was. The man I'd married and suffered to father my children. A great doughy lump I'd sat next to at endless dinners and tedious gatherings. There he was... lying on a table.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: One of my husbands preferred the company of men and was stabbed through the heart. Another was happiest torturing animals and was poisoned at our wedding feast... I must be cursed.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Nonsense. Your circumstances have improved markedly. You may not have enjoyed watching him die, but you enjoyed it more than you would have enjoyed being married to him, I can promise you that.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: But I would have been the queen.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Our alliance with the Lannisters remains every bit as necessary to them as it is unpleasant for us. You did wonderful work on Joffrey. The next one should be easier.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Your brother is dead. Do you know what that means?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I'm not trying to trick you.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: It means I'll become king.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes, you will become king. What kind of king do you think you'll be?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: A good king?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mm, I think so as well. You've got the right temperament for it. But what makes a good king? Hmm? What is a good king's single most important quality?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This is hardly the place or the time.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Holiness?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Hmm. Baelor the Blessed was holy. And pious. He built this sept. He also named a six-year-old boy high septon because he thought the boy could work miracles. He ended up fasting himself into an early grave because food was of this world and this world was sinful.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Justice.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yeah. A good king must be just. Orys I was just. Everyone applauded his reforms. Nobles and commoners alike. But he wasn't just for long. He was murdered in his sleep after less than a year by his own brother. Was that truly just of him? To abandon his subjects to an evil that he was too gullible to recognize?
ners: [set(), set(), {'orys'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: What about strength?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes. Strength. King Robert was strong. He won the rebellion and crushed the Targaryen dynasty. And he attended three small council meetings in 17 years. He spent his time whoring and hunting and drinking until the last two killed him. So, we have a man who starves himself to death, a man who lets his own brother murder him, and a man who thinks that winning and ruling are the same thing. What do they all lack?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Wisdom.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes!

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Wisdom is what makes a good king.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes. But what is wisdom? Hmm? A house with great wealth and fertile lands asks you for your protection against another house with a strong Navy that could one day oppose you. How do you know which choice is wise and which isn't? You've any experience of treasuries and granaries or shipyards and soldiers?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No. Of course not. A wise king knows what he knows and what he doesn't. You're young. A wise young king listens to his counselors and heeds their advice until he comes of age. And the wisest kings continue to listen to them long afterwards... Your brother was not a wise king. Your brother was not a good king. If he had been, perhaps he'd still be alive. Now, as the king, you will have to marry. Do you understand why?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: A king needs a queen.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes, but why? To further the family line. Do you know how that happens?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes, but has anyone explained the details to you?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I don't think so. It's all relatively straightforward.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: How are you?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I'm all right.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You are. You will be. I'll see to that.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Please give the queen a moment alone with her son.

Name: septon
Subtitles: Yes, my lord. All of you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It was Tyrion. He killed him. He told me he would. "A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth." That's what he said to me. You saw it. You saw Joff point at him just before he...

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't know what I saw.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Avenge him. Avenge our son. Kill Tyrion.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion's my brother. Our brother. There'll be a trial. We'll get to the truth of what happened.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I don't want a trial. He'll squirm his way to freedom given the chance. I want him dead. Please, Jaime. You have to. He was our son. Our baby boy.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're a hateful woman. Why have the gods made me love a hateful woman?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Jaime, not here, please. Please.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Stop it. Stop it. Stop.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Stop it. Stop.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Stop. Stop. It's not right.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's not right. It's not right.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't care.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Don't.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Don't. Jaime, don't.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Gonna rain soon. Where are we?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Near Fairmarket, I think.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You think? You don't have a map?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: No, I don't have a map.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Maybe we should get one.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Just point out the next map shop you see and I'll buy you one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How far is it to the Eyrie?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Far.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: And you're sure we're going the right way?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Believe me, girl, I want you there as soon as I can. Get my gold, be on my way.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: On your way where?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Why do you care? Might book passage across the Narrow Sea. Fight as a sellsword. Second Sons, could be. Seems like a good fit for me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'd like to see Braavos one day.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Why Braavos?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I have friends there.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I doubt it.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: Seven blessings to you.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: What do I want? This is my land.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: If I'm standing on it, it's my land.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: We were just watering the horses. We'll be on our way. Forgive my father. He was wounded fighting in the war. Our cottage burned down while he was gone and my mother with it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He's never been the same.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: Which house did he fight for?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Tullys of Riverrun.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: There's a storm coming. You'll be wanting a roof tonight. There's fresh hay in the barn. And Sally here makes rabbit stew just like her mom used to do. We don't have much, but any man that bled for House Tully is welcome to it.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: We ask the Father to judge us with mercy accepting our human frailty. We ask the Mother to bless our crops so we may feed ourselves and all who come to our door. We ask the Warrior to give us courage in these days of strife and turmoil. We ask the Maiden to protect Sally's virtue to keep her from the clutches of depravity.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You got to do all seven of the fuckers?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Father!

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: We ask the Smith to strengthen our hands and our backs so we may finish the work required of us. We ask the Crone to guide us on our journey from darkness to darkness.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: And we ask the Stranger not to kill us in our beds tonight for no damn reason at all.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm so sorry.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Really good.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: Did you fight at the Twins?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Call that a fight? Slaughtering livestock more like.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: The Red Wedding they're calling it. Walder Frey committed sacrilege that day. He shared bread and salt with the Starks. He offered them guest right.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Guest right don't mean much anymore.

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: It means something to me. The gods will have their vengeance. Frey will burn in the seventh hell for what he did. Things were different when Hoster Tully ruled the Riverlands. We had good years and bad years, same as anyone. But we were safe. Now with the Freys, raiders come plundering, steal our food, steal our silver. I was gonna send Sally north to stay with my brother, but the north's no better. The whole country's gone sour.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You got any ale?

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: Afraid not.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: How can a man not keep ale in his home?

Name: farmer hamlet
Subtitles: You look like you could really swing that sword. A real warrior with proper training. Those raiders wouldn't stand a chance against you. How would it be if you stayed on till the new moon? I could use a man to help with the farmwork. Sally does what she can, but she can't lift a bale of hay. And if any thieves came looking for easy pickings, one look at you, I'd bet they'd run the other way. Meaning no offense.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'sally'}, set(), set()]

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: What'll you pay? I don't have much. But I have hidden a bit of silver from the bandits. Fair wages for fair work?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Fair wages for fair work.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What did you do?!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Get your horse saddled.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You told me you weren't a thief.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I wasn't.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He took us in. He fed us and you...

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Aye, he took us in. He's a good man and his daughter makes a nice stew. And they'll both be dead come winter.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You don't know that.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I do know it. He's weak. He can't protect himself. They'll both be dead come winter. Dead men don't need silver.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're the worst shit in the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: There's plenty worse than me. I just understand the way things are. How many Starks they got to behead before you figure it out?

Name: ranger
Subtitles: Raper. Raper. Horse thief. Ninth born son. Raper. Thief. Thief and raper.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: alliser thorne
Subtitles: There he is, Sam the Slayer.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: Going to visit your wildling whore?

Name: sam
Subtitles: She's not a whore.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: No? Maybe I'll give her a copper tonight and find out.

Name: sam
Subtitles: They all think I'm lying.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: About what?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Killing the white Walker.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You're not lying. I'll never forget the way it screamed.

Name: sam

So the evening before Luthor was to propose to my sister, I got lost on my way back from my embroidery lesson and happened upon his chamber.

Name: rast
Subtitles: If I was your size, I'd be king of the fucking world.

Name: tanner
Subtitles: Help him up.

Name: tanner
Subtitles: This is nice. Fine leather. You're no wildling. Important. Highborn. Who are you?

Name: tanner
Subtitles: You see, where I come from, a commoner like me slaps a little lord like you, I'd lose my right hand. But we're a long way from home, aren't we? And the two of you, fancy-looking folks north of the Wall creeping through the woods. Isn't that a bit odd?

Name: tanner
Subtitles: I like your curly hair. My mom had curls like that. Beautiful brown curls. Why'd you drag a crippled boy all the way up here?

Name: tanner
Subtitles: See you haven't played this game before. A highborn hostage, that's valuable. But three of them, that's a lot of mouths to feed.

Name: rast
Subtitles: What the fuck's wrong with him?

Name: tanner
Subtitles: Come here.

Name: meera
Subtitles: No, please. Please.Please, let me help him.

Name: tanner
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: meera
Subtitles: Please.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm Brandon Stark! I'm Brandon Stark of Winterfell.

Name: rast
Subtitles: It's Jon Snow's brother.

Name: meera
Subtitles: It's Meera. It's Meera.I'm right here.

Name: tanner
Subtitles: And I thought this was gonnabe another boring day.

Name: meera
Subtitles: I'm right here.

Name: septon
Subtitles: May the Warrior grant him courage and protect him in these perilous times. May the Smith grant him strength that he might bear this heavy burden. And may the Crone, she that knows the fate of all men, show him the path he must walk and guide him through the dark places that lie ahead. In the light of the Seven, I now proclaim Tommen of the House Baratheon First of His Name. King of the Andals and the First Men and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms. Long may he reign!

Name: all
Subtitles: Long may he reign!

Name: septon
Subtitles: Special day.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace.
