Subtitles: There he is.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Long may he reign.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Long may he reign.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He sits the throne like he was born to it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes. He wasn't, though, was he?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No, he wasn't.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You still mourn for Joffrey?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He was my husband. My king.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He would have been your nightmare.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace, I feel...

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You knew exactly what he was. I did, too. You never love anything in the world the way you love your first child. Doesn't matter what they do. And what he did, it shocked me. Do you think I'm easily shocked?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The things he did shocked me. He's only a boy. A good boy. A decent boy. He always has been. Who was the last decent king, I wonder? He could be the first man who sits on that throne in fifty years to actually deserve it.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It would be some consolation, wouldn't it? For all the horror that put him there.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He will need help... if he's going to rule well.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He has you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A mother is not enough. You're still interested in being queen, I take it?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Oh. After all that's happened... It sounds strange, I know, but I am... I haven't even given any thought to it, what comes next. It would be a great honor, of course. But I will have to speak to my father about it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes, speak to your father. I'll speak to mine.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: We may be faced with an alarming number of weddings soon.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I won't even know what to call you. Sister? Or Mother? Hmm.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: King Joffrey Baratheon is dead. Murdered at his own wedding.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: And we have taken the Meereenese Navy, Your Grace.

Name: daario
Subtitles: The Second Sons took the Meereenese Navy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who told you to take the Navy?

Name: daario
Subtitles: No one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So why did you do it?

Name: daario
Subtitles: I heard you liked ships.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many ships?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Ninety-three, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many men can they carry?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Ninety-three hundred, not counting sailors.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Would that be enough to take King's Landing?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Lannisters have more.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: They've been fighting Joffrey's wars for years. They're tired, dispersed. And now their king is dead. Eight thousand Unsullied, two thousand Second Sons sailing into Blackwater Bay and storming the gates without warning.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It's hard to say. It could be enough. But we're not fighting to make you Queen of King's Landing. Ten thousand men can't conquer Westeros.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: The old houses will flock to our queen when she crosses the Narrow Sea.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The old houses will flock to whichever side they think will win, as they always have.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: There's other news. From Yunkai. Without the Unsullied to enforce your rule, the Wise Masters have retaken control of the city. They've re-enslaved the freedmen who stayed behind and sworn to take revenge against you. And in Astapor, the council you installed to rule over the city has been overthrown by a butcher named Cleon who's declared himself "His Imperial Majesty."

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Please leave me. Not you, Jorah.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It appears my liberation of Slaver's Bay isn't going quite as planned.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You could sail for Westeros and leave it all behind. A boy sits on the Iron Throne. A boy many believe to be a bastard with no right to it. They've never been more vulnerable.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You counseled me against rashness once in Qarth. I didn't listen. That all worked out well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How can I rule seven kingdoms if I can't control Slaver's Bay? Why should anyone trust me? Why should anyone follow me?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You're a Targaryen. You're the Mother of Dragons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I need to be more than that. I will not let those I have freed slide back into chains. I will not sail for Westeros.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: What, then?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will do what queens do. I will rule.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Pull up your hood. A memorable shade.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But how would they know?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You know what kind of stories poor men enjoy the most? Ones about rich girls they'll never meet.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Is this the only way into the Eyrie?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The mountains are impassable. If you want to get to the Eyrie, you need to go through the Bloody Gate. It doesn't matter how large your army is, if you attack this gate, you do it on this road, three men abreast and get slaughtered like goats. The first Lords of the Vale didn't have much, but they had these mountains and they knew how to use them. And the fortress they built here has never been overcome. Not once in a thousand years. Know your strengths, use them wisely, and one man can be worth ten thousand.

Name: sansa stark

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Oh, do take down that hood, child. Don't you think know who you are? You think I'd let my intended leave the Eyrie on urgent business without knowing what that business was? I let him go so he could bring you here to me.

Name: lysa

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's wonderful to meet you, Aunt Lysa.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: You mustn't call me that in front of anyone else.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Of course. I understand.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: No one can know you're here. It would put us in a very precarious position.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I would never say a thing.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: The Lannisters want to destroy us. They've been trying for years. Now they know what it feels like.

Name: robin
Subtitles: Mummy said they killed your mother and they chopped off your brother's head.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They did, and my father's.

Name: robin
Subtitles: They killed my father, too, with poison. I wanted to make the little Lannister baby man fly, but Mother said I couldn't.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Make him fly?

Name: robin
Subtitles: Through the Moon Door.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: And on top of everything else, they made you marry that filthy troll.

Name: lysa

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No. We never...

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Good. Robin, this is your cousin Sansa. But you're not to call her Sansa in front of anyone but Uncle Petyr and myself. Do you understand? Sansa, this is my son Robin.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's a pleasure to meet you, Robin.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Robin, show Sansa to her chamber. Take the back stairs.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Go. We'll speak soon.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: What took you so long?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Arranging for the ascension of King Tommen I, extricating Sansa, getting her here alive.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: She's here. We've spent more than enough time on her for one evening.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Let's get married tonight.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Ought we not... inform the Lords of the Vale about the ceremony?

Name: lysa
Subtitles: There's only one Lord of the Vale. The others can all hang. Lurking and simpering on the stairs like buzzards the moment my husband died, trying to get their claws in me.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I do think that we could wait until...

Name: lysa
Subtitles: I'm done waiting, Petyr. We had our wedding night many years ago. Or don't you remember?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Like it was yesterday.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: What wife would do for you the things I've done for you? What wife would trust you the way I've trusted you? When you gave me those drops and told me to pour them into Jon's wine, my husbando s wine... when you told me to write a letter to Cat telling her it was the Lannisters...

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The deed is done. Faded into nothing. Only speaking of it can make it real.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Tonight it is, then.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Let me bathe and dress for the occasion. Once I'm presentable, I'll call on the septon immediately.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: I'm warning you. I'm going to scream when my husband makes love to me. I'm going to scream so loud, they'll hear me clear across the Narrow Sea.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: When will the wedding take place in your mind?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: As soon as decency permits. After we've allowed Tommen the appropriate time to mourn his brother and Margaery to mourn her husband.

Subtitles: A fortnight?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That seems reasonable.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No jugglers, no jousting dwarves, no seventy-seven-course meals.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And your wedding to Loras?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Shortly after Tommen's.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Shortly?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A fortnight.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I know you don't like them. I didn't like your husband. Used to pat me on the back a lot. I didn't trust him.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We had that in common.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You don't need to make formal alliances with people you trust.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Then whom can we trust?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Ourselves alone.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The Tyrells are our only true rivals in terms of resources and we need them on our side.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Robert wasn't particularly rich.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Robert had me funding him. Wars swallow gold like a pit in the earth.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I suppose that explains why we did so well in the last one.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you know how much gold was mined in the Westerlands this past year?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Haven't a clue.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Go on, your best guess.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Pounds, tons, ounces?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Doesn't matter. The answer is the same.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That can't be.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Our last working mine ran dry three years ago.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Then how do we pay for anything?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The crown owes the Iron Bank of Braavos a tremendous amount of money.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How much?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: A tremendous amount.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: There must be someone at the Iron Bank you can speak to, come to some arrangement.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The Iron Bank is the Iron Bank. There is no someone.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Someone does work there. It is comprised of people.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And a temple is comprised of stones. One stone crumbles and another takes its place. And the temple holds its form for a thousand years or more. That's what the Iron Bank is... a temple. We all live in its shadow and almost none of us know it. You can't run from them. You can't cheat them. You can't sway them with excuses. If you owe them money and you don't want to crumble yourself, you pay it back. Vesting the Tyrells in the crown will help a great deal in this respect.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's for the good of the family, I understand that. I'm not sure my brothers do.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I know you're building a strong case against Tyrion. And as a mother, that is your right. But as a judge, I cannot discuss the trial with you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I respect that. We don't need to discuss it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Lannister legacy is the only thing that matters. You've started wars to protect this family. Turned your back on Jaime for refusing to contribute to its future. What does Tyrion deserve for lighting that future on fire?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Joffrey. Cersei. Walder Frey. Meryn Trant. Tywin Lannister. The Red Woman. Beric Dondarrion. Thoros of Myr. Ilyn Payne. The Mountain.

Name: sandor clegane

Subtitles: I can't sleep until I say the names.

Name: sandor clegane

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Only the ones I'm going to kill.

Subtitles: Hate's as good a thing as any to keep a person going. Better than most. We come across my brother, maybe we can both cross a name off our list.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: If he were here right now, what would you do?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I'd tell him to shut the fuck up so I can get some sleep. Go on, get it over with, your list of doomed men.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm almost done. Only one name left.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Hound.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Your mother always had a sweet tooth, you know?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Really?

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Oh, yes. At suppertime, she would go straight for honey cakes, candied almonds, custard. Anything sweet. Eventually, your grandfather had to assign a septa to watch her at meals. Cat was the firstborn daughter after all. It was important that she remain desirable so Father could arrange a good match for her and she was starting to get fat.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My mother, fat? She never let me have my pudding until I'd finished all my proper food.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: This is before she married your father and moved to the North. By the time you were born, your father's austerity had become hers. Marriage changes people. I didn't mean for you to stop. Go on, enjoy them. How do you like them?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They're delicious. Where did you get the lemons? You can't grow them up here.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Oh, gods, no. Petyr had three crates brought all the way from King's Landing. He knew you liked lemon cakes. He's so kind. He really cares for you. Think where you'd be without him. In their clutches and tried for murder.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes. I'm very lucky.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: He feels responsible for you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Oh, I know he does. I'm so grateful.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Why? Why does he feel responsible for you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Well, I'm half Tully. He loved your family so much.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Loved your mother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: That's what you wanted to say.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He loves you, Aunt Lysa. He's married to you.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Your mother never loved him. Never. Cat always went straight for the sweetest thing. The most obvious thing. Your Uncle Brandon. Your handsome, arrogant, cruel Uncle Brandon. He almost killed Petyr in a duel. And your mother loved him anyway. And now Petyr is risking his life to save you, the daughter of a woman who didn't love him no more than those whores in his brothels. Has he told you about them?

Name: lysa
Subtitles: He hasn't told you about the vile things they do with their bodies? The vile things they let him do with their bodies?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, never.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Are you pregnant?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What? No, I told you. Lord Tyrion and I never-

Name: lysa
Subtitles: I wasn't asking about Tyrion. What have you let Petyr do with your body?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Aunt Lysa, no, I-

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Your young, pretty body.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Nothing. I'm a virgin.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Don't lie to me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're hurting me.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: I'll know if you lie.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm a virgin, I swear it. He loves you, Aunt Lysa. All he says is that I'm stupid. I'm a stupid little girl with stupid dreams who never learns and I'm a terrible liar, so I should always tell the truth. And I swear to you that he has never touched me. Not once, not ever.

Name: lysa
Subtitles: Shh. Shh. Shh. It's all right. It will all be all right. You'll be a widow soon. They'll execute that dwarf for murdering the king and you'll be free to marry Robin. You'll be the Lady of the Vale. Hmm.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Didn't they teach you how to ride a horse?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Perhaps you should have stayed with him. It's not going to be a pleasant journey for you. It could take weeks to get to the Wall, depending on the weather.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: That's a long way off.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Well, Lady Sansa's brother's at Castle Black. If I were her, that's where I'd go. Feel free to stop at any point.

Subtitles: I know.

Subtitles: The hell you doing?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Practicing.

Subtitles: No one's going to kill me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's not fighting. It's water dancing.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Dancing? Maybe you ought to put on a dress. Who taught you that shite?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The greatest swordsman who ever lived. Syrio Forel, the First Sword to the Sealord of Braavos.

Subtitles: Braavos. Greasy-haired little bastard, I bet. They all are.

Name: arya stark

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It was not.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Was? He dead?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: How?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He was killed.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Who by?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Meryn Trant. That's why Ser Meryn-

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Meryn Trant? The greatest swordsman who ever lived killed by Meryn fucking Trant?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He was outnumbered.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Any boy whore with a sword could beat three Meryn Trants.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Syrio didn't have a sword. Or armor. Just a stick.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: The greatest swordsman who ever lived didn't have a sword? All right. You have a sword. Let's see what he taught you. Go on, do it for your Braavosi friend. Dead like all the rest of your friends.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Your friendo s dead and Meryn Trant's not 'cause Trant had armor and a big fucking sword.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Prince Oberyn. Writing letters?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: A poem, actually.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: May I show you the gardens?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: I couldn't very well refuse a royal escort.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, you couldn't.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I didn't realize you were a poet.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Not a very good one.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: For your paramour?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: For one of my daughters.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You have several, don't you?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Eight.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Eight? Eight daughters?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: The fifth is difficult. I named her after my sister Elia.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Beautiful name.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Yes. But I can't say it without turning sad. And after I turn sad, I grow angry.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps that's why she's difficult. The gods love their stupid jokes, don't they?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Which joke is that?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're a prince of Dorne. A legendary fighter. A brilliant man feared throughout Westeros. But you could not save your sister. I'm a Lannister. Queen for nineteen years. Daughter of the most powerful man alive. But I could not save my son. What good is power if you cannot protect the ones you love?

Subtitles: We can avenge them.

Subtitles: I know he did.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: We will have a trial and we will learn the truth.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We'll have a trial, anyway. I haven't seen my daughter in over a year.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: The last time I saw her, she was swimming with two of my girls in the Water Gardens. Laughing in the sun.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I want to believe that. I want to believe she's happy.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: You have my word. We don't hurt little girls in Dorne.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Everywhere in the world, they hurt little girls. Would you bring her a gift for me? I wasn't there for her name day. I don't know when I'll see her again.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Anything at all.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The best shipwrights in King's Landing have been working on it for months. Myrcella loves the open water.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: I will have it sailed down to Sunspear for her.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Please tell her... her mother misses her very much.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Oh, no, no, no.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: No, no, no, no.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Hells. Gods.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Did you remove the skin?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: No, my lady.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Have you ever cooked a rabbit before?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Did you ever cook anything for Lord Tyrion?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: No, my lady. That was the cooks.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I'm helping you with your armor.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I've been removing my own armor for quite some time, thank you very much.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: What exactly did you do for Lord Tyrion?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I brought him his meals and cleared his table when he was finished. I kept his clothing and linens clean. Carried his messages and returned the replies. Mostly I poured wine.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Oh. Whilst in Lord Tyrion's service, did you ever do anything remotely related to combat?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I killed a man.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Who?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: A Kingsguard. He tried to kill Lord Tyrion at the Blackwater.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: How did you kill a Kingsguard?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I pushed a spear through the back of his head.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Bloody ridiculous. Help me with these straps.

Name: rast
Subtitles: Hey. Hey, get up. Get up.

Name: man
Subtitles: That's it lad, put it inside. Get the fire going again. We're all freezing.

Name: man
Subtitles: Aye. What we need is a girl there.

Name: man
Subtitles: I've got to have a piss.

Name: man
Subtitles: Now keep quiet.

Name: meera
Subtitles: You need water.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: It doesn't matter.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Of course it matters.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You mustn't let anything stop you.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: They already have stopped me.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: No. You're not here. You're far from here.

Name: meera
Subtitles: What does that mean?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: At the hill. A great weirwood tree.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You've seen it, too.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Meera and I, even Hodor, we're only here to guide you. He's waiting for you. We have to find it. You have to make it.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We will.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: This... this isn't the end. Not for you. Not yet.

Name: meera
Subtitles: How... will we know the end?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You'll know.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Brothers.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: You do move quiet.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How many?

Name: locke
Subtitles: Eleven men. Most of them already drunk. No guards posted. They don't seem to have a care in the world. We'll carve them up like walnut pie.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Karl was a top paid cutthroat in Flea Bottom. I've seen what he can do with a knife.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Have you seen what I can do with a knife?

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Not yet.

Name: locke
Subtitles: There's a hut on the west side of the keep. We should steer clear of it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Why?

Name: locke
Subtitles: They've got some hounds chained up inside. Closer we can get without the dogs sniffing us, the better.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: New moon tonight.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Get some rest. We move at sundown.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: I've always liked a girl with curls. A touch of class. You take whatever's left.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Get her up.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Stop.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Stop. What are you doing?

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor. Hodor. Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Stop. Stop!

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor. Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Stop! Please.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Please, get off her!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Please! Please, leave her alone!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Please, stop. Stop.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: What are you doing? Leave her alone!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No!

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Shh. Shh, shh, shh.

Name: karl
Subtitles: Shh.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: You've got pretty hair, don't you? Now what is a pretty little highborn girl like you doing out here in the deep, dark woods, eh? You left your daddy's castle looking for trouble, didn't you? No dresses for you. You like it rough, don't you? You like it in the gutter, don't you?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: If you let my sister go, I can help you.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: You can help me?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I can.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: And how you gonna do that?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I have the sight. I can see things.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: That's very helpful.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Things that haven't happened yet.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: What a fine thing. A fine thing.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Have you seen what I'm gonna do to your sister? Have you seen what they're going to do to your sister?

Name: jojen
Subtitles: No.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Don't close your eyes.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: I saw you die tonight. I saw your body burn. I saw the snow fall and bury your bones.

Name: man
Subtitles: To arms!

Name: rast
Subtitles: They're here, the Night's Watch.

Name: locke
Subtitles: Rescue party is here, lads. Lady.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Is Jon with you?

Name: locke
Subtitles: Aye. I'll take you to him.

Name: locke
Subtitles: You're Brandon Stark?

Name: locke
Subtitles: The little crippled lord. We're going for a ride, boy.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Jon! Jon!

Name: locke
Subtitles: Keep talking and I'll cut your friends' throats. Starting with the idiot. Do you hear? Do you hear?

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor! Hodor! Hodor. Hodor.

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor. Hodor. Hodor. Hodor. Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Hodor. Hodor, get his knife. Cut me loose.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Hodor, get his knife. Hodor. Cut me loose, Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Jojen and Meera, free them. Go!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Jon.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Jon!

Name: jojen
Subtitles: If he sees you, he won't let you go north.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He's my brother.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: And wants to protect you. He'll take you back to Castle Black.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: You have to decide. Do you want to find the three-eyed raven?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Hodor.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We need to free Summer. And we need to go.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Lord Snow. Are you bringing me back for trial?

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: We had a good thing here. We were free men. You'll never be free. You'll never know what that's like.

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: You learn how to fight in a castle?

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: Some old man teach you how to stand, how to parry?

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: How to fight with honor?

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: You know what's wrong with honor?

Name: karl tanner
Subtitles: You.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Are you all right? Come with me. Come on.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We lost four brothers?

Name: doloroud edd
Subtitles: Five.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: What the seven hells could do that to a man?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I count ten dead mutineers.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Locke said there were eleven of them.

Name: dolrous edd
Subtitles: Where's Rast?

Name: man
Subtitles: Here's another.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Jon.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Where in seven hells? Come here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I missed you, boy.

Name: dolorous edd
Subtitles: What should we do with this lot?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not safe for you here on your own. Mance Rayder has an army heading this way and there's worse out there than Mance. Come with us to Castle Black. We can find you work. Keep you safe.

Name: morag
Subtitles: Meaning all respect, Ser Crow, Craster beat us and worse. Your brother crows beat us and worse. We'll find our own way.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You want to stay here in Craster's Keep?

Name: morag
Subtitles: Burn it to the ground and all the dead with it.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, if you'd like to sit, I'm sure that--

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: We've been here since midday.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Easterners have a difference sense of time, I've often found. Once I was waiting for Salladhor Saan here in Braavos. Together, we were going to run three shiploads of the finest--

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Welcome to the Iron Bank. Please, sit.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: What can we do for you, Lord Stannis?

Name: davos
Subtitles: This is Stannis of the House Baratheon, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: The Iron Throne is currently occupied by Tommen of the House Baratheon, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: He shares no blood with me. He is a bastard born of incest. As was his brother before him.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Yes, we have heard this story.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: It's not a story. It's the truth.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: The king's grandfather tells a different story. A story about a jealous uncle whose attempts to usurp the throne from the rightful king cost the Seven Kingdoms dearly in blood and gold.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Gold you loaned him.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: And you feel your blood gives you a claim on our gold?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: More than any man living.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Across the Narrow Sea, your books are filled with words like "usurper" and "madman" and "blood right." Here, our books are filled with numbers. We prefer the stories they tell. More plain. Less open to interpretation. How many fighting men remain loyal to you?

Name: tycho
Subtitles: And how many ships do you have? The ones still afloat, Ser Davos, not at the bottom of Blackwater Bay.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: And how much wheat and barley and beef and pork do you produce on Dragonstone to feed your 4,000 men on your 32 ships?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: None.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: You can see why these numbers seem unlikely to add up to a happy ending from our perspective. I'm afraid we must respectfully decline your request. But we thank you for paying us the honor of your visit.

Name: davos
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: I'm not a lord, Ser Davos Seaworth. You would not be either here. In Braavos, thieves are not rewarded with titles.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Well, strictly speaking, I didn't do the thieving. That would be the pirates. I just moved what they stole from one place to another. {DAVOS removes his right glove to show the stubs of his fingers.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This is the payment that was demanded by King Stannis for my crimes. I consider it an honest accounting. He's an honest man and he's your best chance to get back the money you've sunk into Westeros. Which is a lot, I imagine. Wars are expensive.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: The war is over.

Name: davos
Subtitles: As long as Stannis lives, the war is not over. Who's the real power in King's Landing?

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Ser Davos...

Name: davos
Subtitles: Humor me.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Tywin Lannister.

Name: davos
Subtitles: How old is Tywin Lannister?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: 67. And when he dies, who's in command? A half-grown boy, the product of incest? Cersei Lannister, a queen whose people despise her? Jaime Lannister, a man best known for killing the king he was sworn to protect? When Tywin's gone, who do you back?

Name: tycho
Subtitles: That is a problem for another time.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Begging your pardon, I think it's a problem for now. There's only one reliable leader left in Westeros. Stannis. He's got the birthright. He's in his prime. He's a tried and tested battle commander. And he doesn't just talk about paying people back, he does it.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: The lookout sees a pirate ship sailing their way. The captain shouts to his first mate, "Bring me my red shirt." The first mate brings the red shirt and the captain puts it on. And when the pirates try to board, the brave captain leads his men to victory. A few days later, the lookout screams, "Two pirate ships!" The crew is shivering like scared mice. But the courageous captain hollers, "Bring me my red shirt!"
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sallador
Subtitles: After the battle, the first mate asks, "Captain, why do you call for your red shirt before battle?" The captain replies, "So that if I am stabbed, you will not see me bleed." The next morning the lookout screams, "10 pirate ships! We are surrounded!" The crew goes silent.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: They all look to their brave captain, waiting for his usual command. Calm as ever, the captain bellows...

Name: women
Subtitles: Bring me my brown pants!

Name: davos
Subtitles: You think they ever met a pirate who didn't tell them that joke?

Name: sallador
Subtitles: Davos. I heard you were rotting in a dungeon in Dragonstone.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Only half rotted.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: Join us, my friend. Join us. This is Lhara. And this is--

Name: lhara
Subtitles: I am Lhara.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: She's an artist, this one, truly.

Name: davos
Subtitles: No time, I'm afraid. We sail at sunrise.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: We?

Name: davos
Subtitles: You, me-- we.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: Once I thought this man loved me. Now I know he despises me. He wants to see me die poor and alone on some cold--

Name: davos
Subtitles: You won't be alone. And you won't be poor.

Name: davos
Subtitles: There's a chest of the good stuff left back at your house. I gave it to your wife.

Name: sallador
Subtitles: You're not my friend, my friend.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'll see you at sunrise.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I give you until the full moon to order all ironborn scum out of the North and back to those shit-stained rocks you call home. On the first night of the full moon, I will hunt down every islander still on our lands and flay them living, the way I flayed the 20 ironborn scum I found at Winterfell. In the box you'll find a special gift-- Theon's favorite toy. He cried when I took it away from him. Leave the North now or more boxes will follow with more Theon. Signed Ramsay Snow, natural born son of Roose Bolton, Lord of the Dreadfort and Warden of the North.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Yes!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: They skinned our countrymen and they mutilated my brother, your prince. Your prince. Everything they've done to him, they've also done to you.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Yes! Yes!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: As long as they can hurt our prince with impunity, the word ironborn means nothing.

Name: first mate
Subtitles: Go left.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Theon Greyjoy.

Name: bolton guard
Subtitles: I don't know--

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm here for Theon Greyjoy. Take me to the dungeons.

Name: bolton guard
Subtitles: He's not in the dungeons.

Name: bolton guard
Subtitles: Last cage on the right.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: This way!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: We're going home.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: It's all right. It's me, Yara.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You can't trick me. Tell him. Tell him you couldn't trick me.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm not tricking you, Theon. I'm saving you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not Theon! Reek! Reek! My name is Reek!

Name: first mate
Subtitles: They're here.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: If they catch us in here, we're trapped. Help me with him.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No, you can't! You can't!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You're Theon Greyjoy.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No, I don't believe her! I know who I am! I'm Reek! Reek! Loyal Reek! Good Reek! I've always been Reek!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: This is turning into a lovely evening.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm Reek! Loyal Reek!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Aah! Theon!

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Give me my brother and no more of your men will die.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You've got bigger balls than he ever did. But with those big balls of yours...

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: how fast can you run?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Make for the ship, now.

Name: ironborn
Subtitles: But your brother.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: My brother is dead.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I have a treat for you. A reward.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Reward?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Yes, Reek. Those creatures who came in the night, they wanted to take you away. And you didn't let them. You remained loyal.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I-- I didn't want them to take me. I was so scared. I didn't want them--

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Yes, yes, Reek. It's a bath. For you. Remove those rags. Now.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: The britches, too, Reek. Take them off.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Do you love me, Reek?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes, of course, my lord.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Good. Because I need you to do something for me. Something very important. There's a castle, you see. Some bad men hold this castle. I need your help to take this castle back.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: But how can--

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I need you to play a role. To pretend to be someone you're not.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Pretend to be who?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Theon Greyjoy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You stand before Daenerys Stormborn of the House Targaryen, the First of Her Name, Queen of Meereen, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Khaleesi of the Great Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons. Don't be afraid, my friend.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: The Queen says you may approach and speak.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: He is a goatherd. He says he prayed for your victory against the slave masters.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I thank him for his prayers.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: It was your dragons, he says. They came this morning for his flock.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: He hopes he has not offended Your Grace, but now he has nothing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Tell this man I am sorry for his hardship. I cannot bring back his goats,

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: but I will see he is paid their value three times over.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Send the next one in.

Name: manservant
Subtitles: The noble Hizdahr zo Loraq begs an audience with the Queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The noble Hizdahr zo Loraq can speak to me himself.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Queen Daenerys. Tales of your beauty were not exaggerated.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I thank you.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Mine is one of the oldest and proudest families in Meereen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Then it is my honor to receive you.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: My father, one of Meereen's most respected and beloved citizens, oversaw the restoration and maintenance of its greatest landmarks. This pyramid included.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: For that, he has my gratitude. I should be honored to meet him.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: You have, Your Grace. You crucified him. I pray you'll never live to see a member of your family treated so cruelly.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Your father crucified innocent children.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: My father spoke out against crucifying those children. He decried it as a criminal act, but was overruled. Is it justice to answer one crime with another?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I am sorry you no longer have a father, but my treatment of the masters was no crime. You'd be wise to remember that.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: What's done is done. You are the queen and I am a servant of Meereen. A servant who does not wish to see its traditions eradicated.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what traditions do you speak of?

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: The tradition of funeral rite. Proper burial in the Temple of the Graces. My father and 162 noble Meereenese are still nailed to those posts, carrion for vultures, rotting in the sun.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Your Grace, I ask that you order these men taken down so that they might receive proper burials.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what of the slave children these noble Meereenese crucified? They were rotting in the sun as well. Would you have begged me for their right to a proper burial?

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Your Grace, I cannot defend the actions of the masters. I can only speak to you as a son who loved his father. Let me take his body down. Let me have him brought to the temple and buried with dignity so that he might find peace in the next world.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Bury your father, Hizdahr zo Loraq.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Thank you, my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many more?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: There are 212 supplicants waiting, Your Grace.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: These meetings aren't always going to be this early, are they? I was up late last night. So, does this mean I am a master of something now? Coins, ships?

Name: mace
Subtitles: Lord Tywin and I already determined that I shall be the Master of Ships long before you--

Name: mace
Subtitles: Lord Tywin, it's a great honor to have been granted a seat on this council. I--

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The trial begins this afternoon. We only have the morning for affairs of state. Shall we begin?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Sandor Clegane has been spotted in the Riverlands, my lord.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A coward and a traitor.

Name: varys
Subtitles: My birds tell me the Hound slaughtered five of our soldiers. I believe the phrase "fuck the king" was uttered.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Disgraceful.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What would it take to make the common soldier stupid enough to try his luck with the Hound?

Name: varys
Subtitles: 10 silver stags seems a generous bounty.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Make it 100. What else?

Name: varys
Subtitles: More whispers from the east, my lord.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The Targaryen girl?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Daenerys has taken up residence in Meereen. She has conquered the city and rules as its queen.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Conquered with what?

Name: varys
Subtitles: She commands an army of Unsullied, my queen. Some 8,000 strong. She has a company of sellswords-- the Second Sons. She has two knights advising her-- Jorah Mormont and Barristan Selmy. And she has three dragons.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Baby dragons. Larger every year, Your Grace.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Mormont is spying on her for us.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No longer. He appears to be fully devoted to her. As for Ser Barristan, it would seem he took his dismissal from the Kingsguard a bit harder than anticipated.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He's an old man. He wasn't fit to protect my son.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey didn't die on his watch. Dismissing him was as insulting as it was stupid.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Don't tell me you're worried about a child halfway across the world.

Name: varys
Subtitles: A child with two seasoned warriors counseling her and a powerful army at her back, Your Grace.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Lord Varys is right. I have been to Essos and seen the Unsullied firsthand. They are very impressive on the battlefield. Less so in the bedroom.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Dragons haven't won a war in 300 years. Armies win them all the time. She must be dealt with.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: How, my lord? By force?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Eventually, if it comes to that. Can your little birds find their way into Meereen?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Most certainly, my Lord Hand.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Mmm. Lord Tyrell, be a good man. Fetch my quill and paper.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Prince Oberyn.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Lord Varys...

Name: varys
Subtitles: Only Varys. I'm not actually a nobleman. No one is under obligation to call me lord.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: And yet everyone does.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You seem quite knowledgeable about the Unsullied. Did you spend much time in Essos?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Five years.

Name: varys
Subtitles: May I ask why?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Tis a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I don't want to be most of us.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Most of us aren't princes.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: You are from Essos. Where? Lys?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I have an ear for accents. I've lost my accent entirely.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: I have an ear for that as well. How did you get here?

Name: varys
Subtitles: It's a long story.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: One you don't like telling people.

Name: varys
Subtitles: People I trust.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: My paramour Ellaria, she would find you very interesting. You should come to the brothel and meet her. We brought our own wine, not the swill they serve here. We have some lovely boys on retainer, but...

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: You did like boys before?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Really? Girls? Hmm. I hope you won't be offended when I say I never would have guessed.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Not at all. But I was never interested in girls, either.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: What then?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Nothing.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Everybody is interested in something.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Not me. When I see what desire does to people, what it's done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Such as?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Let me guess, I've been pardoned.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Really?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Father's orders.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, we mustn't disappoint Father.

Name: man
Subtitles: Kingslayer!

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I, Tommen of the House Baratheon, First of my Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms, do hereby recuse myself from this trial. Tywin of the House Lannister, Hand of the King, Protector of the Realm, will sit as judge in my stead. And with him Prince Oberyn of the House Martell and Lord Mace of the House Tyrell. And if found guilty... may the gods punish the accused.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion of the House Lannister, you stand accused by the Queen Regent of regicide. Did you kill King Joffrey?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Did your wife, the Lady Sansa?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not that I know of.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: How would you say he died, then?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Choked on his pigeon pie.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: So you would blame the bakers?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Or the pigeons. Just leave me out of it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The crown may call its first witness.

Name: meryn trant
Subtitles: Once we'd got King Joffrey safely away from the mob, the Imp rounded on him. He slapped the king across the face and called him a vicious idiot and a fool. It wasn't the first time the Imp threatened Joffrey. Right here in this throne room, he marched up those steps and called our king a halfwit. Compared His Grace to the Mad King and suggested he'd meet the same fate. And when I spoke in the king's defense, he threatened to have me killed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, why don't you tell them what Joffrey was doing?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Silence.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Pointing a loaded crossbow at Sansa Stark while you tore at her clothes and beat her.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Silence! You will not speak unless called upon. You're dismissed, Ser Meryn.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Basilisk venom, widow's blood, wolfsbane, essence of nightshade, sweetsleep, tears of Lys, demon's dance... blind eye--

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: I think you have made your point, Grand Maester. You have a lot of poison in your store.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Had, Prince Oberyn. My stores were plundered.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: By whom?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: By the accused, Tyrion Lannister, after he had me wrongfully imprisoned.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Grand Maester, you examined King Joffrey's corpse. Was it without question poison that killed him?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Without question.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: This was found on the body of Dontos Hollard, the king's fool. He was last seen spiriting Sansa Stark, the wife of the accused, away from the feast. She wore this necklace the day of the wedding. Residue of a most rare and terrible poison was found inside.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Was this one of the poisons stolen from your store?

Name: pyelle
Subtitles: It was. The Strangler. A poison few in the Seven Kingdoms possess. And used to strike down the most noble child the gods ever put on this good earth.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I will hurt you for this. A day will come when you think you are safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth and you will know the debt is paid.

Name: mace
Subtitles: Your own brother said this to you?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Shortly before the Battle of Blackwater Bay. I confronted him about his plans to put Joffrey on the front lines. As it turned out, when the attack came, Joff insisted on remaining at the battlements. He believed his presence would inspire the troops.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Tyrion said, "And you will know the debt is paid." What debt?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I discovered he'd been keeping whores in the Tower of the Hand. I asked him to confine his salacious acts to the brothel where such behavior belongs. He wasn't pleased.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Thank you, Your Grace, for the courage of your testimony.

Name: mace
Subtitles: Do you remember the precise nature of this threat?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I'm afraid I do, my lord. He said, "Perhaps you should speak more softly to me, then. Monsters are dangerous and just now kings are dying like flies."

Name: mace
Subtitles: And he said this to you at a meeting of the small council?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Yes. After we received word of Robb Stark's death. He didn't seem gladdened by the news. Perhaps his marriage to Sansa Stark had made him more sympathetic to the northern cause.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You're excused, Lord Varys.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Father, may I ask the witness one question?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: One.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You once said that without me, this city would have faced certain defeat. You said the histories would never mention me, but you would not forget. Have you forgotten, Lord Varys?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Sadly, my lord, I never forget a thing.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: We will adjourn for now.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Toll the bells in an hour's time.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Clear the court!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You'd condemn your own son to death?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I've condemned no one. The trial is not over.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This isn't a trial. It's a farce. Cersei has manipulated everything and you know it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I know nothing of the sort.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You've always hated Tyrion.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: He killed his king.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: As did I. Do you know the last order the Mad King gave me? To bring him your head. I saved your life so you could murder my brother?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: It won't be murder. It'll be justice.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Justice?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I'm performing my sworn duty as Hand of the King. If Tyrion is found guilty, he will be punished accordingly.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He'll be executed.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No, he'll be punished accordingly.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Once you said family is what lives on. All that lives on. You told me about a dynasty that would last 1,000 years. What happens to your dynasty when Tyrion dies? I'm a Kingsguard, forbidden by oath to carry on the family line.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I'm well aware of your oath.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What happens to your name? Who carries the lion banner into future battles? Your nephews? Lancel Lannister? Others whose names I don't even remember?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What happens to my dynasty if I spare the life of my grandson's killer?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It survives through me. I'll leave the Kingsguard. I'll take my place as your son and heir if you let Tyrion live.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Done.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: When the testimony's concluded and a guilty verdict rendered, Tyrion will be given the chance to speak. He'll plead for mercy. I'll allow him to join the Night's Watch. In three days' time, he'll depart for Castle Black and live out his days at the Wall. You'll remove your white cloak immediately. You will leave King's Landing to assume your rightful place at Casterly Rock. You will marry a suitable woman and father children named Lannister. And you'll never turn your back on your family again.
ners: [{'tyrion'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'lannister'}, set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You have my word.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And you have mine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not going well, is it?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're going to be found guilty.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, you think so?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: When you are, you need to enter a formal plea for mercy and ask to be sent to the Wall. Father's agreed to it. He'll spare your life and allow you to join the Night's Watch.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ned Stark was promised the same thing and we both know how that turned out.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Father is not Joffrey. He'll keep his word.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How do you know?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Do you trust me?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Keep your mouth shut. No more outbursts. This will all be over soon.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: The crown may call its next witness.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: State your name.

Name: shae
Subtitles: Shae.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you swear by all the gods that your testimony will be true and honest?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I swear it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you know this man?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Yes. Tyrion Lannister.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: How do you know him?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I was handmaiden to his wife Lady Sansa.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: This man stands accused of murdering King Joffrey. What do you know of this?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I know that he's guilty.

Name: shae
Subtitles: He and Sansa planned it together.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Silence! Continue.

Name: shae
Subtitles: She wanted revenge for her father, her mother, her brother. She blamed their deaths on the king. Tyrion was happy to help. He hated Joffrey. He hated the queen. He hated you, my lord.

Name: shae
Subtitles: He stole poison from the Grand Maester's chamber to put in Joffrey's wine.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: How could you possibly know all this? Why would he reveal such plans to his wife's maid?

Name: shae
Subtitles: I wasn't just her maid. I was his whore.

Name: mace
Subtitles: I beg your pardon? You said you were his...

Name: shae
Subtitles: His whore.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: How did you come to be in his service?

Name: shae
Subtitles: He stole me. I was with another man, a knight in your lordship's army. But when Tyrion arrived at the camp, he sent one of his cutthroats into our tent. He broke the knight's arm and brought me to Lord Tyrion. "You belong to me now," he said. "I want you to fuck me like it's my last night in this world."

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Silence. Silence!

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: And did you?

Name: shae
Subtitles: Did I what?

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: Fuck him like it was his last night in this world.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I did everything he wanted. Whatever he told me to do to him. Whatever he felt like doing to me. I kissed him where he wanted. I licked him where he wanted. I let him put himself where he wanted. I was his property. I would wait in his chambers for hours so he could use me when he was bored. He ordered me to call him "my lion," so I did. I took his face in my hands and said, "I am yours and you are mine."
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Shae. Please don't.

Name: shae
Subtitles: I am a whore. Remember? That was before he married Sansa. After that, all he wanted was her. But she wouldn't let him into her bed. So he promised to kill King Joffrey for her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Father, I wish to confess. I wish... to confess.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You wish to confess?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I saved you. I saved this city and all your worthless lives. I should have let Stannis kill you all.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion. Do you wish to confess?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, Father. I'm guilty. Guilty. Is that what you want to hear?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You admit you poisoned the king?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, of that I'm innocent. I'm guilty of a far more monstrous crime. I am guilty of being a dwarf.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You are not on trial for being a dwarf.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, yes, I am. I've been on trial for that my entire life.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Have you nothing to say in your defense?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Nothing but this-- I did not do it. I did not kill Joffrey, but I wish that I had.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Watching your vicious bastard die gave me more relief than 1,000 lying whores.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I wish I was the monster you think I am. I wish I had enough poison for the whole pack of you. I would gladly give my life to watch you all swallow it.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Ser Meryn. Ser Meryn. Escort the prisoner back to his cell.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I will not give my life for Joffrey's murder. And I know I'll get no justice here. So I will let the gods decide my fate. I demand a trial by combat.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I made a deal for you to keep your ungrateful head on your ungrateful neck a little while longer.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry, what am I grateful for? The opportunity to live and die at the Wall as punishment for a crime I did not commit?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You threw your life away. You threw it away. It's not a joke. You understand that, don't you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Of course it's a joke, just not a very funny one. I couldn't- I couldn't listen to her standing there telling her lies. I couldn't do it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You fell in love with a whore.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, I fell in love with a whore. And I was stupid enough to think that she had fallen in love with me. That deal you made, it was everything Father wanted. You do see that? He gets you back as his heir. The future Lord of the Rock. And he ships me off to Castle Black, out of sight at last. All so perfect. It felt good to take that from him. He knows I'm innocent and he's willing to sacrifice me anyway. He's willing to sacrifice any of us. Not you. You're the golden son. You could kill a king, lose a hand, fuck your own sister, you'll always be the golden son.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'lord'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Careful. I'm the last friend you've got.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: At least I got to tell them what they really are.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Yes, brilliant speech. They'll be talking about it for days to come. I thought you were a realist. Didn't realize you'd die for pride.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Don't give up on me just yet. I survived one trial by combat, even though you weren't there to save me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I can't save you this time either. My training has proved that I can't beat a stable boy with my left hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where's your sense of adventure? Even if you lose, imagine the look on Father's face when you fall.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Our family name snuffed out with a single swing of the sword.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It is tempting.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well... Bronn fought for me once, he'll do it again. If he wins, I expect I'll be in his debt for the rest of my life.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If he wins.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Will you find him for me? Who does Cersei plan on naming as a champion? I hope it's Ser Meryn Trant. I'd enjoy watching Bronn disembowel that pompous child beater.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No. Not Ser Meryn.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Go on, move it.

Name: guard
Subtitles: And you. Come on.

Name: prisoner
Subtitles: Mercy. Please. Please, mercy.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Ser Gregor. Welcome to the capital. Thank you for riding here so quickly.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You seem to be in good form.

Name: mountain
Subtitles: Who am I fighting?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Does it matter?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Could be food.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Could be soldiers.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You shouldn't be sitting out here like this.

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Where else to sit? Tried to walk back to my hut, hurt too much. Then I remembered they burned my hut down.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Who were "they"?

Name: dying man
Subtitles: I stopped asking a while ago.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: That's not gonna get better.

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Doesn't seem so.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: A bad way to go. Haven't you had enough?

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Of what? I know. Time to go. Take matters into my own hands. The thought has occurred to me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So why go on?

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Habit.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nothing could be worse than this.

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Maybe nothing is worse than this.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nothing isn't better or worse than anything. Nothing is just nothing.

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My name is Arya. Arya Stark.

Name: dying man
Subtitles: You her father?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Her captor. Bringing her to her aunt for ransom.

Name: dying man
Subtitles: A fair exchange, that is. Always held to the notion of fair exchange in all my dealings. You give me, I give you. Fair. A balance. No balance anymore. Could I have a drink? Dying is thirsty work.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: dying man
Subtitles: Wish it were wine.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: So do I.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: That's where the heart is. That's how you kill a man.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: The fuck you doing?

Name: rorge
Subtitles: There's a price on your head.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Guess that's what the king does when you tell him to fuck off.

Name: rorge
Subtitles: The king's dead. He drank poisoned wine at his own wedding. The bounty on you is for killing Lannister soldiers. 100 silver stags.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: And you thought you were going to collect it? Didn't think very hard, did you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You were Yoren's prisoners when he was taking me to the Wall. He told me he'd fuck me bloody with a stick.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: This day's really not working out the way you planned. He on your little list?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He can't be. I don't know his name.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: What's your name?

Name: rorge
Subtitles: Rorge.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're learning.

Name: man
Subtitles: Rangers returning!

Name: man
Subtitles: They return!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Greetings.

Name: man
Subtitles: Didn't think I'd see you again.

Name: sam
Subtitles: All right, Jon?

Name: man
Subtitles: Welcome back, brother.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Lord Snow.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: This is no place for wild beasts. Lock him away or I'll let Hobb throw him in tonight's stew.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Come on, Ghost.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Mance's army was closing in on Craster's Keep when we left. We saw their campfires from Osric's Hill. They'll reach the Wall before the next full moon.

Name: janos slynt
Subtitles: I'm surprised you didn't ride over and say hello. The King-beyond-the-Wall is your old friend, isn't he?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We need to prepare.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: We've been preparing.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We should seal the tunnel. Plug it with rocks and ice. Flood it and let it freeze.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: And how would we range north?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We wouldn't.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Coward. You would cut off our legs, pluck out our eyes, leave us cowering behind the Wall hoping for the storm to pass?

Name: grenn
Subtitles: We can't defend the gate against a hundred thousand men.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: This castle has stood for thousands of years. The Night's Watch has defended her for thousands of years. And in all those centuries, we have never sealed the tunnel.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Have you ever seen a giant, Ser Alliser? I have.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: The bars on those gates are four inches thick. Cold-rolled steel.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They won't stop them.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Remind me which order you belong to, Lord Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The stewards.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Are the stewards responsible for maintaining the tunnel?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Who would that be?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The builders.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Ah, the builders. First Builder Yarwyck, Lord Snow here recommends sealing the tunnel, leaving us unable to carry out our duties as sworn brothers of the Night's Watch. Do you agree with him?

Name: yarwick
Subtitles: No.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Given your deep knowledge of the Wildling army, Lord Snow, you and Tarly will take night duties atop the Wall until the full moon.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Moving on. First Builder, we'll need a hundred barrels of pitch brought atop the wall.

Name: yarwick
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You have new clothes.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Do you like 'em? Eh? Gloves are doeskin. Softer than a virgin's thighs.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I sent for you days ago.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I've been a bit busy.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Doing what?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: My lonesome bachelor days are over. I'm to wed Lollys Stokeworth.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Lollys Stokeworth? She doesn't strike me as your sort of girl.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I wouldn't say I had a single sort of girl.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She's dim-witted.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: If I wanted wits, I'd marry you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: When my sister arranged this love match, did she mention that Lollys has an older sister?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Falyse. Aye, I did know about the older sister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And you understand the rules of inheritance?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Falyse is forty and barren.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She still gets Castle Stokeworth when her father dies.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: She does. Unless she happens to perish before her father. Then Lollys gets the castle.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: What? Ladies fall from their horses and snap their pretty necks all the time.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You and my sister deserve each other. Why did you bother to come here?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You once said if anyone ever asked me to sell you out, you'd double their price.

Name: tyrion lannister
