Subtitles: Well, what are you going to say?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I'm sorry it woke you up.

Name: moles town whore
Subtitles: I don't care if you're sorry. Keep that baby quiet, or I will.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Don't you ever touch him.

Name: moles town whore
Subtitles: Hehehe, little Wildling bitch. You shouldo ve stayed with your own kind. *an owl hoots in the distance* Are you listening to me?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Shut your mouth.

Name: moles town whore
Subtitles: What? It's just an owl you dumb bitch.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: No it's not.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I should never have left her there.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You couldn't have known.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Of course I couldo ve known. They were raiding the villages close by.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: And we just cower in here while they slaughter our brothers?

Name: ed
Subtitles: Our brothers had orders to stay at Castle Black.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: Oh, so it's alright then?! Black Jack and Kegs and Mully chopped to pieces 'cause they broke the rules?!

Name: ed
Subtitles: I didn't say it was alright! I'm sayin' they shouldn't have been there.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: We pledged to guard the realms of men.

Name: sam
Subtitles: She's dead because of me.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: We can't even guard Mole's Town.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We can't go after them, you know that. That's what they want.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Little Same. As if I'd cut their throats myself.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: Maybe she managed to hide herself. I thought one of you was dead, you went North with Mormont and no one came back. Not for ages. But then you did.

Name: ed
Subtitles: She survived Craster and he was the worst shit I've ever met. She survived the long march to the wall. She survived a white walker for fuck's sake. She might've got out.

Name: sam
Subtitles: She might have.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If they hit Mole's Town, then we're next. Mance's army must be close.

Name: ed
Subtitles: A hundred thousand.

Name: grenn
Subtitles: And there's what, 5 of us left.

Name: ed
Subtitles: If you're counting Black Jack, Kegs, and Mully. A hundred and two.

Name: pyp
Subtitles: How do a hundred and two men stop a thousand?

Name: ed
Subtitles: Whoever dies last, be a good lad and burn the rest of us. Once I'm done with this world, I don't want to come back.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You think he was spying on you?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: No, not spying.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Dothraki think outsiders are ridiculous taking shame in the naked body. They make love under the stars for the whole Khalasar to see.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Yes your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But you are not Dothraki.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: No.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, I don't see why it matters. Grey worm isn't interested, none of the unsullied care what's under our clothes.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: He was interested.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I believe he was interested.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: When the slavers castrate the boys, do they take all of it?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: All of it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The...the pillar an the stones.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I don't know, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Haven't you ever wondered?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Yes, your grace.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Missandei. *in Valyrian* I have come to apologize.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: in Valyrian* You don't need to apologize.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: in Valyrian* I hope I didn't frighten you.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: in Valyrian* No.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: The lessons you give I in Common tongue, these are precious to I.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: To me.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: To me.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I don't remember teaching you the word precious.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Jorah the Andal, he teaches I...he teaches me this word.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Do you remember the name you were given at birth?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: I remember nothing. Only unsullied.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: When they cut you, do you remember that?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I'm sorry they did that to you.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Why? Why sorry?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: It's a terrible thing to do to a boy.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: approaches Missandei* If the masters never cut me, I am never unsullied. I never stand in the Plaza of Pride when Daenerys Stormborn orders us to kill the masters. I never am chosen to lead the unsullied. I never meet Missandei from the Island of Naath. I am sorry I...for today. I am sorry.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: in Valyrian* Grey Worm.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: in Valyrian* I'm glad you saw me.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: in Valyrian* So am I.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Bracken. Mmm, strong. As long as they're in the see. But when you take them out of the water, no bones. They collapse under their proud weight and slum into a heap of nothing. You'd think they'd know that. Unfortunately they're not very bright. What do you tell them?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm Theon Greyjoy, son of Balon, heir to the Iron Islands.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: And what are you really?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm Reek.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Are you sure? You do look very much like a lord. Formidable, proud.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Until when?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Always. Forever.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: That's right. Until you're rotting in the ground. Remember what you are and what you're not. Bring me Lord Kenning.

Name: guard
Subtitles: to Theon* No closer. Who are you?

Name: ralf
Subtitles: I'm Kenning, commander of this garrison. And you say you're Theon Greyjoy?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: And why should I believe that?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I was born on Pike to Balon Greyjoy. His third and last-living son. I am your prince. I swear it by the drowned god. What is dead may never die.

Name: everyone
Subtitles: What is dead may never die.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: And if you were my prince, why are you marching with a Bolton army?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Lord Bolton took me captive after Winterfell. He sent me to treat with you in good faith as your fellow Ironborn.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: And what does Lord Bolton want?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You are fading from sickness. You are badly outnumbered and you're hundreds of miles from the sea. Lord Bolton implores you to protect your men and abandon this fortress you can no longer hold. Do this and he will be just and fair with you as he is being with me. The Boltons will give you safe passage to the stony shore.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: He wants us to surrender?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: My own father, your king, surrendered years ago to Robert Baratheon. I watched him bend the knee. There was no shame there. He fought with honor, as did you.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: shame fought with honor.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm sorry, I didn't hear...

Name: ralf
Subtitles: No shame fought with honor. Only a whipped dog would speak this way. Or a woman. Are you a woman boy?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: scared* You don't know.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: The Ironborn will not surrender.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: whispering* Reek. Reek.

Name: ralf
Subtitles: You go tell your master that, Theon Greyjoy. Or whoever the fuck you are. What in the hell are you muttering?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Reek.

Name: man
Subtitles: If we yield, we live? Is that what it says on this paper here?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes. Have your men raise the white flag and open the gates. You're going home.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You didn't really think I'd let them go did you? It's falling out of fashion. Fileting. Sad, but true. Traditions are important. Where are we without our history, eh?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes m'lord. Will we go home now?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I believe we will. To our new home.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: A great-grandfather from Braavos, yes. I suppose all of our ancestors came from somewhere else originally.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Our forebearers settled the Vale thousands of years ago. We've fought off invaders ever since.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: The beauty of the Vale is matched only by the nobility of its great families. Lady Arryn often told me that you were her rock, Lord Royce.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: She told me nothing about you, Baelish. But I didn't need to hear from her. Moneylender. Whoremonger. You've been licking Tywin Lannister's boots so long, it's a wonder your tongue's not black.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: My lord...

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: And when Jon Arryn named you Master of Coin, no one cared. Always been a grubby job. Why not let a grubby man do it? But when I heard you were lurking here, fawning over the Lady Arryn...

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Lady Arryn invited me. She and I have been close since childhood.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Yes, we all know how close you were. Lady Arryn's predilections were her own affair. Her death is our affair.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Of course. Her suicide shattered us all.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: She was an odd fish. Everyone knew that. But suicide? She adored that boy of hers. I don't see her abandoning him. Not by choice.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Strange that within days of your arrival, you've married Lady Arryn and she's fallen through the Moon Door.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: She was always prone to melancholy. My lady wasn't meant for a world as brutal as ours.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: We were told there was a witness. A girl.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: A niece of yours, I believe.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: A girl with no learning and scattered wits. I assure you, she would be of no help.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: We'd like to speak with her.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Let me fetch her.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: No need. We prefer to hear her testimony unadulterated.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Come closer, child. You have nothing to fear from us or him. Lord Baelish here is your uncle? Your name is Alayne? Perhaps you would feel more comfortable if Lord Baelish left the room.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: My lady...

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: I wasn't asking you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He can stay.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Speak up, girl, you're not a damn kitchen mouse. Tell us what you saw.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: to Petyr* I'm sorry, Lord Baelish. I have to tell the truth. *to the council* I'll tell you everything.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Please, Alayne, leave nothing out.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My name is not Alayne. It's Sansa Stark, eldest daughter of Lord Eddard Stark. Lord Royce, we met when you came to Winterfell. You were escorting your son Ser Waymar to the Wall.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Sansa Stark? You tell lies right to my face, you little worm?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Baelish has told many lies. All to protect me. Since my father was executed, I have been a hostage in King's Landing. A plaything for Joffrey to torture or Queen Cersei to torment. They beat me, they humiliated me, they married me to the Imp. I had no friends in King's Landing...except one. He saved me. Smuggled me away when he had the chance. He knew I'd be safe here in the Eyrie with my own blood, my Aunt Lysa. The Lannisters have friends everywhere. Even the Vale. He made me swear not to tell anyone my true name.
ners: [{'baelish'}, set(), set(), {'cersei', 'joffrey'}, {'imp'}, set(), set(), set(), {'lysa'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: ser vance
Subtitles: Your secret is safe with us, my lady.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Your father grew up right here in these halls. We hunted together many times. He was a fine man.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Tell us what happened to your aunt, Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You knew her well, my lords, my lady. You knew she was a troubled woman. She always loved Lord Baelish. She told me herself. From the moment he arrived at the gates of Riverrun, a boy of eight carrying everything he owned in a little sack. She confessed to me she never loved Lord Arryn. She did as her father commanded, as so many of us have. When the gods finally allowed her to be with Lord Baelish, she was so happy. For a time. My aunt was a jealous lady. She was terrified that Lord Baelish didn't love her anymore. That he would abandon her for a younger woman. And then...one day she saw him kiss me.
ners: [set(), set(), {'baelish'}, set(), set(), {'arryn'}, set(), {'baelish'}, set(), set(), {'baelish'}, set(), set()]

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Lady Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It was a peck on the cheek, Lord Royce, nothing more. Lord Baelish is my uncle now, in truth, by marriage. He's always been so kind to me. I was so happy to be here, to be free. All because of him. But my aunt turned on me. She cursed me. Called me a whore. Promised to throw me through the Moon Door. When Lord Baelish tried to calm her, she struck him. She said she didn't want to live anymore. She stood on the edge of that Moon Door. He tried to reason with her. Promised her she was the only one he had ever loved, but she stepped through those doors and she was...*begins sobbing*
ners: [{'royce'}, {'baelish'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'baelish'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Shh. Shh, it's not your fault, sweet girl. It's not your fault.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: You could see it in the way she raised that boy. Feeding him from her own teats when he was 10 years old.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Lord Royce! This is hardly the time.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Apologies, my lady. And to you as well, Baelish. We treated you a bit harshly.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: You want justice, Lord Royce. I can hardly complain about that. I want the same.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Not much justice to be meted out in suicide, is there?

Name: petyr
Subtitles: For Lysa, no. But for her son? Only 20 years ago, the knights of the Vale rode behind Jon Arryn, Ned Stark, Robert Baratheon. They fought together to overcome the Mad King. And since then, Arryn and Royce, Corbray, Waynwood, all the great houses of the Vale watched from the corner. A timid boy at a tavern brawl.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Are you questioning our courage?

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I want to know which side you're on. Do you support the Lannisters, the house that executed your friend Ned Stark?

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Of course we don't support the damn Lannisters.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: No? Catelyn Stark begged her sister for support and Lysa refused. By staying out of the fray, you've allowed Tywin Lannister to destroy his rivals on every compass point. Who stands against him now?

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Who would you have us back, Lord Baelish? Robb Stark is dead.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I'd have you back Robin Arryn, Lord of the Vale.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: Robin Arryn is a sickly little boy.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: And sickly little boys sometimes become powerful men.

Name: lady anya
Subtitles: More often they die young.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I adored Lysa with all my heart. But she loved her son so much, she became overprotective. He needs to learn how to swing a sword. How to ride a horse.

Name: lord royce
Subtitles: Aye, it's time.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Yes, it's time. Time for him to tour the Vale, to visit all the castles in his domain. Time for Robin to leave the nest.

Name: boy
Subtitles: Ser Barristan.

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: Yes? Who sent you?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Ser Barristan.

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: Ser Jorah.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Have I forgotten a council meeting?

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: No.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: What's this?

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: A royal pardon signed by Robert Baratheon. You spied on her.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Who gave you this?

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: Does it matter?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Have you told her?

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: I wanted to tell you first, man-to-man rather than go behind your back.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Let me speak with her in private.

Name: ser barristan
Subtitles: You'll never be alone with her again.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why did the usurper pardon you?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: If we could speak alone.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No, speak to me here. Explain it to me.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Who do you think sent this to Meereen? Who profits? This is the work of Tywin Lannister. He wants to divide us. If we're fighting each other, we're not fighting him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The pardon was signed the year we met. Why were you pardoned? Unless you're saying this document was forged.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: It is not forged.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why, then?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: I sent letters to Varys, the spymaster of King's Landing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What was the content of these letters?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Information.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What information?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: When you and Viserys arrived in Pentos. His plan to marry you to Khal Drogo. When you were married. When your brother died.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You told him I was carrying Drogo's child?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Yes or no?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't call me that. Did you tell him I was carrying Drogo's child?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That wine merchant tried to poison me because of your information.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: I stopped you from drinking his wine.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Because you knew it was poisoned.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: I suspected.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You betrayed me from the first.

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Forgive me. I never meant...please, Khaleesi, forgive me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You sold my secrets to the man who killed my father and stole my brother's throne...

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: I have protected you. Fought for you. Killed for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: and you want me to forgive you?

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: I have loved you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Love? Love? How can you say that to me? Any other man, and I would have you executed. But you, I do not want you in my city dead or alive. Go back to your masters in King's Landing. Collect your pardon if you can.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: ser jorah
Subtitles: Daenerys, please.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't ever presume to touch me again or speak my name. You have until dusk to collect your things and leave this city. If you're found in Meereen past break of day, I'll have your head thrown into Slaver's Bay. Go. Now.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Moat Cailin is yours, Father.

Name: lord bolton
Subtitles: Walk with me. Has there been any word from Locke?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: No.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Unimportant. A cripple, a young boy. None of the northern lords have seen them. Dead most likely. Most of the Ironborn have fled the North. Now more will follow, thanks to you. Tell me what you see.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Moors, fields, hills.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tell me what you see.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Nothing.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Not nothing. The North. Ride 700 miles that way, you're still in the North. 400 miles that way. 300 miles that way. The North is larger than the other six kingdoms combined. And I am the Warden of the North. The North is mine. Now tell me, what is your name?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'the'}, set(), set()]

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Ramsay Snow.

Name: roose
Subtitles: No, not Ramsay Snow. *hands Ramsay a scroll* Open it. From this day until your last day, you are Ramsay Bolton, son of Roose Bolton, Warden of the North.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You honor me. I swear I will uphold your name and your tradition. I will be worthy of you, Father, I promise.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Come, Reek, I'll be needing a bath.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes?

Name: petyr
Subtitles: First time I saw you, you were just a child. A girl from the North come to the capital for the first time. Not a child any longer. Why did you help me?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They would have thrown you through the Moon Door if they found you guilty.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: That's not an answer.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If they'd have executed you, what would they have done with me?

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I don't know.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Neither do I.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Better to gamble on the man you know than the strangers you don't? And you think you know me?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I know what you want.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Do you?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I thought it'd make me happy, but it doesn't. Not really. Nothing makes you happy.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Lots of things make me happy.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Like what?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Killing Polliver, killing Rorge.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: So you're sad because you didn't get to kill Joffrey yourself. Is that it?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: At least I could have been there to watch. I wanted to see the look in his eyes when he knew it was over.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Aye, nothing in the world beats that look.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You protected him for most of his life. You think you could have saved him?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I wasn't the damn wine taster. Little shit deserved to die, but poison...poison's a woman's weapon. Men kill with steel.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's your stupid pride talking. It's why you'll never be a great killer. I'd have killed Joffrey with a chicken bone if I had to.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: laughs* I'd pay good money to see that. *grunts and rubs his neck*

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You should have let me burn it.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: It's a fleabite.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That fleabite's got you walking a lot slower than you used to.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Well, we won't have to walk too much further.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You really think my aunt will pay for me?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Aye, she'll pay.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I've never even met her.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Doesn't matter. You're her blood. Family, honor, all that horseshit. It's all you lords and ladies ever talk about.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not a lady.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Who would pass the Bloody Gate?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: The bloody Hound, Sandor Clegane. And his...traveling companion Arya Stark, niece of your lady Lysa Arryn.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Then I offer my condolences. Lady Arryn died. Three days ago.

Name: robin
Subtitles: I've never left home before, Uncle Petyr. I'm afraid to leave.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: You shouldn't be.

Name: robin
Subtitles: The Lord of the Vale belongs in the Eyrie, Mother said. She said it's not safe outside.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: It wasn't safe for her inside. People die at their dinner tables. They die in their beds. They die squatting over their chamber pots. Everybody dies sooner or later. Don't worry about your death. Worry about your life. Take charge of your life for as long as it lasts. That is what it means to be Lord of the Vale.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Shall we go?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Wine always helps. I thank you for it. Trial by combat. Deciding a man's guilt or innocence in the eyes of the gods by having two other men hack each other to pieces. Tells you something about the gods. How much longer?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Soon.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you think Oberyn has a chance? The Red Viper of Dorne. You don't get a name like that unless you're deadly, right?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I've never seen him fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, he's going to die. I'm going to die.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Oberyn believes in himself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: That's putting it mildly. What's the punishment for regicide? Drawing and quartering? Hanging? Breaking at the wheel?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Beheading.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Seems rather ordinary. And he was my nephew as well, so what is that? Fratricide is brothers. Filicide is sons. Nepoticide. That's the one. Matricide, patricide, infanticide, suicide. There's no kind of killing that doesn't have its own word.
ners: [set(), set(), {'fratricide'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Cousins.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Cousins, you're right. There is no word for cousin killing. Well done. Do you remember cousin Orson? Orson Lannister?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Of course. Wet-nurse dropped him on his head. Left him simple.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Simple? Used to sit all day in the garden. Crushing beetles with a rock.

Name: together
Subtitles: Khuu! Khuu! Khuu!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Nothing made him happier.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Nothing made you happier. You'd think being tormented from birth would have given you some affinity for the afflicted.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: On the contrary. Laughing at another person's misery was the only thing that made me feel like everyone else.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The joke wore thin, though.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: For you. You drifted away.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I had other interests.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, other interests. But I stayed with Orson.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I was curious. Why was he smashing all those beetles? What did he get out of it? First thing I did was ask him. "Orson, why are you smashing all those beetles?" He gave me an answer. "Smash the beetles. Smash 'em. Khuu! Khuu! Khuu!" I wasn't deterred. I was the smartest person I knew. Certainly I had the wherewithal to unravel the mysteries that lay at the heart of a moron. So I went to Maester Volarik's library.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'orson'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'volarik'}]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Volarik. Tried to touch me once.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Turns out, far too much has been written about great men and not nearly enough about morons. Doesn't seem right. In any case, I found nothing that illuminated the nature of Orson's affliction or the reason behind his relentless beetle slaughter. So I went back to the source. I may not have been able to speak with Orson, but I could observe him, watch him the way men watch animals to come to a deeper understanding of their behavior. *picks up a beetle* And as I watched, I became more and more sure of it. There was something happening there. His face was like the page of a book written in a language I didn't understand. But he wasn't mindless. He had his reasons. And I became possessed with knowing what they were. I began to spend inordinate amounts of time watching him. I would eat my lunch in the garden, chewing my mutton to the music of "khuu, khuu, khuu". And when I wasn't watching him, I was thinking about him. Father droned on about the family legacy and I thought about Orson's beetles. I read the histories of Targaryen conquests. Did I hear dragon wings? No. I heard "khuu, khuu, khuu" and I still couldn't figure out why he was doing it. And I had to know, because it was horrible that all these beetles should be dying for no reason.
ners: [set(), set(), {'orson'}, set(), {'orson'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'targaryen'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Every day around the world, men, women, and children are murdered by the score. Who gives a dusty fuck about a bunch of beetles?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I know, I know. But still, it filled me with dread. Piles and piles of them, years and years of them. How many countless living crawling things smashed and dried out and returned to the dirt? In my dreams I found myself standing on a beach made of beetle husks stretching as far as the eye could see. I woke up crying, weeping for their shattered little bodies. I tried to stop Orson once.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He was twice your size.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He just pushed me aside with a "khuu" and kept on smashing. Every day until that mule kicked him in the chest and killed him. *puts the beetle back on the ground* So what do you think? Why did he do it? What was it all about?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't know.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Good luck today.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Looks like very light armor.

Subtitles: I like to move around.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You could at least wear a helmet. You shouldn't drink before a fight.

Subtitles: You learn this during your years in the fighting pits? I always drink before a fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It could get you killed. It could get me killed.

Subtitles: Today is not the day I die.

Subtitles: He is the biggest man I've ever seen.

Subtitles: Size does not matter when you are flat on your back.

Subtitles: Say it. You raped her. You murdered her. You killed her children.

Name: oberyn martell
Subtitles: You raped her! You murdered her! You killed her children!

Subtitles: You raped her! You murdered her!

Who gave you the order?! Say her name! You raped her! You murdered her! You killed her children. Say it. Say her name. Say it!

Subtitles: Yes. Imagine the stories Wildlings tell about us! Love is the death of duty. I told that to your friend Jon Snow once. He didn't listen and neither did you. That's why you abandoned your watch atop the wall to come here and read about the things that may have happened to the girl you love.

Subtitles: Yes you do.

Subtitles: You know who I was before I came here? What I couldo ve been if I'd only said the word? Of course you do. I met many girls when I was Aemon Targaryen. A future king always does. Some of them were quite forward in their attempts to win my affections. One of them succeeded. I was very young.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), {'aemon'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

We could spend all night trading tales of lost love. Nothing makes the past a sweeter place to visit than the prospect of imminent death. Go to bed Tarly.

But if he starts second-guessing himself, that's the end. For him. For the clever little twats. For everyone. This is not the end. Not for us. Not if you lot do your duty for however long it takes to beat them back. And then you get to go on hating me and I get to go on wishing your Wildling whore had finished the job.

I was nothing at all. And when you're nothing at all, there's no more reason to be afraid.

Subtitles: Where are you going?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm going to find Mance.

Name: sam
Subtitles: To...you can't do that. No one gave you any orders.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Who's left to give orders? The Wildling army is only an army because of Mance. He united a hundred warring tribes. Without Mance they lose their leader. They lose their purpose, they go back to fighting each other, scatter back to their home.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Without Mance? You're going to kill him?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm going to try.

Name: sam
Subtitles: They'll never let you within a hundred yards of him. And if you did, even if you managed to kill him.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He'll kill me. If I don't go he'll kill me anyway. They'll kill the rest of us too.

Name: sam
Subtitles: He won't just kill ya. They'll boil you. They'll filet you. They'll make it last days!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're right. It's a bad plan. What's your plan?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They held the gate. Get some brothers down here to help you. You need to burn the bodies. Raise the outer gate, then lower it again as soon as I'm out.

Name: sam
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I promised Jeor I'd never lose it again. *he hands the sword to Sam* In case I don't come back.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Jon. Come back.

Name: mance
Subtitles: You're wearing a black cloak again.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I've been sent to negotiate with you.

Name: mance
Subtitles: It appears my trusting nature got the better of me. It's happened before. I was hoping your loyalty was real when you pledged yourself to us, Jon Snow, truly I was.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Halfhand ordered me to join your army and bring back whatever information I could to Castle Black. He made me kill him so you'd trust me. I was loyal, to him and to my Night's Watch vows.

Name: mance
Subtitles: All of your vows? She wasn't enough to turn ya, eh? Were you enough to turn her?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She put three arrows in me when I escaped.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Did you see her again at Castle Black?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: mance
Subtitles: And?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She's dead.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Your doing?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: mance
Subtitles: We'll drink to her.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Of all the ways I'd kill you, poison would be the last.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Ygritte.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ygritte.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's not wine.

Name: mance
Subtitles: No, it's a proper Northern drink, Jon Snow. You did well. Fought hard. Killed some of our strongest men. One of our giants went into your tunnel and never came out again. Mag the Mighty.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's dead. He killed my friend Grenn.

Name: mance
Subtitles: He was their king. Last of a bloodline that stretches back before the First Men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Grenn came from a farm.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Mag and Grenn.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Grenn and Mag.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Kullback, could I trouble you for something to eat? I don't imagine our guest has eaten anything in quite some time. So. You're here to strike a bargain?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Turn your army around and go home.

Name: mance
Subtitles: You know I know you're low on arrows. You're low on oil. You're low on men. How many are left? 50?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I told Tormund and Orell. We have more than a thousand men.

Name: mance
Subtitles: I showed you everything I had. The whole army, a hundred thousand strong, and what did you do? You fired on us with everything you had. It wasn't much. Soon as I saw that I sent four hundred men to climb the wall. An unmanned stretch five miles west of here. A lot of them will die climbing, but most of them will be over by the end of the day. This is me being honest with you, Jon Snow, which is more than you've ever done for me. My people have bled enough. We're not here to conquer, we're here to hide behind your wall just like you. We need your tunnel. Now we both know that winter is coming and if my people aren't south of the wall when it comes in earnest, we'll all end up worse than dead. Wanna strike a bargain with me? Here's a bargain. You go back, you open the gates to us and I swear to you that no one else will die. Refuse and we'll kill every last man in Castle Black.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'jon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: mance
Subtitles: Ah! Oh, that's why you're here. I reckon you could do it before any of them could stop ya. They'd kill you of course, they'd kill ya slow, but ya knew that when you came in here. Are you capable of that, Jon Snow? Killing a man in his own tent when he's just offered ya peace? Is that what the Night's Watch is? Is that what you are?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'jon'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: mance
Subtitles: You attacking us?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No, it's like you said, we don't have the men.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Hold! To me. To me.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Stand down! I said my people have bled enough and I meant it.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You're the king beyond the wall?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You know who I am?

Name: mance
Subtitles: Never had the pleasure.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This is Stannis Baratheon, the one true king of the seven kingdoms.

Name: mance
Subtitles: We're not in the seven kingdoms and you're not dressed for this weather.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: It is customary to kneel when surrendering to a king.

Name: mance
Subtitles: We do not kneel.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'll have thousands of your men in chains by nightfall, I'll have nowhere to put them and nothing to feed them. I'm not here to slaughter beat dogs. Their fate depends on their king.

Name: mance
Subtitles: All the same, we do not kneel.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Take these men away.

Name: davos
Subtitles: What are men of the Night's Watch doing in a Wildling camp?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I was sent to discuss terms with the king beyond the wall.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You're speaking to the one true king boy. You'll address him as your grace.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I know he's the king. My father died for him. My name is Jon Snow, your grace. I'm Ned Stark's son.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Your father was an honorable man.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He was, your grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: What do you think he'd have done with him?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I was this man's prisoner once. He couldo ve tortured me, he couldo ve killed me, but he spared my life. I think my father wouldo ve taken him prisoner, listened to what he had to say.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Very well. *to Davos* Take him.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your grace. If my father'd seen the things that I've seen, he'd also tell you to burn the dead before nightfall. All of them.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: I would suggest milk of the poppy to ease his pain but he is completely insensate.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Bloody Martells.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: The cause appears to be manticore venom.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: It is, yes, manticore.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: I've read a good deal about it. It's a horrible poison, usually Mantari in origin. Oh! Yes, yes. There's nothing to be done.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Yes there is.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: May I ask what you think you're doing?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Saving him.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your grace. I wish it were otherwise, but Ser Gregor is beyond saving. Well, well beyond. This man is not even a Maester, let alone Grand Maester.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: That's for the best. No Maester knows how to save him.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: That is exactly the sort of arrogance that had him expelled from the citadel, your grace. His curiosity was deemed dangerous and unnatural. Rightly so in my opinion.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're dismissed, Grand Maester.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your grace. This is my laboratory!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Not anymore.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You can save him?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Difficult to say, your grace, but if my past work is any guide. We stand a chance.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do everything you can. Come to me with anything you need.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Thank you, your grace. You should know, the process may change him, somewhat.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Will it weaken him?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Oh no.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Very well then.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Not another word. We've been over this, the matter's closed.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm opening it again.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You are betrothed to Loras Tyrell. Still betrothed to Loras Tyrell and you will marry Loras Tyrell as soon as Tommen marries Margaery.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I will not.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Jaime cannot marry or inherit lands. Tyrion's sentence will be carried out tomorrow. You have, on several occasions, made great claims about your commitment to this family's future. Your role in that future is more vital now than it ever was.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I don't care. I will stay in King's Landing where I belong with my son, the king.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: When you were nine years old, I was called to the capital. I decided to take your brother with me and not you. You insisted that you would not be left at Casterly Rock under any circumstances and if you recall-

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm not interested in hearing another one of your smug stories about the time you won. This isn't going to be one of those times.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Do you think you'll be the first person dragged into a sept to be married against her will?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: When you marched into the throne room to tell me we'd won the Battle at Blackwater, do you remember?! I was sitting on the iron throne with Tommen. I was about to give him essence of nightshade, that's how far I was willing to go when I thought someone awful had come to take my son away. Someone awful is coming to take him away.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Joffrey is dead. Myrcella's been sold like livestock. And now you want to ship me off to Highgarden and steal my boy, my last boy. Margaery will dig her claws in and you will dig your claws in and you will fight over him like beasts until you rip him apart. I will burn our house to the ground before I let that happen.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And how will you do that?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'll tell everyone the truth.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And what truth would that be?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You don't know, do you? You never believed it. How is that possible? What am I saying, of course it's possible. How can someone so consumed by the idea of his family have any conception what his actual family was doing? We were right there in front of you and you didn't see us. One look in the past twenty years, one real look and you wouldo ve known.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Known what?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Everything they say is true. About Jaime and me.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: No, no, no, no, no.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your legacy is a lie.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: I don't believe you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes you do.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You won. One fewer brother. Must be proud of yourself. There's really nothing you wouldn't do, is there?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: For my family, no. I would do things for my family you couldn't imagine.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion is your family.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He's not.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You don't get to choose.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I do, so do you. You can choose the creature that killed our mother to come into this world-

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Are you really mad enough to blame him for that? He didn't decide to kill her. He was an infant.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A disease doesn't decide to kill you, all the same you cut it out before it does. What do you decide? What do you choose?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The things I did to get back to you, to endure all that, only to find you-

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I choose you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Those are words.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes. Like the ones I just said to father. I told him.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Told him what?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I told him about us.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You told him?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I told him I wouldn't marry Loras Tyrell. I told him I'm staying right here with Tommen, with you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You think he'll just accept that?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Go and ask him.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What did you say?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I don't want to talk about Tywin Lannister. I don't choose Tywin Lannister, I don't love Tywin Lannister. I love my brother. I love my lover. People will whisper, they'll make their jokes. Let them. They're all so small I can't even see them. I only see what matters.
ners: [{'tywin'}, {'tywin'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Someone will walk in.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I don't care.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: in Valyrian* You stand before Daenerys Stormborn, the Unburnt, Queen of Mereen, Queen of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men. Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons.

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: in Valyrian* Thank you for seeing me, your grace. My name is Fennesz. I can speak the common tongue if you wish.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You speak it very well.

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: Before you freed me, I belonged to Master Mighdal. I was tutor to his children. I taught them languages and history. They know a great deal about your family because of me. Little Calla is only seven, but she admires you very much.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I hope I can prove worthy of her admiration. What can I do for you?

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: When you took the city, the children begged me not to leave the house. But Master Mighdal and I agreed that I must. So I lost my home. Now I live on the streets.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I have outfitted mess halls to feed all former slaves and barracks to shelter them.

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: I do not mean to offend, your grace. I went to one of these places. The young prey on the old. Take what they want and beat us if we resist.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My Unsullied will make them safe again in short order my friend, this I promise you.

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: Even if they are safe, who would I be there? What purpose would I serve? With my master, I was a teacher. I had the respect and love of these children.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What is it that you want from me?

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: Your grace, I ask you to let me sell myself back to Master Mighdal.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You want to return to a man who owned you, like a goat or a chair?

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: Please, your grace, the young may rejoice in the new world you've built for them. But for those of us too old to change there is only fear and squalor. I am not alone. There are many outside waiting to beg the same-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I did not take this city to preside over the injustice I fought to destroy. I took it to bring people freedom. But freedom means making your own choices. I will allow you to sign a contract with your former master. It may not cover a period lasting longer than a year.

Name: fennesz
Subtitles: Thank you, your grace. Thank you.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: The masters will take advantage of this situation. The men serving them will be slaves in all but name.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Approach my friend.

Name: man
Subtitles: in Low Valyrian* I do not understand, my queen. I do not understand, my queen.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: in Low Valyrian* The Queen says you may approach.

Name: man
Subtitles: crying, speaking Low Valyrian*

Name: missandei
Subtitles: translating* I have brought you. He came from the sky. The black one. The winged shadow. He came from the sky and...

Name: missandei
Subtitles: translating* My girl. My little girl.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What was her name?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Zala, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How old was she?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Three.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Three. *in Valyrian* And still no word on Drogon?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: in Valyrian* Sailors saw him flying over the Black Cliffs three days ago, my queen. Nothing since then.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: in Valyrian* Meet me in the catacombs.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: They came to us from White Harbor and Barrowton, from Fairmarket and King's Landing, from north and south, from east and west. They died protecting men, women, and children who will never know their names. It is for us to remember them. Our brothers, we shall never see their like again.

Name: all together
Subtitles: And now their watch is ended.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: And now their watch is ended.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Your old blind man patched me up. Why?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's sworn to treat all wounded men, friend or foe.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You want me alive so you can torture me?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No one's going to torture you.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: So how do we die? Hanging? Beheading? Drop us from the top of the wall?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't know what happens to the prisoners.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Who decides?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I suppose Stannis does.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: He your king now?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't have a king.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You spent too much time with us, Jon Snow. You can never be a kneeler again.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're gonna burn the bodies of your dead. Do you want to say any words over them?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Words? What kind of words?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Funeral words. I don't know how the Free Folk do it.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Do what?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Say farewell.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: The dead can't hear us, boy.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Snow. Did you love her? She loved you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She told you?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: No. All she ever talked about was killing you. That's how I know. She belongs in the North. The real North. You understand me?

Name: meera
Subtitles: We can stop, we can rest.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: We'll rest with the three-eyed raven.

Name: meera
Subtitles: We're not going to make it.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: We're already here.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Jojen. Jojen! Look, Jojen, look.

Name: meera
Subtitles: JOJEN! Hold on!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Help them! Now!

Name: meera
Subtitles: Hold on to me!

Name: hodor
Subtitles: Hodor...

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Help them!

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Bran! Save yourself, now!

Name: girl
Subtitles: Come with me, Brandon Stark!

Name: girl
Subtitles: He is lost. Come with me, or die with him.

Name: jojen
Subtitles: Go with them.

Name: girl
Subtitles: They cannot follow us. The power that moves them is powerless here.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: girl
Subtitles: The First Men called us The Children, but we were born long before them. Come, he waits for you.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You're the three-eyed raven.

Name: old man
Subtitles: I have been many things. Now, I am what you see.

Name: meera
Subtitles: My brother, he led us to you, and now he…

Name: old man
Subtitles: He knew what would happen. From the moment he left, he knew, and he went anyway.

Name: meera
Subtitles: How do you know?

Name: old man
Subtitles: I've been watching you. All of you, all of your lives, with a thousand eyes and one. Now you've come to me at last, Brandon Stark, though the hour is late.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I didn't want anyone to die for me.

Name: old man
Subtitles: He died so that you could find what you have lost.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You're going to help me walk again?

Name: old man
Subtitles: You'll never walk again. But you will fly.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Podrick. Podrick! Where are the horses?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I hobbled them last night.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: What sort of hobble?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: A figure-eight, like you taught me.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: If you did it like I taught you then the horses would be here.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Thieves, maybe?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: It's at least thirty miles to the Eyrie from here. You're carrying the saddle bags.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: People coming. You can shit later, there's people coming!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Morning!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Morning.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I like your sword. Are we getting close to the bloody gate?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: About ten more miles.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Did you hear that Podrick? Only about ten more miles to the Bloody Gate.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you a knight?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: No.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But you know how to use that sword.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I do.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Does it have a name?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Oathkeeper.”

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Mine's “Needle.”

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Good name.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Who taught you how to fight?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: My father.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Mine never wanted to. Said fighting was for boys.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Mine said the same. But I kept fighting the boys anyway. Kept losing. Finally my father said, “If you're going to do it, you might as well do it right.”

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Seven blessings. I'm Brienne of Tarth, this is Podrick Payne.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You want something?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: That's Sandor Clegane- the Hound.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You're Arya Stark.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I asked if you wanted something.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I swore to your mother I would bring you home to her.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My mother's dead.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I know. I wish I couldo ve been there to protect her.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're not a northerner.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I know, but I swore a sacred vow to protect her.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why didn't you?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: She commanded me to bring Jaime Lannister back to King's Landing.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're paid by the Lannisters. You're here for the bounty on me.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm not paid by the Lannisters.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: No? Fancy sword you've got there. Where'd you get it? I've been looking at Lannister gold all my life. Go on, Brienne of fucking Tarth, tell me that's not Lannister gold.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Jaime Lannister gave me this sword.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Bloody Gate's ten miles.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I swore to your mother by the Old Gods and the New -

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't care what you swore!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Arya!

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You heard the girl! She's not coming with you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: She is.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're not a good listener. Valyrian steel-- I've always wanted some Valyrian steel.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Come with me Arya. I'll take you to safety.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Safety?! Where the fuck's that? Her aunt in the Eyrie's dead. Her mother's dead, her father's dead, her brother's dead. Winterfell's a pile of rubble. There's no safety, you dumb bitch. If you don't know that by now, you're the wrong one to watch over her.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: And that's what you're doing? Watching over her?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Aye, that's what I'm doing.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I have no wish to kill you Ser.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: I'm not a knight.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Arya! Arya! ARYA! Where is she?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: She was just here...

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Why weren't you watching her?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I was watching you I thought you migth need some help…

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Which way Pod? Which way did she go?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Ah, I think that way.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You're still here? [Coughs] Big bitch saved you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't need saving.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: No, not you. You're a real killer. With your water dancing, and your needle.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're gonna die?

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Unless there's a Maester hiding behind that rock, aye, I'm done. I'd skin you alive for wine. [Arya offers water.] Fuck water! Killed by a woman. I bet you liked that. Go on, go after her. She'll help you. Going out alone, you won't last a day out there.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'll last longer than you.

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: You remember where the heart is? Fuck it. I'm ready. Go on, girl. Another name off your list. You kept promising me. I cut down your butcher's boy, the ginger. He was begging for mercy. Please sir, please don't kill me, please, please. Bled all over my horse. Saddle stunk of butcher's boy for weeks. And your sister, your pretty sister. I shouldo ve taken her. That night the Blackwater burned, I shouldo ve fucked her bloody. At least I'd have one happy memory! Do I have to beg you? Do it. Do it.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'saddle'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sandor clegane
Subtitles: Kill me. Kill me! Kill me! Kill me!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, get on with it you son of a whore.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Is that any way to speak about our mother?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What're you doing?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What do you think I'm doing? The galley's waiting in the bay bound for the Free Cities.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Who's helping you?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Varys.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Varys?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You have more friends than you thought.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: There's a locked door at the top of the stairs. Knock on it twice, and then twice again. Varys will open.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I suppose this is goodbye, then.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Farewell, little brother.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Jaime, thank you. For my life.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Quickly now.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Tywin… my lion...

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I'm sorry.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion! Put down the crossbow. Who released you? Ah, your brother ,I expect. He always had a soft spot for you. Come, we'll go and talk in my chambers. Is this how you want to speak to me? Shaming your father has always given you pleasure…
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All my life, you've wanted me dead.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Yes. But you refused to die. I respect that, even admire it. You fight for what's yours. I'd never let them execute you; is that what you fear? I'd never let Illyn Payne take your head. You're a Lannister. You're my son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I loved her.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Who?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Shae.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Bah, Tyrion. Put down that crossbow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I murdered her. With my own hands.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: It doesn't matter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It doesn't matter?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: She was a whore!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Say that word again.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: And what? You'll kill your own father in the privy? No. You're my son. Enough of this nonsense…

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I am your son, and you sentenced me to die. You knew I didn't poison Joffrey, but you sentenced me all the same. Why?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: Enough. We'll go back to my chambers and speak with some dignity.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I can't go back there. She's in there.

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: What, are you afraid of a dead whore?

Name: tywin lannister
Subtitles: You shot me. You're no son of mine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I am your son. I have always been your son.

Name: varys
Subtitles: What have you done? Quickly. Trust me, my friend, I've brought you this far.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I want to see the captain.

Name: captain
Subtitles: You're seeing him.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I want to go north, to the wall.

Name: captain
Subtitles: No you don't.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I can pay.

Name: captain
Subtitles: There is nothing in the north but ice and war and pirates.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I wouldn't need a cabin. Please, I could work, scrubbing the floors, or…

Name: captain
Subtitles: I'm not going north, child, we're going home.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Where's home?

Name: captain
Subtitles: The Free City of Braavos.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Wait, I have something else.

Name: captain
Subtitles: More silver won't make a difference.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's not silver, it's iron.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Valar morghulis.

Name: captain
Subtitles: How did you… valar dohaeris. Of course, you shall have a cabin.

Name: melara
Subtitles: We shouldn't be out here alone.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Why not?

Name: melara
Subtitles: If your father hears…

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He'll never know we've been gone.

Name: melara
Subtitles: But if he finds out…

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You don't need to be afraid of my father.

Name: melara
Subtitles: Are you sure?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: melara
Subtitles: We shouldn't go in.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Of course we should.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Get out. Get out!

Name: melara
Subtitles: Let's go…

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Listen to your friend.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They said that you were terrifying. With cat's teeth and three eyes. You're not terrifying. You're boring.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: You don't know what I am.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I know you're a witch and you can see the future. Tell me mine.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Everybody wants to know their future. Until they know their future.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This is my father's land. My land. Tell me my future or I'll have your two boring eyes gouged out of your head.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Your blood. Give me a taste.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Three questions you get. You won't like the answers.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I've been promised to the prince. When will we marry?

Name: maggy
Subtitles: You'll never wed the prince. You'll wed the king.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: But I will be queen?

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Oh yes, you'll be queen. For a time. In comes another. Younger, more beautiful, to cast you down and take all you hold dear.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Will the king and I have children?

Name: maggy
Subtitles: No. The king will have 20 children, and you will have 3.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That doesn't make sense.

Name: maggy
Subtitles: Gold will be their crowns. Gold their shrouds.

Name: melara
Subtitles: Come on, we have to go. We have to go! Cersei!

Name: priest
Subtitles: Your grace, we are honored by your presence. The mourners are waiting.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They will keep waiting. I want a moment alone with him.

Name: priest
Subtitles: But your grace, many of these lords and ladies have travelled day and night to be here…

Name: priest
Subtitles: From all seven kingdoms…

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They will wait.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He never wanted you to be a King's Guard, but here you are, protecting his dead body.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What he built. The towers. He built it for us. He meant it for us. They're going to try to take it away, all of it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: All of them out there are enemies. They're waiting a night to make sure he's really dead and as soon as they see the stones on his eyes they'll set to work on tearing us apart.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They had nothing to do with it. The man who murdered our father, he tore us apart, he's the enemy. I've been telling you for years, you've been defending him for years…

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This is exactly what they want.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: and now our father is dead. And that little monster is out there somewhere drawing breath. Did you set him free?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion may be a monster but at least he killed our father on purpose. You killed him by mistake. With stupidity. You're a man of action, aren't you? When it occurs to you to do something you do it, nevermind the consequences. Take a look. Look at the consequences. Here they are. He loved you more than anyone in this world.
ners: [{'tyrion'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: varys
Subtitles: Apologies.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I still don't see why I had to stay in this fucking crate once we set sail.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I saved your life. If they catch you, they catch me. I cannot say I feel overly guilty about leaving you in that “fucking crate”.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you know what it's like to stuff your shit through one of those air holes?

Name: varys
Subtitles: No. I only know what it's like to pick up your shit and throw it overboard.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Pentos?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The home of my colleague. Ilyrio Mopatis. A merchant. He and I met many years ago, through mutual friends. A group of people who saw Robert Baratheon for the disaster he was. We tried to do what was best for the realm by supporting the Targaryen restoration. And thus began the chain of mistakes that has led us both here. Things have gotten worse, not better. Westeros needs to be saved from itself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Much better.

Name: varys
Subtitles: My lord?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't think I am anymore. A lord. Are you a lord if you kill your father? I don't suppose they revoke your nobility for killing a whore. That has to be happen all the time.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You already drank yourself across the Narrow Sea.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: In a box. Why stop now?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Because we are talking about the future of our country.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The future is shit. Just like the past.

Name: prostitute
Subtitles: You want the same? Same as always?

Name: white rat
Subtitles: You… you don't have to.

Name: prostitute
Subtitles: Habit.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Sons of the Harpy?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Yes, your grace. They left it on the body.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They've never killed before.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: It was only a matter of time, your grace. Conquerors are always met with resistance.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I didn't conquer them. Their own people did.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: They do not see us as people, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Then they will have to learn to see things differently, Mossador. He did not risk his life fighting for freedom so cowards in masks could take it away. And I did not take up residence in this pyramid so I could watch the city below decline into chaos. What was the name of the man you lost?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: White Rat, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I want him buried with honor. Publicly. In the Temple of the Graces.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: The Sons of the Harpy will hear that message.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: Make them very angry.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Angry snakes lash out. Makes chopping off their heads that much easier. Find the men who did this and bring them to me.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Torgo Nudho.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Missandei hin Naath.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I wanted to speak with you.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Why do you come?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: White Rat, the Unsullied who… I have heard they found his body in a brothel. I have heard that more than one Unsullied has been known to visit Meereen's brothels. May I ask you why? Why would an Unsullied go to a brothel?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: I do not know. I must go.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Get your shield up.

Name: olly
Subtitles: It's too heavy.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If it wasn't heavy it wouldn't stop a sword, now get it up.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Come. Try it again. Drive at me. Keep your shield up. Or I'll ring your head like a bell.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Shouldn't you be training, too?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Well, I'm hardly a new recruit. How many brothers can say they've killed a white walker and a Thenn? I might be the first in history!

Name: alliser
Subtitles: These men need a firm hand. Always have. They're poachers and thieves.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Not soldiers.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: That one hates me.

Name: sam
Subtitles: If Ser Alliser is chosen as the new Lord Commander… he hates the wildlings.

Name: sam
Subtitles: All the wildlings.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Don't let them send us away.

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's not a sure thing. Ser Denys Mallister has commanded the Shadow Tower for 20 years, and people say he's a good man. He's running against Ser Alliser--

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sam! Don't let them send us away.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I told you. Wherever you go, I go, too.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You can't leave, they'll execute you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Good, good, pivot! Don't forget to pivot! Shield up!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The king wants a word.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're not cold, my lady?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Never. The Lordo s fire lives within me, Jon Snow.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Feel.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Are you a virgin?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Good.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Your grace. The bastard of Winterfell.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You know who rules at Winterfell now?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Roose Bolton.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: The traitor who plunged a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. Don't you want to avenge him?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I want a great many things, your grace. But I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch now.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I've been talking to your sworn brothers. Many of them love you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They're good men.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Many don't. You were seen taking the body of a wildling girl north of the Wall. Why?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's where she belonged.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Some of the Night's Watch feel you have too much affection for the wildlings.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They were born on the wrong side of the wall. That doesn't make them monsters.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: No matter. I shall take back the North from the thieves who stole it. Tywin Lannister is dead. He can't protect them now. I shall mount Roose Bolton's head on a spike. But if I'm to take Winterfell I'll need more men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The men of the Night's Watch are sworn to play no part--

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'm not talking about the damn Night's Watch. I'm talking about the wildlings.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your grace, you want the wildlings to march in your army?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: If they swear to follow me, I'll pardon them. We'll take Winterfell. Once the North is won, I'll declare them citizens of the realm. I'll give them land to live on.

Name: davos
Subtitles: It's a fair offer. More than fair.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'll offer them their lives and their freedom if Mance kneels before me and swears his loyalty.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't think that's likely.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You admire him, don't you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I respect him.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: He likes you. Convince him to bend the knee...

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your grace…

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: or he burns.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How much time do I have?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Nightfall. The sun drops fast this time of year. Hurry, Jon Snow.

Name: master of arms
Subtitles: Sword up! Attack, my lord! Attack! Don't cross your feet!

Name: yohn royce
Subtitles: My sons have had swords in their hands from the time they could walk. This one…

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lord Arryn will never be a great warrior.

Name: royce
Subtitles: Great warrior? He sings a sword like a girl with palsy.

Name: squire
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: master of arms
Subtitles: Sword up, my lord!

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Some boys develop more slowly. He's still young.

Name: royce
Subtitles: He's 13. Boys go to war at 13.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He has other gifts.

Name: royce
Subtitles: Does he?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The gift of a great name. Sometimes that's all one needs.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Goodbye Lord Royce, and thank you for all you've done for me.

Name: royce
Subtitles: I have done nothing more than my duty, my lady.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I have no doubt that upon my return, Robin's skills will have improved immeasurably.

Name: royce
Subtitles: He'll be safe here. As for his skills, I make no promises.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Will we head north at some point? He said Sansa had a brother at Castle Black. We're a few days ride from the Kingsroad, but that will take us--

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Us? The only reason you're here is that Jaime Lannister told me you weren't safe in the capital. You're hundreds of miles from King's Landing. No one knows what you look like. No one cares. You're safe.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: But I'm you're squire.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Do you even know what a squire is?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: An attendant to a knight?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm not a knight. That means you're not a squire.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Well, where would I go?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I don't care, I'm not your mother.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: You swore to find the Stark girls.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I found Arya. She didn't want my protection.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Sansa still might.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Will you shut your mouth? I didn't ask for advice. I don't want anyone following me. I'm not a leader. All I ever wanted is to fight for a Lord I believed in. The good lords are dead and the rest are monsters.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You told Lord Royce we were going to the Fingers.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I did.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But we're heading west.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: We are.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If he wanted to betray us, he already would have.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lord Royce may be as honorable as he thinks he is, but he's not alone in that castle. Do you trust all those knights and ladies, stable boys and serving girls?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No. Do you trust the carriage driver or the knights escorting us?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No. But I pay them well, and they've seen what happens to men who disappoint me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So where are we going? To a land where you trust everyone?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: So a land so far from here, even Cersei Lannister can't get her hands on you.

Name: loras
Subtitles: It was such a deep, deep shock to us all. Your father was a force to be reckoned with. He truly was. I wouldn't presume to claim to have known him as such…

Name: loras
Subtitles: But just being in his presence was enough to make it so clear just how formidable a person you were dealing with. What a… what a force to be reckoned with.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Thank you so much for your kind words.

Name: grand maester pyrcelle
Subtitles: Deepest condolences, your grace. This tragedy… I never trusted Varys. I often warned…

Name: lancel lannister
Subtitles: Your grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Cousin Lancel. I hardly recognized you.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: My deepest sympathies.

Name: kevan lannister
Subtitles: I apologize for my son's appearance.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Uncle, it's quite alright.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: They call themselves sparrows. Bloody fanatics. Religion has its place, of course, but at a certain point… They never would have come to the capital when Tywin was alive.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure he'll grow out of it. Whatever it is. Excuse me.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your wounds from the Blackwater seem to have healed.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: It wasn't my wounds that needed healing.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What can I do for you?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: You can forgive me.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What could you possibly have done to warrant my forgiveness?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I led you into the darkness.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I doubt you've ever led anyone anywhere.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I tempted you into our unnatural relations. And, of course, there was the king. His boar hunt. His wine.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I don't know what you're talking about.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: I'm a different person now. I found peace in the light of the Seven. You can too. They watch over all of us, ready to dole out mercy… or justice. Their world is at hand. I will pray for your father's soul.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The day Tywin Lannister's soul needs your help…

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: It looks like Dorne.

Name: loras
Subtitles: No it doesn't.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: It does. That's the Sunspear bit right there. And that's where the mountains are. And over here is… Sunsnake? Stonespear?

Name: loras
Subtitles: Sandstone.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Yes. Yes, Sandstone. Just there.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Fine.

Name: loras
Subtitles: It's Dorne.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: We should go there. I think we would have a lovely time.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Judging by my experience, that would be wonderful. Dorne, Highgarden. Anywhere but here.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: We're late for dinner as it is.

Name: loras
Subtitles: You're very respectful.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I'm very hungry.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: What's your name?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Olyvar, my lady.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I'm afraid my brother is keeping the king waiting, Olyvar.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Perhaps you might consider being a bit more discreet?

Name: loras
