Subtitles: Why? They all know about me anyway. Everybody knows everything about everyone. What's the point in trying to keep a secret in a place like this?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: In any event… you shouldn't keep your intended waiting.

Name: loras
Subtitles: My intended? Please. Tywin's dead. That means no one can force Cersei to marry me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Lucky you.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Unlucky you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You think I want that woman married to my brother?

Name: loras
Subtitles: If she doesn't marry me, she doesn't go to Highgarden. Which means she stays in King's Landing. Which means you're trapped here with Cersei Lannister as your mother-by-law.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Perhaps.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Perhaps?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Perhaps?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Eunuch, the spider, the master of whisperers.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Imp, half-man.

Name: varys
Subtitles: There are faster ways to kill yourself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not for a coward.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You are many things, my friend, but not a coward.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You never told me why you set me free.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Your brother asked me to.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You could have said no.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Refuse the Kingslayer? A dangerous proposition.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not as dangerous as releasing me. You risked your life, your position, everything. Why? You're not family, you owe me nothing.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I didn't do it for you. I did it for the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A drunken dwarf will never be the savior of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I don't believe in saviors. I believe men of talent have a role to play in the war to come.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're going to have to find another soldier. I'm done with Westeros and Westeros is done with me.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You have many admirable qualities, self-pity is not one of them. Any fool with a bit of luck can find himself born into power. But earning it for yourself, that takes work.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm not well-suited for work.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I think you are. You have your father's instinct for politics, and you have compassion.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Compassion? Yes. I killed my lover with my bare hands. I shot my own father with a crossbow.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I never said you were perfect.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What is it you want exactly?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Peace. Prosperity. A land where the powerful do not prey on the powerless.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Where the castles are made of gingerbread and the moats are filled with blackberry wine. The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that's how they became powerful in the first place.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Perhaps. And perhaps we've grown so used to horror we assume there's no other way. If you sat on the Iron Throne, would you spread misery throughout the land?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I will never sit on the Iron Throne.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No, you won't. But you could help another climb those steps and take that seat. The Seven Kingdoms need someone stronger than Tommen, but gentler than Stannis. A monarch who can intimidate the high lord and inspire the people. A ruler loved by millions with a powerful army and the right family name.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good luck finding him.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Who said anything about him? You have a choice my friend. You can stay here at Ilyrio's palace and drink yourself to death, or you can ride with me to Mereen, meet Daenerys Targaryen, and decide if the world is worth fighting for.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Can I drink myself to death on the road to Meereen?

Name: daario naharis
Subtitles: When did the Unsullied start patrolling the streets of Meereen? Looks like your friends haven't been behaving themselves.

Name: hizdahr zo loraq
Subtitles: The mission to Yunkai was a resounding success. The Wise Masters of Yunkai have agreed to cede power to a council of elders, made up of both the freedmen and the former slaveholders. All matters of consequence will be brought to you for review.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Good.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: They did ask for some concessions.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Concessions?

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Politics is the art of compromise, your grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not a politician. I'm a queen.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Forgive me. You're right, of course. Still, it's easier to rule happy subjects than angry ones.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't expect the Wise Masters to be happy. Slavery made them rich, I ended slavery.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: They do not ask for the return of slavery. They ask for the re-opening of the fighting pits.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The fighting pits? Where slaves fought slaves to the death?

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: In the new world that you've brought to us, free men would fight free men.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: The pitfighters that you liberated plead for this opportunity. Bring some here and ask them yourself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No fighting pits.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Opening them would show the people of Yunkai and Meereen that you respect their traditions.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I do not respect the tradition of human cockfighting.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: If you--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many times must I say no before you understand?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Whatever he wants from me he's not going to get it. If he really believes I'm going to reopen the fighting pits…

Name: daario
Subtitles: You should reopen the fighting pits.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What?

Name: daario
Subtitles: My mother was a whore, I told you that. She liked to drink pear brandy. The older she got, the less she made selling her body, the more she wanted to drink. So one day when I was 12, she sold me to a slaver she fucked the night before.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why?

Name: daario
Subtitles: I was a bad child. I wasn't big, but I was quick. And I loved to fight. So they sold me to a man in Tolos who trained fighters for the pits. I had my first match when I was 16.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You were sold into slavery, forced to fight to the death for the amusement of the masters, and you're defending the fighting pits?

Name: daario
Subtitles: I'm only here because of those pits. I learned to fight like a Dothraki screamer, a Norvoshi priest, a Westerosi knight. Soon I was famous. 10,000 men and women screamed my name when I stepped into the pit. I made so much money for my master he set me free when I died. I joined the Second Sons, and then I met you.

Name: daario
Subtitles: You're the queen. Everyone's too afraid of you to speak truth. Everyone but me. You've made thousands of enemies all across the world. As soon as they see weakness, they'll attack. Show your strength here, now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That's why I have the Unsullied patrolling the streets.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Anyone with a chest full of gold can buy an army of Unsullied. You're not the Mother of Unsullied. You're the Mother of Dragons.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't want another childo s bones dropped at my feet. No one's seen Drogon in weeks. For all I know he's flown halfway across the world. I can't control them anymore.

Name: daario
Subtitles: A dragon queen with no dragons is not a queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Viserion? Rhaegal?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Easy. Easy. Easy.

Name: mance
Subtitles: So here we are.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Here we are.

Name: mance
Subtitles: When we first met you were my prisoner. And now, for our last meeting…

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: This doesn't have to be our last meeting.

Name: mance
Subtitles: No, but it will be.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You know what Stannis wants?

Name: mance
Subtitles: He wants me to bend the knee. And he wants the free folk to fight for him. I'll give him this much

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Shouldn't a king be bold?

Name: mance
Subtitles: Oh, aye. I respect him. If he gets what he wants, I expect he'll be a better ruler than the fools sitting on the Iron Throne the last hundred years. But I'll never serve him.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You told me you weren't here to conquer. You told me your people have bled enough.

Name: mance
Subtitles: That's right. But I don't want them bleeding for Stannis Baratheon either.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You spent your life convincing 90 clans to come together for the first time in history. Thenns and Hornfoots, the ice-river clans, even the giants. A life's work uniting them. You didn't do it for power. You didn't do it for glory. You brought them together to save them because none of them will survive the winter, not if they're north of the wall. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

Name: mance
Subtitles: Pride? Fuck my pride. This isn't about that.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Then bend the knee and save your people.

Name: mance
Subtitles: They followed me because they respected me. Because they believed in me. The moment I kneel for a Southern king that's all gone.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And how many tens of thousands are out there right now? How many women? How many children? And you won't go out and rescue them because why? You're afraid of looking afraid.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Oh, I am afraid. No shame in that. How will they do it? Beheading? Hanging?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They'll burn you alive.

Name: mance
Subtitles: Bad way to go. I'll be honest with you, I don't want to die. And burnt to death, I don't want people to remember me like that. Scorched and screaming. But it's better than betraying everything I believe.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And what happens to your people? You preserve your dignity and die standing, and they'll sing songs about you. “You'd rather burn than kneel. The great hero.” Until winter comes, and the white walkers come for us all, and there's no one left to sing.

Name: mance
Subtitles: You're a good lad. Truly, you are. But if you can't understand why I won't enlist my people in a foreigner's war, there's no point explaining.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I think you're making a terrible mistake.

Name: mance
Subtitles: The freedom to make my own mistakes was all I ever wanted.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Mance Rayder, you've been called the King Beyond the Wall. Westeros only has one king. Bend the knee, I promise you mercy.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Kneel and live.

Name: mance
Subtitles: This was my home for many years. I wish you good fortune in the wars to come.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Man or woman, young or old, lord or peasant, our choices are the same. We choose light, or we choose darkness. We choose good, or we choose evil. We choose the true god or the false.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Free folk, there is only one true king, and his name is Stannis. Here stands the king of lies. Behold the fate of those who choose the darkness.

Name: braavosi man
Subtitles: In the old times, whenever Braavos stood in danger, the titan would step with fire in his eyes. He'd wade into the sea and smash the enemies.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He's just a statue.

Name: man
Subtitles: Don't be afraid. He's announcing our arrival.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not afraid.

Name: man
Subtitles: The House of Black and White

Name: man
Subtitles: Here, I leave you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Thank you for bringing me.

Name: man
Subtitles: Any man of Braavos would have done the same. Valar morghulis.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Valar dohaeris.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Hello. Valar Morghulis.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Jaqen H'ghar gave me this.

Name: old man
Subtitles: No one here by that name.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Please. I crossed the Narrow Sea. I have nowhere else to go.

Name: old man
Subtitles: You have everywhere else to go.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But wait!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant. Cersei, Walder Frey, The Mountain, Meryn Trant.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Mountain, Meryn Trant.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Must be good food if it's crowded.

Name: waitress
Subtitles: Ale? Ale?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Before we left, a maester gave you a raven scroll.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You are becoming an observant young lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My mother used to say, "dark wings, dark words".

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: An old saying. Inaccurate in this case.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So it was good news.?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: My marriage proposal has been accepted.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I thought you still mourn the death of my beloved Aunt Lysa.

Name: waitress
Subtitles: Ale?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'll have some.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: My lady!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Sansa Stark. Don't look!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You sure?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: She's dyed her hair, but it's her. She's sitting with Petyr Baelish.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Littlefinger?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: A bunch of knights with him.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Bunch? What's a bunch? 100? 6? 20?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: 10, I think. Too many. My lady, I don't think this is the right--

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Ready the horses.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: We only have one horse.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Find more.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Do you like the taste?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't see what all the fuss is about. Why do men love it so much?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It gives some men courage.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Does it give you courage?

Name: guard
Subtitles: That's far enough.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Lord Baelish, Lady Sansa, my name is Brienne of Tarth.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: We've met. With Renly Baratheon. What did he say about you? He said, "You're a loyalty comes free of charge." Someone appears to have paid quite a bit for it since then.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Lady Sansa, before your mother's death, I was her sworn sword. I gave my word I would find you and protect you. I will shield your back and keep your council, and give my life for yours if need be. I swear it by the old gods and the new.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Please, Lady Brienne. No need for such formality. You are Catelyn Stark's sworn sword?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I was.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Strange. I knew Cat from the time we were children. She never mentioned you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: It was after Renly's murder.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Ah, yes. You were accused of killing him.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I tried to save him.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: But you were accused.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: By men who didn't see what happened.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Then what did happen?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: He was murdered by a shadow. A shadow with a face of Stannis Baratheon.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A shadow? With a face? This woman swore to protect Renly; she failed. She swore to protect your mother; she failed. Why would I want somebody with your history of failure guiding Lady Sansa?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Why should you have any say in her affairs?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Because I am her uncle. I married her Aunt Lysa shortly before my belovedo s untimely death. We're family now, and you're an outsider. Forgive me, Lady Brienne, but experiences made me wary of outsiders.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Lady Sansa, if we can have a word alone--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Please, my lady. If I could explain--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I saw you at Joffrey's wedding bowing to the king.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Neither of us wanted to be there. Sometimes we don't have a choice.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And sometimes we do. You should leave.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: We don't want our new friend wandering the countryside alone. The roads of these parts aren't safe. Why don't you stay?

Name: knight
Subtitles: He asked you to stay.

Name: guard
Subtitles: After her!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Podrick!

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Stop, stop, stop! That's a good boy.

Name: knight
Subtitles: I guess that means you're unarmed.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Down, Podrick, down!

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Podrick?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Yes, my lady?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You can stand now.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Yes, my lady. Sansa Stark?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Wary of strangers, as she should me. I saw her riding on the East Trail with Littlefinger. We'll follow them.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: My lady, if those Stark girls refused your service, maybe you're released from your vow.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I swore to their mother I'd protect those girls.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: If they don't want your protection--

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Do you think she's safe from Littlefinger?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: No, my lady.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Get your horse.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: A summons from the queen.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: There are only two like it in the world

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's a threat.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Of course it's a threat! Our daughter's in Dorne surrounded by people who hate our family. "It's a threat."

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No note.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They blame us for the death of Oberyn and his sister, and every other tragedy that's befallen their cursed country. I will burn their cities to the ground if they touch her!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Softer.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Not so loud.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Our daughter's in danger, and you're worried I'm speaking too loudly!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The world can't know knows she's our daughter.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Then don't call her your daughter. You've never been a father to her.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If I was the father to any of my children, they'd be stoned in the streets.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And what has your caution brought? Our eldest child murdered at his own wedding. Our only daughter shipped off to Dorne. Our baby boy sent to marry that smirking whore from Highgarden.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll make things better.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You never made anything better.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm going to Dorne. I'll bring our daughter home.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You can't just ask Prince Doran to give her back! She's promised his son.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not going to ask him anything.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You go there with an army, it's an act of war.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No army. Do you know where they're keeping her?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Oberyn mentioned the Water Gardens.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll find her. Is there anything else, your grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're going to Dorne? A one-handed man? Alone?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I never said I was going alone.

Name: lollys stokeworth
Subtitles: No sunflowers. I don't like yellow. Roses are very nice, definitely roses. And music. I adore music. But no flutes, I hate flutes! We can have a harp if you like, but no flutes. Then there's the food. Food is the most important thing, don't you agree? We're going to need pigeon pies. That's what they eat in the capital, don't they?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: lollys
Subtitles: Don't they?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Don't who?

Name: lollys
Subtitles: People eat pigeon pie in the capital.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: They certainly do, my dear. They certainly do.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: It's a fine place, isn't it? A fine place. I never thought I'd end up settling down in a place like this.

Name: lollys
Subtitles: You won't.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Pardon?

Name: lollys
Subtitles: We won't get to live at Stokeworth. When Mother dies, my sister gets the castle because she's older.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh.

Name: lollys
Subtitles: She hates me. She calls me mean names, and sometimes even still she pulls my hair when Mother isn't looking.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You know what I think? I think you're a good person. And your sister is a mean person.

Name: lollys
Subtitles: She is.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I've been all over the world. And if there's one thing I've learned, it's that meanness comes around. People like your sister, they always get what's coming to them eventually. One way or another.

Name: lollys
Subtitles: Who's that?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Jaime fucking Lannister.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I was very sorry to hear about your father.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: This is my betrothed, Lollys.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: A pleasure.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Run along, love.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Beautiful bride you've chosen. When were you planning on getting married?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Just get on with it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: On with what?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: What you're here for. There's no way this little visit could possibly mean anything good for me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's very good for you.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Lollys will be marrying Ser Wyllis Bracken.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Mmm.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: We made a deal, your sister and I.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I would have advised against that.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: How is this good for me?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Cause you're going to come with me and help me with something important. And when we return, I'm going to give you a much better girl, and a much better castle.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Return from where?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: As far south as south goes.

Name: trystane
Subtitles: My future queen.

Name: areo
Subtitles: The prince does not wish to be disturbed.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Remove myself from my path, or I'll take that long axe and shove it--

Name: doran
Subtitles: Captain. Let her pass.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Your brother was murdered, and you sit here at the Water Gardens, staring at the sky and doing nothing.

Name: doran
Subtitles: Oberyn was slain during a trial by combat. By law, that is not murder.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Your brother--

Name: doran
Subtitles: You don't have to remind me. He was my brother long before he was anything to you.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: What will you do about his death.

Name: doran
Subtitles: I will bury him. I will mourn for him.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: You would have me go to war?

Name: doran
Subtitles: You would have me go to war?

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: The whole country would have you go to war.

Name: doran
Subtitles: Then we are lucky the whole country does not decide.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: The Sand Snakes are with me. They have the love of their people. They will avenge your father while you sit here in your chair doing nothing.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Oberyn is dead. And this Lannister girl skips about the Water Gardens eating our food, breathing our air. How many of your brothers and sisters do they have to kill?

Name: doran
Subtitles: I loved my brother. And you made him very happy. For that you will always have a place in my heart. But we do not mutilate little girls for vengeance. Not here. Not while I rule.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: And how long will that be?

Name: daario
Subtitles: The Unsullied are too conspicuous.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Anyone can see you coming from a mile off. Of course you haven't found any Sons of the Harpy. You haven't, have you?

Name: daario
Subtitles: My Second Sons, on the other hand, they drink, they whore, fight in the streets--they blend in. They overhear things in taverns, follow people from the taverns to nice, quiet alleys, break a few fingers, overhear a few more things. Before you know it...

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: No one here. We go.

Name: daario
Subtitles: In a hurry? You're afraid?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Unsullied fear nothing.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Right. That's your problem. You understood fear once, long ago, but you've forgotten what it means. Someone who's forgotten fear has forgotten how to hide.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Fear is useful that way.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: Sons of the Harpy, they want to put a collar back on my neck. On all of our necks. Please, Your Grace, you must kill him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It would send a message.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I think you should exercise restraint, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: For one thing, he may have valuable information.

Name: daario
Subtitles: The Son of the Harpy has no more valuable information.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: How do you know that?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Because I questioned him.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: And the information you did get, he is young and poor.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: He is born free.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Why should he want to bring back slavery? What did it do for him?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Perhaps the only thing that gave him pride was knowing that there was someone lower than he was.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: They pay him. Great families afraid to do a thing. They pay poor man to do it for them.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: And how do you know this?

Name: mossador
Subtitles: Everyone knows this.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: I don't know it, and I'm the head of a great family.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: We do not know what this man did or didn't do. Give him a trial, at least. A fair trial. Show all of the citizens of Meereen that you are better than those who would depose. Teach them a better way.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: I do not know the place from where Old Ser comes. Things maybe are different there, I hope. But here, in Meereen, before Daenerys Stormborn, they own us. So we learn much about them or we do not live long. They teach me what they are. Mercy, fair trial

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you all for your counsel.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Your Grace, a word, please, I beg you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: About what?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: About your father. About the Mad King.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Mad King? You're here to remind me of my enemies' lies? Consider me reminded.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Your Grace, I served in his Kingsguard. I was at his side from the first. Your enemies did not lie.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: When the people rose in revolt against him, your father set their towns and castles aflame. He murdered sons in front of their fathers. He burned men alive with Wildfire, and laughed as they screamed. And his efforts to stamp out dissent led to rebellion that killed every Targaryen except two.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not my father.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: No, Your Grace. Thank the gods. But the Mad King gave his enemies the justice he thought they deserved. And each time it made him feel powerful and right. Until the very end.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will not have the Son of the Harpy executed without a fair trial.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: There's a bug.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Yes, best be careful. You might accidentally consume some solid food.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: When I agreed to come with you, did I misrepresent my intentions? Besides, what is there for me to do inside this fucking box?

Name: varys
Subtitles: You don't like it?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I want to take a walk.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You can't. Cersei has offered a lordship to the man who brings her your head.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She ought to offer her cunt. Best part of her for the best part of me. Well, I suppose a box is as good a place for me as anywhere.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Are we really going to spend the entire road to Volantis talking about the futility of everything?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're right. No point. The road to Volantis? You said we were going to Meereen. What's in Volantis?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The road to Meereen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And what do you hope to find at the end of the road to Meereen?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I told you. A ruler.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We've already got a ruler. Everywhere has already got a ruler. Every pile of shit on the side of every road has someone's banner hanging from it.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You were quite good, you know. At ruling. During your brief tenure as Hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I didn't rule. I was a servant.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Still, a man of talent.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Managed to kill a lot of people.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Yes, but showed great promise in other areas as well.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She wanted me to leave King's Landing. She begged me. I wouldn't go.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Why?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Cause I liked it. Power. Even as a servant.

Name: varys
Subtitles: People follow leaders. And they will never follow us. They find us repulsive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I find us repulsive.

Name: varys
Subtitles: And we find them repulsive, which is why we surround ourselves with large, comfortable boxes to keep them away. And yet, no matter what we do, people like you and me are never really satisfied inside the box. Not for long.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're right. Let's go for a walk.

Name: varys
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How many dwarves are there in the world? Is Cersei going to kill them all?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Not him.

Name: meryn
Subtitles: Are you trying to deceive your Queen? Shall I throw them in a cell, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That won't be necessary, Ser Meryn. I don't want to dissuade the other hunters. Mistakes will be made.

Name: hunters
Subtitles: Thank you, Your Grace. Thank you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Take the head.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Pardon me, Your Grace. I would take it, if you don't mind. It could prove useful for my work.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Very good.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Over there will be fine.

Name: meryn
Subtitles: You heard the man. Over there.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: You're the Hand of the King?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, Uncle. Clearly it would not be appropriate for a woman to assume that role. I'm merely advising my son until he comes of age and chooses a Hand for himself.

Name: mace tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace, I would be willing to serve provisionally as the King's Hand until he becomes old enough--

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're a good man, Lord Tyrell, but I don't imagine you'll have the time. In addition to being Master of Ships, the king has appointed you Master of Coin.

Name: mace
Subtitles: Oh, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He called your experience and wisdom in financial matters unparalleled. He said he would be honored to have you represent the crown's interests in the same.

Name: mace
Subtitles: The honor is all mine, Your Grace.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your Grace, in the past on several occasions, a Grand Maester has served as the King's Hand.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The King has named Qyburn the new Master of Whisperers.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: Your Grace, him? This man? This embarrassment to the Citadel? Your Grace, what qualifications can he possibly have for this post?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The qualification of loyalty, Grand Maester. That's far more than the eunuch ever had. Far more than many ever have.

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: I must say I cannot see--

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Uncle Kevan, in light of your position as commander of the Lannister armies, it would please the king if you would serve as his Master of War. No man living better deserves the title.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: That is kind of you to say. I would like to hear it from the king himself.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The king is very busy at this moment.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: He should be here, learning what it means to rule.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He is learning. On this occasion, in his capacity as ruler, he's asked me to speak on his behalf.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: I returned to the capital to pay my respects to my brother. And to you. And to serve the king. I did not return to the capital to serve as your puppet. To watch you stack the small council with sycophants. Sending your own brother away so he wouldn't be--

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My brother has left the capital to lead a sensitive diplomatic mission.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: What mission?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That is not your concern as Master of War.

Name: kevan
Subtitles: I do not recognize your authority to dictate what is and is not my concern. You are the Queen Mother. Nothing more.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You would abandon your king in his time of need?

Name: kevan
Subtitles: If he wants to send for me, I will be waiting for him. At Casterly Rock.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Come on. You know this one. It looks like an animal.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Snake. Snake... S! It's an S!

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Right, very good!

Name: sam
Subtitles: Hmm! Did you know that the youngest Lord Commander in history, Osric Stark, was elected at the age of 10?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I know "S".

Name: shireen
Subtitles: You'll learn, I promise. I taught Ser Davos, and old people are terrible at learning new things.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Well, you're a wonderful teacher. Very patient!

Name: sam
Subtitles: I only said that the more time you spend practicing, the faster you'll be able to read.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: That's alright. We're doing just fine. I'm sure you and Ostrich Stark have a lot to talk about.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: How old were you when you learned to read?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Three.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Three?! Who taught you, your mother?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: No. Old Maester Cressen did. I had a lot of time to practice. My mother kept me inside because...

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What do you call it in the South, what happened to your face?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Greyscale. What do you call it north of the Wall?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I don't know. But two of my sisters had it. They both died. How did they cure you?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: I don't remember. I was a baby. Lots of people came and tried, I think. Whatever they did, it went away. What happened to your sisters?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: My father made them move out of the keep into the huts outside. None of us were allowed to go near them. But we heard them. Especially at night. They started to sound... not like themselves.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Did you ever see them?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Only once at the end. They were covered with it. Their faces, their arms. They acted like animals. My father had to drag them out to the woods on a rope.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: What did he do to them in the woods?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Mother.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: Leave us.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You need to stay away from that girl.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Why?

Name: selyse
Subtitles: She's a wildling.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Her name's Gilly. She's nice. I'm teaching her to read.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: She's a wildling. Your father defeated their people. He executed her king for treason. They could strike at him by striking at you.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Gilly wouldn't do that.

Name: selyse
Subtitles: You have no idea what people will do. All your books and you still don't know.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I ordered Mance Rayder burnt at the stake. You prevented that order from being carried out. You showed mercy to Mance Rayder. A king's word is law. Perhaps you should ask Ser Davos how much mercy I show to lawbreakers. Show too much kindness, people won't fear you. If people don't fear you, they don't follow you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: With respect, Your Grace, the free folk will never follow you, no matter what you do. You're the man who burned their king alive.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Who then? You?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. Only one of their own.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Do you know this wretched girl Lyanna Mormont?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Lord Commander's niece.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Lady of Bear Island, and a child of 10. I asked her to commit her house to my cause, that's her response.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North, whose name is Stark.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: That amuses you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I apologize, Your Grace. Northerners can be a bit like the free folk. Loyal to their own.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I know. My brother Robert went on often and loudly about how difficult it was to control them - even with your father's help.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Tonight, the Night's Watch elect a new Lord Commander. Ser Alliser Thorne is going to win.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Most likely.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Unpleasant man. He thinks you're a traitor. What's your life going to be like on the Wall with Thorne in command?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Unpleasant, I expect.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Your bravery made him look weak. He'll punish you for it. I don't punish men for bravery. I reward them.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't doubt it, Your Grace. But I'm a brother of the Night's Watch. I've pledged them my life, my honor, my sword. I don't know what I have left to give you.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You can give me the North.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I can't. Even if I wanted to, I'm a bastard. A Snow.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Kneel before me. Lay your sword at my feet. Pledge me your service and you'll rise again as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell.

Name: sam
Subtitles: He'll make you a Stark with the stroke of a pen?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's the first thing I ever remember wanting. I'd daydream that my father would ask the king, and just like that I would never be the bastard of Winterfell again.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You deserve this. You do. I couldn't be happier for you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm going to refuse him.

Name: sam
Subtitles: But you'd be Lord of Winterfell.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I swore a vow to the Night's Watch. If I don't take my own word seriously, what sort of Lord of Winterfell would I be?

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Crowded. You'd think we were serving venison stew.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Does anyone wish to speak for candidates before we cast our tokens for the 998th Lord Commander of the Night's Watch?

Name: janos
Subtitles: Ser Alliser Thorne is not just a knight, he's a man of true nobility. He was acting commander when the Wall came under attack, and led us to victory against the wildlings.

Name: men
Subtitles: Hear, hear.

Name: janos
Subtitles: He's a veteran of 100 battles and has been a defender of the Watch and the Wall almost all of his life. He's the only true choice.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Is there anyone else?

Name: shadow tower brother
Subtitles: Ser Denys Mallister joined the Watch as a boy and has served loyally longer than any other ranger. Through 10 winters he served. As commander of the Shadow Tower, he kept the wildlings away. We could do no better.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: If there's no one else, we will begin the voting. The triangular tokens count for Ser Alliser Thorne. The square tokens for Ser Denys Mallister. Each brother will--

Name: sam
Subtitles: Maester Aemon.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Samwell Tarly. Go on.

Name: janos
Subtitles: Sam the Slayer.

Name: janos
Subtitles: Another wildling lover just like his friend Jon Snow. How's your lady love Slayer?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Her name is Gilly. Brother Slynt knows her quite well. They cowered together in the larder during the battle for the Wall.

Name: janos
Subtitles: Lies!

Name: sam
Subtitles: A wildling girl, a baby, and Lord Janos. I found him there when the battle was over in a puddle of his own making.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Whilst Lord Janos was hiding with the women and children, Jon Snow was leading.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Ser Alliser fought bravely, it is true. And when he was wounded, it is Jon who saved us. He took charge of the wall's defense. He killed the Magnar of the Thenns. He went North to deal with Mance Rayder, knowing it almost certainly meant his own death. Before that, he led the mission to avenge Lord Commander Mormont. Mormont himself chose Jon to be his steward. He saw something in Jon, and now we've all seen it, too. He may be young, but he's the commander we turned to when the night was darkest.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: I can't argue with any of that. But who does Jon Snow want to command? Night's Watch or the wildlings? Everyone knows he loved a wildling girl and spoke with Mance Rayder many times. What would have happened in that tent between those two old friends if Stannis's army hadn't come along? We all saw him put the King-beyond-the-Wall out of his misery. Do you want to choose a man who has fought the wildlings all his life, or a man who makes love to them?

Name: aemon
Subtitles: It is time.

Name: brother
Subtitles: It appears to be a tie, Maester.

Name: brothers
Subtitles: Jon Snow! Jon Snow! Jon Snow! Jon Snow!

Name: man
Subtitles: You. You!

Name: man
Subtitles: What have you got there?

Name: man
Subtitles: I said--

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Turn around and go. Turn around and go.

Name: man
Subtitles: That's a nice little sword. Worth 100 pieces, a sword like that.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nothing's worth anything to dead men.

Name: men
Subtitles: Quickly, go, go!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Who are you? Why were they scared of you?

Name: old man
Subtitles: You lost this.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You said there was no Jaqen H'ghar here.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: There isn't. A man is not Jaqen H'ghar.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Well who are you then?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: No one. And that is who a girl must become.

Name: harpy
Subtitles: She doesn't belong here. And no matter how many of your traitors call her "Mhysa", she will never be your mother.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: For you, Mhysa. You wanted the Harpy dead, but your hands were tied. I set you free, as you did all of us.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He was our prisoner, awaiting trial. You had no right.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: He would rather rip your city apart than see slaves lifted from the dirt.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: There are no more slaves. There are no more Masters.

Name: mossador
Subtitles: Then who lives in the Pyramids? Who wears gold masks and murders your children? When Grey Worm came to us, I was the first to take up the knife for you. I remember the look on my father's face as I struck down his Master, who had traded his infant son for a dog. My father died in the fighting. If we allow the Sons of the Harpy to return us to chains, he never lived.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Harpy's life was not yours to take. Once, the Masters were the law--

Name: mosador
Subtitles: and now you are the law!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The law is the law. Take him.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Mhysa! Myhsa!

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: She should have cut off the traitor's head in the Great Pyramid and been done with it.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Which is what I keep telling her to do to you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You opened your gates to me because I promised you freedom and justice. One cannot exist without the other.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Brother! Brother!

Name: mossador
Subtitles: Mhysa, please! Forgive me!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: A citizen of Meereen was awaiting trial and this man murdered him. The punishment is death.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Mercy! Mercy!

Name: mossador
Subtitles: Mhysa...

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Mhysa...

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I'll stand guard outside your door tonight, Your Grace.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: We all guard tonight.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Leave me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Drogon...

Name: end
Subtitles: EPISODE

Name: man
Subtitles: Valar morghulis.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Valar dohaeris.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I've been sweeping this floor for days.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Good.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I didn't come here to sweep floors.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: No? Why come, then?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You said that I could be your apprentice. You said you'd teach me how to a Faceless Man.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A man teaches a girl. . Valar dohaeris. All men must serve. Faceless men, most of all. .

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I want to serve. .

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A girl wants to serve herself. Here we serve the Many-Faced God, to serve well. A girl must become no-one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Which one is the Many-Faced God? I see the Stranger. I see the Drowned God. I see the Weirwood Face.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: There is only one god. A girl knows his name. And all men know his gift.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Where are they taking him?

Name: bystanders
Subtitles: Queen Margaery! Queen Margaery! Queen Margaery!

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I am his/hers, and she/he is mine. From this day, until the end of my days.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Did I hurt you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No. You were lovely.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: It all happened so fast.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Yes. .

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I was scared maybe I hurt you, it sounded

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No, no, no. You're very sweet. The sweetest king who ever lived.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: This is what I want to do all day, every day for the rest of my life.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Wouldn't that be glorious? . Shouldn't we rest a little while? Just to catch our breath, there's no rush, is there?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Of course not. Are you hungry? Shall I have them bring you some cake or pomegranate juice?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No, I'm fine. I just want you all to myself. I want to know everything there is to know about King Tommen First of His Name.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: King Tommen. It still sounds strange to me. Does Queen Margaery sound strange to you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: So strange… Husband.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Wife. . Sometimes it feels odd. I'm the king, I've married the most beautiful woman in the world, , and it's all because my brother died.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I understand. But it's not your fault, you know that, don't you? You mustn't feel guilty.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I don't feel guilty. That's what's odd.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Do you like to sail?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I love to sail.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I do, too.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I think we're going to be very happy, you and I.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Living in a tower so high, it touches the clouds. Of course my grandmother couldn't wait to go home. The capital is not for everyone, I suppose. Does your mother like it here?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I don't think so. She told me never to trust anyone in King's Landing.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It's so wonderful to have her watching over you. A lioness guiding her cub. .

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Well, but I'm a man now.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You are. And the king. . But you'll always be her baby-boy.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I suppose.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I adore how she has always been so generous with me, so kind. And the horror she's had to injure. . Losing her husband, her eldest child and her father. It's no wonder she's so protective of you. She'll never let you out of her sight.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You look very much in love. The first days of marriage are often so blissful. She's certainly very pretty, isn't she? Like a doll, she smiles quite a lot. Do you think she's intelligent? I can't quite tell. Not that it matters.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Do you ever miss Casterly Rock?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: There's nothing for me in Casterly Rock.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: That's where you grew up. . You always told me that you liked the people there better. You said that King's Landing smelled of horse dung and sour milk.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Why are we speaking of Casterly Rock?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: The way that you talked about it, I always thought that you missed it. That you... That it was your real home.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This is my real home now. Where my family lives.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I want you to be happy, mother.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I know that. I know you do, my sweet boy.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: But wouldn't you be happier in Casterly Rock?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I said, "Darling, surely 4 times is enough, are you trying to set a new record?" . And he said, "Well, what is the record? I'm sure we can break it."

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Mother! . Welcome.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Don't you look lovely. Marriage agrees with you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Can we bring you anything to eat or drink? I wish we had some wine for you. It's a bit early in the day for us.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, no. I, I can't stay. I just wanted to let you know if, there is ever anything I can do for you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You are very sweet.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Tommen seems quite taken with his new queen.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I absolutely adore him. You raised a gallant young man. I'm forever grateful.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Good. Good. I'm glad to hear you're happy.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Ecstatic. I really am. Exhausted, to be honest, but what can I expect, he is half lion, half stag. .

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'll leave you to it then. .

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Oh, forgive me, I haven't been at Court for long, I get so confused. What's the proper way to address you now? Queen Mother or Dowager Queen?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: There's no need for such formalities.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: In any event, judging from the King's enthusiasm, the Queen Mother will be a Queen Grandmother soon.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Won't that be a lovely day.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Can you imagine the celebrations? They'll ring the bells all day and night.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Remember. Anything you need.

Name: roose
Subtitles: We can't hold the North with terror alone.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You can't hold the North if you let these lesser lords insult us.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I sent you there to collect taxes, not bodies.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Lord Cerwyn refused to pay. Said the Warden of the North would always be a Stark, and he'd be damned if he kissed a traitor's boot.

Name: roose
Subtitles: He left you no choice.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I flayed him living, along with his wife and brother. Made his son watch.

Name: roose
Subtitles: And?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: The new Lord Cerwyn paid his taxes.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I have something important to tell you. Stop eating and listen.

Name: roose
Subtitles: We don't have enough men to hold the North if the other Houses rise up against us. Do you understand that?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Our pact with the Lannisters protects -

Name: roose
Subtitles: I had a pact with Tywin Lannister, and Tywin Lannister is dead. The remaining Lannisters are a thousand miles away dealing with that fact. They've never once in the history of the Seven Kingdoms sent their army this far north. If you think they will for us, you're a fool. We become a great house by entering in alliances with other houses, and parleying those alliances into greater power. The best way to forge a lasting alliance isn't by peeling a man's skin off. The best way is marriage. . Now that you're a Bolton by royal decree, it's time you married a suitable bride. And as it happens, I found the perfect girl to solidify our hold in the North.
ners: [{'tywin'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'bolton'}, set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: That's Moat Cailin.

Subtitles: Yes. A bit shabby, isn't it? You've been here before.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: On our way down to King's Landing, with my father and Arya and… where are you taking me?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Home.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: The Boltons have Winterfell. . The marriage proposal, it wasn't for you?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Roose Bolton murdered my brother. He betrayed my family!

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He did.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He serves the Lannisters.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: For now.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I won't go.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Winterfell is your home.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Not anymore.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Always. You're a Stark. Dyeing your hair doesn't change that. You're Sansa Stark. The eldest surviving child of Ned and Catelyn Stark. Your place is in the North.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I can't marry him. You can't make me. He's a traitor. A murderer.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: You're not marrying Roose Bolton. No, you'll be marrying his son and heir, Ramsay. One day he'll be Warden of the North and you will -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No!

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Sansa -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, you can't make me. I will starve myself. I will die before I have to go there.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I won't force you to do anything. Don't you know by now how much I care for you? Say the word and we turn the horses round, but listen to me. Listen. . You've been running all your life. Terrible things happened to your family and you weep. You sit alone in a darkened room, mourning their fates. You've been a bystander to tragedy from the day they executed your father. Stop being a bystander, do you hear me? Stop running. There's no justice in the world. Not unless we make it. You loved your family. Avenge them.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: podrick
Subtitles: How do we get through there?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: We don't. We go around. .

Name: podrick
Subtitles: It sets miles out of the way. We'll lose sight of them.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Doesn't matter. I know where they're going.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Aren't you getting a bit old to be a squire? How did you end up squiring for the Imp?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: He hates that nickname.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Well, he's not here to complain about it, is he?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I squired for a knight name Ser Lorimer during the War of the Five Kings. One night, he had a bit too much to drink. And he was famished, so he borrowed a ham.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: He borrowed it?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: He wasn't a thief. He was drunk and hungry and he wasn't thinking. I was drunk too. He gave me half the ham. Next morning, one of the guards saw him passed out, under a wagon, with the ham bone still in his hand. They hanged the man afternoon. They tied the noose for me too, but, Lord Tywin heard my family name was Payne. So he pardoned me, and sent me to King's Landing to squire for his son.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'payne', 'tywin'}, set()]

Name: brienne
Subtitles: As punishment. For both of you.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: It didn't seem that way. Lord Tyrion was always very good to me.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Yes, all of your lords were very kind to you. All except me. Sorry you have to squire such a nasty person.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I'm not sorry. You're the best fighter I've ever seen. You beat The Hound. I'm proud to be your squire.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm sorry I'm always snapping at you.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: If you wouldn't snap at me I wouldn't learn anything.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You want to be a knight, Pod?

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Starting tomorrow, we'll train with the sword twice a day, before we ride in the morning and after we camp for the evening. . And I'm going to show you how to ride properly.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I can't knight you, but I can teach you how to fight.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: I suppose that's more important.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: You weren't a knight, but you were a Kingsguard to Renly Baratheon, weren't you?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I was.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion said he was a good man.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: He was.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: But how did you end up serving Renly?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: When I was a girl, my father held a ball. I'm his only living child, so he wants to make a good match for me. He invited dozens of young lords to Tarth. I didn't want to go, but he dragged me to the ballroom. . And it was wonderful. None of the boys noticed how mulish and tall I was. The shoved each other, and threatened to duel if they thought it was their turn to dance. And whispered in my ear how they wanted to marry me and take me back to their castles. . My father smiled at me and I smiled at him. I'd never been so happy. . Till I saw a few of the boys sniggering. And then they all started to laugh, they couldn't keep the game going any longer. They were toying with me. ‘Brienne the Beauty', they called me. Great joke. And I realized I was the ugliest girl alive. A great lumbering beast. I tried to run away, but Renly Baratheon took me in his arms. “Don't let them see your tears,” he told me. “They're nasty little shits. The nasty little shits aren't worth crying over.” He danced with me and none of the other boys could say a word. And he was the king's brother after all.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'brienne'}, set(), set(), set(), {'renly'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: podrick
Subtitles: But wasn't he... Lord Tyrion said he was...

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Yes, Pod, he liked men, I'm not an idiot. He didn't love me, he didn't want me, he danced with me because he was kind and he wouldn't see me hurt. He saved me from being a joke. From that day until his last day. And I couldn't save him in return. Nothing's more hateful than failing to protect the one you love. One day, I will avenge King Renly.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: But you said a shadow murdered him. How do you fight a shadow?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: A shadow with the face of Stannis Baratheon. I know it was Stannis. I know it in my heart. Stannis is a man, not a shadow. And a man can be killed.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'd like to speak alone.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Olly is my steward now, as I was Lord Commander Mormont's. I want him to attend my meetings, to learn from men with experience. One day, he might command.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Very well. . Have you considered my offer?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I have. And I thank you for it. You do me great honor. All my life I wanted to be Jon Stark.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Say the word and you will be.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But I have to refuse you. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. My place is here.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I'm giving you a chance to avenge your family. To take back the castle where you grew up. To rule the North.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wish I could fight beside you. Believe me, I do. But I swore a sacred vow at the Godswood. I pledged my life to the Night's Watch.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You're as stubborn as your father. And as honorable.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I can imagine no higher praise.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I didn't mean it as praise. Honor got your father killed. . But if your mindo s made up, I won't try to persuade you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: May I ask, Your Grace, how long you plan to stay at Castle Black?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Are you bored of us already?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You saved us from Mance Rayder's army. We will never forget that. But it's a question of survival. The Night's Watch can't continue to feed your men and the wildling prisoners indefinitely. Winter is coming.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I know it. We march on Winterfell within the fortnight. Before the snows trap us here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And the wildlings?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: They'd rather burn than fight for me, so be it. I leave their fate to you. You could execute them, that's the safest course. . Or you could see if this Tormund fellow is more willing to compromise than Mance ever was. I assume the brothers of the Night's Watch would rather see the wildlings dead.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Most of the brothers, yes. There's little love for the free folk here. .

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You're the Lord Commander. Your decision.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You have many enemies in Castle Black. Have you considered sending Alliser Thorne elsewhere? Give him command of Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I heard it was best to keep your enemies close.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Whoever said that didn't have many enemies.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He sees something in you. . Might not be apparent from his tone, but it's the truth. He believes in you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm sorry I disappointed him.

Name: davos
Subtitles: The king is a complicated man. But he wants what's right for the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: As long as he's ruling them.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He's the one true king. He has the blood right to that throne.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I've sworn to stay clear of the politics of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Have you now? . How does the Night's Watch vow go again? I bet you've got it memorized since you got here.

Name: olly
Subtitles: Night gathers and now my watch begins -

Name: davos
Subtitles: Not that bit, the bit at the end.

Name: olly
Subtitles: I'm the sword in the darkness, the watcher on the walls, the shield that guards the realm of men. I pledge my life -

Name: davos
Subtitles: Wait, that's enough. “The shield that guards the realm of men.” That's what you swore to be. Now I'm not a learned man, but the best way of helping the most people might not be sitting in a frozen castle at the edge of the world. It just might mean wading in the muck, getting your boots dirty, and doing what needs to be doing.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And what needs to be done?

Name: davos
Subtitles: As long as the Boltons rule the North, , the North will suffer. Just one man's opinion.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: waif
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: waif
Subtitles: You, who walk in here with a coin you never earned, whose value you do not respect. . Who are you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Ow! Cunt!

Name: waif
Subtitles: A lie, a sad little lie. Who are you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I told you, I'm no - . Do that again and -

Name: arya stark

Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: waif

Subtitles: A girl is not ready.

Name: waif

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I am ready.

Subtitles: Whose sword is that? It belongs to Arya Stark. Arya Stark's sword, Arya Stark's clothes, Arya Stark's stolen silver. A man wonders how is it that no one came to be surrounded by Arya Stark's things?

Subtitles: What do we do with them after we wash them?

Subtitles: Open gates!

Subtitles: Lady Sansa, welcome.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Bolton.

Subtitles: May I introduce my son, , Ramsay Bolton?

Subtitles: It's an honor to meet you, my Lady.

Subtitles: I'll bring you a bowl of hot water. You must want to wash.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Welcome home, Lady Stark. The North remembers.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sam. . Maester Aemon?

Name: sam
Subtitles: He apologizes for not being here. He's not feeling well.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Take good care of him. . Brothers. As you all know too well, it's long past time to dig a new latrine pit. . First Builder Yarwyck and I have decided to appoint a latrine captain to oversee this crucial task. . Brian. Seems like a good job for a ginger.

Subtitles: Ser Alliser. . You have more experience than any other soldier at Castle Black. You proved your valour many times over, while defending the Wall from the wildling attack. I name you First Ranger.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Janos. I'm giving you command of Greyguard.

Name: janos
Subtitles: Greyguard is a ruin.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yes, the fort is in a sorry state. Restore it as best you can. First Builder Yarwyck can spare ten of his -

Name: janos
Subtitles: I was charged with the defense of King's Landing when you were soiling your swaddling clothes. Keep your ruin.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Alright, alright! Enough of that.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You mistake me, my Lord. That was a command, not an offer. Pack your arms and armour, say your farewells, and ride for Greyguard.

Subtitles: I will not go meekly off to freeze and die! Give it to one of the fools who cast a stone for you. I will not have it. Do you hear me, boy? I will not have it!

Name: janos
Subtitles: You can stick your order up your bastard arse.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Take Lord Janos outside.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Olly, bring me my sword.

Name: janos
Subtitles: You cannot do this! Get your hands off me! . Scum, all of you! If the boy thinks he can frighten me, he's mistaken, yes, very mistaken.

Name: janos
Subtitles: A disgrace! I have friends, important friends in the capital! You'll see!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If you have any last words, my Lord, now is the time.

Name: janos
Subtitles: I was wrong. You're the Lord Commander! We all serve you. I'm sorry. Not only for this, for all I've done and said. I was wrong! . My Lord, please, mercy! Mercy! I'll go! I will! Please. I'm afraid. I've always been afraid.

Subtitles: You have served us well, my son.

Subtitles: Thank you, Father.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Which of the Seven will you worship today?

Subtitles: The Maiden.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Where is the Maiden?

Name: septon
Subtitles: And the Stranger.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Two is extra, you realize?

Name: septon
Subtitles: Yes, yes.

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: What are you doing? This establishment belong to Lord Petyr Baelish. You can't -

Subtitles: You have profaned our faith. The faith of our fathers and forefathers.

Name: septon
Subtitles: I am the High Septon of the -

Name: lancel
Subtitles: You are a sinner. And you shall be punished.

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Sinner! Sinner! Sinner!

Name: man
Subtitles: Repent!

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Sinner! Sinner! Sinner! Sinner! Sinner! Sinner!

Name: man
Subtitles: Shame on you!

Name: crowd
Subtitles: Sinner! Sinner!

Name: septon
Subtitles: Your Grace, , Grandmaester, Lord Tyrell, , uh…

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: It doesn't matter. .

Name: septon
Subtitles: As the High Septon of the Faith of the Seven I give voice to the will of the Gods and am their foremost servant in this world. An insult to me is an insult to the Gods. An assault on my person, is an assault on our very religion.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You were assaulted?

Name: septon
Subtitles: I was, by those fanatics who call themselves ‘sparrows'. They humiliated me, they they beat me, they left me naked and bleeding on the cobblestones. I am lucky to be alive.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: I heard this all began in Littlefinger's brothel.

Name: mace
Subtitles: High Septon, this is a rather shocking thing to hear.

Name: septon
Subtitles: I tend to both the highest born, and the lowliest amongst us. Even prostitutes may earn the mercy of the Mother.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: So you were administering to the needs of these devout prostitutes?

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: A man's private affairs ought to stay private!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you want from us, High Septon?

Name: septon
Subtitles: Justice! I ask that you protect our Faith by arresting these criminals and throwing them in the black cells. I ask that you execute their leader, this so-called High Sparrow. He's a threat to everything we hold sacred. If he goes unpunished -

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And where do I find this man? This High Sparrow?

Name: meryn
Subtitles: I don't think this is a good idea, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Nonsense, Ser Meryn. These are deeply religious people. . Where can I find the High Sparrow?

Name: man
Subtitles: Seven blessings.

Name: man
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: man
Subtitles: Just a little more...

Name: woman
Subtitles: Thank you ever so for the soup!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A young man said I would find the High Sparrow back here. Where is he?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: High Sparrow? Sounds ridiculous, doesn't it? Like Lord Duckling, or King Turtle. . So, it's meant to. We're often stuck with the names our enemies give to us. . The notion that we are all equal in the eyes of Seven doesn't sit well with some, so they belittle me.
ners: [{'high'}, set(), {'turtle', 'duckling'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: woman
Subtitles: Seven blessings to you.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Seven blessings to you, my dear. It's only a name, quite an easy burden to wear. Far easier than hers. .

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Why no shoes?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Because I gave them away to someone who needed them more. We all do that. It stops us from forgetting what we really are.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Is that why you came to King's Landing? To remind everyone?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Everyone? I have a hard enough job reminding myself. Oh, I tell them no one's special. And they think I'm special for telling them so.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps they're right.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: It would be comforting to believe that, wouldn't it? The Gods sent you here to tempt me? I hope not. I had assumed you'd only come here to arrest me. For that incident with the High Septon.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: An unacceptable way to treat the chosen representative of the Gods in this world, wouldn't you say?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Hypocrisy is a boil. Lancing a is never pleasant. Although, they could have been more careful with the blade.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The High Septon came to speak to me today. He doesn't want me to arrest you, he wants me to execute you.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: I wouldn't presume to know your thoughts on the matter.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My thoughts on the matter align with your own. The High Septon's behaviour was corrosive, as was his attitude. Having a man like that reside in the Sept eats away the Faith from the inside. So now he resides in the Red Keep's dungeons instead. . The Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. If one collapses, so does the other. We must do everything necessary to protect one another.
ners: [set(), {'the'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Send a raven with this message to Littlefinger in the Eyrie, or wherever he's slithering about. .

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: At once, Your Grace. .

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How's your work coming along?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Very well.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You've made progress?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: More than I've expected. Still a way to go, but…

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Very good. I'll leave you to it then. Make sure Littlefinger is clear on the meaning of the word "immediately".

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Shh. Easy, friend.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: She really is lovely. I hope I can make her happy.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I hope so too. I've become quite fond of Lady Sansa during our travels together. She's suffered enough.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I'll never hurt her. You have my word.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I've heard very little about you. Which makes you quite a rare thing, as lords go.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I haven't been a lord very long. I was a bastard.

Name: roose
Subtitles: And you're not anymore. Allow me a moment alone with Lord Baelish.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Yes, father. And thank you, Lord Baelish. I'm forever in your debt. .

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: He seems pleased.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Shouldn't he be?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I assure you she's still a virgin. Tyrion never consummated the marriage. By the law of the land, she's no man's wife. Inspect her, if you must.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I leave that to the brothel keeper. It's her name I need, not her virtue.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Then I have delivered everything I've promised.

Name: roose
Subtitles: And you prepared for the consequences. When the Lannisters hear I've wed Sansa Stark to Ramsay.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The Lannister name doesn't mean what it once did. Tywin is dead. He kept his house in power through sheer will. Without him, Jaime has one hand and no allies, Tommen is a soft boy, not a king to fear.

Name: roose
Subtitles: The Queen will be enraged.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Queen Margaery adores Sansa. Cersei is Queen Mother, a title whose importance wanes with each passing day.

Name: roose
Subtitles: And yet she still has friends. Men in important places, whom she can ask for favours. . A message for you, from Cersei Lannister. A rider arrived from Eyrie, shortly before dawn. Apparently, she thinks you're still in the Vale.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A message for me, you say. Strange that the seal is broken.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I'm sure you understand my position, Lord Baelish. If you received word in the night from the Queen Mother, it does make me question our new alliance. The Lannisters made you one of the great lords of Westeros. Yet, here you are in the North, undermining them. Why gamble with your position?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Every ambitious move is a gamble. You gambled when you drove a dagger into Robb Stark's heart. It appears that your gamble paid off. You're Warden of the North.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I had Tywin Lannister backing. Who supports me now? You?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The Eyrie is mine. The last time the lords of the Eyrie formed an alliance with the lords of the North, they brought down the greatest dynasty this world has ever known. I'd like to borrow one of your birds. Cersei will expect a reply.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I'd like to read the reply.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

Subtitles: Volantis is a large city.

Name: varys
Subtitles: The likelihood of you being spotted here increases a hundredfold.

Subtitles: Mm, I have to get out of this wheelhouse.

Subtitles: I'm not sure how many new ways I can find of saying this.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I will not be of any use to Daenerys Targaryen if I lose my mind. I can't remember the last face I saw that wasn't yours.

Name: varys
Subtitles: It's a perfectly good face.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm losing my mind.

Name: varys
Subtitles: If anyone recognizes you, you'll lose more than that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Look, we are thousands of miles from Westeros. . What am I? . One more drunk dwarf.

Name: tyrion lannister

Name: priestess
Subtitles: Lord cast your light upon us.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I saw her once. I was a boy, living with your mother's family. Lord Whent had a great tourney at Harrenhal. Everyone was there. The Mad King, your father, Robert Baratheon. And Lyanna, she was already promised to Robert. You can imagine what it was like for me, a boy from nowhere, with nothing to his name, watching these legendary men, tilting at the lists. The last two riders were Barristan Selmy and Rhaegar Targaryen. When Rhaegar won, everyone cheered for the prince. I remember the girls laughing when he took off his helmet and they saw that silver hair. How handsome he was. Until he rode right past his wife, Elia Martell, and all the smiles died. I've never seen so many people so quiet. He rode past his wife, and he lay a crown of winter roses in Lyanna's lap. Blue as frost. How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt?
