Name: bronn
Subtitles: Our ship capsized in the night. We managed to swim ashore. It was a near thing, really.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I thought the sharks would get us. .

Name: rider
Subtitles: There are no sharks in Dorne.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I could have sworn those were shark fins.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Dolphins maybe.

Name: rider
Subtitles: Throw your swords in the sand.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Boys, there's no need for this. Just, point us in the right direction. We'll find our way home.

Name: rider
Subtitles: Swords in the sand! Now!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: That one should be slow enough.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Nice move! .

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Luck.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You had a wonderful teacher.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Always wanted a Dornish stallion. Beasts can run a day and night without tiring. We'll ride to the Water Gardens with a nice breeze in our face.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: First we need to bury these bodies.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Birds have to eat too.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Corpses raise questions, questions raise armies. We're not here to start a war.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Do you know how long it will take us to dig all those holes?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I can't dig very well with one hand. Not at all, really.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Nama!

Name: elaria
Subtitles: Nym, Obara.

Name: obara
Subtitles: Will it be war?

Name: elaria
Subtitles: Prince Doran will weep for your father, but nothing else. We must avenge Oberyn ourselves.

Name: obara
Subtitles: Without Doran we have no army to march against the Lannisters.

Name: elaria
Subtitles: We don't need an army to start a war. . Queen Cersei loves her children, and we have one of them.

Name: nymeria
Subtitles: We may have a problem.

Name: obara
Subtitles: A ship's captain, who found me in Planky Town, claiming he had information to sell. He told me he smuggled Jaime Lannister into Dorne.

Name: elaria
Subtitles: He's come for Myrcella. If he gets to her before we do, we lose our only chance for revenge. You must choose. Doran's way and peace, or my way and war.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: I'm with you. Always. .

Name: elaria
Subtitles: Nym? . Obara?

Name: obara
Subtitles: When I was a child, , Oberyn came to take me to court. I'd never seen this man, and yet he called himself my father. My mother wept, said I was too young, and a girl.

Name: obara
Subtitles: I made my choice long ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Thank you. . Who are you?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your captor.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do you have wine?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I can't sleep without wine.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Then stay awake.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're going the wrong way. My sister's in Westeros. Westeros is west! We're heading east.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I'm not taking you to your sister.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You said you were taking me to the Queen.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I am. Queen Daenerys Targaryen. She's the Queen I serve.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What a waste of a good kidnapping. So happens I was heading there myself!

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: What business would you have with the Queen?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Gold and glory. Oh, and hate. If you've ever met my sister, you'd understand. So now that it's clear we're on the same side? . A high born knight from the North of Westeros, down on his luck in Essos. Dragon epaulettes? Bear sigil breast plate. You're Jorah Mormont. I have to ask how, exactly, were you serving your Queen in a whore house, half a world away? Is it possible, that you were running? Why would you be running? And why would she have sent you away? Oh, wait! You were spying on her, weren't you? It's all coming back to me! I was drunk through most of the Small Council meetings, but it's all coming back. You passed notes to Varys's little birds. She found out, didn't she? Found out, and exiled you. . And now you hope to win back her favor with a gift. A risky scheme. One might even say, desperate. Do you think Daenerys would execute me, and pardon you? I'd say the reverse is just as likely.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'jorah'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'varys'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'daenerys'}, set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Everyone looks happy enough from up here. . What?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I was thinking of all the times your brother made me go with him down from the Red Keep, into the streets of King's Landing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: He liked to walk among the people, he liked to sing to them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He sang to them?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Yes. Rhaegar would take a spot on the Hook or the Street of Seeds and then he'd sing. Just like all the other minstrels.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what did you do?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: I made sure no one killed him. And I collected the money. . Well he liked to see how much he could make.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He was good?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: He was very good. Viserys never told you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He told me Rhaegar was good at killing people. .

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Rhaegar never liked killing. He loved singing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what did you do with the money?

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Well, one time, he gave it to the next minstrel down the street. One time, he gave it to an orphanage in Flea Bottom. One time... we got horribly drunk. .

Name: daario
Subtitles: Your Grace. Hizdahr is here, waiting in your audience chamber.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many others are there?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Fifty a hundred.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Will you be joining us, Ser Barristan?

Name: daario
Subtitles: I think I can protect you from Hizdahr Zo Loraq.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I think I can protect me from Hizdahr Zo Loraq. Go, Ser Barristan. Sing a song for me.

Name: barristan
Subtitles: Your Grace. .

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: All men must die. But not all can die in glory.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Glory?

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Why else do men fight? Why did your ancestors cross the Narrow Sea and conquer the Seven Kingdoms? So their names would live on. Those who find victory in the fighting pits, will never become kings, but their names will live on. It's the best chance they'll ever have.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Is that what you used to tell men before you set them to butchering each other for sport?

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Your Grace, today is the traditional start of the fighting season.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I do not recognize this tradition.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Traditions are the only thing that will hold this city, your city, together. . Without them, former slaves and former masters have nothing in common. Nothing but centuries of mistrust and resentment. I can't promise this is the answer to all our problems, but it's a start.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Sons of the Harpy.

Name: end
Subtitles: EPISODE

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: I am so sorry, my queen. He was a good man.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Barristan the Bold" they called him. He crossed a continent to serve me. He was a loyal friend. And he died in an alley, butchered by cowards who hide behind masks.

Name: daario
Subtitles: We could pull back to the pyramid district, secure it, and use it as a base from which to operate. Then we clean the city out, neighborhood by neighborhood, street by street, until the rats have nowhere left to hide.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I prefer your earlier suggestion. Round up the leaders of each of Meereen's great families and bring them to me.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: But... I'm the leader of my family.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: No, Your Grace! I had nothing to do with this. Your Grace!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Walk forward.

Name: man
Subtitles: You cannot do this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Another step.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They will eat you, if I tell them to. They may eat you even if I don't. Children. Some say I should give up on them. . But a good mother never gives up on her children. She disciplines them if she must.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But she does not give up on them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who is innocent? Maybe all of you are, , maybe none of you are. Maybe, , I should let the dragons decide.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: All men must die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't want to overfeed them. Tomorrow perhaps.

Name: sam
Subtitles: And though Daenerys maintains her grip on Slaver's Bay, forces rise against her from within and without. She refuses to leave until the freedom of the former slaves is secure." She sounds like quite a woman.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: And she's alone, under siege, no family to guide her or protect her. Her last relation thousands of miles away, useless, dying.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Don't say that, Maester Aemon.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: A Targaryen, alone in the world, is a terrible thing.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Maester Aemon.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sam, I'd like to speak to the maester alone.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How are you feeling?

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Oh, like a hundred-year-old man slowly freezing to death.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I need your advice. There's something I want to do, something I have to do. But it'll divide the Night's Watch. Bitterly. Half the men will hate me the moment I give the order.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Half the men hate you already, Lord Commander. Do it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But you don't know what it is.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: That doesn't matter. You do. You will find little joy in your command. But with luck, you will find the strength to do what needs to be done. Kill the boy, Jon Snow. Winter is almost upon us. Kill the boy, and let the man be born.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Where are the rest of the free folk now? . Where have they gone? . Who leads them?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: They followed Mance. They won't follow anyone else.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What about you?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Hard to lead when you're in chains.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What if I unchained you?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Why would you do that?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Because you are not my enemy. And I'm not yours.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You sure seemed like my enemy when you were killing my friends.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: For 8,000 years the Night's Watch have sworn an oath to be the shield that guards the realms of men. And for 8,000 years we've fallen short of that oath. You belong to the realms of men. All of you.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: And now everything is going to change?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It is.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Why now?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Because now, , I am Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: What would you have me do, , Lord Commander?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'd have you go north of the Wall. Gather the remaining free folk wherever they are and bring them back here. I'll open the gates for them and let them through. I'll find them lands to settle south of the Wall.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: They won't kneel for you and neither will I.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't want them to kneel for me. I want them to fight with me when the time comes.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: The day I ask my people to fight with the crows is the day my people cut my guts from my belly and make me eat them.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And how many of your people can't fight? The women, the children, the old, the sick, what happens to them? You're condemning them to death. Worse than death because you're too proud to make peace. Or maybe you're not proud. Maybe you're just a coward.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Easy thing to say to a man in chains.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your people need a leader. And they need to get south of the Wall before it's too late. We don't have much time and they have less. The walkers are coming and they'll hit your people first. I'm not asking you to make peace to save your skin. Make peace to save your people.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Most of them are at Hardhome. You know where that is?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Up on Storroldo s Point. I can give you 10 horses and nine other men. You can get there in a week.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We'll need ships.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'll talk to King Stannis about lending you his fleet.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: All right, then. You're coming with me. You're the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. They need to hear it from you. They need to know the ships they are boarding won't be torched in the middle of the sea. You come with me, or I don't go.

Name: man
Subtitles: You'd bring wildlings here, through our gates?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Men, women, and children will die by the thousands if we do nothing.

Name: man
Subtitles: Let them die. We got our own to worry about. Less enemies for us.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Fewer.

Name: davos
Subtitles: What?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Nothing.

Name: sam
Subtitles: There is good farmland in the Gift. . Land that no one uses now. A dozen abandoned villages.

Name: man
Subtitles: And why do you think the farmers abandoned those villages? Because the wildlings raided them for years. Cut them down! Just like they did this boy's people.

Name: allister
Subtitles: We've been fighting them all for thousands of years. They've slaughtered villages. They've slaughtered our brothers.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And we've slaughtered theirs.

Name: edd
Subtitles: I will follow you anywhere, you know that. But they killed Grenn. And they killed Pyp. . They killed 50 of our brothers. I can't forget that. I can't forgive it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You were at the Fist of the First Men. If we abandon them, you know what they become. We can learn to live with the wildlings or we can add them to the army of the dead. Whatever they are now, they're better than that.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Thank you. . Olly. . If you have something you want to say to me, say it. It's all right.

Name: olly
Subtitles: You don't mean it, do you? Telling the wildlings you want to make peace. You're just doing it to trick them.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not a trick.

Name: olly
Subtitles: They burned my village. They put an arrow through my father's head right in front of me. They butchered my mother, everyone I ever knew.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I know what it's like to lose the people you love. I know this is hard for you. But winter is coming. We know what's coming with it. We can't face it alone.

Name: olly
Subtitles: Will there be anything else you need, Lord Commander?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: She's far away from the Lannisters. This is her home. Maybe Lady Sansa is better off here.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Better off with the Boltons who murdered her mother and brother? Sansa's in danger even if she doesn't realize it.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Thank you. You've lived here a long time?

Name: man
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Did you know Lord Eddard?

Name: man
Subtitles: I knew him and his father before him. The Starks are gone now.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Not all of them. I know who's inside that castle.

Name: man
Subtitles: Everyone knows. The Boltons.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm not talking about the Boltons. I need to get a message to her. To Sansa Stark.

Name: man
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Someone who swore to keep her safe.

Name: man
Subtitles: Swore to who?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Her mother.

Name: man
Subtitles: Her mother's dead.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: That doesn't release me from an oath. I served Lady Catelyn. I serve her still. Who do you serve?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Come back here. Myranda.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I saw you staring at her.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I'm going to marry her. That will involve looking at her from time to time.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: You said you'd marry me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: And I meant it. When I was a bastard named Snow. But I'm a Bolton now. What I want is no longer the primary consideration. I'm furthering a dynasty.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Do you think she's pretty?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Of course I do. I'm not blind.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You think she's pretty, too. I'm looking forward to our wedding night. But don't worry, I'll have plenty of time for you.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Perhaps I'll marry, too.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You're the kennel master's daughter. Who are you going to marry, the stable keeper's son? . You're mine. You're not going anywhere. Unless I have to listen to more of your jealousy. Jealousy bores me. You remember what happens to people who bore me. You're not going to bore me, are you, Myranda?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Never.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Beg pardon, my lady. I've come to refill the wash basin.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Oh, I don't need-

Name: woman
Subtitles: You still have friends in the North. If you're ever in trouble, light a candle in the highest window of the broken tower.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But who -

Name: woman
Subtitles: You're not alone.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I like your dress. Who made it for you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I made it myself.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Really?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Who, who are you?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I'm Myranda, the kennel master's daughter. May I? . Oh, wonderful. The stitching. Who taught you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My mother. .

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I'm sorry for what happened to her.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: It's good that she taught you. It was a gift. Now every time you wear something you made, you can remember her.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'd rather have a mother.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I know. It's not the same. Still, it's good to remember. Remember the way things were. I almost forgot. There's something else to help you remember.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Down there at the end.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: That would spoil the surprise. Go ahead, it's perfectly safe. You won't believe it when you see it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Theon?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You shouldn't be here.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You smell particularly ripe this evening. Pour me some wine.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Do you have something to tell me?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: No, my lord.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Reek.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: She saw me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Who?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Sansa. Lady Sansa. She came to the kennels.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: She saw you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes. I'm sorry, master. Forgive me. I didn't think -

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Come here.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You mustn't keep secrets from me, Reek. Get on your knees.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Give me your hand.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I forgive you.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I trust you find your chamber suitable, my lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes, thank you, my lord.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Allow me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Mother.

Name: walda
Subtitles: Thank you, Ramsay.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: My lady, we are all a family, we northerners. Our blood ties go back thousands of years. So I'd like to drink to our wedding. May our happiness spread from Moat Cailin to the Last Hearth.

Name: roose
Subtitles: To your wedding.

Name: walda
Subtitles: To your wedding.

Name: walda
Subtitles: It must be difficult for you being in a strange place.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: This isn't a strange place. This is my home. It's the people who are strange.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You're right. Very strange. More wine, please.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I heard you two had reunited. A fitting place for it. . I like to imagine that the last time you spoke was in this very room. Are you still angry with him after he - what he did? Don't worry. The North remembers. I punished him for it. He's not ironborn anymore. Not Theon Greyjoy anymore. He's a new man. A new person, anyway. Aren't you, Reek?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yes, master.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: That's his new name, Reek.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why are you doing this?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Because Reek has something to say to you. Don't you, Reek? . An apology. Apologize to Lady Sansa for what you did. Apologize for murdering her two brothers.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm sorry.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Look at her, Reek. An apology doesn't mean anything if you're not looking the person in the eye.

Name: theon greyjoy

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: There, over and done with. Doesn't everyone feel better? I do. That was getting very tense. Whew. . You know what, my lady? What with him having murdered your brothers and the rest of your family gone Reek here is the nearest thing to living kin that you have left. Reek. You will give away the bride. Someone has to. What better person? Good? Good?

Name: roose
Subtitles: Yes, yes, very good.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Wonderful. .

Name: roose
Subtitles: Walda and I have some good news as well, since we're all together.

Name: walda
Subtitles: We're going to have a baby.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm very happy for you.

Name: roose
Subtitles: From the way she's carrying, Maester Wolkan says it looks like a boy.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: How can you be sure?

Name: roose
Subtitles: Sure of what?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: That she's pregnant. I mean how can you tell?

Name: roose
Subtitles: Maester Wolkan has assured us beyond all doubt.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: So how did you manage it?

Name: roose
Subtitles: Manage what?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Getting her pregnant.

Name: roose
Subtitles: I imagine you're familiar with the procedure.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Of course, but how did you find it?

Name: roose
Subtitles: You disgraced yourself at dinner, parading that creature before the Stark girl.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: And if it's a boy?

Name: roose
Subtitles: You're worried about your position.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: My position is quite clear. I'm your son until a better alternative comes along.

Name: roose
Subtitles: You've never asked me about your mother.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Why would I? She had me, she died. And here we are.

Name: roose
Subtitles: She was a peasant girl. Pretty in a common sort of way. She was the miller's wife. Apparently they had married without my knowledge or consent. So I had him hanged and I took her beneath the tree where he was swaying. She fought me the whole time. She was lucky I didn't hang her, too. A year later she came to my gates with a squalling baby in her arms. A baby she claimed was mine. I nearly had her whipped and the child thrown in the river. . But then I looked at you and I saw then what I see now. You are my son. . Stannis Baratheon has an army at Castle Black. But he won't stay for long. He wants the Iron Throne, and the road to King's Landing comes right through Winterfell. He means to take the North. But the North is ours. It's yours and mine. Will you help me defeat him?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'stannis'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Is this every book there is?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Every book there is?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: In the world.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Well, no. There are thousands and thousands of books out there. This library is rather small, actually.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Where you grew up, were there more books?

Name: sam
Subtitles: My father's not the most literate man. They say the Citadel has the largest library in the world.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Where's that?

Name: sam
Subtitles: The Citadel? In Oldtown.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I'm sorry I don't know things.

Subtitles: Neither did I. I was a cynic, just like you. Then I saw a girl step into a great fire with three stone eggs. When the fire burned out I thought I'd find her blackened bones. Subtitles: There is another matter, your Grace. Something so urgent I couldn't trust the words to a raven. You once charged me with finding Arya Stark. To my shame I failed you. But I have found Sansa Stark. Alive, and well, and home again. In Winterfell.

Subtitles: Stannis Baratheon is also a traitor, marching with his army on Winterfell. Let Stannis and Roose battle, let the enemies of the throne slaughter each other and when they're done seize Winterfell from whichever thief survives.

Subtitles: Winterfell is 1,000 miles away from here. The weather has already begun to turn.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Ser Jaime, then.

Subtitles: Jaime is away on a sensitive diplomatic mission. I've no idea when he'll be back.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Perhaps I can help. The Knights of the Vale are some of the best fighters in Westeros, trained to battle in the ice and the snow.

Subtitles: Forgive me Lord Baelish, you have a reputation as a money lender and brothel keeper, not a military man.
