Subtitles: You wouldn't risk a single Lannister soldier or a single coin from the Royal Treasury. What do you have to lose, a brothel keeper?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And if you succeed?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Name me Warden of the North.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'll speak to the king this evening. Have him issue a royal decree.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'll not rest until the lion flies over Winterfell.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And I'll l know you're a man of your word when I see Sansa Stark's head on a spike.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: As I said. I live to serve.

Name: trystane
Subtitles: I'm going to ask him tomorrow.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: What if he says no?

Name: trystane
Subtitles: He won't. You've waited long enough. I want you to be my wife now. What is it?

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: Do you want to marry me because our families arranged it, or do you…

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: We can't. Not yet.

Name: trystane
Subtitles: Why not?

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: You know why not. Someone will see.

Name: trystane
Subtitles: You are going to be my wife. I am going to be your husband. We are allowed to walk through the gardens together.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: How many other girls have you walked through these gardens?

Name: trystane
Subtitles: I like the way your eyes go squinty when you're jealous.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: They don't go squinty, and you didnt answer the question.

Name: doran
Subtitles: They make a lovely couple. A Lannister and a Martell. They have no idea how dangerous that is. We must protect them.

Name: areo
Subtitles: Yes, my prince.

Name: doran
Subtitles: You have not had to use that axe of yours in a very long time. I hope you remember how.

Name: areo
Subtitles: I remember how.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: The Dornishman's wife was as fair as the sun and her kisses were warmer than spring. The Dornishman's blade it was made of black steel and its kiss was a terrible thing. The Dornishman's wife would sing as she bathed in a voice that was sweet as a peach...

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Alright, thats enough.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I'm coming to the best part.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We're trying to blend in. We don't want everyone in Dorne to hear your accent.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: This song really is all about the ending.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It can wait. Up there.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That's the Water Gardens.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Once we got the princess, then what?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I like to improvise.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: That explains the golden hand.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Unbowed, unbent, unbroken. For Oberyn.

Name: sand snakes
Subtitles: For Oberyn.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Well, she's made herself at home.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Myrcella.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: Uncle Jaime? I don't understand, what are you doing here?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Let's speak in private.

Name: trystane
Subtitles: I am Trystane Martell.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: Trystane is my intended.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Excellent. Good to meet you.

Name: trystane
Subtitles: We weren't expecting you, Ser Jaime.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Why don't you let them have some time alone, son?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Let's not do something stupid.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: No!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: That was something stupid.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We have to go, Myrcella, now.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: You hurt him!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You'll be fine, I promise, but we have to--

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh for fuck's sake.

Name: obara
Subtitles: You're coming with me.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: I don't want to!

Name: obara
Subtitles: I wasn't asking, princess.

Name: areo
Subtitles: Drop you weapons!

Name: obara
Subtitles: I am Obara Sand. Daughter of Oberyn Martell. I fight for Dorne. Who do you fight for?

Name: areo
Subtitles: Drop your weapons!

Name: areo
Subtitles: When you were whole, it would have been a good fight.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You fight pretty good for a little girl.

Name: rider
Subtitles: Halt!

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Oh! You can smell the shit from 5 miles away. Well, why are we stopped, go on.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Rumors and gossip, that's all they got. It's theater, nothing more. If they arrested all the pillow biters in King's Landing there'd be no room left in the dungeons for anyone else.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Everyone knew about him and Renly.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Renly Baratheon shagged half the stable boys in the Seven Kingdoms. Everyone knew. No one cared.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: But he was the king's brother.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And Loras is the queen's brother. No, no, no, no, this is unacceptable.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Cersei is behind this.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Of course she is. She wants to drag our names through the dirt. Put us in our place. Get some rest, dear, you look appalling. Let me deal with Cersei Lannister.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Your Grace, I have travelled a long way.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You must be exhausted.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Put the pen down, dear, we all know you aren't writing anything.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Ah, yes, the famously tart-tongued queen of thorns.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And the famous tart Queen Cersei.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Beg your pardon.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I know you're behind this absurd incarceration of my grandson.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If you apologize for that comment perhaps--

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You'll get your apology when I get Loras.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I was as shocked as anyone when The Faith arrested Ser Loras. I have no love for these fanatics. But what can the queen mother do?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Has the crown suddenly stopped needing the troops, gold, and wheat my house supplies?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I assure you our alliance with House Tyrell remains--

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Do you expect the alliance to continue after you've thrown our future into prison?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: As I said, i didn't imprison anyone. As for your veiled threats--

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What veil?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Lannister-Tyrell alliance brought peace to a war-torn country. Do you really want to see the Seven Kingdoms slide back into warfare?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I didn't trust your father. I didn't particularly like him. But I respected him. He was no fool. He understood that sometimes we must work with our rivals rather than destroy them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: House Lannister has no rival. The High Septon has called for an inquest, not a trial. Just a small hearing to determine whether the charges against Loras have merit, which I'm sure they don't. Loras will be freed, our happy alliance will continue, and we'll forget this unfortunate conversation ever happened. Good day, Lady Olenna.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You are aware of the rumors concerning you and Renly?

Name: loras
Subtitles: I don't pay attention to rumors.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You were said to be despondent when he died. Witnesses said that you refused to leave his bedside, even as Stannis' army closed in

Name: loras
Subtitles: He was my friend. He was my king.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Wasn't Joffrey your king? He was anointed by the 7, not Renly.

Name: loras
Subtitles: I was wrong to support Renly's claim. I know that. But I was forgiven by Joffrey. I fought for him at the Battle of the Blackwater.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Wearing Renly's armor.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Why does it matter what I wore?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Do you deny all of the charges against you? Fornication, buggery, blasphemy.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Of course I deny them.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You never lay with Renly Baratheon.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Never.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Nor any other man.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: That will be all Ser Loras.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Well I think that's quite enough of that.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Faith calls Queen Margaery forward.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You call me forward?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Yes. We have some questions for you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I am the queen.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You are. And according to Law of the Seven, neither kings nor queens are exempt from testimony at a holy inquest.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: How do you respond to these charges against your brother?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: They are lies.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: All of them?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: All of them.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Queen Margaery, in the presence of the gods, do you swear that your brother is innocent of these charges against him, to the best of your knowledge?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Yes, I swear it.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Thank you, your grace.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Do you know this man?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Yes, very well. He is Ser Loras Tyrell, heir to Highgarden.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: How did you come to meet?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: I squired for him. He took a liking to me. He summoned me to his chamber the first day we met.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: And what occurred in his chamber?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: We engaged in intimate relations.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You laid with him?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: That night and many others.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Liar! He's a liar!

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Is there anyone else who can support your claim?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: Yes, yes, Queen Margaery. She walked in on us once not long ago. She didn't seem surprised.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This testimony is an insult to a great house. Why should The Faith or anyone else take the word of a squire over the heir to Highgarden?

Name: olyvar
Subtitles: He has a birthmark, your grace. Quite high on his thigh, wine-colored, and roughly the shape of Dorne.

Name: loras
Subtitles: Liar!

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What are you doing? Let us pass.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: The Faith is satisfied that there is enough evidence to bring a formal trial for Ser Loras... and Queen Margaery.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: What?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Bearing false witness before the gods is as grave a sin as any. Take her.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Tommen! Tommen!

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You can't do this, I am the queen! Tommen, Tommen! I am your queen, how dare you!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Lord Ramsay sent me to draw your bath, my lady. You want to be clean and fresh for your new husband don't you?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: You're so beautiful. But if you need to keep him happy. Ramsay gets bored easily. You dont want to end up like... Well, like the others.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What others?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: I shouldn't gossip. It's good to see the red again. No point in hiding anymore.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Let's see. There was Kiera. The blacksmith's daughter. She was tall. Like you. Lovely figure. But she talked and talked and talked and… Ramsay got tired of that. Then there was Violet. She had gorgeous blond hair. But she got pregnant and, well, that was boring. Then Tamsay. Such a sweet girl. Of course sweet girls get a bit dull after a while, don't they? Ramsay let me come with him on that hunt.
ners: [set(), {'kiera'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'ramsay'}, {'violet'}, set(), set(), {'tamsay'}, set(), set(), {'ramsay'}]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Hunt?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Mm. Have you ever seen a body after the dogs have been at it? Not so pretty. But it's your wedding day, why am I talking about such things?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What was your name again?

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Myranda.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And how long have you loved him, Myranda. Did you imagine that he would be with you forever, is that it? Then I came along and ruined it. I am Sansa Stark of Winterfell. This is my home and you can't frighten me.

Name: myranda
Subtitles: Are you done with your bath, my lady?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Go. I can finish on my own.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I've come to escort you to the Godswood, my lady. If you please, my lady, will you take my arm?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Lord Ramsay, he said I'm to take your arm.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm not touching you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Please. He'll punish me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Do you think I care what he does to you.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Who comes before the Old Gods this night?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Sansa of the House Stark comes here to be wed. A woman grown, trueborn and noble. She comes to beg the blessings of the gods. Who comes to claim her?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Ramsay of House Bolton. Heir to the Dreadfort and Winterfell. Who gives her?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Theon of House Greyjoy. Who was… who was her father's ward.

Name: roose
Subtitles: Lady Sansa, will you take this man?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I take this man.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Are you pleased my lady?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Good. I want you to be happy. My father said you're still a virgin.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Why? Why are you still a virgin? Afraid of dwarves?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion was kind, he was gentle, he never touched me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You're not lying to me?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, my lord.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Lying to your husband on his wedding night, that would be a very bad way to start a marriage. We are man and wife now, we should be honest with each other, don't you think?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes sir.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Good. Now take off your clothes.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Oh, no no no. You stay here Reek. You watch. Do I need to ask a second time? I hate asking a second time.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Reek? I told you to watch.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You've known Sansa since she was a girl. Now watch her become a woman.

Name: end
Subtitles: EPISODE

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: First Ranger, you have command of Castle Black.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Lord Commander, it is my duty to tell you I believe this mission to be reckless, foolhardy, and an insult to all of the Brothers that have died fighting the wildlings.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: As always, thank you for your honesty.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Safe travels, Lord Commander.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Thank you, Sam.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, and…

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's Dragonglass. It's what I used to kill the White Walker. I hope you don't need them.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Me too.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: There he is. That laugh. Egg! Egg laughed like that. One of the first things I remember about him.

Name: sam
Subtitles: His little brother, Aegon. He became king.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: And before that, he was a jolly fellow. Like this one.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Get him south, Gillyflower. Before it's too late.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Theon, wait.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not Theon, my lady. Reek.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Help me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You're his wife now.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Theon

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Do what he says. Do what he says or he'll hurt you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He already hurts me every night. All day I'm locked in this room and every night he comes. It can't be worse.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: It can. It can always be worse.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What did he do to you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Please…

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You betrayed my family!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I'm sorry!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You have to help me!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He'll see us. You don't know him.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: My family still has friends in the North. All I have to do is give a signal and they'll rescue me. Climb to the top of the Broken Tower, light this candle, and put it in the window. Promise me, Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Reek, my lady, Reek!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Your name is Theon Greyjoy. Last surviving son of Balon Greyjoy, Lord of the Iron Islands, do you hear me? Theon. Promise me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Yes, Reek?

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Egg! Egg! Mothers looking for you! Egg!

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Get some sleep, Sam. You'll have to speak for him tomorrow.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You don't know that.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Get some sleep. I'll watch over him.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'll stay too. He's always been good to me. I can't leave him now.

Name: aemon
Subtitles: Egg! Egg.. I dreamed... that I was old

Name: sam
Subtitles: His name was Aemon Targaryen. He came to us from King's Landing, a Maester of the Citadel, chained and sworn. And a sworn brother of the Night's Watch, ever faithful. No man was wiser or gentler or kinder. At the Wall a dozen Lord Commanders came and went during his years of service, but he was always there to counsel them. He was the blood of the dragon, but now his fire has gone out. And now his watch has ended.
ners: [{'aemon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: brothers
Subtitles: And now his watch has ended.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: You're losing all your friends, Tarly.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: My beautiful wife.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: When my father told me we were marrying I half expected a fat, bearded beast. Do you know how pleased I was when I saw you? You've made me very happy.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Our scouts report that Stannis Baratheon rides for Winterfell. He's a respected commander. His troops are loyal and battle tested. He's hired thousands of foreign sell swords to bolster his army. But this storm was a stroke of luck for us northerners. Our people are used to fighting in frost. His army's out there now, suffering in the snow. One day I'll be Lord of Winterfell, and Warden of the North. You'll be my Lady and Wardeness.
ners: [{'stannis'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But isn't your step mother pregnant?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: What of it?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What happens if she has a boy?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Then I'll have a baby brother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But he'll be the heir.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I'm Lord Bolton's eldest son.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But you're a bastard, a true born will always have the stronger claim.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I've been naturalized by a royal decree of--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Tommen Baratheon. Another bastard.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Bastards can rise high in the world. Like your half-brother Jon Snow. Born The Bastard of Winterfell, now the Lord Commander of the Night's Watch.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You didn't know? Yes, he's done very well for himself. Ah. I near forgot why I asked you to join me. Come, my lady.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Your Northern friend. Reek told me you wanted to leave.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Why? Winterfell is your home and I am your husband.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Tough old bird. Everyone talks when I start beating them. But this one. Her heart gave out before I got to her face. We do breed them tough in the North. Bring my wife back to her chamber. It's far too cold out here for a lady. You should hold on to your candles. The nights are so long now.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: davos
Subtitles: 40 horses died in the night. We'll lose more come sunset. We're running out of food. We can't open the supply line until the snow clears.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: What else?

Name: davos
Subtitles: The Stormcrows rode off last night.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: 500 men.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Sell swords, loyal to nothing but gold.

Name: davos
Subtitles: We still have a hard march to Wintefell and we won't be marching anywhere in this weather.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: And?

Name: davos
Subtitles: This isn't our time, we should head back to Castle Black when the snow clears.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I retreated from King's Landing, Ser Davos. If I retreat again, I become “The King Who Ran.”

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace..

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Winter is coming. Those arent just the Stark words, it's a fact. If we march back to Castle Black, we winter at Castle Black. And who can say how many years this winter will last.

Name: davos
Subtitles: It's better to wait for the right time than to risk everything.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: This is the right time, and I will risk everything. Because if I don't, we've lost. We march to victory or we march to defeat, but we go forward only forward,

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I've trusted in your visions, in your prophecies for years.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You saw it yourself, my king, when you stared into the flames. A great battle in the snow.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: I don't know what I saw.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: You do know. Trust yourself.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: And you, do you trust yourself?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I trust in the Lord.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Are you sure?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I have seen myself walk along the battlements of Wintefell. I have seen the flayed men banners lowered to the ground.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: But sometimes sacrifices must be made to ensure victory. I have shown you the power of king's blood. The Usurper Robb Stark. The Usurper Joffrey Baratheon.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: We don't have Robert's bastard here.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: No, we have someone better, and your blood runs through her veins.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Have you lost your mind?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Do you doubt me still? After all that you've seen?

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: There must be another way. Leeches or something.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: There is only one way. You must become king before the Long Night begins. Only you can lead the living against the dead. All your life has led us to this moment. To this decision.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: She's my daughter.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Get out.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: The beauty from beyond The Wall.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Where are you going, huh? Aren't we better looking than the fat man?

Name: derryk
Subtitles: The question is, is she pretty down south in the real world, or is she pretty because she's the only girl here?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Even in White Harbor, I'd want a kiss.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: Come on love, give us a kiss.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Leave me alone.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: If you were my girl I wouldn't leave you alone.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: One little kiss.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: Come on, give him a kiss.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: A man gets lonely guarding the Wall.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: There's no need to be rude.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: We just want a little affection.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Get your hands off her. Brother Derryk. Brother Brand. I believe you both have guard duty tonight.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Sam the Slayer. Are you gonna slay me with that sword?

Name: derryk
Subtitles: Look at his hands shaking.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Gilly go on, Get back to your room and lock the door.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'm warning you.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: Come on! Come on!

Name: derryk
Subtitles: You lying sack of shit! Killed a White Walker, eh? You fatass fuck. Come on, get up. He's your hero. He's a hog!

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Leave him alone!

Name: derryk
Subtitles: Stubborn little wilding bitch aren't ya?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sam! Sam! Sam!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Alright. Hold still.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I said get your hands off her.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You're gonna get yourself killed.

Name: derryk
Subtitles: Roll over. Jon Snow's not here to save you.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I killed a White Walker. I killed a Thenn. I'll take my chances with you.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sam!

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'm alright.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You're not.

Name: sammy
Subtitles: Just a bit woozy.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: The next time you see something like that you leave it alone.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I will not. They wouldo ve… I don't know what they would have done

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I know they would have killed you if Ghost hadn't come.

Name: sam
Subtitles: No. They were tiring out. I had them in the palm of my hand.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Don't be stupid Sam, you're not a fighter.

Name: sam
Subtitles: What kind of man would I be if I ran away when I saw someone hurting you?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Just promise me that whatever happens you'll take care of little Sam.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Of course I will. And I'll take care of you, too.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I need more water.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Stay. Please.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Am I hurting you?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Are you sure?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh. Oh my.

Name: malko
Subtitles: A rare find for the fighting pits, my friends. Not your usual street tough old drunken pirate. This one's a Westerosi knight from an ancient house, trained in sword and lance. he fought beside the Stag King Robert on the far side of the Narrow Sea. He was first from the breach during the siege of Pyke, slaughtering 50 men with his flaming sword. He killed the great Khal Drogo in single combat. Betrayed by his woman, he sold himself into slavery to repay his debts. Bidding begins at 12 gold honors.

Name: malko
Subtitles: 13. Do I have 14?

Name: malko
Subtitles: 15? 15 golds honors. Do I have 16?

Name: malko
Subtitles: Sold!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Wait! You have to buy me as well.

Name: buyer
Subtitles: Why?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We're a team. I'm a great fighter, too.

Name: malko
Subtitles: He's funny. You have to give him that.

Name: buyer
Subtitles: Alright. He's funny.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Thank you my Lord. Thank you.

Name: buyer
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My Lord, if I may. I've heard Mereen's become a free city. You might run into trouble if you try to fight slaves in the fighting pits. Now if you were to fight free men who were paid a wage…

Name: buer
Subtitles: Here's your wages, funny man. It'll last the rest of your life.

Name: daario
Subtitles: How long before the king of Mereen comes to claim my pillow?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't be ridiculous. My marriage to Hizdahr is political. I think he's smart enough to understand that.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I think the Sons of the Harpy have stopped killing because their leader was made king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Are you jealous?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Do you think I'm petty enough to speak ill of a man just because he represents competition?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I do.

Name: daario
Subtitles: You're right. My motivations are entirely impure.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Doesn't make me wrong.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You told me yourself, I can't fight enemies within and without. So when enemies from without come knocking, I need the city of Mereen behind me. I have no choice.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Everyone has a choice. Even slaves have a choice. Death or slavery.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So what else can I do?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Marry me instead.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Even if I wanted to do such an inadviseable thing, I couldn't.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Why not? You're our queen, you can do as you like.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No. I can't

Name: daario
Subtitles: Then you are the only person in Mereen who's not free.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I know I'm here to serve my queen and not to give advice, but can I make one more suggestion?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Of course

Name: daario
Subtitles: On the day of the Great Games, gather all the great masters, and wise masters, and worthy masters you can find, and slaughter them all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I am a queen. Not a butcher.

Name: daario
Subtitles: All rulers are either butchers or meat.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You there! Where would I find the High Septon, or High Sparrow, or whatever bloody fool name he's got.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: It's not as good a name as Queen of Thorns, I'll admit.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You should have the decency to stand when you talk to a lady.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You should have the decency to kneel before the gods

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Don't spar with me little fellow.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: For me, it's the knees. You?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Hips.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Huh.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: A man of the people, is that your game? It's an old game. dull and unconvincing. A man of the people who does Cersei's dirty work for her.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: The people always do the dirty work.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Spare me the homilies, I can smell a fraud from a mile away.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: A useful talent.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I'm here for my grandson and granddaughter.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Your grandson and granddaughter swore sacred vows and lied. The Father judges us all. Sons of high lords, sons of fishermen. If you break his laws you will be punished.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Don't you walk away from me.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You don't give commands here, Lady Olenna.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What is it you want? Gold? I'll make you the richest septon who ever lived.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What then?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: I imagine this is strange for you. Everyone you meet has a hidden motive, and you pride yourself on slitting in and out. But I'm telling you a simple truth

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: How do they communicate their demands? By raven or horse?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: By the holy text. The seven pointed star. If you don't have one in your library I'll give you my own.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I've read the seven pointed star.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Then you'll remember the passages concerning buggery and perjury. Your grandchildren will be punished in the same manner as anyone who breaks the sacred laws.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Half the men, women, and children in this foul city break the sacred laws. You live among murderers, thieves, and rapists. And yet you punish Loras for shagging and Margaery for defending her brother?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Yes. The Gods' laws must be applied to all equally.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: If it's equality you want then so be it. When House Tyrell stops sending our crops to the capital, everyone here will starve. And I'll make sure the hungry know who to blame,

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Have you ever served the field, Lady Olenna? Have you ever reaped the grain? Has anyone in House Tyrell? A lifetime of wealth and power has left you blind in one eye. You are the few. We are the many. And when the many stop fearing the few…

Name: squire
Subtitles: Lady Olenna.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Starving yourself won't make things any better for her, my love.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: She's in a prison cell and there's nothing I can do. I am the king! The queen is in prison and there's nothing I can do!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No matter who you are, no matter how strong you are, sooner or later, you'll face circumstances beyond your control.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I'll call in the army. I'll take back the sept and kill every last one of them. I'll start a war if I have to.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You know as well as I do who the first casualty in that war would be.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I love her. I love her. I can't help her.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We must be strong for those we love. We cannot give in to despair.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I will speak to the high sparrow. There must be something--

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Let me speak to him on your behalf. The king cannot dirty sully himself negotiating with an unwashed fanatic.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your happiness is all I want in this world

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I know.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No you don't. You can't possibly. Not until you have children of your own. I would do anything for you. Anything to keep you from harm. I would burn cities to the ground. That is all that matters. You and your sister. From the moment you came into this world, my boy. My only boy.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: areo
Subtitles: Prince Doran hopes this satisfies your concerns about the princess's wellbeing.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: You looked different when I left. You had more hair.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And more hands. How's Trystane?

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: He'll be alright.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry for that. It wasn't supposed to happen that way.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: Why is it happening at all?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Your mother's worried about you. Threats have been made. Dorne is too dangerous for you. I've come to take you home.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: This is my home, this has been my home for years. I didn't want to come here but she told me to. I did what she said, I did my duty and now she's forcing me to go back?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It's for your own good. These are complicated matters.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: It's not complicated at all, it's simple. I love Trystane, I'm going to marry him, and we're staying right here.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't understand.

Name: myrcella
Subtitles: Of course you don't! You don't know me!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Brothers oh brothers, my days here are done, the Dornishman's taken my life. Bur what does it matter, for all men must die, and I've tasted the Dornishman's wife! Yes I've tasted the Dornishman's wife!

Name: tyene
Subtitles: He's got a good voice.

Name: obara
Subtitles: We're lucky he's a singer. If he were a fighter we might have been in trouble.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: It's against my code to hurt a woman.

Name: obara
Subtitles: It's amazing how many men we beat seem to have this code.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I wouldn't say you beat me.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: How's your arm?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Wonderful. Wouldn't feel right to leave Dorne without a new scar.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: You think you're leaving Dorne?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: No great hurry. Dornish women are the most beautiful women in the world.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I said Dornish women. I didn't say you.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: I'm not the most beautiful woman you've ever seen?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I've seen quite a few women in all the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Name one more beautiful than I am.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Well now, in King's Landing there was an absolutely gorgeous...

Name: tyene
Subtitles: There was a what? In King's Landing you were saying.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Was I?

Name: tyene
Subtitles: There was a woman more beautiful than I am.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Was there? My memory's not what it was earlier.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: How's your arm now?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You seem concerned with it. You must really like me.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: And how about your head?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: My head… You don't even wanna know what's going on in…

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Your nose is bleeding.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: It's nothing. It's the dry air.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: My dagger was coated with a special ointment from Asshei. They call it the Long Farewell. It takes time to work, but if a single drop makes contact with the skin, death.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: The only antidote. Who's the most beautiful woman in the world?

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Sorry? Who?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Don't drop it.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: I think you're very handsome as well.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'm sorry about the locale.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: No you're not.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It felt like the safest place.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Not for your clientele, clearly.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: It was an establishment like no other. The sheer range of appetites catered to, desires that didn't exist until we invented them.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You've always been rather impressed with yourself, haven't you?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The past is the past. The future is all that's worth discussing. The future of House Tyrell.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Don't pretend to have any concern for my house, my grandchildren, or me. I should have known you'd return to the capital once things started going wrong.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I promise you..

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I promise you, Lord Baelish, that our fates are joined. Together we murdered a king. And if my house should fall, I would have nothing to hide. And if i should meet with some accident here at this broken little flesh market, they'll never even find what's left of you. So do you deny a part in all of this?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Cersei summoned me to King's Landing. I dared not refuse her.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And what did she want?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: A piece of info that she know that I had. Neither silence nor lies were an option. But I have other information of which she is unaware. And as you say, our interests are aligned. I have a gift for you.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What kind of gift?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The same kind I gave Cersei. A handsome young man.

Name: slave owner
Subtitles: Many worthy fighters have died trying to make it to the Great Games. When most of you worthless scum join them in death this afternoon it will represent a significant rise in your station. But if you happen to triumph here you will fight at the great pit of Daznak itself in front of the queen. So whatever happens, the gods have smiled upon you today. Today is the day your lives actually start to mean something.

Name: owner
Subtitles: You and you, you, you two, you, you, and you.

Name: owner
Subtitles: Valar morghulis.

Name: men
Subtitles: Valar dohaeris.

Name: owner
Subtitles: Prepare yourselves.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Sitting through the great games will be bad enough.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: For generations, in the days leading up to the great games, it has been customary for our ruler to make the rounds to the lower pits to pay the fighters there the honor of her presence.

Name: owner
Subtitles: Move yourselves!

Name: owner
Subtitles: Your Grace. Your Future Grace. You honor us all.

Name: owner
Subtitles: We fight and die for your glory, O glorious queen.”

Name: men
Subtitles: We fight and die for your glory, O glorious queen.”

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I think I've seen enough.

Name: hizdahr
Subtitles: Your Grace, it's a tradition for the queen to stay until the victor has emerged.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I've sacrificed more than enough for your traditions.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Get him out of my sight.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Khaleesi, please, I just need a moment of your time. I brought you a gift.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's true. He has.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I am the gift. It's a pleasure to meet you, Your Grace. My name is Tyrion Lannister.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This is horrible. Unacceptable. Are they feeding you enough at least? I brought you this. Venison. It's quite good. I had it myself for supper only last night. We did everything we could from the moment they took your brother. Tommen even went to the sept himself to confront the high sparrow, but I fear The Faith has left reason behind.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'tommen'}]

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I know you did this.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We are making every effort on your behalf. I swear to you by all the seven gods.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Lies come easily to you. Everyone knows that. But innocence, decency, concern? You're not very good at those, I'm afraid. Perhaps that's why your son was so eager to cast you aside for me.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're upset. You're not thinking clearly. I'll visit again when you've had a chance to calm down.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I don't want to see you again.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I do hope you change your mind about that. I've been told men often go mad in the Black Cells below the Red Keep, but I suppose your isolation will end once your trial begins.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Leave.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes, I'm afraid I must. My son needs me now more than ever.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Get out you hateful bitch!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Sleep well, sister.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Thank you. You saw her?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: And?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Her accommodations seem sufficient. What happens to her now?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Well she and her brother are both being held under fair suspicion. A trial will be held for each of them to determine if they are guilty of any acts that might constitute a violation of the tenants of the faith.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Who will stand judge?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Seven septons. As it was in all trials before the Targaryens.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Will you be one of them?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: I will.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If one or both of them were to confess before the trial…

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Then they will be at The Mother's mercy.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What does The Mother's mercy entail?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: It depends on the situation. The acts themselves, the degree of contrition.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Thank you High Septon for bringing them whatever justice they deserve in the eyes of the Seven.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Did you know this chapel is one of the oldest structures in King's Landing?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I think I may have heard at one point.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Baelor built his sept around it. But men worshipped here long before him.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Who carved this altar do you know?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm afraid i don't.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: No one does. There's no name on it. Or anywhere else in the chapel. The people who built this place didn't inflict their vanity on the people who came after them. The way Baelor did with that great gilded monstrosity out there. Their faith was clean.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: A young man came to us not long ago, broken in body and spirit. He had so much to strip away, so much weighing him down. But piece by piece he unburdened himself. Let go of vanity, pride, sin, now his soul is so light he will float through the Seven Heaves like a bird.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: And he has much to say about you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Move. Let me go immediately.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You will order her to let me go! I am the queen! I am the queen! Have you lost your mind? Let me go! You filthy… I am the queen! Let me go!
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Look at me. Look at my face. It's the last thing you'll see before you die.

Name: end
Subtitles: EPISODE

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your Grace, I want to say--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You will not speak. How do I know you are who you say you are?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If only I were otherwise.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: If you are Tyrion Lannister why shouldn't I kill you? To pay your family back for what it did to mine

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You want revenge against the Lannisters? I killed my mother Joanna Lannister the day I was born. I killed my father Tywin Lannister with a bow to the heart. I am the greatest Lannister killer of our time.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So I should welcome you into my service because you murdered members of your own family?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Into your service? Your Grace we have only just met. It's too soon to know if you deserve my service.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: If you'd rather return to the fighting pits just say the word.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: When I was a young man I heard a story about a baby born during the worst storm in living memory. She had no wealth, no lands, no army, only a name and a handful of supporters, most of whom probably thought they could use that name to benefit themselves. They kept her alive, moving her from place to place, often hours ahead of the men who had been sent to kill her. She was eventually sold off to some warlord on the edge of the world and that appeared to be that. And then a few years later the most well informed person I knew told me that this girl without wealth, lands, or armies had somehow acquired all 3 in a very short span of time, along with three dragons. He thought she was our best, last chance to build a better world. I thought you were worth meeting at the very least.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And why are you worth meeting? Why should I spend my time listening to you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Because you can not build a better world on your own. You have no one at your side who understands that land you want to rule. The strengths and the weaknesses of the houses that will either support or oppose you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I have a very large army and very large dragons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Killing and politics aren't always the same thing. When I served as Hand of the King I did quite well with the latter considering the king in question preferred torturing animals to leading his people. I could do an even better job advising a ruler worth the name.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So you want to advise me. Very well. What would you have me do with him? I swore I would kill him if he ever returned.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I know.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why should the people trust a queen who can't keep her promises?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Whomever Ser Jorah was when he started informing on you, he is no longer that man. I can't remember seeing the same man as devoted to anything as he is to serving you. He claims he would kill for you and die for you, and nothing I have witnessed gives me reason to doubt him. And yet he did betray you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did he have an opportunity to confess his betrayals?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Yes, many opportunities.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And did he?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No. Not until forced to do so.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He worships you. He is in love with you, I think. But he did not trust you with the truth - an unpleasant truth, to be sure - but one of great significance to you. He did not trust that you would be wise enough to forgive him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So I should kill him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A ruler who kills those that are devoted to her is not a ruler that inspires devotion. And you're going to need to inspire devotion, and lots of it, if you're ever going to rule across the Narrow Sea. But you cannot have him by your side when you do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Remove Ser Jorah from the city.

Name: septa
Subtitles: Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My son. Let me speak to--

Name: septa
Subtitles: Confess. I meant it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My face will be the last thing you see before--

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My name is Lana. I'm an orphan. When I was 8 I begged enough money to buy my first bucket of oysters, and I sold that bucket and made enough money to buy 2 more.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Iit took a while but I finally saved enough to buy myself an oyster cart. Now every morning I make my way down to the canals. I pass the fish mongers and the bakers. I usually see Lhara, my first customer of the day on my way home. Then I turn left onto Moonsinger Lane--

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Left onto Ragman Lane, where I do most of my trade.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Lana is very impressive. Very industrious. She will make a fine servant for the Many Faced God.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How will she serve him?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: She will no longer turn left onto Ragman Lane. She will turn right and go to Ragman Harbor.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What will she do there?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: She will see.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: See what?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: How can a man tell a girl this. If he knew what she would see, there would be no reason to send her.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Oysters, clams and cockles!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Oysters clams and cockles! Oysters clams and cockles!

Name: thin man
Subtitles: Your oysters fresh?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Best in the city.

Name: thin man
Subtitles: You wouldn't lie to an old man would you?

Name: thin man
Subtitles: Very nice. Give me 4. With vinegar.

Name: man
Subtitles: It's my 18th voyage. I've returned from all of them without a scratch on me.

Name: thin man
Subtitles: Can't do it.

Name: man
Subtitles: Please I have 3 children. Without me-- here take it you have to, I have 3 children, what will they do? Please you have to! Please! You don't understand?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: The man is a gambler. He wages that his sailor's ship will make it to its destination. It is a strange wager for the captain. He only wins if he loses his life.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So why would a captain make the wager in the first place?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A girl tells a man that she has seen.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: If the captain dies, the thin man pays his family a lot of money.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: But perhaps the gambler loses his bet and decides that he doesn't have to pay after all. A destitute woman and her small child, what can they do to such a man if he keeps their money for himself? To whom can they turn for recourse?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The Many Faced God. You said you didn't know what I would see at the docks.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A man had no idea what she would see and what she would not. A girl named Lana will return to the docks. She will watch the gambler. She will come to know as much about him as she knows about herself.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: And then what?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A gift for the Thin Man.

Name: waif
Subtitles: She is not ready.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Perhaps she is, perhaps she's not.

Name: waif
Subtitles: And if she's not?

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: It is all the same to the Many Faced God.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: The trial will take place. The High Sparrow will be presenting a substantial case against you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The charges?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Fornication, treason, incest, the murder of King Robert.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: All lies.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Of course, Your Grace. My concern is that The Faith does not adhere to the same standards of proof as the crown. And I hope you'll excuse me for saying it, but belief is so often the death of reason.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I wish you'd said it sooner. Any word from Jaime?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: I'm afraid not. Your Grace, Grand Maester Pycelle has summoned your Uncle Kevan back from Casterly Rock to serve as Hand of the King. He now presides over the small council.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Tell him I need to speak to him.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: I implored him to visit you but he would not.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What about my son, the king? If you can visit me then surely the king--

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Your arrest, and Queen Margaery's arrest, the king has not taken well. He remains in his chambers, his servants often find his food in the hall. Left untouched.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You need to talk to him, you need to talk to my son to come and see me, come and see his mother.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: I tried my grace, he wouldn't see me. He wouldn't see anyone.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I can't stay here.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: There is a way, Your Grace. A way out.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Confess? To the High Sparrow? I won't. I made him. I rose him up from nothing, I will not kneel before some barefooted commoner and beg his forgiveness.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Goodbye my queen. The work continues.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why. Why Theon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not Theon. There is no Theon. Reek.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Reek. Why did you tell him, Reek?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I was helping you. You were trying to escape, there is no escape. Not ever. Theon Greyjoy tried to escape. The master knew. He knows everything. He hunted him, he caught him, he strapped him to a cross, and cut away piece after piece until there was no Theon left.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Good. If it weren't for you I'd still have a family. If I could do to you what Ramsay did to you right here, right now, I would.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I deserved everything. I deserve to be Reek. I did terrible things. Turned on Robb. Captured Winterfell. Killed those boys.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: They weren't “those boys”, they were Bran and Rickon. They were your brothers, you'd know them since they were born.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: They weren't. They were only--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Only what?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I can't..

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Tell me!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I can't, not unless the master says...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Tell me, they weren't what?!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: They weren't...

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Tell me why Bran and Rickon should be dead while you still breathe the air. Tell me to my face Theon, tell me that they weren't your brothers!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: They weren't Bran and Rickon! I couldn't find them. It was two farm boys. I killed them and burned them so no one would know.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You didn't…?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Do you know where they went, Bran and Rickon?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I can't talk to you anymore.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Theon, you have to tell me, do you have any idea where Bran and Rickon--

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not Theon, Reek!

Name: bolton bannerman
Subtitles: Our scouts tells us he's got no more than 6000 men. More than half of them are mounted, however.

Name: roose
Subtitles: And how high can Stannis' horses jump? Our walls have been full repaired our walls have been reinforced. We have enough food for six months. We are more prepared for a siege than they could have ever been. All we have to do is wait for them to freeze, starve, and mutiny.

Name: roose
Subtitles: You disagree?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Stannis isn't from the North. You are, father. I think you're missing an opportunity to show the people of the North how House Bolton treats southern invaders.

Name: roose
Subtitles: And what do you recommend?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: That we not sit and wait to let Stannis to decide what type of fight this is going to be. That we hit first, and hit hard, and leave a feast for the crows.

Name: roose
Subtitles: A smart commander does not surrender a defensive advantage. As long as we stay behind these walls they can't touch us. Not to mention that the snow is so deep that we couldn't get an army through if we wanted to.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I don't need an army. I need 20 good men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So have you decided yet? Whether I'm worthy of your service?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Have you decided yet whether you're going to have me killed?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's probably my safest option.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I can see why you would think so. It's what your father would have done.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what would your father do?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My father? Who publicly sentenced me to death? I'd say his thoughts on having me killed were abundantly clear.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Is that why you killed him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Some day if you decide not to execute me, I'll tell you all about why I killed my father. And on that day, should it ever come, we'll need more wine than this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I know what my father was. What he did. I know the Mad King earned his name.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So here we sit, two terrible children of two terrible fathers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm terrible?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I've heard stories.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why did you travel to the other side of the world to meet someone terrible?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: To see if you were the right kind of terrible.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Which kind is that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The kind that prevents your people from being even more so.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I did reopen the fighting pits. Under my rule murder will once again become entertainment.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, that was wise. And you agreed to marry someone you loathed for the greater good. Very impressive. My own sister married someone she loathed as well, though not by choice and certainly not for the greater good, Gods forbid. She ended up having him killed.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Perhaps it won't come to that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's not impossible that Varys was right about you after all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Varys? King Robert's spy master?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes. He was the one who convinced me to come find you. He was my travelling companion before Ser Jorah seized that role for himself.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Jorah sent my secrets to Varys. For 20 years the spider oversaw the campaign to find and kill me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He did what he had to do to survive. He did a lot of other things that he didn't have to do. I suspect he's the main reason you weren't slaughtered in your crib.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But you trust him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, oddly. He might be the only person in the world that I trust. Besides my brother.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The brother who killed my father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: That's the one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Perhaps I will have you killed after all.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your queenly prerogative. I had given up on life until Varys convinced me you might be worth living for. You chop off my head? Well, my final days were interesting.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not going to kill you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No? Banish me?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So if I'm not going to be murdered, and I'm not going to be banished...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You're going to advise me. While you can still speak in complete sentences.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Advise you on what?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How to get what I want.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Iron Throne. Perhaps you should try wanting something else.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: If I want jokes I'll get myself a proper fool.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm not entirely joking. There's more to the world than Westeros after all. How many hundreds of thousands of lives have you changed for the better here? Perhaps this is where you belong. Where you can do the most good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I fought so that no child born into Slaver's Bay would ever know what it was like to be bought or sold. I will continue that fight here and beyond. But this is not my home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And when you get back to your home, who supports you?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The common people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Let's be generous and assume that's going to happen. Here in Slaver's Bay you had the support of the common people and only the common people. What was that like, ruling without the rich? House Targaryen is gone, not a single person who shares your blood is alive to support you. The Starks are gone as well, our two terrible fathers saw to that. The remaining Lannisters won't back you, not ever. Stannis Baratheon won't back you either, his entire claim to the Throne depends on the illegitimacy of yours. That leaves the Tyrells. Not impossible, but not enough.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell. They're all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that ones on top and on and on it spins, crushing the people on the ground.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's a beautiful dream. Stopping the wheel. You're not the first person to have dreamt it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not going to stop the wheel. I'm going to break the wheel.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You said whoever wins would fight at the Great Pit in front of the queen. I won.

Name: master
Subtitles: You struck me.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I've been flogged if it makes you happy. I'm the best you've got. If I win at the Great Pit how much can you sell me for?

Name: master
Subtitles: You're a free man, you could have gone anywhere, why did you come back?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Let me fight for her and I belong to you.

Name: septa
Subtitles: Thirsty? Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'll get out of here, you realize. Before long.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I can make you a wealthy woman. A lady of the court.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I can make sure you die in the most hideous way imaginable, and all I do is sit here imagining ways for you to die.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Does it hurt?

Name: sam
Subtitles: No.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Good.

Name: sam
Subtitles: How are you?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I'm not the one who got punched and kicked in the face.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You know what I mean.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I'm good.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Are you scared?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: A little.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Me too.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Who's there?

Name: olly
Subtitles: Olly.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: olly
Subtitles: I heard what happened.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Not to worry. Men brawl from time to time. It's only natural.

Name: olly
Subtitles: Figured you were hungry.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You're a good lad.

Name: olly
Subtitles: Wanted to ask you something. If you've got the time.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I need to check on baby Sam.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Now then. How can I help?

Name: olly
Subtitles: It's about the Lord Commander.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Yes?

Name: olly
Subtitles: He's going up to Hardhome to save all them wildlings. Wildlings killed my mom and dad. They killed everyone in my village.

Name: sam
Subtitles: We've been fighting them for years.

Name: olly
Subtitles: This wasn't a fight. We were farmers and they slaughtered us. So why's he saving them?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Wildlings are people, just like us. There are good ones and bad ones.

Name: olly
Subtitles: The one he's travelling with, the one with the red beard, he led the raid on my village.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Olly...

Name: olly
Subtitles: How can he trust him?

Name: sam
Subtitles: I've seen the army of the dead. I've seen the white walkers, and they're coming for us, for all the living. And when it's time we'll need every last man we can find.

Name: olly
Subtitles: But what if we let the wildings through the gates and they cut our throats while we sleep?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Jon's taking a risk, but he has to. We don't stand a chance otherwise. Sometimes a man has to make hard choices, choices that might look wrong to others but you know are right in the long run.

Name: olly
Subtitles: You believe that?

Name: sam
Subtitles: With all my heart.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Try not to worry Olly. I've been worrying about Jon for years. He always comes back.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You trust me Jon Snow?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Does that make me a fool?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We are fools together now.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Lord of Bones. Been a long time.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: Last time I saw you the little crow was your prisoner. The other way around now. What happened?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: War.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: You call that a war? The greatest army the North has ever seen cut to pieces by a southern king.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We should gather the elders find somewhere quiet to talk.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: You don't give the orders here.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I'm not giving an order.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: Why aren't you in chains?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's not my prisoner.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: What is he?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're allies.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: You fucking traitor! You fight for the crows now.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I don't fight for the crows.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're not here to fight. We're here to talk.

Name: lord of bones
Subtitles: Is that right? You and the pretty crow do a lot of talking, Tormund. And when you're done talking, do you get down on your knees and suck his cock--

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Gather the elders and let's talk.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My name's Jon Snow. I'm Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. We're not friends. We've never been friends. We won't become friends today. This isn't about friendship. This is about survival. This is about putting a 700 foot wall between you and what's out there.
ners: [{'jon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: karsi
Subtitles: You built that wall to keep us out.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Since when do the crows give 2 shits if we live?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: In normal times we wouldn't. But these aren't normal times. The white walkers don't care if a man's Free Folk or Crow. We're all the same to them. Meat to their army. But together we can beat them.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: Beat the white walkers? Good luck with that. Run from them, maybe.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not a trick. It's a gift for those who join us.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Dragonglass. A man of the Night's Watch used one of these daggers to kill a walker.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: You saw this?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. But I trust the man.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: There are old stories about Dragonglass.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: There are old stories about ice spiders big as hounds.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: And with the things we've seen you don't believe them?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Come with me and I'll share these weapons.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: Come with you where?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There are good lands south of the wall. The Night's Watch will allow you through the tunnel and allow your people to farm those lands.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I knew Mance Rayder. He never wanted a war with the Night's Watch, he wanted a new life for his people. For you. We're prepared to give you that new life.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: If…?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If you swear you join us when the real war begins.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Where is Mance?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He died.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: How?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I put an arrow through his heart.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: I say we send the Lord Commander back to Castle Black with no eyes.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: None of you saw Mance die! I did. The Southern King who broke our army, Stannis, wanted to burn him alive to send him a message. Jon Snow defied that cunt's orders. His arrow was mercy. What it did took courage, and that's what we need today

Name: karsi
Subtitles: I lost my father, my uncle, and 2 brothers fighting the damn crows.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm not asking you to forget your dead. I'll never forget mine. I lost 50 brothers the night that Mance attacked the wall. But I'm asking you to think about your children now. They'll never have children of their own if we don't band together. The Long Night is coming and the dead come with it. No clan can stop them. The free folk can't stop them. The Night's Watch can't stop them. And all the southern kings can't stop them. Only together, all of us, and even then it might not be enough, but at least then we'll give the fuckers a fight.
ners: [set(), set(), {'mance'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: karsi
Subtitles: You vouch for this man, Tormund?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: He's prettier than both my daughters, but he knows how to fight. He's young, but he knows how to lead. He didn't have to come to Hardhome. He came because he needs us. And we need him.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: My ancestors would spit on me if I broke bread with a crow.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: So would mine, but fuck 'em, they're dead.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: This is the way.

Name: wildling elder
Subtitles: I'm with Tormund. We stay here we're dead men. At least with King Crow there's a chance.

Name: giant
Subtitles: Tormund.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Keep that new life you want to give us. Keep your glass, King Crow. Soon as you get on his ships they're gonna slit your throats and dump your bodies to the bottom of the Shivering Sea. That's our enemy. That has always been our enemy.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: I fucking hate Thenns.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How many are with us? 5000?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I'm not good at counting.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're leaving too many behind.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: The free folk are stubborn. You know how long it took Mance to band them together. 20 fucking years.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And he knew them better than I ever will.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: They're running out of food and there's nothing to hunt. They'll come around.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: Johnna is gonna look after you. She's in charge, you listen to her.

Name: daughter
Subtitles: I wanna go with you.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: I need to get the old folks on the boats. I'm right behind you, I promise. Go on.

Name: wun wun
Subtitles: Lokh kif rukh?

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Shut the gate.

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Shut the gate!!

Name: shouting
Subtitles: Wait! Open the gate! Let us in! Help us! Please open it!

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Ready your arrows!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Get in line! Get in line!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Hold the line! Hold the line!

Name: nights watch brother
Subtitles: Lord Commander!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Get them to the ship and come back for me!

Name: brother
Subtitles: But you'll never make it--

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Now!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You should be on one of those boats.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: So should you ! My little girl has gone on. They're gonna let them pass the wall even if you're not there ?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You have my word. I've given orders.

Name: karsi
Subtitles: Don't think you're gonna be there to enforce those orders !

Name: tormund
Subtitles: If they get through, everyone dies !

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Night's Watch with me! Move! Move! Move!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Dragonglass!

Name: loboda
Subtitles: You're with me, lad! Now!

Name: loboda
Subtitles: Get the glass.

Name: edd
Subtitles: Fuck the glass! We're gonna die here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Go! Go! Go!

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Wun Wun, to the sea.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Let's go now! Now!

Name: end
Subtitles: EPISODE

Name: davos
Subtitles: A band of 20 men, maybe less. They were in and out before anyone spotted them, burnt our food stores to the ground, all our siege weapons were destroyed, dozens of tents were--

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Horses?

Name: davos
Subtitles: We're still getting a count, but hundreds are dead.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: 20 men rode into our camp without a single guard sounding the alarm?

Name: davos
Subtitles: The northerners know more about their land than we ever will.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Put last night's guards in chains, either they fell asleep or they were conspiring with the enemy. Find out the truth and then hang them.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Unless there's a thaw, we can't press forward to Winterfell, and we don't have enough food to get us back to Castle Black.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: We're not returning to Castle Black.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Forgive me, Your Grace, I never claimed to be an expert in military matters. But if we can't march forward, and we won't march back…

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Have the dead horses butchered for meat.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: Open the gates.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It was a failure.

Name: sam
Subtitles: It wasn't.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I went to save them, I failed.

Name: sam
Subtitles: You didn't fail him, or him, or her. Every one of them is alive because of you, and no one else.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't think that fact's lost on them.

Name: alliser
Subtitles: You have a good heart, Jon Snow. It will get us all killed.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You sent for me, Your Grace.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Find you some healthy horses and a few good men to guard you, I'm sending you back to Castle Black. Tell the Lord Commander to send food, supplies, fresh horses, in return when I take the throne I'll make sure the Night's Watch has all the men it requires. He can guard all 19 castles if he so wishes.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, you've named me your Hand.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: davos
Subtitles: The King's Hand should never abandon the King, especially in a time of war.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: You're not abandoning me, you're obeying a command.

Name: davos
Subtitles: A boy with a scroll could deliver this message.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: And if Jon Snow refuses a boy with a scroll, what does the boy say? I didn't name you hand for your expertise in military matters, ride for Castle Black, don't come back empty handed.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace, perhaps Queen and Princess Shireen could accompany me.

Name: stannis baratheon
Subtitles: My family stays with me.

Name: davos
Subtitles: At least let me take Shireen. A siege is no place for a little girl.

Name: davos
Subtitles: What's this one now?

Name: shireen
Subtitles: The Dance of Dragons

Name: davos
Subtitles: Well that sounds like a proper story.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: Ser Byron Swann wanted to kill the dragon Vhagar. He polished his shield for a week, til the steel was like a mirror. Then he crouched behind it, and crept forward, hoping the dragon would only see his own reflection.

Name: davos
Subtitles: But the dragon only saw a dumb man, holding a mirrored shield.

Name: shireen
Subtitles: And burnt him to a crisp.

Name: davos

Subtitles: Yes, yes, she does enjoy reading at people You're close But it wasn't a graveyard It was a feast I bought old fine wine and young pretty girls and invited my friends to come share it all We passed around the wine, passed around the women, and soon we fell into a stupor I woke before dawn I could barely stand Everyone else was asleep on the couches or on the floor, lying in heaps next to their fine clothes The truth of their bodies laid bare I could smell them beneath the incense and the perfume and the fine food that had already started to turn And I saw it with perfect clarity I saw what my sins were The gold I had, the wine I drank, the women I used, my ceaseless struggle to maintain my position It was all part of a story A story I was telling myself about who I was A collection of lies that would disappear in the light The people I was trying to climb away from, the beggars in the street, the poor, they were closer to the truth than I ever was
