Subtitles: Did you tell them how far north?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Well, it wasn't a very large piece of parchment.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You didn't tell them where I'm really from? You didn't tell them I'm a wildling?

Name: sam
Subtitles: The thing is...my father doesn't like wildlings. He hoped I'd make a man of myself by “killing some bloody wildlings,” so it's probably a good subject to avoid if at all possible.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I think we're here.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: Sam. Oh, Sam.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, hello, Mother.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: I never thought I'd see you again. You look wonderful.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Talla? Gods, you're a woman now.

Name: talla
Subtitles: Father says I have to marry Symun Fossoway. He has yellow teeth- -

Name: melessa
Subtitles: That's enough, Talla.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, um, Mother, this is Gilly.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: Oh, my. You are lovely.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I am happy to know you, Lady Tarly.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, and this, this is our son Samwell.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: Hello, little one. It's me, your grandmother.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: May I hold him?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Yes, of course.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: You have a curious mind, I can tell. You'll be a scholar like your father.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Where is Father? And Dickon?

Name: melessa
Subtitles: They're on a hunt. They'll join us for dinner. Come inside. Such a journey. You must be exhausted.

Name: talla
Subtitles: Come, you'll be wanting a bath after all that travel. Oh, and a dress for dinner. You can wear one of mine. What's your color? Midnight blue or silver? Silver, maybe. Come. You can choose one of my bedrooms if you want.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Is there no other way?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You're afraid for her?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Of course I'm afraid for her! It just seems very dangerous.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: She'll be protected the entire way. The Faith Militant are very stern with those who overstep their bounds. And Queen Margaery isn't your mother. I suspect the gods will predispose the common people to gentleness on her behalf. She's truly opened her heart to them.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: She's always been very devoted to the poor and the unfortunate.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: And now she's devoted to the gods as well. Would you like to see her?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Have they hurt you? Have they mistreated you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No, Your Grace.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I've missed you. More than you could know.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: We'll be together again soon and everything will be better than it was before.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Better how? Soon the- - walk of atonement. He says there's no other way.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Have you spoken to him at all, the High Sparrow?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Yes, a few times. Have you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Yes, I have. He's not quite what we thought he was, is he?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You think I'm mad. I sound mad.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: No. No, you don't. You- - you could never. You're right, he's not. He's a lot more- -

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He is. There's something about him. His way of looking at the world. It's not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It's taken me a while. He's helped me.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: What are you talking about? You're a good person. You've always been a good person. You're the best person I know.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I was just telling him about your devotion to the poor.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I don't understand.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It's all right. It really is. It's such a relief to let go of those lies.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: What about Loras?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don't erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: gilly
Subtitles: It's hard to walk in this.

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's beautiful. You're beautiful.

Name: sam
Subtitles: This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Well, no. We haven't been able to cure that one yet. This is last week's.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Brought it down from 70 yards. One shot.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, that's a fair distance.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: So do you do much hunting up at the wall?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Mm-hmmm. Mostly deer or is it elk as well?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say “we,” it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's- - she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: I imagine it's common where you're from. We once met a man, Lord Umber from Last Hearth, wasn't it, Randyll, who said he taught all his daughters how to hunt.

Name: talla
Subtitles: Your father taught you to hunt? Our father would never teach us. I think our father could learn a thing or two from your father.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: That's enough of that.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: Samwell, would you care for more bread?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Not fat enough already?

Name: sam
Subtitles: I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to- -

Name: randyll
Subtitles: I read your letter. You're to be a maester.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: I thought the Night's Watch might make a man of you. Something resembling a man at least. You managed to stay soft and fat.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Your nose buried in books. Spending your life reading about the achievements of better men. I'll wager you still can't sit a horse or wield a sword.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: Randyll, to be maester of the Night's Watch is a great honor.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: He can wield a sword. He killed a Thenn. He killed a White Walker.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: There's no such thing.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I saw it with my own eyes on our way down to Castle Black. He drove a dagger into the walker's heart. He risked his own life to save mine more than once. He's a greater warrior than either of you will ever be.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Your way down to Castle Black? Where did he kill a white walker? Where are you from? How'd you come to meet my son?

Name: gilly
Subtitles: The Night's Watch came to our keep.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Where?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Gilly.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: North of the Wall.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: North of the Wall? You're a Wildling. The Seven Kingdoms have waged war against these savages for centuries and here I sit hosting one in my hall thanks to my son. See that sword?

Name: randyll
Subtitles: It's called Heartsbane. It's been in our family for 500 years. It's Valyrian steel. Only a handful of them left in the world. It's supposed to go to my firstborn son after I die. To him. He will never wield that sword. If he were to become Lord Tarly of Horn Hill, it would be the end of this house. I took you for a Mole's Town whore when I saw you and I made my peace with that. Who else would have him? But I overestimated him. No. It was a wildling whore that seduced my son. This you getting back at me, boy? Hmm? Bring that to my table and making me dine with it. And you got what you were after, didn't you? A bastard. A half-breed bastard. Your invitation into our home.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'tarly'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: melessa
Subtitles: Come, my dear. Talla.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: I've lost my appetite.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: He dishonors us.

Name: melessa
Subtitles: You dishonor yourself.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Your mother's a fine woman. You're not worthy of her. To please her, I'll take the wildling in. She can work in the kitchens. The bastard will be raised here. But this will be the last night you ever spend at Horn Hill.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I'm not angry at you. I'm angry that horrible people can treat good people that way and get away with it. When do you have to go?

Name: sam
Subtitles: First light.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Say good-bye to him for me.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You're not what he thinks you are, Sam. He doesn't know what you are.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Good-bye, Gilly.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sam?

Name: sam
Subtitles: We're leaving.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Get your things.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: I don't have any things.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: sam
Subtitles: We belong together. All of us.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What about your mother and sister?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, they'll understand.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Your sister's dress.

Name: sam
Subtitles: She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sam. That's your father's sword.

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's my family's sword.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Sam. Won't he come for it?

Name: sam
Subtitles: He can bloody well try.

Name: clarenzo
Subtitles: The lion and the rose are one. I thank the gods above.

Name: clarenzo
Subtitles: And to you, my beauteous bridge, I pledge undying love.

Name: all
Subtitles: Hail King Joffrey. Hail Queen Margaery.

Name: clarenzo
Subtitles: I'll drink a toast to my new queen, for there is no one fairer. Dear Uncle, will you share my joy and be my royal cupbearer?

Name: bobono
Subtitles: Drink long and deep, my noble king, from this cup of sweet wine.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: The last drink he shall ever take. And vengeance shall be mine.

Name: clarenzo
Subtitles: Poison! Murder! I gasp. I- - I die.

Name: clarenzo
Subtitles: I limp. And it was he…

Name: clarenzo
Subtitles: that poisoned me. My evil Uncle Imp.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: My firstborn son. My golden lion foully, falsely slain. I pray you found a lasting peace free from strife and pain.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: Hear my prayer, O cruel gods. Take my life instead. For I cannot face another day when my sweet boy is dead. Oh, woe. Oh grief.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: Oh, darkest day, my heart is full of sorrow. All hope is lost. All joy is gone. And there is no tomorrow.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: What is that I hear and smell? Someone I'll soon send to hell.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: It's time to see if truth they told who said Tywin Lannister shits gold.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: You beast. You beast. You killed my wife and now you've taken your father's life.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: No worse child ever stained this land.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: Curse the day I named you.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: My greatest crime. Now I must flee.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: Then sail across the Narrow Sea to do unto you more treachery.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: Don't fear the winter.

Name: bobono
Subtitles: Fear me!

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Bianca, Clarenzo.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: I give you Bobono.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: I give you Camello.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: And last but not least, sweet Lady Crane.

Name: camello
Subtitles: Give this a good beating. Shake those fleas out. That's a dear.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: That crowd was shit.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: Girl.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: What are you doing back here?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nothing.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: I saw you the other day in the audience. How many times have you seen this stupid play?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Three times.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: Did you pay?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: I remember when the players came to my village. I didn't have any money, so I snuck in. Just like you. Saw the painted faces, the costumes, listened to the songs, cried when the young lovers died in each other's arms. I ran off and joined them the next day, never looked back.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're very good.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: My final speech is shit.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: But to be fair to myself, which I always like to be, the writing's no good.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: How would you change it?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: What's your name?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Mercy.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: You have very expressive eyes, Mercy.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: Wonderful eyebrows. Do you like pretending to be other people?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I have to go. My father's waiting for me.

Name: bianca
Subtitles: Lady Crane, they loved you.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: They were sweet. Or drunk. Drunkenly sweet.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: No laugh for Nedo s death. These people are worse than animals.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: But they loved her. They all love her.

Name: camello
Subtitles: Yes, you are adored by people and animals alike.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: I do what I can with what I'm given.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: With what you're given?

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: Well, I was thinking- -

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: Oh, we're all thinkers now, are we?

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: Full to the tits with ideas.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: I didn't mean- -

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: You have ideas, I have ideas, he has ideas. Why should my ideas have any more value than yours simply because I've been doing this my whole life? Who is anyone to judge my work? This is my profession. I know what I'm doing.

Name: izembaro
Subtitles: You have no right to an opinion.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Careful of that one. She wants you dead.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: And?

Name: waif
Subtitles: As I expected.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: A shame. A girl had many gifts.

Name: waif
Subtitles: You promised me.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Don't let her suffer.

Name: mace
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: My lord.

Name: mace
Subtitles: My friends, the hour has come. Madness has overtaken this city and grasped in its claws my children. But now we must drive it back under the rocks whence it came. Madness has had its day!

Name: captain
Subtitles: Forward, march!

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Rich or poor, noble or common, if we win, we must atone. Margaery of House Tyrell came to us a sinner. She stood before the gods in the holy sept and lied. She turned a blind eye to her brother's sins. She disgraces her house, the king, and herself.

Name: captain
Subtitles: Company, halt! Face front! Turn!

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Lord Tyrell.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Sorry to interrupt. We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we'll be on our way.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: I don't have the authority to give them to you. And you don't have the authority to take them.

Name: captain
Subtitles: Lock spears!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: The gods don't recognize his authority in this matter.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You already insulted one great house. It won't happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: To die in the service of the gods would please each and every one of us. We yearn for it. But there is no call for it today. There will be no walk of atonement.

Name: captain
Subtitles: Order up!

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Queen Margaery has already atoned for her sins by bringing another into the true light of the Seven.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Together we announce a new age of harmony. A holy alliance between the Crown and the Faith.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Long live King Tommen and bless you, Queen Margaery!

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: The crown and the faith are the twin pillars upon which the world rests. Together we will restore the Seven Kingdoms to glory.

Name: mace
Subtitles: What's happening?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: He's beaten us. That's what's happening.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: When you attack the Faith, you attack the Crown. Anyone who attacks the Crown is unfit to serve as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I have to answer to the gods.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Not when you're sitting in that chair.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: The Crown's decision on this matter is final.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: You have served your house and your king faithfully for many years. And you will continue to do so. But not in this city.

Name: walder
Subtitles: You've lost it?

Name: black walder
Subtitles: Yes, father.

Name: walder
Subtitles: It's a castle, not a bloody sheep. Presumably you still know where it is. You didn't lose Riverrun. You let the Blackfish take it from you.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: He surprised us. He knows the castle better than anyone.

Name: walder
Subtitles: You did lose the Blackfish after the Red Wedding. You had him right here in this hall and you let him leave. Then when I told you to hunt him down and kill him, you couldn't find him. That's what it means to lose something. Now he's come back and taken Riverrun.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: I don't think it's fair to blame us- -

Name: walder
Subtitles: For 300 years we kissed Tully boots, swore oaths to them and their stinking fish banners. Not again. Riverrun is ours. Take it back.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: We don't have the men.

Name: walder
Subtitles: We've got 10 times as many men as the damn Blackfish.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: The Mallisters have risen against us. And the Blackwoods.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: The Brotherhood Without Banners is rallying the commoners against us, raiding our supply trains and camps.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: Riverrun can withstand a siege for a year.

Name: walder
Subtitles: If I want excuses, I'll put her in charge. They're laughing at us. All across the Riverlands right down to King's Landing, they're laughing at us.

Name: walder
Subtitles: I hear it in my sleep! I'm not dead yet, unfortunately for you. And I'll not leave this world until they all choke on that laughter. Take that castle back.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: He'll never yield, Father.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Oh, he'll yield.

Name: walder
Subtitles: You'll show him the knife you used to kill Robb Stark's child in his whore mother's belly, and you'll show him the knife you used to open his niece's throat. And you'll remind him who it was that got married at the Red Wedding in the first place. His nephew.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Cheer up, Lord Edmure. You're going home.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: BEtter you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not going to the Riverlands.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What, then?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone's ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows. I'll take them to the sept and I'll remove the High Sparrow's head and every other sparrow head I can find.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You can't.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He has our son! He stole our son! He's torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You'll stand trial soon. I need to he here for you.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They've made us both stronger, all of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we're going to do to them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We've always been together. We'll always be together. We're the only two people in the world.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Why did you help us?

Name: rider
Subtitles: The Three-Eyed Raven sent for me.

Name: meera
Subtitles: The Three-Eyed Raven's dead.

Name: rider
Subtitles: Now he lives again.

Name: rider
Subtitles: When I last saw you, you were a boy. A fearless boy. Loved to climb the castle walls, frighten his mother.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: I led a ranging party deep into the North to find White Walkers. They found us. A white walker stabbed me in the gut with a sword of ice. Left me there to die. To turn. The Children found me. Stopped the walker's magic from taking hold.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: How?

Name: benjen
Subtitles: The same way they made the Walkers in the first place. You saw it yourself.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: You are the Three-Eyed Raven now.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: You must learn to control it before the Night King comes.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: Drink.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: One way or another, he will find his way to the world of men. When he does, you will be there waiting for him. And you will be ready.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Everything all right?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many days' ride to Meereen?

Name: daario
Subtitles: A week at best.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Dothraki and all their horses, the Unsullied, the Second Sons- - 1,000 ships easily. Probably more.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And who has that many?

Name: daario
Subtitles: Nobody.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Nobody yet.

Name: daario
Subtitles: So we ride for Meereen and after that we sail for Westeros. What then?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I take what is mine.

Name: daario
Subtitles: You weren't made to sit on a chair in a palance.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What was I made for?

Name: daario
Subtitles: You're a conqueror, Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Wait here.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I'm going after her. Wait for me here.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Every khal who ever lived chose three blood riders to fight beside him and guard his way. But I am not a khal. I will not choose three blood riders. I choose you all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will ask more of you than any khal has ever asked of his khalassar! Will you ride the wooden horses across the black salt sea?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Will you kill my enemies in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Will you give me the Seven Kingdoms, the gift Khal Drogo promised me before the Mother of Mountains?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Are you with me?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Now and always?

Name: man
Subtitles: That's it. Get it to the top.

Name: man
Subtitles: Steady. Steady.

Name: ray
Subtitles: Up she goes.

Name: ray
Subtitles: Hey, come on. Put your back into it, huh?

Name: ray
Subtitles: Here you are, son.

Name: ray
Subtitles: Oh, gentlemen, please.

Name: ray
Subtitles: And you lot, come on. Come on, get it moving. Come on, come on.

Name: ray
Subtitles: In all my days I've never seen a man swing an ax like that. How many men did it take to cut you down?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Just one.

Name: ray
Subtitles: Ooh. he must have been some kind of monster.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: He was a woman.

Name: ray
Subtitles: I think some of the men are a bit afraid of you.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I'm used to it.

Name: ray
Subtitles: When I found you, I thought you'd been dead for days. The way you were stinking already and you had bugs all over you and bone was coming through right there.

Name: ray
Subtitles: I was gonna give you a proper burial and then you coughed. Oh, nearly shit myself. I reckoned you were gonna die by the time I loaded you on the wagon, but you didn't. Now, I reckoned you'd die a dozen more times over the next few days, but you didn't. What kept you going?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Hate.

Name: ray
Subtitles: No, there's a reason you're still here.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Aye, there's a reason. I'm a big fucker and I'm tough to kill.

Name: ray
Subtitles: No, a reason. Gods aren't done with you yet.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I've heard that before. Man was talking about a different god, though.

Name: ray
Subtitles: Well, maybe he was right. I don't know much about the gods.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You're in the wrong line of work.

Name: ray
Subtitles: Oh, there's plenty of pious sons of bitches who think they know the word of god or gods. I don't. I don't even know their real names. Maybe it is the Seven. Or maybe it's the old gods. Or maybe it's the Lord of Light. Or maybe they're all the same fucking thing. I don't know. What matters, I believe, is that there's something greater than us. And whatever it is, it's got plans for Sandor Clegane.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You didn't know me back in my time. You don't know the things I've done.

Name: ray
Subtitles: I've heard stories.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: If the gods are real...why haven't they punished me?

Name: ray
Subtitles: They have.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Your Grace. What are we reading today?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Ah, “As water rounds the stones, smoothing- -”

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature. A wife salves her husbando s wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep.”

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You learn quickly. There are some who know every verse of the sacred text, but don't have a drop of the Mother's mercy in their blood and savages who can't read at all who understand the Father's wisdom.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: They are hard to love.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: The poor disgust us because they are us, shorn of our illusions. They show us what we'd look like without our fine clothes. How'd we smell without perfume.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Can I ask you about a personal matter?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: The king mentioned that since your reunion, you haven't joined him in the marriage bed.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: No.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You have a duty, Your Grace. To your husband, your king, your country, to the gods themselves.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: It's just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Congress does not require desire on the woman's part, only patience. The king must have an heir if we are to continue our good work.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Hard to find and harder still to walk upon. But you've made great progress. I only pray your grandmother follows your lead.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: My grandmother?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Yes. The Queen of Thorns is a remarkable woman, a strong woman, and an unrepentant sinner. You must teach her the new way as she taught you the old. Or I fear for her safety, body and soul.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Does it move or talk? I want to speak with you alone.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Oh, this is madness!

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You're not in your sanctuary now, my dear. All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Grandmother.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: until I tell them to stop. If I tell them to stop. You could use a good bashing.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Grandmother, please.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What have they done to you?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You marched against the High Sparrow, against the Faith.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: We marched for you.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn't. They showed mercy.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And what about your brother? What mercy did they show him?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Loras's only hope is to confess his crimes and repent. If he does, the Faith will allow him to return to Highgarden. He'll have to renounce his name and title...

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Have you lost your mind?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: and live his life as a penitent.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: He can begin again.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: As a mindless fanatic.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: As a free man.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You will leave for Highgarden today. There is no law that says you must stay here.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: I am the queen. It is my duty to serve my husband the king.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: But you should leave, Grandmother. Your place is at home.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I will never leave you. Never.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You must.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: The Mother watches over us all.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I'll see you soon, my dear.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Seven blessings to you, Grandmother.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Shall we pray?

Name: dim dalba
Subtitles: We said we'd fight with you, King Crow, when the time comes and we meant it, but this isn't what we agreed to. These aren't White Walkers. This isn't an army of the dead. This isn't our find.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: If it weren't for him, none of us would be here. All of you would be meat in the Night King's army. And I'd be a pile of charred bones just like Mance.

Name: dim dalba
Subtitles: Remember Mance's camp? It stretched all the way to the horizon. And look at us now. Look what's left of us. And if we lose this, we're gone. Dozens of tribes, hundreds of generations. Be like we were never there at all. We'll be the last of the free folk.
ners: [{'mance'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's what'll happen to you if we lose. The Boltons, the Karstarks, the Umbers, they know you're here. They know that more than half of you are women and children. After they finish with me, they'll come for you. You're right. This isn't your fight. You shouldn't have to come to Winterfell with me. I shouldn't be asking you. It's not the deal we made. I need you with me if we're gonna beat them, and we need to beat them if you're going to survive.
ners: [set(), {'umbers', 'boltons', 'karstarks'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tormund
Subtitles: The crows killed him because he spoke for the free folk when no other southerners would. He died for us. If we are not willing to do the same for him, we're cowards. And if that's what we are, we deserve to be the last of the free folk.

Name: wun wun
Subtitles: Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Are you sure they'll come?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We're not clever like you southerners. When we say we'll do something, we do it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I heard you were leaving King's Landing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: That is hardly your concern.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your grandson is still a prisoner. You'll leave him rotting in a cell?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Loras rots in a cell because of you. THe High Sparrow rules this city because of you. Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're right. I made a terrible mistake. I carry it with me every single day.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Good.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep. And now we must fight them together. We need each other.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met. At a certain age, it's hard to recall. But the truly vile do stand out through the years. Do you remember the way you smirked at me when my grandson and granddaughter were dragged off to their cells? I do. I'll never forget it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You love your granddaughter. I love my son. It's the only truth I know. We must defend them.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I'm leaving this wretched city as fast as I can before that shoeless zealot throws me into one of his cells. If you're half as bright as you think you are, you'll find your way out of here, too.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Never. I'll never leave my son.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What'll you do, then? You have no support. Not anymore. Your brother's gone. The High Sparrow saw to that. The rest of your family have abandoned you. The people despise you. You're surrounded by enemies, thousands of them. You're going to kill them all by yourself? You've lost, Cersei. It's the only joy I can find in all this misery.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'the'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'cersei'}, set()]

Name: man
Subtitles: Pick the pace up. Keep going.

Name: man
Subtitles: Keep it moving!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege. Someone needs to teach those sad twats how to dig trenches.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Someone certainly does.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh, no. Not me. I'm just an upjumped sellsword.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're an anointed knight. There's quite a difference.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Aye, knights don't get paid.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You have better instincts than any officer in the Lannister army.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: That's like saying I have a bigger cock than anyone in the Unsullied army.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long. You can be the right hand I lost.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You promised me a lordship and a castle and a highborn beauty for a wife.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And you'll get all three. A Lannister always- -

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Don't say it. Don't fucking say it.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Come out and fight us, Blackfish. Yield the castle or we'll hang him.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: This is your last warning. Yield the castle.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: You think I won't do it, old man?

Name: black walder
Subtitles: I sliced your niece's throat from ear to ear. And where were you? Running and hiding like a fucking coward. Yield the castle or I cut his throat.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Go on, then. Cut his throat.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Lothar, is it?

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Ser Jaime. We didn't know you were coming.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Cause you didn't set up a proper perimeter. You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Good thing we're friends or we'd be fucking you in the ass right now.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Have Lord Edmure bathed and fed.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: Whoa, whoa.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Walder.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: Edmure is a prisoner of House Frey.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Only a fool makes threats he's not prepared to carry out. Now let's say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking. What do you think I'd do?

Name: black walder
Subtitles: I don't give a rat's- -

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm here by the king's command to take back this castle. Have him bathed and fed. Unless you'd like to take his place.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Apologies, Ser Jaime.

Name: lothar
Subtitles: Do as he says.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The siege is now under my command. The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he'll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Have your lads start digging perimeter trenches. Set pickets every hundred yards. And work double-time on those siege towers and trebuchets.

Name: black walder
Subtitles: Those are our siege towers- -

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: As I said, the siege is under my command. If that's not to your liking, go home.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Get word to the Blackfish. I want a parley.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: A parley or a fight?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He's an old man.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You've got one hand. My money's on the old boy.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lady Mormont.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Welcome to Bear Island.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I remember when you were born, my lady. You were named for my Aunt Lyanna. It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I doubt it. My mother wasn't a great beauty or any other kind of beauty. She was a great warrior, though. She died fighting for your brother, Robb.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I served under your uncle at Castle Black, Lady Lyanna. He was also a great warrior and an honorable man. I was his steward. In fact- -

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I think we've had enough small talk. What are you here?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Stannis Baratheon garrisoned at Castle Black before he marched on Winterfell and was killed. He showed me the letter you wrote to him when he petitioned for men. It said- -

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I remember what it said. “Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark.”

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Robb is gone, but House Stark is not. And it needs your support now more than ever. I've come with my sister to ask for House Mormont's allegiance.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: As far as I understand, you're a Snow and Lady Sansa is a Bolton. Or is she a Lannister? I've heard conflicting reports.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I did what I had to do to survive, my lady. But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: If you say so. In any case, you don't just want my allegiance. You want my fighting men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ramsay Bolton cannot be allowed to keep Winterfell, my lady. It is our duty to stop him. Even more so because he holds our brother Rickon Stark as prisoner. What you have to understand, my lady, is that- -

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I understand that I'm responsible for Bear Island and all who live here. So why should I sacrifice one more Mormont life for someone else's war?

Name: davos
Subtitles: If it please, my lady, I understand how you feel.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I don't know you, Ser…?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Davos, my lady, of House Seaworth.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You needn't ask your maester about my house. It's rather new.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: All right, Ser Davos of House Seaworth. How is it you understand how I feel?

Name: davos
Subtitles: You never thought you'd find yourself in your position. Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age. I never thought I'd be in my position. I was a crabber's son, then I was a smuggler. And now I found myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war. But I'm here because this isn't someone else's war. It's our war.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Go on, Ser Davos.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward. He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life. Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn't between a few squabbling houses. It's between the living and the dead. And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Is this true?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men. I fought them at Hardhome. We both lost.

Name: davos
Subtitles: As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided. And a divided North won't stand a chance against the Night King. You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand. But there's no hiding from this. We have to fight and we need to do it together.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: House Mormont has kept faith with House Stark for 1,000 years. We will not break faith today.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Thank you, my lady. How many fighting men can we expect?

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: We are not a large house, but we're a proud one. And every man from Bear Island fights with the strength of 10 mainlanders.

Name: davos
Subtitles: If they're half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Kingslayer.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Blackfish.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: I assume you're here to fulfill the vow you gave my niece. I don't see Sansa and Arya.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't have them.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Pity. Do you wish to resume your captivity?

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Then why are you here?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You know why I'm here. This castle belongs to House Frey. You're trespassing. In the name of King Tommen, I order you to surrender or- -

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Or you'll kill Edmure?

Name: brynden
Subtitles: My nephew's marked for death no matter what. Hang him and be done with it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It won't stop with Edmure. You'll force me to storm the castle. Hundreds will die.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Hundreds of mine. Thousands of yours. If you can breach the walls.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We'll breach them and kill every last one of you. But if you surrender, I'll spare the lives of your men. On my honor.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Your honor? Bargaining with oathbreakers is like building on quicksand.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The war is over, ser. Why sacrifice living men to a lost cause?

Name: brynden
Subtitles: As long as I'm standing, the war is not over. This is my home. I was born in this castle and I'm ready to die in it. So you can either attack or try to starve us out. We have enough provisions for two years. Do you have two years, Kingslayer?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You clearly have no intention of saving your men's lives. Why did you come to treat with me?

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Sieges are dull. And I wanted to see you in person, get the measure of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Well, now you have.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Aye, now I have. I'm disappointed.

Name: robett
Subtitles: The answer is no.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out.

Name: robett
Subtitles: I've heard enough. We've only just taken back this castle from the Ironborn. The Boltons helped us do it. Now you want me to fight against them? I could be skinned for even talking to you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Boltons are traitors. Roose Bolton- -

Name: robett
Subtitles: Have other northern houses pledged to fight for you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: House Mormont.

Name: robett
Subtitles: And?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We sent raven to Houses Manderly- -

Name: robett
Subtitles: I don't care about ravens. You're asking me to join your army. Who is fighting in this army?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.

Name: robett
Subtitles: Then the rumors are true. I didn't dare believe them. I received you out of respect for your father. Now I would like you to leave. House Glover will not abandon its ancestral home to fight alongside wildlings.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Glover.

Name: robett
Subtitles: There's nothing else to say.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark. Sworn to answer when called upon.

Name: robett
Subtitles: Yes, my family served House Stark for centuries. We wept when we heard of your father's death. When my brother was lord of this castle, he answered Robb's call and hailed him King in the North.

Name: robett
Subtitles: And where was King Robb when the Ironborn attacked this castle? When they threw my wife and children in prison and brutalized and killed our subjects? Taking up with a foreign whore. Getting himself and those who followed him killed.

Name: robett
Subtitles: I served House Stark once, but House Stark is dead.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Why did we have to come here?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Some of us still like it. Have a drink at least.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't want one.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Don't go far, love.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I'll find you in a bit.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Nothing on the Iron Islands has an ass like that. Doesn't interest you anymore?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I won't joke about it. I'll never hurt you, little brother. Don't you know that?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Of course he is. As long as we're alive, we're a threat.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He'll find us.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: It's a great big world and we have fast ships. Drink.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't want any.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't care what you want. Drink.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Drink it all.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You're Ironborn, Theon. I know you've had some bad years.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Some bad years?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: But I'm tired of watching you cower like a beat dog. Drink the goddamn ale.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Now listen to me. I need you. The real Theon Greyjoy, not this rat shit pretender. Can you find him for me? Drink.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You escaped, do you hear me? You got away and you're never going back. We'll get justice for you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Fuck justice, then. We'll get revenge. Drink.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Listen to me. If you're so broken that there's no coming back, take a knife and cut your wrists. End it. But if you're staying, Theon, I need you. We're gonna sail to Meereen. We're gonna make a pact with this Dragon Queen. And we're gonna take back the Iron Islands.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Are you with me? Are you really with me?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Now, since it's my last night ashore for a long while, I'm gonna go fuck the tits off this one.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Stannis camped here on his way to Winterfell.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And that's a good thing?

Name: davos
Subtitles: He was the most experienced commander in Westeros. He chose this place for a reason. Those mountains are a natural fortification. There's a stream down there for the horses.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're not staying here long. Another storm could hit any day..

Name: davos
Subtitles: Aye, the snows defeated Stannis as much as the Boltons did.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We have to march on Winterfell now while we still can.

Name: davos
Subtitles: 2,000 Wildlings. 200 Hornwoods, 143 Mazins- -

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: 62 Mormonts.

Name: davos
Subtitles: It's not what we'd hoped for. But we still have a chance if we're careful and smart.

Name: davos
Subtitles: For fuck's sake.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So he's your most trusted advisor now? Because he secured 62 men from a ten year old?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ser Davos is the reason I'm standing here talking to you and he served Stannis for years.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Stannis who lost the Blackwater, who murdered his own brother, who doesn't have a head?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's not enough. We need more men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's no time.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If we went down to Castle Cerwyn, I know that Lord- -

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We fight with the army we have.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Friends, this is not worth fighting over!

Name: davos
Subtitles: This'll be it, now. Right now, we don't need to be fighting.

Name: man
Subtitles: Who the fuck are you?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Hold on.

Name: man
Subtitles: Yeah, who the fuck are you?

Name: ray
Subtitles: I was a soldier once. All my superiors thought I was brave. I wasn't. I mean, I never ran from a fight. Only because I was afraid my friends would see I was afraid. That's all I was, a coward. We followed orders no matter the orders. Burn that village. Fine, I'm your arsonist. Steal that farmer's crops. Good, I'm your thief. Kill those young lads so they won't take up arms against us. I'm your murderer. I remember once a woman screaming at us, calling us animals as we dragged her son from their hut. But we weren't animals. Animals are true to their nature and we had betrayed ours. I cut that young boy's throat myself as his mother screamed and my friends held her back.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: ray
Subtitles: That night...I felt such shame. Shame was so heavy on me, I couldn't eat, I couldn't sleep.

Name: ray
Subtitles: All I could do was stare into that dark sky and listen to that mother screaming her son's name. I'll hear her screaming the rest of my life.

Subtitles: Now, I know I can never bring that lad back. All I can do with time I've got left is bring a little goodness into the world. That's all any of us can do, isn't it? Never too late to stop robbing people, to stop killing people. Start helping people.

Name: ray

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Seven save you, friends.”

Subtitles: I'm a fucking septon. What was I supposed to say?

Subtitles: Aye, well, all are welcome here. Anyway, we got nothing for them.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I want a cabin. And we'll leave at dawn.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: See you at sunrise.

Name: woman
Subtitles: Sweet girl.

Name: lady crane
Subtitles: My son. My firstborn son. My child king, hush. Listen to the gods, for you they sing. Fight no more, sweet child. Your wars are won. The wolves are buried and the false stag done. Shut your blue eyes, my love. Let the crown fall. The Father above beckons you into his hall. In Seventh Heaven I'll see you once more. But now I seek vengeance on Sansa the whore and my brother the Imp who killed his own king. Born amongst lions, our curse from within. I will slay him, I swear. With noose or with knife, though it take me a fortnight, a moon, or my life.

Subtitles: Lords and ladies, the Faith and the Crown are the two pillars that hold up this world. One collapses, so does the other. The Father judges us all. If you break his laws...you will be punished. After conferring with His Holiness the High Septon, we have determined that Loras Tyrell and Cersei lannister's trial will be held in the Great Sept of Baelor on the first day of the Festival of the Mother.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: Furthermore, after much prayer and reflection, the Crown has decided that from this day forward, trial by combat will be forbidden throughout the Seven Kingdoms. The tradition is a brutish one, a scheme devised by corrupt rulers in order to avoid true judgment from the gods. Cersei Lannister and Loras Tyrell will stand trial before seven septons as it was in the earliest days of the Faith. Seven blessings to all.

Subtitles: Yes, yes. Fermentation. One day, after our queen has taken the Seven Kingdoms...I'd like to have my own vineyard. Make my own wine. The Imp's Delight. Only my close friends could drink it.

Subtitles: Right. Three lords walk into a tavern- - a Stark, a Martell, and a Lannister. They order ale...
