Subtitles: You understand. On some level you understand that you're an evil man.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll leave the judgments to the gods.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Well, that is convenient for you. You're a fine-looking fellow, aren't you?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Your square jaw, your golden armor. Tell me, I want to know. I truly do. How do you live with yourself? All of us have to believe that we're decent, don't we? You have to sleep at night. How do you tell yourself that you're decent after everything that you've done?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I was your sister's prisoner once. She hit me on the head with a rock if I remember correctly.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Yeah. She should have killed you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps, but she didn't. Catelyn Stark hated me just like you hate me. But I didn't hate her. I admired her. Far more than her husband or her son.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Do you think I care whom you admire and whom you don't?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, I don't, but I'm telling you anyway because you're my prisoner. You don't have a choice. The love she had for her children, I was a little awed by it. Reminded me of my sister.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Oh. Oh, I see. You're a madman.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not here to trade insults. Your sister was a strong- -

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Don't talk about Cat!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'll talk about whomever I want.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She loved her children. I suppose all mothers do, but Catelyn and Cersei, there's a fierceness you don't often see.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They'd do anything to protect their babies.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Start a war. Burn cities to ash. Free their worst enemies. The things we do for love.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: You didn't come here to talk about our sisters.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That's exactly why I came here. I love Cersei. You can laugh at that if you want. You can sneer. It doesn't matter. She needs me. And to get back to her, I have to take Riverrun. I'll send for your baby boy.
ners: [set(), {'cersei'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And I'll launch him into Riverrun with a catapult. Because you don't matter to me, Lord Edmure. Your son doesn't matter to me. The people in the castle don't matter to me. Only Cersei. And if I have to slaughter every Tully who ever lived to get back to her, that's what I'll do.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: Who goes there?

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Edmure Tully, son of Hoster Tully, and the rightful Lord of Riverrun. I demand entry.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Don't let him in.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: He's the Lord of Riverrun. I have to obey his commands.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: He's been their captive ever since they murdered his king at the Red Wedding. Why do you think the people who murdered his king at the Red Wedding would decide to let him come home? Because it's a trap, you idiot. Don't let him in.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: He's my lord, my lord. I've sworn to serve the Lord of Riverrun and obey his commands.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: You're not obeying Edmure's commands. You're obeying the fucking Kinglsayer's commands.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: I demand entry.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: My lord has given an order.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: WIth a knife to his throat. That is not a valid order.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: Lower the drawbridge and open the gate for Lord Ed- -

Name: brynden
Subtitles: I'll have your head before I surrender Riverrun.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: You are not lord of this castle, my lord.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: Lower the drawbridge!

Name: guard
Subtitles: Aye, ser!

Name: black walder
Subtitles: If you're wrong, we're just surrendered our most valuable prisoner.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: Welcome home, my lord.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Command all the forces within the castle to lay down their arms. Open the gates.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: My lord- -

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Your lord has given a command.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Find the Blackfish. Put him in irons and hand him over to the Freys.

Name: guard captain
Subtitles: Find him.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Come with us.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: I've run before from the Red Wedding. I'm not running again. This is my family home.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Your family is in the North. Come with us. Don't die for pride when you can fight for your blood.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: You'll serve Sansa far better than I ever could.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: Go on, now.

Name: brynden
Subtitles: I haven't had a proper sword fight in years. I expect I'll make a damn fool of myself.

Name: guard
Subtitles: We found the Blackfish, my lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Good. Bring him to me.

Name: guard
Subtitles: He died fighting, my lord.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I was wrong. I admit it.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: That changes nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Unsullied could mount a defense off the beachhead. If the slavers' forces- -

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: No more talking from you. Your talking gave us this.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And I have acknowledged that. I'm trying- -

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: You're trying to tell me what the army should do. You do not know what the army should do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All right, what should the army do?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: We'll not go to the beach. If we go to the beach, the Masters will take the pyramid. The pyramid is the only place in the city we can defend. We stay here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And then?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: We wait for them to come to us. Then we fight them.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Clegane.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: What the fuck you doing here?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Chasing them. You?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Hanging them.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Any particular reason?

Name: beric
Subtitles: They're our men. Or they were. They attacked a nearby sept and murdered the villagers. Why do you want them?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Same reason. I was helping build it. They killed a friend of mine.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You've got friends?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Not anymore. They're mine.

Name: beric
Subtitles: It's the Brotherhoodo s good name they've dragged through the dirt.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Fuck your name. They're mine. I killed you once before, Dondarrion. Happy to do it again.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Drop that arrow, you bloody girl.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Tougher girls than you have tried to kill me.

Name: beric
Subtitles: You can have one of them.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Two.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: No, no, no.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: We're not butchers. We hang them.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: hanging? All over in an instant. Where's the punishment in that?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: They die.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: We all bloody die.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Except this one here. I'll only gut one of them.

Name: beric
Subtitles: No.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I'll chop off one hand.

Name: beric
Subtitles: We gave you two of the three out of respect for your loss. That's generous.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Bunch of nancies.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: There was a time I would have killed all seven of you just to gut these three.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You're getting old, Clegane.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: He's not.

Name: lem
Subtitles: Please don't. I'll give you anything.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Got anything to eat?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Enjoying yourself?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I prefer chicken.

Name: beric
Subtitles: You ought to join us. We could use you.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I tried joining. Didn't work out for me.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Clegane, we're here for a reason. The Lord of Light is keeping Beric alive for a reason. He gave a failed, drunk priest the power to bring him back for a reason. We are part of something larger than ourselves.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Lots of horrible shit in this world gets done for something larger than ourselves.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Cold winds are rising in the North.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: And you're going to go stop them?

Name: beric
Subtitles: We need good men to help us.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Last time you saw me, you wanted to execute me.

Name: beric
Subtitles: True enough. But the Lord of Light gave you the power to defeat me. Why?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I beat you because I'm better than you, Beric. I was better than you before you started yammering on about the Lord and I'm better than you now.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Aye, you're probably right. You're a fighter. You were born a fighter. You walked away from the fight. How did that go? Good and bad, young and old, the things we're fighting will destroy them all alike. You can still help a lot more than you've harmed Clegane, it's not too late for you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Lady Crane?

Name: waif
Subtitles: If you'd have done your job, she would have died painlessly.

Name: waif
Subtitles: Instead…

Name: waif
Subtitles: The Many-Faced God was promised a name. He must always receive what is his. You can't change that. I can't change that. No one can. And now he's been promised another name.

Name: waif
Subtitles: It will all be over soon. On your knees or on your feet?

Name: waif
Subtitles: Haven't we been through this already? That won't help you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You told her to kill me.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Yes. But here you are. And there she is.

Name: jaqen hghar
Subtitles: Finally a girl is no one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: A girl is Arya Stark of Winterfell and I'm going home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Despite appearances, I think you'll find the city's on the rise.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps we should take shelter.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The city is on the rise?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Meereen is strong. Commerce has returned to the markets. The people are behind you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, not all the people, of course. No ruler that ever lived had the support of all the people. But the rebirth of Meereen is the cause of this violence. The Masters cannot let Meereen succeed. Because if Meereen succeeds, a city without slavery, a city without Masters…

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: it proves that no one needs a Master.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Good. Shall we begin?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Do we have a plan?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will crucify the Masters. I will set their fleets afire, kill every last one of their soldiers, and return their cities to the dirt. That is my plan.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You don't approve?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You once told me you knew what your father was. Did you know his plans for King's Landing when the Lannister armies were at his gates?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Probably not. Well, he told my brother and Jaime told me. He had caches of wildfire hidden under the Red Keep, the Guildhalls, the Sept of Baelor, all the major thoroughfares. He would have burned every one of his citizens. The loyal ones and the trators. Every man, woman, and child. That's why Jaime killed him.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: This is entirely different.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're talking about destroying cities. It's not entirely different. I'd like to suggest an alternate approach.

Name: razdal
Subtitles: Once before, I offered you peace. If you had not been so arrogant, you could have returned to your homeland with a fleet of ships. Instead, you will flee Slaver's Bay on foot like the beggar queen you are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We are here to discuss terms of surrender, not to trade insults.

Name: yezzan
Subtitles: The terms are simple. You and your foreign friends will abandon the Great Pyramid and the city of Meereen. The Unsullied you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The translator you stole from Kraznys mo Nakloz will remain to be sold again to the highest bidder. The dragons beneath the Great Pyramid will be slaughtered.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We obviously didn't communicate clearly. We're here to discuss your surrender, not mine.

Name: razdal
Subtitles: I imagine it's difficult adjust to the new reality. Your reign is over.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My reign has just begun.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dracarys.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: You men have a choice

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: fight and die for the masters who would never fight and die for you, or go home to your families.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Thank you for the armada. Our queen does love ships. Now, last time we spoke, we made a pact. You violated that pact. You declared war upon us. Though our queen does have a forgiving nature, this cannot be forgiven.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Our queen insists that one of you must die as punishment for your crimes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It always seems a bit abstract, doesn't it, other people dying?

Name: razdal
Subtitles: Him. He should die.

Name: belicho
Subtitles: Yes, him.

Name: razdal
Subtitles: He's not one of us. He's an outsider, a lowborn. He does not speak for us.

Name: yezzan
Subtitles: Please.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Tell your people what happened here. Tell them you live by the grace of Her Majesty. When they come forward with notions of retribution or ideas about returning the slave cities to their former glory, remind the what happened when Daenerys Stormborn and her dragons came to Meereen.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You don't have to be here.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes, I do.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: My beloved wife. I've missed you terribly.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Thank you for returning Lady Bolton safely. Now, dismount and kneel before me, surrender your army and proclaim me the true Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North. I will pardon you for deserting the Night's Watch. I will pardon these treasonous lords for betraying my house. Come, bastard, you don't have the men, you don't have the horses, and you don't have Winterfell. Why lead those pour souls into slaughter? There's no need for a battle. Get off your hose and kneel. I'm a man of mercy.
ners: [{'bolton'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're right. There's no need for a battle. Thousands of men don't need to die. Only one of us. Let's end this the old way. You against me.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I keep hearing stories about you, bastard. The way people in the North talk about you, you're the greatest swordsman who ever walked. Maybe you are that good. Maybe not. I don't know if I'd beat you. But I know that my army will beat yours. I have 6,000 men. You have, what, half that? Not even?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aye, you have the numbers. Will your men want to fight for you when they hear you wouldn't fight for them?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: He's good. Very good. Tell me, will you let your little brother die because you're too proud to surrender?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: How do we know you have him?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Now, if you want to save —

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're going to die tomorrow, Lord Bolton. Sleep well.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: She's a fine woman, your sister. I look forward to having her back in my bed. And you're all fine-looking men. My dogs are desperate to meet you. I haven't fed them for seven days. They're ravenous. I wonder which parts they'll try first. Your eyes? Your balls? We'll find out soon enough. In the morning, then, bastard.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If he was smart, he'd stay inside the walls of Winterfell and wait us out.

Name: davos
Subtitles: That's not his way. He knows the North is watching. If the other houses sense weakness on his part, they'll stop fearing him. He can't have that. Fear is his power.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's his weakness, too. His mean don't want to fight for him. They're forced to fight for him. If they feel the tide turning...

Name: tormund
Subtitles: It's not his men that worry me. It's his horses. I know what mounted knights can do to us.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You and Stannis cut through us like piss through snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're digging trenches all along our flanks. They won't be able to hit us the way that Stannis hit you, in a double envelopment.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: stares blankly at JON SNOW.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: A pincer move.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They won't be able to hit us from the sides.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Good.

Name: davos
Subtitles: It's crucial that we let them charge at us. They've got the numbers, we need the patience. If we let him buckle our center, he'll pursue. Then we'll have him surrounded on three sides.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Did you really think that cunt would fight you man to man?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. But I wanted to make him angry. I want him coming at us full tilt.

Name: davos
Subtitles: We should all get some sleep.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Rest, Jon Snow. We need you sharp tomorrow.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So you've met the enemy, drawn up your battle plans.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aye, for what they're worth.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You've known him for the space of a single conversation, you and your trusted advisors, and you sit around and make your plans on how to defeat a man you don't know. I lived with him. I know the way his mind works. I know how he likes to hurt people. Did it ever once occur to you that I might have some insight?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're right.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You think he's going to fall into your trap. He won't He's the one who lays traps.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's overconfident.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He plays with people. He's far better at it than you. He's been doing it all his life.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aye, and what have I been doing all my life? Playing with broomsticks? I fought beyond the Wall against worse than Ramsay Bolton. I've defended the Wall from worse than Ramsay Bolton.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You don't know him.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: All right, tell me. What should we do? How do we get Rickon back?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We'll never get him back. Rickon is Ned Starks trueborn son, which makes him a greater threat to Ramsay than you, a bastard, or me, a girl. As long as he lives, Ramsay's claim to Winterfell will be contested, which means he won't live long.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We can't give up on our brother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Listen to me, please. He wants you to make a mistake.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Of course he does. What should I do differently?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't know! I don't know anything about battles! Just don't do what he wants you to do.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aye, that's good advice.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You think that's obvious?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Well, it is a bit obvious.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If you had asked for my advice earlier, I would have told you not to attack Winterfell until we have a larger force, or is that obvious, too?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: When will we have a larger force?! We've pleaded with every house that'll have us! The Blackfish can't help us! We're lucky to have this many men!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's not enough!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Now, it's not enough! It's what we have! Battles have been won against greater odds.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If Ramsay wins, I'm not going back there alive. Do you understand me?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: SNOW I won't ever let him touch you again. I'll protect you, I promise.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No one can protect me. No one can protect anyone.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You think there's hope?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I've never seen these Bolton fuckers fight. And they've never seen the free folk fight, so, yes, there's hope. You want to avenge your king, don't you?

Name: davos
Subtitles: It wasn't the Boltons defeated Stannis. It was Stannis himself. I loved the man. He lifted me up and made me something. But he had demons in his skull whispering foul things.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You saw these demons?

Name: davos
Subtitles: What?

Name: davos
Subtitles: No, it's a manner of speaking. Not actual demons.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Oh. Well, you loved that cunt Stannis and I loved the man he burned. Mance didn't have demons in his skull. He didn't torch people or listen to some red witch. I believed in him. I thought he was the man to lead us through the Long Night. But I was wrong just like you.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Maybe that was our mistake, believing in kings.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Jon Snow's not a king.

Name: davos
Subtitles: No, he's not.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I need a good drink to help me sleep the night before a fight. You want some? I have a jug of sour goat's milk stronger than any of that grape water you southern twats like sucking on.

Name: davos
Subtitles: No, thanks. It does sound delicious, but I better keep a clear head. I can never sleep the night before a battle.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: So what do you do all night?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I walk. Think and walk. Think and walk until I'm far enough away from camp that no one can hear me shitting my guts out.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Happy shitting.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My lady. You weren't at the war council.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I'm not a soldier.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Any advice?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Don't lose.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If I do, if I fall, don't bring me back.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I'll have to try.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm ordering you not to bring me back.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I am not your servant, Jon Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're in my camp. I'm the commander.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I serve the Lord of Light. I do what he commands.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How do you know what he commands?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I interpret his signs as well as I can. If the Lord didn't want me to bring you back, how did I bring you back? I have no power. Only what he gives me and he gave me you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Why?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I don't know. Maybe you're only needed for this small part of his plan and nothing else. Maybe he brought you here to die again.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What kind of god would do something like that?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The one we've got.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Last time we saw each other was at Winterfell, yes? You were making jokes about my height, I seem to recall. Everyone who makes a joke about a dwarf's height thinks he's the only person ever to make a joke about a dwarf's height. “The height of nobility,” “a man of your stature,” “someone to look up to.” You're all making the same five or six jokes.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: It was a long time ago.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It was. And how have things been going for you since then? Not so well, I gather. Can't imagine you would have murdered the Stark boys if things had been going well.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I didn't murder the Stark boys. But I did things that were just as bad or worse.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: And he paid for them.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Doesn't seem like it. He's still alive. It was complicated for you, I'm sure, growing up at Winterfell. Never quite knowing who you were. But then, we all live complicated lives, don't we?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You've brought us 100 ships from the Iron Fleet with men to sail them. In return, I expect you want me to support your claim to the throne of the Iron Islands?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not my claim. Hers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what's wrong with you?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm not fit to rule.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We can agree upon that at least.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Has the Iron Islands ever had a queen before?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: No more than Westeros.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Our Uncle Euron returned home after a long absence. He murdered our father and took the Salt Throne from yara. He would have murdered us if we had stayed.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion tells me your father was a terrible king.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You and I have that in common.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We do. And both murdered by a usurper as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Will their ships be enough?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: With the former Masters' fleet, possibly. Barely. There are more than 100 ships in the Iron Fleet.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: There are and Euron is building more. He's going to offer them to you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So why shouldn't I wait for him?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: The Iron Fleet isn't all he's bringing. He also wants to give you --

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: His big cock, I think he said. Euron's offer is also an offer of marriage, you see. You won't get one without the other.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And I imagine your offer is free of any marriage demands?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I never demand, but I'm up for anything, really.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He murdered our father and would have murdered us. He'll murder you as soon as you have what he wants.

Subtitles: The Seven Kingdoms.

Subtitles: All of them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Reasonable.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What if everyone starts demanding their independence?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: She's not demanding, she's asking. The others are free to ask as well. Our father were evil men, all of us here. They left the world worse than they found it. We're not going to do that. We're going to leave the world better than we found it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You will support my claim as queen of the Seven Kingdoms and respect the integrity of the Seven Kingdoms. No more reaving, roving, raiding, or raping.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: That's our way of life.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No more.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: No more.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Do you like games, little man? Let's play a game. Run to your brother. The sooner you make it to him, the sooner you get to see him. That's it. That's the game. Easy. Ready? Go.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Subtitles: Don't.

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: Now.

Subtitles: Loose!

Subtitles: Show me!

Subtitles: Hey!

Subtitles: Fuck this, come on!

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: You suggested one on one combat, didn't you?

Name: ramsay bolton
Subtitles: I've reconsidered. I think that sounds like a wonderful idea.

Name: jon snow

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Jon.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Where is he?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You haven't fed them in seven days. You said it yourself.

Name: ramsay bolton

Subtitles: Sit. Down! Down! Down! Down! Down!

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Ser Loras Tyrell. Are you prepared to stand trial and profess your guilt or innocence before the Seven?

Name: loras
Subtitles: There'll be no need for a trial. I confess before the Seven and freely admit to my crimes.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: To which crimes will you be confessing?

Name: loras
Subtitles: All of them. I lay with other men including the traitor Renly Baratheon.

Name: loras
Subtitles: I perjured myself before the gods. I am guilty of depravity… dishonesty, profligacy, and arrogance. I see that now. I humble myself before the Seven and accept whatever punishment the gods deem just.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: The gods' judgment is fierce, but also fair. The Warrior punishes those who believe themselves beyond the reach of justice. But the Mother shows her mercy to those who kneel before her.

Name: loras
Subtitles: I take full responsibility for my many sins and unburden myself of my desires. My only remaining wish is to devote my life to the Seven. May I be a living example of their grace for others to witness.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You understand fully what this means?

Name: loras
Subtitles: I do. I will abandon the Tyrell name and all that goes with it. I will renounce my lordship and my claims on Highgarden. I will never marry and I will never father children.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Brother Loras…

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: I ask you to dedicate your life to the seven gods.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Will you fight to defend your faith against heretics and apostates?

Name: loras
Subtitles: I will.

Name: mace
Subtitles: No, I can't let them…

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Faith is the way, Father.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: All right. I'm ready.

Name: tommen lannister
Subtitles: I have to go, I'm-- I'm late for the trial.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: You mutilated him. You gave me your word.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: I've kept my word. Once the queen mother's trial is concluded, Brother Loras is free to leave.

Subtitles: And where is the queen mother?

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Her litter never left the Red Keep.

Name: sparrow

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: Go to the Red Keep and show her the way.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: Get the others.

Subtitles: Where's the king?

Name: qyburn

Name: pycelle
Subtitles: What's the meaning of this? I was told that-- I have more important things to do with my time than waste them in the presence--

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Please, Grand Maester. I bear you no ill will. Please forgive me if you can.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: This pains me, my lord. Whatever your faults, you do not deserve to die alone in such a cold, dark place. But sometimes before we can usher in the new, the old must be put to rest.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: The longer you wait, the worse it'll be for you.

Name: lancel
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: There's something wrong.

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: You have nothing to fear, Your Grace. The trial will begin shortly.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Cersei is not here. Tommen is not here. Why do you think they are not here?

Name: sparrow
Subtitles: If the accused is not here, she will be tried regardless. We cannot escape the justice of the gods--

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Forget about the bloody gods and listen to what I'm telling you. Cersei understands the consequences of her absence and she is absent anyway, which means she does not intend to suffer those consequences. The trial can wait. We all need to leave.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: We all need to leave now!

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Loras. Stay with me.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Let me through. Let me through. Get out of my way.

Name: margaery tyrell
Subtitles: Let us through!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Confess. Confess.

Name: septa unella
Subtitles: No.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Confess.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Confess. It felt good. Beating me, starving me, frightening me, humiliating me. You didn't do it because you cared about my atonement. You did it because it felt good. I understand. I do things because they feel good. I drink because it feels good. I killed my husband because it felt good to be rid of him. I fuck my brother because it feels good to feel him inside me. I lie about fucking my brother… because it feels good to keep our son safe from hateful hypocrites. I killed your High Sparrow… and all his little sparrows… all his septons, all his septas, all his filthy soldiers, because it felt good to watch them burn. It felt good to imagine their shock and their pain. No thought has ever given me greater joy. Even confessing feels good under the right circumstances.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You've always been quiet.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I said my face would be the last thing you saw before you died. Do you remember?

Name: septa unella
Subtitles: Good. I'm glad to see your face. I'm ready to meet the gods.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What? Now? Today? You're not going to die today. You're not going to die for quite a while. Ser Gregor.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: This is Ser Gregor Clegane. He's quiet, too.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your gods have forsaken you. This is your god now.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Shame.

Name: attendant
Subtitles: I'm very sorry, Your Grace. Very sorry.

Name: walder
Subtitles: For House Lannister!

Name: men
Subtitles: Hear me roar!

Name: walder
Subtitles: For House Frey!

Name: men
Subtitles: We stand together!

Name: walder
Subtitles: May we stand together through the centuries, good friends to the last.

Name: walder
Subtitles: And when we drive our swords through our enemies' hearts, may we speak the words of our alliance, “The Freys and the Lannisters send their regards.”

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You don't even have to do anything, do you?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You just sit there, a rich slab of beef, and all the birds come pecking.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're welcome to her.

Name: bronn

Subtitles: Those two have their eyes on you.

Name: bronn

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Not my type.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Not blonde enough?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ladies, have you met Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, hero of the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: There you go.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Maybe I'm not in the mood.

Name: bronn

Name: bronn

Name: walder
Subtitles: This came together rather well. Your father would be pleased.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure he would be.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Edmure is back in a cell. Can't go killing my son by law. It wouldn't be right. Give the family a bad name.

Name: walder
Subtitles: So the famous Blackfish killed by footsoldiers, eh? Legendary warrior, everyone said.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Have you done much fighting yourself, Lord Frey?

Name: walder
Subtitles: I'm a bit old for all that.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, but back in your day.

Name: walder
Subtitles: The purpose of fighting is defeating your enemies, isn't it?

Name: walder
Subtitles: I've defeated mine. Riverrun belonged to House Tully for a thousand years. Now it's mine. What do you call that? Victory.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Yes, you're a great conqueror.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Go on, mock me, boy. You think I mind? The Tullys mocked me for years. The Starks mocked me. Where are they now? You talk about war as if you're an expert but the one battle I remember you fighting, you were captured by Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. But it doesn't matter. Here we are now, two kingslayers. We know what it's like to have them grovel to our faces and snigger behind our backs. We don't mind, do we? Fear is a marvelous thing.
ners: [set(), set(), {'tullys'}, {'starks'}, set(), {'the', 'robb'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They don't fear the Freys, though. They fear the Lannisters. We gave you the Riverlands to hold the Riverlands. If we have to ride north and take them back for you every time you lose them, why do we need you?

Name: cersei lannister

Subtitles: Your Grace, there's no need--

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: What are your thoughts concerning the king's funeral? As the Sept of Baelor is no longer an option, perhaps a ceremony in the throne room?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He should be with his grandfather, his brother, his sister. Burn him and bury his ashes where the sept once stood.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Hello.

Name: sam
Subtitles: From Lord Commander Snow at Castle Black.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I'm-- I'm to be the new maester.

Name: maester
Subtitles: Oh.

Name: maester
Subtitles: According to our records, Jeor Mormont is Lord Commander.

Name: sam
Subtitles: He died.

Name: maester
Subtitles: We received no report from the maester at Castle Black.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Maester Aemon became quite ill shortly after the election. He's since passed away. Which is why I'm here.

Name: maester
Subtitles: This is irregular.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Yes, well, I suppose that life is irregular.

Name: maester
Subtitles: The archmaester will discuss these irregularities with you. In the meantime, you are permitted to use the library. Follow me.

Name: maester
Subtitles: No women or children!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: When we had feasts, our family would sit up here… and I'd sit down there.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Could have been worse, Jon Snow. You had a family. You had feasts.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Aye, you're right. I was luckier than most.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What is that?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Tell him. Tell him who it belonged to.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The Princess Shireen.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Tell him what you did to her. Tell him!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: We burned her at the stake.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Why?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The army was trapped. The horses were dying. It was the only way.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You burned a little girl alive!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I only do what my Lord commands!

Name: davos
Subtitles: If he commands you to burn children, your Lord is evil!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: We are standing here because of him. Jon Snow is alive because the Lord willed it.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I loved that girl like she was my own. She was good. She was kind. And you killed her!

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: So did her father. So did her mother. Her own blood knew it was the only way.

Name: davos
Subtitles: The only way for what? They all died anyway! You told everyone Stannis was the one. You had him believing it, all of them fooled. And you lied.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I didn't lie. I was wrong.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Aye, you were wrong. How many died because you were wrong?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I ask your leave to execute this woman for murder. She admits to the crime.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you have anything to say for yourself?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I've been ready to die for many years. If the Lord was done with me, so be it, but he's not. You've seen the Night King, Jon Snow. You know the great war is still to come. You know the army of the dead will be upon us soon. And you know I can help you win that war.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ride south today. If you return to the North, I'll have you hanged as a murderer.

Name: davos
Subtitles: If you ever come back this way, I will execute you myself.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm having the lordo s chamber prepared for you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Mother and Father's room? You should take it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm not a Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You are to me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're the Lady of Winterfell. You deserve it. We're standing here because of you. The battle was lost until the Knights of the Vale rode in. They came because of you. You told me Lord Baelish sold you to the Boltons.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He did.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And you trust him?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Only a fool would trust Littlefinger. I should have told you about him, about the Knights of the Vale. I'm sorry.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We need to trust each other. We can't fight a war amongst ourselves. We have so many enemies now.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Jon.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: A raven came from the Citadel. A white raven. Winter is here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Well, Father always promised, didn't he?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: The last time a Tyrell came to Dorne, he was assassinated. 100 red scorpions, was it?

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: You have nothing to fear from us, Lady Olenna.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You murder your own prince, but you expect me to trust you?

Name: obara
Subtitles: We invited you to Dorne because we needed your help. You came to Dorne because you needed our help?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What is your name again? Barbaro?

Name: obara
Subtitles: Obara.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Obara. You look like an angry little boy. Don't presume to tell me what I need.

Name: nymeria
Subtitles: Forgive my sister. What she lacks in diplomacy, she makes--

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Do shut up, dear.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Anything from you?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: No? Good. Let the grown women speak.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: The Lannisters have declared war on House Tyrell. They have declared war on Dorne. We must be allies now if we wish to survive.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Cersei stole the future from me. She killed my son. She killed my grandson. She killed my granddaughter. Survival is not what I'm after now.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: You're absolutely right. I chose the wrong words. It is not survival I offer. It is your heart's desire.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And what is my heart's desire?

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Vengeance. Justice.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Fire and blood.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Your ships are nearly ready. I saw them painting the sails.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I'm curious to see how the Dothraki do on the poison water.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You're not coming with us.

Name: daario
Subtitles: New strategy? You want the Second Sons to attack from the west coast? If we take Casterly Rock, the Lannisters will have nowhere to run when you hit King's Landing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You're not going to Westeros. You're staying here with the Second Sons. There's finally peace in Meereen. You will keep the peace while the people choose their own leaders.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Fuck Meereen. Fuck the people. I'm here for you, not them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You promised me. “My sword is yours. My life is yours.” This is what I command. If I'm going to rule in Westeros, I'll need to make alliances. The best way to make alliances is with marriage.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Who are you marrying this time?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't know. Maybe no one.

Name: daario
Subtitles: But you need to lure all the noble houses to the table? Are you a queen or fish bait?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I can't bring a lover to Westeros.

Name: daario
Subtitles: A king wouldn't think twice about it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So that's what you want? To be my mistress?

Name: daario
Subtitles: I'm not proud. I don't care what perfumed aristocrat sits beside you in the throne room. I don't want a crown. I want you.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I love you. And I make you happy. You know I do. Bring me with you. Let me fight for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I can't.

Name: daario
Subtitles: The dwarf told you to do this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No one tells me to do anything.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Clever fellow. Can't argue with his logic. I'm no use to you over there.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't get angry.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I'm not angry. I'm full of self-pity. Who comes after you? Who can ever follow Daenerys Stormborn, the Mother of Dragons?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: A great number of women, I imagine. Specific orders will be left for you regarding the welfare of Meereen and the Bay of Dragons.

Name: daario
Subtitles: Bay of Dragons?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We can't call it Slaver's Bay anymore, can we?

Name: daario
Subtitles: You'll get that throne you want so badly, I'm sure of it. I hope it brings you happiness.

Name: daario
Subtitles: I pity the lord of Westeros. They have no idea what's coming for them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Farewell, Daario Naharis.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: How did he take it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No tears.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I know it was hard for you. You turned away a man who truly loves you because he would have been a liability in the Seven Kingdoms. That's the kind of self-sacrifice that makes for a good ruler, if it's any consolation.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's not.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, I suppose not. I'm terrible at consoling.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Yes, you really are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All right, how about the fact that this is actually happening? You have your armies, you have your ships, you have your dragons. Everything you've ever wanted since you were old enough to want anything. It's all yours for the taking. Are you afraid?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good. You're in the great game now. And the great game's terrifying. The only people who aren't afraid of failure are madmen like your father.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do you know what frightens me? I said farewell to a man who loves me. A man I thought I cared for. And I felt nothing. Just impatient to get on with it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He wasn't the first to love you and he won't be the last.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, you have completely failed to console me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: For what it's worth, I've been a cynic for as long as I can remember. Everyone's always asking me to believe in things-- family, gods, kings, myself. It was often tempting until I saw where belief got people. So I said no, thank you to belief. And yet here I am.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I believe in you. It's embarrassing, really. I'd swear you my sword, but I don't actually own a sword.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's your counsel I need.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's yours. Now and always.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Good. I, um… I had something made for you. I'm not sure if it's right.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Tyrion Lannister, I name you Hand of the Queen.

Name: walder
Subtitles: You're not one of mine, are you?

Name: handmaiden
Subtitles: No, my lord.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Didn't think so. Too pretty.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Where are my damn moron sons? Black Walder and Lothar promised to be here by midday.

Name: handmaiden
Subtitles: They're here, my lord.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Well, what are they doing, trimming their cunt hairs? Tell them to come here now.

Name: handmaiden
Subtitles: But they're already here, my lord.

Name: handmaiden
Subtitles: Here, my lord.

Name: handmaiden
Subtitles: They weren't easy to carve. Especially Black Walder.

Name: walder
Subtitles: What…

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My name is Arya Stark. I want you to know that. The last thing you're ever going to see is a Stark smiling down at you as you die.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: Forgive me, my lady… if you're at prayer.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm done with all that. I came here every day when I was a girl. I prayed to be somewhere else. Back then I only ever thought about what I wanted, never about what I had.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I was a stupid girl.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: You were a child.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I thought you knew what I wanted.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I was wrong.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: No, you weren't. Every time I'm faced with a decision, I close my eyes and see the same picture. Whenever I consider an action, I ask myself will this action help to make this picture a reality? Pull it out of my mind and into the world? And I only act if the answer is yes. A picture of me on the Iron Throne… and you by my side.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's a pretty picture.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: News of this battle will spread quickly through the Seven Kingdoms. I've declared for House Stark for all to hear.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You've declared for other houses before, Lord Baelish. It's never stopped you from serving yourself.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: The past is gone for good. You can sit here mourning its departure or you can prepare for the future. You, my love, are the future of House Stark. Who should the North rally behind? A trueborn daughter of Ned and Catelyn Stark born here at Winterfell or a motherless bastard born in the south?

Name: benjen
Subtitles: This is where I leave you.

Name: meera
Subtitles: You're not coming with us?

Name: benjen
Subtitles: The Wall is not just ice and stone. Ancient spells were carved into its foundations. Strong magic to protect men from what lies beyond. And while it stands, the dead cannot pass. I cannot pass.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Where will you go?

Name: benjen
Subtitles: The great war is coming and I still fight for the living. I'll do what I can… as long as I can.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Thank you, Uncle Benjen.

Name: benjen
Subtitles: I wish you both good fortune.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Are you sure you're ready for this?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm the Three-Eyed Raven now. I have to be ready for this.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Ned?

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Lyanna.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Is that you? Is that really you?

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: You're not a dream.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: No, I'm not a dream. I'm here. Right here.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I've missed you, big brother.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: I've missed you, too.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I want to be brave.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Shh. You are.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I'm not.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I don't want to die.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: You're not going to die.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Get her some water!

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: No, no water.

Name: eddard stark
Subtitles: Is there a maester?

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Please. Listen to me, Ned.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: If Robert finds out, he'll kill him, you know he will. You have to protect him. Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Promise me, Ned. Promise me.

Name: vale knight
Subtitles: You can't expect Knights of the Vale to side with wildling invaders.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We didn't invade. We were invited.

Name: vale knight
Subtitles: Not by me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The free folk, the northerners, and the Knights of the Vale fought bravely, fought together, and we won. My father uses to say we find our true friends on the battlefield.

Name: man
Subtitles: The Boltons are defeated. The war is over. Winter has come. If the maesters are right, it'll be the coldest one in a thousand years. We should ride home and wait out the coming storms.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The war is not over. And I promise you, friend, the true enemy won't wait out the storm. He brings the storm.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Your son was butchered at the Red Wedding, Lord Manderly. But you refused the call. You swore allegiance to House Stark, Lord Glover, but in their hour of greatest need, you refused the call. And you, Lord Cerwyn, your father was skinned alive by Ramsay Bolton. Still you refuse the call. But House Mormont remembers. The North remembers. We know no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark. I don't care if he's a bastard. Ned Stark's blood runs through his veins. He's my king from this day until his last day.

Name: manderly
Subtitles: Lady Mormont speaks harshly and truly. My son died for Robb Stark, the Young Wolf. I didn't think we'd find another king in my lifetime. I didn't commit my men to your cause ‘cause I didn't want more Manderlys dying for nothing. But I was wrong. Jon Snow avenged the Red Wedding. He is the White Wolf. The King in the North.

Name: glover
Subtitles: I did not fight beside you on the field and I will regret that until my dying day. A man can only admit when he was wrong and ask forgiveness.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's nothing to forgive, my lord.

Name: glover
Subtitles: There will be more fights to come. House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousands years. And I will stand behind Jon Snow… the King in the North!

Name: glover
Subtitles: The King in the North!

Name: all
Subtitles: The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North! The King in the North!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Come on.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: I now proclaim Cersei of the House Lannister First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Long may she reign.

Name: all
Subtitles: Long may she reign.

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: You're wonder why I brought you all here. After all, we just had a feast. Since when does old Walder give us two feasts in a single fortnight?

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: Well, it's no good being lord of the Riverlands if you can't celebrate with your family. That's what I say!

Name: walder frey
Subtitles: I've gathered every Frey who means a damn thing so I can tell you my plans for this great house now that winter has come. But first, a toast! No more of that Dornish horse piss! This is the finest Arbor gold! Proper wine for proper heroes!

Name: waldery frey
Subtitles: Stand together!

Name: all
Subtitles: Stand together!

Name: walder
Subtitles: Not you. I'm not wasting good wine on a damn woman.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Maybe I'm not the most pleasant man. I'll admit it. But I'm proud of you lot. You're my family, the men who helped me slaughter the Starks at the Red Wedding.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Yes, yes. Cheer. Brave men, all of you. Butchered a woman pregnant with her babe. Cut the throat of a mother of five. Slaughtered your guests after inviting them into your home. But you didn't slaughter every one of the Starks.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: walder
Subtitles: No, no, that was your mistake. You should have ripped them all out, root and stem.

Name: walder
Subtitles: Leave one wolf alive and the sheep are never safe.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: When people ask you what happened here, tell them the North remembers. Tell them winter came for House Frey.

Name: edd
Subtitles: You wildlings?

Name: meera
Subtitles: I'm Meera Reed, daughter of Howland Reed. This is Brandon Stark, son of Ned Stark.

Name: edd
Subtitles: How do I know that's true?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You were at the Fist of the First Men. You were at Hardhome. You've seen the Army of the Dead. You've seen the Night King. He's coming for us. For all of us.

Name: edd
Subtitles: Okay, come on. Let's get them inside.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I want every northern maester to scour their records for any mention of dragonglass. Dragonglass kills white walkers. It's more valuable to us now than gold. We need to find it, we need to mine it, we need to make weapons from it. Everyone aged 10 to 60 will drill daily with spears, pikes, bow and arrow.

Name: robett
Subtitles: It's about time we taught these boys of summer how to fight.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Not just the boys.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We can't defend the North if only half the population is fighting.

Name: robett
Subtitles: You expect me to put a spear in my granddaughter's hand?

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: I don't plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me. I might be small, Lord Glover, and I might be a girl, but I am every bit as much a Northerner as you.

Name: robett
Subtitles: Indeed you are, my lady. No one has questioned--

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: And I don't need your permission to defend the North.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: We'll begin training every man, woman, boy, and girl on Bear Island.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: While we're preparing for attack, we need to shore up our defenses. The only thing standing between us and the Army of the Dead is the Wall and the Wall hasn't been properly manned in centuries. I'm not the king of the Free Folk.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But if we're going to survive this winter together...

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You want us to man the castles for you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Last time we saw the Night King was at Hardhome. The closest castle to Hardhome is Eastwatch-by-the-Sea.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Then that's where I'll go. Looks like we're the Night's Watch now.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If they breach the wall, the first two castles in their path are Last Hearth and Karhold.

Name: yohn
Subtitles: The Umbers and the Karstarks betrayed the North. Their castles should be torn down with not a stone left standing.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: The castles committed no crimes. And we need every fortress we have for the war to come. We should give the Last Hearth and Karhold to new families, loyal families who supported us against Ramsay.

Name: all
Subtitles: Aye!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Umbers and the Karstarks have fought beside the Starks for centuries. They've kept faith for generation after generation.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And then they broke faith.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm not going to strip these families of their ancestral homes because of the crimes of a few reckless sons.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So there's no punishment for treason and no reward for loyalty?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The punishment for treason is death. Smalljon Umber died on the field of battle. Harald Karstark died on the field of battle.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They died fighting for Ramsay. Give the castles to the families of the men who died fighting for you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: When I was Lord Commander of the Night's Watch I executed men who betrayed me. I executed men who refused to follow orders. My father always said, "The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword," and I have tried to live by those words. But I will not punish a son for his father's sins, and I will not take a family home away from a family it has belonged to for centuries. That is my decision, and my decision is final.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ned Umber.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Alys Karstark.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: For centuries, our families fought side by side on the battlefield. I ask you to pledge your loyalty once again to House Stark, to serve as our bannermen and come to our aid whenever called upon.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Stand.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yesterday's wars don't matter anymore. The North needs to band together, all the living north. Will you stand beside me, Ned and Alys, now and always?

Name: ned alys
Subtitles: Now and always!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You are my sister, but I am king now.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Will you start wearing a crown?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: When you question my decisions in front of the other lords and ladies, you undermine me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So I can't question your decisions anymore?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Of course you can, but--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Joffrey never let anyone question his authority. You think he was a good king?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you think I'm Joffrey?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're as far from Joffrey as anyone I've ever met.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're good at this, you know.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: At what?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: At ruling.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You are. You are. They respect you, they really do, but you have to--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why are you laughing?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What did father used to say? Everything before the word "but" is horse shit.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He never said that to me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. No, he never cursed in front of his girls.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Because he was trying to protect us. He never wanted us to see how dirty the world really is, but Father couldn't protect me and neither can you. Stop trying.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: All right, I'll stop trying to protect you and you stop trying to undermine me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm not trying to undermine you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You have to be smarter than Father. You need to be smarter than Robb. I loved them, I miss them, but they made stupid mistakes, and they both lost their heads for it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And how should I be smarter? By listening to you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Would that be so terrible?

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: A raven from King's Landing, Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Cersei of House Lannister, First of Her Name, Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms--

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What does she want?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Come to King's Landing. Bend the knee or suffer the fate of all traitors.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You've been so consumed with the enemy to the north, you've forgotten about the one to the south.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm consumed with the Night King because I've seen him. And believe me, you'd think of little else if you had, too.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We still have a wall between us and the Night King. Theres nothing between us and Cersei.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's a thousand miles between us and Cersei. Winter is here. The Lannisters are a southern army. They've never ranged this far north.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're the military man, but I know her. If you're her enemy, she'll never stop until she's destroyed you. Everyone who's ever crossed her, she's found a way to murder.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You almost sound as if you admire her.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I learned a great deal from her.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What is this?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Its what we've been waiting for our whole lives. It's what Father trained us for, whether he knew it or not.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He knew it. Made me memorize every damn city, town, lake, forest, and mountain.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's ours now, we just have to take it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You've been quiet since you came home. Are you angry with me?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, not angry.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Are you afraid of me?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Should I be?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Daenerys Targaryen has chosen Tyrion to be her Hand. Right now, they're sailing across the Narrow Sea, hoping to take back her father's throne. Our little brother, the one you love so much, the one you set free, the one who murdered our father and our first-born son, now he stands beside our enemies and gives them counsel. He's out there somewhere at the head of an armada. Where will they land?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Dragonstone.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They have deep-water ports for the ships. Stannis left the castle unoccupied, and that's where she was born.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Enemies to the east.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Enemies to the south--Ellaria Sand and her brood of bitches.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Enemies to the west--Olenna, the old cunt. Another traitor.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Enemies to the north. Ned Stark's bastard has been named King in the North and that murdering whore Sansa stands beside him. Enemies everywhere. We're surrounded by traitors. You're in command of the Lannister army now. How do we proceed?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Winter is here. We can't win a war if we can't feed our men and our horses. The Tyrells have the grain, the Tyrells have the livestock.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Will the Tyrell bannermen stand alongside a Dothraki horde and Unsullied slave soldiers?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If they think Daenerys will win. No one wants to fight on the losing side. Right now, we look like the losing side.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm the Queen of the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Three kingdoms, at best. I'm not sure you understand how much danger we're in.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I understand we're in a war for survival. I understand whoever loses dies. I understand whoever wins could launch a dynasty that lasts a thousand years.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: A dynasty for whom? Our children are dead. We're the last of us.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A dynasty for us, then.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We never talked about Tommen.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: There's nothing to say.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Our baby boy killed himself.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He betrayed me. He betrayed us both. Should we spend our days mourning the dead--mother, father, and all our children?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Cersei--

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I loved them. I did. But they're ashes now and we're still flesh and blood. We're the last Lannisters, the last ones who count.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Even Lannisters can't survive without allies. Where are our allies now? You saw what happened to Walder Frey and his family.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I heard. How could we ever trust a man like that?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We couldn't. He was a useless, old coward, but the Freys supported us. Now they're all dead. Whoever killed them is no friend of ours. We need allies. Stronger, better allies. We can't win this war alone.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You think I listened to Father for 40 years and learned nothing?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The Greyjoys? You invited the Greyjoys to King's Landing?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Not all of them.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Well, it looks like all of them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I invited Euron Greyjoy, the new King of the Iron Islands. You said yourself we needed stronger, better allies. There you are.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: How are they better allies? How are they different from the Freys? They both broke their promises and murdered their former friends as soon as it suited them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: So does everyone when it suits them. Unlike the Freys, they have ships. And they're good at killing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They're not good at anything. I know the Ironborn. They're bitter, angry little people. All they know how to do is steal things they can't build or grow themselves.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Euron Greyjoy didn't come here for that.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Oh, what did he come here for, then?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: A queen.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: The moment I was chosen Lord of the Iron Islands, they turned on me. Their own uncle. They stole my best ships and ran. Sailed the right across the world and gave them to the Dragon Queen so she could bring her armies here to attack you.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: It's nothing compares to the treason you suffered at the hands of a family members, from what I hear. But still, it bothers me. Murdering them would make me feel a lot better. And since it appears that all our treasonous family members are fighting for the same side, I thought we rightful monarchs could murder them together.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're not a rightful monarch, though, are you?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The Greyjoys rebelled agains the throne for the right to be monarchs, but as I recall, you were soundly defeated. Come to mention it, weren't you the one who started that rebellion by sailing to Casterly Rock and burning the Lannister fleet? You certainly caught us there. Very smart move on your part. Of course, we all made it to the Iron Islands anyway. I was there.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I remember very well. I saw you. I heard so much talk. The best in the world. No one can stop him. I didn't believe it, to be honesty. But I must say, when you rushed through the breach and started cutting people down...it was glorious. Like a dance.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The people I was cutting down were your own kin.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: The place was getting crowded. I enjoyed watching it. I truly did.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And I enjoyed killing Greyjoys.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: A good thing for me. If you hadn't crushed us, I wouldn't have gone into exile. If I hadn't done that, I wouldn't be the greatest captain on the 14 seas.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If not the most humble.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: You're not humble. You're the queen of a great nation. You don't care about the Iron Islands. They're nothing but rocks and bird shit and--and a lot of very unattractive people. The Iron Fleet, on the other hand, that's something else entirely. It's the greatest armada Westeros has ever seen. With the Iron Fleet, you own the seas. You can defeat the invaders of the east and the pretenders of the north and south.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What do you want in return?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Ever since I was a little boy, I wanted to grow up and mary the most beautiful woman in the world. So here I am, with a thousand ships and two good hands.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I decline your proposal.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Why?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're not trustworthy. You've broken promises to allies before and murdered them at the nearest opportunity. You murdered your own brother.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: You should try it. Feels wonderful.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I don't expect you to trust me outright. You need proof of my honest intentions. In my experience, the surest way to a woman's heart is with a gift. A priceless gift. I won't return to King's Landing until I have that for you.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Ah, Maester Weyland. A drinker's liver if ever I saw one.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Weigh that.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: The triumph of transitory pleasures. Mankindo s curse.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Archmaester, I was wondering...

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: What's the weight?

Name: sam
Subtitles: I was wondering if you had considered my proposition.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I don't remember your proposition.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I asked you if, in light of what I've seen in the North, if I could have access to the restricted area of the library.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: That area is reserved for maesters. Are you a maester?

Name: sam
Subtitles: No.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Not a very strong proposition, is it?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Archmaester, with respect, I've seen them--the Army of the Dead. The white walkers. W was sent here to learn how to defeat them, but everyone in the Citadel, those who will even talk to me, they all doubt the walkers ever existed in the first place.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Everyone in the Citadel doubts everything. It's their job. But the tales of the Long Night can't be pure fabrication. Too many similarities from unconnected sources.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Sources in the restricted area?

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: The very same. And the simplest explanation for your grating obsession with the white walkers is that you're telling the truth and that you saw what you say you saw.

Name: sam
Subtitles: So, you believe me.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I do. You'll finish weighing that heart?

Name: sam
Subtitles: That makes you the only person south of the Twins who does.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: We're not lie the people south of the Twins. And we're not like the people north of the Twins. In the Citadel, we lead different lives for different reasons. We are this worldo s memory, Samwell Tarly. Without us, men would be little better than dogs. Don't remember any meal but the last, can't see forward to any but the next. And every time you leave the house and shut the door, they howl like you're gone forever. When Robert's Rebellion was raging, people that the end was near. The end of the Targaryen dynasty. "How will we survive?" When Aegon Targaryen turned his eye westward and flew his dragons to Blackwater Rush--"The end is near! How will we survive?" And thousands of year before that, during the Long Night, we can forgive them for thinking it truly was the end. But it wasn't. None of it was. The Wall has stood through it all. And every winter that ever came has ended.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), {'samwell'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'targaryen'}, set(), {'aegon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Be a good lad. Clean this up.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Nope.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You're a lucky man.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I've heard she beat the Hound in single combat. She's a very impressive woman.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What do you want, Lord Baelish?

Name: petyr
Subtitles: I want you to be happy. I want you to be safe.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I am safe. I'm at home, surrounded by friends. I have Brienne to protect me from anyone who would harm me.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: What about happy? Why aren't you happy? What do you want that you do not have?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: At the moment, peace and quiet.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No need to seize the last word, Lord Baelish. I'll assume it was something clever.

Name: petyr
Subtitles: My lady.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Why is he still here?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We need his men. Without the Vale, Ramsay Bolton would still hold this castle. Littlefinger saved us.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: He wants something.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I know exactly what he wants.

Name: man
Subtitles: He rode through the streets of the city / Down from his hill on high / O'er the winds and the steps and the cobble / He rode to a woman's sigh / For she was his secret treasure / She was his shame and his bliss / And a chain and a keep are nothing / Compared to a woman's kiss / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are warm / For hands of gold are always cold / But a woman's hands are--

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's a pretty song. I've never heard it before.

Name: man
Subtitles: It's a new one.

Name: man
Subtitles: Are you hungry? We've got some rabbit.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't want to steal your food.

Name: man
Subtitles: You're not stealing, we're offering. Come on, it's gonna be a cold night.

Name: man
Subtitles: You heading south?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: King's Landing.

Name: man
Subtitles: Poor girl.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Not so bad, is it?

Name: man
Subtitles: Depends on your taste, I guess. If you like your streets covered in shit and pig's blood, it's the town for you.

Name: man
Subtitles: All my life, I wanted to see the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor, the Dragonpit. Then when I finally make it, they wouldn't let me within a mile of the Red Keep, the Sept of Baelor's blown to hell, and the Dragonpit is a damn ruin.

Name: man
Subtitles: The people who live there, they'd skin you alive if they could make two coppers off your hide.

Name: man
Subtitles: Worst place in the world.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What are you doing in the Riverlands?

Name: man
Subtitles: There's been some trouble with the Freys up at The Twins, so we're part of the army that's been sent to keep the peace.

Name: man
Subtitles: Here you go. Guests first.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Oh, no, I couldn't. You don't have enough.

Name: man
Subtitles: My mother always told me to be kind to strangers. Strangers will be kind to you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're a long way from home. I'm sure you've had some adventures, though.

Name: man
Subtitles: Yeah, endless adventures. They'll be singing about us for a thousand years.

Name: man
Subtitles: 3; The truth is when we left home, we couldn't wait to get away. But now we've been gone a while, we can't wait to get home.

Name: man
Subtitles: I just think about my dad out there on his boat all alone. I ought o be out there with him.

Name: man
Subtitles: My wife's just had our first baby.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Boy or girl?

Name: man
Subtitles: Oh, who knows? You think soldiers get ravens with news from home?

Name: man
Subtitles: I hope it's a girl.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: man
Subtitles: Girls take care of their papas when their papas grow old. Boys just go off to fight in someone else's wars.

Name: man
Subtitles: Are you old enough to drink?

Name: man
Subtitles: It's blackberry wine. I made it myself.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's really good.

Name: man
Subtitles: So, why is a nice girl on her own heading to King's Landing?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm going to kill the queen.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Bad night to be outdoors.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You've got real powerful magic to figure that out. Did the Lord of Light whisper that in your ear? "It's snowing, Thoros. It's windy. It's gonna be a cold night."

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You're a grouchy old bear, aren't you, Clegane? You want some rum?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Don't like that shit. It's too sweet.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Why are you always in such a foul mood?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Experience.

Name: beric
Subtitles: This seems like a good place to spend the night.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: These people don't want us here.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Seems deserted to me. No livestock. No smoke coming from the chimney.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I don't like the look of it.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: For a big, hard man, you scare easy.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I'll tell you what doesn't scare me

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Come on. Maybe they've got some ale hidden away.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: They don't.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: See if there's a larder. They always leave something behind.

Name: beric
Subtitles: How do you think it ended for them?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: With death.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Girl died in her father's arms. Both of them covered in blood and a knife at their feet. I'd say they were starving. And rather than letting his little girl suffer, he ended it for both of them.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Doesn't matter now.

Name: beric
Subtitles: No, doesn't matter now.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I've known you a long time, Dondarrion.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Aye. I think the first time we met was at that tournament--

Name: sandor
Subtitles: And I always thought you were dull as dirt.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You're not bad. I don't hate you. Don't like, but you're not bad.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Thank you, Clegane. That warms the heart.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: But there's nothing special about you.

Name: beric
Subtitles: You're right about that.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: So why does the Lord of Light keep bringing you back? I've met better men than you, and they've been hanged from crossbeams, or beheaded, or just shat themselves to death in a field somewhere. None of them came back. So, why you?

Name: beric
