Subtitles: You think I don't ask myself that? Every hour of every day? Why am I here? What am I supposed to do? What does the Lord see in me?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: And?

Name: beric
Subtitles: I don't know. I don't understand our Lord.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Your Lord.

Name: beric
Subtitles: I don't know what He wants from me. I only know that He wants me alive.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: If he's so all-powerful, why doesn't he just tell you what the fuck he wants?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Clegane.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Come over here. Don't worry. The fire won't bite. I want to show you something.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: It's my fucking luck I end up with a band of fire worshippers.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Aye. Almost seems like divine justice.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: There's no divine justice, you dumb cunt. If there was, you'd be dead...and that girl would be alive.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Look into the flames.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I don't want to look in the damn flames.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You saw me bring him back from the dead after you cut him down. Don't you want to know what gave me the power?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I keep asking and no one wants to tell me.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: We can't tell you. Only the fire can tell you.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: What do you see?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Logs burning.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Keep looking. What do you see?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Ice. A wall of ice. The Wall.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: What else?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: It's where the Wall meets the sea. There's a castle there.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: There's a mountain. Looks like an arrowhead. The dead are marching past.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Thousands of them.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Do you believe me now, Clegane? Do you believe we're here for a reason?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: What the hell are you doing, Clegane?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Burying the dead.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: You knew these people.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Not really.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: We ask the Father to judge us with mercy. We ask the Mother to... Fuck it, I don't remember the rest. I'm sorry you're dead. You deserved better. Both of you.

Name: little sam
Subtitles: Mom.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: You should really sleep, Sam.

Name: sam
Subtitles: The dead don't.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Legends of the Long Night.

Name: sam
Subtitles: The Targaryens used dragonglass to decorate their weapons without even knowing what the First Men used it for.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's a map of Dragonstone. The Targaryens built their first stronghold there when they invaded Westeros.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: That's dragonglass?

Name: sam
Subtitles: A mountain of it. Beneath the ground. Stannis told me, but I didn't think... This is important. Jon needs to know.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Has she come yet?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Who?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: The Dragon Queen. Daenerys Stormborn.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Haven't heard anything.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Shall we begin?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: On a night like this, you came into the world.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I remember that storm. All the dogs in King's Landing howled through the night.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I wish I could remember it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I always thought this would be a homecoming. It doesn't feel like home.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We won't stay on Dragonstone for long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not so many lions.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Cersei controls fewer than half the Seven Kingdoms. The lord of Westeros despise her. Even before your arrival, they plotted against her. Now...

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They cry out for their true queen? They drink secret toasts to my health?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: People used to tell my brother that sort of thing, and he was stupid enough to believe them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: If Viserys had three dragons and an army at his back, he'd have invaded King's Landing already.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Conquering Westeros would be easy for you. But you're not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We can take the Seven Kingdoms without turning it into a slaughterhouse. If the great houses support your claim against Cersei, the game is won. With the Tyrell army and the Dornish on our side, we have powerful allies in the south.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I never properly thanked you for that.

Name: varys
Subtitles: They joined our side, my queen, because they believe in you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You served my father, didn't you, Lord Varys?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And then you served the man who overthrew him?

Name: varys
Subtitles: I had a choice, Your Grace--serve Robert Baratheon or face the headman's axe.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But you didn't serve him long. You turned against him.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Robert was an improvement on your father, to be sure. There have been few rulers in history as cruel as the Mad King. Robert was neither mad nor cruel. He simply had no interest in being king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So you took it upon yourself to find a better one.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace, when I was ready to drink myself into a small coffin, Lord Varys told me about a queen in the east who--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Before I came to power, you favored my brother. All your spies, your little birds, did they tell you Viserys was cruel, stupid, and weak? Would those qualities have made for a good king in your learned opinion?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Until your marriage to Khal Drogo, Your Grace, I knew nothing about you, save your existence and that you were said to be beautiful.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So you and your friends traded me like a prized horse to the Dothraki.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Which you turned to your advantage.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who gave the order to kill me?

Name: varys
Subtitles: King Robert.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who hired the assassins?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who sent word to Essos to murder Daenerys Targaryen?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Your Grace, I did what had to be done to--

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: To keep yourself alive.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Lord Varys has proven himself a loyal servant.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Proven himself loyal? Quite the opposite. If he dislikes one monarch, he conspires to crown the next one. What king of a servant is that?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The kind the realm needs. Incompetence should not be rewarded with blind loyalty. As long as I have my eyes, I'll use them. I wasn't born into a great house. I came from nothing. I was sold as a slave and carved up as an offering. When I was a child, I lived in alleys, gutters, abandoned houses. You wish to know where my true loyalties lie? Not with any king or queen, but with the people. The people who suffer under despots and prosper under just rule. The people whose hearts you aim to win. If you demand blind allegiance, I respect your wishes. Grey Worm can behead me or your dragons can devour me. But if you let me live, I will serve you well. I will dedicate myself to seeing you on the Iron Throne because I choose you. Because I know the people have no better chance than you.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'grey'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Swear this to me, Varys. If you ever think I'm failing the people, you won't conspire behind my back. You'll look me in the eye as you have done today, and you'll tell me how I'm failing them.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I swear it, my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And I swear this--if you ever betray me, I'll burn you alive.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I would expect nothing less from the Mother of Dragons.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Forgive me, my queen. A red priestess from As'shai has come to see you.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Queen Daeneys, I was a slave once, bought and sold, scourged and branded. It is an honor to meet the Breaker of Chains.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Red Priests helped bring peace to Meereen. You are very welcome here. What is your name?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I am called Melisandre.

Name: varys
Subtitles: She once served another who wanted the Iron Throne. It didn't end well for Stannis Baratheon, did it?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: No, it didn't.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You chose an auspicious day to arrive at Dragonstone.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We've just decided to pardon those who served the wrong king.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The Lord of Light doesn't have many followers in Westeros, does he?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Not yet. But even those who don't worship the Lord can serve his cause.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What does your Lord expect from me?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: The Long Night is coming. Only the prince who was promised can bring the dawn.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The prince who was promised will bring the dawn. I'm afraid I'm not a prince.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Your Grace, forgive me, but your translation is not quite accurate. That noun has no gender in High Valyrian, so the proper translation for that prophecy would be the prince or princess who was promised will bring the dawn.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Doesn't really roll off the tongue, does it?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No, but I like it better.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And you believe this prophecy refers to me?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Prophecies are dangerous things. I believe you have a role to play, as does another. The King in the North, Jon Snow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Jon Snow? Ned Stark's bastard?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You know him?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I traveled with him to the Wall when he joined the Night's Watch.

Name: varys
Subtitles: And why do you think the Lord of Light singled out this Jon Snow aside from the visions you've seen in the flames, that is?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: As Lord Commander of the Night's Watch he allowed the Wildlings south of the Wall to protect them from great danger. As King in the North he has united those Wildlings with the northern houses so together they may face their common enemy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He sounds like quite a man.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Summon Jon Snow. Let him stand before you and tell you things that have happened to him, the things that he has seen with his own eyes.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I can't speak to prophecies or visions in the flames, but I like Jon Snow and I trusted him, and I am an excellent judge of character.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If he does rule the north, he would make a valuable ally. The Lannisters executed his father and conspired to murder his brother. Jon Snow has even more reason to hate Cersei than you do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Very well. Send a raven north. Tell Jon Snow that his Queen invites him to come to Drangonstone...and bend the knee.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Do you think it's really Tyrion? It could be someone trying to lure you into a trap.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Read the last bit.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: All dwarfs are bastards in their father's eyes." What does that mean?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's something he said to me the first night we met. You know him better than any of us. What do you think?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Tyrion is not like the other Lannisters. He was always kind to me, but it's too great a risk. "The Seven Kingdoms will bleed as long as Cersei sits on the Iron Throne. Join us. Together we can end her tyranny."

Name: davos
Subtitles: Sounds like a charmer. Of course, the casual mention of a Dothraki horde, a legion of Unsullied and three dragons, a bit less charming.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Fire kills Whites, you told me. What breathes fire?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're not suggesting Jon meet with her?

Name: davos
Subtitles: No, too dangerous.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But?

Name: davos
Subtitles: But if the Army of the Dead makes it passed the Wall, do we have enough men to fight them?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: If the Mad King's daughter takes the Iron Throne, she will destroy the Realm as we know it. Some of you are bannermen of House Tyrell. But House Tyrell is in open rebellion against the Crown. With their help the Mad King's daughter has ferried an army of savages to our shores. Mindless Unsullied soldiers who will destroy your castles and your holdfasts. Dothraki heathens who will burn your villages to the ground, rape and enslave your women, and butcher your children without a second thought. This is how Olenna Tyrell rewards centuries of service and loyalty.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You all remember the Mad King. You remember the horrors he inflicted upon his people. His daughter is no different. In Essos her brutality is already legendary. She crucified hundreds of noblemen in Slaver's Bay. And when she grew bored of that, she fed them to her dragons.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It is my solemn duty to protect the people, and I will but I need your help, My Lords. We must stand together, all of us, if we hope to stop her.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: She has three full-grown dragons, Your Grace. The same as Aegon when he conquered the Seven Kingdoms. How do you propose to stop them?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: We are currently at work on a solution, My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Lord Tarley.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Ser, Jaime. I believe you know my son.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Ser, Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Rickon, isn't it?

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Dickon.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That's it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Thank you for coming. The other lords of the Reach look to you for guidance now more than ever. They might not have come if you hadn't.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: If my queen summons me, I answer the call. And I've heard what she does to those that defy her.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Do you ride for Hornhill today?

Name: randyll
Subtitles: I have an army to mobilize. It won't be long until the fighting starts.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And what side will you be fighting for? You were the only man to defeat Robert Baratheon in battle. Not even Rhaegar Targaryen could --

Name: randyll
Subtitles: It's a long ride back to the reach, Ser Jaime. How may I serve?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I want you to be my ranking general in the wars to come. I want you to swear allegiance to Cersei and I want you to help her destroy her enemies. All of her enemies.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Including Olenna Tyrell? I'm a Tarley. That name means something. We're not oath breakers. We're not schemers. We don't stab our rivals in the back or cut their throats at weddings. I swore an oath to House Tyrell.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You swore an oath to the Crown as well, Lord Tarley.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: I've known Olenna since I was a child.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She was a great woman, once. Now she's broken. She wants revenge so badly she brought the Dothraki to our shores. The Dothraki in Westeros for the first time in history. I know you don't like my sister, but you have to make a choice. Do you fight with us or with the foreign savages and eunuchs?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: When the war is won the queen will need a new warden of the south. I can think of no better man than Randyll Tarley.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: The infection has spread too far. You should have cut off your arm the moment you were touched.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: How long?

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: It will be years before it kills you. It could be 10, could be 20.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: But how long 'till...

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Your mind? Six months, maybe fewer.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Pardon, Archmaester. I met Stannis Baratheon's daughter at Castle Black. She had Greyscale as a baby and was cured. Isn't there some way --

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Does this look like a baby to you?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Have you studied the varying rates of Greyscale progression in infants and fully grown men?

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Maester Chrissen discovered Shireen Baratheon's affliction immediately.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: This is quite advanced and beyond our skills, Ser. Were you a commoner I'd have you shipped to Valyria at once to live out your life with the Stone Men. As an anointed Knight I'll allow you one more day. How you choose to spend that time is up to you.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Come, Samwell.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Should we send word to your family, Ser...

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Jorah. Jorah Mormont.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Mormont?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: There's no need. I've been dead to them for years.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Have you ever been down here, Your Grace?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, I can't say I have. I haven't seen these since Robert had them removed from the Throne Room.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Curious that King Robert did not have them destroyed.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They were his trophies. He couldn't keep them around. They would have made him look small. Sometimes he would come down here and look at them. I believe he brought his whores on occasion.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Balerion the Dread. The beast that Aegon rode across the sea. Its flames forged the Iron Throne and brought the Seven Kingdoms to heel. Powerful, but not invincible.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Apparently one of Daenarys' dragons was wounded by spears in the fighting pits of Meereen. If they can be wounded, they can be killed.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: The finest artilleters and blacksmiths in King's Landing have been laboring day and night, Your Grace. If you'd kindly pull that lever.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: If you want the Iron Throne, take it. We have an army, a fleet, and three dragons. We should hit King's Landing now. Hard. With everything we have. The city will fall within a day.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If we turn the dragons loose, tens of thousands will die in the firestorms.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: It's called war. You don't have the stomach for it, scurry back into hiding.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I know how you wage war. We don't poison little girls here. Myrcella was innocent.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: She was a Lannister. There are no innocent Lannisters. My greatest regret is that Oberyn died fighting for you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That's enough. Tyrion is the Hand of the Queen. You will treat him with respect.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I am not here to be queen of the ashes.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: That's very nice to hear. Of course, I can't remember a queen who was better loved than my grand daughter. The common people loved her, the nobles loved her. And what is left of her now? Ashes. Commoners, nobles, they're all just children really. They won't obey you unless they fear you.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm grateful to you, Lady Olenna, for your council. I'm grateful to all of you. But you have chosen to follow me. I will not attack King's Landing. We will not attack King's Landing.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Then how do you mean to take the Iron Throne? By asking nicely?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We will lay siege to the capital surrounding the city on all sides. Cersei will have the Iron Throne but no food for her army or the people.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But we won't use Dothraki and Unsullied.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Cersei will try to rally the lords of Westeros by appealing to their loyalty, their love for their country. If we besiege the city with foreigners, we prove her point. Our army should be Westerosi.

Name: ellia
Subtitles: And I suppose we're providing the Westerosi?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Lady Greyjoy will escort you home to Sunspear and her Iron Fleet will ferry the Dornish army back up to King's Landing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Dornish will lay siege to the capital alongside the Tyrell army. Two great kingdoms united against Cersei.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: So, your master plan is to use our armies? Forgive me for asking, but why did you bother to bring your own?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The unsullied will have another objective. For decades House Lannister has been the true power in Westeros. And the seat of that power is Casterly Rock. Grey Worm and the Unsullied will sail for the Rock and take it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Do I have your support?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You have mine.

Name: ellia
Subtitles: Dorne is with you, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you all. Lady Olenna, may I speak with you alone?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I realize you're here out of hatred for Cersei and not love for me. But I swear to you she will pay for what she's done and we will bring peace back to Westeros.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Peace. Do you think that's what we had under your father or his father or his? Peace never lasts, my dear. Would you take a bit of advice from an old woman?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: He's a clever man, your Hand. I've known a great many clever men. I've outlived them all. Do you know why? I ignored them. The lords of Westeros are sheep. Are you a sheep? No. You're a dragon. Be a dragon.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Enter.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: You leave tomorrow. Were you going to say goodbye?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: I will see you when I return.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: But you don't know when that will be.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: No one knows.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I wish you good fortune.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Missandei --

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: It is hard for me to say goodbye to you.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Why?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: You know why.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I don't.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: You are my weakness.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: That's what I am? Your weakness?

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: When Unsullied are young their masters learn their fears. One boy is scared of dogs. One boy hates high places. One is frightened of the ocean. They make the boy sleep with dogs or climb a cliff. They throw him in the water. If he learns to swim, good. If he drowns, good. Either way, strong Unsullied. But I had no fears. I was never the biggest, never the strongest, but I was bravest always.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I believe it.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Until I meet Missandei from the Isle of Naarth. Now I have fear.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I do too.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: No.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I want to see you. Please.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: It might be useful. Fouthen was a dreadful writer but an excellent researcher.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Archmaester, I wanted to --

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: And this one.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Maester Faol was quite the opposite. A brilliant stylist who invented half the stories he tells.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I wanted to ask you --

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: If you need to write histories, Tarley, you have to do the research. If you want people to read your histories, you need a bit of style. I'm not writing the Chronicle of the Wars Following the Death of King Robert the First so it can sit on a shelf unread.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: What? You don't like the title? What would you call it then?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Possibly something a bit more poetic?

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: We're not poets, Tarley.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Archmaester, if I could just have a moment.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: This is your moment. Use it wisely.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I may have found a way to treat Ser Jorah. There are two recorded cases of advanced Greyscale being cured. I found the procedure in the Study of Rare Diseases by Archmaester Pilos.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I'm familiar with Archmaester Pylos and the Study of Rare Diseases.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Oh, you are?

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Yes. Should I tell you how he died? From Greyscale.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Oh.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: The procedure is far too dangerous which is why it's now forbidden.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Hello.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You're Jorah Mormont. You're the only son of Jeor Mormont.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: My name is Samwell Tarley. I'm a sworn brother of the Night's Watch training to serve as maester of Castle Black. I knew your father. I was with him when he died. You're not dying today, Ser Jorah.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Drink this.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Rum. Drink it all, please. I'm afraid this is going to hurt.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: If you could take off your shirt.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: If you wouldn't mind, bite down hard. I'm sorry but no one knows I'm here. If they hear you screaming then we're both finished.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Have you ever done this before?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No. No one else will try, so I'm the best you've got. Have a seat. I'm going to remove the entire layer of infected tissue, then apply a medicinal ointment to the --

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Shh, shhh. Again, I'm sorry. Please try not to scream.

Name: man
Subtitles: They say her dragons are bigger than Aegons.

Name: man
Subtitles: Horse shit. Cersei is just trying to frighten us.

Name: man
Subtitles: If it's true, if she lays siege to King's Landing prices will triple.

Name: man
Subtitles: As long as we get back there before they start.

Name: man
Subtitles: One more round. It's a long ride.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Ary!

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Hello, Hot Pie. Sit down. Who's that for?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Mmm. This is good.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: You think so? The secret is browning the butter before making the dough. Most people don't don't do that because it takes up too much time.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I didn't do that.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: You've been making pies?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: One or two.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I can't believe you're here. Did you meet the big lady?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Big lady?

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: The lady knight. I figured she was a knight because she had armor on. She was looking for your sister but I told her about you. Did she ever find you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: She found me.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: What happened to you Ary?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You got any ale?

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Where are you heading?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: King's Landing.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Why?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I heard Cersei's queen now.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I heard she blew up the Great Sept. That must have been something to see. Boom.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Hmm.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I can't believe someone could do that.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Cersei would do that.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: I thought you'd be heading for Winterfell.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why would I go there? The Boltons have it.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: No. The Boltons are dead.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Jon Snow came down from Castle Black with a Wildling army and won the Battle of the Bastards. He's King in the North now.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're lying.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Why would I lie about that? He's your brother right?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Thanks for the pie.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: Friends don't pay. I can't believe I thought you were a boy. You're pretty.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Thanks.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Take care of yourself, Hot Pie. Try not to get killed.

Name: hot pie
Subtitles: No, I won't. I'm like you, Ary. I'm a survivor.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: A raven, My King, from the Citadel.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: This message was sent to me by Samwell Tarley. He was my brother at the Night's Watch. A man I trust as much as anyone in this world. He's discovered proof that Dragonstone sits on a mountain of Dragonglass.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I received this a few days ago from Dragonstone. It was sent to me by Tyrion Lannister.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's now Hand of the Queen to Daenerys Targaryen. She intends to take the Iron Throne from Cersei Lannister. She has a powerful army at her back and if this message is to be believed, three dragons.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion has invited me to Dragonstone to meet with Daenerys and I'm going to accept.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We need this Dragonglass, My Lords. We know that Dragonglass can destroy both White Walkers and their army. We need to mine it and turn it into weapons.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But more importantly, we need allies. The Night King's army grows larger by the day. We can't defeat them on our own. We don't have the numbers. Daenerys has her own army and she has dragon fire. I need to try and persuade her to fight with us. Ser Davos and I will ride for White Harbor tomorrow, then sail for Dragonstone.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Have you forgotten what happened to our grandfather? The Mad King invited him to King's Landing and roasted him alive.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I know that.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: She is here to reclaim the Iron Throne and the Seven Kingdoms. The north is one of those seven kingdoms. This isn't an invitation, it's a trap.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It could be, but I don't believe Tyrion would do that. You know him. He's a good man.

Name: yohn royce
Subtitles: Your Grace, with respect I must agree with Lady Sansa. I remember the Mad King all too well. A Targaryen cannot be trusted, nor can a Lannister.

Name: robett glover
Subtitles: We called your brother king, and then he rode south and lost his kingdom.

Name: lyanna mormont
Subtitles: Winter is here, Your Grace. We need the King in the North in the north.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You all crowned me your king. I never wanted it, I never asked for it, but I accepted it because the north is my home. It's part of me and I will never stop fighting for it, no matter the odds. But the odds are against us. None of you have seen the Army of the Dead. None of you. We can never hope to defeat them alone. We need allies, powerful allies. I know it's a risk. But I have to take it.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Then send an emissary. Don't go yourself.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Daenerys is a queen. Only a king can convince her to help us. It has to be me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're abandoning your people. Your abandoning your home.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm leaving both in good hands.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Whose?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yours. You are my sister. You are the only Stark in Winterfell. Until I return, the north is yours.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I delivered his bones myself. I presented them to Lady Catlyn as a gesture of goodwill from Tyrion Lannister. It seems like a lifetime ago. Do give Lord Tyrion my best when you see him.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I was sorry when he died. Your father and I had our differences but he loved Cat very much. So did I. She wasn't fond of you, was she? Well, it appears she vastly underestimated you. Your father and brothers are gone, yet here you stand King in the North. Last best hope against the coming storm.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You don't belong down here.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Forgive me. We have never talked properly. I wanted to remedy that.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I have nothing to say to you.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Not even thank you? If it weren't for me you'd have been slaughtered at that battlefield. You have many enemies, My King, but I swear to you I'm not one of them. I love Sansa as I loved her mother.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Touch my sister and I'll kill you myself.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nymeria?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nymeria, it's me, Arya. I'm heading north, girl, back to Winterfell. I'm finally going home. Come with me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Come with me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's not you.

Name: nymeria
Subtitles: You can't have them all. It's not fair.

Name: obara
Subtitles: I'm oldest.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Momma will want Cersei for herself.

Name: obara
Subtitles: She's not my momma. You can have Cersei. I want The Mountain.

Name: nymeria
Subtitles: The Mountain killed father. He'll crush you with one hand.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Father got careless. That's what Momma says.

Name: obara
Subtitles: Will you shut up about Momma? Momma, momma.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Maybe I'll kill you both before we take King's Landing and then I won't have to share.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: How can you drink this piss? When we reach Sunspear I'll treat you to a Dornish red, the best in the world. Have you ever been to Dorne?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: A few times. Never stayed long.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: A boy in every port?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: A boy, a girl. Depends on the port.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Could we get some more?

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: I thought it wasn't for you.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: I'm developing a taste for it.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: He's not your servant.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: It's fine.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: So, you're going to be Queen of the Iron Islands.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Once I kill my uncle.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: And what will you be, handsome?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Whatever my queen demands.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: He'll be my advisor, my protector.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Oh, I see. Your protector.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: So if someone gets too close to you --

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: He might have to intervene.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: hold that person back.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Until they've made their intentions known.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Why are you standing all the way over there then? A foreign invasion is under way. It seems like you don't need a protector.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Stay here.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Euron.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Your mother is below deck. Keep her safe.

Name: ellaria
Subtitles: Kill us! Get it over with!

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Give your uncle a kiss.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Theon!

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Ah, come on your cockless hound. I have her. Come and get her.

Name: end
Subtitles: CREDITS

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The bastard of Winterfell.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The dwarf of Casterly Rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I believe we last saw each other on top of the wall.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You were pissing off the edge, if I remember right. You picked up some scars along the road.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's been a long road. But we're both still here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm Tyrion Lannister.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Davos Seaworth.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: and DAVOS shake hands.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ah, the Onion Knight. We fought on opposite sides at the Battle of Blackwater Bay.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Unluckily for me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Missandei is the queen's most trusted advisor.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Welcome to Dragonstone. Our queen knows this is a long journey. She appreciates the effort you have made on her behalf. If you wouldn't mind handing over your weapons.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Please, this way.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Where are you from? I can't place the accent.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I was born on the Island of Naarth.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Ah. I hear it's beautiful down there. Palm trees and butterflies. I haven't been myself.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This place has changed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And Sansa, I hear she's alive and well.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She is.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Does she miss me terribly?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A sham marriage and unconsummated.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I didn't ask --

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, it was. It wasn't. Anyway, she's much smarter than she lets on.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She's starting to let on.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good. At some point I want to hear how a Knight's Watch recruit became King in the North.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: As long as you tell me how a Lannister became Hand to Daenerys Targaryen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A long and bloody tale. To be honest, I was drunk for most of it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My bannermen think I'm a fool for coming here.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Of course they do. If I was your hand I would have advised against it. General rule of thumb, Stark men don't fare well when they travel south.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: True. But I'm not a Stark.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'd say you get used to them, but you never really do.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Come. Their mother is waiting for you.

Name: varys
Subtitles: I wondered why you weren't there to meet our guests. You begged us to summon the King in the North. Don't you want to see him again?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I've done my part. I've brought ice and fire together.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Strange. You spoke so highly of Jon Snow but when he arrives you hide on a cliff. I didn't take you for a bashful girl.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: My time whispering in the ears of kings has come to an end.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Oh, I doubt that. Give us common folk one taste of power we're like the lion who tasted man. Nothing is ever so sweet again.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Neither of us is common folk anymore. I did not part on good terms with the King in the North, or his advisor.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Why?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Because of mistakes I made. Terrible mistakes. I would only be a distraction if I stayed.

Name: varys
Subtitles: So where will you go?

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: Volantis.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Good. If you don't mind my saying, I don't think you should return to Westeros. I'm not sure you'd be safe here.

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I will return, dear spider. One last time.

Name: varys
Subtitles: My Lady --

Name: melisandre
Subtitles: I have to die in this strange country, just like you.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: You stand in the presence of Daenerys Stormborn of House Targaryen, rightful heir to the Iron Throne, rightful Queen of the Andals and the First Men, Protector of the Seven Kingdoms, the Mother of Dragons, the Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea, The Unburnt, The Breaker of Chains.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This is Jon Snow.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He's King in the North.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you for traveling so far, My Lords. I hope the seas weren't too rough.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The winds were kind, Your Grace.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Apologies. I have a Flea Bottom accent, I know. But Jon Snow is King in the North, Your Grace. He's not a lord.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Forgive me --

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace, this is Ser Davos Seaworth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Forgive me, Ser Davos. I never did receive a formal education, but I could have sworn the last King in the North was Torren Stark who bent the knee to my ancestor Aegon Targaryen in exchange for his life and the lives of the northmen. Torren Stark swore fealty to House Targaryen in perpetuity. But do I have my facts wrong?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I wasn't there, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No. Of course not. But still, an oath is an oath. In perpetuity means -- what does perpetuity mean, Lord Tyrion?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Forever.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Forever. So I assume, My Lord, that you're here to bend the knee.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I am not.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Oh. Well, that is unfortunate. You've travelled all this way to break faith with House Targaryen?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Break faith? Your father burned my grandfather alive. He burned my uncle alive. He would have burned the Seven Kingdoms.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My father was an evil man. On behalf of House Targaryen I ask your forgiveness for the crimes he committed against your family. And I ask you not to judge a daughter by the sins of her father. Our two houses were allies for centuries. Those were the best centuries the kingdom's ever known. Centuries of peace and prosperity with the Targaryens sitting on the Iron Throne and a Stark serving as Warden of the North. I am the last Targaryen, Jon Snow. Honor the pledge your ancestor made to mine. Bend the knee and I will name you Warden of the North. Together we will save this country from those who would destroy it.
ners: [set(), {'targaryen'}, set(), set(), set(), {'stark', 'targaryens'}, {'jon'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're right. You're not guilty of your father's crime. And I'm not beholden to my ancestor's vows.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Then why are you here?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Because I need your help and you need mine.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Did you see three dragons flying overhead when you arrived?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And did you see the Dothraki, all of whom have sworn to kill for me?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They're hard to miss.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But still, I need your help?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Not to defeat Cersei. You could storm King's Landing tomorrow and the city would fall. Hell, we almost took it and we didn't even have dragons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Almost.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But you haven't stormed King's Landing. Why not? The only reason I can see is you don't want to kill thousands of innocent people. It's the fastest way to win the war but you won't do it. Which means at the very least you're better than Cersei.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Still, that doesn't explain why I need your help.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Because right now you and I and Cersei and everyone else, we're children playing at a game screaming that the rules aren't fair.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You told me you liked this man.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I do.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: In the time since he's met me he's refused to call me queen, he's refused to bow and now he's calling me a child.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I believe he's calling all of us children. Figure of speech.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your Grace, everone you know will die before winter is over if we don't defeat the enemy to the north.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: As far as I can see, you are the enemy to the north.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I am not your enemy. The dead are the enemy.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The dead?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Is that another figure of speech?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Army of the Dead is on the march.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Army of the Dead?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You don't know me well, My Lord, but do you think I am a liar or a madman?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No, I don't think you're either of those things.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Army of the Dead is real. The White Walkers are real. The Knight King is real. I've seen them. If they get past the wall and we're squabbling amongst ourselves --

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: we're finished.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I was born at Dragonstone. Not that I can remember it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We fled before Robert's assassins could find us. Robert was your father's best friend, no? I wonder if your father knew his best friend sent assassins to murder a baby girl in her crib. Not that it matters now of course. I spent my life in foreign lands. So many men have tried to kill me. I don't remember all of their names. I have been sold like a brood mare. I have been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled. Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile? Faith. Not in any gods. Not in myths and legends. In myself. In Daenerys Targaryen. The world hadn't seen a dragon in centuries until my children were born. The Dothraki hadn't crossed the sea. Any sea.
ners: [{'robert'}, {'robert'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'daenerys'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They did for me. I was born to rule the Seven Kingdoms. And I will.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You'll be ruling over a graveyard if we don't defeat the Night King.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The war against my sister has already begun. You can't expect us to halt hostilities and join you in fighting --

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: whatever you saw beyond the wall.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You don't believe him. I understand that. It sounds like nonsense.

Name: davos
Subtitles: But if destiny has brough Daenerys Targaryen back to our shores, it has also made Jon Snow King in the North. You were the first to bring Dothraki to Westeros. He was the first to make allies with Wildlings and northmen. He was named Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. He was named King in the North. Not because of his birthright. He has no birthright. He's a damn bastard. All those hard son's of bitches chose him as their leader because they believe in him.
ners: [{'daenerys', 'jon'}, {'dothraki'}, {'wildlings'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: davos
Subtitles: All those things you don't believe in, he faced those things. He fought those things for the good of his people. He risked his life for his people. He took a knife in the heart for his people. He gave his own --

Name: davos
Subtitles: If we don't put asside our enmities and band together we will die. And then it doesn't matter whose skeleton sits on the Iron Throne.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If it doesn't matter you might as well kneel.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Swear your allegiance to Queen Daenerys. Help her to defeat my sister and together our armies will protect the north.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's no time for that. There's no time for any of this. While we stand here debating --

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It takes no time to bend the knee. Pledge your sword to her cause.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And why would I do that?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I mean no offense, Your Grace, but I don't know you. As far as I can tell your claim to the throne rests entirely on your father's name. And my own father fought to overthrow the Mad King. The lords of the north placed their trust in me to lead them. And I will continue to do so as well as I can.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That's fair. It's also fair to point out that I'm the rightful queen of the Seven Kingdoms. By declaring yourself king of the northern most kingdom, you are in open rebellion.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You must forgive my manners. You will both be tired after your long journey. We'll have baths drawn for you and supper sent to your rooms.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Am I your prisoner?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not yet.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Our Iron Born and Dornish allies were attacked on route to Dorne.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Two or three ships escaped. The rest sunk our captured. Ellaria and the sand snakes dead or captured. The Greyjoys are dead or captured.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: All of them?

Name: captain
Subtitles: Your sister's dead?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Euron has her.

Name: captain
Subtitles: You saw him take her? And you got away?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I couldn't save her. I tried.

Name: captain
Subtitles: You wouldn't be here if you tried.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: This is the life. Look at them. Cheering for a Greyjoy.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I have to be honest, it's making me hard. Did you see little Theon's face right before he jumped overboard?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Oh no!

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: What a twat.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: My queen. Please accept this gift on behalf of all of your loyal subjects in the Iron Islands.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I give you --

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: what no other man could give. Justice. Justice for your murdered daughter.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You've proven yourself the greatest captain on the 14 seas and a true friend to the crown.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: A bit more than a true friend.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And you deserve a proper reward for your heroism.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: There's only one reward I want.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You shall have what your heart desires --

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: when the war is won.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: With Euron Greyjoy commanding our naval forces and Jaime Lannister leading our armies, the sons and daugters of Westeros shall defend our country.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: There's nothing quite like it, is there? The love of the people. I suppose you wouldn't know.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This same mob spat at my sister not long ago, and if you turn on us, they'll cheer to see your head mounted on a spike.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Or yours. They just like severed heads really. Listen, if you have any advice at all I'd love to hear it when we have an hour or two to speak as brothers.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Advice?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Does she like it gentle or rough? A finger in the bum?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Shhh, shhh, shhh, not now. We'll talk later.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I want you to know I understand. Even though we're enemies, you and I, I understand the fear that drives you. I was there that day when Ser Gregor crushed your lover's head. I close my eyes I can hear the sound of Oberyn's skull breaking.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The sound of your scream. I never heard a sound like that. I thought, that's true love. Oberyn looked beautiful that day. He really did. No one moved like him. No one had such skill with a spear. Even Ser Gregor couldn't stop him. If only he hadn't taunted him. He could have walked away and left poor Ser Gregor to die. But that wasn't your lover's way, was it? Now he's burried somewhere. And here Ser Gregor is stronger than ever. That must be difficult for you. When my daughter was taken from me, my only daughter, well, you can't imagine how that feels unless you've lost a child. I fed her at my own breast even though they told me to give her to the wet nurse. I couldn't bear to see her in another woman's arms. I never got to have a mother. But Myrcella did. She was mine and you took her from me. Why did you do that?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), {'oberyn'}, set(), set(), set(), {'gregor'}, set(), {'ser'}, set(), set(), {'ser'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'myrcella'}, set(), set()]

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It doesn't matter now.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your daughter is a beauty too. Brown eyes, those lips. A perfect Dornish beauty.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I imagine she is your favorite.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I know, I know, we're not supposed to have favorites. But still, we're only human. We love who we love.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry. I can't understand you. The gag makes it difficult to understand what you're saying. It must be frustrating.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We all make our choices. You chose to murder my daughter. You must have felt powerful after you made that choice.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do you feel powerful now? I don't sleep very well, not at all really. I lie in bed and I stare at the canopy and imagine ways of killing my enemies. How to destroy Ellaria Sand, the woman who murdered my only daughter. I thought about having Ser Gregor crush your skull the way he did Oberyn's. It would be poetic I suppose but fast. Too fast.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I thought about having him crush your daughter's skull.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She's so beautiful. The thought of this lovely face cracking open like a duck egg, no, it's just not right.

Name: tyene
Subtitles: Momma!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Qyburn, he's the cleverest man I know. Clever enough to learn what poison you used to murder Myrcella. The long goodbye, was that it?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: The Long Farewell.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's the one.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How long does the poison take?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Difficult to say. Hours, days, it depends on the subject's constitution.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: But death is certain?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Oh yes, Your Grace, quite certain.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Your daughter will die here in this cell. You will be here watching when she does. You will be here the rest of your days. If you refuse to eat we will force food down your throat. You will live to watch your daughter rot, to watch that beautiful face collapse to bone and dust all the while contemplating the choices you've made.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Make sure the guards change the torches every few hours. I don't want her to miss a thing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Don't.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What are you doing? No one can see us like this ?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I am queen of the Seven Kingdoms. I'll do as I please.

Name: messenger
Subtitles: Forgive me, Your Grace. The visitor from Braavos has arrived.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Good. And we'll need fresh sheets for the bed.

Name: messenger
Subtitles: At once, Your Grace.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: No, thank you.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: My condolences, Your Grace, on the death of your son. From all reports he was a fine young man.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Iron Bank didn't send you hear to offer condolences.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Condolences and congratulations. You've become the first ruling queen in the Seven Kingdoms. That's quite an accomplishment. The Iron Bank appreciates how you cast off the yoke of superstition freeing the crown from elements that sought to subvert the rule of law.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The destruction of the Sept of Baelor was a tragic accident.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Indeed. But sometimes tragedies are necessary to restore order and rational leadership.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Iron Bank wants its gold back.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Your father never minced words either. But, yes, your debts are considerable. And you are now engaged in a conflict on several fronts. We both know how expensive war can be.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And we both know gold wins wars. Your vaults are empty. Your late husbando s profligacy saw to that.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Your wealthiest ally is the Tyrells who are now your enemies. You're surrounded on all sides by rivals for the throne.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And the Iron Bank wants to bet on a winner.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: We don't make bets. We invest in endeavors we deem likely to be successful.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's a fancy way of saying bet. The war has already begun. I've drawn first blood. I decapitated the Dornish snake. My armada owns the Narrow Sea.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Euron Greyjoy's armada owns the Narrow Sea.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Euron Greyjoy is loyal to me.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: For now. Daenerys Targaryen has three full grown dragons. How well do wooden ships fare against fire breathing dragons?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Her dragons might not be as invulnerable as some think. Now, let's talk about the Targaryen girl. You want to invest in her? I'm guessing the Iron Bank invested considerable gold in the slave trade. How are you profits now that Daenerys has freed all the slaves?

Name: tycho
Subtitles: The slave trade has entered a down turn, it's true.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: From what I gather she considers herself more of a revolutionary that a monarch. In your experience how do bankers usually fare with revoltionaries?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Lannisters owe the Iron Bank quite a lot of money but Lannisters always pay their debts. Do former slaves or Dothraki or dragons?

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Your father's daughter indeed.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Give me a fortnight. Stay in King's Landing as my honored guest and when you return to Braavos I swear to you my debt will be paid in full.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I came out here to brood over my failure to predict the Greyjoy attack. You're making it difficult. You look a lot better brooding than I do. You make me feel like I'm failing at brooding over failing.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm a prisoner on this island.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I wouldn't say you're a prisoner on this island. You're free to walk the castle, the beaches, to go wherever you want.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Except to my ship. They took my ship.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I wouldn't say we took your ship.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm not playing word games with you. The dead are coming for us all.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Why don't you figure out what to do about my missing fleet and murdered allies, and I'll figure out what to do about your walking dead men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's hard for me to fathom. It really is. If someone told me about the White Walkers and the Night King --

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You probably don't believe me.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I do actually.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You didn't before. Grumpkins and snarks you called them. Do you remember? You said it was all nonsense.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It was all nonsense. Everybody knew it. But then Mormont saw them and you saw them, and I trust the eyes of an honest man more than I trust what everybody knows.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How do I convince people who don't know me that an enemey they don't believe in is coming to kill them all?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good question.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I know it's a good question. I'm looking for an answer.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: People's minds aren't made for problems that large. White Walkers, the Night King, Army of the Dead, it's almost a relief to confront a familiar monster like my sister.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I need to help prepare my people for what's coming. I can't help them from here. I'd like to leave.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It seems unlikely that you became King in the North by giving up that easily.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Everyone told me to learn from my father's mistakes. Don't go south. Don't answer a summons from the Mad King's daughter, a foreign invader. And here I am. A northern fool.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Children are not their fathers, luckily for all of us. And sometimes there's more to foreign invaders than northern fools that meets the eye. Daenerys could have sailed for Westeros long ago but she didn't. Instead she stayed where she was and saved many people from horrible fates some of whom are on this island with us right now. While you're our guest here you might consider asking them what they think of the Mad King's daughter. She protects people from monsters, just as you do. That's why she came here. And she's not about to head north to fight an enemy she's never seen on a word of a man she doesn't know after a single meeting. That's not a reasonable thing to ask.
ners: [set(), set(), {'daenerys'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So do you have anything reasonable to ask?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What do you mean?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Maybe you are a northern fool. I'm asking if there's something I can do to help you.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dragonglass?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes. Volcanic glass, obsidian. He says you have a tremendous amount of it here.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Why are we talking about glass? We just lost two of our allies.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Which is why I was speaking to Jon Snow, a potential ally.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what does the King in the North want with Dragonglass?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Apparently it can be turned into weapons that kill White Walkers and their foot soldiers, or stop them, destroy them. I'm unsure of the nomenclature.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And what do you think of this Army of the Dead and White Walkers and Night Kings?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'd very much like to believe that Jon Snow is wrong, but a wise man once said that you should never believe a thing simply because you want to believe it.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Which wise man said this?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't remember.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Are you trying to present your own statements as ancient wisdom?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I would never do that...to you. The reason I believe Jon Snow is because he's here. All of his advisors would have told him not to come. I would have told him not to come, yet he's here anyway. You don't have to believe him. Let him mine the Dragonglass. If he's wrong it's worthless. You didn't even know it was here. It's nothing to you. Give him something by giving him nothing. Take a step toward a more productive relationship with a possible ally. Keep him occupied while we focus on the task at hand. Casterly Rock.
ners: [set(), {'jon'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What was that Ser Davos said about taking a knife in the heart for his people? Did you notice that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You must allow them their flights of fancy. It's dreary in the north.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Amazing thing to see.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I named them for my brothers Vicerys and Rhaegon. They're both gone now.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You lost two brothers as well?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: People thought dragons were gone forever but here they are. Perhaps we should all be examining what we think we know.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You've been talking to Tyrion?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He is my Hand.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He enjoys talking.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We all enjoy what we're good at.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You know I'm not going to let Cersei stay on the Iron Throne.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I never expected that you would.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And I haven't changed my mind about which kingdoms belong to the throne.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I haven't either.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will allow you to mine the Dragonglass and forge weapons from it. Any resources or men you need I will provide for you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: So you believe me then about the Night King and the Army of the Dead?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You better get to work, Jon Snow.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: How much do we have?

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: 4,000 bushels, My Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What does that mean?

Name: yohn
Subtitles: For the current occupants of the castle it's enough food for a year, perhaps more.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What's the longest winter in the past 100 years?

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: I'm not entirely certain. I'll check Maester Llewyn's records. He kept a copy of every raven scroll.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're telling me we don't have enough food, especially not if the armies of the north come back to defend Winterfell.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: No, My Lady, most likely not.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We must prepare for that eventuality. Every direction the threat comes from, this is the best place to be. We need to start building up our grain stores with regular shipments from every keep in the north. If we don't use it by winter's end we'll give it back to them, but if the entire north has to flee to Winterfell there won't be enough time to bring wagonloads of grain with them.

Name: yohn
Subtitles: Very wise, My Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Maester Wolkan, you'll see to it?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Are they covering those breastplates in leather?

Name: yohn
Subtitles: No, My Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Well, shouldn't they be once the real cold comes?

Name: yohn
Subtitles: They should indeed. Pardon me, My Lady.

Name: yohn
Subtitles: You there, why isn't there leather on these?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Command suits you. The northerns are all facing north worried about the threat beyond the wall.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So they should be.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I know Cersei better than anyone here. If you turn your back on her --

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You don't know Cersei better than anyone here.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I only meant to say --

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: That the woman who murdered my mother, father and brother is dangerous? Thank you for your wise council.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: One of two things will happen. Either the dead will defeat the living, in which case all our troubles come to an end. Or life will win out. And what then?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Don't fight in the north or the south. Fight every battle everywhere always in your mind. Everyone is your enemy, everyone is your friend, every possible series of events is happening all at once. Live that way and nothing will surprise you. Everything that happens will be something that you've seen before.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Lady Sansa, at the gate.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Hello, Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I wish Jon was here.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Yes. I need to speak to him.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Your father's last living true born son. You're Lord of Winterfell.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I can never be the Lord of Winterfell. I can never be lord of anything. I'm the three-eyed raven.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I don't know what that means.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It's difficult to explain.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Try, please, for me.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It means I can see everything. Everything that's ever happened to everyone. Everything that's happening right now. It's all pieces, fragments. I need to learn to see better. When the long night comes again I need to be ready.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: How do you know all of this?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: The three-eyed raven taught me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I thought you were the three-eyed raven.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I told you it's difficult to explain.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Bran --

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm sorry for all that's happened to you. I'm sorry it had to happen here at our home. It was so beautiful that night. Snow falling just like now. And you were so beautiful in your white wedding dress.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I have to go back inside, Bran.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'll stay a bit longer.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Hmm.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Hmm. Does it hurt?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: A bit. Less than before.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: The infection no longer appears to be active.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Unusual. Unlikely. One could almost be forgiven for thinking the entire upper layer of diseased skin was debrided and the underlying region treated with some sort of ointment.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I don't know anything about that. I just started feeling better. I assumed it was the rest that did it.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: And the climate.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: The climate? You're free to go, Ser. This chamber is needed for the infectious, which you are no longer.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Tarley, I'd like to speak with you in my study this evening.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: How bad is it?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I suppose I'll find out this evening.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Where will you go?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I surrendered to this sickness the moment I first saw it. I knew it would kill me or I'd kill myself before it could. Daenerys Stormborn convinced me otherwise. The only place for me is with her.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I owe my life to her and you.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Your father saved me more than once. It's the least I could do.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Perhaps our paths will cross again?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I hope they do.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: You treated him?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Who told you to treat him?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No one.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Who forbade you or anyone to attempt to treat him?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I seem to remember you.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: But you treated him anyway?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I did.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I forbade it because it's dangerous and rarely successful. Especially on someone of that age. You could have infected yourself and others. You could have devastated the entire Citadel. But you didn't. It's a meticulous, difficult procedure. Many maesters whose chains are heavy with healing links have attempted it and failed. But you succeeded. How?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I read the books and followed the instructions.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: That man is alive because of you. You should be proud.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Thank you, Archmaester.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Come here.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: All these manuscripts and scrolls and rotting away. I need you to make copies of them.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: You were expecting a reward? Your reward is not being immediately expelled from the Citadel. You'd better get started. Be mindful of the paper mites. They like flesh as well.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We need to find Euron Greyjoy's fleet and sink it.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Your Grace, he's already destroyed a good portion of our fleet. To send our remaining ships after him --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not talking about sending our ships after him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But you'll have to go yourself. Euron's ships could be anywhere or in more than one place. You'd be flying around the open seas alone for who knows how long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I wouldn't be alone. I'd have Drogon, Vicerion and Rhaegal. What can anyone do to them?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: They can still do something to you. It only takes one arrow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's too great a risk. You're too important.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What about Casterly Rock?

Name: varys
Subtitles: The Unsullied will be there soon.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: And what will they face?

Name: varys
Subtitles: A difficult situation. They know we're coming.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes. Cersei believes my sole purpose in life is to destroy House Lannister. She will be ready.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No one has ever taken the rock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Lannister army is still the army my father built. Well trained and well provisioned. 10,000 men at least. They will see us coming.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They will be ready.

Name: man
Subtitles: Draw! Loose!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The gates of Casterly Rock are impregnable.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The fight up the walls will be hard. We'll be at a disadvantage. Many men will die.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Interesting thing about my father. He built our house up from near ruin. He built our army. He built Casterly Rock as we know it, but he didn't build the sewers. That was beneath him. So he gave the job to the lowest person he could find. Me. He was right. I was low. The company I kept low, women mostly. They weren't welcome at the Rock. Father disapproved of that sort of behavior. I couldn't walk them through the front gates. I couldn't have them in my chambers. So in the process of building the sewers I threw in something for myself.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It was a passage that began by the sea and ended beneath one of the main guard towers.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: No better place for low pursuits. Casterly Rock, the impregnable fortress.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: As a good friend of mine once said, "give me 10 good men and I'll impregnate the bitch."

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And so it begins. They will face the bulk of the Lannister forces. They will be outnumbered. They will have less armor and fewer weapons.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: But as my sister's armies fights for her, the Unsullied will be fighting for something greater. They will be fighting for freedom and the person who gave it to them. They will be fighting for you. And that is why they will triump.

Name: unsullied
Subtitles: There are none left.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: There are supposed to be more than this. Many more.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Where are they? Where are the rest of the Lannisters?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: It's done?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It is.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And now the rains weep for our whores. Did we fight well?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I suppose as well as can be expected.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: It was never our forte. Golden roses indeed. Your brother and his new queen thought you would be defending Casterly Rock.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The truth is Casterly Rock isn't worth much anymore. Well, it is to me. My fond childhood memories won't keep Cersei on the throne.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: So you'll just let them take it?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: For now. They won't be able to hold it. Euron Greyjoy's navy burned their ships, we emptied the larders before we left. Eventually they'll be forced to abandon their position and march all the way across Westeros.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: And you took your army, your real army, and went where they weren't?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: As Robb Stark did to me at Whispering Wood. There are always lessons in failures.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Yes. You must be very wise by now.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: My father always said I was a slow learner.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: If he was so clever why didn't he take Highgarden the moment your gold mines ran dry? I suppose I'll be able to ask him myself soon enough. No more learning from my mistakes, eh? How will you do it? With that sword?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: That was Joffrey's sword, wasn't it? Not that he ever used it. What did he call it?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Widow's Wail.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: He really was a cunt, wasn't he? I did unspeakable things to protect my family, or watched them being done on my orders. I never lost a night's sleep over them. They were necessary. And whatever I imagined necessary for the safety of House Tyrell I did. But your sister has done things I wasn't capable of imagining. That was my prize mistake, a failure of imagination. She's a monster, you do know that?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), {'tyrell'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: To you, sure. To others as well. But after we've won and there's no one left to oppose us, the people living peaceful in the world she built, do you really think they'll wring their hands over the way she built it?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: You love her. You really do love her. You poor fool. She'll be the end of you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Possibly. Not much to be gained from discussing it with you though, is there?

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: What better person to discuss it with? What better guarantee could you have that the things you say will never leave this room? But perhaps you're right. If she's driven you this far it's gone beyond your control.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Yes, it has.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: She's a disease. I regret my role in spreading it. You will too.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I think we're done here.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: How will it happen?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Cersei had several ideas. Whipping you through the streets and beheading you in front of the Red Keep. Flaying you alive and hanging you from the walls of King's Landing. I talked her out of those.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: Will there be pain?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No. I made sure of that.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: That's good.

Name: olenna tyrell
Subtitles: I'd hate to die like your son clawing at my neck, foam and bile spilling from my mouth, eyes blood red, skin purple. It must have been horrible for you as a Kingsguard, as a father. It was horrible enough for me. A shocking scene. Not at all what I intended. You see, I'd never seen the posion work before. Tell Cersei. I want her to know it was me.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'cersei'}, set()]

Name: end
Subtitles: CREDITS

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Halt that wagon!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: opens the carriage. It is filled with gold bars and coins. He picks up a large sack and hands it to BRONN.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You just won the biggest prize in the world. What could you possibly have to be upset about? Come on. You can tell me. Queen of Thorns give you one last prick in the balls before saying goodbye?

Name: jaime lannister
