Subtitles: I'll save my confessions for the High Septon.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: There is no more High Septon.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, there isn't, is there?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: There is still the question of my prize.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: is putting a padlock on the wagon bearing the gold. He stops and turns to BRONN.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That's a lot of money I just gave you.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: It's not a castle.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: turns and points to Highgarden.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: How about that one? It's available.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You don't want Highgarden.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I beg to differ.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We're at war. Daenerys Targaryen could come take it back the day after you move in. Besides, think of the upkeep. The more you own, the more it weighs you down.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh, is that why you're so fucking glum, eh? All your new riches weighing you down?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: pounds on the back of the carriage and the horses start trotting.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They're not mine. The gold belongs to the Iron Bank. We pay our debts.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Right. Just not to me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Bronn of the Blackwater, formerly of whatever nameless shit heap you're from with a saddlebag full of gold complaining about not getting paid. When we win this war all the castles in the Seven Kingdoms will be yours to choose from with no one left to take them away from you.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Yes, I'm sure Queen Cersei's reign will be quiet and peaceful.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Stranger things have happened.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Like what?

Name: randyll
Subtitles: TARLEY and his son DICKON come riding up on horseback. RANDYLL addresses JAIME.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: The granaries are being emptied and loaded into wagons, My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The current harvest?

Name: dickon
Subtitles: We have teams of men collecting it and more farmers in the Reach.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: looks over to BRONN.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ser Bronn, will you accompany the Tarleys and help them accelerate this process?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I'm not much for shoveling weight.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, but motivating reluctant farmers to hand over their harvest, I've heard you guys have a real talent for that.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: My Lord.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: My Lord.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: DICKON and BRONN break away from the Lannister army and ride into the distance. Horse drawn carts are carrying spoils from Highgarden and Lannister men are marching down the road.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: and TYCHO NESTORIS from the Iron Bank of Braavos are sitting having a discussion.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: I must say, I don't think the Iron Bank has ever had a debt of this magnitude repaid in a single installment. I always considered your father a very effective and efficient man, but you appear to be redefining those terms entirely.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're too kind, My Lord.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: I am neither kind, nor a lord, Your Grace. I am merely an instrument of the institution I represent, its wellbeing is a matter of arithmetic, not sentiment. And the current arithmetic is outstanding. The gold --

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Is on its way. My brother is supervising its transportation himself.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Some at the Iron Bank will be disappointed. They've grown rather fond of your interest payments.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: We must devise a way to raise their spirits.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Yes. Perhaps we could be of assistance in some current venture.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My only venture at the moment is reestablishing control over this continent and every person on it.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: I see a great deal of potential in that venture. I imagine that it would require outside investment?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It will indeed. I need to expand my armies, my navies. My hand, Qyburn, had made overtures to the Golden Company in Essos.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: I know them well. They've helped us recover significant sums from parties who had fallen into deep arrears.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's good to hear. I too would like them to recover some things that belong to me.

Name: tycho
Subtitles: Rest assured, Your Grace, you can count on the Iron Bank's support, as soon as the gold arrives.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: is sitting in a wheelchair. PETER BAELISH is sitting next to him. BAELISH unsheathes a Valyrian steel dagger and shows it to BRAN. It's the same dagger used in the attempt to assassinate BRAN years ago.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: This is for you.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: flips the knife in his hand and extends it towards BRAN.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The last man who wielded it meant to cut your throat, but your mother fought him off.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: reaches out and takes the knife, turning it and looking it over carefully.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: The other dagger, the one that took her life, I would have stopped that dagger with my own heart if I could have. I wasn't there for her when she needed me most. But I am here for her now. To do what she would have done, to protect her children. Anything I can do for you, Brandon, you need only ask.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Do you know who this belonged to?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: No. That very question was what started the War of the Five Kings. In a way, that dagger made you what you are today. Forced from your home, driven out to the wilds beyond the Wall. I imagine you've seen things most men wouldn't believe.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: hands the sheath of the knife to BRAN. BRAN slides the knife into the sheath.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: To go through all of that and make your way home again only to find such chaos in the world, I can only imagine --

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Chaos is a ladder.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: is staring at BAELISH. BAELISH stops speaking. The door opens and Meera appears.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I'm sorry to have disturbed you, Lord Stark.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: stands up to leave.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm not Lord Stark.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: bows and walks past Meera and closes the door.

Name: meera
Subtitles: notices BRAN sitting in a wheelchair.

Name: meera
Subtitles: What's that?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Maester Wolkan built it for me so I can move around more easily.

Name: meera
Subtitles: It's a very good idea.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You're leaving?

Name: meera
Subtitles: I don't want to leave you, but when they come I need to be with my family. And you're safe, safe as anyone can be now. You don't need me anymore.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No, I don't.

Name: meera
Subtitles: That's all you've got to say?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Thank you.

Name: meera
Subtitles: Thank you?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: For helping me.

Name: meera
Subtitles: My brother died for you. Hodor and Summer died for you. I almost died for you. Bran!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm not really, not anymore. I remember what it felt like to be Brandon Stark, but I remember so much else now.

Name: meera
Subtitles: begins to cry.

Name: meera
Subtitles: You died in that cave.

Name: meera
Subtitles: turns to walk out the door. She hesitates looking at BRAN, then walks out.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: approaches the main gate on foot. Two guards are huddled by a brazier getting warm. There's indistinct chatter. One of the men notice ARYA walking to the gate and approach her.

Name: man
Subtitles: Hey, oh. Where are you going?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: In there. I live here.

Name: man
Subtitles: Fuck off.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm Arya Stark. This is my home.

Name: man
Subtitles: Arya Stark is dead.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Send for Maester Llewyn or Ser Rodrick. They'll tell you who I am.

Name: man
Subtitles: There's no Rodrick here.

Name: man
Subtitles: Maester's name is Wolkan.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Go ask Jon Snow then, the King in the North. He's my brother

Name: man
Subtitles: He's a thousand miles away.

Name: man
Subtitles: It's cold. We're busy. So, you know, best fuck off.

Name: man
Subtitles: Mm-hmm.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: If Jon Snow is gone who is in charge of Winterfell?

Name: man
Subtitles: The Lady of Winterfell, Lady Stark.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Which Lady Stark?

Name: man
Subtitles: You tell us. You're the one impersonating her sister.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Tell Sansa her sister is home.

Name: man
Subtitles: Lady Sansa is too busy to waster her breath on you, just like us. So for the last time, fuck off.

Name: man
Subtitles: 1 goes to grab Arya but she easily dodges out of his grasp.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm getting into this castle one way or another. If I'm not who I say I am, I won't last long. But if I am, and Sansa finds out that you turned me away...

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: keeps glancing at the men. They look uneasy. They bring her inside of the gate. They indicate towards a cart near the entrance.

Name: man
Subtitles: You sit there. Right there. Don't move.

Name: man
Subtitles: Go tell Lady Stark. I'll watch her.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is glancing around Winterfell. Men are working building tools and cutting wood. ARYA looks over and sees a Winterfell flag sigil hanging from the wall. The two guards are still arguing.

Name: man
Subtitles: You tell her.

Name: man
Subtitles: I'm not.

Name: man
Subtitles: Because if you don't I'll hit you right in the fucking face as hard as I can.

Name: man
Subtitles: We told her to wait. We were standing right next to her.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: sighs.

Name: man
Subtitles: When we turned around she had gone, My Lady. She was nothing. Some winter town girl.

Name: man
Subtitles: She comes in asking for Ser Rodrick and Maester Llewyn.

Name: man
Subtitles: Don't trouble yourself over it, My Lady. We'll find her.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You don't have to. I know where she is.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is standing look at a statue of Ned Stark holding his sword. ARYA hears a sound and turns to see SANSA approaching. SANSA stops when she sees ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Do I have to call you Lady Stark now?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: hesitates for a moment.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: begins smiling then walking towards ARYA. SANSA reaches out and hugs ARYA.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You shouldn't have run from the guards.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I didn't run. You need better guards.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: smirks at ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It suits you, Lady Stark. Jon left you in charge?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He did. I hope he comes back soon. I remember how happy he was to see me. When he sees you, his heart will probably stop.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That doesn't look like him. It should have been carved by someone who knew his face.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Everyone who knew his face is dead.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: We're not.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: turns to face SANSA.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: They say you killed Joffrey. Did you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I wish I had.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Me too. I was angry when I heard someone else had done it. However long my list got he was always first.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Your list?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Of people I'm going to kill.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: begins to laugh. ARYA joins her.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: How did you get back to Winterfell?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's a long story. I imagine yours is too.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Yes. It's not a very pleasant one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Mine neither, but our stories aren't over yet.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, they're not.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya, Bran's home too.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: smiles and looks at SANSA. SANSA doesn't smile back. The smile fades from ARYA's face.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: is sitting next to the Weirwood tree. SANSA and ARYA approach. BRAN turns to look at them. BRAN begins speaking to ARYA.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You came home.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: steps forward and throws her arms around BRAN. SANSA smiles in the background. ARYA lets go and steps back.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I saw you at the crossroads.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You saw me?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I see quite a lot now.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Bran has visions.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I thought you might go to King's Landing.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So did I.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why would you go back there?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Cersei is on her list of names.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: stares at BRAN. ARYA turns to look at SANSA.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Who else is on your list?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Most of them are dead already.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: produces the Valyrian dagger that BAELISH gave him and unsheathes it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Where did you get this?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Littlefinger gave it to me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Littlefinger, he's here?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: turns to look at SANSA.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's declared for House Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: steps up closer to BRAN and speaks to him.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why would he give you a dagger?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He thought I'd want it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Why?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Because it was meant to kill me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: The cutthroat after your fall?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Why would a cutthroat have a Valyrian steel dagger?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Someone very wealthy wanted me dead.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: He's not a generous man. He wouldn't give you anything unless he thought he was getting something back.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It doesn't matter.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What do you mean it doesn't matter?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I don't want it.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: holds the knife out to ARYA. ARYA looks at BRAN.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you sure? It's Valyrian steel.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: It's wasted on a cripple.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: looks down at the dagger. She steps forward and takes it from BRAN.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is pushing BRAN in his wheelchair and SANSA is next to them. The Stark children are walking back through the gate of Winterfell. Men are milling around doing various jobs. BRIENNE and PODRICK see the Stark children all back at Winterfell together.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: Catelyn Stark would be proud. You kept your vow.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I did next to nothing.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: You're too hard on yourself, My Lady.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'm not a --

Name: brienne
Subtitles: pauses for a moment.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Thank you, Podrick.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: and MISSANDEI are walking along a path outside of Dragonstone followed by members of the Queensguard.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Your Grace, there's still no word from the Unsullied.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Soon. They will come back to me.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: He better.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: stops and turns to look at MISSANDEI. She then continues walking.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What happened?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: begins smirking.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Many things.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Many things?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: looks at MISSANDEI then her Queensguard. She speaks in Valyrian and motions to her guard to stand down.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It's all right.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: descends the stairs with MISSANDEI and they begin walking with JON. They walk along the beach until they reach a cave. DAVOS is waiting for them with a lit torch.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wanted you to see it before we start hacking it to bits.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: leads DAENERYS and MISSANDEI into the cave. He lights a brazier and illuminates the Dragonglass along the walls. He continues walking deeper into the cave.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: So this is it, all we'll ever need.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: is looking up at the walls of Dragonglass.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There is something else I want to show your, Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: and DAENERYS go to a further chamber in the cave. There are murals painted on the walls of Dragonglass.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The Children of the Forest made these.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: When?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: A very long time ago.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They were right here standing where we're standing before there were Targaryens or Starks or Lannisters. Maybe even before there were men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: stops looking at the walls and turns to look at JON. JON walks to another wall and begins to examine the murals. The murals depict Children of the Forest and the First Men standing together.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They were here together the Children and the First Men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Doing what? Fighting each other?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: takes DAENERYS by the arm and swings her torch to another part of the wall. There is a mural of the Night King and White Walkers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They fought together against their common enemy. Despite their differences, despite their suspicions, together. We need to do the same if we're going to survive.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: and DAENERYS look back at the wall with the Night King.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Because the enemy is real. It's always been real.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns to look at JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And you say you can't defeat them without my armies and my dragons?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No, I don't think I can.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: steps forward closer to JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I will fight for you. I will fight for the north...when you bend the knee.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My people won't accept a southern ruler, not after everything they've suffered.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: steps even closer to JON until they're face to face.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They will if their king does. They chose you to lead them. They chose you to protect them. Isn't their survival more important than your pride?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: and DAENERYS, DAVOS and MISSANDEI are walking out of the cave. As they exit TYRION and VARYS are standing on the beach awaiting them. DAENERYS begins addressing Tyrion.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We took Casterly Rock.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: That's very good to hear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: and VARYS look at each other. They aren't eager to deliver the bad news.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Isn't it?

Name: davos
Subtitles: You'll want to discuss this amongst yourselves. Perhaps --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You will stay. All my allies are gone. They've been taken from me while I've been sitting here on this island.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We still have the largest army.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who won't be able to eat because Cersei has taken all the food from the Reach.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Call Grey Worm and the Unsullied back. We still have enough ships to carry the Dothraki to the mainland. Commit to the blockade of King's Landing. We have a plan. It's still the right plan.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: stops walking, turns and speaks harshly to Tyrion.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The right plan? Your strategy has lost us Dorne, the Iron Islands and the Reach.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If I've underestimated our enemies --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Our enemies? Your family, you mean. Perhaps you don't want to hurt them after all.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: begins looking out to the ocean. Three dragons are flying in the sky over the water.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Enough with the clever plans.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns back and looks at TYRION.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I have three large dragons. I'm going to fly them to the Red Keep.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We've discussed this.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: My enemies are in the Red Keep. What kind of a queen am I if I'm not willing to risk my life to fight them?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: A smart one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: looks over to JON SNOW.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What do you think I should do?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I would never presume to --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm at war. I'm losing.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: begins walking close to JON.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: looks over the ocean at the dragons flying.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I never thought that dragons would exist again. No one did. The people who follow you know that you made something impossible happen. Maybe that helps them believe that you can make other impossible things happen. Build a world that's different from the shit one they've always known.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: glances back towards the dragons.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But if you use them to melt castles and burn cities, you're not different. You're just more of the same.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: looks back out to her dragons flying along the water.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: and PODRICK are sparring. BRIENNE kicks PODS foot out from under him and he lands face first in the dirt.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Don't lunge.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: pushes himself back up and picks up his sword. PODRICK attacks again. Brienne blocks his blows and kicks his foot out again.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Don't go where your enemy leads you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is watching the sparring session from across the courtyard. She begins to approach Brienne.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Up.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: begins striking at PODRICK while he blocks her blows. BRIENNE hits PODRICK in the stomach with the hilt of her sword and PODRICK lands on the ground.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: And don't --

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Don't fight someone like her in the first place.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: stands up and retrieves his sword. ARYA walks closer to speak to BRIENNE.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Nice sword. Very nice dagger.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: looks down at the Valyrian dagger and unsheathes it. She approaches BRIENNE flipping the knife several times in her fingers. BRIENNE takes the dagger and examines it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: and BAELISH are walking along the upper section of the courtyard having a conversation.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: If they haven't contributed the right amount of grain to the stores then I'm afraid they'll have to make due with --

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: sees ARYA in the courtyard speaking with BRIENNE and stops to watch her.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: It's been awhile since I've trained.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I can go and find the Master of Arms for you, My Lady.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He didn't beat the hound. You did. I want to train with you.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: chuckles.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You swore to serve both of my mother's daughters, didn't you?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: nods her head in agreement.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Move aside, Podrick.

Name: podrick
Subtitles: backs away. ARYA draws her sword, Needle.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You can't use that, My Lady. It's too small.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I won't cut you. Don't worry.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: smirks and raises her sword to a fighting posture.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I'll try not to.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: strikes at ARYA who quickly sidesteps and parries the attack. BRIENNE attacks again and ARYA sidesteps, dodges multiple strikes and parries BRIENNE while smiling. ARYA strikes at BRIENNE and hits her hand causing BRIENNE to flinch and lose her two-handed grip on her sword. BRIENNE regains composure and starts to circle ARYA. BAELISH and SANSA are still watching from the upper balcony. ARYA is waiting for an attack with her sword behind her back. BRIENNE strikes and ARYA blocks her attacks, spins and stabs behind her back and hits BRIENNE in the knee causing BRIENNE's sword to strike the dirt. BRIENNE kicks ARYA in the stomach and sends ARYA to the ground. ARYA quickly gets back to her feet. BRIENNE overpowers ARYA and ARYA drops her sword on the ground. BRIENNE strikes again but ARYA dodges, draws her Valyrian dagger and puts it near BRIENNE's neck. BRIENNE and ARYA both stop fighting and sheathe their weapons smiling.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Who taught you to do that?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: collects her sword. SANSA walks away. BAELISH remains on the balcony staring at ARYA who looks up at him. BAELISH bows to ARYA and walks away.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: and DAVOS are walking along the paths outside of Dragonstone having a discussion.

Name: davos
Subtitles: What do you think of her?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Who?

Name: davos
Subtitles: sighs

Name: davos
Subtitles: I believe you know of whom I speak.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I think she has a good heart.

Name: davos
Subtitles: A good heart? I've noticed you starring at that good heart.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's no time for that. I saw the Night King, Davos. I looked into his eyes. How many men do we have in the north to fight him? 10,000? Less?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Fewer.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What?

Name: davos
Subtitles: and JON near the end of the path. MISSANDEI is standing along the path looking at the ocean.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Speaking of good hearts, Missandei of Naarth.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: turns to looks at DAVOS and JON.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Ser Davos, Lord Snow.

Name: davos
Subtitles: King Snow, isn't it? No? That doesn't sound right. King Jon?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It doesn't matter.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Forgive me, but may I ask a question?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Your name is Jon Snow, but your father's name was Ned Stark?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm a bastard. My mother and father weren't married.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Is the custom different in Naarth?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: We don't have marriage in Naarth so the concept of a bastard doesn't exist.

Name: davos
Subtitles: The sounds liberating.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Why did you leave your homeland?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I was stolen away by slavers.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm sorry.

Name: davos
Subtitles: If I may, how did a slave girl come to advise Daenerys Targaryen?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: She bought me from my master and set me free.

Name: davos
Subtitles: That was good of her. Of course you're serving her now, aren't you?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I serve my queen because I want to serve my queen. Because I believe in her.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And if you wanted to sail home to Naarth tomorrow --

Name: missandei
Subtitles: Then she would give me a ship and wish me good fortune.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You believe that?

Name: missandei
Subtitles: I know it. All of us who came with her from Essos, we believe in her. She's not our queen because she's the daughter of some king we never knew. She's the queen we chose.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You'll forgive me if I switch sides.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: notices a single ship sailing into the bay. It has a kraken sigil. MISSANDEI turns to look.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Is that a Greyjoy ship?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: GREYJOY and other Iron Born are pulling their landing boat onto the beach wading through the surf. They pull the boat onto the sand. JON SNOW, MISSANDEI, DAVOS and Dothraki guards are waiting to meet them. JON sees THEON and both men freeze and stare at each other. JON steps forward towards THEON.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Jon. I didn't know you were here.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: steps closer to JON.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Sansa, is she all right?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: grabs THEON by his shirt and pulls him face to face.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What you did for her is the only reason I'm not killing you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: releases THEON.

Name: davos
Subtitles: We heard your uncle attacked your fleet. We thought you were dead.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I should be.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your sister?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Euron has her. I came to ask the queen to help get her back.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The queen is gone.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Where did she go?

Name: randyll
Subtitles: All of the gold is safely through the gates of King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Good.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: We need to get the last of these wagons over the Blackwater Rush before nightfall. If the head of the line is ambushed, the tail will never be able to reinforce in time.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We are stretched a bit thin.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: With your permission, flogging stragglers has a marked effect on mobility.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Let's give them fair warning first. These men fought well at Highgarden.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: is clearly disappointed. He turns and rides off back to the line of soldiers. JAIME and BRONN exchange glances, then follow RANDYLL. BRONN and JAIME are riding through the ranks. DICKON TARLEY sees JAIME and starts a conversation.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Rickon.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: Dickon.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: openly laughs in DICKON's face and looks at JAIME.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I hear you fought bravely at Highgarden. Your first battle?

Name: dickon
Subtitles: nods his head in agreement.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And?

Name: dickon
Subtitles: It was glorious.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Come on. Your father's not here.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: All my life we've been pledged to House Tyrell. I knew some of those men. I hunted with them.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: They didn't deserve to die. But Lady Olenna chose to betray the queen and support the Targaryen girl. So here we are.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: I didn't expect it to smell like that.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Men shit themselves when they die. Didn't they teach you that at fancy lad school?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: looks over at BRONN

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Well, I learned it when I was 5.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: pauses and strains to hear a noise far in the distance.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Listen.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Spears and shields! Spears and shields!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Spears and shields!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: In line now!

Name: randyll
Subtitles: is riding across the battlefield yelling orders to men.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Come on, lads. Not those wagons. Fall in line. Fall in line.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: draws his sword. RANDYLL is yelling orders to the men.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Spears armed!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Get back to King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not abandoning my army.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You're a commander, not a damned infantryman. These fuckers are about to swamp us.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We can hold them off.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dracarys!

Name: drogon
Subtitles: breathes fire into the first line of Lannister soldiers. The men burst into flames and start screaming. DICKON looks on in shock. A flanking group of Dothraki Screamers ride over the flames through the hole created by Drogon and start cutting men down. JAIME attempts to issue orders to the men.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Hold the line!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Archers! Archers with me!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Knock!

Name: archers
Subtitles: Knock! Draw!

Name: drogon
Subtitles: loops around and is making a pass on JAIME and the archers. DAENERYS and DROGON are diving at the group of men.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Loose!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Qyburn's scorpion is over there.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Go get it then.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I can't shoot with one hand.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: holds up his gold hand to illustrate his point.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: hesitates for a moment. He turns his horse and rides to man the artillery crossbow. JAIME draws his sword and rides into battle.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Come on!

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Where are you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: walks to the edge of the battlefield accompanied by Dothraki guards. He can see Lannisters being slaughtered. One of the Dothraki guards begin to speak.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Your people can't fight.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: is watching the mayhem. Men are screaming and engulfed in flames. Horses and carriages run wild with no driver. JAIME is still on the battlefield struggling against the horde. Burning Lannister men are taking off their helmets revealing melted faces. Men crawl to the river in search of relief from the dragonfire. DROGON and DAENERYS are flying over the river creating wake in the water. JAIME sees her approaching his position.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Take cover!

Name: drogon
Subtitles: spits flames into the Lannister position. The men standing there are reduced to standing ash. The wind blows them away. BRONN is lining up DROGON in the sights of the crossbow. He reaches down and pulls the lever to fire. A bolt sails past DROGON and misses. BRONN reloads the machine. DROGON and DAENERYS circle around and dive on the crossbow. BRONN takes his time aiming his shot.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Come on you fucker.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: commands DROGON to fire at the crossbow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Flee, you idiot!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: looks at DAENERYS and readies himself. He spurs his horse onward.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Come on, boy. Come on!

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: grabs the spear as he rides by and brings it up to position. JAIME's horse is galloping full speed on the edge of the river kicking up water. TYRION is watching JAIME's attempt to kill DAENERYS.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You fucking idiot.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: is getting close. DAENERYS turns at the last moment to see JAIME bearing down on her spear in hand. DROGON notices JAIME, turns his head and spews flames. BRONN appears from nowhere and manages to dive off of his horse and knock JAIME and himself in the water before they're both consumed by fire. Their horses are instantly burned to death. JAIME is being dragged down by a full set of armor into the dark water. JAIME sinks into blackness and out of sight.

Name: end
Subtitles: CREDITS

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You could have killed me.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: What the fuck were you doing back there?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Ending the war by killing her.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You saw the dragon between you and her?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: looks incredulously at JAIME.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: And?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: sits up and says nothing to BRONN. BRONN sits up and faces JAIME.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Listen to me, cunt. Till I get what I'm owed, a dragon doesn't get to kill you. You don't get to kill you. Only I get to kill you.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: That was only one of them. She has two more. If she decides to use them, to really use them --

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You're fucked.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Don't you mean we're fucked?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: No, I do not. Dragons are where our partnership ends. I'm not going to be around when those things start spitting fire on King's Landing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I have to tell Cersei.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: pauses and looks at JAIME.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Best well jump back in that river.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: stands up and walks away. JAIME continues sitting on the shore looking at the smoke and fire from the distant battle.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: is walking over an ash covered ground. There are burned bodies and cargo strewn about. Dothraki are looting dead Lannister soldies. A group of mounted Dothraki are escorting captured Lannister soldiers to where DAENERYS and DROGON are awaiting the prisoners. DAENERYS addresses the captured soldiers.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I know what Cersei has told you, that I've come to destroy your cities --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: burn down your homes, murder you and orphan your children. That's Cersei Lannister, not me. I'm not here to murder. And all I want to destroy is the wheel that is rolled over rich and poor to the benefit of no one but the Cersei Lannisters of the world. I offer you a choice. Bend the knee and join me. Together we will leave the world a better place than we found it, or refuse and die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Step forward, My Lord.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: takes several steps towards DAENERYS and stands in front of the kneeling Lannister men.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You will not kneel?

Name: randyll
Subtitles: I already have a queen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My sister, she wasn't your queen until recently though, was she, until she murdered your rightful queen and destroyed House Tyrell for all time. So it appears your allegiances are somewhat flexible.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: There are no easy choices in war. Say what you will about your sister, she was born in Westeros, has lived here all her life. You on the other hand, you murdered your own father and chose to support a foreign invader. One with no ties to this land, an army of savages at her back.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You will not trade your honor for your life. I respect that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: turns to speak to DAENERYS.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps he could take the black, Your Grace. Whatever else he is, he is a true soldier. He would be invaluable at the Wall.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: You cannot send me to the Wall. You are not my queen.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns to look at her Dothraki escort. The Dothraki walk forward to collect RANDYLL. As the men are pulling RANDYLL away DICKON steps forward.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: You will have to kill me too.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: pulls away from the Dothraki and turns to face his son.

Name: randyll
Subtitles: Step back and shut your mouth.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who are you?

Name: randyll
Subtitles: A stupid boy.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: I'm Dickon Tarley, son of Randyll Tarley.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You are the future of your house. This war has already wiped one great house from the world. Don't let it happen again. Bend the knee.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: looks to RANDYLL. RANDYLL nods to his son.

Name: dickon
Subtitles: I will not.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: turns to speak to DAENERYS. He speaks softly so no one but the queen can hear.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace, nothing strips bold notions from a man's head like a few weeks in a dark cell.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I meant what I said. I'm not here to put men in chains. If that becomes an option many will take it. I gave them a choice. They made it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace, if you begin beheading entire families --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm not beheading anyone.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: pauses and looks over the DROGON. DRGON roars and shakes his head and flexes his wings.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: looks to her Dothraki escort and gives a signal. The men grab RANDYLL and DICKON and walk them over to DROGON. RANDYLL takes DICKON by the arm.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Lord Randyll Tarley, Dickon Tarley, I, Daenerys of House Targaryen, First of my name, Breaker of Chains and Mother of Dragons, sentence you to die.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: pauses a moment and looks at RANDYLL and DICKON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Dracarys.

Name: drogon
Subtitles: draws a deep breath and begins spewing dragonfire at the two men. They are instantly engulfed in flames. They both collapse into ash after a few seconds. There are two craters left where RANDYLL and DICKON stood. The Lannister men recoil in horror. Any Lannister soldier that was still standing kneels to the ground. DAENERYS silently turns and begins to walk off the battlefield.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: is quickly walking down the hall leading to CERSEI's room. As he approaches, QYBURN exits the queen's chambers.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: My Lord.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: passes by QYBURN without saying a word and barges into CERSEI's quarters. CERSEI stand and walks over to JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How many men did we lose?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We haven't done a full counting.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: It's armies that win wars. We have the Tyrell gold, we have the Iron Bank behind us. We can buy mercenaries.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: shakes his head.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: They're not the same as our men but they'll fight if they're well paid, which they will be.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I just saw the Dothraki fight. They'll beat any mercenary army. They'll beat any army I've ever seen. Killing our men wasn't war for them, it was sport. Her dragon burned a thousand wagons. Qyburn's scorpion fired bolts bigger than you. They couldn't stop it. And she has three of them. This isn't a war we can win.
ners: [{'dothraki'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'qyburn'}, set(), set(), set()]

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: So what do we do? Sue for peace? I sit on her father's throne, the father you betrayed and murdered. And in her mind she's winning. What sort of offer do you think she'd make?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: turns and walks away from JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Maybe we can count on Tyrion to intercede on our behalf by way of apology for murdering our father and our son.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He didn't.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You saw the crossbow, you saw his body.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: walks across the room to where CERSEI is standing.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not talking about father. Tyrion didn't kill Joffrey. He had nothing to do with it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: After all this time it still amazes me --

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It was Olenna. She confessed before she died.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And this was before or after she drank the poison you so kindly provided her?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: After.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And you believed her?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: If you were Olenna would you rather have seen your granddaughter married to Joffrey or Tommen? Which one would Margerey been better able to control? Which one would have made Olenna the true ruler of the Seven Kingdoms? She was telling the truth.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: looks away, then sits down.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I shouldn't have listened to you. She should have died screaming.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She's dead like her son, her grandchildren, her whole house. And if we don't find a way out of this war we'll follow them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: So we fight and die or we submit and die. I know my choice. A soldier should know his.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: SNOW is standing on the edge of a cliff looking towards the ocean. DROGON roars and flies over him with DAENERYS on his back. DROGON lands next to JON and charges towards him. DROGON opens his jaws and roars in JON's face. DROGON creeps closer until he is inches from JON. JON removes his glove and slowly extends his hand toward DROGON. DROGON lowers his head and allows JON to touch him. DAENERYS looks surprised and steps down from her mount. DROGON turns and flies away.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They're beautiful, aren't they?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That wasn't the word I was thinking of, but, yes, they are. Gorgeous beasts.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They're not beasts to me. No matter how big they get, how terrifying to everyone else, they're my children.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns to look at her three dragons as they fly over Dragonstone in the distance.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You weren't gone long.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns back to JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And I have fewer enemies today than I did yesterday.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: pauses and doesn't say anything.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You're not sure how you feel about that?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No, I'm not.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns and starts walking towards the castle, JON follows.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many men did your army kill taking Winterfell back from the Boltons?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Thousands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We both want to help people. We can only help them from a position of strength. Sometimes strength is terrible. When you first came here Ser Davos said you took a knife in the heart for your people.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ser Davos gets carried away.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So it was a figure of speech?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: doesn't say anything. A group of Dothraki guards approach DAENERYS and speak in their native tongue.

Name: guard
Subtitles: This man says he is your friend, Khaleesi.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He is my friend.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: kneels before DAENERYS.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: stands.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Jon Snow, this is Ser Jorah Mormont, an old friend.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I served with your father. He was a great man.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: nods to JON.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You look strong. You found a cure?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I wouldn't be here if I hadn't. I return to your service, my queen, if you'll have me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: It would be my honor.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: steps forward and hugs JORAH.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: s eyes are pure white. They wash back to their normal color. He is sitting in front of the Weirwood. Maester Wolkan stands next to him.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Ravens. We need to send ravens.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: nods his head to BRAN.

Name: archmaester
Subtitles: MARWYN and other citadel maesters are seated at a council table. MARWYN has a raven scroll in his hand and the maesters are discussing the contents. SAMWELL enters the room carrying a large stock of books and scrolls. MARWYN points SAM to a nearby table to offload the books.

Name: maester
Subtitles: I put very little stock in it myself. Prophecies of doom are never in short supply, especially when winter comes.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I remember Wolkan. A bit timid but a sharp mind.

Name: maester
Subtitles: The north has dulled many good maester's wits. I'm not sure if it's the cold, the drink, or the company.

Name: maester
Subtitles: A crippled boy claims to have seen dead men on the march beyond the wall thanks to the magical help of a raven with three eyes.

Name: sam
Subtitles: stops working and turns around.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: It is a bit much. Still we ought to --

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Brandon Stark --

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: the crippled boy.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Do you know him?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I let him through the Wall years ago. I saw him go beyond the wall.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: And?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Somehow a crippled boy survived for years beyond the wall when no one else could. Not the Night's Watch, not the Wildlings, no one. Perhaps we ought to listen to what he has to say.

Name: maester
Subtitles: Perhaps you need more scribing work to discipline your mind.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I sense a more detailed proposal is forthcoming.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: steps forward and clears his throat.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Everyone in Westeros trusts and respects you. If you tell people the threat is real they'll believe it. If you advise all the lords to send their men north to hold the wall they'll do it. And if you tell every maester in the Citadel to search every word of every faded scroll about the long night, they may find something that lets us defeat the Army of the Dead for good.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: It could be done. And this news could be authentic. It's possible. It's also possible this message is part of a ploy by the dragon queen to lure southern armies away from the lands they are currently defending to open those lands to easy conquest.

Name: maester
Subtitles: That does seem far more likely than magic birds talking to cripples.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Archmaester, please. It's real. I've seen it.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: We will write to Maester Wolkan at Winterfell for clarification. I promise you we will get to the truth of it one way or another.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Archmaester --

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: That will be all, Tarley.

Name: sam
Subtitles: turns to collect his work and leave. The maesters begin talking to one another.

Name: maester
Subtitles: It brings to mind the work of Davy Moonstone, the charlatan who claimed to see the children of the forest.

Name: maester
Subtitles: Don't forget the Prophet Lodock that promised the Drowned God would rise up and destroy Aegon the Conquerer.

Name: maester
Subtitles: Is he the one whose father and brother were just burned alive?

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I'm afraid so.

Name: maester
Subtitles: Horrible business.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: I don't have the heart to tell him yet. He's a good lad.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: crumples the raven scroll and throws it dismissevely on the table.

Name: marwyn
Subtitles: Right. The ravenry was falling apart last time I checked...

Name: varys
Subtitles: and TYRION are sitting on the stairs of the Throne Room alone. VARYS has a sealed raven scroll in his hand tapping it on the stone. TYRION is drinking a glass of wine having a discussion with VARYS.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All rulers demand that people bend the knee. It's why they're rulers. She gave Tarley a choice. A man who had taken up arms against her. What else could she do?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Not burn him alive alongside his son.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I am her hand, not her head. I can't make her decisions for her.

Name: varys
Subtitles: That's what I used to tell myself about her father. I found the traitors but I wasn't the one burning them alive. I was only a purveyor of information.

Name: varys
Subtitles: reaches over to TYRION's cup of wine, picks it up and begins to drink from it. He grimaces as he drinks.

Name: varys
Subtitles: It's what I told myself when I watched them beg for mercy, "I'm not the one doing it." As the pitch of their screams rose higher, "I'm not the one doing it." When their hair caught fire and the smell of the burning flesh filled the Thone Room, "I'm not the one doing it."

Name: varys
Subtitles: drinks again and sets the cup down next to TYRION. TYRION picks it up.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Daenerys is not her father.

Name: varys
Subtitles: And she never will be... with the right counsel. You need to find a way to make her listen.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: looks down at the note in VARYS's hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Who is that for?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Jon Snow.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Did you read it?

Name: varys
Subtitles: It's a sealed scroll for the King in the North.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: pauses and drinks from his cup of wine.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What's it say?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Nothing good.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: and VARYS are seated at the painted table. TYRION and JORAH stand near the queen. DAVOS and JON SNOW are standing on the other end of the table. JON is holding a raven scroll and reading it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I thought Arya was dead. I thought Bran was dead.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'm happy for you. You don't look happy.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Bran saw the Night King and his army marching towards Eastwatch. If they make it past the wall --

Name: varys
Subtitles: The Wall has kept them out for thousands of years. Presumably --

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: interrupts VARYS.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I need to go home.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: You said you don't have enough men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We'll fight with the men we have. Unless you'll join us.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And give the country to Cersei? As soon as I march away she marches in.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Perhaps not. Cersei thinks the Army of the Dead is nothing but a story made up by wet nurses to frighten children. What if we prove her wrong?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't think she'll come see the dead at my invitation.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: begins walking around the table closer to JON.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So bring the dead to her.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I thought that was what we are trying to avoid.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We don't have to bring the whole army. Only one soldier.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Is that possible?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The first White I ever saw was brought into Castle Black from beyond the Wall.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Bring one of these things down to King's Landing and show her the truth.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Anything you bring back will be useless unless Cersei grants us an audience and is somehow convinced not to murder us the moment we set foot in the capital.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The only person she listens to is Jaime. He may listen to me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And how would you get into King's Landing.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I can smuggle you in, but if the Goldcloaks were to recognize you, I'm warning you, I'm not a fighter.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: nods his head.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, it will all be for nothing if we don't have one of these dead men.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Fair point. How do you propose to find one?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: pauses and stares at the ground. JORAH breaks the silence.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: With the queen's permission I'll go north and take one.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: turns to look at JORAH.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You asked me to find a cure so I could serve you. Allow me to serve you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The free folk will help us. They know the real north better than anyone.

Name: davos
Subtitles: They won't follow Ser Jorah.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: They won't have to.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You can't lead a raid beyond the wall. You're not in the Night's Watch anymore. You're King in the North.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm the only one here whose fought them. I'm the only one here who knows them.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I haven't given you permission to leave.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: With respect, Your Grace, I don't need your permission. I am a king. And I came here knowing that you could have your men behead me or your dragons burn me alive. I put my trust in you, a stranger, because I knew it was the best chance for my people, for all our people. Now I'm asking you to trust in a stranger because it's our best chance.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: pauses for a moment then nods her head in agreement.

Name: robett
Subtitles: The King in the North should stay in the north. We did not choose you to rule us, My Lady, but perhaps we should have.

Name: yohn
Subtitles: The Knights of the Vale came here for you, Lady Stark.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're very kind, my lords, but Jon is our king. He is doing what he thinks is best.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: and ARYA are walking through the hall to SANSA's quarters having a discussion.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I warned Jon this would happen. He can't leave the north and expect it to just sit and wait for him like Ghost.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He didn't. He trusted you to hold it for him.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Well, he's not making it easy. The northern lords are proud.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: These are mother and father's chambers.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Nothing.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Don't do that.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: turns around to face ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Say what you mean.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You always liked nice things. It made you feel better than everyone.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: drops the papers in her hand on a table and looks at ARYA.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Are you angry with me?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: They were insulting Jon and you sat there and listened.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I listened to their complaints, which is my responsibility as Lady of Winterfell.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Their opinions are important to you?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Glover has 500 men. Royce has 2,000. Offend them and Jon loses his army.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Not if they lose their heads first.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Winterfell didn't just fall into our hands. We took it back, and the Mormonts and the Hornwoods and the Wildlings and the Vale, all of us working together. Now, I'm sure cutting off heads is very satisfying, but that's not the way you get people to work together.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: And if Jon doesn't come back, you'll need their support, so you can work together to give you what you really want.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: How can you even think such a horrible thing?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're thinking it right now. You don't want to be, but the thought just won't go away.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: and ARYA stare at each in silence for a moment.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I have work to do.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: turns and walks away from ARYA.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My lady.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: exits the room.

Name: davos
Subtitles: and TYRION are standing on the beach of King's Landing. DAVOS is securing a small row boat. TYRION is looking up towards the city walls.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Last time I was here I killed my father with a crossbow.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Last time I was here you killed my son with wildfire.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: turns to look at DAVOS. DAVOS walks next to TYRION and stakes the boat anchor into the sand.

Name: davos
Subtitles: There's a path to the left that hugs the cliff. The guards hardly ever patrol it. Too many steps.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: begins walking towards the path. DAVOS follows him and quickly takes the lead. TYRION stops and looks back towards the unattended boat.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You're not staying here?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I've got my own business in Flea Bottom.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What if someone takes the boat?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Then we're fucked. Best hurry.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: and JAIME are walking by the dragon skulls. Both men have sparring swords in their hand.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We don't have time for this. We should be preparing the city for a siege. The Dothraki are coming.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: All the more reason for you to train. Unless you plan on fighting Dothraki 12 year olds.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I seem to recall them giving you a bit of trouble as well.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: And here I am ready to train.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why down here?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I don't think you want people to see how you look swinging that thing yet.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Today might be the day I kill you by accident.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh, you won't be swinging it at me.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: stops walking and holds his torch out. TYRION steps from around a pillar and looks at JAIME. JAIME looks angrily at BRONN.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I'll leave you to it.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: turns and walks away leaving JAIME and TYRION alone.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I needed to see you and I knew you'd never agree to meet.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: remains silent and stares at TYRION.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You made me look like a complete fool. I thought I'd surprise you by hitting Casterly Rock, but you were three steps ahead of me. You abandoned the family home. Completely unsentimental. Father would have been proud.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Don't talk about our father.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Listen to me --

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I once told Bronn that if I ever saw you again I'd cut you in half.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: glances down at the sword in JAIME's hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It would take you awhile with a sparring sword.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: shakes his head and says nothing.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He was going to execute me. He knew I was innocent. He didn't hate me because of anything I did, he hated me because of what I am. The little monster sent to punish him. Do you think I wanted to be born this way? Did he think I chose --

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What do you want?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Daenerys will win this war. You're a military man. You must know there is no way around it. Daenerys is not her father. She's even willing to suspend hostilities if Cersei agrees to certain terms.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You want Cersei to bend the knee you can ask her yourself.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I -- I don't. Daenerys doesn't. Not right now anyway. She has a more important request.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I wasn't sure I'd find you.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I thought you might still be rowing.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: chuckles and DAVOS smiles.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I looked in shops, taverns, brothels. I should have known to come straight to the Street of Steel.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Weren't you worried about the Goldcloaks?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I haven't been here in years. Why should they recognize me? Sometimes I hardly do. Nothing fucks you harder than time.

Name: davos
Subtitles: walks to the side of the shop and inspects a rack of swords. He pulls one, nods in approval and puts it back in its place. He turns back to GENDRY.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Anybody give you any trouble?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Here I am arming Lannisters. I never get a second look. You were right. Safest place for me was right under the queen's nose.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Don't be so sure. Safety is never a permanent state of affairs. Bad things are coming.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: nods.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You came to get me. You want me to come with you.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I think you need to understand --

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'm ready. Let's go.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You should know what you're heading into.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Don't you think I've been thinking about it every swing of the hammer... how happy I am making weapons for the family that killed my father? They tried to kill me.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: is tossing his tools and apron to the side. He picks up a satchel and swings it over his head.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I've been getting ready. I never knew what for, but I've always known I'd know it when it comes.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You might want to bring one of those swords.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: smiles at DAVOS and begins walking towards the weapons.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I don't know much about swinging swords, but this --

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: removes a giant war hammer from the wall.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: this I know.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: and DAVOS turn and walk out of the shop.

Name: davos
Subtitles: and GENDRY are walking towards the boat DAVOS left on the beach.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Keep your father's name to yourself. The situation is complicated enough already.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: and DAVOS arrive at the boat. GENDRY lays his hammer on top of the boat cargo. DAVOS is gathering the anchor and rope. Two Goldcloaks begin walking down the beach towards the boat unnoticed by DAVOS and GENDRY.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Who should I say I am?

Name: davos
Subtitles: turns and notices the two guards approaching the boat. He turns and loudly addresses GENDRY.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I told you, Clovis, if we don't get out of here soon someone is going to --

Name: guard
Subtitles: You there.

Name: davos
Subtitles: No weapons, friends. I promise. What can I do for you?

Name: guard
Subtitles: Is that your boat?

Name: davos
Subtitles: It is.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: looks down into the boat and sees his weapon in plain view.

Name: guard
Subtitles: The docks are that way.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: That they are. I try to stay away from them to avoid good men such as yourselves.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Still five gold dragons?

Name: guard
Subtitles: Are you joking?

Name: guard
Subtitles: You must be even older than you look. 15.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Apiece.

Name: davos
Subtitles: angrily reaches into his pouch and pays the men.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I can't say it was a pleasure doing business with you.

Name: davos
Subtitles: turns and begins walking back to his boat.

Name: guard
Subtitles: What's in the boat?

Name: davos
Subtitles: pauses and turns back to the guards.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Not more gold.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Wine?

Name: guard
Subtitles: Mmm.

Name: guard
Subtitles: I like wine.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Or hams.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Come and have a look.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Fermented crab.

Name: guard
Subtitles: What?

Name: davos
Subtitles: Fermented crab. One bucket of this triples the brothel's earnings for the week. A man thinks he's done, he's ready to go back to his loving family, but before he gets his britches up his lady of the hour pops a tiny spoon of that into his mouth. Five minutes later, he's back in the race. Here, have a taste.

Name: davos
Subtitles: scoops up a bit of fermented crab and offers it to the guards. Both men reach out and take a pinch. The guards sniff the crab and put it in their mouth. They both recoil from the taste and look at each other.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'd hurry to your favorite establishment or you'll put a whole in that chainmail.

Name: guard
Subtitles: Oi, Dwarf!

Name: davos
Subtitles: quickly walks to cut the guards off.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I really wouldn't try anymore until you see how the first bite hits you.

Name: guard
Subtitles: That dwarf --

Name: guard
Subtitles: Where did you get that scar?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Fish hook. Some men you just can't teach.

Name: guard
Subtitles: We was looking for a dwarf with a scar like that awhile back.

Name: davos
Subtitles: is still standing behind the guards. He retrieves his gold pouch again and holds it up shaking it.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Perhaps there's some arrangement?

Name: guard
Subtitles: Arrangement? You gonna arrange to pay us more than Queen Cersei?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: can be seen behind the backs of the guards. He slowly retrieves his hammer and creeps up behind GUARD 2. He swings his hammer and connects with the side of the guardo s head. The man drops. As GENDRY transitions onto the second guard and swings his hammer, GUARD 1 turns to look and catches a hammer blow to the face.

Name: davos
Subtitles: is looking at TYRION and motions towards GENDRY.

Name: davos
Subtitles: This is Gendry.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He'll do.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: opens the door and step into the queen's room. CERSEI is seated near a window speaking to QYBURN.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That won't be necessary.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: bows his head and walks to leave the room. As he passes by JAIME he addresses him.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Ser Jaime.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: closes the door as he leaves. JAIME and CERSEI are alone. CERSEI begins walking over to a chair in front of JAIME and sits.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why was QYBURN here?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He's Hand of the Queen. Why are you here?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I met with Tyrion.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: pauses for a moment making JAIME uncomfortable.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What did our brother have to say?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Daenerys wants to meet.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: To discuss a surrender?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: To discuss an armistice.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She just won a great victory. Why would she want a truce now?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Because an army of dead men is marching on the Seven Kingdoms. Tyrion claims he'll have proof.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: smirks and looks away from JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Are you going to punish him?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Tyrion?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Bronn.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: looks confused.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: He betrayed you. He set up a meeting without your knowledge or consent. Do you think anything of importance happens in this city without me knowing?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You let it happen. Why?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I've come to believe that accomodation with the Dragon Queen could be in our immediate interest. She has the numbers. If we want to beat her we have to be clever. We have to fight her like father would have. Dead men, dragons and Dragon Queens, whatever stands in our way we will defeat it ourselves for our house. For this.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: lifts her hands from the chair and places them both on her stomach indicating she's pregnant. JAIME looks shocked.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Who will you say is the father?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: People won't like that.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: stands from her chair and walks in front of JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do you remember what father used to say about people?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The lion doesn't concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: reaches forward and takes CERSEI and kisses her. While they embrace CERSEI speaks to JAIME.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Never betray me again.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: and DAVOS are walking down the beach near the Dragonglass cave. Groups of men are carrying boxes filled with Dragonglass out of the cave. DAVOS and GENDRY are having a discussion.

Name: davos
Subtitles: We're leaving today. The king's got a lot on his mind.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I understand.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He doesn't need to be thinking about harboring the bastard of a dead king.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You don't have to worry.

Name: davos
Subtitles: You're just Clovis, a smith who's come to pay his respects before he heads off to work at the Winterfell forges.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Understood.

Name: davos
Subtitles: and GENDRY enter the mouth of the cave. JON is walking along the corridor.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Begging your pardon, Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: stops and turns around to face DAVOS.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You survived King's Landing.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Yet again.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your Grace, this is --

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: steps forward in front of DAVOS.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It's Gendry, Your Grace. I'm Robert Baratheon's son. Bastard son.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: looks to DAVOS.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He was meant to keep that to himself.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Our fathers trusted each other. Why shouldn't we?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I saw your father once at Winterfell.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I met yours in my shop.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're a lot leaner.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You're a lot shorter.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: stops smiling and pauses a moment. Then he chuckles.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I grew up on stories about them.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: All I ever knew was they fought together and won. Ser Davos told me where you're going, Your Grace, and why. Let me come with you.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Don't be a fool. You're not a soldier.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: No, but I'm a fighter. And he won't be needing a smith with a sword like that.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you know how to use one?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: shakes his head.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Well, that's a problem.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I prefer a hammer.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: looks to DAVOS.

Name: davos
Subtitles: He can handle himself.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: nods.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We could use the help.

Name: davos
Subtitles: As my father used to say, it's better to be a coward for a minute than dead for the rest of your life.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I owe you my life. Twice over. But if what you said is true about what's out there, I can't wait out this war.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Yeah. Nobody mind me. All I've ever done is live to a ripe old age.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You may not believe it, but I've missed you Mormont. Nobody glowers quite like you. Not even Grey Worm.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: retrieves a gold coin from his pocket and turns it in his hands.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: This is the coin the slaver gave me when I suggested he free us and pay us. Remember?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: It was supposed to last us the rest of our lives.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: smiles and hands the coin to JORAH.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Take it with you. You'll bring it back. Our queen needs you.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: nods to TYRION. DAENERYS appears and walks up to JORAH.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We should be better at saying farewell by now.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your Grace, I --

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: reaches forward and takes JORAH by his hands. JON SNOW, DAVOS and GENDRY exit the cave and walk towards the boats. JORAH bends and kisses DAENERY's hand. He turns and continues readying the boat. JON stands in front of DAENERYS.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If I don't return at least you won't have to deal with the King in the North anymore.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: smiles.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: But I've grown used to him.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wish you good fortune in the wars to come, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: nods to JON. JON turns and walks to the head of the boat. The men take hold of it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Heave!

Name: sam
Subtitles: is seated at a table surround by papers and candles. He is writing notes into a book. Gilly is seated across from him reading aloud from a tome. SAM JR. is playing on the bed.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Do you know how many steps there are in the Citadel?

Name: sam
Subtitles: No.

Name: sam
Subtitles: looks up from his work annoyed. He remains silent and continues working.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Guess how many windows are in the Great Sept of Baelor.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: looks away and pauses.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: None anymore.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: That's true. This High Septon Meynard, he recorded everything. He even recorded his own bowel movements. What does "annulment" mean?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: It's when a man sets asside his lawful wife.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Meynard says here that he issued an anullment for Prince Rhaegar and remarried him to someone else at the same time in a secret ceremony in Dorne. Is that a common thing --

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: isn't paying much attention to GILLY. He loudly interrupts her.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: These maesters, they set me to the task of preserving that man's window counting and anullments and bowel movements for all eternity while the secret to defeating the Night King's probably sitting on some dusty shelf somewhere completely ignored. But that's all right, isn't it. We could all become slavering, murderous imbecils enthralled to evil incarnate as long as we can have access to the full records of High Septon Meynardo s 15,782 shits.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Steps. That number was steps.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: is dismayed. He sets his quill down and grabs the book he was writing in and hands it to SAM Jr. He retrieves his cloak and walks out the door.

Name: sam
Subtitles: is walking through a dark library. He heads to the restricted section and unlocks the barred gate. He begins removing books and scrolls from shelfs and stuff them in his satchel. After retrieving what he needs, SAM quickly walks to the exit of the library. He pauses before he leaves and turns around. He glances back at the library. It is many stories tall lined with countless shelves of books. SAMWELL looks at the library one last time, turns and walks out of the door.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: is loading a wagon with his things. He walks around to the driver seat. GILLY and SAM JR. are already in the wagon dressed for the road. SAM climbs aboard and takes the reins in his hand.

Name: gilly
Subtitles: Are you sure you want to do this? You always wanted to be a maester.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I'm tired of reading about the achievements of better men.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is in the kennels observing PETER BAELISH and a Winterfell servant having a conversation. The servent is whispering in BAELISH's ear. ARYA can't hear the conversation. ARYA sees BAELISH hand the servant a raven scroll. The servant turns to leave. BAELISH senses someone is watching him and he looks to where ARYA stood but she has already vanished. BAELISH turns and leaves the kennels.
