Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is on the upper level looking down at BAELISH. He is having a conversation with ROBETT GLOVER and YOHN ROYCE. She can't hear what's being said. BAELISH finishes his conversation and walks away from the men. ARYA disappears behind the corner and continues following BAELISH.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: is walking down the hallway. She pauses, peers around a corner and looks towards the door of BAELISH's quarters. BAELISH appears and unlocks his door. Before he walks in MAESTER WOLKAN approaches him. She continues watching the men.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: I found it, my Lord.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: hands BAELISH a raven scroll.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: It took some searching. Maester Llewyn's archives are thorough.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: reads the note then looks at WOLKAN.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Are you sure this is the only copy at Winterfell?

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: Yes, my Lord.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lady Stark thanks you for your service.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: turns and walks away. BAELISH enters his room and shuts the door. ARYA continues watching. A moment later BAELISH opens the door and exits the room, locking the door as he leaves. After he is gone ARYA walks to the door and produces a lockpick from her sleeve. She enters the room and begins searching for the raven scroll. She opens a cabinet but finds nothing of value. She checks another cabinet, then looks in the fireplace and above the mantle finding nothing. She lifts up the mattress and finds a small hole cut into the bedding. She reaches in and retrives the raven scroll. She unrolls it and reads the contents.
ners: [set(), {'baelish'}, set(), {'baelish'}, {'arya'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: and the raiding party land on the Beach of Eastwatch. JON looks up at the castle. The men collect their equipment and make for the castle.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: JON, DAVOS, GENDRY, and JORAH sit at a table having a conversation.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Isn't it your job to talk him out of stupid fucking ideas like this?

Name: davos
Subtitles: I've been failing at that job of late.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: How many queens are there now?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Two.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: And you need to convince the one with the dragons or the one who fucks her brother?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Both.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: How many men did you bring?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: looks around the table.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Not enough.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: The big woman?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: smiles and shakes his head. TORMUND is disappointed.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: We were hoping some of your men could help.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'll be staying behind. I'm a liability out there as you well know.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: nods his head.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You are.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: turns to look at JON.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You really want to go out there again?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You're not the only ones.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: My scouts found them a mile south of the Wall. Said they were on their way here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're The Hound. I saw you once at Winterfell.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: pulls a blanket tight around himself and sits up from the table he was laying on.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: They want to go beyond the Wall too.

Name: beric
Subtitles: We don't want to go beyond the Wall, we have to. Our lord told us the great war is coming.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Don't trust them. Don't trust any of them.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: They're the Brotherhood. And the last thing their Lord told them to do was sell me to a Red Witch to be murdered.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Thoros?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: sits up from a dark corner.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I hardly recognized you.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Ser Jorah Mormont --

Name: tormund
Subtitles: turns and angrily looks at JORAH.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: They won't give me anything to drink down here. I haven't been feeling like myself.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You're a fucking Mormont? Like the last Lord Commander?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: He was my father.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: He hunted us like animals.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: You returned the favor, as I recall.

Name: beric
Subtitles: Here we all are at the edge of the world at the same moment heading in the same direction for the same reason.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Our reasons aren't your reasons.

Name: beric
Subtitles: It doesn't matter what we think our reasons are.

Name: beric
Subtitles: stands up and walks towards the bars of the cell.

Name: beric
Subtitles: There's a greater purpose at work and we serve it together whether we know it or not. We may take the steps but the Lord of Light --

Name: sandor
Subtitles: For fuck's sake, will you shut your hole. Are we coming with you or not?

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Don't you want to know what we're doing?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Is it worse than sitting in a freezing cell waiting to die?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: He's right. We're all on the same side.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: How can we be?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We're all breathing.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: hands the cell keys to JON. JON opens the door and let the men out.

Name: end
Subtitles: CREDITS

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Are you all right?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: faces JON and grunts.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ever been north before?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Never seen snow before.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Beautiful, eh? I can breath again. Down south the air smells like pig shit.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You've never been down south.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I've been to Winterfell.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's the north.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: How do you live up here? How do you keep your balls from freezing off?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You have to keep moving. That's the secret. Walking is good, fighting is better, fucking is best.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's not another woman within 100 miles of here.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: turns to look at JON and GENDRY.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We have to make due with what we've got.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: glances at GENDRY. GENDRY backs away from JON and TORMUND.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: This one is maybe not so smart.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Davos says he is a strong fighter.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Good. That's more important than being smart.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: looks at JON as they continue to walk.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Smart people don't come up here looking for the dead. So, you met this Dragon Queen, huh? And?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She'll only fight beside us if I bend the knee.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You spent too much time with the free folk and now you don't like kneeling. Mance Rayder was a great man, a proud man. The king beyond the wall never bent the knee. How many of his people died for his pride?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Are you still mad at us, boy?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You sold me to a witch.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Priestess. I'll admit, it is a subtle distinction.

Name: beric
Subtitles: We're fighting a great war. Wars cost money.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I wanted to be one of you. I wanted to join the Brotherhood but you sold me off like a slave. Do you know what she did to me? She strapped me down on a bed, she stripped me naked --

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Sounds all right so far.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: and put leeches on me.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Was she naked too?

Name: thoros
Subtitles: She needed your blood.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Yes. Thank you. I know that.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: steps in front of GENDRY to halt him.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: It could have been worse.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: She wanted to kill me. They would have killed me if it wasn't for Davos --

Name: sandor
Subtitles: But they didn't, did they? So what you whinging about?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'm not whinging.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Your lips are moving and you're complaining about something. That's whinging.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: motions to BERIC.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: This one's been killed six times. You don't hear him bitching about it.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: walks away to join the group. BERIC and THOROS smile to each other. THOROS holds his wine flask out to GENDRY who takes a large gulp and hands it back to THOROS.

Name: thoros
Subtitles: Good lad.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The first time I went north of the wall was with your father.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: He was a good man. He deserved a better son. Were you with him at the end?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I was a prisoner of the Wildlings. But we avenged him. I want you to know that every mutineer found justice.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I can't think of a worse way for him to go. The Night's Watch was his life. He would have died to protect every one of those men, and they butchered him.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I hate that he died that way. My father was the most honorable man I ever met. He was good all the way through. And he died on the executioner's block.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Your father wanted to execute me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I heard.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: He was in the right of course. It didn't make me hate him any less.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: and JON glance at each other.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm glad he didn't capture you.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Me too.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: stops walking and loosens the belt holding his sword.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your father gave me this sword. He changed the pommel from a bear to a wolf, but it's still Long Claw.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: hands the sword to JORAH. JORAH slowly takes the sword and looks it over in his hands.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Lord Commander Mormont thought you'd never come back to Westeros.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: stops examining the sword and looks up to JON.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But you are back and it's been in your family for centuries. It's not right for me to have it.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: pauses, then nods at JON.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: He gave it to you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm not his son.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: pulls the sword halfway out of the sheath and inspects the blade, turning it in his hands.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I brought shame to my house. I broke my father's heart.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: resheaths the blade and hands it back to JON.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: I forfeited the right to claim this sword. It's yours. May it serve you well and your children after you.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Father used to watch us from up here. He wouldn't say much. You probably don't remember. You were inside knitting all the time.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I remember.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: One time the boys were shooting arrows with Ser Rodrick. I came out here after and Bran had left his bow behind just lying on the ground. Ser Rodrick would have cuffed him if he saw. There was one arrow in the target. There was no one around, just like now. No one to stop me. So I started shooting. And every shot I had to go out there and get my one arrow and walk back and shoot it again. I wasn't very good. Finally I hit the bullseye. It could have been the 20th shot or the 50th. I don't remember. But I hit the bullseye and I heard this.
ners: [{'ser'}, {'bran'}, {'rodrick'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: starts a slow clap.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I looked up and he's standing right here smiling down at me. I knew what I was doing was against the rules. But he was smiling so I knew it wasn't wrong. The rules were wrong. I was doing what I was meant to be doing and he knew it. Now he's dead. Killed by the Lannisters with your help.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: turns to look at ARYA.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: retrieves a raven scroll from her pocket and unrolls it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That's your pretty handwriting. Septa Mordane used to crack my knuckles because I couldn't write as well as you. "Robb, I write to you today with heavy heart. Our good King Robert is dead. Killed from wounds he took in a boar hunt --

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You don't have to read it. I remember.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Father has been charged with treason. He conspired with Robert's brothers against my beloved Joffrey and tried to steal his throne. The Lannisters are treating me well and providing me with every comfort. I beg you, come to King's Landing, swear fealty to King Joffrey and prevent any strife between the great houses of Lannister and Stark. Your faithful sister, Sansa.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They forced me to do it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Did they. With a knife at your throat? Did they put you on a rack and stretch you until your bones started to pop?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You don't know what it was like. I was a child.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: So was I. I would have let them kill me before I betrayed my family.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: They told me it was the only way to save father.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: And you were stupid enough to believe them. I remember you standing on that platform with Joffrey and Cersei when they dragged father too the block. I remember the pretty dress you were wearing. I remember the fancy way you did your hair.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You were there?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I was there standing in the crowd near Baelor's statue.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And what did you do? Did you come running to the rescue? Did you fight off the Lannisters and save father?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I wanted to.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But you didn't. Just like me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I didn't betray him. I didn't betray Robb. I didn't betray our entire family for my beloved Joffrey.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You should be on your knees thanking me. We're standing in Winterfell again because of me. You didn't win it back. Jon didn't win it back. He lost the Battle of the Bastards. The Knight's of the Vale won the battle and they rode north for me while you were off where, traveling the world?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I was training.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Training. Well, while you were training I suffered things you can never imagine.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Oh, I don't know about that. I can imagine quite a lot.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You never would have survived what I survived.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I guess we'll never know.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: What are you doing to do with that letter.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I don't know yet.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Who did you show it to? Where did you find it?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You're scared, aren't you? What are you scared of? You didn't commit any crimes. No one's going to hang you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Arya --

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you scared I'll show it to Jon and he'll be angry? No. That's not Jon. He'll understand. You were just a scared little girl all alone with the wicked Lannisters.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Do you know how happy Cersei would be if she saw us fighting? This is exactly what she wants. This is what she's always wanted, to tear us apart --

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: The northern lords will read it. They wouldn't think much of Lady Sansa if they knew how she did Cersei's bidding. What would little Lyanna Mormont say? She's younger than you were when you wrote this. Are you going to say, "But I was just a child"?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're angry. Sometimes anger makes people do unfortunate things.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Sometimes fear makes them do unfortunate things. I'll go with anger.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: turns and walks away.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: You're the one they call the dog.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Fuck off.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: They told me you were mean. Were you born mean or you just hate Wildlings?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I don't give two shits about Wildlings.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: looks up at TORMUND.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Gingers I hate.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Gingers are beautiful. We are kissed by fire. Just like you.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: points and motions to SANDOR's burned face. SANDOR slaps his hand away.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: Don't point your fucking finger at me.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: walks away to rejoin the group. TORMUND begins smiling and walks after him.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Did you trip into the fire when you were a baby?

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I didn't trip. I was pushed.

Subtitles: She could want me dead because she thinks I wronged my family.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Why did she come to Winterfell?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: To kill me for marrying our enemies and betraying my family.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Why did she unearth the letter Cersei made you write?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: To provide proof of my betrayals. To provide justification after she murders me.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: And after she murders you, what does she become?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lady

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: If we have the Dothraki ride hard on the kingsroad, they'll arrive at Winterfell within the fortnight.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: And the Unsullied? We can sail with them to White Harbor, meet the Dothraki here on the kingsroad, then ride together to Winterfell.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: Perhaps you should fly to Winterfell, Your Grace. You have many enemies in the North. Thousands fell fighting your fatherAll it takes is one angry man with a crossbow. He'll see your silver hair on the kingsroad and know that one well-placed bolt will make him a hero. The man who killed the conqueror.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's your decision, Your Grace. But if we're going to be allies in this war, it's important for the Northerners to see us as allies. If we sail to White Harbor together, I think it sends a better message.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I've not come to conquer the North. I'm coming to save the North. We sail together.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Jon.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Can I speak with you?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: All right.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What you did in King's Landing, what you said... You couldo ve lied to Cersei about bending the knee to Daenerys. You risked everything to tell an enemy the truth.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We went down there to make peace. And it seems to me we need to be honest with each other if we're going to fight together.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You've always known what was right. Even when we were all young and stupid, you always knew. Every step you take it's always the right step.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not. It may seem that way from the outside, but I promise you, it's not true. I've done plenty of things that I regret.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not compared to me, you haven't.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: No. Not compared to you.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I always wanted to do the right thing. Be the right kind of person. But I never knew what that meant. It always seemed like there's like there was an impossible choice I had to make. Stark or Greyjoy.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Our father was more of a father.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: He was.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: And you betrayed him. Betrayed his memory.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I did.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: But you never lost him. He's a part of you. Just like he's a part of me.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: But the things I've done.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not my place to forgive you for all of it. But what I can forgive, I do. You don't need to choose. You're a Greyjoy and you're a Stark.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: When I was Ramsay's prisoner, Yara tried to save me. She's the only one who tried to save me. She needs me now.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: So, why are you still talking to me?

Name: harrag
Subtitles: Load up. Load up, lads. Go on. Tide's coming in.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: All of us chose to follow Yara. We left the Iron Islands for Yara. She would never leave one of us behind. We're not leaving her behind.

Name: harrag
Subtitles: Your sister--

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: She's not dead.

Name: harrag
Subtitles: She's dead. Even if Euron hasn't cut her throat yet, she's dead.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: She's our queen

Name: harrag
Subtitles: She's your sister

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: I did. I ran from my uncle.

Name: harrag
Subtitles: So, why in fuck's name should we listen to you? They say the dead can't swim. We're going to sail east, find a nice, quiet island, kill all the men, and take their wives for ourselves.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: We're done with all that.

Name: harrag
Subtitles: Who says we are?

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Yara did. She made a pledge. We're going to find her, and we're going to set her free.

Name: harrag
Subtitles: Run away, little Theon. It's what you do best.

Name: man
Subtitles: He needs to shut his mouth.

Name: man
Subtitles: Hey!

Name: man
Subtitles: Oh, yes!

Name: man
Subtitles: That's more like it.

Name: harrag
Subtitles: Stay down or I'll kill you!

Name: harrag
Subtitles: I said stay down or I'll kill you!

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Not for me. For Yara!

Name: men
Subtitles: Yara!

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Have my sister

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you sure you want to do this?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's not what I want. It's what honor demands.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: And what does honor demand?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: That I defend my family from those who would harm us. That I defend the North from those who would betray us.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: All right, then. Get on with it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You stand accused of murder. You stand accused of treason. How do you answer these charges Lord Baelish?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My sister asked you a question.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lady Sansa, forgive me I'm a bit confused.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Which charges confuse you? Let's start with the simplest one you murdered our aunt, Lysa Arryn. You pushed her through the Moon Door and watched her fall. Do you deny it?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I did it to protect you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You did it to take power in the Vale. Earlier, you conspired to murder Jon.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Whatever your aunt

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You had Aunt Lysa send a letter to our parents telling them it was the Lannisters who murdered Jon.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I know of no such letter.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You conspired with Cersei Lannister and Joffrey Baratheon to betray our father.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I deny it! None of you were there to see what happened. None of you knows the truth.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You held a knife to his throat.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You said, "I did warn you not the trust me."

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You told our mother

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Lady Sansa, I have known you since you were a girl. I've protected you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Protected me? By selling me to the Boltons?

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: If we could speak alone, I can explain everything.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Sometimes when I'm trying to understand a person's motives, I play a little game. I assume the worst. What's the worst reason you have for turning me against my sisterThat's what you do, isn't it? That's what you've always done turn family against family, turn sister against sister. That's what you did to our mother.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Sansa, please.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I'm a slow learner, it's true. But I learn.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Give me a chance to defend myself. I deserve that.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I am Lord Protector of the Vale and I command you to escort me safely back to the Eyrie.

Name: john royce
Subtitles: I think not.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Sansa, I beg you! I loved your mother since the time I was a boy.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And yet, you betrayed her.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: I loved you. More than anyone.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And yet, you betrayed me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: When you brought me back to Winterfell, you told me there's no justice in the world, not unless we make it. Thank you for all your many lessons, Lord Baelish. I will never forget them.

Name: petyr baelish
Subtitles: Sansa! I--

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Our men in King's Landing will march north in three days' time.

Name: man
Subtitles: It'll take us a fortnight just to gather supplies for the train.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We don't have a fortnight. If the North falls, we fall. Three days. The remaining forces in the Westerlands will take the river road east. We'll meet at Lord Harroway's Town and march together to Winterfell.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: My lords, I need a moment with my brother.

Name: men
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What are you doing?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Preparing the expedition north.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Expedition north? I always knew you were the stupidest Lannister. The Starks and Targaryens have united against us, and you want to fight alongside them? Are you a traitor or an idiot?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You pledged our forces to fight our common enemy.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I'll say whatever I need to say to ensure the survival of our house. You expect me to trust the man who murdered our father.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You saw it with your own eyes. You saw a dead man trying to kill us.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I saw it burn. If dragons can't stop them, if Dothraki and Unsullied and Northmen can't stop them, how will our armies make a difference?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This isn't about noble houses, this is about the living and the dead!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And I intend to stay amongst the living. Let the Stark boy and his new queen--

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I made a promise.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Our child will rule Westeros.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Our child will never be born if the dead come south.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The monsters are real. The white walkers, the dragons, the Dothraki screamers all the frightening stories we heard when we were young, they're all real. So be it. Let the monsters kill each other. And while they battle in the North, we take back the lands that belong to us.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And then what?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And then we rule.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: When the fighting in the North is over, someone wins. You understand that, don't you? If the dead win, they march south and kill us all. If the living win, and we've betrayed them, they march south and kill us all!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: The Targaryens and the Starks already want to kill us all. Most of them will die in the North.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I faced them in the field. We can't beat them. We can't beat their dragons.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: How many dragons did you see at the pit?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Two.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: What happened to the third?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: For all we know, it's guarding her fleet!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: She came here with her dragons and her Dothraki and her Unsullied. She came here to show us all her power. No, something happened.The dragons are vulnerable.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: We can't beat the Dothraki. We don't have the numbers. We don't have the support of the other houses!

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: No, we have something better. We have the Iron Bank. You shouldo ve listened more when Father--

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: The Golden Company is not here. They're in Essos. How is a mercenary company in Essos going to help us?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Do you really think Euron Greyjoy turned tail and sailed back to the Iron Islands? Do you think he abandoned the chance to marry the queen?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You plotted with Euron Greyjoy without telling me, the commander.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And you conspired with Tyrion, the man who murdered our father without telling me, your queen.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I didn't conspire with him.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You met with him in secret without my consent. You planned to promote my enemies' interests. That is the definition of conspiracy.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I pledged to ride north. I intend to honor that pledge.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And that will be treason.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Treason?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Disobeying your queen

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Doesn't matter what I'd call it.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I told you no one walks away from me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Are you going to order him to kill me? I'm the only one you have left. Our children are gone, our father

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: There's one more yet to come.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Give the order, then.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I don't believe you.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Samwell Tarly.

Name: sam
Subtitles: I wasn't sure if you'd remember me.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I remember everything.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You helped us get beyond the Wall. You're a good man.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, well, thank you, but, um, I'm not sure that I am. What happened to you beyond the Wall?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I became the Three-Eyed Raven.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh! I don't know what that means.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I can see things that happened in the past. I can see things happening now all over the world. Why did you come to Winterfell?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Um, Jon's the one to lead the fight against the dead. I know he is. But he can't do it alone, so I've come here to help him.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He's on his way back to Winterfell with Daenerys Targaryen. You you saw this in a vision?

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He needs to know the truth.

Name: sam
Subtitles: The truth about what?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: About himself. No one knows. No one but me. Jon isn't really my father's son He's the son of Rhaegar Targaryen and my aunt.

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's not.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Dornish bastards are named Sand.

Name: sam
Subtitles: At the Citadel, I transcribed a High Septon's diary. He annulled Rhaegar's marriage to Elia. He wed Rhaegar and Lyanna in a secret ceremony.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Are you certain?

Name: sam
Subtitles: It's what the High Septon wrote in his private diary. I don't know why he'd lie. Is this something you can see?

Name: rhaegar
Subtitles: Father, Smith, Warrior, Mother, Maiden, Crone, Stranger. I am hers and she is mine from this day until the end of my days.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Father, Smith, Warrior, Mother, Maiden, Crone, Stranger. I am his and he is mine from this day until the end of my days.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Robert's Rebellion was built on a lie. Rhaegar didn't kidnap my aunt.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He loved her. And she loved him.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: And Jon - Jon's real name.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: His name is Aegon.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He's never been a bastard.

Name: brans voice
Subtitles: He needs to know. We need to tell him.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you all right?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It's just strange. In his own horrible way, I believe he loved me.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You did the right thing.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You did it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm just the executioner. You passed the sentence. You're the Lady.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Does that bother you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I was never going to be as good a lady as you. So I had to be something else. I never could have survived what you survived.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You would have. You're the strongest person I know.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I believe that's the nicest thing you've ever said to me.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Well, don't get used to it. You're still very strange and annoying.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: In winter, we must protect ourselves. Look after one another.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Father

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I miss him.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Me, too.

Name: beric
Subtitles: It's a long way down.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Yeah. The crows keep telling me I'll get used to it.

Name: man
Subtitles: I can see movement. Watch, on the tree line!

Name: man
Subtitles: What is it?

Name: tormund
Subtitles: Come on! Run! Run!

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You should consider yourself lucky. At least your balls won't freeze off.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You take great offense at dwarf jokes, but love telling eunuch jokes. Why is that?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Because I have balls, and you don't.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I warned you. Northerners don't much trust outsiders.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Look at you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You're a man.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Almost.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Where's Arya?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lurking somewhere.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Queen Daenerys of House Targaryen. My sister, Sansa Stark, the Lady of Winterfell.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Thank you for inviting us into your home, Lady Stark. The North is as beautiful as your brother claimed, as are you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Winterfell is yours, Your Grace.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We don't have time for all this. The Night King has your dragon.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He's one of them now. The Wall has fallen, the dead march south.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: As soon as we heard about the Wall, I called all our banners to retreat to Winterfell. Lord Umber when can we expect your people to arrive?

Name: umber
Subtitles: We need more horses and wagons, if it please my lady.

Name: umber
Subtitles: And my lord.

Name: umber
Subtitles: And my queen. Sorry.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You'll have as many as we can spare. Hurry back to Last Hearth and bring your people here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We need to send ravens to the Night's Watch as well. There's no sense in manning the castles anymore. We make our stand here.

Name: maester wolkan
Subtitles: At once, Your Grace.

Name: lyanna mormont
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: But you're not. Are you? You left Winterfell a king and came back a- I'm not sure what you are now.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: A lord? Nothing at all?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's not important.

Name: lyanna
Subtitles: Not important? We named you King in the North.

Name: man
Subtitles: King of the North!

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You did, my lady. It was the honor of my life. I'll always be grateful for your faith. But when I left Winterfell, I told you we need allies or we will die. I have brought those allies home to fight alongside us. I had a choice, keep my crown or protect the North. I chose the North.
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: If anyone survives the war to come, we'll have Jon Snow to thank. He risked his life to show us the threat is real. Thanks to his courage, we have brought with us the greatest army the world has ever seen. We have brought two full-grown dragons. And soon, the Lannister army will ride north to join our cause.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I know, I know, our people haven't been friends in the past. But we must fight together now or die.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: May I ask, how are we meant to feed the greatest army the world has ever seen? While I ensured our stores would last through winter, I didn't account for Dothraki, Unsullied and two full-grown dragons. What do dragons eat, anyway?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Whatever they want.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Hey, careful, lads. We need every last bit of it.

Name: man
Subtitles: Sorry 'bout that.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Are these the last of the wagons?

Name: man
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: All right, let's get it all to the forges.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My lord. My lady.

Name: royce
Subtitles: My lady.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The Lady of Winterfell. Has a nice ring to it.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: So does Hand of the Queen. Depending on the queen, I suppose.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Last time we spoke was at Joffrey's wedding. Miserable affair.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: It had its moments.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Apologies for leaving like that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, it was a bit hard to explain why my wife fled moments after the king's murder.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: We both survived.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Many underestimated you. Most of them are dead now.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure you weren't thrilled to hear the Lannister army's marching north. You have every right to be fearful of my sister. No one fears her more than I do. But I promise, you'll be safe-

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Cersei told you her army was coming north to fight for you?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She did.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And you believed her?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She has something to live for now. I believe she wants to survive.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I used to think you were the cleverest man alive.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You used to be taller.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: How did you sneak up on me?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How did you survive a knife through the heart?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I didn't.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You still have it.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Needle.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Have you ever used it?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Once or twice.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Valyrian steel.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Jealous?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Too heavy for me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Where were you before? I couldo ve used your help with Sansa.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: She doesn't like your queen, does she?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sansa thinks she's smarter than everyone.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: She's the smartest person I've ever met.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Now you're defending her?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm defending our family. So is she.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Yeah. I'm her family too.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Don't forget that.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Your Grace, I'm afraid I bring terrible news. The dead have broken through the Wall.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Good.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Why don't you just get it over with and kill me?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: But we're family. The last Greyjoys left in the world. The last ones with balls anyway.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: If I kill you who can I talk to? Hmm?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I've got a crew full of mutes. It gets lonely at sea.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Are we in King's Landing?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Mm.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You picked the losing side.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Then I'll sail the Iron Fleet somewhere else.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: But first I'm gonna fuck the queen.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Twenty-thousand men, is it?

Name: harry
Subtitles: Yes, Your Grace. A few died in transit.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: They cheated at dice. Or maybe I cheated. Someone cheated. They weren't good fighters. You won't miss them.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Horses?

Name: harry
Subtitles: Two thousand.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: And elephants?

Name: harry
Subtitles: Uh, no elephants, Your Grace.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: That's disappointing. I was told the Golden Company had elephants.

Name: harry
Subtitles: They are excellent beasts, Your Grace, but not well-suited to long sea voyages.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: In any event, you are most welcome here in King's Landing, Captain Strickland.

Name: harry
Subtitles: We look forward to fighting on your behalf, Your Grace.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Am I most welcome here?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You are a true friend of the crown and an honored guest.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Good. As a true friend and an honored guest

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I was hoping we could talk in private.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: After the war. That was our agreement.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Wars sometimes last years.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You want a whore, buy one. You want a queen, earn her.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: How?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I've given her justice, an army, and the Iron Fleet, yet she gives me no sign of affection. My heart is nearly broken.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're insolent. I've executed men for less.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: They were lesser men.

Name: dirah
Subtitles: I hear the dragon burnt up a thousand Lannister men.

Name: crayah
Subtitles: Burnt up some of my favorite boys.

Name: dirah
Subtitles: Archie, was it?

Name: crayah
Subtitles: And William.

Name: dirah
Subtitles: Tall handsome William?

Name: crayah
Subtitles: Yeah, tall handsome William.

Name: dirah
Subtitles: They said what's left of him could fit in a wine glass.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I am the only man you ever met who shot a dragon.

Name: crayah
Subtitles: Did you?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Nearly killed it.

Name: marei
Subtitles: That's brave.

Name: crayah
Subtitles: That boy Eddie.

Name: dirah
Subtitles: The ginger?

Name: crayah
Subtitles: That's him. Came back with his face burnt right off. He's got no eyelids now.

Name: dirah
Subtitles: How does he sleep with no eyelids?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: All right, can we stop talking about the fucking dragons now?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You're kidding me.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Apologies for the interruption, but the queen did urge me to hurry.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Sorry, ladies. Another time perhaps.

Name: crayah
Subtitles: You ever get lonely; I am partial to older gentlemen.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Poor girl. The pox will take her within the year.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Which girl?

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: The queen's brothers made promises to you and broke them. Her Grace wants to rectify their mistake.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: She once gave me a castle and a wife, then rectified me right out of them.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: That was Ser Jaime's doing, not hers. When Queen Cersei wants something, she pays in advance and in gold. Several chests of it, in fact. Waiting for you in a wagon just outside.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: So, she wants to murder someone, but she can't send her soldiers. If it's the Dragon Queen she's after-

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: She has other plans for the Targaryen girl.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Yeah, well, good luck with that.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: Our queen's brothers are unlikely to survive their Northern adventures. But in the event that they do-

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: She has a keen sense of poetic justice.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: That fucking family.

Name: qyburn
Subtitles: When the Citadel expelled me, I thought I would die poor and alone, but in exchange for my service, Queen Cersei made me her Hand. What would she do for the man who rids her of her treasonous brothers?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: I wanted those elephants.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: So, how do I compare to the fat king?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're insulting my late husband?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Are you offended?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: Robert had a different whore every night, but he still didn't know his way around a woman's body.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: And the Kingslayer?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You enjoy risking your neck, don't you?

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Life is boring.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You're not boring, I'll give you that.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: Do I please the queen?

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: You might be the most arrogant man I've ever met. I like that.

Name: cersei lannister
Subtitles: But now I want to be alone.

Name: euron greyjoy
Subtitles: I'm going to put a prince in your belly.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Euron can't defend the Iron Islands, not if he's in King's Landing with all his men and his ships.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: We can take our home back.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: Daenerys went north.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Daenerys will need somewhere to retreat if they can't hold the North. Somewhere the dead can't go.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: You're my queen. I go where you command.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: You want to go to Winterfell. To fight for the Starks. Go. What is dead may never die.

Name: theon greyjoy
Subtitles: What is dead may never die.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: But kill the bastards anyway.

Name: wolkan
Subtitles: Welcome back, my lady. If you'd follow me

Name: varys
Subtitles: The Karstarks.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: One of the better sigils. Beats an onion, anyway.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Can't argue with that.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Not so long ago, the Starks and the Karstarks were slaughtering each other on the battlefield. Jon Snow brought peace to the houses.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And our queen is grateful.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Her gratitude is lovely, but that's not my point. The Northmen are loyal to Jon Snow, not to her. They don't know her. The Free Folk don't know her. I've been up here a while, and I'm telling you, they're stubborn as goats. You want their loyalty, you have to earn it.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I sense that you're leading to a proposal.

Name: davos
Subtitles: A proposal is what I'm proposing. On the off chance that we survive the Night King, what if the Seven Kingdoms, for once in their whole shit history, were ruled by a just woman and an honorable man?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They do make a handsome couple.

Name: varys
Subtitles: You overestimate our influence. Jon and Daenerys don't want to listen to lonely old men.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I'm not that old.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Not as old as him.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Our queen respects the wisdom of age.

Name: varys
Subtitles: Of course she does. Respect is how the young keep us at a distance, so we don't remind them of an unpleasant truth.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What is that?

Name: varys
Subtitles: Nothing lasts.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Your sister doesn't like me.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She doesn't know you. If it makes you feel any better, she didn't like me either when we were growing up.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: She doesn't need to be my friend but I am her queen. If she can't respect me-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: How many today?

Name: dothraki man
Subtitles: Only eighteen goats and eleven sheep.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What's the matter?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The dragons are barely eating.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What's wrong with them?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: They don't like the North.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Go on.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't know how to ride a dragon.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Nobody does. Until they ride a dragon.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What if he doesn't want me to?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Then I've enjoyed your company, Jon Snow.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What do I hold onto?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Whatever you can.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You've completely ruined horses for me.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We could stay a thousand years-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: No one would find us.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We'd be pretty old.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It's cold up here for a southern girl.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So keep your queen warm.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Don't be afraid.

Name: man
Subtitles: Gendry?

Name: man
Subtitles: He's here.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It isn't easy making a blade that big with dragonglass.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You're saying you're good, is that it?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'm just saying it's a tricky material to-

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You know who makes weapons for the wildlings? Cripples and cocksuckers. Which one are you?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Leave him be.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: I heard you were here. You left me to die.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: First I robbed you.

Name: sandor
Subtitles: You're a cold little bitch, aren't you? Guess that's why you're still alive.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: That was a nice ax you made for him. You've gotten better.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Yeah, thanks. So have you.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I mean, you look good.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Thanks. So do you.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It's not a bad place to grow up, if it wasn't so cold.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Stay close to that forge, then.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Is that a command, Lady Stark?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Don't call me that.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: As you wish, milady.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Here's my wish.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Can you make it?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: What do you need something like this for?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Can you make it or not?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: You already have a sword. What's that?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It's Valyrian steel. I always knew you were just another rich girl.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You don't know any other rich girls.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Come in.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Lord Glover wishes us good fortune, but he's staying in Deepwood Motte with his men.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: House Glover will stand behind House Stark as we have for a thousand years." Isn't that what he said?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I will stand behind Jon Snow," he said.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: The King in the North.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I told you we needed allies.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You didn't tell me you were going to abandon your crown.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I never wanted a crown. All I wanted was to protect the North. I brought two armies home with me, two dragons.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: And a Targaryen queen.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you think we can beat the Army of the Dead without her? I fought them, Sansa. Twice. You want to worry about who holds what title, I'm telling you it doesn't matter. Without her, we don't stand a chance.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Do you have any faith in me at all?

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You know I do.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: She'll be a good queen. For all of us. She's not her father.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: No, she's much prettier.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Did you bend the knee to save the North or because you love her?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Oh!

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So you're the man?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Um. Which man am I, Your Grace?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: The one who saved Ser Jorah when no one else could.

Name: jorah mormont
Subtitles: They could, they just wouldn't.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I'll have to make some changes in the Citadel when I take my throne. A great service merits a great reward.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Oh, it's my honor to serve you, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Well, there must be something I could give you.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: If it's not too much trouble, I could use a pardon.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: For what crime?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Um, I borrowed a few books from the Citadel.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: And also a sword.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: From the Citadel?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: From my family. It's been in House Tarly for generations.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: It wouldo ve been mine anyway, eventually, but my father had other ideas.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not Randyll Tarly?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You know him?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I offered to let him retain his lands and titles if he bent the knee. He refused.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Well At least I'll be allowed home again, now that my brother's the lord.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Your brother stood with your father.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Hm. Thank you, Your Grace. For telling me. And m- may I?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Of course.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: What are you doing out here?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Waiting, for an old friend. It's time to tell Jon the truth.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No, no. You're his brother. Shouldn't you tell him?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm not his brother. He trusts you more than anyone. Now's the time.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Sam?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I'm sorry, I know I'm not supposed to be down here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Were you hiding from me?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Of course not.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What are you doing in Winterfell? Or did you read every book in the Citadel already?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What's wrong? Gilly? Is she all right?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: She's good.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Little Sam?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Don't you know?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Know what?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Daenerys. She executed my father and brother. They were her prisoners.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: She didn't tell you.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm so sorry. We need to end this war.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Would you have done it?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Well, I've executed men who disobeyed me.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: You've also spared men. Thousands of wildlings when they refused to kneel.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I wasn't a king.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: But you were. You've always been.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I gave up my crown, Sam.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I bent the knee. I'm not King in the North anymore.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: I'm not talking about the King in the North. I'm talking about the King of the bloody Seven Kingdoms.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Bran and I worked it out. I had a High Septon's diary. Bran had whatever Bran has.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: What are you talking about?

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: Your mother was Lyanna Stark.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: And your father- your real father was Rhaegar Targaryen. You've never been a bastard. You're Aegon Targaryen, true heir to the Iron Throne. I'm sorry, I know it's a lot to take in.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: My father was the most honorable man I ever met. You're saying he lied to me all my life.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: No. Your father- Well, Ned Stark. He promised your mother he'd always protect you. And he did. Robert would have murdered you if he knew. You're the true king. Aegon Targaryen, Sixth of His Name, Protector of the Realm, all of it.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Daenerys is our queen.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: She shouldn't be.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: That's treason.

Name: sam tarly
Subtitles: It's the truth. You gave up your crown to save your people. Would she do the same?

Name: edd
Subtitles: Stay back, he's got blue eyes!

Name: tormund
Subtitles: I've always had blue eyes!

Name: beric
Subtitles: Did you find anyone?

Name: edd
Subtitles: The Umber boy.

Name: beric
Subtitles: It's a message. From the Night King.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: His army's between us and Winterfell. We're on foot.

Name: edd
Subtitles: We rode down from Castle Black. We can double up on the horses.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: If the horses last, we'll get there before the dead.

Name: tormund
Subtitles: We just have to hope the Night King doesn't come first-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: When I was a child, my brother would tell me a bedtime story about the man who murdered our father.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Who stabbed him in the back and cut his throat. Who sat down on the Iron Throne and watched as his blood poured onto the floor.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: He told me other stories as well. About all the things we would do to that man once we took back the Seven Kingdoms and had him in our grasp.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Your sister pledged to send her army north.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She did.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: I don't see an army. I see one man, with one hand. It appears your sister lied to me.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She lied to me as well. She never had any intention of sending her army north.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She has Euron Greyjoy's fleet and 20,000 fresh troops. The Golden Company from Essos, bought and paid for. Even if we defeat the dead, she'll have more than enough to destroy the survivors.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: We"?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I promised to fight for the living. I intend to keep that promise.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace, I know my brother-

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Like you knew your sister?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He came here alone, knowing full well how he'd be received. Why would he do that if he weren't telling the truth?

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Perhaps he trusts his little brother to defend him, right up to the moment he slits my throat.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You're right. We can't trust him. He attacked my father in the streets. He tried to destroy my house and my family, the same as he did yours.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Do you want me to apologize? I won't. We were at war. Everything I did, I did for my house and my family. I'd do it all again.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: The things we do for love.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: So why have you abandoned your house and family now?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Because this goes beyond loyalty.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: This is about survival.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: You don't know me well, Your Grace.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: But I know Ser Jaime. He is a man of honor. I was his captor once. But when we were both taken prisoner and the men holding us tried to force themselves on me, Ser Jaime defended me. And lost his hand because of it.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Without him, my lady, you would not be alive. He armed me, armored me, and sent me to find you and bring you home because he'd sworn an oath to your mother.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You vouch for him?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I do.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: You would fight beside him?

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I would.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I trust you with my life. If you trust him with yours, we should let him stay.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: What does the Warden of the North say about it?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: We need every man we can get.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Very well.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Thank you, Your Grace.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Either you knew Cersei was lying and let me believe otherwise, or you didn't know at all. Which makes you either a traitor or a fool.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I was a fool.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Not for the first time.

Name: daenerys targaryen
Subtitles: Cersei still sits on the throne. If you can't help me take it back, I'll find another Hand who can.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I suspect one of you will be wearing this before it's all over.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Don't you have something better to do?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You make my weapon yet?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Just as soon as I'm done making a few thousand of these.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You should make mine first. And make sure it's stronger than this.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It's strong enough.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: It's going to be safer down in the crypt, you know.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Are you going to be down in the crypt?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: No, but-

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: But you're a fighter.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I've done my share.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: You've fought them?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I did. Some of them.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: How many?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: A few. That was enough.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What are they like?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Bad. Really bad.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Really bad"?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Even a smith's apprentice can do better than "really bad." What do they look like? What do they smell like? How do they move? How hard are they to kill?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Look, I know you want to fight. And I know you're not scared of rapers or murderers or-This is different. This is-this is death. You want to know what they're like? Death. That's what they're like.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I know Death.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: He's got many faces.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I look forward to seeing this one.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: My weapon?

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: I'll get right on it.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm sorry for what I did to you.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You weren't sorry then. You were protecting your family.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm not that person anymore.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You still would be, if you hadn't pushed me out of that window. And I would still be Brandon Stark.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're not?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: No. I'm something else now.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're not angry at me.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm not angry at anyone.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Why didn't you tell them?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You won't be able to help us in this fight if I let them murder you first.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What about afterwards?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: How do you know there is an afterwards?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Well, here we are.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Yes, here we are.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Together again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: And the masses rejoice.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: How do they feel about their new queen?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She's your new queen too.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: They remember what happened the last time Targaryens brought dragons north. They'll come around once they see Daenerys is different.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: And she is? Different?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She is.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: You're sure about her?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I am.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She didn't seem sure about you.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: It's hard to blame her. I made a mistake common to clever people. I underestimated my opponents.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Hmm.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Cersei told me the pregnancy had changed her. A chance for you both to start again. And I believed her.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Was she lying about the baby too?

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: No, that part is real.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: She's always been good at using the truth to tell lies. I wouldn't be too hard on yourself. She's fooled me more than anybody.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: What?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: She never fooled you. You always knew exactly what she was, and you loved her anyway.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: So we're going to die at Winterfell. Not the death I wouldo ve chosen. I always pictured myself dying in my own bed, the age of 80, with a belly full of wine and-

Name: both
Subtitles: A girl's mouth around-

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Your cock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: My cock.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: At least Cersei won't get to murder me. I'm sure I'll feel some satisfaction denying her that pleasure while I'm being ripped apart by dead men.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Maybe after I'm dead I'll march down to King's Landing and rip her apart.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Ser Jaime.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: Lady Brienne.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: He's come a long way.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: He's alright. Still has a lot to learn.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: I'm sure you'll teach him. I've been told you're commanding the left flank.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I am. It's, uh-it's good ground.

Name: jaime lannister
Subtitles: It is.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: The rise, it should give us some advantage.

Name: brienne

Subtitles: What unites people? Armies? Gold? Flags? Stories. There's nothing in the world more powerful than a good story. Nothing can stop it. No enemy can defeat it. And who has a better story than Bran the Broken? The boy who fell from a high tower and lived. He knew he'd never walk again, so he learned to fly. He crossed beyond the Wall, a crippled boy, and became the Three-Eyed Raven. He is our memory, the keeper of all our stories. The wars, weddings, births, massacres, famines. Our triumphs... mm, our defeats, our past. Who better to lead us into the future?
ners: [set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'bran'}, set(), set(), {'the'}, set(), set(), set(), set()]

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Bran has no interest in ruling and he can't father children.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good. Sons of kings can be cruel and stupid, as you well know. His will never torment us. That is the wheel our queen wanted to break.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: From now on, rulers will not be born. They will be chosen on this spot by the lords and ladies of Westeros to serve the realm.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I know you don't want it. I know you don't care about power. But I ask you now, if we choose you will you wear the crown? Will you lead the Seven Kingdoms to the best of your abilities from this day until your last day?

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Why do you think I came all this way?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: To Brandon of House Stark... I say aye.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: edmure
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: riverlands lord
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: yohn royce
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: maester wolkan
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: robin
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: dornish prince
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: yara greyjoy
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: ironborn lord
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: vale lord
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: gendry baratheon
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: davos
Subtitles: I'm not sure I get a vote, but aye.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Aye.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I love you, little brother. I always will. You'll be a good king. But tens of thousands of Northmen fell in the Great War defending all of Westeros. And those who survived have seen too much and fought too hard ever to kneel again. The North will remain an independent kingdom, as it was for thousands of years.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: All hail Bran the Broken, First of His Name, King of the Andals and the First Men, Lord of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm.

Name: all
Subtitles: All hail Bran the Broken!

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Lord Tyrion, you will be my Hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: N- No, Your Grace, I don't want it.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: And I don't want to be king.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I don't deserve it. I thought I was wise, but I wasn't. I thought I knew what was right, but I didn't. Choose Ser Davos. Choose anyone else.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I choose you.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: You cannot.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Yes, I can. I'm king.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: This man is a criminal. He deserves justice.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: He just got it. He's made many terrible mistakes. He's going to spend the rest of his life fixing them.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: It is not enough.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Giving you to the Unsullied would start a war. Letting you walk free would start a war. So our new king has chosen to send you to the Night's Watch.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: There's still a Night's Watch?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: The world will always need a home for bastards and broken men.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: You shall take no wife, hold no lands, father no children. The Unsullied wanted your head of course, but Grey Worm has accepted the justice of a life sentence. Sansa and Arya wanted you freed, but they understand our new king needs to make peace. No one is very happy. Which means it's a good compromise, I suppose.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Was it right? What I did?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What we did.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: It doesn't feel right.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ask me again in ten years.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I don't expect we'll ever see each other again.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I wouldn't be so sure. A few years as Hand of the King would make anyone want to piss off the edge of the world.

Name: unsullied captain
Subtitles: All the men have boarded.

Name: grey worm
Subtitles: Good. We sail for the isle of Naath.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: I wish there had been another way. Can you forgive me?

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: The North is free, thanks to you.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: But they lost their king.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Ned Stark's daughter will speak for them. She's the best they could ask for.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You can come see me, you know, at Castle Black.

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I can't.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You think anyone will dare tell you women aren't allowed?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: I'm not going back north.

Name: sansa stark
Subtitles: Where are you going?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: What's west of Westeros?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: No one knows. It's where all the maps stop. That's where I'm going.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: You have your Needle?

Name: arya stark
Subtitles: Right here.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: jon snow
Subtitles: I'm sorry I wasn't there when you needed me.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: You were exactly where you were supposed to be.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: That's not- Uh-

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: What's this?

Name: sam
Subtitles: A Song of Ice and Fire. Archmaester Ebrose's history of the wars following the death of King Robert. I helped him with the title.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I suppose I come in for some heavy criticism.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Oh, I wouldn't say that.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Oh, he's kind to me. Never wouldo ve guessed.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He's not kind?

Name: sam
Subtitles: He-

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: He what? What does he say about me?

Name: sam
Subtitles: I don't believe you're mentioned, ahem.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Your Grace.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: We appear to be missing a Master of Whisperers. And a Master of Laws. And a Master of War.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Yes, Your Grace. Suitable prospects will be brought to you for an audience in the coming weeks.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: And Drogon? Any word?

Name: sam
Subtitles: He was last spotted flying east, toward-

Name: bronn
Subtitles: The farther away, the better.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: Perhaps I can find him. Do carry on with the rest.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: As you wish, Your Grace.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Ser Podrick.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: We serve at your pleasure, King Bran the Broken, ruler of the Six Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm. Long may he reign.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Long may he reign.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Long may he reign.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: Long may he reign.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Long may he reign.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: That will improve.

Name: bran stark
Subtitles: I'm sure it will.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Ser Bronn of the Blackwater, Lord of Highgarden, Lord Paramount of the Reach and Master of Coin, would you say the crown's debt to you has been paid?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: In full, my lord Hand.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Good. Time to start incurring a new one. We have hungry people to feed. Can we expect some assistance in this regard?

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Indeed we can.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Lord Davos, we have an armada to rebuild and ports to repair.

Name: davos
Subtitles: We have. These projects will begin as soon as the Master of Coin and Lord of Lofty Titles provides funding.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: The Master of Coin looks forward to helping the Master of Ships, but first he has to ensure we're not wasting coin, or soon there won't be no more coin.

Name: davos
Subtitles: Any more.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: You Master of Grammar now too?

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Grandmaester, ahem, it is my theory, based on my years of work on the Casterly Rock sewers, that clean water leads to a healthier population.

Name: sam
Subtitles: The Archmaester has done some research on this subject and it turns out-

Name: bronn
Subtitles: The strong live and the weak don't.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: Find the best builders and set them to the task.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Oh, speaking of builders, all the best brothels burned down. The Master of Coin is willing to fund reconstruction.

Name: sam
Subtitles: Uh... the Archmaester is less than enthusiastic about the salutary effects of brothels.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: Well, I imagine he isn't using them properly.

Name: brienne
Subtitles: I think we can all agree that ships take precedence over brothels.

Name: bronn
Subtitles: I think that's a very presumptuous statement.

Name: tyrion lannister
Subtitles: I once brought a jackass and a honeycomb into a brothel.

Name: man
Subtitles: The Queen in the North!

Name: all
Subtitles: The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North! The Queen in the North!
